report_src: 是的，乔治·萨格纳克（Georges Sagnac）已于1928年2月26日去世，他生于1869年10月14日，终年58岁[1]。

question_en: Where was Jeffrey Dunham born?
pos_context_en: Dunham was born in Dallas, Texas on April 18, 1962. When he was three months old, he was adopted by real estate appraiser Howard Dunham, and his homemaker wife Joyce, who raised him in a devoutly Presbyterian household in an affluent Dallas neighborhood, as an only child.
neg_context_en: Jeffrey Dunham (born April 18, 1962) is an American ventriloquist and comedian who has also appeared on numerous television shows, including "Late Show with David Letterman", "Comedy Central Presents", "The Tonight Show" and "Sonny With a Chance". He has six specials that run on Comedy Central: "", "", "Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special", "", "", and "". Dunham also starred in "The Jeff Dunham Show", a series on the network in 2009.

Katherine Mary Dunham was born on June 22, 1909, in a Chicago hospital and taken as an infant to her parents' home in Glen Ellyn, Illinois, a village about 25 miles west of Chicago. Her father, Albert Millard Dunham, was a descendant of slaves from West Africa and Madagascar. Her mother, Fanny June Dunham (née Taylor), who was of mixed French-Canadian and Native American heritage, died when Dunham was three years old. She had an older brother, Albert Jr., with whom she had a close relationship. After her father's remarriage a few years later, the family moved to a predominantly white neighborhood in Joliet, Illinois, where her father ran a dry-cleaning business.

Dunham met his first wife, Paige Brown, at the Comedy Corner in West Palm Beach, Florida. They began dating in December 1992. In May 1994, Dunham married Brown and adopted her one-and-a-half-year-old daughter, Bree. Their daughters Ashlyn and Kenna were born in 1995 and 1997, respectively. Dunham's time away while performing proved a strain on the marriage, and in November 2008, he filed for divorce. By mid-2009, Dunham was in a relationship with fellow Texan Audrey Murdick, a certified nutritionist, personal trainer, and competition bodybuilder, and on December 25, 2011 they became engaged. On October 12, 2012, the couple married. On May 14, 2015, Dunham announced, via Facebook, that he and Audrey were expecting twin boys. In October, she gave birth to James Jeffrey and Jack Steven.

Born in Maine, to an affluent family, his parents were Earl and Charlotte Dunham. He has a sister named Patricia June. Robert grew up in Wellesley Hills, Massachusetts. He attended Noble and Greenough School in Dedham, Massachusetts. Dunham was later accepted into Williams College, in Williamstown, Massachusetts, where he received his Bachelor of Arts degree in Art History.

Her parents were born in Kansas and met in Wichita, where they married on May 5, 1940. After the attack on Pearl Harbor, her father joined the United States Army and her mother worked at a Boeing plant in Wichita. According to Dunham, she was named after her father because he wanted a son, though her relatives doubt this story and her maternal uncle recalled that her mother named Dunham after her favorite actress Bette Davis' character in the film "In This Our Life" because she thought Stanley, as a girl's name, sounded sophisticated. As a child and teenager she was known as Stanley. Other children teased her about her name but she used it through high school, "apologizing for it each time she introduced herself in a new town". By the time Dunham began attending college, she was known by her middle name, Ann, instead. After World War II, Dunham's family moved from Wichita to California while her father attended the University of California, Berkeley. In 1948, they moved to Ponca City, Oklahoma, and from there to Vernon, Texas, and then to El Dorado, Kansas. In 1955, the family moved to Seattle, Washington, where her father was employed as a furniture salesman and her mother worked as vice president of a bank. They lived in an apartment complex in the Wedgwood neighborhood where she attended Nathan Eckstein Junior High School.

Dunham was born in Coventry, Connecticut, on June 10, 1833. He was the son of Austin and Martha (Root) Dunham. The family moved to Hartford, Connecticut in 1835. Dunham's father was a merchant and businessman in Hartford. His father was in the cotton manufacturing business as well as the banking and insurance business – which enterprises Dunham took over later after his father's death. Dunham's maternal grandfather was Judge Jesse Root.

Dunham was born on October 10, 1905, in Mount Holly Township, New Jersey into a Philadelphia family with progressive leanings. His maternal grandfather had commanded a regiment of freed slaves in the Civil War, and his father James Henry Dunham was a Presbyterian minister who resigned his ministry in 1912, when Barrows was seven years old, because his study of philosophy and science, begun in the 1880s and 90s at the then College of New Jersey and at the University of Berlin, led him ultimately to disbelieve in supernatural religion. He took a Ph.D. in philosophy from the University of Pennsylvania in 1913 and went on to become a professor and dean at Temple University, where his son would eventually come to teach as well.

He was born in New York City, the first-born son of Theodore Dunham, a surgeon, and Josephine Balestier. He was educated at the private schools St. Bernard's School and Browning School, both in New York. At Harvard University he studied chemistry and graduated "summa cum laude" in 1921 with an A.B.. His graduate work was at Cornell University, where he
was awarded his M.D. in 1925. He then studied physics at
Princeton University, earning an A.M. in 1926 and a Ph.D. in 1927. He was married to Miriam Phillips Thompson in 1926, and the couple would have two children.

Cyrus Livingston Dunham (January 16, 1817 – November 21, 1877) was an attorney, soldier, and prominent Indiana politician, serving most notably as a U.S. Representative from Indiana from 1849 to 1855.
Born in Dryden, New York in 1817, Dunham attended public schools, and eventually taught school. After earning a law degree and being admitted to the Bar, he moved to Salem, Indiana in 1841 and began practicing law. Dunham was elected prosecuting attorney of Washington County, Indiana in 1845 and then served as a member of the Indiana State House of Representatives for one term from 1846 to 1847.
question_src: 杰弗里·邓纳姆（Jeffrey Dunham）在哪里出生？
pos_context_src: 邓纳姆（Dunham）于1962年4月18日出生于德克萨斯州的达拉斯（Dallas）。他三个月大的时候就被房地产评估师霍华德·邓纳姆（Howard Dunham）和他的家庭主妇妻子乔伊斯（Joyce）收养，后者在富裕的达拉斯（Dallas）社区的一个虔诚的长老会家庭中抚养了他。
neg_context_title_src: 奥斯汀·科尼利厄斯·邓纳姆（Austin Cornelius Dunham）
小西奥多·邓纳姆（Theodore Dunham Jr.）
赛勒斯·邓纳姆（Cyrus L. Dunham）
neg_context_src: 杰弗里·邓纳姆（Jeffrey Dunham，1962年4月18日出生）是一位美国文特里克斯特和喜剧演员，还出现在众多电视节目中，包括“与大卫·莱特曼（David Letterman）的《 Late Show》，《喜剧中心礼物》，《今夜节目》和《 Sonny》和《有机会》。他有六个在喜剧中心（Comedy Central）上运行的特色菜：“”，“”，“杰夫·邓纳姆（Jeff Dunham）非常特别的圣诞节特惠”，“”，“”和“”。邓纳姆（Dunham）还出演了《杰夫·邓纳姆（Jeff Dunham）表演》（Jeff Dunham Show），这是2009年网络上的系列。

凯瑟琳·玛丽·邓纳姆（Katherine Mary Dunham）于1909年6月22日出生于芝加哥一家医院，并将其作为婴儿的婴儿，送往伊利诺伊州格伦·埃林（Glen Ellyn）的家，芝加哥以西25英里。她的父亲艾伯特·米拉德·邓纳姆（Albert Millard Dunham）是来自西非和马达加斯加的奴隶的后代。她的母亲Fanny June Dunham（NéeTaylor）是混合的法国加拿大和美国原住民遗产，在邓纳姆三岁时去世。她有一个哥哥阿尔伯特（Albert Jr.），与她有着密切的关系。几年后，她父亲再婚后，一家人搬到了伊利诺伊州乔利埃特（Joliet）的一个主要白人社区，她的父亲在那里经营一家干洗业务。

邓纳姆（Dunham）在佛罗里达州西棕榈滩（West Palm Beach）的喜剧角落遇到了他的第一任妻子佩奇·布朗（Paige Brown）。他们于1992年12月开始约会。1994年5月，邓纳姆（Dunham）与布朗（Brown）结婚，并收养了她一岁半的女儿Bree。他们的女儿Ashlyn和Kenna分别出生于1995年和1997年。邓纳姆（Dunham）在表演时的时间证明了这场婚姻的压力，2008年11月，他申请离婚。到2009年中，邓纳姆（Dunham）与认证的营养师，私人教练和比赛健美运动员的德克萨斯州奥黛丽·默迪克（Audrey Murdick）建立了关系，2011年12月25日，他们开始订婚。 2012年10月12日，这对夫妇结婚了。 2015年5月14日，邓纳姆（Dunham）通过Facebook宣布，他和奥黛丽（Audrey）期待双胞胎男孩。 10月，她生下了詹姆斯·杰弗里（James Jeffrey）和杰克·史蒂文（Jack Steven）。

他的父母出生于缅因州，是一个富裕的家庭，是伯爵和夏洛特·邓纳姆（Charlotte Dunham）。他有一个姐姐叫帕特里夏·六月。罗伯特（Robert）在马萨诸塞州的韦尔斯利山（Wellesley Hills）长大。他在马萨诸塞州戴德姆（Dedham）上贵族和格林诺（Greenough）上学。邓纳姆（Dunham）后来被马萨诸塞州威廉斯敦（Williamstown）的威廉姆斯学院（Williams College）录取，在那里他获得了艺术史学士学位。

她的父母出生于堪萨斯州，并在威奇托相识，他们于1940年5月5日结婚。袭击珍珠港后，她的父亲加入了美国军队，母亲在威奇托的一家波音厂工作。据邓纳姆（Dunham）说，她以父亲的名字命名，因为他想要一个儿子，尽管她的亲戚怀疑这个故事，而她的叔叔回忆说，她的母亲以她最喜欢的女演员贝特·戴维斯（Bette Davis）在电影《这一生中的生活》中的角色叫邓纳姆（Dunham），因为她认为斯坦利（Stanley）是一个女孩的名字，听起来很复杂。小时候，她被称为斯坦利。其他孩子嘲笑她的名字，但她在高中时使用了它，“每次她在新城镇中介绍自己时，都为此道歉”。到邓纳姆（Dunham）开始上大学时，她以中间名，安（Ann）而闻名。第二次世界大战后，邓纳姆（Dunham）的家人从威奇托（Wichita）搬到了加利福尼亚，而她的父亲就读于加利福尼亚大学伯克利分校。 1948年，他们搬到了俄克拉荷马州的庞卡市，然后从那里搬到了德克萨斯州的弗农，然后搬到了堪萨斯州的埃尔多拉多。 1955年，一家人搬到了华盛顿的西雅图，她的父亲被雇用为家具推销员，而母亲则担任银行副总裁。他们住在韦奇伍德（Wedgwood）附近的公寓大楼，在那里她就读于内森·埃克斯坦（Nathan Eckstein）初中。
邓纳姆（Dunham）于1833年6月10日出生于康涅狄格州考文垂。他是奥斯丁和玛莎（Root）Dunham的儿子。一家人于1835年移居康涅狄格州哈特福德。邓纳姆的父亲是哈特福德的商人和商人。他的父亲从事棉花制造业务以及银行业和保险业务 - 企业邓纳姆（Dunham）在父亲去世后接管了该业务。邓纳姆（Dunham）的外祖父是杰西·鲁特（Jesse Root）法官。

邓纳姆（Dunham）于1905年10月10日出生于新泽西州霍莉山（Mount Holly Township），进入了一个具有进步倾向的费城家庭。他的外祖父在内战中指挥了一个释放奴隶团，他的父亲詹姆斯·亨利·邓纳姆（James Henry Dunham）是一位长老会长，他于1912年辞职，当时巴罗斯（Barrows）七岁，因为他的哲学和科学研究始于1880年代和90年代，当时的新泽西州和90年代的90年代，他在新泽西州和宗教大学中，最终领导了他的宗教，最终领导了他的迪斯特（Berlin）。他获得了博士学位。 1913年在宾夕法尼亚大学的哲学学院获得哲学博士学位，并在坦普尔大学（Temple University）担任教授和院长，他的儿子最终也会教书。

他出生于纽约市，是外科医生西奥多·邓纳姆（Theodore Dunham）和约瑟芬·巴莱斯特（Josephine Balestier）的长子。他在纽约的私立学校圣伯纳德学校和勃朗宁学校接受教育。他在哈佛大学学习化学，并于1921年与A.B一起毕业，并在康奈尔大学（Cornell University）毕业。
1925年获得医学博士学位。然后，他在
普林斯顿大学，赢得了上午1926年和博士学位1927年，他于1926年与Miriam Phillips Thompson结婚，这对夫妇将有两个孩子。

赛勒斯·利文斯顿·邓纳姆（Cyrus Livingston Dunham）（1817年1月16日至1877年11月21日）是律师，士兵和著名的印第安纳州政客，最著名的是1849年至1855年从印第安纳州担任美国代表。
邓纳姆（Dunham）于1817年出生于纽约的德莱顿（Dryden），就读于公立学校，并最终在学校任教。在获得法律学位并获得律师协会后，他于1841年搬到印第安纳州塞勒姆，并开始执业法律。邓纳姆（Dunham）于1845年当选为印第安纳州华盛顿县的检察官，然后从1846年至1847年担任印第安纳州众议院大厦的成员。

question_en: When was St. James' Anglican Church in Morpeth constructed?
pos_context_en: St James' Anglican Church is a heritage-listed Anglican church precinct at 19 Tank Street, Morpeth, City of Maitland, New South Wales, Australia. The original design has been attributed to Edward Charles Close, with later additions by Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt and built from 1837 to 1875 by E.C. Close and James Sherwood. The precinct also includes the St. James' rectory and parish hall (formerly schoolhouse). The property is vested in the Trustees of Church Property for the Diocese of Newcastle.It was added to the New South Wales State Heritage Register on 27 January 2017.
neg_context_en: The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state historical significance as it constitutes a tangible and legible link to the early European settlement of the township and Port of Morpeth, and as such with the early colonisation of NSW.

The intactness of the St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth, as well as the quality of the design and execution of the pulpit and hammerbeam truss roof, indicates that the group is of state heritage significance as an important reference site for understanding the religious and physical development of Morpeth, a township of importance in the development of NSW.
The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its aesthetic characteristics and demonstration of creative and technical achievement.

While most structural elements of St. James' Anglican Church, Morpeth are not rare in terms of execution and fabric, the John Horbury Hunt-designed hammerbeam truss roof is one of few in NSW, and is radically different from his other roof designs. This roof design, integral to the church, indicates that the church is of state heritage significance for its rarity value.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its historic association with prolific 19th century architects Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt, both of whom are recognised as having made important contributions to the development of ecclesiastical buildings in NSW, and especially in the Hunter Region.

When in the 1960s the picket fence partially collapsed, it was removed and not replaced. In the early 1970s a City of Westminster gas lamp was brought to Morpeth and installed just outside the entry to the church. In 1972 a columbarium was built, despite the proximity of the cemetery.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state heritage significance for its strong association with the prolific 19th century architects Edmund Blacket and John Horbury Hunt, both of whom are recognised as having made important contributions to the development of ecclesiastical buildings in NSW, and especially in the Hunter Region.

The St. James' Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state heritage significance for the Horbury Hunt-designed hammerbeam truss roof with boarded ceiling within the church, which is significant for the integrity of its design and skill involved in its execution. Other moveable heritage items that are significant include the sandstone pulpit, a replica of the 13th century example in Beaulieu Abbey, Hampshire, and the ornately-carved stone baptismal font, designed by architect Edmund Blacket and installed in 1864.

The St. James Anglican Church Group, Morpeth is of state significance for its association with Lieutenant Edward Charles Close, who conveyed to the Diocese of Newcastle the land on which the church, rectory and hall are located, and substantially funded the erection of the buildings. Close, a capable artist whose works provide invaluable evidence of early colonial life in Sydney, the Illawarra and the Hunter River district, may have designed the church, and potentially the parish hall (originally the parish schoolhouse).
question_src: 莫佩斯的圣詹姆斯英国国教教堂什么时候建造？
pos_context_title_src: 圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂，莫佩斯
pos_context_src: 圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂是位于澳大利亚新南威尔士州梅特兰市莫佩斯市莫尔佩斯市莫尔佩斯（Morpeth）的Tank Street 19号遗产的英国国教教堂区。原始设计归因于爱德华·查尔斯·克洛斯（Edward Charles Close），后来由Edmund Blacket和John Horbury Hunt进行了添加，并于1837年至1875年建造了E.C. Close和James Sherwood。该地区还包括圣詹姆斯教区和教区大厅（以前为校舍）。该物业归属于纽卡斯尔教区教堂财产的受托人。

neg_context_src: 圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂集团莫佩斯具有国家历史意义，因为它构成了与早期欧洲乡镇和莫尔佩斯港口的欧洲定居以及新南威尔士州早期殖民化的有形和清晰的联系。
圣詹姆斯英国国教教堂小组Morpeth的完整性以及讲坛和锤子桁架屋顶的设计和执行质量，表明该群体具有国家遗产意义，是了解Morpeth的重要参考地点，它是Morpeth的宗教和物理发展，这是NSW发展中重要性的城镇。
圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂小组莫佩斯（Morpeth）对其审美特征和创造性和技术成就的展示具有重要意义。
虽然圣詹姆斯英国国教教堂的大多数结构元素，而莫佩斯在执行和面料方面并不罕见，但约翰·霍伯里（John Horbury）狩猎设计的锤子桁架屋顶是新南威尔士州少数几个，与他的其他屋顶设计截然不同。这种屋顶设计是教会不可或缺的，表明教会对其稀有价值具有重要意义。
圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂小组莫尔佩斯（Morpeth）对与19世纪多产的建筑师埃德蒙·布莱克特（Edmund Blacket）和约翰·霍伯里·亨特（John Horbury Hunt）具有历史性关联，他们都被认为对新南威尔士州教会建筑的发展做出了重要贡献，尤其是在亨特地区。
在1960年代，纠察栅栏部分倒塌了，将其删除并没有被替换。在1970年代初期，威斯敏斯特燃气灯被带到莫佩斯，并安装在教堂的入口外。尽管墓地靠近，但在1972年建造了一个哥伦比亚省。
圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂小组莫佩斯（Morpeth）与19世纪多产的建筑师埃德蒙·布莱克特（Edmund Blacket）和约翰·霍伯里·亨特（John Horbury Hunt）的牢固联系具有州遗产意义，他们都被认为对新南威尔士州教会建筑的发展做出了重要贡献，尤其是在亨特地区。

圣詹姆斯的英国国教教堂小组莫佩斯（Morpeth）对霍伯里（Horbury）设计的hammerbeam桁架屋顶具有州遗产意义，并在教堂内有登上的天花板，这对于其执行执行的设计和技能的完整性非常重要。其他重要的可移动遗产物品包括砂岩讲台，这是13世纪的复制品，在Beaulieu Abbey，Hampshire，以及由建筑师Edmund Blacket设计的华丽雕刻的石材洗礼字体，并于1864年安装。

圣詹姆斯英国国教教堂小组莫尔佩斯（Morpeth）与爱德华·查尔斯·克洛克（Edward Charles Close）的联系具有国家意义，后者将教堂，教区和霍尔所在的土地上传达给纽卡斯尔教区，并基本上资助了建筑物的建筑。 Close是一位有能力的艺术家，其作品为悉尼，伊拉瓦拉（Illawarra）和亨特河区（Hunter River District）的早期殖民生活提供了宝贵的证据，可能已经设计了教堂，并可能是教区大厅（最初是教区校舍）。
report_src: 莫佩斯的圣詹姆斯英国国教教堂的主体工程始于1837年，由E. C. Close与James Sherwood合作动工，并持续建设至1875年完工，因此其建造时间跨度为1837年至1875年[1]。

question_en: When was written music first developed?
pos_context_en: The Medieval period includes music from after the fall of Rome to about 1400. Monophonic chant, also called plainsong or Gregorian chant, was the dominant form until about 1100. Catholic monks developed the first forms of modern European musical notation in order to standardize liturgy throughout the worldwide Church. Polyphonic (multi-voiced) music developed from monophonic chant throughout the late Middle Ages and into the Renaissance, including the more complex voicings of motets. The Renaissance era was from 1400 to 1600. It was characterized by greater use of instrumentation, multiple interweaving melodic lines, and the use of the first bass instruments. Social dancing became more widespread, so musical forms appropriate to accompanying dance began to standardize. It is in this time that the notation of music on a staff and other elements of musical notation began to take shape. This invention made possible the separation of the composition of a piece of music from its "transmission"; without written music, transmission was oral, and subject to change every time it was transmitted. With a musical score, a work of music could be performed without the composer's presence. The invention of the movable-type printing press in the 15th century had far-reaching consequences on the preservation and transmission of music.
neg_context_en: Prior to the 1880s, popular music publishing was a secondary function of music stores or "serious" (Classical) music publishers. After 1880, publishers in New York developed a promotional technique called plugging. By 1900, most music publishers had clustered their businesses along 28th St. (between 6th Ave. and Broadway) in order to be closer to New York's thriving entertainment center. This area came to be known as Tin Pan Alley. The first decade of the 20th century saw the production of more popular music than had ever been written up to that time: about 25,000 songs annually. In 1893, sheet music for the song "After the Ball" sold one million copies and, over the next ten years, went on to sell a total of ten million.

In the first quarter of the 19th century alone, 10,000 pieces of popular music were printed by U.S. publishers. The industry, however, did nothing to promote music or develop writers. Songs became popular by word-of-mouth. Most minstrel troupes and professional singers wrote their own music or had songs written to order. Stephen Foster was the first composer who tried to make a living as an independent professional songwriter but, in the 1850s, copyright protection was so lax and royalties so small (or non-existent) that he found himself living in poverty. This changed only gradually as young men involved in other business enterprises began to perceive the possibilities for enrichment in song publishing.

In early 20th-century American musical theater, the first musicals written and produced by African Americans debuted on Broadway in 1898 with a musical by Bob Cole and Billy Johnson. In 1901, the first recording of black musicians was of Bert Williams and George Walker, featuring music from Broadway musicals. Theodore Drury helped black artists develop in the opera field. He founded the Drury Opera Company in 1900 and, although he used a white orchestra, he featured black singers in leading roles and choruses. Although this company was only active from 1900 to 1908, black singers' opportunities with Drury marked the first black participation in opera companies. Also significant is Scott Joplin's opera "Treemonisha", which is unique as a ragtime-folk opera; it was first performed in 1911.

The musical style which developed from these early experiments was called monody. In the 1590s, monody developed into a vehicle capable of extended dramatic expression through the work of composers such as Jacopo Peri, working in conjunction with poet Ottavio Rinuccini. In 1598, Peri and Rinuccini produced "Dafne", an entire drama sung in monodic style: this was the first creation of a new form called "opera". Though Peri's Dafne was the first performed opera, its music has been lost to the centuries. Instead, L'Euridice, his second opera is most-often heralded as the history-making work. The new form of opera also borrowed, especially for the librettos, from an existing pastoral poetic form called the intermedio; it was mainly the musical style that was new. The instrumentation for an opera from the Camerata composers (Caccini and Peri) was written for a handful of gambas, lutes, and harpsichord or organ for continuo.

Musical notation was developed before parchment or paper were used for writing. The earliest form of musical notation can be found in a cuneiform tablet that was created at Nippur, in Sumer (today's Iraq) in about 2,000 BC. The tablet represents fragmentary instructions for performing music, that the music was composed in harmonies of thirds, and that it was written using a diatonic scale.

Music publishing using machine-printed sheet music developed during the Renaissance music era in the mid-15th century. The development of music publication followed the evolution of printing technologies that were first developed for printing regular books. After the mid-15th century, mechanical techniques for printing sheet music were first developed. The earliest example, a set of liturgical chants, dates from about 1465, shortly after the Gutenberg Bible was printed. Prior to this time, music had to be copied out by hand. To copy music notation by hand was a very costly, labor-intensive and time-consuming process, so it was usually undertaken only by monks and priests seeking to preserve sacred music for the church. The few collections of secular (non-religious) music that are extant were commissioned and owned by wealthy aristocrats. Examples include the Squarcialupi Codex of Italian Trecento music and the Chantilly Codex of French Ars subtilior music.

Most early written classical music was predominantly sacred; collections of written music and literature were held by monasteries, cathedrals, and other religious establishments, such as church music societies, offices, and seminaries. As universities emerged in the 12th century, libraries formed throughout Europe, and obtained donations or gifts from monasteries and private collectors. The advent of national and centralized libraries two centuries later allowed for greater attention to special materials like music collections. Up to the end of the 15th century, music collections had been limited to religious organizations, private collectors, or small areas of university libraries. Public collections grew with the development of printing at the end of the 15th century and the surge of scholarly and artistic endeavors of the Renaissance.

Born in Pimlico, London, he made his first onstage appearance at the age of seven. He was an apprentice in a boat building business before becoming a professional entertainer in 1888, making his first appearances in pantomimes and minstrel shows. By 1895 he had become a leading music hall entertainer, appearing at the Middlesex Music Hall in London and developing an act that was considered somewhat risqué for the time. Described as a "low comedian", his popular songs (written by others) included "A Little Bit Off the Top", "The Cock of the North", and "When I Get Some Money".

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: 写音乐何时开发？
pos_context_src: 中世纪的时期包括从罗马秋天到1400年之后的音乐。单声道的颂歌，也称为Plainsong或Gregorian Chant，一直是主要形式，直到1100年左右。天主教僧侣开发了现代欧洲音乐符号的第一种形式，以便在整个全球教堂中标准化礼仪。多音（多声音）音乐是从中世纪晚期和文艺复兴时期发育而来的，包括Motets的更复杂的声音。文艺复兴时期的时代为1400至1600年。它的特征是更多地使用仪器，多个相互交织的旋律线以及使用第一批低音仪器的特征。社交舞蹈变得更加普遍，因此适合伴随舞蹈的音乐形式开始标准化。正是在这个时候，音乐符号对员工和其他音乐符号的元素开始形成。这项发明使一部音乐的组成与其“传播”的分离有可能；没有书面音乐，传输是口头的，每次传输时都可能发生变化。有了乐谱，可以在没有作曲家的存在的情况下进行音乐作品。 15世纪可移动式印刷机的发明对音乐的保存和传播产生了深远的影响。
neg_context_src: 在1880年代之前，流行音乐出版是音乐商店或“严肃”（古典）音乐出版商的次要功能。 1880年后，纽约的出版商开发了一种称为插入的促销技术。到1900年，大多数音乐出版商都沿着第28大街（第6大街和百老汇之间）聚集了业务，以便更接近纽约蓬勃发展的娱乐中心。该区域被称为锡锅巷。 20世纪的前十年，它的制作比到那时以前写的比以往任何时候都更受欢迎：每年大约有25,000首歌曲。在1893年，歌曲“ After the Ball”的乐谱售出了100万张，在接下来的十年中，音乐总共出售了一百万张。

仅在19世纪的第一季度，美国出版商就印刷了10,000首流行音乐。但是，该行业没有采取任何行动来促进音乐或发展作家。歌词被口碑流行。大多数Minstrel剧团和专业歌手都写了自己的音乐，或者写了歌曲。斯蒂芬·福斯特（Stephen Foster）是第一位试图以独立专业词曲作者为生的作曲家，但在1850年代，版权保护如此宽松，特许权使用费是如此之小（或不存在），以至于他发现自己生活在贫困中。这只会逐渐改变，因为参与其他商业企业的年轻人开始意识到歌曲出版中丰富的可能性。

在20世纪初的美国音乐剧院中，由非裔美国人创作和制作的第一部音乐剧于1898年在百老汇首次亮相，由鲍勃·科尔（Bob Cole）和比利·约翰逊（Billy Johnson）创作。 1901年，黑人音乐家的第一张唱片是伯特·威廉姆斯（Bert Williams）和乔治·沃克（George Walker），其中包括百老汇音乐剧的音乐。西奥多·德鲁里（Theodore Drury）帮助黑人艺术家在歌剧领域发展。他于1900年创立了Drury Opera Company，尽管他使用了白色乐团，但他以主角和合唱的身份为黑人歌手。尽管这家公司仅在1900年至1908年才活跃，但黑人歌手与德鲁里（Drury）的机会标志着黑人对歌剧公司的首次参加。斯科特·乔普林（Scott Joplin）的歌剧“ Treemonisha”也很重要，它是Ragtime-Folk Opera的独特之处。它是在1911年首次演出的。

从这些早期实验中发展的音乐风格被称为Mondody。在1590年代，Mondody通过作曲家（例如Jacopo Peri）的作品发展成能够扩展戏剧表达的媒介，并与诗人Ottavio Rinuccini一起工作。 1598年，Peri和Rinuccini制作了“ Dafne”，这是一部以单声道风格演唱的整个戏剧：这是首次创作的新形式，称为“ Opera”。尽管Peri的Dafne是第一部歌剧，但它的音乐已经失去了几个世纪。取而代之的是，他的第二部歌剧最常见于历史创作。新的歌剧形式也从现有的田园诗歌形式中借用，尤其是对于歌词，称为Intermedio。主要是音乐风格。来自Camerata作曲家（Caccini and Peri）的歌剧仪器是为少数Gambas，Lutes和Harpsichord或Organ撰写的。
音乐符号是在使用羊皮纸或纸张写作之前制定的。最早的音乐符号形式可以在塞氏片在苏格尔（今天的伊拉克）在公元前大约2,000公元前创建的楔形文字平板电脑中找到。平板电脑代表了表演音乐的零碎说明，音乐是用三分之一的和声组成的，并且是用音量表编写的。

音乐发行是在15世纪中叶文艺复兴时代时期开发的机器印刷的乐谱。音乐出版物的开发是在最初开发用于印刷书籍的印刷技术的发展之后的。 15世纪中叶后，首次开发了用于印刷乐谱的机械技术。最早的例子是一套礼仪圣歌，其历史可追溯至1465年，在印刷了古腾堡圣经之后不久。在此之前，必须手工复制音乐。手工复制音乐符号是一个非常昂贵，劳动力且耗时的过程，因此通常仅由僧侣和牧师试图为教会保留神圣的音乐。现存的少数世俗（非宗教）音乐集由富裕的贵族委托和所有。示例包括意大利trecento音乐的Squarcialupi codex和法式Ars Undior音乐的Chantilly Codex。

大多数早期的古典音乐主要是神圣的。书面音乐和文学的收藏是由修道院，大教堂和其他宗教机构（例如教堂音乐社会，办公室和神学院）持有的。随着大学在12世纪的出现，图书馆在整个欧洲成立，并获得了修道院和私人收藏家的捐赠或礼物。两个世纪后，国家和集中图书馆的出现使人们更加关注音乐收藏等特殊材料。直到15世纪末，音乐收藏都仅限于宗教组织，私人收藏家或大学图书馆的小区域。随着15世纪末印刷的发展以及文艺复兴时期的学术和艺术努力的激增，公共收藏的发展。
他出生于伦敦的皮姆利科（Pimlico），在七岁时就出场了。在1888年成为专业艺人之前，他是一家造船业务的学徒，在Pantomimes和Minstrel表演中首次亮相。到1895年，他已经成为领先的音乐厅演艺人员，出现在伦敦的米德尔塞克斯音乐厅，并开发了当时被认为有些危险的表演。被描述为“低喜剧演员”，他的流行歌曲（由他人写）包括“一点点的顶部”，“北方的公鸡”和“当我赚钱时”。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。
report_src: “写音乐”即用符号将音乐记录于纸的制度，最早可追溯至中世纪早期：为在全球教堂中统一礼仪，天主教僧侣于约公元9–11世纪开发了现代欧洲音乐符号的第一种雏形，用于记录单声道的格里高利圣歌 [1]。进入文艺复兴时期（1400–1600年），随着乐器使用增多和多声部写作兴起，五线谱及其他记谱元素开始逐步成形，使乐曲的“创作”首次与“传播”相分离 [1]。15世纪活字印刷机的发明又大幅促进了乐谱的复制与流通，奠定了书面音乐在西方音乐史中的核心地位 [1]。

question_en: Who is the CEO of the WWE?
pos_context_en: Vincent Kennedy McMahon (; born August 24, 1945) is an American professional wrestling promoter and executive, American football executive, and businessman. Since taking over the company from his father in the 1980s, he has worked in the corporate area of the WWE and behind the scenes. He currently serves as the majority owner, chairman and CEO of WWE as well as founder of Alpha Entertainment, which is the holding company of the American football league the XFL.
neg_context_en:
As of 2018, the company's Board of Directors has nine members: Vince McMahon, the company's Chairman of the Board and CEO; Stuart U. Goldfarb, President of Fullbridge, Inc.; Patricia A. Gottesman, former President and CEO of Crimson Hexagon; Frank A. Riddick, III, CEO of Shale-Inland Group, Inc.; Jeffrey R. Speed, former Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Six Flags; Laureen Ong, former President of Travel Channel; Robyn W. Peterson, 
Chief Technology Officer and Head of Product, Mashable; Stephanie McMahon, Chief Brand Officer of WWE; and Paul "Triple H" Levesque, WWE's Executive Vice President of talent, live events, and creative.

Linda McMahon, the CEO at the time, elected to close the nightclub in February 2003 so WWE could concentrate more on their global efforts. The retail shop closed two months later. This meant that WWE Niagara Falls was the only official WWE retail store in the world. The complex remained closed for two years until 2005, when the Hard Rock Cafe took over the lease and the business. On August 16, 2006, WWE returned to the former location for the 2006 Diva Search finale. WWE also held press conferences at the Hard Rock Cafe for WrestleMania's 24, 25, 27, 30.

WWE & Company is a fashion, beauty and lifestyle technology company specialising in the development of mobile, cloud-based, O2O commerce enterprise technologies, targeting the mainland Chinese consumers. WWE is a joint venture between The Wharf (Holdings) Limited (), Walton Brown Group (a company of The Lane Crawford Joyce Group), and eCargo Holdings Limited (ASX:ECG), initially capitalised at RMB 300 million. WWE & Company was founded and led by Thomson Cheng, President of Walton Brown, and Christopher Lau, CEO and Founder of ECG, as co-CEOs in Hong Kong. 
Walton Brown and ECG jointly invested RMB 150 million for an initial 50% equity interest and The Wharf (Holdings) Limited, which operates Harbour City and Times Square in Hong Kong, will co-invest another RMB 150 million for a 50% equity interest through Novel Colour, a wholly owned subsidiary.

In 2009, McMahon announced his resignation from WWE which went into effect January 1, 2010. He later became CEO of entertainment service company YOU On Demand in late 2010. On July 12, 2013, McMahon voluntarily stepped down as CEO of YOU On Demand and appointed Weicheng Liu as his successor, while remaining the company's principal executive officer and Vice Chairman of the Board. On February 22, 2016, he returned to the WWE as an on-screen character.
The company's majority owner is its chairman and CEO, Vince McMahon, who retains a 42% ownership of the company's outstanding stock and 83% of the voting power.

In 2010, Ben Feder stepped down as CEO, and was replaced by executive chairman Strauss Zelnick, who remains the company's chairman and CEO. In January 2013, while being dissolved, THQ sold the rights of the "WWE" wrestling games series to Take-Two. Subsequently, 2K Sports has published annual "WWE 2K" games as part of its lineup.

She went through a confirmation process in the Connecticut State Assembly where she was questioned on her record as CEO of WWE. The State Senate approved her nomination by a vote of 34-1 and the House by 96-45 with some opponents expressing concerns that the nature of her WWE activities would send the wrong message. State representative Bruce Morris claimed she lacked "depth of knowledge regarding education." However, state representative John Hetherington said it "would be good to have someone outside the establishment on the board."

The origins of the WWE Network can trace back to 2000 when USA Network filed the lawsuit against the World Wrestling Federation (WWF, now known as the WWE) due to breach of contract which saw most of its programming moved to Viacom-owned TNN and MTV. The Delaware Chancery Court ruled in favor of the WWF in June 2000. Then CEO, Linda McMahon, revealed that WWF wanted its own cable network and testified that before WWF signed a rights deal with Viacom, the company had floated the idea of acquiring USA's Sci-Fi Channel, and reformatting it as a dedicated wrestling network. USA executives rejected the idea, and McMahon said that former USA Networks President Barry Baker encouraged her to talk to other programmers about potential deals. "I can tell you right now, Linda, you're not going to get anybody to give you a network," McMahon testified. In 2005, USA Network re-acquired the rights to all WWE programming.

In February 2013, Glory announced that former WWE Executive VP Andrew Whitaker had been hired as the global CEO of Glory Sports International. In August 2014, Glory announced that Jon J. Franklin had been appointed as new CEO of Glory Sports International. In January 2018, Glory announced that Franklin had moved to the role of Chief Development Officer, and former UFC executive Marshall Zelaznik had been hired as the new CEO.
question_src: 谁是WWE的首席执行官？
pos_context_src: 文森特·肯尼迪·麦克马洪（Vincent Kennedy McMahon）（；出生于1945年8月24日）是美国职业摔跤促进者和执行人员，美国足球高管和商人。自从1980年代从父亲那里接任公司以来，他一直在WWE的公司地区和幕后工作。他目前是WWE的多数所有者，董事长兼首席执行官以及Alpha Entertainment的创始人，Alpha Entertainment是美国足球联盟The XFL的控股公司。
neg_context_src:
截至2018年，公司董事会拥有9名成员：董事会主席兼首席执行官文斯·麦克马洪（Vince McMahon）； Fullbridge，Inc。总裁Stuart U. Goldfarb；帕特里夏·戈特斯曼（Patricia A. Senale-Inland Group，Inc。首席执行官Frank A. Riddick；六旗前执行副总裁兼首席财务官Jeffrey R. Speed；旅游频道前总裁Laureen Ong；罗宾·彼得森（Robyn W. Peterson）， 
首席技术官兼产品负责人Mashable； WWE的首席品牌官Stephanie McMahon； WWE人才，现场活动和创意的执行副总裁Paul“ Triple H” Levesque。

当时的首席执行官琳达·麦克马洪（Linda McMahon）选择在2003年2月关闭夜总会，因此WWE可以更多地专注于他们的全球努力。零售店两个月后关闭。这意味着WWE Niagara Falls是世界上唯一的官方WWE零售店。该综合大楼一直关闭了两年，直到2005年Hard Rock Cafe接管了租赁和业务。 2006年8月16日，WWE回到了2006年Diva搜索结局的前地点。 WWE还在Hard Rock Cafe举行了新闻发布会，供WrestleMania的24、25、27、30举行。

WWE＆Company是一家时尚，美容和生活方式技术公司，专门针对基于云的O2O Commerce Enterprise Technologies开发，以中国大陆消费者为目标。 WWE是码头（Holdings）Limited（），Walton Brown Group（Lane Crawford Joyce Group的公司）和Ecargo Holdings Limited（ASX：ECG）之间的合资企业，最初资本为3亿元。 WWE＆Company由Walton Brown总裁Thomson Cheng和ECG的首席执行官兼创始人Christopher Lau创立和领导，并担任香港的共同主持人。 
沃尔顿·布朗（Walton Brown）和心电图（ECG）共同投资了1.5亿元人民币，以获得最初的50％股权利息，在香港运营着港口城市和时代广场的码头（控股）有限公司将通过新的颜色（一个全资产的子公司）共同获得另一个1.5亿卢比的股票，以获得50％的股权利息。
2009年，麦克马洪（McMahon）宣布从WWE辞职，该辞职于2010年1月1日生效。后来，他于2010年底成为娱乐服务公司的首席执行官。2013年7月12日，麦克马洪（McMahon）自愿按需辞去您的首席执行官，并任命了Weicheng Liu担任他的继任者，同时又担任了公司的首席执行官和副董事长和副董事长。 2016年2月22日，他以屏幕上的角色返回WWE。
该公司的多数所有者是其董事长兼首席执行官文斯·麦克马洪（Vince McMahon），他保留了该公司未偿还股票的42％的所有权和83％的投票权。
2010年，本·费德（Ben Feder）辞去了首席执行官的职务，并由执行董事长施特劳斯·泽尼克（Strauss Zelnick）取代，后者仍然是公司董事长兼首席执行官。 2013年1月，THQ在解散时，将“ WWE”摔跤比赛系列的权利卖给了Take-Two。随后，2K Sports作为其阵容的一部分发布了年度“ WWE 2K”游戏。
她经历了康涅狄格州议会的确认过程，在那里她担任WWE首席执行官的记录受到质疑。州参议院以34-1的投票和96-45的众议院批准了她的提名，一些反对者表示担心她的WWE活动的性质会传达错误的信息。州代表布鲁斯·莫里斯（Bruce Morris）声称，她缺乏“有关教育知识的深度”。但是，州代表约翰·赫瑟灵顿（John Hetherington）表示，“最好让某人在董事会中的机构外面。”

当美国网络针对世界摔跤联合会（WWF，现在称为WWE）提起诉讼时，WWE网络的起源可以追溯到2000年，因为违反了合同，这使其大多数编程转移到了维亚科姆拥有的TNN和MTV。特拉华州政府法院于2000年6月裁定支持WWF。当时的首席执行官琳达·麦克马洪（Linda McMahon）透露，世界自然基金会（WWF）想要自己的有线网络，并作证说，在WWF与维亚康姆（Viacom）签署了权利协议之前，该公司浮出水面，提出了收购美国科幻渠道的想法，并将其重新格式化为一个专门的摔跤网络。美国高管拒绝了这个想法，麦克马洪说，前美国网络总裁巴里·贝克（Barry Baker）鼓励她与其他程序员谈论潜在交易。麦克马洪作证说：“我现在可以告诉你，琳达，你不会让任何人给你网络。” 2005年，美国网络重新获得所有WWE编程的权利。

2013年2月，Glory宣布，前WWE执行副总裁Andrew Whitaker被聘为Glory Sports International的全球首席执行官。 2014年8月，Glory宣布Jon J. Franklin被任命为Glory Sports International的新首席执行官。 2018年1月，Glory宣布，富兰克林已晋升为首席发展官的职务，前UFC执行官Marshall Zelaznik被聘为新首席执行官。
report_src: WWE的首席执行官是文森特·肯尼迪·麦克马洪（Vincent Kennedy McMahon），他自1980年代接手父亲的公司以来一直负责公司运营，并现任WWE的多数所有者、董事长兼首席执行官，同时也是Alpha Entertainment的创始人[1]。

question_en: What happens when the president and VP of the USA die?
pos_context_en: If the Vice President-elect dies or resigns "before" the meeting of the Electoral College in December, the National Committee of the winning party would, in consultation with the president-elect, choose a replacement to receive the electoral votes of the Vice Presidential nominee in the same manner as would happen if the former Vice Presidential nominee had become President-elect due to the death of the apparent winner. Assuming the requisite number the electors agreed to vote for the replacement candidate, that person would then become the Vice President-elect. If such a vacancy were to occur "after" the electoral votes had been cast in the states, most authorities maintain that no replacement would be chosen and the new President (after taking office) would nominate a Vice President, per the provisions of the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the Constitution.
neg_context_title_en: State funerals in the United States
List of Presidents of the United States who died in office
Traditions of the United States Senate
neg_context_en: The Twenty-fifth Amendment (1967) clarifies what happens upon the death, removal, or resignation of the President or Vice President and how the Presidency is temporarily filled if the President becomes disabled and cannot fulfill the responsibilities of the office. It supersedes the ambiguous succession rule established in . A concrete plan of succession has been needed on multiple occasions since 1789. However, for nearly 20% of U.S. history, there has been no vice president in office who can assume the presidency.

Sitting presidents who die while in office may lie in repose in the East Room of the White House. Former presidents may lie in repose in their home or adopted state, usually at their presidential library, before traveling to Washington, D.C. when thereafter, lying in state in the United States Capitol Rotunda will occur. Dwight D. Eisenhower was an exception to this general rule. Following his death at Walter Reed Army Hospital in 1969, Eisenhower lay in repose in the Bethlehem Chapel at Washington National Cathedral for 28 hours, rather than at his presidential library in Abilene, Kansas.

Because of the nature of the cross campus elections for the Executive posts, it is in theory possible for any member of the Union to stand for any post, and thus in the past this was capable of creating the anomaly that the VP-S&L (Cross Campus election) could have been held by a separate person from the post of President of the Athletic Union (Internal AU election) and the VP-SCA could have been separate from Chair HUSSO. While changes to the constitution/standing orders have removed the possibility of this happening for Chair-HUSSO, it is still theoretically possible to have the posts of Vice President Scarborough held by a student who is neither a resident of the town, or undertaking a course at the campus. This happened in the elections of 2010 and 2011 when Matthew Jason Brown who graduated from Scarborough two years before, but was undertaking a course on the Hull campus was elected to the post and then reelected the subsequent year.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

From May 1973 to September 1974, Abdelghani Bousta lived in hiding. During this time, he realised the mistakes made when the March 1973 events were organised. In 1975, he wrote a critical analysis of UNFP on behalf of the Option Révolutionnaire (Revolutionary option) movement, harshly criticising the events and the leaders: “[…] the March 1973 events helped shed light on the internal contradictions of the Party and show the true nature of its leaders: putschist and adventurous leaders who did not see any problem in sacrificing dozens of activists in a hazardous battle.”

"The Man" was written before the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution. It depicts a political situation in which the office of Vice Presidency is vacant due to the incumbent's death. While overseas in Germany, the President and the Speaker of the House are in a freak accident; the President is killed, the Speaker of the House later dies in surgery. The Presidency then devolves onto Douglass Dilman, the President Pro Tempore of the Senate, a black man earlier elected to that office in deference to his race. Dilman's presidency is challenged by white racists, black political activists, and an attempted assassination. Later, he is impeached on false charges for firing the United States Secretary of State. One of his children, who is "passing" for white, is targeted and harassed. At the end of the book the protagonist - though having credibly dealt with considerable problems during his Presidency and gained some popularity - does not consider running for re-election.

On March 26, 1841, William Henry Harrison became ill with a cold. According to the prevailing medical misconception of that time, it was believed that his illness was directly caused by the bad weather at his inauguration; however, Harrison's illness did not arise until more than three weeks after the event. The cold worsened, rapidly turning to pneumonia and pleurisy. He sought to rest in the White House, but could not find a quiet room because of the steady crowd of office seekers. His extremely busy social schedule made any rest time scarce.

If the apparent winner dies between the College's December vote and its counting in Congress in January, the Twelfth Amendment stipulates that all electoral ballots cast shall be counted, presumably even those for a dead candidate. The U.S. House committee reporting on the proposed Twentieth Amendment said the "Congress would have 'no discretion' [and] 'would declare that the deceased candidate had received a majority of the votes.'"

If a Senator dies in office, it is traditional for the Senate to adjourn for a day and for U.S. flags to be flown at half-staff. A black cloth and a vase filled with white roses are placed over the deceased Senator's desk, and a large contingent of Senators often travel to the home state of the departed senator to pay their respects.
question_src: 当美国总统和副总裁死亡时会发生什么？
pos_context_src: 如果当选副总统在12月的选举学院会议之前死亡或辞职，那么，在与当选总统的总统协商中，全国获胜党委员会将选择替代者接受副总统候选人的选举票，而不是前副总统提名人将成为总统的临时胜利的胜利。假设选举人同意投票支持替换候选人，则该人将成为当选副总统。如果“在”选举票是在各州进行的，那么大多数当局都认为不会选择替代人，并且根据《宪法》第25修正案的规定，新任总统（上任后）将提名副总统。
neg_context_title_src: 在办公室死亡的美国总统名单
neg_context_src: 《二十五修正案》（1967年）阐明了总统或副总统死亡，撤职或辞职时发生的事情，如果总统变得残疾并无法履行办公室的责任，则如何暂时担任总统职位。它取代了建立的模棱两可的继承规则。自1789年以来，已经多次需要一个具体的继承计划。但是，在美国近20％的历史上，没有办公室副总统可以担任总统职位。

在任职期间死亡的现任总统可能会在白宫东室休息。前总统可能会在他们的家中或采用州，通常在其总统图书馆，然后前往华盛顿特区。德怀特·D·艾森豪威尔（Dwight D. Eisenhower）是这一一般规则的例外。艾森豪威尔于1969年在沃尔特·里德（Walter Reed）陆军医院去世后，艾森豪威尔（Eisenhower）在华盛顿国家大教堂的伯利恒教堂（Bethlehem Chapel）休息了28个小时，而不是在堪萨斯州阿比林（Abilene）的总统图书馆。

由于跨校园选举的行政职位的性质，从理论上讲，联盟的任何成员都有可能代表任何职位，因此过去，这有能力造成异常，即VP-S＆L（跨校园选举）可以由一个单独的人与体育联盟总统（Internal Au Enlection（In Iu Iun）总统（VP-SCA）的职位以及VP-SCA的职位以及VP-SCA的帖子，并且与VP-SCA的主席可以与董事椅子分开。尽管对宪法/常规命令的变化却消除了主席霍斯索的可能性，但从理论上讲，仍然有可能让既不是该镇居民的学生担任过副总统士嘉堡的职位，也可以在校园内开设课程。这发生在2010年和2011年的选举中，当时马修·杰森·布朗（Matthew Jason Brown）在两年前从斯卡伯勒（Scarborough）毕业，但在船体校园的课程中选出了一门课程，然后当选了该职位，然后在随后的一年中当选。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。

从1973年5月至1974年9月，阿卜杜勒加尼·布斯塔（Abdelghani Bousta）居住在藏身之中。在这段时间里，他意识到在组织了1973年3月的活动时犯了错误。 1975年，他代表选项对《联合国公司》（RévolutionNaire）（革命性选项）运动进行了批判性分析，严厉地批评了事件和领导人：“ […] 1973年3月的事件帮助揭示了该党的内部矛盾，并展示了其领导者的真实本质：使他们的领导者和冒险的领导人没有任何问题，他们在行动中没有欺骗任何问题。

“男人”是在《美国宪法》第25修正案之前写的。它描绘了一个政治局势，副总统办公室由于现任人的死亡而空缺。在德国海外时，众议院的总统和发言人陷入了怪胎事故。总统被杀，众议院议长后来在手术中去世。然后，总统职位转移到了参议院总统的总统道格拉斯·迪尔曼（Douglass Dilman）上，他早些时候当选为他的种族而当选为该职位。迪尔曼（Dilman）的总统职位受到白人种族主义者，黑人政治活动家和企图暗杀的挑战。后来，他因解雇美国国务卿而受到虚假指控的弹each。他的一个为白人“通过”的孩子是针对性和骚扰的。在这本书的最后，主角 - 尽管在担任总统期间有可靠地处理了相当多的问题并获得了一些受欢迎程度，但并不考虑竞选连任。
1841年3月26日，威廉·亨利·哈里森（William Henry Harrison）感冒了。根据当时的医学误解，人们认为他的病直接是由于他就职典礼上的恶劣天气造成的。但是，直到活动结束后三周以上，哈里森的病才出现。感冒恶化，迅速转向肺炎和胸膜炎。他试图在白宫休息，但由于稳定的办公室寻求者人群而找不到安静的房间。他非常忙碌的社交日程使任何休息时间都稀少。
如果明显的获胜者在学院的12月投票与1月份在国会进行计数之间死亡，那么《第十二修正案》规定，所有选举选票都应被计算，甚至可能是为死者候选人而言。美国众议院委员会关于拟议的二十世纪修正案的委员会说，“国会将'无酌处权'和]宣布已故候选人获得了多数票。''
如果一名参议员去世，传统上是参议院押后一天，而在半场夫人则悬挂美国国旗。一块黑布和一个装满白玫瑰花的花瓶放在死者参议员的桌子上，一大批参议员经常前往已故参议员的家乡，以表示敬意。
report_src: 若在任期内现任总统和副总统同时去世，《总统继任法》规定由众议院议长立即继任为总统，其后依次为参议院临时议长及内阁成员按既定顺序；继任者就任后须依《宪法》第25修正案提名并经国会两院多数同意产生新的副总统。若两位当选人尚未就职且副总统当选人在选举人团投票前死亡，全国获胜党全国委员会可与当选总统协商指定替代人选，选举人团可将副总统票投给该人，确保新任副总统在就职日与总统同日就职[1]；若副总统当选人在选举人团已分别投票后去世，则新总统就职时副总统职位为空缺，须在就职后依第25修正案程序另行提名副总统[1]。

question_en: Where was Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur born?
pos_context_en: Auf der Maur was born in Montreal, Quebec to journalist and politician Nick Auf der Maur and journalist and literary translator Linda Gaboriau. Auf der Maur's father's family was Swiss–German and her mother's was mixed European-American. Gaboriau was born in Boston, Massachusetts in the United States. As a result, she holds dual Canadian–American citizenship. Auf der Maur's surname translates to English as "on the wall", as "maur" was derived from the German word for "wall" ("die Mauer"). She has stated that her grandmother, Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur, was "always pounding my heritage down my throat—reminding me that I'm the last one in North America to further the name".
neg_context_en: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur (; born March 17, 1972) is a Canadian musician, singer-songwriter, photographer and actress.

Auf der Maur did not meet her father until she was three years old. Gaboriau called Nick Auf der Maur after her daughter began questioning her about her father's identity. Reflecting on the encounter, Auf der Maur said "[my father] realised my mother Linda was the love of his life because she'd offered the gift of this child without any demands. He fell madly in love with her [and] pursued her for two years". Auf der Maur and Gaboriau married in 1978 when Melissa was six years old. The couple divorced in 1979 after which Auf der Maur traveled worldwide with her mother. A portion of Auf der Maur's childhood was spent living in "a circus caravan in Wales, a red post-office box truck in Morocco, and a hut in Kenya" with her mother. During her time in Kenya, she contracted three bouts of malaria and returned to Montreal.

In Montreal, Auf der Maur attended the Fine Arts Core Education (FACE) School and Moving in New Directions (MIND) High School—both of which are schools of alternative education. At FACE, she was a member of the classical choir and at MIND, she was "part of the small English elite", where she formed friendships with Leonard Cohens daughter Lorca and Rufus Wainwright. At school, she became interested in photography and subsequently attended Concordia University, from which she majored in photography in 1994. At Concordia at age 19, Auf der Maur began working part-time as a disc jockey at Bifteck, a well known rock club, where she met several musicians including Steve Durand.

Nick Auf der Maur (April 10, 1942 – April 7, 1998) was a journalist, politician and "man about town" boulevardier in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He was also the father of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur, through his marriage to Linda Gaboriau.

In 2002, Auf der Maur formed a brief project with former Hole drummer Samantha Maloney, Peaches, Paz Lenchantin and Radio Sloan. Adopting the title The Chelsea—named after the Chelsea Hotel in New York where Auf der Maur had lived for a number of years—the band performed one show at Spaceland in Los Angeles, California in February that included original songs and cover versions. Featuring a cover version of Devos "Gates of Steel" and early renditions of songs Auf der Maur would feature on her debut studio album, the show was poorly received due to its "seeming lack of preparation" and "was little more than pleasantly mopey and blurry garage rock" according to a Variety review. Courtney Love subsequently named her backing band The Chelsea, also hiring Maloney and Sloan in the process, while touring for her debut studio album, "America's Sweetheart" (2004).

Hole reunited again—with the "Celebrity Skin" line-up of Love, Erlandson, Auf der Maur and Schemel—for a one-off performance at Public Assembly in Brooklyn, New York on April 12, 2012 at an after-party for Schemel's film "Hit So Hard" (2011). Originally Auf der Maur, Erlandson and Schemel were performing as a trio until Love arrived for a spontaneous performance of "Miss World" and "Over the Edge". "The Quietus" reported in April 2014 that the four members had reunited although in subsequent interviews, Love downplayed talk of an imminent reunion. In April 2016, Auf der Maur stated in an interview that she no longer had time or energy for a full-fledged reunion, but would be interested in wrapping up the Hole legacy with a retrospective disc and small set of tour dates.

Recorded from 2001 to 2003  at various studios in the U.S. and Canada, Auf der Maur's debut studio album "Auf der Maur" was released in February 2004 on Capitol Records. Produced with Chris Goss, Auf der Maur financed the recording sessions herself as she was not signed to a record label at the time of recording and during post-production, her budget ran out and she was unable to mix the album. She accepted a recording contract from Capitol soon afterwards and released "Auf der Maur" to "generally favorable reviews", according to Metacritic. The album's supporting singles—"Followed the Waves", "Real a Lie" and "Taste You"—were moderate successes in the United Kingdom, charting in the Top 40 of the UK Single Charts. As of 2010, "Auf der Maur" sold 200,000 copies worldwide.

Gaboriau was previously married to Montreal city councillor Nick Auf der Maur, and is the mother of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur. She and her late partner of 35 years, author and professor Hervé de Fontenay, have one son, architect Yves de Fontenay.

Auf der Maur began performing in 1993 after forming the indie rock band Tinker while she was a student at Concordia University. She was recruited as the bassist for the American alternative rock band Hole in the summer of 1994 and is included on several Hole releases, including the album "Celebrity Skin" (1998). Following her departure from Hole in 1999, Auf der Maur briefly joined The Smashing Pumpkins as a touring member for its 2000 tour and began her solo career; her debut studio album, "Auf der Maur", was released in 2004 on Capitol Records and her second studio album, "Out of Our Minds", was released in 2010 on her own independent record label, PHI–MAdM Music. She has also collaborated with Indochine, Rufus Wainwright, Ric Ocasek and Neverending White Lights.
question_src: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur出生在哪里？
pos_context_src: Auf der Maur出生于魁北克蒙特利尔，新闻记者和政治家Nick Auf Der Maur以及记者以及文学翻译琳达·加博里亚（Linda Gaboriau）。阿夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）的父亲的家人是瑞士 - 德国人，她的母亲是欧洲裔美国人。 Gaboriau出生于美国马萨诸塞州的波士顿。结果，她拥有加拿大双重美国公民身份。 Auf der Maur的姓氏将英语转化为“墙上”，“毛尔”源自德语单词“ wall”（“ Die Mauer”）。她说，她的祖母Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur“总是将我的遗产猛击到我的喉咙上，这让我感到我是北美最后一个进一步的名字的人”。
neg_context_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur（；出生于1972年3月17日）是加拿大音乐家，歌手兼作曲家，摄影师和女演员。

阿夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）直到三岁才遇到她的父亲。加波里亚（Gaboriau）在女儿开始向她询问父亲的身份后，打电话给尼克·阿夫·莫尔（Nick Auf Der Maur）。在反映这次相遇时，Auf der Maur说：“ [我父亲]意识到我的母亲琳达是他一生的热爱，因为她毫不犹豫地提供了这个孩子的礼物。他疯狂地爱上了她[并追求她两年了。” Auf der Maur和Gaboriau于1978年六岁时结婚。这对夫妇于1979年离婚，此后Auf der Maur与她的母亲一起旅行。与母亲一起生活在“威尔士的马戏团大篷车，一辆红色的邮局盒子卡车和肯尼亚的小屋”中度过的一部分。在肯尼亚期间，她染上了三局疟疾，然后返回蒙特利尔。

在蒙特利尔，奥夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）就读于美术核心教育（Face）学校，并沿着新的方向（思维）高中搬家，这都是替代教育的学校。从面对面对面，她是古典合唱团的成员，在想到她是“小英国精英的一部分”，在那里她与伦纳德·科恩斯（Leonard Cohens）的女儿洛尔卡（Lorca）和鲁弗斯·温赖特（Rufus Wainwright）建立了友谊。在学校里，她对摄影感兴趣，随后就读于康科迪亚大学（Concordia University），她于1994年主修摄影。在19岁的康科迪亚（Concordia），Auf der Maur开始在著名的摇滚俱乐部Bifteck兼职兼职，在著名的摇滚俱乐部兼职，在那里遇到了几位音乐家，遇到了包括史蒂夫·杜兰德（Steve Durand）在内的几位音乐家。
Nick Auf der Maur（1942年4月10日至1998年4月7日）是加拿大魁北克蒙特利尔的新闻记者，政治家和“关于城镇的人”大道。他还是与琳达·加博里亚（Linda Gaboriau）的婚姻，也是摇滚音乐家梅利莎·奥夫·莫尔（Melissa Auf Der Maur）的父亲。

2002年，Auf der Maur与前洞鼓手Samantha Maloney，Peaches，Paz Lenchantin和Sloan Radio Sloan组成了一个简短的项目。采用切尔西的头衔，以阿夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）在纽约的切尔西酒店（Chelsea Hotel）居住了很多年，该乐队在2月在加利福尼亚州洛杉矶的Spaceland演出了一场演出，其中包括原始歌曲和封面版本。根据一份综艺评论，该节目以其首张录音室专辑的封面为“钢铁之门”和歌曲的早期演绎，由于其“似乎缺乏准备”和“仅仅是令人愉悦的Mopey and Blurry Garage Rock”，因此该节目的收到不佳。考特尼·洛夫（Courtney Love）随后命名了她的支持乐队切尔西（The Chelsea），并在此过程中聘请了马洛尼（Maloney）和斯隆（Maloney）和斯隆（Sloan），同时巡回她的首张录音室专辑《美国甜心》（America's Sweetheart）（2004）。

霍尔再次团聚 - 与爱情的“名人皮肤”阵容，埃兰森，阿夫·莫尔和斯图梅尔 - 在2012年4月12日在纽约布鲁克林举行的公共集会上进行一次演出，在Schemel的电影《 The So So So Hard》（2011年）举行。最初是Auf der Maur，Erlandson和Schemel表演三人组，直到Love到达“ Miss Miss World”和“ Edge the Edge”的自发表演。 “安静”在2014年4月报道说，尽管在随后的采访中，这四名成员团聚了，但爱情轻描淡写了关于即将举行的团聚的话题。 Auf der Maur在2016年4月在一次采访中表示，她不再有时间或精力进行全面的聚会，但有兴趣用回顾性的唱片和少量旅行日期来包裹洞的遗产。

Auf der Maur的首张录音室专辑“ Auf der Maur”从2001年到2003年在美国和加拿大的各种工作室录制，2004年2月在Capitol Records上发行。 Auf der Maur由克里斯·戈斯（Chris Goss）制作，本人为唱片会议提供了资金，因为她在录音时没有签约唱片公司，并且在后期制作期间，她的预算用完了，她无法混合专辑。据Metacritic称，她不久之后就接受了国会大厦的录音合同，并将“ Auf der Maur”发布给了“通常有利的评论”。这张专辑的支持单曲 - “跟随海浪”，“真正的谎言”和“品尝您”  - 在英国取得了适度的成功，在英国单一排行榜的前40名中绘制了排行榜。截至2010年，“ Auf der Maur”在全球售出了200,000份。
Gaboriau之前嫁给了蒙特利尔市议员Nick Auf Der Maur，并且是摇滚音乐家Melissa Auf der Maur的母亲。她和她已故的35岁伴侣，作家兼教授HervéDeFontenay，有一个儿子，建筑师Yves de Fontenay。

Auf der Maur在康科迪亚大学（Concordia University）的一名学生时成立了独立摇滚乐队Tinker后，于1993年开始表演。她在1994年夏天被招募为美国替代摇滚乐队Hole的贝斯手，并被包括在多个洞发行中，包括专辑《 Celebrity Skin》（1998年）。在1999年离开霍尔之后，Auf der Maur短暂加入了粉碎的南瓜，作为其2000年巡回演出的巡回演出，并开始了她的个人职业。她的首张录音室专辑“ Auf der Maur”于2004年发行，在Capitol Records和她的第二张录音室专辑“ Out Out我们的脑海”上发行，于2010年在她自己的独立唱片公司Phi -Madm Music上发行。她还与Indochine，Rufus Wainwright，Ric Ocasek和永无止境的白光合作。
report_src: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur出生于加拿大魁北克省蒙特利尔市[1]。

question_en: What is the life expectancy of a horse?
pos_context_en: Depending on breed, management and environment, the modern domestic horse has a life expectancy of 25 to 30 years. Uncommonly, a few animals live into their 40s and, occasionally, beyond. The oldest verifiable record was "Old Billy", a 19th-century horse that lived to the age of 62. In modern times, Sugar Puff, who had been listed in "Guinness World Records" as the world's oldest living pony, died in 2007 at age 56.
neg_context_title_en: Field artillery in the American Civil War
British Army during the Victorian Era
neg_context_en: The number of horses killed in the war was at the time unprecedented in modern warfare. For example, in the Relief of Kimberley, French's cavalry rode 500 horses to their deaths in a single day. The wastage was particularly heavy among British forces for several reasons: overloading of horses with unnecessary equipment and saddlery, failure to rest and acclimatise horses after long sea voyages and, later in the war, poor management by inexperienced mounted troops and distant control by unsympathetic staffs. The average life expectancy of a British horse, from the time of its arrival in Port Elizabeth, was around six weeks.
It is unknown as to why Prospect Point lived as long as he did. The average life expectancy for a Thoroughbred is between the ages of 25-28.

Horses were required to pull the enormous weight of the cannon and ammunition; on average, each horse pulled about 700 pounds (317.5 kg). Each gun in a battery used two six-horse teams (for normal field artillery; heavier guns required much larger teams): one team pulled a limber that attached to the trail of the gun to form a four-wheeled wagon of sorts; the other pulled a limber that attached to a caisson. The large number of horses posed a logistical challenge for the artillery, because they had to be fed, maintained, and replaced when worn out or injured. Artillery horses were generally selected second from the pool of high quality animals; cavalry mounts were the best horses. The life expectancy of an artillery horse was under eight months. They suffered from disease, exhaustion from long marches—typically 16 miles (25.8 km) in 10 hours—and battle injuries.

Each wooden carousel horse that is attached to the operational carousel required several hours of restoration labor. Upon arrival to the museum, many of these artifacts dated close to 100 years old, and had an original life expectancy of around five years. Due to wood rot, many of the horses had to be completely re-carved by hand. The process of re-carving utilized the same primitive tools that would have been used in the original making. It is estimated that thousands of hours of labor were volunteered to complete the projects. To keep with historical building styles, each horse contains wooden dowels instead of nails (Reinhardt,2014).

The cavalry, obsessed with the charge with cold steel, had "ceased to be in any useful sense mobile". They used heavy chargers as mounts rather than lighter horses. The heavy mounts required acclimatisation and recovery after long sea voyages, and needed plenty of forage when grazing was sparse. They were also overloaded with unnecessary or over-decorated equipment and saddlery. The average life expectancy of a British horse from the time of its arrival in South Africa was around six weeks.

Life expectancy usually varies within a range. For example, a Beagle (average life expectancy 13.3 years) usually lives to around 12–15 years, and a Scottish Terrier (average life expectancy 12 years) usually lives to around 10–16 years.

Depending on maturity, breed, and work expected, horses are usually put under saddle and trained to be ridden between the ages of two and four. Although Thoroughbred race horses are put on the track as young as the age of two in some countries, horses specifically bred for sports such as dressage are generally not put under saddle until they are three or four years old, because their bones and muscles are not solidly developed. For endurance riding competition, horses are not deemed mature enough to compete until they are a full 60 calendar months (five years) old.

Writing for Allmusic, critic William Ruhlman wrote that "Singer/songwriter Jeffrey Foucault likes to play in a familiar, slow-moving country-folk style; this is a guy who has been to the desert on "A Horse with No Name," searching for a "Heart of Gold." The lyrical reflections he expresses so introspectively also tend to be spare and allusive... For the most part, however, Foucault is a miniaturist as interested in evoking mood as meaning in his atmospheric music, expecting his listeners to fill in the blanks." David Kleiner of Minor 7th wrote "Writers should check out Foucault's similes, here ("singing / darker than the sea") and throughout ("smoking like a river / in the dark before the dawn"), as the comparison is always unexpected and richer for it... What you remember is, "When I had one good coat, I was warm." You disappear. Only Foucault's songs remain, as haunting as they are haunted."

He explained the album title, saying: "If you listen to it, and look at some of the old cats who’ve used the title before, one of The Beatles [George Harrison] was actually called “the dark horse” before, because you didn’t know how much of his musical involvement had a hand in what Beatles material came out. The dark horse meaning, like, the least expected person to win the race, or the least expected person to win the Super Bowl. I look at the dark horse as the person that you don’t always expect to see coming out on top. I consider myself a dark horse in the industry."
question_src: 一匹马的预期寿命是什么？
pos_context_src: 根据品种，管理和环境，现代家族的预期寿命为25至30年。罕见的是，一些动物生活在40多岁的时候，偶尔甚至超越。最古老的可验证记录是“老比利”，这是一匹19世纪的马，居住在62岁。在现代，糖粉被“吉尼斯世界纪录”列为世界上最古老的小马，他于2007年去世，享年56岁。
neg_context_title_src: 美国内战中的野战炮兵
neg_context_src: 战争中杀死的马数在现代战争中是前所未有的。例如，在金伯利（Kimberley）的救济中，法国骑兵在一天之内骑了500匹马。在英军中，浪费尤其严重，原因有几个：用不必要的装备和马鞍超负荷，在长长的海上航行后未能休息和适应马匹，后来在战争中，没有经验的骑兵部队和遥不可及的员工控制着不同意的员工。从到达伊丽莎白港（Port Elizabeth）的时候，英国马的平均预期寿命大约六个星期。
对于为什么Prospect Point过着他的生活，这是未知的。纯种的平均预期寿命在25-28岁之间。

要求马匹拉大炮和弹药的重量。平均而言，每匹马都拉了约700磅（317.5公斤）。电池中的每根枪都使用了两个六匹马队（对于普通的野战炮兵；较重的枪需要更大的球队）：一支球队拉了一支弯曲者，该弯曲者连接到枪的步道上，形成了四轮的货车。另一个拉了一个连接到凯森的弯曲者。大量马匹对炮兵构成了后勤挑战，因为它们必须在磨损或受伤时被喂食，维护和更换。通常从高质量动物池中选第二炮弹。骑兵坐骑是最好的马。火炮马的预期寿命不到八个月。他们患有疾病，漫长的游行疲惫 - 在10个小时内经常16英里（25.8公里）和战斗伤害。
连接到操作旋转木马的每匹木制旋转木马都需要几个小时的恢复劳动。到达博物馆后，许多这些文物的历史可追溯到100年，其原始预期寿命约为五年。由于木质腐烂，许多马匹都必须手工重新雕刻。重新货架的过程利用了原始制造中本应使用的相同原始工具。据估计，数千个小时的劳动力是自愿完成项目的。为了保持历史建筑风格，每匹马都包含木销，而不是指甲（Reinhardt，2014年）。
骑兵迷恋冷钢，“在任何有用的手机上都停止了”。他们使用重型充电器作为坐骑而不是轻便的马匹。长山需要在长海航行后进行适应和恢复，并且在稀疏时需要大量觅食。他们还装有不必要或装修过度的设备和马鞍。从到达南非之时，英国马的平均预期寿命约为六个星期。
预期寿命通常在一个范围内变化。例如，小猎犬（平均预期寿命为13。3年）通常生活在12  -  15年左右，而苏格兰梗（平均预期寿命为12年）通常生活在10  -  16年左右。
根据成熟度，繁殖和预期的工作，通常将马匹放在鞍座下，并受过训练的年龄在2至4岁之间。尽管在某些国家 /地区，纯种赛马的年龄与两个国家一样年轻，但专门为盛装舞步而繁殖的马匹通常直到三到四岁，因为它们的骨骼和肌肉才牢固地发育。对于耐力骑行比赛，直到整整60个日历月（五岁）才能竞争，马才被认为成熟了。

批评家威廉·鲁尔曼（William Ruhlman）写作的写作写道：“歌手/词曲作者杰弗里·福柯（Jeffrey Foucault）喜欢以一种熟悉的，缓慢的乡村狂风风格玩耍；这是一个曾在“没有名字”的马上去沙漠的家伙，他们在寻找“金子之心”。在他的大气音乐中，人们可以唤起心情，这是他的听众能够填补空白。”第七名的大卫·克莱纳（David Kleiner）写道：“作家应该在这里查看福柯的明式（“唱歌 /黑暗，比大海更黑”）和整个过程（“像河一样吸烟 /在黎明前的黑暗中吸烟”），因为比较总是出乎意料的，而且更加富有……你记得的是，当我有一件好外套时，我很温暖。
他解释了这张专辑的标题：“如果您听它的话，并看一些以前使用过标题的老猫，甲壳虫乐队（George Harrison）实际上被称为“ The Dark Horse”，因为您不知道他的音乐参与不知道甲壳虫乐队有多少甲壳虫的材料。期望我认为自己是一个黑马。”
report_src: 现代家马的预期寿命通常为25至30年，具体受品种、饲养管理和环境等因素影响[1]；极少数个体能活到40岁以上，例如19世纪的“老比利”验证活到了62岁，而现代纪录里名为“糖粉”的小马也活到56岁[1]。

question_en: How did King Arthur die?
pos_context_title_en: King Arthur and His Knights of the Round Table
pos_context_en: After the Grail is found, the last battle of the Knights of the Round Table is fought. In this battle many knights die, and with them King Arthur, Sir Gawain, who is Arthur's nephew, and Mordred, the wicked son of King Arthur, and his half-sister Morgana le Fay. King Arthur is taken away to Avalon, a secret island after he is terribly wounded by Mordred while he was making the final stab with his sword to kill Mordred.
neg_context_title_en: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
neg_context_en: There are evident parallels between these stories and those which surround other medieval characters like Barbarossa or King Arthur. It is said that Barbarossa did not die, but retired to a cave in the Kyffhäuser mountain, and that one day, when the ravens no long fly around the mountain, he will awake and restore Germany to its ancient greatness. King Arthur, according to many traditions, lives in many hills and caves of the island of Great Britain. His most famous dwelling is the Eildon Hill in Scotland, where he took refuge after the battle of Camlann.

Geoffrey Ashe points out that Arthur is said by Geoffrey of Monmouth to have crossed into Gaul twice, once to help a Roman emperor and once to subdue a civil war. Riothamus did both, assuming that he was a king in Britain as well as Armorica. Arthur is also said to have been betrayed by one of his advisers, and Riothamus was betrayed by one of his supposed allies. Finally, it is well known how King Arthur was carried off to Avalon (called "insula Auallonis" by Geoffrey of Monmouth, the first author to mention the legendary isle) before he died; Riothamus, after his defeat at Déols, was last known to have fled to the kingdom of the Germanic Burgundians, perhaps passing through a town called Avallon (though no ancient source on Riothamus mentions him being anywhere in the area of Avallon).

The red-billed chough has a long association with Cornwall, and appears on the Cornish coat of arms. According to Cornish legend King Arthur did not die after his last battle but rather his soul migrated into the body of a red-billed chough, the red colour of its bill and legs being derived from the blood of the last battle and hence killing this bird was unlucky. Legend also holds that after the last Cornish chough departs from Cornwall, then the return of the chough, as happened in 2001, will mark the return of King Arthur.

The French poet Chrétien de Troyes created a version of a naive, victimised King Arthur who is cuckolded by his allegedly best friend Lancelot and left by his knights who rather seek for the Holy Grail than to stand by his side while Mordred is about to become Arthur's nemesis. Films like First Knight that pick up these motifs, depict Arthur as a King whose Britons fail him and who lives in a gigantic castle which must have required such a great deal of drudgery that it is hard to believe in his legendary popularity. Finally he dies tragically. In "Arthur of the Britons" the protagonist does not die, nor does he have to escape to Avalon or Brittany in France. In the penultimate episode, which probably should have been the second-season finale, under threat of attack by the Scots, Arthur comes close to securing a treaty between himself, Cerdig and Yorath the Jute, but a carelessly placed target board results in a death, and old hostilities quickly re-surface. Arthur and his men return home, disappointed, but still hopeful that one day, there will be a lasting peace.
In 1975, the series was edited into a 90-minute direct-to-video movie, "King Arthur, the Young Warlord". The complete series was released on DVD in 2008, by Network DVD. While the movie is available in the US and the UK, the series is only available in the UK.

Ashamed of his failures, Arthur tries to throw away the sword, but the Lady of the Lake returns it and shows him a vision of England's future under Vortigern's rule. Coming to terms with his responsibility, Arthur reunites with Bedivere. When they return to the rebel hideout, however, they discover all of their allies dead, Vortigern having found them and delivered an ultimatum: if Arthur does not surrender himself, the captured mage will die. Arthur surrenders himself, but as Vortigern is about to execute his nephew, a giant snake summoned by the mage attacks and devours Vortigern's men. While Bedivere and the others lead an attack on the castle, a desperate Vortigern sacrifices his only daughter and is transformed into the demon knight, confronting Arthur in a separate dimension. Despite his fighting skill, Arthur is beaten, and he is about to submit when he witnesses a vision of his father, convincing him to accept the sword and his character as his own. Arthur violently slays Vortigern but blesses him as he dies.

The possibility of Arthur's return is first mentioned by William of Malmesbury in 1125: "But Arthur’s grave is nowhere seen, whence antiquity of fables still claims that he will return." In the "Miracles of St. Mary of Laon" ("De Miraculis Sanctae Mariae Laudensis"), written by a French cleric and chronicler named Hériman of Tournai in c. 1145, but referring to events that occurred in 1113, mention is made of the Breton and Cornish belief that Arthur still lived. As Constance Bullock-Davies demonstrated, various non-Welsh sources indicate that this belief in Arthur's eventual messianic return was extremely widespread amongst the Britons from the 12th century onwards. How much earlier than this it existed is still debated – it was often linked to the expulsion of the English and Normans from Britain. This did, in fact, remain a powerful aspect of the Arthurian legend through the medieval period and beyond. So John Lydgate in his "Fall of Princes" (1431–8) notes the belief that Arthur "shall resorte as lord and sovereyne Out of fayrye and regne in Breteyne" and Philip II of Spain apparently swore, at the time of his marriage to Mary I of England in 1554, that he would resign the kingdom if Arthur should return.

Arthur's mole is removed and is told that the melanoma has been dealt with. The following month Arthur coughs blood and asks Dom to examine him. Dom orders a CT scan which reveals that he has secondary tumours on his lungs. Arthur tells Morven about his condition and accepts he must endure a tough course of chemotherapy. After undergoing chemotherapy Arthur is hopeful that his illness will be cured. He and Morven decide to get married the same day to celebrate his optimism. But Arthur is told by Sacha that his cancer has spread to his stomach and is terminal. Ostlere said Arthur was scared and turned to Sacha for "peace of mind" but did not expect to be told that he will die. Arthur is left in a "state of denial, anger and fear". He and Morven agree to cancel their wedding until Arthur has "a moment of clarity" and realises he wants to marry Morven more than anything else. The two go on and marry in a ceremony at the hospital surrounded by friends. The actor explained that "the wedding is about two people doing what they can to carry on and have an amazing day with all their family and friends. It's the best day of Arthur's life... but also the worst."

Arthur is now King and hard at work establishing Camelot as the center of government and authority. A few ambitious lords from other parts of Britain have designs on Arthur's throne, and Merlin is kept busy preventing them from doing so. Having unwisely taken Morgause (his half-sister) to his bed as a very young man after his first battle and victory, Arthur is now the father of Mordred. Merlin foresees that Mordred will be the cause of Arthur's death, but doesn't understand how it will happen. He spends a great deal of time traveling in disguise and observing Morgause's scheming and intrigue.

Arthur Pendragon is the son of King Uther and Igraine. The wizard Merlin had Arthur brought up by the knight Sir Ector and his son Kay. When Uther died from an illness without being able to see his son, Merlin held a contest in London where whoever pulls Excalibur from the stone will become the new king. When Arthur found the sword in the stone while going to retrieve a recently knighted Kay's sword, he showed it to Kay where Sir Ector alerted those partaking in the contest of it in order to see if Arthur was the one who pulled it from the stone. When everyone else failed and Arthur pulled the sword from the stone, Arthur was automatically made the next king and reunited with his mother. In his difficult beginnings as the ruler of Camelot, King Arthur had to unite the kings of Britain in order to fight off the Saxons. He even gained Merlin as his mythical advisor and protector. After he unknowingly seduced Morgause, he had a vision that his unborn son would rise up and destroy him. This ended up resulting in the birth of Mordred as Merlin worked to prepare King Arthur for the day this prophecy happens. Following a fight with the Romans, King Arthur's half-sister Morgan le Fay became one of the fiercest foes of King Arthur, Merlin, and all of Camelot. When it came to the Battle of Camlann, King Arthur and Mordred faced each other where both of them became badly wounded. In his dying breath, King Arthur instructed Sir Bedivere throw Excalibur into Lake Benoye. At first he was reluctant, Sir Bedivere threw it toward the lake where it was caught by the hand of the Lady of the Lake. After a night has passed, nine women dressed as queens came and loaded King Arthur's body onto a barge and rowed it across the lake as Merlin showed them the way into Avalon.
question_src: 亚瑟王如何死亡？
pos_context_title_src: 亚瑟王和他的圆桌骑士
pos_context_src: 找到圣杯后，圆桌骑士的最后一场战斗将进行。在这场战斗中，许多骑士都死了，他们与亚瑟王的戈恩爵士（Arthur Sir Gawain）一起，他是亚瑟（Arthur）的侄子，而亚瑟王（King Arthur）的邪恶儿子莫德雷德（Mordred）和他的同父异母姐姐摩根娜·勒·费伊（Morgana Le Fay）。亚瑟国王（King Arthur）被带到阿瓦隆（Avalon），这是一个秘密岛屿，他在莫德雷德（Mordred）受伤时，他用剑杀死了莫德雷德（Mordred）。
neg_context_src: 这些故事与围绕其他中世纪角色（例如Barbarossa或Arthur国王）的故事之间有明显的相似之处。据说，巴巴罗萨没有死，而是退休到凯瑟斯山的一个山洞，有一天，当乌鸦没有长时间飞行到山上时，他将醒着并恢复德国的古老伟大。根据许多传统，亚瑟王生活在英国岛上的许多山丘和洞穴中。他最著名的住宅是苏格兰的埃尔登山（Eildon Hill），在坎伦战役之后，他避难了。

杰弗里·阿什（Geoffrey Ashe）指出，蒙茅斯（Monmouth）的杰弗里（Geoffrey）说，亚瑟（Arthur）曾两次越过高卢（Gaul），一次帮助罗马皇帝（Roman Emperor），曾经征服内战。 Riothamus都做到了这两个，假设他是英国和Armorica的国王。据说亚瑟（Arthur）也被他的一位顾问出卖了，黎莎（Riothamus）被他的一位盟友背叛。最后，众所周知，在他去世之前，蒙茅斯的杰弗里（Geoffrey）是蒙茅斯（Monmouth）的杰弗里（Geoffrey），他是如何将亚瑟王（King Arthur）带到阿瓦隆（Avalon）的；黎塔曼（Riothamus）在戴尔斯（Déols）失败后，最后众所周知，逃到了日耳曼burgundians的王国，也许经过一个名为阿瓦隆（Avallon）的小镇（尽管riothamus上没有古老的消息来源，他提到他在阿瓦隆地区的任何地方）。

红嘴谷（Chough）与康沃尔（Cornwall）有很长的联系，并出现在康沃尔（Cornish）的徽章上。根据康沃尔传奇人物的说法，亚瑟国王在他的最后一场战斗之后没有死，而是他的灵魂迁移到了红嘴谷的身体中，其账单和腿部的红色是源自最后一场战斗的血，因此杀死这只鸟是不幸的。传说还认为，在最后一场康沃尔（Cornish Chough）从康沃尔（Cornwall）出发之后，当2001年发生的乔夫（Chough）返回将标志着亚瑟王（King Arthur）的归来。

法国诗人克里蒂安·德·特洛伊斯（Chrétiende Troyes）创造了一个幼稚，受害的国王亚瑟（King Arthur）的版本，他被他的据称是最好的朋友兰斯洛特（Lancelot）戴上戴帽帽，并由他的骑士们留下，而他的骑士们则宁愿寻求圣杯，而不是在莫德雷德（Mordred）即将成为亚瑟（Arthur）的夜间的夜间。像第一骑士这样的电影拾起了这些主题，将亚瑟描绘成一个英国人，他的英国人失败了，住在一座巨大的城堡里，这一定需要如此巨大的畏缩，以至于很难相信他的传奇人物。最后，他悲惨地死了。在“英国人的亚瑟”中，主角没有死，也不必逃到法国的阿瓦隆或布列塔尼。在倒数第二季，这可能是第二季的结局，在苏格兰人受到攻击的威胁下，亚瑟（Arthur）接近确保自己之间的条约，塞尔迪格（Cerdig）和黄麻（Jute）Yorath，但不小心放置的目标委员会导致死亡，而老式的敌对行动很快就会重新出现。亚瑟（Arthur）和他的手下回到家，感到失望，但仍然希望有一天会有持久的和平。
1975年，该系列被编辑成90分钟直接到视频的电影《亚瑟王》，《年轻的军阀》。完整系列是由Network DVD在2008年在DVD上发布的。虽然这部电影在美国和英国都可以上市，但该系列仅在英国可用。

亚瑟（Arthur）为自己的失败感到羞耻，试图扔掉剑，但湖中的夫人将其归还，并向他展示了沃特格恩（Vortigern）统治下的英格兰未来的愿景。亚瑟（Arthur）与贝德维尔（Bedivere）团聚。但是，当他们返回叛军的藏身处时，他们发现了所有盟友死了，沃蒂格恩找到了他们并发出了最后通atum：如果亚瑟不投降自己，被俘虏的法师将死亡。亚瑟（Arthur）屈服于自己，但随着Vortigern即将处决他的侄子，一条巨型蛇被法师袭击召唤并吞噬了Vortigern的男子。贝德维尔（Bedivere）和其他人对城堡进行了攻击，但绝望的沃尔蒂格恩（Vortigern）牺牲了他的唯一女儿，并被转变为恶魔骑士，并在一个单独的维度面对亚瑟（Arthur）。尽管他的战斗技巧，亚瑟还是被殴打了，当他目睹父亲的愿景，说服他接受剑和他的性格时，他即将提交。亚瑟（Arthur）猛烈地杀死了沃特格恩（Vortigern），但在他死亡时祝福他。

马尔姆斯伯里（Malmesbury）的威廉（William of Malmesbury）在1125年首先提到了亚瑟（Arthur）返回的可能性：“但是亚瑟（Arthur）的坟墓无处可见，寓言的古代仍然声称他会返回。”在《洛恩的圣玛丽奇迹》（“ de miraculis sanctae mariae laudensis”）中，由一位法国牧师和编年史家在c中名叫Hériman。 1145年，但指的是1113年发生的事件，提到了布雷顿和康沃尔仍然生活的信念。正如康斯坦斯·布洛克·戴维斯（Constance Bullock-Davies）所表明的那样，各种非韦尔什的消息来源表明，这种对亚瑟最终弥赛亚归来的信念在12世纪以来的英国人中非常普遍。比这已经存在的时间要早​​，但仍在辩论 - 它通常与英国和诺曼人从英国驱逐出境有关。实际上，在中世纪及以后，这确实是亚瑟王传奇的强大方面。因此，约翰·莱德盖特（John Lydgate）在他的“王子堕落”（1431–8）中指出，信念是，亚瑟（Arthur）将以布雷特尼（Breteyne）的法耶里（Lord）和索维（Sovereyne）为索尔特（Lord），而西班牙的菲利普二世（Philip II）显然发誓，他在1554年与英格兰玛丽（Mary I）结婚时，他将在1554年辞去王国的辞职。

亚瑟的痣被清除，并被告知黑色素瘤已被处理。接下来的一个月，亚瑟咳嗽，要求唐检查他。 DOM下令进行CT扫描，显示他的肺部有次要肿瘤。亚瑟（Arthur）告诉莫文（Morven）关于他的状况，并接受他必须忍受艰难的化学疗法。在进行化学疗法后，亚瑟（Arthur）希望能够治愈他的病。他和Morven决定在同一天结婚以庆祝自己的乐观。但是萨莎（Sacha）告诉亚瑟（Arthur），他的癌症已经扩散到他的胃中，并且是终极。奥斯特勒（Ostlere）说，亚瑟（Arthur）感到害怕，并转向萨莎（Sacha）“安心”，但没想到会被告知他会死。亚瑟（Arthur）处于“否认，愤怒和恐惧状态”。他和莫文（Morven）同意取消婚礼，直到亚瑟（Arthur）拥有“清晰的时刻”，并意识到他想嫁给Morven比其他任何事情都要多。两人继续在朋友包围的医院举行的仪式上结婚。这位演员解释说：“婚礼是关于两个人竭尽所能继续前进的事情，并与他们的家人和朋友度过了美好的一天。这是亚瑟一生中最好的一天……但也是最糟糕的一天。”

现在，亚瑟（Arthur）是国王，努力将卡梅洛特（Camelot）作为政府和权威的中心。来自英国其他地区的一些雄心勃勃的领主在亚瑟的宝座上设计了设计，而梅林一直忙于阻止他们这样做。在他的第一次战斗和胜利之后，阿瑟（Morgause）不知所措（他的​​同父异母的姐姐）作为一个非常年轻的男人床，亚瑟（Arthur）现在是莫德雷德（Mordred）的父亲。梅林（Merlin）预计莫德雷德（Mordred）将是亚瑟（Arthur）死亡的原因，但不明白它将如何发生。他花了很多时间伪装和观察Morgause的策略和阴谋。

亚瑟·彭德拉贡（Arthur Pendragon）是乌瑟（King Uther）和伊格雷（Igraine）的儿子。巫师梅林（Merlin）由骑士爵士（Sir Ector）和他的儿子凯（Kay）抚养亚瑟（Arthur）。当乌瑟（Uther）因疾病而无法见到儿子而死亡时，梅林（Merlin）在伦敦举行了一场比赛，从石头上拉埃奇里伯（Excalibur）的人将成为新国王。当亚瑟（Arthur）在取回最近被骑士的凯（Kay）的剑的同时发现了石头上的剑时，他向凯（Kay）展示了它，埃克特爵士（Sir Ector）提醒那些参与其中的人，以查看亚瑟（Arthur）是否是从石头上拉出它的人。当其他所有人失败时，亚瑟从石头上拉了剑时，亚瑟自动成为下一个国王并与母亲团聚。亚瑟王（King Arthur）在他作为卡米洛特（Camelot）的统治者的艰难开局中必须团结英国国王，以与撒克逊人作斗争。他甚至获得了梅林（Merlin）的神话顾问和保护者。在他在不知不觉中诱骗了Morgause之后，他有一个远见，他的未出生的儿子会崛起并摧毁他。这最终导致了莫德雷德（Mordred）的诞生，因为梅林（Merlin）努力为阿瑟国王（King Arthur）做好准备。在与罗马人战斗之后，亚瑟王的同父异母姐姐摩根·勒·费伊（Morgan Le Fay）成为亚瑟王，梅林和整个卡米洛特的最激烈的敌人之一。当涉及到坎伦战役时，亚瑟王和莫德雷德彼此面对面，他们俩都受了重伤。亚瑟国王在垂死的呼吸中指示贝德维尔爵士将Excalibur扔进了贝诺湖。起初，他不愿意，贝德维尔爵士将其扔到被湖女士手中抓住的湖中。一个夜晚过去了，穿着皇后的九个妇女来了，将亚瑟王的尸体装在驳船上，并在梅林向她们展示进入阿瓦隆的道路时将其划过湖上。
report_src: 亚瑟王在寻找圣杯后的最终战役中与邪恶之子莫德雷德交锋，被莫德雷德所伤后仍以剑将其杀死，随后因重伤被送往神秘岛屿阿瓦隆，并最终伤重身亡。[1]

question_en: Does Buddhism believe in Jesus?
pos_context_en: Although analogies have been drawn between Buddhism and Christianity, there are differences between the two religions beginning with monotheism's place at the core of Christianity, and Buddhism's orientation towards non-theism (the lack of relevancy of the existence of a creator deity) which runs counter to teachings about God in Christianity; and extending to the importance of grace in Christianity against the rejection of interference with karma in Theravada Buddhism, etc. Another difference between the two traditions is the Christian belief in the centrality of the crucifixion of Jesus as a single event believed to act as the atonement of sins and its direct contrast to Buddhist teachings.
neg_context_en: Takahashi preached that Buddhism and Christianity in the present age have become academic, or formalized, and changed into a faith based on other powers. In response to this, he advocated returning to the times of Gotama Siddhartha and Jesus Christ in many of his literary works, starting with “"Ningen/Shaka"” (“Human Beings/Gotama Buddha”). In addition, Takahashi emphasized that neither Jesus Christ nor Gotama Siddhartha preached the thoughts of other powers at all, and that Christianity and Buddhism in their respective times were not complicated like the Christianity and Buddhism of today. With regard to the thoughts of other powers influencing these religions, these laws of nature (the pure religious base of Buddhism, Islam, and Christianity) transformed as a result of the intentions of those who were in power over time, as well as the interpretations of the many scholars; the cores of these laws of nature were lost, various theories became mixed, and they became academized in a complex manner and lost their substance. In addition, these laws of nature were intentionally distorted and conveyed to people for the purpose of individual's own benefit, and people were made to believe that those who obstructed this would be met with strict counteractions. This new set of distorted laws were slowly deemed as being the laws of nature as taught in today's versions of those religions.

Most scholars believe there is no historical evidence of any influence by Buddhism on Christianity, Paula Fredriksen stating that no serious scholarly work has placed the origins of Christianity outside the backdrop of 1st century Palestinian Judaism. Leslie Houlden states that although modern parallels between the teachings of Jesus and Buddha have been drawn, these comparisons emerged after missionary contacts in the 19th century and there is no historically reliable evidence of contacts between Buddhism and Jesus.

In 2008, Al Mohler declined to sign An Evangelical Manifesto, publishing a lengthy explanation for his decision. Mohler is an evangelical and an exclusivist, which means that he believes Jesus is the only way through which an individual can attain salvation or have a relationship with God the Father. As a Calvinist, Mohler believes that human salvation is a free gift from God which cannot be earned by human action or will and is only given to the elect. He has publicly advanced this position with respect to Judaism, Islam, and Catholicism. He recently stated that "any belief system, any world view, whether it's Zen Buddhism or Hinduism or dialectical materialism for that matter, Marxism, that keeps persons captive and keeps them from coming to faith in the Lord Jesus Christ, yes, is a demonstration of Satanic power." He believes Muslims are motivated by demonic power and in the months after the September 11, 2001 attacks, Mohler characterized Islamic views of Jesus as false and destructive:

In Tilakkhana, de Silva finds a foundation for a constructive dialogue with Buddhists regarding the role of Jesus as saviour in Christianity. Buddhists overcome Tilakkhana by turning attention away from the self and focusing their attention towards anattā; therefore, the ultimate goal to which Buddhism is directed towards – Nibbana – can be achieved by self effort. This, de Silva believes, is one of the "deepest dilemmas in Buddhism," leading him to ask the question "What is the self that denies the self and at the same time asserts that it alone can save the self?" He infers that "to deny the self and to affirm self-sufficiency is a contradiction."

Late in the 20th century, historian Jerry H. Bentley also wrote of similarities and stated that it is possible "that Buddhism influenced the early development of Christianity" and suggested "attention to many parallels concerning the births, lives, doctrines, and deaths of the Buddha and Jesus". Some high level Buddhists have drawn analogies between Jesus and Buddhism, e.g. in 2001 the Dalai Lama stated that "Jesus Christ also lived previous lives", and added that "So, you see, he reached a high state, either as a Bodhisattva, or an enlightened person, through Buddhist practice or something like that." Thich Nhat Hanh affirmed core Christian beliefs such as the trinity, and the death and resurrection of Jesus Christ, in his book "Living Buddha, Living Christ". Bokin Kim, similarly, sees Christ as the Buddha Dharmakaya, and Jesus as similar to Gautama who was just a historical manifestation of the transhistorical Buddha.

Although modern parallels between the teachings of Jesus and Buddhist philosophy have been drawn (by the 14th Dalai Lama for example), these comparisons emerged after missionary contacts in the 19th century, and there is no historically reliable evidence of contacts between Buddhism and Jesus during his life. Modern scholarship has almost unanimously agreed that claims of the travels of Jesus to Tibet, Kashmir or India (see Unknown years of Jesus) and the influence of Buddhism on his teachings are without historical basis.
The similarities between the teachings of Buddha and Jesus have been noted. On this subject, Bible scholar Marcus Borg and Buddhist Jack Kornfield collaborated on a book, "Jesus and Buddha: The Parallel Sayings'.'
