Though some early Christians were aware of Buddhism which was practiced in both the Greek and Roman Empires in the pre-Christian period, the majority of modern Christian scholarship has roundly rejected any historical basis for the travels of Jesus to India or Tibet or direct influences between the teachings of Christianity in the West and Buddhism; and has seen the attempts at parallel symbolism as cases of parallelomania which exaggerate resemblances. However, in the East syncretism between Nestorian Christianity and Buddhism was widespread along the Silk Road in Antiquity and the Middle Ages, and was especially pronounced in the medieval Church of the East in China, as evidenced by the Jesus Sutras.

Late in the 20th century, historian Jerry H. Bentley also wrote of similarities and stated that it is possible "that Buddhism influenced the early development of Christianity" and suggested "attention to many parallels concerning the births, lives, doctrines, and deaths of the Buddha and Jesus". Some high level Buddhists have drawn analogies between Jesus and Buddhism, e.g. in 2001 the Dalai Lama stated that "Jesus Christ also lived previous lives", and added that "So, you see, he reached a high state, either as a Bodhisattva, or an enlightened person, through Buddhist practice or something like that."

Faith is included in lists of virtues for laypeople, and is therefore described as a progressive quality for devotees, as a devotee who is new to the Buddhist religion is characterized as "young in devotion". Thus, there are various lists of virtues in which faith is included, and other early traditions have also given faith a prominent role, such as the Sarvāstivāda tradition. Moreover, early Buddhism describes faith as an important quality in stream-enterers, a state preceding enlightenment. In standard descriptions of people going forth (taking ordination as a monk), faith is mentioned as an important motivation. Despite this role, some Indologists such as André Bareau and Lily De Silva believed early Buddhism did not assign the same value to faith as in some other religions, such as Christianity. Bareau argued that "Buddhism has no comparable [idea of] pure faith as in Christianity, ... The idea of blind faith, an absolute faith in a master's word, goes completely against the spirit of early Buddhism." Translator Caroline Rhys Davids disagreed with such statements, however, stating that "faith is no less important than it is for all religions worthy of the name". Indologist Richard Gombrich argues that Buddhism does not prescribe believing in someone or something to the extent of going against reason. Also, Gombrich believes the Buddha did not aim to create a religion that focuses on devotion to his person, though he recognizes that such devotion already started when the Buddha was still alive. Gombrich notes that there is a lot of material in the early scriptures emphasizing how important faith is, but argues that "the growth of Buddhist rites and liturgies was surely a wholly unintended consequence of the Buddha's preaching".
question_src: 佛教相信耶稣吗？
pos_context_src: 尽管佛教和基督教之间已经借鉴了类比，但两种宗教从一神论在基督教核心的地位开始，佛教对非神学的方向（缺乏与基督教教义相反的基督教教义相反的相关性）的方向存在差异；并扩展了恩典在基督教中的重要性，反对拒绝在西瓦达佛教中对业力的干扰等。这两种传统之间的另一个区别是，基督教对耶稣被钉十字架的中心地位的信仰是一种单一的事件，被认为是罪恶及其与佛教教义的直接相反。
neg_context_title_src: 林恩·德·席尔瓦（Lynn de Silva）的神学
neg_context_src: 高桥宣讲，当今时代的佛教和基督教已经成为学术或形式化，并根据其他力量变成了信仰。为此，他倡导在他的许多文学作品中返回哥达马·西达塔（Gotama Siddhartha）和耶稣基督时代，首先是“ ningen/shaka”（“人类/哥达玛佛”）。此外，高桥还强调，耶稣基督和哥达玛·悉达尔（Gotama Siddhartha）都没有宣讲其他力量的思想，而在各自时代，基督教和佛教都不像今天的基督教和佛教那样复杂。关于影响这些宗教的其他力量的思想，这些自然法则（佛教，伊斯兰教和基督教的纯粹宗教基础）是由于那些随着时间的推移掌权的人的意图以及许多学者的解释而改变了。这些自然法则的核心丢失了，各种理论变得混杂，它们以复杂的方式学术并失去了实质。此外，这些自然定律被故意扭曲并传达给人们，以个人的利益，使人们相信那些阻碍这种阻碍的人将受到严格的反应。这套扭曲的法律逐渐被认为是当今宗教版本所教授的自然定律。
大多数学者认为，没有历史证据表明佛教对基督教的影响，宝拉·弗雷德里克森（Paula Fredriksen）指出，没有认真的学术工作使基督教的起源远远超出了1世纪巴勒斯坦犹太教的背景。莱斯利·霍尔登（Leslie Houlden）指出，尽管耶稣和佛陀教义之间的现代相似之处是在19世纪的传教接触之后出现的，并且在历史上没有可靠的证据证明佛教与耶稣之间的接触。

2008年，艾尔·莫勒（Al Mohler）拒绝签署福音派宣言，为他的决定发表了漫长的解释。莫勒是福音派和排他性主义者，这意味着他认为耶稣是个人可以获得救赎或与父神建立救赎的唯一途径。作为加尔文主义者，莫勒（Mohler）认为，人类的救赎是上帝的免费礼物，无法通过人类的行动或意志赢得，并且只能授予选民。在犹太教，伊斯兰教和天主教方面，他公开提出了这一立场。他最近说：“任何信仰体系，任何世界观，无论是禅宗佛教，印度教还是辩证的唯物主义，马克思主义，都使人俘虏并阻止他们相信对主耶稣基督的信仰，是的，是撒旦力量的示范。”他认为，穆斯林是由恶魔般的力量激励的，在2001年9月11日袭击之后的几个月中，莫勒将耶稣的伊斯兰观点描述为虚假和破坏性：

在Tilakkhana，德席尔瓦（De Silva）为与佛教徒的建设性对话找到了有关耶稣在基督教中的救主的作用的基础。佛教徒通过将注意力从自我转移并将注意力集中在Anattā上来克服Tilakkhana。因此，佛教指向尼巴纳的最终目标可以通过自我努力来实现。德·席尔瓦（De Silva）认为，这是佛教中“最深的困境”之一，导致他问这个问题：“否认自我的自我是什么，同时断言它可以拯救自我？”他提出“否认自我并确认自给自足是矛盾的。”

在20世纪末，历史学家杰里·本特利（Jerry H. Bentley）也写道，并说“佛教影响了基督教的早期发展”，并提出了“关注许多关于出生，生命，教义和佛陀和耶稣死亡的相似之处”。一些高水平的佛教徒在耶稣和佛教之间吸引了类比，例如达赖喇嘛在2001年说，“耶稣基督也过上前生活”，并补充说：“因此，您看到，他通过佛教的练习或类似的东西就达到了一个高州，要么是菩萨或开明的人。” Thich Nhat Hanh在他的《活佛，活着的基督》一书中肯定了诸如三位一体之类的核心基督教信仰，以及耶稣基督的死亡和复活。类似地，Bokin Kim将基督视为佛陀佛法，而耶稣与Gautama相似，Gautama只是跨历史佛陀的历史体现。

尽管耶稣和佛教哲学教义之间的现代相似之处是在19世纪的传教接触之后进行的，但这些比较在19世纪的传教接触之后出现，并且历史上没有可靠的证据表明佛教与耶稣在他一生中之间的接触。现代奖学金几乎一致同意，耶稣前往西藏，克什米尔或印度的主张（请参阅耶稣的未知年），佛教对他教义的影响没有历史依据。
已经注意到了佛陀和耶稣的教义之间的相似之处。关于这个主题，圣经学者马库斯·博格（Marcus Borg）和佛教杰克·科恩菲尔德（Jack Kornfield）合作了一本书《耶稣和佛陀：平行的俗语》。
尽管一些早期的基督徒意识到佛教在基督教前时期在希腊和罗马帝国中都实行的，但大多数现代基督教学者都彻底拒绝了耶稣到印度或西藏的历史基础，或者直接影响了西方基督教教义之间的影响。并将平行象征主义的尝试视为平行狂暴的案例，夸大了相似之处。然而，在内斯托里亚基督教和佛教之间的东方融合中，沿着古代和中世纪的丝绸之路很普遍，在中国中世纪的中世纪教会中尤其明显，如耶稣经》所证明的。
在20世纪末，历史学家杰里·本特利（Jerry H. Bentley）也写道，并说“佛教影响了基督教的早期发展”，并提出了“关注许多关于出生，生命，教义和佛陀和耶稣死亡的相似之处”。一些高水平的佛教徒在耶稣和佛教之间吸引了类比，例如达赖喇嘛在2001年说，“耶稣基督也过上前生活”，并补充说：“因此，您看到，他通过佛教的练习或类似的东西就达到了一个高州，要么是菩萨或开明的人。”

信仰被包含在外行的美德清单中，因此被描述为奉献者的渐进素质，是奉献者的奉献者，他是佛教宗教的新手，被描述为“奉献中的年轻人”。因此，有各种各样的美德清单，其中包括信仰，其他早期传统也赋予了信仰的重要作用，例如萨尔瓦斯瓦达传统。此外，早期的佛教将信仰描述为溪流进入者的重要素质，这是一个先前的启蒙国家。在对人们出发的标准描述中（以和尚为名），将信仰视为重要的动机。尽管有这一角色，但像安德烈·巴罗（AndréBareau）和莉莉·德·席尔瓦（Lily de Silva）这样的一些印第安学家认为，早期的佛教并未为信仰带来与其他宗教（例如基督教）相同的价值。巴罗认为：“佛教没有纯信仰的[佛教观念与基督教一样，……盲人信仰的思想，对主人的话的绝对信仰，完全违背了早期佛教的精神。”译者卡罗琳·里斯·戴维斯（Caroline Rhys Davids）不同意这样的陈述，他说：“信仰同样重要的是对所有值得名称的宗教都重要”。遗嘱学家理查德·戈姆布里奇（Richard Gombrich）认为，佛教没有规定对某人或某物的违背理性的规定。同样，戈姆布里希（Gombrich）认为，佛陀并不是要建立一个专注于对他人的奉献的宗教，尽管他认识到当佛陀还活着时，这种奉献已经开始。戈姆布里奇（Gombrich）指出，早期经文中有很多材料强调信仰的重要性，但认为“佛教礼仪和礼仪的成长肯定是佛陀讲道的完全意想不到的后果”。
report_src: 从教义上看，佛教强调无神论或非神学取向，并以业力与解脱为核心；基督教则以一神论及“耶稣被钉十字架”的救赎事件为中心，这一单一事件被视为对罪恶的根本解决，与佛教教义截然相反[1]。因此，佛教并不把耶稣视为救世主或神性对象，也不在修行体系中“信奉”耶稣；若有佛教徒尊敬耶稣，多属于个人对其道德教诲的认同，而非佛教本身的信仰内容。

question_en: How many countries speak Spanish?
pos_context_en:
The Association of Spanish Language Academies (, or ) is the entity which regulates the Spanish language. It was created in Mexico in 1951 and represents the union of all the separate academies in the Spanish-speaking world. It comprises the academies of 23 countries, ordered by date of Academy foundation: Spain (1713), Colombia (1871), Ecuador (1874), Mexico (1875), El Salvador (1876), Venezuela (1883), Chile (1885), Peru (1887), Guatemala (1887), Costa Rica (1923), Philippines (1924), Panama (1926), Cuba (1926),
Paraguay (1927), Dominican Republic (1927), Bolivia (1927), Nicaragua (1928), Argentina (1931), Uruguay (1943), Honduras (1949), Puerto Rico (1955), United States (1973) and Equatorial Guinea (2016).
The (Cervantes Institute) is a worldwide nonprofit organization created by the Spanish government in 1991. This organization has branched out in over 20 different countries, with 54 centers devoted to the Spanish and Hispanic American cultures and Spanish language. The ultimate goals of the Institute are to promote universally the education, the study, and the use of Spanish as a second language, to support methods and activities that help the process of Spanish-language education, and to contribute to the advancement of the Spanish and Hispanic American cultures in non-Spanish-speaking countries. The Institute's 2015 report "El español, una lengua viva" (Spanish, a living language) estimates that there are 559 million Spanish speakers worldwide. Among the sources cited in the report is the U.S. Census Bureau, which estimates that the U.S. will have 138 million Spanish speakers by 2050, making it the biggest Spanish-speaking nation on earth, with Spanish the mother tongue of almost a third of its citizens.
neg_context_title_en: Spanish language in the United States
Names given to the Spanish language
neg_context_en: Spanish is spoken by about 90% of the country's population. In Nicaragua the Voseo form is common, just as in other countries in Central and South America like Honduras, Argentina, Uruguay or coastal Colombia. Spanish has many different dialects spoken throughout Latin America, Central American Spanish is the dialect spoken in Nicaragua. In the Caribbean coast many afro-Nicaraguans and creoles speak English and creole English as their first language. Also in the Caribbean coast, many Indigenous people speak their native languages, such as the Miskito, Sumo, Rama and Garifuna language. In addition, many ethnic groups in Nicaragua, such as the Chinese Nicaraguans and Palestinian Nicaraguans, have maintained their ancestral languages, which are minority languages, while also speaking Spanish and/or English. These minority languages include Chinese, Arabic, German, and Italian, among others.

Guatemalan Spanish () is the national variant of Spanish spoken in the Central American country of Guatemala. About 13.7 million of the 16 million population speak Spanish. It includes the use of the second-person singular personal pronoun "vos" alongside the standard Spanish second-person singular pronouns "tú" and "usted" to form a three-level system of second-person singular address.A number of words widely used in Guatemala which have Mayan or other native origins, in particular names for flora, fauna and toponyms. Some of these words are used in most, or all, Spanish-speaking countries, like "chocolate" and "aguacate" ("avocado"), and some are only used in Mexico and most Central American countries, like Guatemala and El Salvador. The latter include "guajolote" "turkey" < Nahuatl "huaxōlōtl" (although "chompipe" is also used; "pavo" is also used, as in other Spanish-speaking countries); "papalote" "kite" < Nahuatl "pāpālōtl" "butterfly"; and "jitomate" "tomato" < Nahuatl "xītomatl" . For a more complete list see List of Spanish words of Nahuatl origin. Local words include There are also many words unique to Central America, for example, "chunche" or "chochadas" or "babosadas" means "thing" or "stuff" in some places. The words used to describe children (or kids) vary among the countries in Central America; in Guatemala they are often called "patojos". Cipotes is also used in Guatemala in the eastern departments. In the western and northern departments of Guatemala "chamacos" is used to say children or kids. In Guatemala and Honduras the word "güiros" is also used. In Guatemala (also in Honduras and El Salvador) people with money are said to have "pisto", a term originally used by Maya peoples in Guatemala.

Mexicans are linguistically diverse, with many speaking European languages as well as various Indigenous Mexican Languages. Spanish is spoken by approximately 92.17% of Mexicans as their first language making them the largest Spanish speaking group in the world followed by Colombia (45,273,925), Spain (41,063,259) and Argentina (40,134,425). Although the great majority speak Spanish "de facto" the second most populous language among Mexicans is English due to the regional proximity of the United States which calls for a bilingual relationship in order to conduct business and trade as well as the migration of Mexicans into that country who adopt it as a second language.

The United States has forty-one million people aged five or older that speak Spanish at home, making Spanish the second most spoken language of the United States by far. Spanish is the most studied foreign language in United States, with about six million students. With over 50 million native speakers, heritage language speakers and second language speakers, the United States now has the second largest Spanish-speaking population in the world after Mexico, although it is not an official language of the country. About half of all American Spanish speakers also assessed themselves as speaking English "very well" in the 2000 U.S. Census. This percentage increased to 57% in the 2013-2017 American Community Survey. The United States is among the Spanish-speaking countries that has its own Academy of the Spanish Language.

While everyone in Spain can speak Spanish, other languages figure prominently in many areas: Basque in the Basque Country and Navarre; Catalan in Catalonia, Balearic Islands and Valencia (where it is usually referred to as Valencian), and Galician in Galicia. Spanish is official throughout the country; the rest of these have co-official status in their respective communities and all are major enough that there are numerous daily newspapers in these languages and, especially in Catalan, a significant book publishing industry. Many citizens in these territories consider their own language as their primary language and Spanish as secondary; these languages cover broad enough regions to have multiple distinct dialects. Spanish itself also has distinct dialects around the country, with the Andalusian dialect being closer to the Spanish of the Americas, which it heavily influenced.

A similar situation occurred in the American Southwest, including California, Arizona, New Mexico and Texas, where Spaniards, then "criollos" (Tejanos, Californios, etc.) followed by Chicanos (Mexican Americans) and later Mexican immigrants, kept the Spanish language alive before, during and after the American appropriation of those territories following the Mexican–American War. Spanish continues to be used by millions of citizens and immigrants to the United States from Spanish-speaking countries of the Americas (for example, many Cubans arrived in Miami, Florida, beginning with the Cuban Revolution in 1959, and followed by other Latin American groups; the local majority is now Spanish-speaking). Spanish is now treated as the country's "second language," and over 5 percent of the U.S. population are Spanish-speaking, but most Latino/Hispanic Americans are bilingual or also regularly speak English.

In 1492, the arrival of Christopher Columbus on a Castilian-paid expedition paved the way for the Spanish colonization of the Americas. As a result of this process, most countries in South America now speak the same language as Castile. Until about the eighteenth century, the Kingdom of Castile, and not Spain as a whole, was the colonizing power, and the language used was called "castellano". Thus, some Latin American countries formerly under Spanish rule have retained the custom of calling it "castellano", while others eventually switched to calling it "español", with many different factors influencing the final choice.

Another motivator for the unification of Spanish is the translation by multinational companies of manuals, software, websites, etc., from English to Spanish. It is easier to use a neutral version of Spanish than to create different versions for each country or region. If it were done by country, there would be over twenty versions, and if by region it would be difficult to define which countries belonged to which region, as well as being complicated from the logistical point of view. The result has been to identify a neutral Spanish, a version that tries to avoid regional phenomena, such as the Spanish-speaking American voseo, or terms that may be identified with specific countries (for example, for “computer”, the term in Spanish-speaking America is ', except in a few areas that prefer ', while in Spain the most frequent term is '; as a result, Microsoft Windows uses the region-neutral term '). This neutral language is developed with the help of glossaries that prescribe the preferred terms and the terms to avoid. It is a common occurrence in the computing field, because it lowers production costs.

Much as with French Americans, who are of French descent but mostly by way of Canada, the majority of the 41 million massively strong Spanish-speaking population have come by way of Latin America, especially Mexico, but also Puerto Rico, Dominican Republic, and other areas that the Spanish themselves colonized. Many of the Hispanic and Latino Americans bring their Spanish-speaking culture into the country. A lot of the Americans who are descended from Mexico, Puerto Rico or other places from Latin America have Spanish ancestry from Spain, but it is mixed with a different race; for example, Mexican-Americans who are identified as mestizo, which is mixed Native American and European ancestry, while others, like Puerto Ricans in the United States, are identified as Mulatto, which is mixed African and European ancestry. However, some Spanish Americans are descendants of colonial settlers in the southwestern states, especially New Mexico, before they became part of the United States.
question_src: 有几个国家会说西班牙语？
pos_context_src:
西班牙语学院协会（OR）是调节西班牙语的实体。它是在1951年在墨西哥创建的，代表了讲西班牙语世界中所有独立学院的结合。它由23个国家的学院组成，按学院基金会的日期命令：西班牙（1713），哥伦比亚（1871年），厄瓜多尔（1874年），墨西哥（1875年），萨尔瓦多（1876），萨尔瓦多（1876），委内瑞拉（1883），智利（1885），智利（1885），智利（1885年），秘鲁（1887），（1887），1887年，gueemanala（1887）菲律宾（1924），巴拿马（1926），古巴（1926），，
巴拉圭（1927年），多米尼加共和国（1927），玻利维亚（1927），尼加拉瓜（1928），阿根廷（1931），乌拉圭（1943），洪都拉斯（1949），波多黎各（1955），美国（1955），美国（1973）和埃克斯塔伊尔（Equinea）和赤道盖伊尼亚（Equinea）（2016）。
（塞万提斯研究所）是一个由西班牙政府在1991年成立的全球非营利组织。该组织已在20多个不同的国家 /地区分支机构，其中54个中心致力于西班牙和西班牙裔美国人的文化和西班牙语。该研究所的最终目标是促进普遍促进教育，研究和使用西班牙语作为第二语言，以支持有助于西班牙语教育过程的方法和活动，并为西班牙和西班牙裔美国人在非言语国家的发展做出贡献。该研究所的2015年报告“ Ela lengua viva”（西班牙语，一种活着的语言）估计，全球有5.59亿西班牙语者。报告中引用的消息来源包括美国人口普查局，该局估计，到2050年，美国将拥有1.38亿西班牙语的人，使其成为地球上西班牙语最大的国家，西班牙语是其几乎三分之一的公民的母语。
neg_context_src: 该国约90％的人口所说的西班牙语。在尼加拉瓜中，沃瑟（Voseo）形式很普遍，就像在中美洲和南美的其他国家一样，如洪都拉斯，阿根廷，乌拉圭或哥伦比亚沿海。西班牙语在整个拉丁美洲都有许多不同的方言，中美洲西班牙语是尼加拉瓜的方言。在加勒比海沿岸，许多非洲裔尼卡拉瓜人和克里奥尔人会以英语和克里奥尔语作为第一语言。同样在加勒比海沿岸，许多土著人会说他们的母语，例如Miskito，Sumo，Rama和Garifuna语言。此外，尼加拉瓜的许多族裔，例如中国尼加拉瓜和巴勒斯坦尼加拉瓜人，都维持其祖先语言，这些语言是少数族裔语言，同时也说西班牙语和/或英语。这些少数语言包括中文，阿拉伯语，德语和意大利语等。

危地马拉西班牙语（）是在危地马拉中美洲国家使用的西班牙语的全国性变体。在1600万人口中，约有1370万说西班牙语。它包括使用第二人称奇异人代词“ vos”以及标准的西班牙二人奇异代词“tú”和“ uSted”，形成了一个由第二个人称单数地址组成的三级系统。在危地马拉广泛使用的单词数量，这些单词具有玛雅人或其他本地起源，特别是Flora，fauna和fauna和toponymans的名称。其中一些单词在大多数或所有讲西班牙语的国家中都使用，例如“巧克力”和“ aguacate”（“鳄梨”），其中一些仅在墨西哥和大多数中美洲国家使用，例如危地马拉和埃尔·萨尔瓦多。后者包括“ guajolote”“土耳其” <nahuatl“huaxōlōtl”（尽管也使用了“ chompipe”；也使用了“帕沃”，就像其他讲西班牙语的国家一样）； “ papalote”“风筝” <nahuatl“pāpālōtl”“蝴蝶”；和“ jitomate”“番茄” <nahuatl“xītomatl”。有关更完整的列表，请参阅Nahuatl起源的西班牙语单词列表。当地的单词包括中美洲独有的单词，例如“ chunche”或“ chochadas”或“ babosadas”的意思是“事物”或“东西”。用来描述儿童（或孩子）的词在中美洲的国家 /地区各不相同；在危地马拉，他们通常被称为“ patojos”。东部部门的危地马拉也使用了密码。在危地马拉的西部和北部部门中，“ Chamacos”被用来说孩子或孩子。在危地马拉和洪都拉斯中，还使用了“古罗斯”一词。在危地马拉（也在洪都拉斯和萨尔瓦多）中，有钱的人据说有“手枪”，这是危地马拉的玛雅人最初使用的术语。

墨西哥人在语言上是多种多样的，许多讲话的欧洲语言以及各种土著墨西哥语言。西班牙语被大约92.17％的墨西哥人称为其第一语言，使其成为世界上最大的西班牙语群体，其次是哥伦比亚（45,273,925），西班牙（41,063,259）和阿根廷（40,134,425）。尽管绝大多数人说西班牙语“事实上”墨西哥人中第二大人物的语言是英语，这是因为美国的区域性距离呼吁建立双语关系，以进行商业和贸易以及将墨西哥人移民到该国家，这些国家将其作为第二语言。

美国有400万人在家中说西班牙语的五千万人，使西班牙语成为迄今为止美国第二大口语。西班牙语是美国研究最多的外语，约有600万学生。尽管这不是该国的官方语言，但美国现在拥有超过5000万母语的人，传统语言的讲话者和第二语言讲者，现在是世界第二大西班牙语人口。在2000年的美国人口普查中，大约一半的美国西班牙语者也评估自己是说英语“很好”。在2013  -  2017年美国社区调查中，这一比例增加到57％。美国是拥有自己的西班牙语学院的西班牙语国家之一。

虽然西班牙的每个人都可以说西班牙语，但其他语言在许多领域都显着：巴斯克国家和纳瓦拉的巴斯克；加泰罗尼亚，加泰罗尼亚，巴利阿里群岛和瓦伦西亚（通常称为Valencian）和加利西亚的加泰罗尼亚。西班牙语是全国官方的；其余的在各自社区中都具有共同的地位，并且所有这些都足够重大，以至于这些语言中有许多每日报纸，尤其是在加泰罗尼亚语中，这是一个重要的书籍出版行业。这些领土上的许多公民将自己的语言视为其主要语言，而西班牙语则是次要的。这些语言涵盖了足够广泛的区域以具有多种不同的方言。西班牙本身在全国各地也有不同的方言，安达卢西亚方言更接近美洲西班牙，这对它的影响很大。

在美国西南部，包括加利福尼亚，亚利桑那州，新墨西哥州和德克萨斯州，西班牙人，然后是“克里奥尔斯”（Tejanos，加利福尼亚斯等）发生了类似的情况，随后是奇卡诺斯（墨西哥裔美国人）和后来的墨西哥移民，在墨西哥人的墨西哥人及其墨西哥人的美国人拨款期间保持了西班牙语言。西班牙人继续被美国讲西班牙语国家的数百万公民和移民到美国（例如，许多古巴人抵达佛罗里达州迈阿密的，从1959年的古巴革命开始，随后是其他拉丁美洲群体；当地大多数人现在是西班牙语）。现在，西班牙语被视为该国的“第二语言”，美国超过5％的人口是讲西班牙语的，但是大多数拉丁裔/西班牙裔美国人都是双语的，或者也经常说英语。

1492年，克里斯托弗·哥伦布（Christopher Columbus）到达卡斯蒂利亚（Castilian）付费探险队（Castilian Paid Expedition）为西班牙殖民美洲铺平了道路。由于这一过程，南美的大多数国家现在都说与卡斯蒂利亚相同的语言。直到大约十八世纪，卡斯蒂利亚王国，整个西班牙的王国都是殖民力量，所使用的语言被称为“卡斯泰拉诺”。因此，一些以前在西班牙统治下的拉丁美洲国家保留了称其为“ Castellano”的习俗，而另一些拉丁美洲则最终改用了“Español”，其中许多不同的因素影响了最终选择。

统一西班牙语的另一个动机是手册，软件，网站等的跨国公司的翻译，从英语到西班牙语。使用中性版本的西班牙语比为每个国家或地区创建不同的版本要容易。如果是由国家完成的，将有二十多个版本，如果由地区很难定义哪个国家属于哪个地区，以及从后勤的角度来看。结果是确定一个中性西班牙语，该版本试图避免区域现象，例如讲西班牙语的美国沃塞奥或可能与特定国家 /地区识别的术语（例如，对于“计算机”，说西班牙语的美国术语是'，除了一些偏爱的领域，而在西班牙的一些领域，而在西班牙则最常见的期限是';作为一个最常见的期限；这种中性语言是在规定首选条款和避免条款的词汇表的帮助下开发的。这是计算领域的常见发生，因为它降低了生产成本。

与法国血统但大部分是在加拿大的法国美国人一样，讲西班牙语的4100万人中的大多数人在拉丁美洲，尤其是墨西哥，但也是波多黎各，多米尼加共和国和其他西班牙本身殖民的领域。许多西班牙裔和拉丁美洲裔美国人将其讲西班牙语的文化带入该国。许多来自墨西哥，波多黎各或拉丁美洲其他地方的美国人都有西班牙的西班牙血统，但与另一种种族混合在一起。例如，被确定为混合美洲原住民和欧洲血统的墨西哥裔美国人，而其他人，例如美国的波多黎各人，被确定为Mulatto，这是非洲和欧洲血统的混合物。但是，一些西班牙美国人是西南州殖民定居者的后代，尤其是新墨西哥州，在他们成为美国的一部分之前。
report_src: 根据西班牙语学院协会的资料，该协会汇集了来自23个国家的西班牙语学院，反映出西班牙语被这23个国家作为官方或主要语言使用，因此通常认定全球共有23个国家“说西班牙语”[1]。

question_en: When did Lin Biao become a Marshal of the People's Republic of China?
pos_context_en: Lin Biao was considered one of the Communists' most brilliant generals after the founding of the People's Republic of China, in 1949. Lin was the youngest of the "Ten Marshals" named in 1955, a title that recognized Lin's substantial military contributions.
neg_context_en: Lin Biao (December 5, 1907 – September 13, 1971) was a Marshal of the People's Republic of China who was pivotal in the Communist victory in the Chinese Civil War, especially in Northeast China. Lin was the general who commanded the decisive Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns, in which he co-led the Manchurian Field Army to victory and led the People's Liberation Army into Beijing. He crossed the Yangtze River in 1949, decisively defeated the Kuomintang and took control of the coastal provinces in Southeast China. He ranked third among the Ten Marshals. Zhu De and Peng Dehuai were considered senior to Lin, and Lin ranked directly ahead of He Long and Liu Bocheng.

The Constitution drafted under Kang's supervision and adopted at the Ninth Congress stipulated that "Comrade Lin Biao is Comrade Mao Zedong's close comrade-in-arms and successor." Kang Sheng and Lin Biao were not close allies, although Kang had earlier assisted Lin in his successful efforts to remove Marshal He Long, a formidable rival to Lin's wish to control the People's Liberation Army. In the wake of Lin Biao's aborted coup attempt and death in September 1971, Kang was careful to distance himself from Mao's disgraced former heir and from Chen Boda, who had been closely aligned with Lin at the Central Committee meeting in Lushan in August 1970 and who was denounced after Lin's fall as "China's Trotsky." Efforts to link Kang to Lin Biao's plotting were unsuccessful and unsubstantiated.

Lin abstained from taking an active role in politics after the civil war ceased in 1949. He led a section of the government's civil bureaucracy as one of the co-serving Deputy Vice Premiers of the People's Republic of China from 1954 onwards, becoming First-ranked Vice Premier from 1964. Lin became more active in politics when named one of the co-serving Vice Chairmen of the Communist Party of China in 1958. He held the three responsibilities of Vice Premier, Vice Chairman and Minister of National Defense from 1959 onwards. Lin became instrumental in creating the foundations for Mao Zedong's cult of personality in the early 1960s, and was rewarded for his service in the Cultural Revolution by being named Mao's designated successor as the sole Vice Chairman of the Communist Party of China, from 1966 until his death.

After the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949, Wang served as the first chief of staff of the PLA Air Force and then the first Minister of the Seventh Ministry of Machine Building, in charge of China's ballistic missile program. During the Cultural Revolution, he replaced Marshall Nie Rongzhen as the acting director of the Science and Technology Commission of the National Defense Ministry, in charge of China's nuclear tests and the launch of its first satellite. However, in the aftermath of Marshall Lin Biao's alleged coup attempt and subsequent death in October 1971, Wang was purged and imprisoned for ten years. He was released in 1981 and discharged from the army without being prosecuted or convicted of a crime.

Huang Yongsheng (; 1910–1983) was a general of the China's People's Liberation Army. In 1955 Huang was awarded the position of "Shang Jiang" (colonel-general), and Huang continued to rise throughout the 1950s and 1960s, eventually becoming Lin Biao's Chief-of-staff during the Cultural Revolution. Because of Huang's close associations with Lin Biao, Huang was purged following Lin's death in 1971.

The military plans contained in the Outline were below the standards that could have been expected from Lin Biao, one of modern China's most successful generals. Because Lin Biao was a master of maneuvering ground forces, it is unusual that he would have relied almost exclusively on the Air Force, even though his own elite forces were readily available to him. In the Chinese Civil War, Lin had become a master of delaying decisive confrontations until he knew that the chances of victory had become overwhelming, and scholars note that it would have been out of character for Lin to have staked his political career on such a poorly planned military coup, whose chances of success were slim. There is no direct evidence that suggests that either Lin or his generals were involved in the coup plot. Many scholars believe that his son, Lin Liguo, a high-ranking officer in the People's Liberation Air Force, was instead the author. Within China, the theory that Lin Liguo drafted the Project 571 Outline was corroborated by the testimony of Lin Biao's generals in the special trials of the "Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-Revolutionary Cliques", which were held in 1980.

Project 571 () was the numeric codename given to an alleged plot to execute a "coup d'état" against Chinese leader Mao Zedong in 1971 by the supporters of Lin Biao, then Vice-Chairman of the Communist Party of China. In Chinese, the numbers "5-7-1" sound like the term "armed uprising" (). The Chinese government initially claimed that Lin Biao himself had devised Project 571, but evidence inside and outside of China has made it more likely that Lin's son, Lin Liguo, a high-ranking officer in the People's Liberation Air Force, instead developed the plot. Any plots that may have been planned or attempted by Lin Biao or his family ultimately failed. Lin's family attempted to flee China for the Soviet Union, but died when their plane crashed over Mongolia on September 13, 1971. A draft copy of the Project 571 Outline was discovered following Lin's death, and was publicly circulated by the Chinese government as a means of explaining the event.

Due partially to his periods of ill health and physical rehabilitation in the Soviet Union, Lin was slow to rise to power. In the early 1950s Lin was one of five major leaders given responsibility for civil and military affairs, controlling a jurisdiction in central China. In 1953 he was visited by Gao Gang, and was later suspected of supporting him. In 1955 Lin was named to the Politburo. In February 1958 Peng Dehuai, then China's Defense Minister, gave a speech for the fortieth anniversary of the Soviet Red Army in which he suggested increasing the military cooperation between China and the Soviet Union. Mao wanted to distance China from the Soviet Union, and began grooming Lin Biao as a viable successor to Peng. In 1958 Lin joined the Politburo Standing Committee and became one of China's Vice-Chairmen. After the 1959 Lushan Conference, at which Peng criticized Mao's disastrous Great Leap Forward, Peng was arrested and removed from all government positions. Privately, Lin agreed with Peng and was strongly opposed to Peng being purged, but Lin's fear of being purged himself kept him from publicly opposing Mao's efforts to purge Peng, and Lin publicly condemned Peng as a "careerist, a conspiracist, and a hypocrite". Under Mao's direction, Peng was disgraced and put under indefinite house arrest. Lin became the senior leader most publicly supportive of Mao following the Great Leap Forward, during which Mao's economic policies caused an artificial famine in which tens of millions of people starved to death.

Liu Yalou (; April 1910 – 7 May 1965) was a general in the People's Liberation Army of the People's Republic of China, first commander-in-chief of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, as well as chief of staff of Lin Biao's army group during the Chinese Civil War, occupied the whole of Manchuria in 1948 and captured 472,000 Nationalist troops in the Liaoshen Campaign.
question_src: 林比亚何时成为中华人民共和国的元帅？
pos_context_src: 林比亚（Lin Biao）于1949年被认为是共产党最杰出的将军之一。林是1955年命名的“十个元帅”中最年轻的一位，这个头衔彰显了林的实质性军事贡献。
neg_context_src: 林·比亚（Lin Biao）（1907年12月5日至1971年9月13日）是中华人民共和国的元帅，他在中国内战中的共产主义胜利中是关键的，尤其是在中国东北部。林是命令决定性的Liaoshen和Pingjin运动的将军，他共同领导了满洲野外军队胜利，并带领人民解放军进入北京。他于1949年越过长江，果断地击败了库恩甘（Kuomintang），并控制了中国东南部的沿海省份。他在十个元帅中排名第三。朱德（Zhu de）和彭·德赫（Peng Dehuai）被认为是林的高级，林直接在他和刘·博钦（Liu Bocheng）领先。

在康的监督下起草并在第九国会通过的宪法规定，“林·比亚同志是毛泽东同志的紧密同志和继任者。”康尚（Kang Sheng）和林·比亚（Lin Biao）并没有亲密盟友，尽管康（Kang）早些时候曾协助林（Lin）成功地努力去除元帅，这是林（Lin）希望控制人民解放军的强大竞争对手。在1971年9月林·比奥（Lin Biao）在林·比奥（Lin Biao）中止政变的企图和死亡之后，康（Kang）谨慎地与毛泽东（Mao）的耻辱前继承人和陈·博达（Chen Boda）保持距离，后者在1970年8月在Lushan的中央委员会会议上与Lin紧密结盟，在Lin跌倒后，他被谴责为“中国的Trotsky”。将Kang与Lin Biao的情节联系起来的努力没有成功，没有证实。

林在1949年内战后弃权在政治上发挥积极作用。他带领政府的民事官僚机构是中华人民共和国共和国共和国的一部分，从1954年开始，从1954年开始，从1964年开始成为首发副总理，从1964年开始就变得更加活跃。从1959年起，副总理，国防部副主席兼国防部长的职责。林在1960年代初为毛泽东的个性崇拜创造了基础，并因其在文化大革命中的服务而获得了回报，从1966年到他去世，他被任命为毛泽东指定的继任者为中国共产党唯一的副主席。

1949年，中华人民共和国成立后，王是PLA空军的第一任参谋长，然后是机器建筑部第七部长，负责中国的弹道导弹计划。在文化大革命期间，他取代了马歇尔·尼·隆岑（Marshall Nie Rongzhen），为国防部科学技术委员会的代理主任，负责中国的核试验，并推出了其第一个卫星。然而，在马歇尔·林·比奥（Marshall Lin Biao）涉嫌政变企图和随后在1971年10月死亡之后，王被清除并监禁了十年。他于1981年被释放，并从军队中撤离而没有被起诉或犯罪。
黄阳（； 1910- 1983年）是中国人民解放军的将军。 1955年，黄（Huang）被授予“ Shang Jiang”（上校）的地位，在整个1950年代和1960年代，黄继续升级，最终成为林比亚（Lin Biao）在文化革命期间的竞选主管。由于Huang与Lin Biao的密切联系，Huang于1971年去世后被清除。

大纲中包含的军事计划低于现代中国最成功的将军之一林·比奥（Lin Biao）可能预期的标准。由于林比亚（Lin Biao）是机动地面部队的大师，因此即使他自己的精英部队很容易获得，他几乎只能依靠空军。在中国内战中，林成为延迟决定性对抗的大师，直到他知道胜利的机会已经变得压倒性，学者们指出，林将他的政治生涯置于如此不太计划的军事政变上，其成功的机会很小。没有直接的证据表明林或他的将军参与了政变。许多学者认为，他的儿子Lin Liguo是人民解放空军的高级军官，而是作者。在中国，在1980年举行的“ Lin Biao and Jiang Qing反革命集团”的特别试验中，Lin Biao的将军的证词证实了Lin Liguo起草该项目571大纲的理论。

第571（）项目是涉嫌阴谋的数字代号，该阴谋是由当时的中国共产党副主席林·比亚（Lin Biao）的支持者在1971年对中国领导人毛泽东（Mao Zedong）执行“政变”。在中文中，“ 5-7-1”的数字听起来像“武装起义”一词（）。中国政府最初声称林·比奥本人已经设计了571项目，但中国内外的证据使林的儿子林·利戈（Lin Liguo）更有可能是人民解放空军的高级官员，而是开发了这一阴谋。 Lin Biao或他的家人可能已计划或尝试的任何地块最终都失败了。林的家人试图逃离中国前往苏联，但他们的飞机于1971年9月13日在蒙古上坠毁时去世。该项目571大纲的副本草案在林去世后发现，并被中国政府公开传播，作为解释该活动的手段。

由于他在苏联的健康状况不佳和身体康复时期的一部分，林的权力缓慢。在1950年代初期，林是负责民事和军事事务的五个主要领导人之一，控制着中国中部的管辖权。 1953年，他被Gao Gang拜访，后来涉嫌支持他。 1955年，林被任命为政治局。 1958年2月，当时的中国国防部长彭·杜伊（Peng Dehuai）发表了苏联红军五十周年纪念日的讲话，他建议在中国与苏联之间增加军事合作。毛泽东想让中国与苏联保持距离，并开始将林·比奥（Lin Biao）作为彭的可行继任者。 1958年，林加入了政治局常务委员会，并成为中国的副主席之一。在1959年的Lushan会议之后，彭批评了毛泽东的灾难性巨大飞跃，彭被捕并从所有政府职位上撤职。林私下面同意彭的意见，并强烈反对彭被清除，但林对被清除的恐惧使他无法公开反对毛泽东清除彭的努力，林公开谴责彭（Peng）为“职业主义者，阴谋主义者和伪君子”。在毛泽东的指导下，彭被丢失了，并被无限期的众议院逮捕。林成为高级飞跃之后最公开支持毛泽东的高级领导者，在此期间，毛泽东的经济政策造成了人工饥荒，其中数千万人饿死了。
刘Yalou（; 1910年4月至1965年5月7日）是中华人民共和国人民解放军的一般人，是人民解放军空军的首位总司令，以及中国内战期间林比亚（Lin Biao）陆军参谋长，在1948年曼彻里亚（Manchuria）期间，在整个曼彻里亚（Manchuria）占领了472,000个国民军事部队。
report_src: 林比亚于1955年被授予中华人民共和国元帅军衔，他是当年被命名的“十大元帅”中最年轻的一位，这一任命充分体现了他在解放战争中的卓越军事贡献 [1]。

question_en: How tall is Mike Pratt?
pos_context_en: Michael P. Pratt (born August 4, 1948) is an American retired basketball player and coach. He was a 6'4" (1.93 m), 195 lb (88.5 kg) guard.
neg_context_title_en: List of Shameless (U.S. TV series) characters
neg_context_en: Michael Philip Pratt (born 10 February 1948) is a former Liberal member of the Australian House of Representatives. He was born in Blyth, South Australia and was a farmer and grazier before entering Parliament. He was elected to the seat of Adelaide at a 1988 by-election following the resignation of Chris Hurford to become Consul-General in New York, but was defeated by Labor's Bob Catley at the 1990 election.

Mike Pratt (Jake McDorman) is a recurring character in season 3 and a regular character in season 4. Mike is responsible and good natured. He is Fiona's corporate boss and in season 4, becomes her boyfriend. Fiona cheats on Mike with his brother Robbie, which Mike eventually learns. Although very hurt by Fiona's betrayal, Mike does not fire her and bails Fiona out of prison. Mike makes it clear that he never wants to see her again. At the end of season 4, Fiona is having a hard time finding a job because of her felony conviction. She asks Mike's sister to lie and say that she was not fired because of her drug and child neglect arrest but because of downsizing. Mike's sister berates Fiona for taking advantage of someone as nice as Mike, asking the company to lie to the federal government for her and causing a rift in their family.

Guy Pratt was born on 3 January 1962, in a flat above a shop on the street The Cut, in Lambeth, South London, England. His father, Mike Pratt, was an actor, songwriter and screenwriter but died when Guy was 14. He worked for a while as a graphic designer, but then decided to concentrate on a music career.In the late 1970's guy was in a band based in southend on sea called 'speedball', who released one 45 on NO PAP1 records called ' no survivors' - absolutely superb for its time within the mod revival of that period, the single today can fetch upwards of £200-£300 in mint condition. In 1981, aged 19, Pratt was asked to tour with Icehouse. Two years later as a member of Icehouse he supported David Bowie on his Serious Moonlight Tour, which was Bowie's longest, largest, and most successful concert tour. This led to other engagements including a stint with Pink Floyd. He also spent some time in Los Angeles where he played with Madonna and Michael Jackson.

Upon returning to England, he earned a living as a jazz and skiffle musician in London clubs. An accomplished guitarist and pianist, in the 1950s, he jammed with the Vipers Skiffle Group at the 2 I's club in London with his friend Tommy Steele. Pratt can be seen jamming skiffle on a 1950s Pathé News clip with other musicians of the era including members of the Shadows. A successful songwriter, Mike collaborated with Bart and Steele on many of Steele's early hits in the late 1950s and early '60s. To enable Steele to start to film his life story, co-writers Steele, Bart and Pratt, wrote twelve songs in seven days. A Steele-Pratt collaboration, "A Handful of Songs", originally a hit for Tommy Steele in 1957, became the theme tune to a long-running Granada Television children's programme of the same name in the late 1970s. They also contributed to the writing of the song "Rock with the Caveman". Bart and Pratt received the 1957 Ivor Novello award for Best Song Musically and Lyrically for "Little White Bull". He won a further Ivor Novello award for "Handful of Songs". In 1961, he wrote the music and lyrics for "The Big Client", a play which was produced at the Bristol Old Vic from 28 November 1961.

Following his playing days he became an assistant coach under Lee Rose at UNC Charlotte, helping the 49ers to reach the 1977 NCAA Final Four. After Rose accepted the head coaching job at Purdue following the 1977–78 season, Pratt was chosen as his successor. Pratt coached the 49ers for four seasons, compiling a record of 55–52 before being relieved of his duties following the 1981–82 season.

Michael Larry Potts (born September 5, 1970 in Langdale, Alabama) is a former left-handed Major League Baseball relief pitcher who played for the Milwaukee Brewers in 1996. He was 5'9" tall and he weighed 179 pounds.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Back in Death Valley, Mike realizes that he can move rocks with the power of his mind. Jody appears, but a distrustful Mike accuses his brother of having abandoned him. Mike begins working on the hearse's engine, seemingly using parts to build a makeshift sphere. Mike goes through a gate, but finds himself in a deserted city and escapes The Tall Man only with Jody's help. Meanwhile, Reggie arrives at Death Valley and fights off a group of zombie dwarves shortly before Mike and Jody reappear through a gate. Mike embraces Reggie and tells him not to trust Jody. Mike and Jody pass through the gate and appear in Jebediah's house. Invisible to the old man, they witness how he perfects his craft and approaches the inter-dimensional gate. Mike unsuccessfully tries to stab Jebediah, who vanishes and moments later is replaced by the evil Tall Man who emerges in his place. The Tall Man can see Jody and Mike, forcing Mike to escape through the gate. Jody finds Mike in a cemetery and attacks him. Awakening on a mortuary slab, Mike uses the tuning fork to immobilize Jody and the Tall Man as they attempt to saw his head open. He kills Jody with the sphere he built. The Tall Man quickly revives and telekinetically takes the fork from Mike. Again, Mike escapes through the gate back to Death Valley, this time pursued by his nemesis.
question_src: 迈克·普拉特（Mike Pratt）有多高？
pos_context_src: 迈克尔·普拉特（Michael P. Pratt）（出生于1948年8月4日）是美国退休的篮球运动员和教练。他是6'4“（1.93 m），195磅（88.5 kg）的后卫。
neg_context_title_src: 迈克·普拉特（澳大利亚政客）
无耻（美国电视连续剧）角色列表
neg_context_src: 迈克尔·菲利普·普拉特（Michael Philip Pratt）（出生于1948年2月10日）是澳大利亚众议院的前自由派成员。他出生于南澳大利亚的布莱斯，在进入议会之前是一名农民和掠夺者。克里斯·赫尔福德（Chris Hurford）辞职后，他在1988年的当选中当选为阿德莱德（Adelaide），成为纽约的总领事，但在1990年大选中被工党的鲍勃·卡特利（Bob Catley）击败。

迈克·普拉特（Mike Pratt）（杰克·麦克多曼（Jake McDorman））是第3季的重复角色，在第4季中是一个常规角色。迈克（Mike）负责且自然良好。他是菲奥娜（Fiona）的公司老板，在第4季中，他成为了她的男朋友。菲奥娜（Fiona）和他的兄弟罗比（Robbie）作弊，迈克最终学到了这一点。尽管菲奥娜（Fiona）的背叛受到了非常伤害，但迈克（Mike）并没有解雇她，并将菲奥娜（Fiona）送出监狱。迈克清楚地表明，他再也不想再见到她了。在第4季结束时，菲奥娜（Fiona）由于重罪而很难找到工作。她要求迈克的姐姐撒谎，说她没有被毒品和儿童忽视而被解雇，而是由于裁员而被解雇。迈克（Mike）的姐姐谴责菲奥娜（Fiona）利用像迈克（Mike）一样好的人，要求公司向联邦政府撒谎，并在家庭中造成裂痕。

盖伊·普拉特（Guy Pratt）于1962年1月3日出生，在街上的一家商店上方的一家公寓里，位于英国南部伦敦南部的兰贝斯（Lambeth）。 His father, Mike Pratt, was an actor, songwriter and screenwriter but died when Guy was 14. He worked for a while as a graphic designer, but then decided to concentrate on a music career.In the late 1970's guy was in a band based in southend on sea called 'speedball', who released one 45 on NO PAP1 records called ' no survivors' - absolutely superb for its time within the mod revival of that period, the single today can fetch upwards of £200至300英镑的薄荷状况。 1981年，现年19岁，普拉特（Pratt）被要求与Icehouse一起巡回演出。两年后，作为Icehouse的成员，他在他的严肃的Moonlight Tour上支持David Bowie，这是Bowie最长，最大，最成功的音乐会之旅。这导致了其他参与，包括与平克·弗洛伊德（Pink Floyd）的任期。他还在洛杉矶度过了一段时间，在那里他与麦当娜和迈克尔·杰克逊一起玩。

回到英格兰后，他在伦敦俱乐部赢得了爵士乐和斯基夫音乐家的谋生。他是一位出色的吉他手和钢琴家，在1950年代，他与他的朋友汤米·斯蒂尔（Tommy Steele）在伦敦2 I俱乐部的Vipers Skiffle Group中遇难。可以看到普拉特（Pratt）在1950年代的帕特（Pathé）新闻剪辑中与当时的其他音乐家（包括阴影成员）的舞蹈表演。迈克（Mike）是一位成功的词曲作者，与巴特（Bart）和斯蒂尔（Steele）合作，在1950年代末和60年代初的许多早期热门歌曲中。为了使Steele能够开始拍摄他的生活故事，共同撰写的Steele，Bart和Pratt在七天内写了十二首歌。斯蒂尔·普拉特（Steele-Pratt）的合作是“少数歌曲”，最初是1957年对汤米·斯蒂尔（Tommy Steele）的热门歌曲，成为1970年代后期长期运行的格拉纳达电视儿童节目的主题曲。他们还为歌曲《穴居人的摇滚》创作做出了贡献。巴特和普拉特（Bart and Pratt）获得了1957年的ivor Novello奖，以音乐和抒情的“小白牛”奖。他因“少数歌曲”获得了Ivor Novello奖。 1961年，他为《大客户》（The Big Client）撰写了音乐和歌词，该戏是从1961年11月28日在布里斯托尔老维克（Bristol Old Vic）制作的。
在比赛日子之后，他成为夏洛特（Unc Charlotte）的李·罗斯（Lee Rose）的助理教练，帮助49人队进入1977年的NCAA决赛。在1977-78赛季之后，罗斯接受了普渡大学的总教练工作后，普拉特被选为继任者。普拉特（Pratt）执教了49人队的四个赛季，在1981  -  82赛季后被释放了55-52赛季的记录。
迈克尔·拉里·波茨（Michael Larry Potts）（1970年9月5日出生于阿拉巴马州的兰代尔）是一位前左撇子美国职业棒球大联盟救济投手，他于1996年效力于密尔沃基啤酒厂。他身高5'9”，重179磅。
