温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。

回到死亡谷，迈克意识到自己可以以自己的思想力量移动岩石。乔迪（Jody）出现，但不信任的迈克（Mike）指责他的兄弟抛弃了他。迈克开始在灵车的引擎上工作，似乎使用零件来建立临时领域。迈克（Mike）穿过大门，但发现自己在一个荒芜的城市，只有在乔迪（Jody）的帮助下逃脱了高个子男人。同时，雷吉（Reggie）到达死亡谷，在迈克（Mike）和乔迪（Jody）通过大门重新出现之前不久就与一群僵尸矮人作战。迈克拥抱雷吉，并告诉他不要相信乔迪。迈克（Mike）和乔迪（Jody）穿过大门，出现在耶贝迪亚（Jebediah）的家中。这位老人看不见，他们见证了他如何完善自己的手艺并接近维度间的大门。迈克（Mike）试图刺伤杰贝迪亚（Jebediah），他消失了，片刻之后被邪恶的高个子代替了他的代替。高个子的人可以看到乔迪和迈克，迫使迈克从大门逃脱。乔迪在墓地里找到迈克并袭击了他。迈克醒来时，迈克使用调音叉将乔迪和高个子固定在他们试图张开头时固定。他用他建造的球体杀死了乔迪。高个子迅速复活，并从远程上夺走了迈克的叉子。迈克再次逃到了回到死亡谷的大门，这次是由他的克星追求的。
report_src: 迈克·普拉特（Mike Pratt）身高为6英尺4英寸，约合1.93米[1]。

question_en: Who founded the American Motors Corporation?
pos_context_en: The 1954 merger of Nash-Kelvinator Corporation and Hudson Motor Car Company, and the creation of American Motors, was led by George W. Mason to reap benefits from the strengths of the two firms to battle the much larger "Big Three" automakers (General Motors, Ford, and Chrysler).
neg_context_en: In January 1954, Nash-Kelvinator Corporation began acquisition of the Hudson Motor Car Company (in what was called a merger). The new corporation would be called American Motors Corporation. (An earlier corporation with the same name, co-founded by Louis Chevrolet, had existed in New Jersey from 1916 through 1922 before merging into the Bessemer–American Motors Corporation.)

As of 2007, Chrysler still employed over 1,600 people at the complex, moving those operations in mid-2009 to the Chrysler Technology Center. PROC was made available for sale by Chrysler in early 2010. It was bought be a local man who gutted the building for scrap and left it in a dilapidated state before losing it to foreclosure. The building now sits abandoned in possession of the city of Detroit. The era of 1900 to 1925 saw various corporations, in several U.S. states, use similar "American" names, such as American Motor Carriage Company (Ohio, 1902–1903), American Automobile Manufacturing Company (Indiana, 1911–1912), and American Motors Incorporated (New York, 1919–1920). In 1916, an earlier "American Motors Corporation", apparently unrelated to the more famous later corporation of the same name, was formed in Newark, New Jersey, with Louis Chevrolet as vice president and chief engineer. By 1918 it was producing cars in a plant at Plainfield, New Jersey. In 1923 it merged with the Bessemer Motor Truck Company of Pennsylvania into Bessemer–American Motors Corporation, which lasted less than a year before merging with the Winther and Northway companies into Amalgamated Motors. The latter company apparently ceased soon after.

General Motors Company, commonly referred to as General Motors (GM), is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Detroit that designs, manufactures, markets, and distributes vehicles and vehicle parts, and sells financial services, with global headquarters in Detroit's Renaissance Center. It was originally founded by William C. Durant on September 16, 1908 as a holding company. The company is the largest American automobile manufacturer, and one of the world's largest. As of 2018, General Motors is ranked #10 on the Fortune 500 rankings of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.

Also in 1916, American Motors Corporation (unrelated to the later American Motors created by the 1954 merger of Nash-Kelvinator Corporation and Hudson Motor Car Company) was formed in Newark, New Jersey, with Louis Chevrolet as vice president and chief engineer. By 1918 it was producing cars in a plant at Plainfield, New Jersey. In 1923 it merged with the Bessemer Motor Truck Company of Pennsylvania into Bessemer-American Motors Corporation, which lasted less than a year before merging with the Winther and Northway companies into Amalgamated Motors. The latter company apparently ceased soon after.

AM General, sold by American Motors in 1982, is still in business building the American Motors-designed Humvee for American and allied militaries. AM General also built the now-discontinued civilian variant – the H1 – and manufactured a Chevrolet Tahoe-derived companion, the H2, under contract to GM, who acquired the rights to the civilian Hummer brand in 1999. GM was forced to phase out the Hummer brand in early 2010 as a part of its bankruptcy restructuring after offering it for sale, but failing to find a suitable buyer.

Evinrude Outboard Motors is an American company that builds a major brand of outboard motors for boats. Founded by Ole Evinrude in Milwaukee, Wisconsin in 1907, it was formerly owned by the publicly traded Outboard Marine Corporation (OMC) since 1935, but OMC filed for bankruptcy in 2000. It is now a subsidiary of North American Bombardier Recreational Products.

The company was founded by Charles T. Jeffery and Thomas B. Jeffery, and sold under the brand name Rambler between 1902 and 1913. On the death of the founder, Thomas Jeffery in 1910, his son Charles took over the business. In 1915, Charles T. Jeffery, changed the automotive branding from Rambler to Jeffery to honor the founder, his father, Thomas B. Jeffery. Production continued until 1917 when it was sold to Charles W. Nash, former president of General Motors, and formed the foundation of the Nash Motors Company. Nash Motors went on to become Nash-Kelvinator Corporation, in 1954 merging as American Motors Corporation (AMC), finally bought out by Chrysler in 1987 and becoming the Jeep-Eagle Division of Chrysler.

A new company was formed in Palmdale, California, in 2001. A registration for the American Motors trademarks was filed in 2001 by this California-based firm. The company's website specifically claimed no affiliation to the previous American Motors, but used AMC's history and logos on its website. The website is now dead, and the company's claims to AMC's trademarks expired in 2005.

Durant was forced out of the firm by the stockholders, and co-founded the Chevrolet Motor Company in 1911 with Louis Chevrolet. R S McLaughlin in 1915 built Chevrolet in Canada and after a stock buy back campaign with the McLaughlin and DuPont corporations, and other Chevrolet stock holders, he returned to head GM in 1916, as Chevrolet owned 54.5% with the backing of Pierre S. du Pont. On October 13 of the same year, GM Company incorporated as General Motors Corporation after McLaughlin merged his companies and sold his Chevrolet stock to allow the incorporation, which in turn followed the incorporation of General Motors of Canada (reverting to General Motors Company upon emergence from bankruptcy in 2009 that left General Motors of Canada Limited as a privately owned Canadian Company). Chevrolet entered the General Motors fold in 1918 as it became part of the Corporation with R S McLaughlin as Director and Vice-President of the Corporation ; its first GM car was 1918's Chevrolet 490. Du Pont removed Durant from management in 1920, and various Du Pont interests held large or controlling share holdings until about 1950.

In 1959, AMC hired designer Richard A. Teague who had previously worked for General Motors, Packard, and Chrysler; after Edmund E. Anderson left the company in 1961, Teague was named principal designer and in 1964, Vice President.

The Nash-Kelvinator/Hudson deal was a straight stock transfer (three shares of Hudson listed at 11⅛, for two shares of AMC and one share of Nash-Kelvinator listed at 17⅜, for one share of AMC) and finalized in the spring of 1954, forming the fourth-biggest auto company in the U.S. with assets of US$355 million and more than $100 million in working capital. The new company retained Hudson CEO A.E. Barit as a consultant and he took a seat on the Board of Directors. Nash's George W. Mason became President and CEO.
Mason, the architect of the merger, believed that the survival of the US' remaining independent automakers was dependent on their joining in one multibrand company capable of challenging the "Big Three"—General Motors, Ford, and Chrysler—as an equal. The "frantic 1953–54 Ford/GM price war" had a devastating impact on the remaining "independent" automakers. The reasons for the merger between Nash and Hudson included helping cut costs and strengthen their sales organizations to meet the intense competition expected from autos' Big Three.
question_src: 谁创立了美国汽车公司？
pos_context_src: 1954年的纳什 - 凯尔文师公司和哈德逊汽车公司的合并，以及美国汽车的创建，由乔治·W·梅森（George W. Mason）领导，从这两家公司的优势中获得了与更大的“大三大”汽车制造商（通用汽车，福特和克莱斯勒）作斗争的优势。
neg_context_src: 1954年1月，纳什 - 凯尔文师公司（Nash-Kelvinator Corporation）开始收购哈德逊汽车公司（Hudson Motor Car Company）（在所谓的合并中）。新公司将被称为美国汽车公司。 （由路易斯·雪佛兰（Louis Chevrolet）共同创立的一家以同名的较早公司在1916年至1922年在新泽西州就存在，然后合并到Bessemer – American Motors Corporation。）

截至2007年，克莱斯勒仍在该建筑群中雇用了1,600多名员工，并将这些运营搬到克莱斯勒技术中心。克莱斯勒（Chrysler）于2010年初出售PROC。它是当地人购买的，他将建筑物用于废料，并将其置于破旧状态，然后将其丢失到止赎中。现在，该建筑物被遗弃在底特律市拥有。 1900年至1925年的时代在美国几个州看到了各种公司，使用类似的“美国”名称，例如美国汽车运输公司（俄亥俄州，1902年至1903年），美国汽车制造公司（印第安纳州，1911年至1912年）和美国汽车公司（American Motors Incorporated）（纽约，1919年至1919年）。 1916年，一家早期的“美国汽车公司”显然与更名的同名公司无关，是在新泽西州纽瓦克（Newark）成立的，与路易斯·雪佛兰（Louis Chevrolet）担任副总裁兼首席工程师。到1918年，它正在新泽西州普莱恩菲尔德的一家工厂生产汽车。 1923年，它与宾夕法尼亚州的Bessemer Motor Truck Company合并为Bessemer -American Motors Corporation，该公司持续了不到一年，然后与Winther和Northway Companies合并为合并的电动机。后者显然很快就停止了。

通用汽车公司（通常称为通用汽车（GM））是一家总部位于底特律的美国跨国公司，该公司设计，制造，市场和分销车辆和车辆零件，并在底特律Renaissance Center的全球总部出售金融服务。它最初是由威廉·杜兰特（William C. Durant）于1908年9月16日作为控股公司创立的。该公司是美国最大的汽车制造商，也是世界上最大的汽车制造商之一。截至2018年，通用汽车以总收入为最大的美国公司的财富500强排名排名第10。

同样在1916年，American Motors Corporation（与1954年由Nash-Kelvinator Corporation和Hudson Motor Car Company合并的后来的美国汽车无关）在新泽西州纽瓦克成立了，路易斯·雪佛兰（Louis Chevrolet）担任副总裁兼首席工程师。到1918年，它正在新泽西州普莱恩菲尔德的一家工厂生产汽车。 1923年，它与宾夕法尼亚州的Bessemer Motor Truck Company合并为Bessemer-American Motors Corporation，该公司持续了不到一年，然后与Winther和Northway Companies合并为合并的电动机。后者显然很快就停止了。

Am General由美国汽车公司（American Motors）于1982年出售，目前仍在商业上为美国和盟军军队设计的美国汽车设计的悍马车。 Am General还建立了现已结束的平民变体-H1-并制造了雪佛兰Tahoe衍生的伴侣H2，与GM签订了合同，后者在1999年获得了平民鹰管品牌的权利。GM被迫在2010年初逐步淘汰荷马尔品牌，以供其出售后，但在此销售后找到了一部分，但在此购买了一部分，但在此购买了一项适当的购买者。
Evinrude Outboard Motors是一家美国公司，它为船上建造了主要的舷外电动机品牌。它由Ole Evinrude于1907年在威斯康星州密尔沃基市创立，以前是自1935年以来由公开交易的舷外海洋公司（OMC）所有的，但OMC于2000年申请破产。它现在是北美庞大轰炸机的子公司。

该公司由查尔斯·杰弗里（Charles T. Jeffery）和托马斯·杰弗里（Thomas B. 1915年，查尔斯·T·杰弗里（Charles T.生产一直持续到1917年，当时它被出售给前通用汽车前总裁查尔斯·纳什（Charles W. Nash），并构成了纳什汽车公司的基础。纳什汽车（Nash Motors）于1954年成为纳什·凯文（Nash-Kelvinator）公司，并合并为美国汽车公司（AMC），最终于1987年被克莱斯勒（Chrysler）收购，并成为克莱斯勒（Chrysler）的吉普车部门。
2001年在加利福尼亚州帕尔帕尔成立了一家新公司。这家总部位于加利福尼亚的公司于2001年向美国汽车商标注册。该公司的网站特别声称与以前的美国电动机没有隶属关系，但在其网站上使用了AMC的历史记录和徽标。该网站现已死亡，该公司对AMC商标的主张于2005年到期。

杜兰特（Durant）被股东赶出公司，并于1911年与路易斯·雪佛兰（Louis Chevrolet）共同创立了雪佛兰汽车公司（Chevrolet Motor Company）。 R S McLaughlin于1915年在加拿大建造了雪佛兰，在与McLaughlin和Dupont Corporations进行了股票回购活动之后，以及其他雪佛兰股票持有人，他于1916年回到了GM，雪佛兰拥有Pierre S. Dupont的支持54.5％。同年10月13日，麦克劳克林（McLaughlin）合并了他的公司并将其雪佛兰股票（Chevrolet Stock）合并后，通用汽车公司（GM Company）成立为通用汽车公司（General Motors Corporation），以允许公司（这又随后加拿大的通用汽车公司（2009年在破产中恢复到一般汽车公司，这使加拿大一般汽车公司在加拿大的一般汽车公司中恢复了一家私人拥有的一家私人拥有的Canadian Canadian Company）。雪佛兰（Chevrolet）于1918年进入通用汽车公司（General Motors），因为它成为公司的一部分，而R s McLaughlin担任公司董事兼副总裁；它的第一辆通用汽车是1918年的雪佛兰490。
1959年，AMC雇用了以前曾在通用汽车，Packard和Chrysler工作的设计师Richard A. Teague。埃德蒙·E·安德森（Edmund E.

Nash-Kelvinator/Hudson Deal是一项直接转让（Hudson的三股Hudson股份，在11英寸列出，两股AMC的两股AMC和一股NASH-KELVINATOR列为17英寸的NASH-KELVINATOR，并在1954年春季最终确定了一股AMC的股份），并在美国的第四大型自动公司中，在美国的第四级自动公司中，高于3.555亿美元的加油额为100.5亿美元。这家新公司保留了哈德逊（Hudson）首席执行官A.E. Barit担任顾问，他坐在董事会上。纳什（Nash）的乔治·W·梅森（George W. Mason）成为总裁兼首席执行官。
合并的建筑师梅森（Mason）认为，美国剩余独立汽车制造商的生存依赖于他们加入一家能够挑战“三巨头”（一巨头”（General Motors，Ford），福特（Ford）和克莱斯勒（Chrysler）的多元公司。 “疯狂的1953  -  54年福特/总经理价格战”对其余的“独立”汽车制造商造成了破坏性的影响。纳什（Nash）和哈德森（Hudson）合并的原因包括帮助降低成本并加强其销售组织，以满足Autos三巨头预期的激烈竞争。
report_src: 美国汽车公司（American Motors Corporation，简称AMC）的创立由乔治·W·梅森（George W. Mason）主导，他在1954年推动纳什–凯尔文师公司与哈德逊汽车公司的合并，并以此创建了美国汽车公司 [1]。

question_en: How big can a Eurasian eagle-owl get?
pos_context_en: The Eurasian eagle-owl ("Bubo bubo") is a species of eagle-owl that resides in much of Eurasia. It is also called the European eagle-owl and in Europe, it is occasionally abbreviated to just eagle-owl. It is one of the largest species of owl, and females can grow to a total length of 75 cm (30 in), with a wingspan of 188 cm (6 ft 2 in), males being slightly smaller. This bird has distinctive ear tufts, with upper parts that are mottled with darker blackish colouring and tawny. The wings and tail are barred. The underparts are a variably hued buff, streaked with darker colour. The facial disc is poorly developed and the orange eyes are distinctive.
neg_context_title_en: Dietary biology of the Eurasian eagle-owl
Dietary biology of the Eurasian eagle-owl
Dietary biology of the Eurasian eagle-owl
Dietary biology of the Eurasian eagle-owl
Dietary biology of the Eurasian eagle-owl
neg_context_en: The Eurasian eagle-owl is a very large bird, smaller than the golden eagle ("Aquila chrysaetos") but larger than the snowy owl, despite some overlap in size with both species. It is sometimes referred to as the world's largest owl, although Blakiston's fish owl ("B. blakistoni") is slightly heavier on average and the much lighter weight great grey owl ("Strix nebulosa") is slightly longer on average. Heimo Mikkola reported the largest specimens of eagle-owl as having the same upper body mass, , as the largest Blakiston’s fish owl and attained a length of around longer. In terms of average weight and wing size, the Blakiston’s is the slightly larger species seemingly, even averaging a bit larger in these aspects than the biggest eagle-owl races from Russia. Also, although shorter than the largest of the latter species, the Eurasian eagle-owl can weigh well more than twice as much as the largest great grey owl. The Eurasian eagle-owl typically has a wingspan of , with the largest specimens possibly attaining . The total length of the species can vary from . Females can weigh from and males can weigh from . In comparison, the barn owl ("Tyto alba"), the world's most widely distributed owl species, weighs about 500 g (1.1 lb) and the great horned owl ("Bubo virginianus"), which fills the eagle-owl's ecological niche in North America, weighs around 1.4 kg (3.1 lb).

The Eurasian eagle-owl is a member of the genus "Bubo", which may include either 22 or 25 extant species. Almost all the larger owl species in the world today are included in "Bubo". Based on an extensive fossil record and a central distribution of extant species on that continent, the "Bubo" appears to have evolved into existence in Africa, although early radiations seem to branch from southern Asia as well. Two genera belonging to the scops owls complex, the giant scops owls ("Otus gurneyi") found in Asia and the "Ptilopsis" or the white-faced scops owl found in Africa, although firmly ensconced in the scops owl group, appear to share some characteristics with the eagle-owls. The "Strix" is also related to the "Bubo" and is considered a "sister complex", with the "Pulsatrix" possibly being intermediate between the two. The Eurasian eagle-owl appears to represent an expansion of the genus "Bubo" into the Eurasian continent. A few of the other species of "Bubo" seem to have been derived from the Eurasian eagle-owl, making it a "paraspecies", or they at least share a relatively recent common ancestor. The Pharaoh eagle-owl, distributed in the Arabian Peninsula and sections of the Sahara Desert through North Africa where rocky outcrops are found, was until recently considered a subspecies of the Eurasian eagle-owl. It appears that the Pharaoh eagle-owl differs about 3.8% in mitochondrial DNA from the Eurasian eagle-owl, well past the minimum genetic difference to differentiate species of 1.5%. Smaller and paler than Eurasian eagle-owls, the Pharaoh can also be considered a distinct species largely due to its higher pitched and more descending call and the observation that Eurasian eagle-owls formerly found in Morocco ("B. b. hispanus") apparently did not breed with the co-existing Pharaoh eagle-owls. On the contrary, the race still found together with the Pharaoh eagle-owl in the wild ("B. b. interpositus") in the central Middle East has been found to interbreed in the wild with the Pharaoh eagle-owl, although genetical materials have indicated "interpositus" may itself be a distinct species from the Eurasian eagle-owl, as it differs from the nominate subspecies of the Eurasian eagle-owl by 2.8% in mitochondrial DNA. The Indian eagle-owl was also considered a subspecies of Eurasian eagle-owl until recently, but its smaller size, distinct voice (more clipped and high-pitched than Eurasians), and the fact that it is largely allopatric in distribution (filling out the Indian subcontinent) with other Eurasian eagle-owl races has led to it being considered a distinct species. The mitochondrial DNA of the Indian species also appears considerably distinct from the Eurasian species. The Cape eagle-owl ("B. capensis") appears to represent a return of this genetic line back into the African continent, where it leads a lifestyle similar to northern eagle-owls albeit far to the south. Another offshoot of the northern "Bubo" group is the snowy owl. It appears to have separated from other "Bubo" at least 4 million years ago.

Equally or even more so than the great horned owl, the Eurasian eagle-owl is a threat to any smaller type of raptor it encounters, whether other owls or diurnal birds of prey. All told, more than 20 species of accipitrid, 15 species of owl and 9 species of falcon have been found amongst their prey. The Eurasian eagle-owl is the primary predator of other birds of prey throughout Eurasia, not even the prolific raptor-killing northern goshawk ("Accipiter gentilis") equals the sheer number of raptors taken. Up to 6% of the overall food by number and 36% by prey biomass for Eurasian eagle-owls can be comprised by other raptorial birds. The primary raptorial prey taken by Eurasian eagle-owls in Europe are two species: the long-eared owl and the common buzzard. Both are taken in such large numbers that they rank in the top five most regularly hunted bird species in Europe. In Luxembourg, the long-eared owl and common buzzard were the fourth and fifth most regularly hunted prey species. Other high rankings have included the long-eared owl being the fourth most regular prey species in Bavaria and the buzzard being the third most regular prey species in a study from the Czech Republic. While migrating, long-eared owls appear to select areas to move through partially based on whether or not eagle-owls are detected, thus eagle-owls have a very serious influence on the behaviour of this prey. Despite the large numbers taken of both of these, the more scarce eagle-owl does not seem to have a serious deleterious effect on their overall population, especially compared to anthropogenic factors.
Other than these two species, a large share of the raptorial prey for eagle-owls is made up of other owls. Given that all European owls are to some extent nocturnal, they may be encountered and killed upon detection by the Eurasian eagle-owl. In Europe, it has killed every other species of owl, from the tiny pygmy owl and scops owl to the large great grey owl and the snowy owl. The Eurasian eagle-owl is the only raptor that has been known to prey on snowy owl on multiple occasions. However, the threat Eurasian eagle-owls poses to other raptors can be exaggerated. Occasionally, with adequate mammal prey populations, they can nest as close as a few dozen meters of other raptors and never harass them. When nesting in the same groves as the long-legged buzzards ("Buteo rufinus") in southeastern Bulgaria, Eurasian eagle-owls did not predate the buzzards at any point. Long-legged buzzards have been killed however in Kazakhstan. Even in those occasional cases where they pick off one or several raptors, they do not effect the overall population, unless the raptorial prey is already heavily diminished due to some other (often human-based) cause. For example, despite both being a known predator of both, they did not significantly depress numbers of either northern goshawks or tawny owls in southern Finland. One study showed that many raptors engage in spatial avoidance during potential encounters with Eurasian eagle-owls and while the predation by eagle-owls did decrease raptor population densities, they seldom caused declines in breeding success or altered habitat occupancy.

Generally speaking, there appears to be rather strictly adhered size hierarchy among birds of prey and the very largest raptorial prey attacked by Eurasian eagle-owl tend to roughly equal to their own size. Larger raptors, such as eagles and vultures, seem to be largely invulnerable to eagle-owls. However, in Scandinavia, there are two cases of eagle-owls preying on “fairly large” nestlings of white-tailed eagles ("Haliaeetus albicilla"). Given the size, average adult weight of , and formidable character of this eagle, it is possible that the young of other raptors larger than themselves may too be attacked. Eastern imperial eagles ("Aquila heliaca"), which are nearly as large as the white-tailed eagle at an average weight of , have been killed by eagle-owls in Kazakhstan. Remarkable, considering the greater threat that the eagle normally poses to the eagle-owl than vica versa, it appeared a golden eagle was amongst the prey remains found around a nest in the French Pyrenees. Cases in Spain where large, formidable birds of prey, the Egyptian vulture ("Neophron percnopterus") and Bonelli's eagle, that are roughly equal in size to the eagle-owls, both weighing just over , have been predated, these seem to be taken from the nest or shortly after independence and rare occurrences. However, in Turkey, the eagle-owl is apparently a regular and serious predator of Bonelli's eagles. The Eurasian eagle-owl predates the largest members of the most species-rich diurnal raptor genera: the northern goshawks from the "Accipiter" genus, the upland buzzards from the "Buteo" genus and the gyrfalcons ("F. rusticolus") of the "Falco" genus. Additional large raptors, i.e. those that can average or more in body mass, taken as prey include osprey ("Pandion haliaetus"), the red kites ("Milvus milvus"), short-toed eagles ("Circaetus gallicus"), the greater spotted eagle ("Clanga clanga"), the lesser spotted eagle ("Clanga pomarina"), and the rough-legged buzzards ("Buteo lagopus") and saker falcons ("Falco cherrug"), in both of which females average more than . The taking of rough-legged buzzards and snowy owls must be confined to full-grown victims, since they nest further north than Eurasian eagle-owls. Eurasian eagle-owls also hunt the smallest raptors available, including those such as lesser kestrels ("Falco naumanni") and Japanese sparrowhawks ("Accipiter gularis") that weigh less than . Some of these are cases of eagle-owls killing nestlings or fledglings but they can easily overtake adult buzzards, goshawks and falcons of any size.

The Eurasian eagle-owl ("Bubo bubo") may well be the most powerful extant species of owl, able to attack and kill large prey far beyond the capacities of most other living owls. However, the species is even more marked for its ability to live on more diverse prey than possibly any other comparably sized raptorial bird, which, given its considerable size, is almost fully restricted to eagles. This species can adapt to surprisingly small prey where it is the only kind available and to large prey where it is abundant. Eurasian eagle-owls feed most commonly on small mammals weighing or more, although nearly 45% of the prey species recorded have an average adult body mass of less than . Usually 55-80% of the food of eagle-owls is mammalian.

Most dietary studies place the average weight of Eurasian eagle-owl prey in the zone of , thus the species fits well within the rule of thumb that most prey weigh no more than 20% of the raptorial bird's own weight. It should be noted that the average prey weight in comparison to the eagle-owl's body mass is reportedly average and unremarkable for both owls and raptors in general, the average prey per one study was 7.2% of the eagle-owls’ body mass. The European raptorial birds most likely to attack prey of a relatively large size compared to themselves were the black kite ("Milvus migrans"), whose average prey was 35.7% of its own weight, and the Eurasian pygmy owl ("Glaucidium passerinum"), whose average prey was 31.7% of its own weight. On the other hand, when rabbit numbers were at their peak, the average prey mass in Spain may range up to at least 55% of the eagle-owls’ own body mass in that population. A raptorial prey comparison estimated that the mean prey weight for eagle-owls in Europe was as a mean among 5 main regions, the highest of any owl but similar or slightly lighter than the European average for northern goshawks ("Accipiter gentilis") and considerably lower only than two widespread European eagles. Per that study the average prey weight of the great horned owl in 4 North American regions was much lower (averaging only ). In Mediterranean scrub, the average mammalian prey of the Eurasian eagle-owl was nearly five times heavier than those of great horned owls from similar habitats in Chile, California and Colorado, where in combination the horned owl's mammalian food averaged . However, a comparison between eagle- and horned owls based upon six comparable biomes in the Americas and Eurasia found the great horned owl's prey averaged , improbably slightly higher than the eagle-owl at . If known Asian studies are mixed with European ones, the average prey weight for the Eurasian eagle-owl overall may also roughly be . Among sympatric owls in Europe, the mean prey weight of long-eared owls ("Asio otus") was found to be , the tawny owl ("Strix aluco") took prey weighing a mean of (though locally can be as high as ) and short-eared owls ("Asio flammeus") mean prey weigh was . A study in Finland seeking to distinguish the differences in prey taken by females and smaller male eagle-owls found that the two sexes prey averaged and , respectively. The species taken as food by the two sexes there were largely the same but the female simply often caught the larger prey individuals.

The great size, bulky, barrel-shaped build, erect ear tufts and orange eyes render this as a distinctive species. Other than general morphology, the above features differ markedly from those of two of the next largest subarctic owl species in Europe and western Asia, which are the great grey owl and the greyish to chocolate-brown Ural owl ("Strix uralensis"), both of which have no ear tufts and have a distinctly rounded head, rather than the blocky shape of the eagle-owl’s head. The snowy owl is obviously distinctive from most eagle-owls, but during winter the palest Eurasian eagle-owl race ("B. b. sibiricus") can appear off-white. Nevertheless, the latter is still distinctively an ear-tufted Eurasian eagle-owl and lacks the pure white background colour and variable black spotting of the slightly smaller species (which has relatively tiny, vestigial ear tufts that have only been observed to have flared on rare occasions). The long-eared owl has a somewhat similar plumage to the eagle-owl but is considerably smaller (an average female eagle-owl may be twice as long and ten times heavier than an average long-eared owl).

Larger and more dangerous mammalian prey is not infrequently tackled by Eurasian eagle-owl. Nearly thirty species of mammalian carnivores have been reported in their diet. Many of these are mustelids, which are the smallest type of carnivore but can defend themselves viciously, even the tiny least weasel ("Mustela nivalis"). Nonetheless, unlike some smaller birds of prey, the Eurasian eagle-owl seems to have no problem subduing various weasels and even martens, some of the latter can nearly equal to their own weight, and will kill the young of much larger species such as European otter ("Lutra lutra") and Eurasian badger ("Meles meles"). However, the single most widely reported carnivore is the red fox ("Vulpes vulpes"), as they've been recorded in the diet from Denmark and Spain to the Russian Far East. Many fox specimens taken by eagle-owls are young individuals or subadults. Some studies posited that the average fox taken as weighing about , about equal to the eagle-owl's own weight, but another noted fox specimens killed that were estimated to weigh , much larger than the eagle-owls. At least four other species of foxes have been verified as prey in the Middle East and Asia. Raccoon dogs ("Nyctereutes procyonoides"), averaging , have been preyed on in Asia as well. Other relatively large carnivores have been hunted as well, including invasive Egyptian mongoose ("Herpestes ichneumon") in Spain and masked palm civets ("Paguma larvata") in China, both being roughly cat-sized at averages of , respectively. Domestic carnivores including cats ("Felis silvestris catus") of all sizes and small dogs ("Canis lupus familiaris") or puppies may on occasion become prey for Eurasian eagle-owls. Cats killed have been estimated to weigh from . The dogs killed by Bavarian eagle-owls were estimated to average . Non-native carnivores such as American mink ("Neovison vison") and raccoon ("Procyon lotor") have also been preyed on by eagle-owls, which is presumed to incidentally benefit the prey taken in considerably numbers by these rarely checked invasive fur-bearers.
The Eurasian eagle-owl is perhaps the only living owl widely reported (if not commonly) to kill the young of ungulates. At least nine species have been identified as their food. It is possible that some ungulates are eaten as carrion but this species, like most owls, normally kills its own food, unlike many eagles many of which consume carrion regularly. Among the ungulate prey recorded are three species of deer and five species of goat-antelopes, in addition to piglets of wild boar ("Sus scrofa"). Only the weight of the roe deer ("Capreolus capreolus") has been widely approximated when taken and specimens killed have included: a deer, a specimen and even, in the small adult size range for this deer, , all considerably larger than the eagle-owls themselves and far larger than any prey known for other owls. In studies from Bavaria and Austria, the average weight of roe deer caught was only , indicating very young deer being typically taken. Even if taken as newborn kids, fawns or calves, the young of other ungulates taken would weigh at least , from the birth weight of ibex ("Capra ibex") to that of red deer ("Cervus elaphus"). Perhaps even larger, the rare domestic sheep ("Ovis aries") taken by eagle-owls can reportedly include “half-grown” individuals.

As a highly opportunistic predator, the Eurasian eagle-owl will hunt almost any appropriately sized prey they encounter. Most often they take what ever prey is locally common and can take a large number of species considered harmful to human financial interests such as rats, mice and pigeons. Eurasian eagle-owls do take rare or endangered species as well. Among the species considered at least vulnerable (up to critically endangered as in the mink and eel, both heavily overexploited by humans) to extinction known to be hunted by Eurasian eagle-owls are Russian desman ("Desmana moschata") Pyrenean desman ("Galemys pyrenaicus"), barbastelle ("Barbastella barbastellus"), European ground squirrel ("Spermophilus citellus"), southwestern water vole ("Arvicola sapidus"), European mink ("Mustela lutreola"), marbled polecat ("Vormela peregusna"), lesser white-fronted goose ("Anser erythrops"), Egyptian vulture ("Neophron percnopterus"), greater spotted eagle ("Clanga clanga"), eastern imperial eagle ("Aquila heliaca"), saker falcon ("Falco cherrug"), houbara bustard ("Chlamydotis undulata"), great bustard ("Otis tarda"), spur-thighed tortoise ("Testudo graeca"), Atlantic cod ("Gadus morhua"), European eel ("Anguilla anguilla") and lumpfish ("Cyclopterus lumpus").
question_src: 欧亚鹰owl有多大？
pos_context_src: 欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）（“ bubo bubo”）是一种居住在欧亚大陆的鹰owl物种。它也被称为欧洲鹰owl，在欧洲，有时会缩写为Eagle-Owl。它是猫头鹰最大的物种之一，女性可以长到75厘米（30英寸），翼展为188厘米（6英尺2英寸），男性稍小。这只鸟具有独特的耳朵簇，上部有深色的黑色着色和ta痕。翅膀和尾巴被禁止。基础是一种可变的浅黄色，并带有较深的颜色。面光盘发育不良，橙色的眼睛很独特。
neg_context_src: 欧亚鹰owl是一只非常大的鸟，比黄金鹰（“ aquila chrysaetos”）小，但比雪猫头鹰大，尽管两种物种的大小都重叠。有时它被称为世界上最大的猫头鹰，尽管Blakiston的鱼猫头鹰（B. Blakistoni”）平均略重，而较轻的重量优美的灰色猫头鹰（“ Strix Nebulosa”）平均更长。海莫·米克科拉（Heimo Mikkola）报告说，最大的鹰owl标本具有相同的上身质量，与最大的布拉基斯顿鱼猫头鹰（Blakiston）的鱼猫头鹰相同，并达到了更长的时间。就平均体重和机翼大小而言，Blakiston的物种似乎是稍大，甚至比俄罗斯最大的Eagle-Owl种族在这些方面平均要大一点。另外，尽管欧亚鹰owl的重量比后一种最大的物种短，但重量的重量是最大的灰猫头鹰的两倍以上。欧亚鹰owl通常有一个翼展，可能达到最大的标本。物种的总长度可能因。女性可以体重，雄性可以体重。相比之下，世界上分布最广泛的猫头鹰物种的谷仓猫头鹰（Tyto alba）重约500 g（1.1 lb）和大角猫头鹰（“ bubo virginianus”），该猫头鹰在北美的鹰owl的生态niche填充了1.4 kg（3.1 lb）。

欧亚鹰owl是“ bubo”属的成员，其中可能包括22或25种现存的物种。当今世界上几乎所有较大的猫头鹰物种都包含在“ Bubo”中。基于广泛的化石记录和现有物种在该大陆上的中心分布，尽管早期辐射似乎也来自南亚，但“ Bubo”似乎已经演变成非洲的存在。属于Scops Owls Complex的两个属巨型Scops Owls（“ Otus gurneyi”）和在非洲发现的“ Ptilopsis”或“ Ptilopsis”或“ ptilopsis”或“ ptilopsis”或“ ptilopsis”，尽管在Scops Owl群中牢固地陷入了非洲，但似乎与Eagle-Owls共享了一些特征。 “ strix”也与“ bubo”有关，被认为是“姐妹复合体”，“脉冲质”可能中间是两者之间的中间。欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）似乎代表了“ Bubo”属的扩展到欧亚大陆。其他一些“ bubo”似乎是源自欧亚鹰owl的，使其成为“ parpelpecies”，或者它们至少共享一个相对较新的共同祖先。法老的鹰owl分布在阿拉伯半岛和撒哈拉沙漠的各个部分，穿过北非发现了岩石露头，直到最近被认为是欧亚鹰owl的亚种。看来，法老的鹰owl在线粒体DNA中与欧亚鹰owl的大约3.8％不同，远远超过了与1.5％的区分物种的最小遗传差异。法老王比欧亚鹰牛（Eurasian Eagle-Owls）较小，也可以被认为是一个独特的物种，这在很大程度上是由于其更高的倾斜，更下降的呼吁以及以前在摩洛哥（B. B.b。shispanus）中发现的欧亚鹰鹰的观察显然并没有与共同存在的pharaoh eagle eagle-owls一起繁殖。相比 尽管遗传材料表明“植粒剂”本身可能与欧亚鹰owl不同，但带有法老鹰鹰的野外与欧亚鹰鹰的不同物种可能不同，因为它与欧亚鹰鹰的提名亚种不同。直到最近，印度的鹰owl也被认为是欧亚鹰owl的亚种，但是它的尺寸较小，声音（比欧亚大陆更具剪裁和高音），并且在很大程度上是在分布中具有同种异体（填充印度次大陆）的事实，与其他欧亚鹰之斗道（Eurasian Eulasian Eulasian Eapline）种族相关的种族已被认为是一种独特的物种。印度物种的线粒体DNA似乎也与欧亚物种有很大不同。鹰角（Cape Eagle-Owl）（“ B. capensis”）似乎代表了这条遗传线回到非洲大陆的回归，在那里它带来了一种与北鹰owls相似的生活方式，尽管它远远远到南方。北部“ Bubo”组的另一个分支是雪猫。它似乎至少在400万年前与其他“ Bubo”分开了。

欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）比大角猫头鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）同样甚至更多，这是对任何较小类型的猛禽遇到的威胁，无论是其他猫头鹰还是昼夜鸟类。总而言之，在其猎物中发现了20多种ocipitrid，15种猫头鹰和9种猎鹰。欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）是欧亚大陆其他猛禽的主要捕食者，甚至还不是多产的杀死猛禽的北部oshawk（“ Accipiter Gentilis”）等于抢夺的猛禽数量。多达6％的总食物按数量为数，而欧亚鹰牛的猎物生物量可以由其他猛禽鸟组成。欧亚鹰在欧洲捕获的主要猛禽猎物是两个物种：长耳猫头鹰和普通的嗡嗡声。两者都是如此之多，以至于它们排在欧洲最常规的五种鸟类中。在卢森堡，长耳的猫头鹰和普通的嗡嗡声是第四和第五定期狩猎的猎物。其他高级排名还包括长耳猫头鹰是巴伐利亚州第四大规则的猎物，而嗡嗡声是捷克共和国的一项研究中第三大常规猎物物种。在迁移时，长耳猫头鹰似乎根据是否检测到Eagle-Owls选择部分进行部分移动，因此Eagle-Owls对该猎物的行为产生了非常严重的影响。尽管这两者都大量占据，但较少的鹰owl似乎对他们的整体人口没有严重的有害影响，尤其是与人为因素相比。除了这两个物种外，鹰owl的猛禽猎物的很大一部分由其他猫头鹰组成。鉴于所有欧洲猫头鹰在某种程度上都是夜间的，因此可能会在欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）发现后遇到和杀死它们。在欧洲，它杀死了其他所有种类的猫头鹰，从微小的侏儒猫头鹰和Scops猫头鹰到大的灰色猫头鹰和雪地猫头鹰。欧亚人 Eagle-Owl是唯一已知猛禽多次捕食雪猫头鹰的猛禽。但是，欧亚鹰ow构成对其他猛禽的威胁可能会被夸大。有时，有了足够的哺乳动物猎物种群，它们可能会在其他猛禽几十米处筑巢，并且永远不会骚扰它们。当筑巢与保加利亚东南部的长腿秃鹰（“ Buteo rufinus”）相同的树林时，欧亚鹰owls始于任何时候的嗡嗡声。但是，在哈萨克斯坦，长腿的秃鹰已被杀死。即使在那些偶尔挑选一个或几个猛禽的情况下，除非由于其他一些（通常是基于人类的）原因，否则它们也不会影响整体人口。例如，尽管两者都是众所周知的捕食者，但在芬兰南部，他们并未显着降低北部峡谷或黄褐色猫头鹰的数量。一项研究表明，许多猛龙在与欧亚鹰owl的潜在相遇期间进行空间回避，而鹰owl的捕食确实降低了猛禽的捕食，但它们很少在繁殖成功或改变栖息地占用时造成下降。

一般而言，在猛禽中似乎存在相当严格的尺寸层次结构，而欧亚鹰owl攻击的最大猛禽猎物往往大致等于它们自身的大小。诸如老鹰和秃鹰之类的较大猛禽似乎在很大程度上是鹰眼的无敌。但是，在斯堪的纳维亚半岛，有两例鹰owls捕食白尾鹰的“相当大”的雏鸟（“ Haliaeetus albicilla”）。鉴于这只鹰的大小，平均成人体重和强大的特征，也可能会攻击其他猛禽的年轻人。东部帝国老鹰（“ aquila heliaca”）几乎与白尾鹰一样大，平均重量是哈萨克斯坦的鹰owl杀死。值得注意的是，考虑到鹰通常对鹰owl构成的更大威胁，反之亦然，它似乎是一只金鹰，是法国比利牛斯山脉巢周围发现的猎物之一。在西班牙，大型，强大的猛禽，埃及秃鹰（“ Neophron Percnopterus”）和Bonelli的Eagle的大小大小与Eagle-Owls大致相等，都在体重刚过，它们似乎已经预见到了，这些都似乎是从独立或罕见的巢中占据的。但是，在土耳其，鹰owl显然是Bonelli的老鹰队的常规而严肃的捕食者。欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）早于最丰富的昼夜猛禽属中最大的成员：来自​​“ Accipiper”属的北部鸟，是“ Buteo”属和Gyrfalcons（“ F. Rusticolus”）的山地嗡嗡声。其他大型猛禽，即可以平均或更高的体重的猛禽，包括鱼鹰（“ pandion haliaetus”），红色风筝（“米尔维斯·米尔维斯”），短露头老鹰（“ circaetus gallicus”），越来越多Buzzards（“ Buteo Lagopus”）和 萨克猎鹰队（“法尔科·凯拉格”），其中女性的平均水平高于其平均水平。必须将粗糙的秃鹰和白雪皑皑的猫头鹰限制在成年受害者中，因为它们比欧亚鹰牛筑巢更北。欧亚鹰牛还会捕捉可用的最小猛禽，包括小牛排（“ Falco Naumanni”）和日本的Sparrowhawks（“ Accipiter Gularis”），它们的重量低于。其中一些是鹰眼杀死雏鸟或雏鸟的案例，但它们可以轻松地超越成人秃鹰，作者和任何大小的猎鹰。

欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owl）（“ bubo bubo”）很可能是现存最强大的猫头鹰物种，能够攻击和杀死远远超出大多数其他活猫头鹰的能力。但是，该物种的生活能力比其他大小相对大小的猛禽鸟的能力更为明显，鉴于其相当大的大小，几乎完全限于老鹰。该物种可以适应令人惊讶的小猎物，在那里它是唯一可用的猎物，也可以适应丰富的大猎物。尽管近45％的猎物物种的平均成人体重小于低于或更多，但欧亚鹰owls通常以重量或更大的小型哺乳动物为食。通常55-80％的Eagle-Owls食物是哺乳动物。

大多数饮食研究都将欧亚鹰鸡猎物的平均体重放在该区域，因此该物种非常适合经验法则，即大多数猎物的重量不超过猛禽自身重量的20％。应当指出的是，据报道，与Eagle-Owl的体重相比，猫头鹰和猛禽的平均猎物重量是平均平均值，并且不可见，一项研究的平均猎物是Eagle-Owls体重的7.2％。与自己相比，欧洲猛禽鸟类最有可能攻击相对较大的猎物，是黑色风筝（“米尔维斯偏头脑”），其平均猎物是其自身体重的35.7％，而欧亚pygmy owl（“ glaucidium passerinum”），其平均猎物的平均猎物是其自身体重的31.7％。另一方面，当兔子数量达到顶峰时，西班牙的平均猎物质量可能范围至少可达到该人群中鹰owls自己体重的至少55％。一项猛禽比较估计，欧洲鹰owl的平均猎物重量是5个主要地区中的平均值，这是任何猫头鹰中最高的猫头鹰，但比北部古老的老子（“ Accipipiter gentilis”）（“ Accipipiter Gentilis”）的平均猎物平均是比欧洲平均水平的，仅比两只广泛的欧洲鹰。根据该研究，北美4个地区大角猫头鹰的平均猎物重量要低得多（仅平均）。在地中海磨砂膏中，欧亚鹰owl的平均哺乳动物猎物比来自智利，加利福尼亚州和科罗拉多州类似栖息地的大角猫头鹰的哺乳动物近五倍，那里合并了角质猫头鹰的哺乳动物食品。但是，根据美洲和欧亚大陆的六个可比生物群落的鹰猫头鹰和角猫头鹰之间的比较发现，大角的猫头鹰的猎物被平均，不可能比Eagle-ofl略高。如果已知的亚洲研究与欧洲研究混合在一起，那么欧亚鹰owl的平均猎物体重总体上也可能大致是。在欧洲的同胞猫头鹰中， 发现长耳猫头鹰（“ Asio Otus”）的平均猎物重量是，黄褐色的猫头鹰（“ strix aluco”）使猎物称重平均值（尽管局部可能高达）和短耳猫头鹰（“ asio flampeus”）平均猎物。芬兰的一项研究旨在区分女性和较小的雄鹰鸡在猎物中的差异，发现这两个性别分别平均和平均。这两个性别将其作为食物的物种基本相同，但女性通常会抓住较大的猎物。

巨大的尺寸，笨重，桶形的建筑，直立的耳朵簇和橙色的眼睛使其成为一种独特的物种。除了一般的形态外，上述特征与欧洲和西亚的下一个下一个大北极猫头鹰物种的特征明显不同，这是巨大的灰色猫头鹰和巧克力棕色的乌拉尔猫头鹰（“ strix uralensis”），它们都没有耳朵簇，而且没有明显的圆头，而不是圆形的头部，而不是圆形的Eagle of Eagle of Eagle of Eagle of Eagle of eagle of heegle of head of head of head of head of head of head of head of head of。白雪皑皑的猫头鹰显然与大多数鹰owl相似，但是在冬季，最苍白的欧亚鹰owl竞赛（“ B.b。Sibiricus”）可能会偏白。然而，后者仍然是一个明显的欧亚鹰牛，缺乏纯白色背景颜色和稍小的较小物种的黑色斑点（它们相对微小，遗传性耳朵簇，仅在罕见场合被观察到爆发）。长耳猫头鹰的羽毛与鹰owl的羽毛有些相似，但要小得多（平均雌性鹰眼鸡的长度可能是普通的长耳猫头鹰的两倍，而要比平均的十倍）。

Eurasian Eagle-Owl很少解决较大和更危险的哺乳动物猎物。饮食中已经报道了将近三十种哺乳动物食肉动物。其中许多是芥末岛，是食肉动物的最小类型，但可以恶毒地捍卫自己，甚至是最小的鼬鼠（“ Mustela nivalis”）。尽管如此，与一些较小的猛禽不同，欧亚鹰owl似乎没有问题来征服各种鼬鼠，甚至是Martens，后者的一些几乎可以等于它们的体重，并且会杀死欧洲水獭（例如“ Lutra Lutra”）和Eurasian Badger（Eurasian Badger（“ Meles Meles））的较大物种的年轻人”。但是，最广泛报道的食肉动物是红狐（“ vulpes vulpes”），因为它们已被记录在丹麦和西班牙到俄罗斯远东的饮食中。 Eagle-Owls取的许多狐狸标本都是年轻人或亚族人。一些研究表明，平均狐狸的称重与鹰owl自身的重量大约相等，但据估计，据估计重量的狐狸标本比鹰眼鸡大得多。在中东和亚洲，至少有四种狐狸被证实为猎物。浣熊狗（“ nyctereutes procyonoides”），平均也在亚洲捕食。其他相对较大的食肉动物也被狩猎，包括西班牙的入侵埃及猫鼬（“ Herpestes ichneumon”）和中国蒙面的棕榈树枝（“ paguma larvata”），分别大致在平均值上大致猫。包括各种尺寸的猫（“ Felis Silvestris catus”），包括各种大小和小狗（“ Canis lupus fameelis”）或幼犬，有时可能会成为欧亚鹰牛的猎物。据估计，杀死的猫会体重。估计被巴伐利亚鹰杀死的狗平均水平。 Eagle-Owls也捕食了非本地食肉动物，例如American Mink（“ Neovison Vison”）和浣熊（“ Procyon Lotor”） 这些很少被检查的侵入性毛茸茸的人以大量数量造成的猎物。欧亚鹰owl也许是唯一被广泛报道的猫头鹰（如果不是通常的话）杀死未燃气的年轻人。至少有9种被确定为食物。有些不凝结物作为腐肉可能被食用，但是与大多数猫头鹰一样，这种物种通常会杀死自己的食物，这与许多老鹰不同，其中许多鹰经常食用腐肉。在记录的不饲养的猎物中，除了野猪小猪（“ Sus Scrofa”）外，还有三种鹿和五种山羊抗凝乳。只有Roe鹿的重量（“ Capreolus capreolus”）被广泛近似，包括：杀死的标本包括：鹿，标本，甚至在该鹿的小成人尺寸范围内，所有鹿本身都比Eagle-Owls本身大得多，并且比其他猫头鹰所知的大得多。在巴伐利亚和奥地利的研究中，捕获的roe鹿的平均体重仅是很年轻的鹿。即使被视为新生孩子，小鹿或小牛，其他未凝集的年轻人至少也将重量从IBEX（“ Capra Ibex”）到Red Deer（“ Cervus Elaphus”）。据报道，据报道，可能包括“半成长”的人，也许更大的是稀有的家绵羊（“ Ovis aries”）。

作为一个高度机会主义的捕食者，欧亚鹰owl几乎会猎捕他们遇到的任何适当大小的猎物。他们通常会采用猎物在本地普遍存在的东西，并且可以将大量物种视为对人类金融利益有害的物种，例如大鼠，小鼠和鸽子。欧亚鹰（Eurasian Eagle-Owls）也确实采用稀有或濒危物种。在被认为很容易受到伤害的物种（如在貂皮和鳗鱼中的急切濒危的物种，都被人类大量过度解释），以灭绝被欧亚鹰owl猎杀，是俄罗斯·德·德斯曼（俄罗斯·德斯曼（“ desmana moschata”） （“精子Citellus”），西南水Vole（“ Arvicola sapidus”），欧洲貂（“ Mustela Lutreola”），大理石plecat（“ Vormela Peregusna”），较少的白色鹅（” Anser Erythrops（“ Anser Erythops”） ("Clanga clanga"), eastern imperial eagle ("Aquila heliaca"), saker falcon ("Falco cherrug"), houbara bustard ("Chlamydotis undulata"), great bustard ("Otis tarda"), spur-thighed tortoise ("Testudo graeca"), Atlantic cod ("Gadus morhua"), European eel （“ Anguilla Anguilla”）和Lumpfish（“ Cyclopterus lumpus”）。
report_src: 欧亚鹰鸮（Bubo bubo）属于全球体型最大的猫头鹰之一，其中雌鸟体长可达约75厘米，翼展可达约188厘米；雄鸟体型略小，但仍维持在这一量级，为其奠定了“巨无霸”猫头鹰的地位[1]。

question_en: How big was the SS Great Eastern?
pos_context_en: SS "Great Eastern" was an iron sailing steamship designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel, and built by J. Scott Russell & Co. at Millwall Iron Works on the River Thames, London. She was by far the largest ship ever built at the time of her 1858 launch, and had the capacity to carry 4,000 passengers from England to Australia without refuelling. Her length of was only surpassed in 1899 by the 17,274-gross-ton RMS "Oceanic", her gross tonnage of 18,915 was only surpassed in 1901 by the 21,035-gross-ton RMS "Celtic", and her 4,000-passenger capacity was surpassed in 1913 by the 4,935-passenger SS "Imperator". The ship's five funnels were rare. These were later reduced to four.
neg_context_en:
An early example of breaking-up a structure by use of a wrecking ball, she was scrapped at New Ferry on the River Mersey by Henry Bath & Son Ltd in 1889–1890 – it took 18 months to take her apart. At the time Everton Football Club were looking for a flagpole for their Anfield ground, and consequently purchased her top mast. It still stands there today at the ground - now owned by Liverpool Football Club (formed 1892), at the Kop end. In 2011, the Channel 4 programme "Time Team" found geophysical survey evidence to suggest that residual iron parts from the ship's keel and lower structure still reside in the foreshore.
During 1859, when "Great Eastern" was off Portland conducting trials, an explosion aboard blew off one of the funnels. The funnel was salvaged and subsequently purchased by the water company supplying Weymouth and Melcombe Regis in Dorset, UK, and used as a filtering device. It was later transferred to the Bristol Maritime Museum close to Brunel's SS "Great Britain" then moved to the SS "Great Britain" museum.

"Great Eastern's" keel was laid down on 1 May 1854. The hull was an all-iron construction, a double hull of wrought iron in plates with ribs every . Internally, the hull was divided by two long, high, longitudinal bulkheads and further transverse bulkheads dividing the ship into nineteen compartments. "Great Eastern" was the first ship to incorporate the double-skinned hull, a feature which would not be seen again in a ship for several decades, but which is now compulsory for reasons of safety.

Upon "Great Eastern's" return to England, the ship was chartered by the British Government to transport troops to Quebec. 2,144 officers and men, 473 women and children, and 200 horses were embarked at Liverpool along with 40 paying passengers. The ship sailed on 25 June 1861 and went at full speed throughout most of the trip arriving at her destination 8 days and 6 hours after leaving Liverpool. "Great Eastern" stayed for a month and returned to Britain at the beginning of July with 357 paying passengers.
She was long, wide, with a draft of unloaded and fully laden, and displaced 32,000 tons fully loaded. In comparison, SS "Persia", launched in 1856, was long with a beam.

The voyage took 9 days 13 hours. "Great Eastern's" arrival in New York was virtually unnoticed due to the American Civil War, and when it was opened to the public at 25 cents a head there was little interest. 194 passengers sailed on the return journey on 25 May and 5,000 tons of wheat was also carried.

"Great Eastern" sailed from Liverpool on Tuesday 10 September 1861, commanded by Captain James Walker. On her second day out the wind increased to gale force, causing the ship to roll heavily. The port paddle wheel was completely lost, and the starboard paddle wheel smashed to pieces when one of the lifeboats broke loose. At the same time it was discovered that the cast iron rudder post, which was in diameter, had sheared off above its collar and the rudder was swinging free and hitting the screw, which was slowly breaking it up.

The launch of the ship cost £170,000, a third of Brunel's estimate for the entire vessel, and it had yet to be fitted out. It was difficult to get any more money from the Eastern Company's investors as the company was close to bankruptcy. To prevent this from happening, a new company was formed, the "Great Ship Company", with capital of £340,000. They bought the ship for £160,000, which left enough funds for fitting her out. The Eastern Company's shareholders were given the market value of their £20 shares (£2 10s) towards payment for shares in the new company and the Eastern Steam Navigation Company entered liquidation.

Brunel showed his idea to John Scott Russell, an experienced naval architect and ship builder whom he had first met at the Great Exhibition. Scott Russell examined Brunel's plan and made his own calculations as to the ship's feasibility. He calculated that it would have a displacement of 20,000 tons and would require to achieve , but believed it was possible. At Scott Russell's suggestion, they approached the directors of the Eastern Steam Navigation Company.

The Docks brought with them many associated industries, such as flour and sugar processing, and also ship building. On 31 January 1858 the largest ship of that time, the SS "Great Eastern" designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel, was launched from the yard of Messrs Scott, Russell & Co, of Millwall. The length was too big for the river so the ship had to be launched sideways. Due to the technical difficulties of the launch this was the last big ship to be built on the Island and the industry fell into a decline. However, parts of the launching slipway and plate works have been preserved in situ and may be seen close to Masthouse Terrace Pier.
question_src: SS大东部有多大？
pos_context_src: SS“ Great Eastern”是由Isambard Kingdom Brunel设计的铁帆船，由J. Scott Russell＆Co。在伦敦泰晤士河上的Millwall Iron Works建造。到目前为止，她是她1858年推出时建造的最大的船，并且有能力将4,000名乘客从英格兰带到澳大利亚而不会加油。她的长度仅在1899年超过17,274 Gross-ton RMS“ Oceanic”，她的总吨位为18,915，仅在1901年才超过21,035 Gross-Ton RMS“凯尔特人”，而她的4,000个乘客的容量在1913年在4,935-Passenter的4,935-Passentersssssssssssssssss超过了。该船的五个漏斗很少见。后来将它们降为四个。
neg_context_src:
亨利·巴斯（Henry Bath＆Son Ltd）在1889  -  1890年被亨利·巴斯与儿子有限公司（Henry Bath＆Son Ltd）在默西河上的新渡轮（New Ferry）取消了默西河的新渡轮的早期例子，她在默西河上取消了结构，花了18个月的时间才拆开了她。当时，埃弗顿足球俱乐部（Everton Football Club）正在寻找安菲尔德（Anfield）地面的旗杆，因此购买了她的顶级桅杆。今天它仍然站在地面上 - 现在由利物浦足球俱乐部（1892年）在Kop End拥有。 2011年，第4频道计划“ Time Team”找到了地球物理调查的证据，以表明该船只的龙骨和较低结构的残留铁零件仍然存在于前岸。
1859年，当“大东方”在波特兰进行审判时，爆炸炸开了。该漏斗被水公司抢救，然后由英国多塞特郡的韦茅斯和梅尔科姆·里吉斯（Melcombe Regis）购买，并用作过滤设备。后来，它被转移到布里斯托尔海事博物馆，靠近布鲁内尔（Brunel）的SS“英国”，然后搬到了SS“英国”博物馆。
“大东方”的龙骨于1854年5月1日被放置。船体是全铁的结构，在盘子上有肋骨的双层锻炼。在内部，将船体划分为两个长，高的纵向舱壁，并将船只将船划分为十九个隔间。 “ Great Eastern”是第一艘融合了双皮船体的船，该功能在几十年中不会在船上再次出现，但由于安全原因，现在是强制性的。
在“大东方”返回英国后，这艘船被英国政府租用，将部队运送到魁北克。 2,144名军官和男子，473名妇女和儿童以及200匹马与40名付费乘客一起出现在利物浦。该船于1861年6月25日航行，在离开利物浦后8天到达目的地的大部分时间里，全速前往目的地。 “大东方”呆了一个月，并于7月初返回英国，有357名付费乘客。
她很长，宽阔，有一大堆卸载且充满载荷的草稿，流离失所了32,000吨。相比之下，SS的“波斯”于1856年发射，长距离横梁。
航行花了9天13个小时。由于美国内战，“大东方”到达纽约几乎没有引起人们的注意，当公众以每头25美分的价格向公众开放时，几乎没有兴趣。 194名乘客在5月25日的返回旅程中航行，还携带了5,000吨小麦。
“大东方”于1861年9月10日星期二从利物浦航行，由詹姆斯·沃克上尉指挥。第二天，风增加到了大风力量，导致船长滚动。端口轮完全丢失了，当一只救生艇破裂时，右舷桨轮将其砸成碎片。同时，发现直径为直径的铸铁舵柱剪切了上方，并且舵自由摆动并撞到螺丝，这正在慢慢地将其拧紧。

该船的发射费用为170,000英镑，是布鲁内尔（Brunel）对整个船只的估计的三分之一，尚未安装。由于该公司接近破产，因此很难从东部公司的投资者那里获得更多资金。为了防止这种情况发生，成立了一家新公司，即“大型船公司”，资本为340,000英镑。他们以160,000英镑的价格购买了这艘船，这留下了足够的资金来安装她。东部公司的股东获得了其20英镑股票（2英镑10英镑）的市场价值，用于新公司的股票，而East Steam Navigation Company进入了清算。

布鲁内尔（Brunel）向约翰·斯科特·罗素（John Scott Russell）展示了他的想法，后者是一位经验丰富的海军建筑师和船建筑商，他在大型展览会上首次见面。斯科特·罗素（Scott Russell）检查了布鲁内尔（Brunel）的计划，并就船舶的可行性进行了自己的计算。他计算出它将具有20,000吨的流离失所，并且需要实现，但认为这是可能的。在斯科特·罗素（Scott Russell）的建议下，他们与东方蒸汽导航公司的董事联系。

这些码头带来了许多相关行业，例如面粉和糖加工，以及造船。 1858年1月31日，当时最大的船是由Isambard Kingdom Brunel设计的SS“大东方”，是从Millwall的Scott，Russell＆Co先生的院子发射的。对于河流来说，长度太大了，因此必须侧面推出该船。由于发射的技术困难，这是在岛上建造的最后一艘大型船，该行业逐渐下降。但是，一部分滑道和盘子工程的一部分被原位保存下来，可以看到靠近Masthouse Terrace Pier。
report_src: SS“大东部”号在1858年下水时是全球最大的船舶，其总吨位为18,915吨，直到1901年才被总吨位21,035吨的RMS“凯尔特人”超越[1]；在长度方面，她自1858年起保持世界纪录，直至1899年才被RMS“Oceanic”打破，虽文档未给出确切船长，但其“当时最长”地位可见规模之巨[1]。此外，她可一次性搭载约4,000名乘客从英格兰直航澳大利亚而无需补给，这一运载纪录直到1913年才被4,935名乘客的新船超过[1]。她最初装有五根罕见的烟囱，后改为四根，也体现出其庞大船体对排烟量的需求[1]。综合吨位、长度世界纪录以及超大载客量，“大东部”号在19世纪后半叶的确是当之无愧的“海上巨人”。

question_en: Who plays Booth?
pos_context_en: In 1959, the actor Robert McQueeney played Booth in the episode "The Man Who Loved Lincoln" on the ABC/Warner Brothers western television series, "Colt .45", starring Wayde Preston as the fictitious undercover agent Christopher Colt, who in the story line is assigned to protect Booth from a death threat.
neg_context_en: William Booth (9 May 1886 – 1963) was an English professional football centre half who played in the Football League for Sheffield United. He made 369 appearances for Brighton & Hove Albion and was a member of the team that won the 1909–10 Southern League First Division title and the 1910 FA Charity Shield. Booth was a non-playing reserve for England in February 1913.

Edwin Thomas Booth (November 13, 1833 – June 7, 1893) was an American actor who toured throughout the United States and the major capitals of Europe, performing Shakespearean plays. In 1869, he founded Booth's Theatre in New York. Some theatrical historians consider him the greatest American actor, and the greatest Prince Hamlet, of the 19th century. His achievements are often overshadowed by his relationship with his brother, actor John Wilkes Booth, who assassinated President Abraham Lincoln.

From 1985 to 1986, Booth appeared as pub landlord Ted Pilkington in the short-lived ITV soap "Albion Market". He starred in the 1998 short film "The Duke", playing an elderly man who tells his adoring grandson that he is John Wayne. In 2001, Booth appeared in several episodes of "Family Affairs" playing Barry Hurst, Sadie Hargreaves' brother-in-law. He played a tramp named Nobby Stuart in a special two-hander episode of "EastEnders".

Central to the identity of Booth's theatre was the stage background of Edwin Booth, who belonged to the Booth Family dynasty, which ruled the American stage in the 19th century. It was actually touring with his father, Junius Brutus Booth, that gave Edwin his first break, first appearing as Tressel in Richard II in Boston in 1849. After his father's death in 1852 Booth toured internationally, visiting Australia and Hawaii and briefly settling in California before returning to East Coast. Edwin is perhaps best known for his "hundred nights of Hamlet" in which he played Hamlet for 101 consecutive performances, a record held until 1922. Booth is also known for his relationship with his infamous brother, John Wilkes, who assassinated President Abraham Lincoln. After the tragedy, Edwin publicly disowned his brother.

Issac Ramoun Booth (born May 23, 1971) is a former American professional football player who played three seasons in the National Football League with the Cleveland Browns and Baltimore Ravens. Booth was drafted by the Browns in the fifth round of the 1994 NFL Draft and played cornerback for the Browns for the 1994 and 1995 seasons, earning one start in each of his first two seasons. After the 1995 season the original Cleveland Browns relocated to Baltimore, Maryland and became the Baltimore Ravens. Booth played his final season with the Ravens playing in 11 games and earning a career high three starts. Booth retired from football after the 1996 season. During his brief career, Booth played in 36 games, earning five starts, 55 tackles, two interceptions and one forced fumble.

John "Jack" Booth (birth unknown) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played at representative level for Yorkshire, and at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 557), as a , or , i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12.

Booth gained national renown in England with his performance in the title role of "Richard III" in 1817 at the Covent Garden Theatre. Critics compared his performances favorably with those of Edmund Kean, who was at the time the foremost tragedian in Britain. Partisans of the two actors, called Boothites and Keanites, would occasionally start rows at venues where the two were playing together. This did not stop the two from performing in the same plays; Kean and Booth acted in several Shakespearean productions at the Drury Lane Theatre from 1817 to 1821. Kean then saw Booth as a threat and orchestrated a way for the two of them to perform those roles yet again, planning to outperform his opponent. Kean’s long-standing presence contributed to Booth’s neverending comparisons to his rival.

Since 2006, Booth has been married to Sonia Bonneventia Pule, former Miss South Africa first princess and international model whom he met in 2002. They have two sons, Nathan Katlego, and Noah Neo. Booth saved a woman from being beaten on Cape Town's nightclub strip on Long Street early on a Saturday morning. Booth had been playing for Wits in an Absa Premiership game against Ajax Cape Town, which they lost 1–0, hosted at Cape Town Stadium on the previous Friday night. After using an ATM and walking back to his friends, he saw a man assaulting the woman and rushed to her assistance. The attacker shoved Booth, who toppled onto a store’s window ledge which had spikes to prevent people sitting on the ledge. Members of the Central City Improvement District took the attacker away. Booth returned to his hotel where the team doctor attended to his injuries.
question_src: 谁扮演展位？
pos_context_src: 1959年，演员罗伯特·麦奎尼（Robert McQueeney）在ABC/Warner兄弟西方电视连续剧《柯尔特.45》（Colt .45）的情节“爱林肯的人”中扮演展位，由韦德·普雷斯顿（Wayde Preston）主演，是虚构的秘密特工克里斯托弗·柯尔特（Christopher Colt），他在故事情节中被指派在故事情节中保护摊位，以保护摊位免受死亡威胁。
neg_context_src: 威廉·布斯（William Booth）（1886年5月9日至1963年）是一个英国职业足球中心，在谢菲尔德联队（Sheffield United）参加了足球联赛。他为布莱顿和霍夫·阿尔比恩（Brighton＆Hove Albion）出场了369次，是赢得1909  -  10年南方联赛第一分区冠军和1910 FA慈善机构盾牌的团队成员。布斯（Booth）是1913年2月对英格兰的非比赛储备。

埃德温·托马斯·布斯（Edwin Thomas Booth）（1833年11月13日至1893年6月7日）是美国演员，他在美国和欧洲主要首都巡回演出，表演了莎士比亚戏剧。 1869年，他在纽约创立了布斯剧院。一些戏剧历史学家认为他是19世纪最伟大的美国演员和最伟大的哈姆雷斯王子。他与兄弟，演员约翰·威尔克斯·布斯（John Wilkes Booth）的关系经常掩盖他的成就，后者暗杀亚伯拉罕·林肯（Abraham Lincoln）。

从1985年到1986年，布斯（Booth）在短暂的ITV肥皂“ Albion Market”中以酒吧房东Ted Pilkington的身份出现。他出演了1998年的短片《杜克》（The Duke），扮演一个老人，他告诉他的孙子他是约翰·韦恩（John Wayne）。 2001年，布斯出现在萨迪·哈格里夫斯（Sadie Hargreaves）的姐夫巴里·赫斯特（Barry Hurst）的几集“家庭事务”中。他在“ EastEnders”的特别两作为“ EastEnders”的特别伴奏中扮演了名叫Nobby Stuart的流浪汉。

布斯剧院身份的核心是埃德温·布斯（Edwin Booth）的舞台背景，埃德温·布斯（Edwin Booth）属于布斯家族王朝，该王朝统治了19世纪的美国舞台。它实际上是在与他的父亲朱尼斯·布鲁特斯·布斯（Junius Brutus Booth）一起巡回演出，这使埃德温（Edwin）的第一次休息时间首次出现在1849年的理查德二世（Richard II）。1849年，他的父亲在1852年去世后，布斯（Booth）于1852年去世后，拜访了澳大利亚和夏威夷，拜访了澳大利亚和夏威夷，并在加利福尼亚州短暂定居，然后返回东海岸。埃德温（Edwin）也许以他的“一百夜”（Hamlet）闻名，他连续101场演出哈姆雷特（Hamlet），这是直到1922年的纪录。布斯（Booth）也以与臭名昭著的兄弟约翰·威尔克斯（John Wilkes）的关系而闻名，后者暗杀了亚伯拉罕·林肯（Abraham Lincoln）。悲剧发生后，埃德温公开拒绝了他的兄弟。

Issac Ramoun Booth（1971年5月23日出生）是美国职业足球运动员，他在国家足球联赛中与克利夫兰·布朗队和巴尔的摩乌鸦队一起参加了三个赛季。布尔斯在1994年NFL选秀的第五轮比赛中被布朗队选拔，并在1994年和1995赛季为布朗队扮演角卫，在他的前两个赛季中的每个赛季中都有一个开局。 1995赛季结束后，最初的克利夫兰·布朗斯（Cleveland Browns）搬到了马里兰州的巴尔的摩，成为巴尔的摩乌鸦队。布斯在乌鸦队参加11场比赛并获得职业生涯最高三场比赛的最后一个赛季中打出了他的最后一个赛季。布斯在1996赛季后从足球比赛中退休。在他短暂的职业生涯中，布斯参加了36场比赛，赢得了5场比赛，55个铲球，2次拦截和一次强迫失误。
约翰·杰克·布斯（John“ Jack” Booth）（出生未知）是一位英国的前职业橄榄球联赛足球运动员，在1940年代和1950年代踢球。他曾在约克郡的代表级别演出，并在Wakefield Trinity（Heritage№557）的俱乐部级别演奏，或者是第8或10号，或11或12。

布斯（Booth）在1817年在科文特花园剧院（Covent Garden Theatre）的“理查德三世”（Richard III）的冠军头衔中表现出色。批评家将他的表演与埃德蒙·基恩（Edmund Kean）的表演进行了比较，后者当时是英国最重要的悲剧。两位演员的游击队员，称为展位和基恩特人，偶尔会在两者一起演奏的场地开始行。这并没有阻止两者在同一比赛中表现。基恩（Kean）和布斯（Booth）从1817年至1821年在德鲁里巷剧院（Drury Lane Theatre）的几部莎士比亚作品中表演。随后，基恩（Kean）将布斯视为威胁，并为他们两个人再次扮演这些角色策划了一种方式，计划超越对手。基恩（Kean）的长期存在为布斯（Booth）与他的竞争对手的不断比较做出了贡献。

自2006年以来，布斯（Booth）与他在2002年遇到的前南非第一位公主和国际模式与Sonia Bonneventia Pule结婚。他们有两个儿子Nathan Katlego和Noah Neo。布斯在周六清晨在长街上的开普敦夜总会中拯救了一名妇女。布斯（Booth）在上周五晚上在开普敦体育场（Cape Town Stadium）举办的Absa英超联赛比赛中一直在与Ajax Cape Town的Absa英超比赛中效力。使用ATM并回到他的朋友身边后，他看到一个男人殴打该女人，并急忙寻求帮助。攻击者推了摊位，后者推到了商店的窗户壁架上，该窗户上有钉子，以防止人们坐在壁架上。中央城市改善区的成员将袭击者带走了。布斯回到他的酒店，在那里团队医生受伤。
report_src: 演员罗伯特·麦奎尼（Robert McQueeney）在1959年播出的ABC/华纳兄弟西部电视剧《柯尔特 .45》剧集“爱林肯的人”中饰演了展位这一角色 [1]。

question_en: Where was Jonathan Swift born?
pos_context_en: Jonathan Swift was born on 30 November 1667 in Dublin, Ireland. He was the second child and only son of Jonathan Swift (1640–1667) and his wife Abigail Erick (or Herrick) of Frisby on the Wreake. His father was a native of Goodrich, Herefordshire, but he accompanied his brothers to Ireland to seek their fortunes in law after their Royalist father's estate was brought to ruin during the English Civil War. His maternal grandfather, James Ericke, was the vicar of Thornton, England. In 1634 the vicar was convicted of Puritan practices. Some time thereafter, Ericke and his family, including his young daughter Abilgail, fled to Ireland.
neg_context_en:
Born of English parents in Ireland, Jonathan Swift was working as Sir William Temple's secretary at the time he composed "A Tale of a Tub" (1694–1697). The publication of the work coincided with Swift's striking out on his own, having despaired of getting a good "living" from Temple or Temple's influence. There is speculation about what caused the rift between Swift and his employer, but, as A. C. Elias persuasively argues, it seems that the final straw came with Swift's work on Temple's "Letters." Swift had been engaged to translate Temple's French correspondence, but Temple, or someone close to Temple, edited the French text to make Temple seem both prescient and more fluent. Consequently, the letters and the translations Swift provided did not gibe, and, since Swift could not accuse Temple of falsifying his letters, and because the public would never believe that the retired state minister had lied, Swift came across as incompetent.
Even though Swift published the "Tale" as he left Temple's service, it was conceived earlier, and the book is a salvo in one of Temple's battles. Swift's general polemic concerns an argument (the "Quarrel of the Ancients and the Moderns") that had been over for nearly ten years by the time the book was published. The "Quarrel of the Ancients and Moderns" was a French academic debate of the early 1690s, occasioned by Fontenelle arguing that modern scholarship had allowed modern man to surpass the ancients in knowledge. Temple argued against this position in his "On Ancient and Modern Learning" (where he provided the first English formulation of the commonplace that modern critics see more only because they are dwarves standing on the shoulders of giants), and Temple's somewhat naive essay prompted a small flurry of responses. Among others, two men who took the side opposing Temple were Richard Bentley (classicist and editor) and William Wotton (critic).

The legend of Swift's silver mine is based on accounts given in the journal of an Englishman named Jonathan Swift. Swift claimed to have preceded Daniel Boone into Kentucky, coming to the region in 1760 on a series of mining expeditions. The journal recounts how a wounded bear led Swift to a vein of silver ore in a cave, and how that for the next nine years, he made annual treks back to the site of the mine, carrying out "silver bars and minted coins." An article in an 1886 edition of "Harper's Magazine" tells how Swift supposedly buried a good deal of the treasure at various locations:

Swift was studying for his master's degree when political troubles in Ireland surrounding the Glorious Revolution forced him to leave for England in 1688, where his mother helped him get a position as secretary and personal assistant of Sir William Temple at Moor Park, Farnham. Temple was an English diplomat who arranged the Triple Alliance of 1668. He had retired from public service to his country estate to tend his gardens and write his memoirs. Gaining his employer's confidence, Swift "was often trusted with matters of great importance". Within three years of their acquaintance, Temple had introduced his secretary to William III and sent him to London to urge the King to consent to a bill for triennial Parliaments.

Swift had residence in Trim, County Meath, after 1700. He wrote many of his works during this time period. In February 1702, Swift received his Doctor of Divinity degree from Trinity College, Dublin. That spring he travelled to England and then returned to Ireland in October, accompanied by Esther Johnson—now 20—and his friend Rebecca Dingley, another member of William Temple's household. There is a great mystery and controversy over Swift's relationship with Esther Johnson, nicknamed "Stella". Many, notably his close friend Thomas Sheridan, believed that they were secretly married in 1716; others, like Swift's housekeeper Mrs Brent and Rebecca Dingley (who lived with Stella all through her years in Ireland) dismissed the story as absurd. Swift certainly did not wish her to marry anyone else: in 1704, when their mutual friend William Tisdall informed Swift that he intended to propose to Stella, Swift wrote to him to dissuade him from the idea. Although the tone of the letter was courteous, Swift privately expressed his disgust for Tisdall as an "interloper", and they were estranged for many years.

At the age of one, child Jonathan was taken by his wet nurse to her hometown of Whitehaven, Cumberland, England. He said that there he learned to read the Bible. His nurse returned him to his mother, still in Ireland, when he was three.

Born in Dundalk, Swift was educated at a Christian Brothers School. His father ran a co-operative bakery but this closed and the family endured poverty. In 1914, Swift began an apprenticeship at a bakery in Dublin, and spent much of his spare time attending meetings where Jim Larkin was speaking. He briefly joined the Irish Volunteers, but took time out following an accident, and decided not to rejoin due to Larkin's opposition to the organisation.

Swift was born on Nantucket Island, the son of Foster Swift and his wife, Deborah. At the age of six, he saw George Washington on Boston Common, an experience that made an indelible impression on him.
In 1792, the Swifts moved to Taunton, Massachusetts, where Joseph became the student of Reverend Samuel Daggat, who prepared him to enter Harvard College. Swift had read accounts of the American Revolution in his father’s diary and heard stories from a family friend, Major General David Cobb. With Cobb’s advice and assistance, Swift was appointed by President John Adams on May 12, 1800 as a cadet of artillerists and engineers. He reported for duty a month later at Newport Harbor.

Swift took up his residence at Moor Park where he met Esther Johnson, then eight years old, the daughter of an impoverished widow who acted as companion to Temple's sister Lady Giffard. Swift was her tutor and mentor, giving her the nickname "Stella", and the two maintained a close but ambiguous relationship for the rest of Esther's life.

Swift was born on 7 June 1874 at Hardshaw Hall, Lancashire to Thomas Swift and his second wife Emily. The male members of the family were mostly lawyers - Thomas Swift was a solicitor, three of his sons also became solicitors, his brother was a registrar and his cousin, Sir John Rigby was a barrister and later judge. After John Rigby became a King's Counsel in 1880, Thomas Swift switched paths and became a barrister. He specialised in criminal work, and served as counsel in the trial of Florence Maybrick. His career change had a great impact on the family - they moved from Lancashire to Liverpool (where Thomas Swift's Chambers were) and Rigby Swift was undoubtedly influenced by his father's career when it came to choosing one of his own.
question_src: 乔纳森·斯威夫特（Jonathan Swift）在哪里出生？
pos_context_src: 乔纳森·斯威夫特（Jonathan Swift）于1667年11月30日出生于爱尔兰都柏林。他是乔纳森·斯威夫特（Jonathan Swift）（1640– 1667年）和他的妻子阿比盖尔·埃里克（Abigail Erick）（或赫里克（Herrick））的第二个孩子，也是弗里斯比（Frisby）的妻子阿比盖尔·埃里克（Abigail Erick）。他的父亲是赫里福德郡古德里奇（Goodrich）的本地人，但在英国内战期间，他的保皇党父亲的财产被毁灭后，他陪同他的兄弟们去爱尔兰寻求婚姻。他的外祖父詹姆斯·埃里克（James Ericke）是英格兰桑顿的牧师。 1634年，牧师因清教徒的行为而被定罪。此后的某个时候，埃里克（Ericke）和他的家人，包括他的小女儿阿比尔（Abilgail），逃到了爱尔兰。
neg_context_title_src: 约翰·斯威夫特（工会主义者）
约瑟夫·加德纳·斯威夫特
neg_context_src:
乔纳森·斯威夫特（Jonathan Swift）出生于爱尔兰的英国父母，当时他是威廉·坦普尔爵士（William Temple）的秘书，当时他撰写了《浴缸的故事》（169​​4– 1697年）。这项工作的出版恰逢斯威夫特（Swift）独自罢工，他绝望地从坦普尔（Temple）或坦普尔（Temple）的影响力获得了良好的“生活”。有人猜测是什么原因导致了斯威夫特和他的雇主之间的裂痕，但是，正如A. C. Elias有说服力地认为，最后一根稻草似乎是Swift在Temple上的“信件”上的工作。斯威夫特（Swift）曾订婚，以翻译坦普尔（Temple）的法国信件，但是坦普尔（Temple）或靠近坦普尔（Temple）的人编辑了法语文字，使寺庙看起来既有先见之明，更流利。因此，Swift提供的信件和翻译并没有吉布，而且由于Swift无法指责Temple伪造他的信件，并且由于公众永远不会相信退休的国务大臣撒谎了，因此Swift遇到了无能。
即使斯威夫特（Swift）离开坦普尔（Temple）的服务时发表了“故事”，但它是早些时候的，这本书是坦普尔（Temple）战斗之一的萨尔沃（Salvo）。斯威夫特（Swift）的一般辩论涉及一个论点（“古代与现代的争吵”），该论点已经结束了近十年来。 Fontenelle认为，现代奖学金允许现代人超越古代人的知识。坦普（Temple）在他的“古老和现代学习”中反对这一立场（在那里他提供了第一个英语表达，现代批评家看到的更多仅是因为他们是矮人站在巨人的肩膀上），而坦普尔（Temple）有些天真的文章促使一小片反应。除其他外，有两个反对寺庙的人是理查德·本特利（经典主义者和编辑）和威廉·沃顿（评论家）。

斯威夫特银矿的传说是基于一位名叫乔纳森·斯威夫特（Jonathan Swift）的英国人杂志中给出的帐户。斯威夫特声称曾先于丹尼尔·布恩（Daniel Boone）进入肯塔基州，并于1760年通过一系列采矿探险来到该地区。该期刊讲述了一只受伤的熊如何导致斯威夫特在一个洞穴中垂直于银矿，以及在接下来的九年中，他如何将年度徒步旅行回到矿山的遗址，进行“银棒和铸造的硬币”。 1886年版的《哈珀杂志》（Harper's Magazine）的一篇文章讲述了斯威夫特（Swift）在各个地方埋葬了很多宝藏：

斯威夫特（Swift）正在学习硕士学位，当时爱尔兰的政治麻烦围绕着光荣的革命迫使他于1688年离开英格兰，他的母亲帮助他担任法纳姆（Farnham）Moor Park的William Temple爵士的秘书和私人助理。坦普尔（Temple）是一位英国外交官，安排了1668年的三重联盟。他已从公共服务部退休到他的乡村庄园，抚养着他的花园并写回忆录。斯威夫特（Swift）获得了雇主的信心，“经常被非常重要的事情受到信任”。在熟人的三年内，坦普将其秘书介绍给威廉三世，并派他去伦敦，敦促国王同意三年期议会的法案。

斯威夫特（Swift）在1700年后居住在米斯（Meath）的特里姆（Trim）。他在这段时间内写了许多作品。 1702年2月，斯威夫特从都柏林的三一学院获得了他的神学博士学位。那个春天，他前往英格兰，然后于10月回到爱尔兰，在埃丝特·约翰逊（Esther Johnson）（现在20岁）和他的朋友丽贝卡·丁利（Rebecca Dingley）的陪同下，威廉·坦普尔（William Temple）的另一位成员。关于斯威夫特与以斯帖·约翰逊（Esther Johnson）的关系，绰号为“斯特拉”（Stella），这是一个巨大的谜和争议。许多，特别是他的密友托马斯·谢里丹（Thomas Sheridan），认为他们在1716年秘密结婚。其他人，例如斯威夫特的管家布伦特夫人和丽贝卡·丁利（Rebecca Dingley）（整个爱尔兰的斯特拉（Stella）与斯特拉（Stella）一起生活）将这个故事视为荒谬的。斯威夫特当然不希望她嫁给其他任何人：1704年，当他们的共同朋友威廉·蒂斯达尔（William Tisdall）告诉斯威夫特，他打算向斯特拉求婚时，斯威夫特写信给他，以使他避免这个想法。尽管这封信的语气是有礼貌的，但斯威夫特私下表达了他对蒂斯德尔的厌恶，作为“闯入者”，他们疏远了很多年。
一岁时，乔纳森（Jonathan）的孩子被他的湿护士带到了她的家乡英格兰坎伯兰（Cumberland）的怀特黑文（Whitehaven）。他说，他学会了阅读圣经。他的护士三岁时，他的护士将他送给了他的母亲，他的母亲仍在爱尔兰。
斯威夫特（Swift）出生于邓多克（Dundalk），在一所基督教兄弟学校接受教育。他的父亲经营着一家合作面包店，但这关闭了，一家人忍受了贫困。 1914年，斯威夫特（Swift）在都柏林的一家面包店开始了学徒，并花了很多时间参加吉姆·拉金（Jim Larkin）讲话的会议。他短暂地加入了爱尔兰志愿者，但在事故发生后抽出了时间，由于拉金（Larkin）反对该组织而决定不加入。

斯威夫特（Swift）出生于福斯特·斯威夫特（Foster Swift）的儿子纳尔塔基特岛（Nantucket Island）和他的妻子黛博拉（Deborah）。在六岁的时候，他在波士顿Common上看到了乔治·华盛顿，这种经历给他留下了不可磨灭的印象。
1792年，斯威夫特斯（Swifts）搬到了马萨诸塞州的汤顿（Taunton），约瑟夫（Joseph）成为塞缪尔·达加特（Samuel Daggat）牧师的学生，他准备进入哈佛大学。斯威夫特在父亲的日记中读了有关美国革命的记载，并听到了一位家人朋友大卫·科布少将的故事。在科布的建议和帮助下，斯威夫特于1800年5月12日由约翰·亚当斯总统任命为炮兵和工程师的学员。一个月后，他在纽波特港报道了值班。
斯威夫特（Swift）在摩尔公园（Moor Park）居住，在那里他遇到了当时八岁的埃丝特·约翰逊（Esther Johnson），这是一个贫穷的寡妇的女儿，寡妇是坦普尔姐姐吉法德（Lady Giffard）的伴侣。斯威夫特（Swift）是她的导师和导师，给她昵称“斯特拉”（Stella），两人在埃丝特（Esther）的余生中保持着紧密而模棱两可的关系。

斯威夫特于1874年6月7日出生于兰开夏郡的Hardshaw Hall，托马斯·斯威夫特（Thomas Swift）和他的第二任妻子艾米丽（Emily）。该家庭的男性成员主要是律师 - 托马斯·斯威夫特（Thomas Swift）是一名律师，他的三个儿子也成为律师，他的兄弟是一名书记官，他的堂兄约翰·里格比爵士（John Rigby）爵士是律师，后来是律师。约翰·里格比（John Rigby）在1880年成为国王的律师之后，托马斯·斯威夫特（Thomas Swift）换了道路并成为大律师。他专门从事犯罪工作，并在佛罗伦萨·梅布里克（Florence Maybrick）的审判中担任律师。他的职业变化对家庭产生了巨大影响 - 他们从兰开夏郡搬到了利物浦（托马斯·斯威夫特（Thomas Swift）的钱伯斯（Thomas Swift）的房间），里格比·斯威夫特（Rigby Swift）无疑受到了父亲选择自己的职业的影响。
report_src: 乔纳森·斯威夫特出生于爱尔兰首都都柏林 [1]。

question_en: How many countries are part of the Commonwealth?
pos_context_en: The Commonwealth Youth Programme, also known as CYP, is an international development agency working with young people between the ages of 15 and 29. Part of the Commonwealth Secretariat, CYP is active in the Commonwealth's 54 member countries. CYP has a head office in London with four centres in Africa, Lusaka, Zambia, Asia Chandigarh, India, Caribbean Georgetown, Guyana and Pacific Honiara, Solomon Islands. Currently there are Four Regional Directors and 16 programme officers plus support staff are working there.
neg_context_title_en: Foreign relations of the United Kingdom
neg_context_en: Commonwealth countries share many links outside government, with over a hundred Commonwealth-wide non-governmental organisations, notably for sport, culture, education, law and charity. The Association of Commonwealth Universities is an important vehicle for academic links, particularly through scholarships, principally the Commonwealth Scholarship, for students to study in universities in other Commonwealth countries. There are also many non-official associations that bring together individuals who work within the spheres of law and government, such as the Commonwealth Lawyers Association and the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association.

The Commonwealth Games are overseen by the Commonwealth Games Federation (CGF), which also controls the sporting programme and selects the host cities. The games movement consists of international sports federations (IFs), (CGAs), and organising committees for each specific Commonwealth Games. There are several rituals and symbols, such as the Commonwealth Games flag and Queen's Baton, as well as the opening and closing ceremonies. Over 5,000 athletes compete at the Commonwealth Games in more than 15 different sports and more than 250 events. The first, second, and third-place finishers in each event receive Commonwealth Games medals: gold, silver, and bronze, respectively. Apart from many Olympic sports, the games also include some sports which are played predominantly in Commonwealth countries but which are not part of the Olympic programme, such as lawn bowls, netball and squash.

By 1949, the British Commonwealth was a group of eight countries, each having George VI as king. India, however, desired to become a republic, but not depart the Commonwealth by doing so. This was accommodated by the creation of the title "Head of the Commonwealth" for the King and India became a republic in 1950. Subsequently, many other nations including Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Malaysia and Singapore ceased to recognise the monarch of the United Kingdom as their respective head of state, but as members of the Commonwealth of Nations recognised the British monarch as Head of the Commonwealth.

In 2009, to mark the 60th anniversary of the founding of the Commonwealth, the Royal Commonwealth Society commissioned a poll of public opinion in seven of the member states: Australia, Canada, India, Jamaica, Malaysia, South Africa and the United Kingdom. It found that most people in these countries were largely ignorant of the Commonwealth's activities, aside from the Commonwealth Games, and indifferent toward its future. Support for the Commonwealth was twice as high in developing countries as in developed countries; it was lowest in Britain.

Due to their shared constitutional histories, several countries in the Commonwealth have similar legal and political systems. The Commonwealth requires its members to be functioning democracies that respect human rights and the rule of law. Most Commonwealth countries have the bicameral Westminster system of parliamentary democracy. The Commonwealth Parliamentary Association facilitates co-operation between legislatures across the Commonwealth, and the Commonwealth Local Government Forum promotes good governance amongst local government officials. Most Commonwealth members use common law, modelled on English law. The Judicial Committee of the Privy Council is the supreme court of 14 Commonwealth members.

Wales is one of six countries to have competed in every Commonwealth Games since 1930, the others being Australia, Canada, England, New Zealand and Scotland. The Commonwealth Games is the only major sporting event where Wales takes part as a separate entity, apart from the Six Nations Rugby Championship Rugby World Cup and international association football competitions, as in other events, such as the Olympic Games, they compete under the banner of the United Kingdom.

In the 2016 Brexit referendum 52% of those who voted supported "Brexit", and the government started negotiating to leave the European Union in 2019.
The UK has varied relationships with the countries that make up the Commonwealth of Nations which originated from the British Empire. Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom is Head of the Commonwealth and is Queen of 16 of its 53 member states. Those that retain the Queen as head of state are called Commonwealth realms. Over time several countries have been suspended from the Commonwealth for various reasons. Zimbabwe was suspended because of the authoritarian rule of its President and so too was Pakistan, but it has since returned. Countries which become republics are still eligible for membership of the Commonwealth so long as they are deemed democratic. Commonwealth nations such as Malaysia enjoyed no export duties in trade with the UK before the UK concentrated its economic relationship with EU member states.

Commonwealth countries are major stakeholders in the process and success of the Doha Development Agenda. Together the Commonwealth’s 53 member countries account for 30 per cent of the world’s population and about 25 per cent of its international trade and investment. Commonwealth countries account for 40 per cent of WTO membership. CBC’s trade development objectives include encouraging
trade facilitation and further liberalisation of services; encouraging developing countries to play an active role in the World Trade Organization, and in new trade rounds, by maximising their negotiating strength through cooperative action.

The Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU) was established in 1913, and has over 500 member institutions in over 50 countries across the Commonwealth. It is the world’s oldest international network of universities and its mission is to promote and support excellence in higher education for the benefit of individuals and societies throughout the commonwealth and beyond. While it is the oldest university network, it represents the future – it has a combined population of 3 billion, mainly under the age of 30, in Commonwealth countries.
question_src: 英联邦有多少个国家？
pos_context_src: 英联邦青年计划（也称为CYP）是一家国际发展机构，与15至29岁的年轻人合作​​。在英联邦秘书处的一部分，CYP活跃于英联邦的54个成员国。 CYP在伦敦设有一个总部，在非洲，卢萨卡，赞比亚，亚洲昌迪加尔，印度，加勒比乔治敦，圭亚那和太平洋霍尼亚拉，所罗门群岛。目前，有四名区域董事和16名计划官员以及支持人员在那里工作。
neg_context_title_src: 威尔士在英联邦运动会
neg_context_src: 英联邦国家在政府外部有许多联系，其中一百多个联邦非政府组织，尤其是用于体育，文化，教育，法律和慈善机构。英联邦大学协会是学术联系的重要工具，尤其是通过奖学金，主要是英联邦奖学金，供学生在其他英联邦国家的大学学习。也有许多非官方协会将在法律和政府领域工作的个人组合在一起，例如英联邦律师协会和联邦议会协会。

英联邦运动会由英联邦运动会联合会（CGF）监督，该联合会也控制体育计划并选择东道国城市。奥运会运动包括国际体育联合会（IFS），（CGA）和每个特定联邦运动会的组织委员会。有几种仪式和符号，例如英联邦运动会的旗帜和女王的接力棒，以及开幕式和闭幕式。超过5,000名运动员参加了15多种不同的运动和250多个比赛的英联邦运动会。在每个活动中，第一，第二和第三名的成绩分别获得英联邦运动会：金，银和铜牌。除了许多奥林匹克运动之外，这些比赛还包括一些体育运动，这些运动主要在英联邦国家 /地区进行，但不是奥运会计划的一部分，例如草坪碗，无板篮球和南瓜。
到1949年，英联邦是八个国家组成的一组，每个国家都有乔治六世作为国王。然而，印度希望成为共和国，但不希望这样做。这是由国王和印度的“英联邦负责人”的头衔于1950年成为共和国所容纳的。随后，包括巴基斯坦，巴基斯坦，斯里兰卡，马来西亚和新加坡在内的许多其他国家不再承认英国君主是他们各自的国家元首，但作为国家联邦的成员却被认为是英国英国英国君主的成员。
在2009年，为了纪念英联邦成立60周年，皇家联邦学会委托在七个成员国对公众舆论进行民意调查：澳大利亚，加拿大，印度，牙买加，马来西亚，马来西亚，南非和英国。它发现，除了英联邦运动会，这些国家的大多数人在很大程度上对英联邦的活动一无所知，并且对其未来无动于衷。在发展中国家，对英联邦的支持是发达国家的两倍。它在英国最低。
由于其共同的宪法历史，英联邦的几个国家都有类似的法律和政治制度。英联邦要求其成员运作尊重人权和法治的民主国家。大多数英联邦国家都有三角洲国会民主制度。英联邦议会协会促进了整个联邦立法机关之间的合作，英联邦地方政府论坛促进了地方政府官员的良好治理。大多数英联邦成员使用以英国法为蓝本的普通法。枢密院司法委员会是14名英联邦成员的最高法院。
威尔士是自1930年以来参加每一次英联邦运动会的六个国家之一，其他国家是澳大利亚，加拿大，英格兰，新西兰和苏格兰。英联邦运动会是威尔士唯一一项主要的体育赛事，除了六个国家橄榄球橄榄球世界杯和国际足球比赛之外，像其他赛事一样，他们在英国的旗帜下竞争。

在2016年英国脱欧公投中，有52％的投票支持“英国退欧”的人，政府开始谈判于2019年离开欧盟。
英国与构成起源于大英帝国的国家的国家有各种关系。英国的伊丽莎白二世是英联邦的负责人，是其53个成员国中16个的女王。那些将女王保留为国家元首的人被称为英联邦领域。随着时间的流逝，由于各种原因，几个国家已被暂停。津巴布韦由于其总统的独裁统治而被停职，巴基斯坦也是如此，但此后又回来了。只要被视为民主，成为共和国的国家仍然有资格获得英联邦的成员。在英国将其与欧盟成员国的经济关系集中之前，马来西亚等英联邦国家在与英国的贸易中没有出口关税。

英联邦国家是多哈发展议程过程和成功的主要利益相关者。英联邦的53个成员国共同占世界人口的30％，约占其国际贸易和投资的25％。联邦国家占WTO会员资格的40％。 CBC的贸易发展目标包括鼓励
贸易便利和服务的进一步自由化；鼓励发展中国家通过合作行动最大化其谈判实力，在世界贸易组织中发挥积极作用。
英联邦大学协会（ACU）成立于1913年，在整个英联邦的50多个国家 /地区拥有500多家会员机构。它是世界上最古老的大学网络，其使命是促进和支持高等教育卓越，以使整个英联邦及其他地区的个人和社会受益。尽管它是最古老的大学网络，但它代表了未来 - 它的总人口为30亿，主要在30岁以下，在英联邦国家。
report_src: 英联邦目前由54个成员国组成，这是在英联邦青年计划（CYP）开展工作的范围中明确定义的 [1]。

question_en: When was Zylom Studios founded?
pos_context_en: Zylom was founded in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, in 2001. Due to the success of the company it expanded fast and just a couple of years later in 2006, it was acquired by the American RealNetworks Inc.. In 2011, RealNetworks came up with one name for all their game websites, GameHouse. Zylom became part of GameHouse too, but because of the popular and well-known name of the company, it stayed Zylom for their consumers. In 2012 Zylom’s in-house game studio was closed, but Zylom still continues to develop their own game titles like the "Delicious" series.
neg_context_en:
The nine founders of Zylom had a hard time making the website profitable in the first years. Releasing Deluxe games, advertisements, and a change of target audience was the answer. In the beginning, Zylom mainly focused on online games for young men, until extensive research revealed their games were mostly played by women. The company decided to change their target audience and focused more and more on download games that were suitable for female players. Nowadays Zylom is strongly related to www.gamehouse.com, www.realnetworks.com, and www.atrativa.com.br
Type: Subsidiary
Founded: 2001 (Eindhoven)
Headquarters: Eindhoven, the Netherlands
Industry: Casual Games/Casual Online/Video Games Developer/Publisher/Distributor
Employees: 50 – 70
Website: www.zylom.com

This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

The factory was founded on 2nd August 1916 as the Moscow Automotive Society or AMO (). The factory was completed in 1917, just before the Revolution, and was built south of Moscow near Moscow River in Tjufeleva grove. It was a modern building with the latest in American equipment and was designed to employ 6,000 workers. The plans were to produce Fiat F-15 1.5-ton trucks under license. Because of the October Revolution and the subsequent Russian Civil War it took until 1st November 1924 to produce the first vehicle which was shown at a parade in 7th of November, the AMO-F15. Nevertheless the factory sill managed to assemble trucks bought from Italy in 1917-1919. In April 30 1923 the factory was named after an Italian coummunist Pietro Ferrero, but in 1925 was renamed to First National Automobile Factory (Russian: 1-й Государственный автомобильный завод). 2 years later in 1927 Ivan Likhachov was appointed as a head of the factory, a person whose name the factory bears from 1956. In April 1929, it was agreed on to expand the plant to build Autocar 2.5-ton truck models.

Tortoiseshell wares were first mentioned by Thomas Whieldon in his "Account and Memorandum Book" of 1749. In his "Experiment Book", Josiah Wedgwood states that in 1759 tortoiseshell ware was the second most important ware at the Whieldon factory, but the market was declining:“[…] But as no improvement had been made in this branch for several years, the country was grown weary of it; and though the price had been lowered from time to time, in order to increase the sale, the expedient did not answer, and something new was wanted, to give a little spirit to the business."Historically, tortoiseshell wares have come to be associated almost exclusively with Thomas Whieldon, however, ceramics expert Pat Halfpenny warns that:“The ‘Whieldon’ label has inhibited scholarly research and limited our understanding of the pottery production dates in North Staffordshire.”In his 1991 study of William Greatbatch, David Barker also concluded:"Many of the wares manufactured by Whieldon are of types now known to have been made by Greatbatch and have been found on the Greatbatch site. Whieldon ware, or Whieldon-type ware are terms which are widely accepted in describing a variety of ceramics, particularly tortoiseshell wares, but which lead to problems in any objective research into the pottery of the period."In the absence of any supporting information, caution is therefore needed in ascribing any particular tortoiseshell wares to Thomas Whieldon.
