温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。
Made的永久展览利用创新的数字浸入来吸引游客解决以下问题：民主是什么，我们为什么关心？为什么昨天和今天都为之奋斗？没有权力的感觉如何？探索了当代技术与历史对象相结合，人民作为民主中心的作用。如何做出决定？他们是为谁做的？您在当今的当代民主中有什么影响？

刑事哲学的根本变化是由于对这些不断提升的监狱候补名单的国家关注而引起的。荷兰司法部报告“运动法则”，实际上倡导，“危险不过是宪法政府及其民主和社会价值的信誉……我们的最高政策优先级是必须通过预防和压制的手段来打击犯罪的必要性……[。]响应于1990年的Populace的担忧，这是对1980年的构建的实质性的，而这是一项实质性的增长。监禁能力的提高是迅速涌现的监狱候补名单引起的批评的直接结果。罪犯的判决更加严重，这也增加了对额外监禁的需求。 1970年，大约有13,000名无人青睐的监狱刑罚判处2,100年的拘留年。然而，在2000年，虽然无用的监狱刑罚数量增加了一倍，但拘留年的数量增加了近8倍，达到16,000。在1980年代的监狱建设繁荣之后，监狱容量从3,300名居民增加到约12,800名。在1990年代，产能进一步增加了3500人，使总监狱容量达到了约16,300人。这种趋势可能会持续到未来。至少有一位评论员指出，制定“三罢工法”有可能提高荷兰监禁率到美国级别的监禁率。 2002年，监禁率为每100,000名公民93名囚犯。自颁布新的Penological指南以来，检察官先前对案件的广泛酌处权有所下降。指南以前提出了有利于解雇的推定，而现在的准则施加了不驳回案件的推定。

在润滑剂的探索期间，达成了初步协议。政治历史上第一次，荷兰可能受到第三方“外部”政府支持的少数派内阁的管辖。将有两项合同：VVD和CDA之间的实际政府协议，以及内阁和PVV之间的所谓“ Gedoogakkoord”（宽容协议）。该协议将处理诸如移民，整合，庇护以及法律和秩序之类的事项。这意味着关于PVV在其竞选活动中提出的问题（例如家庭统一）在有资格获得社会保障之前付费的新移民，可能会达成协议。可以引入有关公务员服装的更具争议性的法规 - 这意味着在公务员制度中可能会禁止头巾和其他宗教符号。知情人士称其为“特殊多数内阁”，而不是少数派政府。
“我们从内而外设计的建筑物，而不是外部设计。” “我们想要有史以来最有效的办公楼，没有浪费的空间或浪费的能量。这是未来的建筑，而不是当前的建筑物。这座建筑物已经有很多爱，而且很自豪。”
report_src: 荷兰共和国的城市政府虽偶有“罕见的民主迹象”，但整体是由少数精英掌控的寡头政体；全国层面不存在普选，民众面临的并非“民主与贵族”而是“贵族与君主制”的选择，执政官（Stadtholder）通常出自奥伦治-拿骚家族[1]。与其他欧洲国家相比，荷兰各阶层在法律权利和教育机会上的差距较小，阶级分化主要体现在资金多寡而非政治特权，这种“文化和谐”化解了深刻的阶级对立并允许更广泛的社会参与[1]。因此，荷兰人的“民主”可视为地方层面存在有限参与、国家层面由寡头与世袭领袖共治的混合模式：平民在公共事务中有一定空间，但缺乏直接选举国家代表和决定国家方向的权利[1]。

question_en: How many types of calendars are there?
pos_context_en: Calendars fall into four types, lunisolar, solar, lunar, seasonal, besides calendars with "years" of fixed length, with no intercalation. Most pre-modern calendars are lunisolar. The seasonal calendars rely on changes in the environment rather than lunar or solar observations. The Islamic and some Buddhist calendars are lunar, while most modern calendars are solar, based on either the Julian or the Gregorian calendars.
neg_context_title_en: History of science and technology in Africa
neg_context_en: There are many types of calendar, serving a wide variety of uses.

Ancient documents and inscriptions, such as from Rome and China, include early forms of calendars. Printing gave rise to many related types of publication which track dates, of which calendars are just one. The modern calendar evolved alongside others such as almanacs, which collected religious, cultural, meteorological, astronomical and astrological information in a table format; practica, which gave astrological predictions for the year ahead; and diaries for personal and professional use. The introduction of broadside printing allowed a calendar to be printed on a single large sheet of paper, differentiating the basic calendar from more detailed diaries and practica. In the absence of accurate clocks, calendars doubled as timekeeping aids - by noting the times of sunrise and moonrise, calendars helped farmers tell the time while in the fields.

The basic element to the calendar is Sunday, which is a festival of Jesus’ resurrection. However, Christian Churches have historically observed other festivals which commemorate events in the life of Jesus or of significant individuals in the history of the Church. The purpose of the liturgical calendar is to guide commemorations as a part of the daily worship of the Lutheran Church. There is some variation associated with the observance of the calendar, as each Lutheran Church creates its own calendar and each congregation must choose independently how many individuals will be commemorated within a given year and how many festivals and lesser festivals they will publicly celebrate, especially if they do not coincide with a Sunday.

Three types of calendars can be found in Africa: lunar, solar, and stellar. Most African calendars are a combination of the three. African calendars include the Akan calendar, Egyptian calendar, Berber calendar, Ethiopian calendar, Igbo calendar, Yoruba calendar, Shona calendar, Swahili calendar, Xhosa calendar, Borana calendar, and Luba calendar.

A new version of Calendar with a text-heavy was added to Windows 8 as one of many apps written to run full-screen or snapped as part of Microsoft's Metro design language philosophy. It is one of three apps on Windows that originate from Microsoft Outlook, the other two being Mail and People apps. Structurally, the three apps are one and are installed and uninstalled as such. But each has its own user interface. Calendar in Windows 8 originally supported Outlook.com, Exchange, Google Calendar, and Facebook calendars. Because of API changes, Facebook and Google calendars can no longer be directly synced on Windows 8. Like many Microsoft apps introduced for Windows 8, many of the features are hidden in the charms or a menu at the bottom of the screen that is triggered by right clicking. Different calendars can be labeled with different colors. When a user with a Microsoft account adds a calendar account on one computer with Windows 8 Calendar, the account will be automatically added to all other Windows 8 computers the user is logged into. .ics files are not supported in this version.

Google Calendar allows users to create and edit events. Events have a set start time and stop time, with an option for an "All-day event". Users can enable a "Recurring" functionality with optional parameters for frequency. Users can add a color to an event for recognition or to distinguish the event from others. Users can optionally set notifications, with options for type (email, mobile push notification) and time. Locations can be added for easy understanding of an event's place. Events are viewable in different types of setups, including day, week, month, or schedule. Users can invite other people to events; for other Google Calendar users, the event becomes visible in their calendar, and for non-Google Calendar users, an email will have options for "Yes", "No", or "Maybe". Privacy settings allow the user to define the levels of public visibility of the entire calendar or individual events. Although the calendar defaults to showing users event times in their local time, users can specify a different time zone for an event. Users can enable or disable the visibility of special calendars, including a Birthdays calendar, that automatically retrieves dates of births from a user's Google contacts and displays the dates on a yearly basis, and a Holidays calendar, a country-specific calendar featuring dates of special occasions.

The calendar recognizes two types of months: synodic month and sidereal month. The Synodic months are used to compose the years while the 27 lunar sidereal days (Sanskrit: "nakshatra"), alongside the 12 signs of the zodiac, are used for astrological calculations. (The Burmese calendar also recognizes a solar month called "Thuriya Matha", which is defined as 1/12th of a year. But the solar month varies by the type of year such as tropical year, sidereal year, etc.)

Hinduism and Buddhism were the prominent religions of southeast Asia in the 1st millennium CE, prior to the Islamic conquest that started in the 14th century. The Hindus prevailed in Bali, Indonesia and they have two types of Hindu calendar. One is a 210-day based Pawukon calendar which likely is a pre-Hindu system, and another is similar to lunisolar calendar system found in South India and it is called the Balinese saka calendar which uses Hindu methodology. The names of month and festivals of Balinese Hindus for the most part are different, though the significance and legends have some overlap.

Aztec religious life was organized around the calendars. As most Mesoamerican people, the Aztecs used two calendars simultaneously: a ritual calendar of 260 days called the "tonalpohualli" and a solar calendar of 365 days called the "xiuhpohualli". Each day had a name and number in both calendars, and the combination of two dates were unique within a period of 52 years. The tonalpohualli was mostly used for divinatory purposes and it consisted of 20 day signs and number coefficients of 1–13 that cycled in a fixed order. The "xiuhpohualli" was made up of 18 “months” of 20 days, and with a remainder of 5 “void” days at the end of a cycle before the new "xiuhpohualli" cycle began. Each 20-day month was named after the specific ritual festival that began the month, many of which contained a relation to the agricultural cycle. Whether, and how, the Aztec calendar corrected for leap year is a matter of discussion among specialists. The monthly rituals involved the entire population as rituals were performed in each household, in the "calpolli" temples and in the main sacred precinct. Many festivals involved different forms of dancing, as well as the reenactment of mythical narratives by deity impersonators and the offering of sacrifice, in the form of food, animals and human victims.
question_src: 有多少种日历？
pos_context_src: 日历分为四种类型，即Lunisolar，太阳能，月球，季节性，除了“固定长度”的日历，没有插入。大多数现代的日历是Lunisolar。季节性日历依赖于环境的变化，而不是月球或太阳观测。伊斯兰和一些佛教日历是月球，而大多数现代日历都是太阳日历，基于朱利安或格里高利日历。
neg_context_src: 日历有多种类型，可提供多种用途。

古老的文件和铭文，例如罗马和中国，包括日历的早期形式。印刷产生了许多相关类型的出版物，这些出版物跟踪日期仅是一个日历。现代日历与其他人一起演变，例如年鉴，这些年历以桌面形式收集了宗教，文化，气象，天文学和占星学信息。实践，这给了未来一年的占星学预测；以及个人和专业用途的日记。宽边打印的引入允许将日历打印在一张大纸上，从而将基本日历与更详细的日记和实践区分开来。在没有准确的时钟的情况下，日历是定时管理辅助工具的一倍 - 通过指出日出和月球的时代，日历帮助农民在田野中告诉时间。
日历的基本要素是星期日，这是耶稣复活的节日。但是，基督教教会历史上观察到其他节日，这些节日纪念耶稣生活中或教会历史上重要的个人的事件。礼仪日历的目的是指导纪念活动作为路德教会日常崇拜的一部分。日历的观察有一些差异，因为每个路德教会都创建了自己的日历，每个会众必须在给定的一年内独立选择将纪念多少个人，以及他们将公开庆祝的节日和较少的节日，尤其是如果他们不与周日重合。
在非洲可以找到三种类型的日历：月球，太阳能和出色的日历。大多数非洲日历是三个的组合。非洲日历包括Akan日历，埃及日历，柏柏尔日历，埃塞俄比亚日历，伊博日历，Yoruba日历，Shona Calendar，Swahili Calendar，Xhosa Calendar，Borana Calendar，Borana Calendar和Luba Calendar。

作为Microsoft Metro Design Leganaghosophy的一部分，将其添加到Windows 8中的新版本的日历中，它被添加到Windows 8中。它是Windows上的三个应用程序之一，源自Microsoft Outlook，另外两个是邮件和人员应用程序。从结构上讲，这三个应用程序是一个应用程序，并且已安装和卸载。但是每个都有自己的用户界面。 Windows 8中的日历最初支持Outlook.com，Exchange，Google日历和Facebook日历。由于API的更改，无法直接在Windows 8上直接同步Facebook和Google日历。就像Windows 8引入的许多Microsoft应用程序一样，许多功能隐藏在魅力或屏幕底部的菜单中，右键单击触发。不同的日历可以用不同的颜色标记。当带有Microsoft帐户的用户在带有Windows 8日历的一台计算机上添加了一个日历帐户时，该帐户将自动添加到所有其他Windows 8计算机中，该计算机将登录用户。此版本中不支持ICS文件。

Google日历允许用户创建和编辑事件。活动有设定的开始时间和停止时间，并有“全天活动”的选项。用户可以使用可选的频率参数启用“重复”功能。用户可以在事件中添加颜色以识别或将事件与其他事件区分开。用户可以选择设置通知，具有类型的选项（电子邮件，移动推送通知）和时间。可以添加位置，以方便理解事件的位置。活动可以在不同类型的设置中查看，包括日，周，月或时间表。用户可以邀请其他人参加活动；对于其他Google日历用户，该事件在其日历中变得可见，对于非Google日历用户，电子邮件将具有“是”，“否”或“也许”的选项。隐私设置允许用户定义整个日历或单个事件的公众可见性级别。尽管日历默认值在当地时间显示用户事件时间，但用户可以为事件指定不同的时区。用户可以启用或禁用特殊日历的可见性，包括生日日历，这些日历会自动从用户的Google联系人中检索出生日期，并每年显示日期，以及一个假期日历，这是一个特定于特殊场所的国家特定日历。
日历识别两种类型的月份：会议月和恒星月。会议月份用于构成年份，而27个月球恒星日（梵语：“ nakshatra”），以及十二生肖的12个迹象，用于占星术计算。 （缅甸日历还认可了一个名为“ Thuriya Matha”的太阳月，该月份定义为一年的1/12。
印度教和佛教是始于14世纪的伊斯兰征服之前的第1千年的东南亚著名宗教。印度教徒在印度尼西亚巴厘岛盛行，他们有两种印度日历。一个是一个基于210天的Pawukon日历，可能是印度教前系统，另一个类似于在印度南部发现的Lunisolar日历系统，它被称为使用印度教方法的Balinese Saka Calendar。尽管意义和传奇人物有些重叠，但巴厘岛印度教徒的月份和节日的名称和节日大部分都不同。

阿兹台克人的宗教生活是在日历周围组织的。正如大多数中美洲人一样，阿兹台克人同时使用了两个日历：一个称为“ Tonalpohualli”的仪式日历为260天，太阳日历为365天，称为“ xiuhpohualli”。每天在两个日历中都有一个名称和数字，并且两个日期的组合在52年之内是唯一的。 Tonalpohualli主要用于占卜目的，由20天的符号和数量系数组成，为1-13的数字系数，这些系数为固定顺序。 “ xiuhpohualli”由20天的18个月组成，剩下的5个“无效”天在一个周期结束之前，才开始新的“ xiuhpohualli”周期。每个20天的月份以本月开始的特定仪式节命名，其中许多人与农业周期有关系。是否以及如何以及如何纠正leap年的阿兹台克日历是专家之间的讨论问题。每月仪式涉及整个人口，因为在每个家庭，“卡尔波利”寺庙和主要神圣区中都进行了仪式。许多节日涉及不同形式的舞蹈，以及以食物，动物和人类受害者的形式重演神的神话叙事和牺牲的神话叙事。
report_src: 根据文档所述，日历可分为四种类型：阴阳历（Lunisolar）、太阳历、月亮历以及季节性日历，因此共有4种日历类型[1]。

question_en: What was Reginald Aubrey Fessenden's first patented invention?
pos_context_en: She was named in honor of Reginald Aubrey Fessenden, born in Brome County, Quebec, Canada, 6 October 1866. He served as head chemist with Thomas Edison's East Orange, New Jersey, laboratories. In 1890 he began concentrating on electrical engineering, and through the next years made many important inventions and improvements in existing devices. His great contributions in the field of radio (particularly the invention of radio-telephony were of marked benefit not only to the Navy but to all seamen. He died 22 July 1932, at his home on Bermuda.
neg_context_en: The list of Reginald Fessenden patents contains the innovation of his pioneering experiments. Reginald Aubrey Fessenden received hundreds of patents for devices in fields such as high-powered transmitting, sonar, and television.

Reginald Aubrey Fessenden (October 6, 1866 – July 22, 1932) was a Canadian-born inventor, who did a majority of his work in the United States and also claimed U.S. citizenship through his American-born father. During his life he received hundreds of patents in various fields, most notably ones related to radio and sonar.

Having few resources, he had to rely on friends to push his project. Despite great difficulty, three patents were awarded: "The Wave Transmitter" (October 11, 1904), which is the precursor of today's radio transceiver; "The Wireless Telephone" and the "Wireless Telegraph", both dated November 22, 1904.
The next advancement was the vacuum tube detector, invented by Westinghouse engineers. On Christmas Eve 1906, Reginald Fessenden used a synchronous rotary-spark transmitter for the first radio program broadcast, from Ocean Bluff-Brant Rock, Massachusetts. Ships at sea heard a broadcast that included Fessenden playing "O Holy Night" on the violin and reading a passage from the Bible. This was, for all intents and purposes, the first transmission of what is now known as amplitude modulation or AM radio.

At the outbreak of World War I, Fessenden volunteered his services to the Canadian government and was sent to London where he developed a device to detect enemy artillery and another to locate enemy submarines. Other efforts included a version of microfilm, that helped him to keep a compact record of his inventions, projects and patents. He also patented the basic ideas leading to reflection seismology, a technique important for its use in exploring for petroleum, and received patents for diverse subjects that included tracer bullets, paging, television apparatus, and a turbo electric drive for ships.

An inveterate tinkerer, Fessenden eventually became the holder of more than 500 patents. He could often be found in a river or lake, floating on his back, a cigar sticking out of his mouth and a hat pulled down over his eyes. At home he liked to lie on the carpet, a cat on his chest. In this state of relaxation, Fessenden could imagine, invent and think his way to new ideas. Fessenden also had a reputation for being temperamental, although in his defense his wife later stated that "Fessenden was never a difficult man to W O R K with but he was an intensely difficult man to play politics with." However, one of his former assistants, Charles J. Pannill, recalled that "He was a great character, of splendid physique, but what a temper!", while a second, Roy Weagant, ruefully noted that "He could be very nice at times, but only at times."

On December 23, 1900, Reginald Aubrey Fessenden sent and received the first intelligible speech by electromagnetic waves on a pair of masts high and apart on Cobb Island.
Fessenden was using a spark transmitter with the Kintner-Brashear interrupter.

In 1901, Reginald Fessenden demonstrated a direct-conversion heterodyne receiver or beat receiver as a method of making continuous wave radiotelegraphy signals audible. Fessenden's receiver did not see much application because of its local oscillator's stability problem. A stable yet inexpensive local oscillator was not available until Lee de Forest invented the triode vacuum tube oscillator. In a 1905 patent, Fessenden stated that the frequency stability of his local oscillator was one part per thousand.

In 1925, "Radio News", saluting Fessenden as "one of the greatest American radio inventors", began a monthly autobiographical series titled "The Inventions of Reginald A. Fessenden", with the intention of publishing the completed installments as a book. However, instead of reviewing his radio work, Fessenden immediately went on a series of tangents, including discussions of which races he believed were the most capable of producing inventions, and the proper approach that government institutions should be taking in order to support inventors. (At the close of the seventh installment, "Radio News" included a disclaimer that it was "not responsible for any opinions expressed in Dr. Fessenden's article".) After eleven installments Fessenden had only covered his life up to 1893, having discussed virtually nothing about radio, and the series was quietly terminated at this point.
In response to Edison's patent, Reginald Fessenden invented the bi-pin connector for the 1893 World's Fair. Other lamp bases include the bayonet mount and wedge base.
question_src: Reginald Aubrey Fessenden的第一个专利发明是什么？
pos_context_src: 她的名字是为了纪念雷金纳德·奥布里·费森登（Reginald Aubrey Fessenden），1866年10月6日出生于加拿大魁北克郡布罗姆县。 1890年，他开始专注于电气工程，在接下来的几年中，他在现有设备方面做出了许多重要的发明和改进。他在广播领域的巨大贡献（尤其是广播电台的发明，不仅对海军而且对所有海员都有很大的好处。他于1932年7月22日在他在百慕大的家中去世。
neg_context_src: Reginald Fessenden专利清单包含他开创性实验的创新。雷金纳德·奥布里·费森登（Reginald Aubrey Fessenden）在高功率传输，声纳和电视等领域获得了数百项专利。
雷金纳德·奥布里·费森登（Reginald Aubrey Fessenden）（1866年10月6日至1932年7月22日）是加拿大出生的发明家，他在美国做了大部分工作，还通过他的美国出生的父亲声称拥有美国公民身份。在他的一生中，他在各个领域获得了数百项专利，最著名的是与广播和声纳有关的专利。

拥有很少的资源，他不得不依靠朋友来推动自己的项目。尽管很困难，但还是获得了三项专利：“ Wave Transmitter”（1904年10月11日），这是当今无线电收款机的前身； “无线电话”和“无线电电报”，日期为1904年11月22日。
下一个进步是由西屋工程师发明的真空管探测器。 1906年圣诞节前夕，雷金纳德·费森登（Reginald Fessenden）使用同步的旋转露天发射器进行了第一个广播节目，该节目是从马萨诸塞州的海洋悬崖布兰特岩石（Ocean Bluff-Brant Rock）广播。海上的船只听到了一个广播，其中包括菲森登在小提琴上演奏“哦夜”，并从圣经中读了一段话。就所有目的和目的而言，这是现在称为振幅调制或AM无线电的第一次传输。
第一次世界大战爆发时，费森登自愿向加拿大政府提供了服务，并被派往伦敦，在那里他开发了一种侦探敌方炮兵的装置，而另一个设备可以找到敌方潜艇。其他努力包括缩微胶卷的版本，这有助于他保留其发明，项目和专利的紧凑记录。他还为导致反思地震学的基本思想申请了专利，这是该技术对于探索石油的使用很重要，并获得了包括示踪子弹，分页，电视设备以及用于船舶的涡轮电动驱动器在内的各种主题的专利。

费森登（Fessenden）是一名武装修补匠，最终成为500多项专利的持有人。他经常在河流或湖泊中发现他，漂浮在他的背上，一支雪茄从他的嘴里伸出，帽子戴在他的眼睛上。在家里，他喜欢躺在地毯上，一只猫在胸前。在这种放松的状态下，费森登可以想象，发明和思考自己进入新想法的方式。费森登（Fessenden）也因气质而闻名，尽管在他的辩护中，他的妻子后来说：“菲森登（Fessenden）从来不是一个很难与之相处的男人，但他是一个非常困难的人，很难与他一起进行政治。”然而，他的一位前助手查尔斯·帕尼尔（Charles J. Pannill）回忆说：“他是一个伟大的人物，具有出色的体格，但是脾气暴躁！”，而第二秒钟，罗伊·韦吉特（Roy Weeagant）却毫不振奋地指出：“有时他有时会非常好，但有时只有。”

1900年12月23日，雷金纳德·奥布里·费森登（Reginald Aubrey Fessenden）在一对高高的桅杆上和科布岛（Cobb Island）的一对桅杆上发表了第一个可理解的演讲。
Fessenden使用Kintner-Brashear Interupter使用火花发射器。
1901年，雷金纳德·费森登（Reginald Fessenden）展示了直接转化的杂项接收器或击败接收器，作为使连续波辐射图信号的一种方法。 Fessenden的接收器由于其本地振荡器的稳定性问题而没有看到太多应用。直到Lee de Forest发明了Triode真空管振荡器，才能使用稳定但廉价的本地振荡器。在1905年的一项专利中，费森登说，他的本地振荡器的频率稳定性为千分之一。

1925年，“广播新闻”向费森登（Fessenden）称为“美国最伟大的广播发明家之一”，开始了一个月度的自传系列，标题为“雷金纳德·A·费森登（Reginald A.但是，Fessenden没有审查他的广播工作，而是立即进行了一系列切线，包括讨论他认为哪些种族最能有能力生产发明的种族，以及政府机构应采取的适当方法来支持发明家。 （在第七部分结束时，“广播新闻”包括一个免责声明，即“对Fessenden博士的文章中表达的任何意见不负责”。
为了回应爱迪生的专利，雷金纳德·费森登（Reginald Fessenden）为1893年世界博览会发明了双针连接器。其他灯泡包括刺刀安装座和楔形底座。
report_src: 根据现有文档，资料仅指出雷金纳德·奥布里·费森登在1890年起专注电气工程，并在随后的几年对现有设备做出了许多重要发明和改进，尤其是对广播电台的发明贡献巨大，但并未具体说明他获得的第一个专利发明的名称或内容，因此无法从该文档确定其首项专利。[1]

question_en: How many students are enrolled at UT's Cockrell School of Engineering?
pos_context_en: The Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin has more than 7,800 students enrolled in nine undergraduate degrees and thirteen graduate programs. The college is ranked fourth in the world according to the Academic Ranking of World Universities and eighth nationally by "U.S. News & World Report", while all graduate programs are ranked in the top twenty nationally. Annual research expenditures are over $150 million and the school has the fourth-largest number of faculty in the National Academy of Engineering.
neg_context_title_en: University of Texas at Austin School of Architecture
neg_context_en: The Cockrell School of Engineering is home to over 80 student organizations under the supervision of the Engineering Student Life Office. These organizations offer a wide variety of student groups that provide academic, professional development, service, and social opportunities. The majority are student chapters of national and international professional engineering organizations. Among the organizations are:

Joe H. Gill and his engineering friends thoughtfully considered how to make a holiday of April Fool's Day. After an unsuccessful attempt involving tying cans around dogs' tails and releasing them to disrupt class, the group of students saw a wooden statue about five feet high while getting refreshments, which they requested to borrow. The next day, Gill presented the statue as their patron saint and traced his ancestry back to ancient times between classes. The presentation successfully broke up classes, and led to his christening as Alexander Frederick Claire, patron saint of UT engineers, exactly one year later. Alec was at the center of a friendly rivalry between law and engineering students for many years, and was subject to numerous escapades such as kidnappings and amputations. Today, what is left of the original wooden statue is safely preserved in the engineering library.

Every year, engineering groups on campus build new Alecs which are then voted on by the students. The winner is announced on April 1 during Alec's birthday party.The Cockrell School of Engineering has formal organized research units that coordinate and promote faculty and student research. These units provide and maintain specialized research facilities for faculty within a designated field.

Ahmed H. Tewfik is an Egyptian-American electrical engineer, professor and college administrator who currently serves as the chair of the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin since October 1, 2010. He holds the Cockrell Family Chair in Engineering #1 at UT Austin. For his research and contributions to the field of Signal Processing he was awarded the 2017 IEEE Signal Processing Society Technical Achievement Award as well as the IEEE Third Millennium Award in 2000. He is the 2018–2019 IEEE Signal Processing Society President-Elect.

In 1910, The University of Texas at Austin College of Engineering (now known as the Cockrell School of Engineering) began offering a professional degree in architecture. Two years later, the program had over 30 registered students. The school was expanded over the next two decades under the leadership of Frederick Giesecke and Goldwin Goldsmith. In 1925, the school became the first in Texas to be accepted for membership in the Association of Collegiate Schools of Architecture. The program was accredited in 1935 by the National Architectural Accreditation Board. The school moved into its permanent home in the Architecture Building (Goldsmith Hall, named after Goldwin Goldsmith) in 1933 and became the School of Architecture in 1948. The school's first graduate was Bertram Ernst Giesecke, who was officially licensed as an architect in 1927.UTSOA is home to:

Seven schools provide undergraduate programs and an additional seven provide graduate and professional programs. Students pursuing graduate degrees in departments of these schools are enrolled in the Graduate School. The School of Continuing Education and Summer Sessions offers programs for college and high school students, professionals, and other adults. Of the 15,182 undergraduate students, 4,602 (30.3%) are affiliated with the largest college by enrollment, Arts and Sciences, followed by 3,203 (21.1%) in Engineering and 3,101 (20.4%) in Agriculture and Life Sciences. By student enrollment, the smallest of the seven undergraduate colleges is Architecture, Art, and Planning, with 503 (3.3%) students.

Prior to his role as executive vice president and provost of UT Austin from 2013 to 2015, he was appointed as the eighth dean of the Cockrell School of Engineering at UT Austin in 2008 and served in that capacity for five years. In 2015, he was selected as the 29th president of UT Austin.

Dr. Santoso joined the faculty at the Cockrell School of Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin in 2003. He teaches courses in the broad area of electric power systems, particularly in power quality, modeling and simulation of electrical transients and wind power systems. Since becoming professor, he has graduated seven doctoral and twenty-four master’s students.

The Cooper Union School of Engineering's enrollment includes about 550 students, and is the largest of the three schools by a significant margin. It is one of the most prestigious and selective engineering schools in the United States, consistently ranked within the top ten undergraduate engineering programs among non-doctorate-awarding schools nationwide. The school offers ABET-accredited Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) programs in chemical, civil, electrical, and mechanical engineering. In addition, Cooper Union offers an interdisciplinary engineering program, leading to a Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools-accredited Bachelor of Science in Engineering (B.S.E.) degree.
question_src: UT的Cockrell工程学院有多少名学生？
pos_context_src: 德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的科克雷尔工程学院拥有7,800多名学生，获得了九个本科学位和13个研究生课程。根据世界大学的学术排名，该学院在世界上排名第四，在全国范围内通过“美国新闻与世界报告”排名第八，而所有研究生课程在全国排名最高。年度研究支出超过1.5亿美元，学校拥有美国国家工程学院的第四大教师。
neg_context_title_src: 德克萨斯大学奥斯汀建筑学院
neg_context_src: 在工程学生生活办公室的监督下，科克雷尔工程学院是80多个学生组织的所在地。这些组织提供各种各样的学生团体，提供学术，专业发展，服务和社会机会。大多数是国家和国际专业工程组织的学生章节。在组织中有：

乔·H·吉尔（Joe H.在一次失败的尝试涉及围绕狗的尾巴并将其释放到班级的尝试失败之后，一群学生看到了一个高约五英尺高的木制雕像，同时又有茶点，他们要求借用。第二天，吉尔（Gill）作为他们的守护神，将他的血统追溯到班级之间的古代。演讲成功地分解了课程，并在一年后，他扮演了UT工程师的守护神亚历山大·弗雷德里克·克莱尔（Alexander Frederick Claire）的洗礼。亚历克（Alec）在法律与工程专业的学生之间一直处于友好竞争的中心，并受到众多逃生（例如绑架和截肢）的约束。如今，原始木制雕像的剩下的东西可以安全地保存在工程库中。
每年，校园的工程团体都会建立新的Alecs，然后由学生投票。获胜者将于4月1日在ALEC的生日聚会上宣布。科克雷尔工程学院拥有正式的有组织的研究单位，以协调和促进教师和学生研究。这些单位为指定领域的教师提供并维护专门的研究设施。
艾哈迈德·H·图菲克（Ahmed H. Tewfik）是一位埃及裔美国人电气工程师，教授和大学管理员，目前担任德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的科克雷尔工程学院电气和计算机工程系主席。在他对信号处理领域的研究和贡献中，他获得了2017年IEEE信号处理协会技术成就奖以及2000年的IEEE第三千年奖。

1910年，德克萨斯大学奥斯汀工程学院（现称Cockrell工程学院）开始提供建筑专业学位。两年后，该计划有30多名注册学生。在弗雷德里克·吉斯克（Frederick Giesecke）和戈德温·戈德史密斯（Goldwin Goldsmith）的领导下，该学校在接下来的二十年中得到了扩展。 1925年，这所学校成为德克萨斯州第一个被录取为大学建筑学院协会的会员资格。该计划于1935年获得国家建筑认证委员会的认可。该学校于1933年搬进了建筑大楼的永久住所（以戈德史密斯（Goldsmith Hall）的名字命名），并于1948年成为建筑学院。该校的第一位毕业生是Bertram Ernst Giesecke，他于1927年被正式许可作为建筑师。

七所学校提供本科课程，另外七个提供了研究生和专业课程。在这些学校的系中攻读研究生学位的学生已入学。继续教育和夏季课程为大学和高中生，专业人士和其他成年人提供课程。在15,182名本科生中，有4,602名（30.3％）隶属于最大的大学，由招生，艺术和科学归属，其次是工程学的3,203（21.1％），3,101（20.4％）的农业和生命科学。根据学生入学率，七所大学的大学中最小的是建筑，艺术和计划，有503名学生（3.3％）。
在2013年至2015年担任UT Austin的执行副总裁兼教务长之前，他于2008年被任命为UT Austin的Cockrell工程学院的第八名院长，并以这种身份任职五年。 2015年，他被选为UT Austin的第29任总统。
Santoso博士于2003年在德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的Cockrell工程学院加入了教职员工。自从成为教授以来，他已经毕业了七个博士学位和二十四名硕士学生。
库珀联盟工程学院的入学率包括大约550名学生，并且是这三所学校中最大的一所学生。它是美国最负盛名，最有选择性的工程学校之一，在全国范围内非授予授课的学校中，始终在前十名的本科工程课程中排名。该学校提供了化学，民用，电气和机械工程学学士学位（B.E。）课程（B.E。）课程。此外，库珀联盟提供了一项跨学科工程计划，导致了学院和学校认可的工程学学士学位（B.S.E.）学位。
report_src: 德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的科克雷尔工程学院目前拥有7,800多名学生，是全美规模较大的工程学院之一[1]。

question_en: How many episodes did King of the Hill have?
pos_context_en: Judge began creating "King of the Hill" during his time making the MTV series "Beavis and Butt-Head", which he also created and voiced. After pitching the pilot to Fox, Judge was paired with Greg Daniels, an experienced writer who previously worked on "The Simpsons". The series debuted on the Fox network as a mid-season replacement in 1997, quickly becoming a hit. The series' popularity led to worldwide syndication, and reruns aired on Adult Swim from 2009 until 2018. As of July 24, 2018, reruns aired on Comedy Central. The show became one of Fox's longest-running series (third-longest as an animated series, behind "The Simpsons" and "Family Guy").. A total of 259 episodes aired over the course of its 13 seasons. The final episode aired on Fox on September 13, 2009. Four episodes from the final season were to have aired on Fox, but later premiered in nightly syndication from May 3 to 6, 2010.
neg_context_title_en: List of King of the Hill home video releases
List of King of the Hill episodes
List of King of the Hill home video releases
neg_context_en: King of the Hill season box sets have been released on DVD since 2003 in region 1, region 2 and in region 4. Seasons one to thirteen have been released in region 1 and seasons one to five in region 2 and region 4. The first six seasons were issued by 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment; releases of seasons seven and onwards were by Olive Films, who acquired the rights in 2014. For details on episodes listed below, refer to the List of "King of the Hill" episodes.

Because FOX wanted to make room for new shows on their "Animation Domination" line-up, the final six DABE episodes were cut down to two ("The Boy Can't Help It" and "To Sirloin with Love"). Both episodes aired as a special one-hour series finale on September 13, 2009. The other four unaired episodes ("The Honeymooners," "Bill Gathers Moss," "When Joseph Met Lori, and Made Out with Her in the Janitor's Closet," and "Just Another Manic Kahn-Day") did not air on FOX, but did appear in syndicated reruns and on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim line-up, as well as appearing on streaming platforms Netflix and Amazon Prime. "To Sirloin with Love" is still considered by most to be the final episode of the series, despite not being the last episode to air, as it was the last episode produced and written for the series.

"King of the Hill" is an American animated television series created by Mike Judge and Greg Daniels. The series focuses on the Hills, a middle-class American family in the fictional city of Arlen, Texas. It originally aired on Fox from January 12, 1997 to September 13, 2009; with four episodes from the final season premiering in syndication from May 3 to May 6, 2010. A total of 259 episodes aired over the course of 13 seasons.

The showrunners for the season were John Altschuler and Dave Krinsky. Beginning with the episode "Lucky See, Monkey Do", "King of the Hill" started being produced in 720p high-definition. 20th Century Fox Television initially ordered 13 DABE production episodes, but decided to keep the show in production for four additional episodes (DABE14–DABE17).

Because it was scheduled to lead off Fox's Sunday-night animated programming lineup, portions of "King of the Hill" episodes were often pre-empted by sporting events that ran into overtime; in season nine especially, whole episodes were pre-empted. Ultimately, enough episodes were pre-empted that the majority of the series' 10th season—initially intended to be the final season, consisted of unaired ninth-season episodes.

This is the first "King of the Hill" box set, released on July 1, 2003. It contains all thirteen episodes produced (only 12 were aired in season 1, one episode was held over for broadcast with season 2) from the first season (1997) spread across three DVD-9s (single-sided, dual layer).

The thirteenth and final season of "King of the Hill" originally aired Sunday nights on the Fox Broadcasting Company from September 28, 2008 to September 13, 2009. Four episodes from this season originally premiered in syndication from May 3 to May 6, 2010. Actress Brittany Murphy, who voiced Luanne Platter, died of pneumonia on December 20, 2009, five months before the final four episodes aired.

"King of the Hill" is the twenty-third episode in the ninth season of the American animated television series "The Simpsons". It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on May 3, 1998. It was written by John Swartzwelder and directed by Steven Dean Moore, and guest stars Brendan Fraser and Steven Weber. The episode sees Homer trying to climb a large mountain to impress Bart after he humiliates him at a church picnic with his lack of fitness.

The showrunners for the season were John Altschuler and Dave Krinsky. The wackier stories from recent years began to be phased out. Series creator Mike Judge described the episodes from this season as "small personal stories like we did in the second season."
question_src: 山之王有几集？
pos_context_src: 法官在他制作MTV系列“ Beavis and Butt-Head”期间开始创建“山之王”，他也创建并发表了声音。在将飞行员投向福克斯之后，法官与以前从事过《辛普森一家》的经验丰富的作家格雷格·丹尼尔斯（Greg Daniels）配对。该系列节目在Fox网络上首次亮相，是1997年赛季中期的替代者，很快受到了打击。该系列的受欢迎程度导致了全球联合组织，并从2009年至2018年在成人游泳上播出。截至2018年7月24日，重播Comedy Central在Comedy Central上播出。该节目成为福克斯（Fox）最长的系列赛（第三次是动画系列，仅次于《辛普森一家》和《家庭家伙》）。在其13个赛季中，总共播出了259集。最后一集于2009年9月13日在福克斯（Fox）播出。最后一个赛季的四集将在福克斯（Fox）上播出，但后来在2010年5月3日至6日在夜间联合组织中首映。
neg_context_title_src: Hill Home Video版本的国王清单
Hill Home Video版本的国王清单
neg_context_src: 自2003年以来，在DVD上发布了第1区，第2区和第4区。第1至13个季节已在第1区和第4区和第4区的第1季发布。前六个季节是由20世纪福克斯家庭娱乐发布的；第七季及以后发行的是Olive Films，他于2014年获得了权利。有关下面列出的情节的详细信息，请参阅“山之王”情节列表。

因为福克斯想在他们的“动画统治”阵容上为新节目腾出空间，所以最后的六集剧集被削减到两个（“男孩无能为力”和“爱上爱情的莫恩”）。 Both episodes aired as a special one-hour series finale on September 13, 2009. The other four unaired episodes ("The Honeymooners," "Bill Gathers Moss," "When Joseph Met Lori, and Made Out with Her in the Janitor's Closet," and "Just Another Manic Kahn-Day") did not air on FOX, but did appear in syndicated reruns and on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim line-up, as well as出现在流媒体平台Netflix和Amazon Prime上。大多数人仍然认为“与爱情的寿命”被认为是该系列的最后一集，尽管这不是播出的最后一集，因为这是该系列的最后一集。
“山之王”是由Mike Judge和Greg Daniels创作的美国动画电视连续剧。该系列重点关注山丘，这是一个虚构的德克萨斯州阿伦市的中产阶级家庭。它最初于1997年1月12日至2009年9月13日在FOX上播出；从最后一个赛季开始的四集从2010年5月3日至5月6日在联合组织中首映。在13个季节中，总共播出了259集。
本赛季的表演者是约翰·阿尔茨舒勒（John Altschuler）和戴夫·克林斯基（Dave Krinsky）。从“幸运的见，猴子做”开始，“山之王”开始以720p的高清生产。 20世纪福克斯电视台最初订购了13个DABE的生产剧集，但决定将演出保留在制作中，以进行四集（DABE14 – DABE17）。
因为它计划带领福克斯的周日晚上动画节目阵容，所以“山之王”情节的某些部分经常被体育赛事竞争加时赛的体育赛事。特别是在第九季中，整集都被抢占了。最终，足够多的情节被抢占了本系列第10季的大多数，最初是打算是最后一个赛季，包括未播放的第九季情节。
这是2003年7月1日发行的第一个“山丘之王”盒装。它包含了所有生产的13集（在第1季中仅播出了12集，第一季以第2季（1997年）（1997）（1997年）播放了一集，分布在三个DVD-9（单侧，双层层）中。
“山之王”的第十三个也是最后一个季节最初于2008年9月28日至2009年9月13日在福克斯广播公司播出。本赛季的四集最初是在2010年5月3日至5月6日在联合组织中首映的。女演员布里塔尼·布里塔尼（Brittany Murphy），墨菲（Brittany Murphy），他在2009年12月20日之前曾在5月20日播出了Pneumonia，该季节死于Pneumonia，该季节是五个月的五个月。

“山之王”是美国动画电视连续剧《辛普森一家》第九季的第21集。它最初于1998年5月3日在美国的Fox Network上播出。它是由John Swartzwelder撰写的，由史蒂文·迪恩·摩尔（Steven Dean Moore）执导，嘉宾明星布伦丹·弗雷泽（Brendan Fraser）和史蒂文·韦伯（Steven Weber）撰写。这一集使荷马试图爬上一座大山，以打动巴特，因为他羞辱了他的教堂野餐，但他缺乏健身。
本赛季的表演者是约翰·阿尔茨舒勒（John Altschuler）和戴夫·克林斯基（Dave Krinsky）。近年来的古怪故事开始分阶段。系列创作者迈克·法官（Mike Judge）将本赛季的情节描述为“像第二季一样的小型个人故事”。
report_src: 动画剧集《山之王》共播出了259集，涵盖13个赛季[1]。

question_en: How well did Descent: FreeSpace – The Great War sale?
pos_context_en: PC Data, which tracked computer game sales in the United States, reported that "Descent: FreeSpace" earned nearly $4 million and sold around 100,000 copies by October 1999.
neg_context_en: "" was released by Volition in 1998. It shared the "Descent" name, but otherwise had no connection to the series; it was given the "Descent" prefix to avoid trademark issues with "FreeSpace", a disk compression utility (in Europe, it was released as "Conflict: FreeSpace – The Great War"). "FreeSpace" was a space simulator, and while it was still technically a 3D shooter, it did not retain "Descent"s characteristic "six degrees of freedom" control scheme, save for a cheat code that would force the player's ship to loosely mimic "Descent"s physics. Some early drafts of the "FreeSpace" story had the pilot searching for "Descent"s "Material Defender", but the story of the finished game was unrelated.

"Descent: FreeSpace" was well received as a single-player space simulation that integrated all the desired features of its genre, from competent AI wingmen, to the presence of large capital ships that not only dwarf the fighters piloted by the player, but also explode spectacularly when destroyed. However, the game's multiplayer mode was criticised, as it was plagued by lag and inaccurate tracking of statistics. An expansion for the game, which was less well received, was also released in 1998 under the title of "Silent Threat", and focuses on events after the main game's campaign with the player working for an intelligence branch of the Terrans' armed forces that later attempt to overthrow the Terran government. A sequel to "Descent: FreeSpace" entitled "FreeSpace 2", was released in 1999 to critical acclaim.

Descent: FreeSpace – The Great War, also known as Conflict: FreeSpace – The Great War in Europe, or simply just FreeSpace; is a 1998 space combat simulation IBM PC compatible computer game developed by Volition, when it was split off from Parallax Software, and published by Interplay Productions. In 2001, it was ported to the Amiga platform as FreeSpace: The Great War by Hyperion Entertainment. The game places players in the role of a human pilot, who operates in several classes of starfighter and combats against opposing forces, either human or alien, in various space-faring environments, such as in orbit above a planet or within an asteroid belt. The story of the game's single player campaign focuses on a war in the 24th century between two factions, one human and the other alien, that is interrupted in its fourteenth year by the arrival of an enigmatic and militant alien race, whose genocidal advance forces the two sides into a ceasefire in order to work together to halt the threat.

"Descent: FreeSpace" received generally good reviews following its launch, with "PC Gamer UK" placing it 20th in its 1999 Top 100 Awards. However reviewers were split on several aspects of the game. While many praised the graphics of the game, some approving of how well rendered an in-game asteroid stood out before the background of softly glowing nebulae, galaxies and stars, others felt the 3D effects were not "spectacular" to those of the software rendered version, commenting that rendered nebulae were unconvincing and that the models of in-game ships lacked detail and had blurry textures. Despite the differences between them, all reviewers unanimously agreed that the explosions effects in the game, including the many small details of the capital ships upon breaking up, were the most impressive they had seen (at the time).

Apogee Software announced on December 12, 1997 that they would be exclusively publishing "FreeSpace" for the first three months before handing the publishing rights back to Interplay Entertainment. This was part of their agreement with Interplay for the latter's purchase of the rights to "Descent", and Apogee decided to release "FreeSpace" as shareware, with themselves as the merchant of the registered version. Interplay, however, bought the full rights to "FreeSpace" from Apogee in late April, 1998, keeping the ownership of the game solely to themselves.

"FreeSpace" was Volition's first project after the split from Parallax Software, which also spawned Outrage Entertainment. It is not part of the canon of the "Descent" computer game series, and contained none of its ideas and only small portions of its code. It was only prefixed with "Descent" to avoid trademark issues with Mijenix Corporation's "FreeSpace", a disk compression utility. Volition also used the term "FreeSpace" in the game to initially describe what became later known as subspace. The game was conceived by Adam Pletcher, with all the features of space simulator games his team had found to be fun. The games "" and "Wing Commander" were their primary inspirations, and those influences made their way into the game's flight model, along with the influence of historical WWII dogfights. Themes from the fiction of "Star Wars", "", and "Ender's Game" form a part in shaping the background and story of the "FreeSpace" world. The chaotic battles between masses of ships commonly found in science-fiction anime became one of the features of "FreeSpace".

The Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences nominated "Descent: FreeSpace" for its 1998 "Simulation Game of the Year" award, although it lost to "". "Descent: FreeSpace" was a finalist for "Computer Games Strategy Plus"s "Sci-Fi Simulation of the Year" and "Computer Gaming World"s "Best Space Sim" awards in 1998, both of which ultimately went to "I-War". The editors of "Computer Gaming World" called it "an excellent game, featuring some of the best wing-man AI to hit the genre, but it was too derivative of previous space sims." "PC Gamer US" nominated it as the year's best action game, and its editors wrote that ""Freespace" came from nowhere to wrest the 3D space combat crown from the "Wing Commander" series with style." However, this award went to "Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six".

On December 14, 1999, Hyperion Entertainment announced their acquisition of the license to port "FreeSpace" to the Amiga system. The publisher was changed to Haage & Partner Computer on October 18, 2001. Despite the game's official release being announced for December 2001, the approval to do so could only be gotten on January 7, 2002. The game was shipped without a printed manual, but had additional German and French language support. Hyperion had stated they would port over "Silent Threat" if the "FreeSpace" port sold well. To date, "Silent Threat" has yet to be ported over to the Amiga platform.

Some notable original mods and campaigns have been created, such as "Wings of Dawn" which takes place in an anime-style world, and "Blue Planet" which offers a continuation of "Freespace 2", telling of a civil war between Earth and the GTVA. "The FreeSpace Port", sometimes called FSPort, ports the original "Descent: FreeSpaceThe Great War" to the "FreeSpace 2" and SCP engine with many graphical enhancements, and serves as a base for many mods set in the FreeSpace: Great War era, such as "Shrouding the Light" and "Awakenings". "Silent Threat: Reborn" similarly ports the "Silent Threat" expansion for Descent: Freespace into the Freespace 2 SCP engine.
question_src: 血统的效果如何：自由空间 - 大战销售？
pos_context_title_src: 血统：自由空间 - 大战
pos_context_src: 在美国跟踪计算机游戏销售的PC数据报告称，“ Descent：FreeSpace”赚了近400万美元，并在1999年10月之前售出了大约100,000份。

neg_context_src: “”是由Volition于1998年发布的。它共享了“下降”名称，但与该系列无关。它的“下降”前缀避免了磁盘压缩公用事业“ Freespace”的商标问题（在欧洲，它以“冲突：自由空间 - 大战”的形式发行）。 “ FreeSpace”是一个太空模拟器，尽管从技术上讲它仍然是3D射击游戏，但它并没有保留“ Descent”的“ s tementival”六个自由度“自由度”控制方案，除了欺骗代码会迫使玩家的船轻松地模仿“下降”的物理学。 “ FreeSpace”故事的一些早期草稿使飞行员在寻找“ Descent” S“物质防守者”，但完成比赛的故事并不相关。

“下降：自由空间”是单人空间模拟的好评，该模拟整合了其流派的所有理想特征，从合格的AI Wingmen到存在的大型资本船的存在，不仅使玩家驾驶的战斗机相形见war，而且在销毁时也爆炸了。但是，游戏的多人游戏模式受到了批评，因为它受到滞后和不准确跟踪统计的困扰。该游戏的扩展受到了不太好评，该游戏也于1998年以“沉默威胁”的名称发布，并重点介绍了主游戏的竞选活动之后的事件，玩家为Terrans武装部队的情报部门工作，后来试图推翻Terran政府。 1999年发行了“ Descent：FreeSpace”的续集，名为“ Freespace 2”，以获取好评。

血统：自由空间 - 大战，也称为冲突：自由空间 - 欧洲的大战，或者只是自由空间；是1998年的空间战斗模拟IBM PC兼容由Volition开发的计算机游戏，当时它是从视差软件中拆分出来的，并由Interplay Productions发布。 2001年，它被移植到Amiga平台，作为Freespace：Hyperion Entertainment的《大战》。该游戏使玩家扮演着人类飞行员的角色，他们在几类星际战斗机中运作，并在各种空间环境中，例如在行星上方的轨道或小行星腰带中与对立力量作战。该游戏的单人运动运动的故事集中在24世纪的战争中，两个派系之间的战争，一个人和另一个外星人，这是由于一个神秘和激进的外星人种族的到来，在十四年中被打断了，其种族灭绝的进步迫使两个方面迫使两个方面陷入困境，以使威胁危害威胁。

发布后，“ Descent：FreeSpace”在其发布后通常获得了良好的评论，“ PC Gamer UK”将其排在1999年的前100名奖项中。但是，审稿人在游戏的几个方面被分解。虽然许多人赞扬了游戏的图形，但有些人批准了在柔和发光的星云，星系和星星的背景之前呈现出的小行星，而其他人则认为3D效果并不是软件渲染版本的“壮观”，这表明了Nebulae呈现的nebulae毫无疑问，并在细节上添加了细节和细节。尽管他们之间存在差异，但所有评论者都一致同意，他们（当时）最令人印象深刻的是，游戏中的爆炸效果，包括分手时的许多小细节。

Apogee Software于1997年12月12日宣布，他们将在头三个月中专门发布“ Freespace”，然后将出版权交给Interplay Entertainment。这是他们与Interplay协议的一部分，即后者购买了“ Descent”权利，Apogee决定将“ Freespace”作为共享软件发行，并将自己作为注册版本的商人。但是，Interplay在1998年4月下旬从Apogee购买了“ Freespace”的全部权利，仅保留了游戏的所有权。

“ Freespace”是Volition与Alallax Software分割后的第一个项目，该项目还产生了愤怒娱乐。它不是“下降”计算机游戏系列的佳能的一部分，也不包含其代码的一小部分。它仅具有“血统”的前缀，以避免Mijenix Corporation的“ Freespace”（磁盘压缩实用程序）的商标问题。 Volition还使用游戏中的“ Freespace”一词来描述后来被称为子空间的内容。该游戏是由亚当·普莱彻（Adam Pletcher）构思的，他的团队发现太空模拟器游戏的所有功能都很有趣。奥运会“”和“机翼指挥官”是他们的主要灵感，这些影响力与历史二战斗争的影响一起进入了游戏的飞行模式。 “星球大战”，“”和“ Ender's Game”的小说中的主题构成了“自由空间”世界的背景和故事的一部分。科幻动漫中常见的船只之间的混乱战斗成为“自由空间”的特征之一。

互动艺术与科学学院的1998年“年度模拟游戏”奖提名为“ Descent：Freespace”，尽管它损失了“”。 “ Descent：FreeSpace”是1998年的“计算机游戏策略和“ Sci-Fi模拟”和“计算机游戏世界” S“最佳太空SIM”奖的决赛入围者，两者最终都参加了“ I-War”。 “计算机游戏世界”的编辑称其为“出色的游戏，具有一些最佳的Wing-Man AI，可以使用该类型，但它太过了以前的Space Sims。” “ PC Gamer US”提名为当年的最佳动作游戏，其编辑写道，“ Freespace”从无处获得了“ Wing Wing Commander”系列风格的3D太空战斗冠冕。但是，该奖项授予“汤姆·克兰西（Tom Clancy）的彩虹六人”。

1999年12月14日，Hyperion Entertainment宣布收购Amiga系统“ Freespace”港口的许可证。出版商于2001年10月18日更改为Haage＆Partner Computer。尽管该游戏的正式发布于2001年12月宣布，但仅在2002年1月7日才能获得批准，但该游戏没有印刷手册，但还提供了额外的德语和法语支持。 Hyperion表示，如果“ Freespace”港口销售良好，他们将端口“沉默的威胁”。迄今为止，“无声威胁”尚未移植到Amiga平台。

已经创建了一些著名的原始mod和运动，例如在动漫风格的世界中发生的“黎明之翼”，以及“蓝色星球”，提供了“ freespace 2”的延续，讲述了地球与GTVA之间的内战。 “自由空间端口”（有时称为FSPORT）将原始的“下降：Freespacethe大战”端口到“ FreeSpace 2”和SCP引擎，并具有许多图形增强功能，并为“ FreeSpace：FreeSpace：Great War Era”中的许多mod的基础提供了基础，例如“光明”和“ shard the Light the Light”和“ shakenings''shakenings and'sawakenings''。 “沉默的威胁：重生”同样将“沉默的威胁”扩展到下降：自由空间进入Freespace 2 SCP发动机。
report_src: 根据美国市场研究公司 PC Data 的统计，截至1999年10月，《血统：自由空间 - 大战》（Descent: FreeSpace – The Great War）在美国 PC 游戏市场的累计销量约为10万套，带来了近400万美元的销售收入，可见其商业表现属于中等水平，在当时的同类太空射击游戏中取得了一定的市场成功但未达到现象级热卖[1]。

question_en: Who first identified the cell?
pos_context_en: In biology, cell theory is the historic scientific theory, now universally accepted, that living organisms are made up of cells, that they are the basic structural/organizational unit of all organisms, and that all cells come from pre-existing cells. Cells are the basic unit of structure in all organisms and also the basic unit of reproduction. With continual improvements made to microscopes over time, magnification technology advanced enough to discover cells in the 17th century. This discovery is largely attributed to Robert Hooke, and began the scientific study of cells, also known as cell biology. Over a century later, many debates about cells began amongst scientists. Most of these debates involved the nature of cellular regeneration, and the idea of cells as a fundamental unit of life. Cell theory was eventually formulated in 1839. This is usually credited to Matthias Schleiden and Theodor Schwann. However, many other scientists like Rudolf Virchow contributed to the theory. It was an important step in the movement away from spontaneous generation.
neg_context_en: The discovery of insulin at the University of Toronto in 1921 is considered among the most significant events in the history of medicine. The stem cell was discovered at the university in 1963, forming the basis for bone marrow transplantation and all subsequent research on adult and embryonic stem cells. This was the first of many findings at Toronto relating to stem cells, including the identification of pancreatic and retinal stem cells. The cancer stem cell was first identified in 1997 by Toronto researchers, who have since found stem cell associations in leukemia, brain tumors and colorectal cancer. Medical inventions developed at Toronto include the glycaemic index, the infant cereal Pablum, the use of protective hypothermia in open heart surgery and the first artificial cardiac pacemaker. The first successful single-lung transplant was performed at Toronto in 1981, followed by the first nerve transplant in 1988, and the first double-lung transplant in 1989. Researchers identified the maturation promoting factor that regulates cell division, and discovered the T-cell receptor, which triggers responses of the immune system. The university is credited with isolating the genes that cause Fanconi anemia, cystic fibrosis and early-onset Alzheimer's disease, among numerous other diseases. Between 1914 and 1972, the university operated the Connaught Medical Research Laboratories, now part of the pharmaceutical corporation Sanofi-Aventis. Among the research conducted at the laboratory was the development of gel electrophoresis.

In neuroscience, Golgi cells are inhibitory interneurons found within the granular layer of the cerebellum. They were first identified as inhibitory by Eccles "et al." in 1964.
It was also the first example of an inhibitory feed back network, where the inhibitory interneuron was identified anatomically.
These cells synapse onto the dendrite of granule cells and unipolar brush cells. They receive excitatory input from mossy fibres, also synapsing on granule cells, and parallel fibers, which are long granule cell axons. Thereby this circuitry allows for feed-forward and feed-back inhibition of granule cells.

Anton van Leeuwenhoek is another scientist who saw these cells soon after Hooke did. He made use of a microscope containing improved lenses that could magnify objects almost 300-fold, or 270x. Under these microscopes, Leeuwenhoek found motile objects. In a letter to The Royal Society on October 9, 1676, he states that motility is a quality of life therefore these were living organisms. Over time, he wrote many more papers in which described many specific forms of microorganisms. Leeuwenhoek named these “animalcules,” which included protozoa and other unicellular organisms, like bacteria. Though he did not have much formal education, he was able to identify the first accurate description of red blood cells and discovered bacteria after gaining interest in the sense of taste that resulted in Leeuwenhoek to observe the tongue of an ox, then leading him to study "pepper water" in 1676. He also found for the first time the sperm cells of animals and humans. Once discovering these types of cells, Leeuwenhoek saw that the fertilization process requires the sperm cell to enter the egg cell. This put an end to the previous theory of spontaneous generation. After reading letters by Leeuwenhoek, Hooke was the first to confirm his observations that were thought to be unlikely by other contemporaries.

Alexander Friedenstein and his colleagues first identified osteoprogenitor cells in multiple mammalian tissues, before any genetic or morphological criteria were put in place for bone marrow or connective tissues. Osteoprogenitor cells can be identified by their associations with existing bone or cartilage structures, or their placement in the embryo, as the sites for osteogenesis and chondrogenesis are now known.

Cell, developmental, and reproductive biology have been a central part of the MBL's programs since the 1890s. Important discoveries in these fields at the MBL reach back to 1899, when Jacques Loeb demonstrated artificial parthenogenesis in sea urchin eggs; to 1905, when Edwin Grant Conklin first identified egg cytoplasmic regions that are programmed to form certain tissues or organs; to 1916, when Frank Rattray Lillie identified circulating hormones that influence sexual differentiation (Lillie, 1944). In the MBL's first two decades, cytologists Edmund Beecher Wilson, Nettie Stevens and others made connections between the chromosomes and Mendelian heredity, while Wilson's colleague at both the MBL and Columbia University, Thomas Hunt Morgan, launched the field of experimental genetics (Pauly, 2000:158). Keith R. Porter, considered by many to be a founder of modern cell biology due to his pioneering work on the fine structure of cells, including the discovery of microtubules, carried out research at the MBL starting in 1937 and directed the laboratory from 1975-77 (Barlow et al., 1993: 95-115).

Cell theory led biologists to re-envision individual organisms as interdependent assemblages of individual cells. Scientists in the rising field of cytology, armed with increasingly powerful microscopes and new staining methods, soon found that even single cells were far more complex than the homogeneous fluid-filled chambers described by earlier microscopists. Robert Brown had described the nucleus in 1831, and by the end of the 19th century cytologists identified many of the key cell components: chromosomes, centrosomes mitochondria, chloroplasts, and other structures made visible through staining. Between 1874 and 1884 Walther Flemming described the discrete stages of mitosis, showing that they were not artifacts of staining but occurred in living cells, and moreover, that chromosomes doubled in number just before the cell divided and a daughter cell was produced. Much of the research on cell reproduction came together in August Weismann's theory of heredity: he identified the nucleus (in particular chromosomes) as the hereditary material, proposed the distinction between somatic cells and germ cells (arguing that chromosome number must be halved for germ cells, a precursor to the concept of meiosis), and adopted Hugo de Vries's theory of pangenes. Weismannism was extremely influential, especially in the new field of experimental embryology.

The cells were first observed by Karl Wilhelm von Kupffer in 1876. The scientist called them "Sternzellen" (star cells or hepatic stellate cell) but thought, inaccurately, that they were an integral part of the endothelium of the liver blood vessels and that they originated from it. In 1898, after several years of research, Tadeusz Browicz identified them, correctly, as macrophages.

Rudd is credited with having had a major impact on the understanding of the intracellular signals that control T-cell immunity. Rudd was the first to discover that intracellular protein kinases interact with surface receptors to generate an intracellular protein-tyrosine phosphorylation cascade, by identifying the interaction of T-cell co-receptors CD4 (also the receptor for the human immunodeficiency virus, HIV-1) and CD8 on T-cells with protein-tyrosine kinase p56lck. His discovery provided the first example of a role for members of the proto-oncogene pp60src kinase family in normal cell signaling. Other receptors were later found to use src-related kinases to regulate cell growth. In terms of immunology, the CD4- and CD8-p56lck complexes are now widely accepted as the initiators of the T cell activation, leading to the recruitment of a second tyrosine kinase ZAP-70 that control the ability of T-cells to respond to foreign pathogens, foreign transplants and cancer cell neo-antigens.

William Grove produced the first fuel cell in 1839. He based his experiment on the fact that sending an electric current through water splits the water into its component parts of hydrogen and oxygen. So, Grove tried reversing the reaction—combining hydrogen and oxygen to produce electricity and water. Eventually the term "fuel cell" was coined in 1889 by Ludwig Mond and Charles Langer, who attempted to build the first practical device using air and industrial coal gas. He also introduced a powerful battery at the annual meeting of the British Association for the Advancement of Science in 1839. Grove's first cell consisted of zinc in diluted sulfuric acid and platinum in concentrated nitric acid, separated by a porous pot. The cell was able to generate about 12 amperes of current at about 1.8 volts. This cell had nearly double the voltage of the first Daniell cell. Grove's nitric acid cell was the favourite battery of the early American telegraph (1840–1860), because it offered strong current output.

Dopaminergic cell groups are collections of neurons in the central nervous system that synthesize the neurotransmitter dopamine. In the 1960s, dopamine neurons were first identified and named by Annica Dahlström and , who used histochemical fluorescence. The subsequent discovery of genes encoding enzymes that synthesize dopamine, and transporters that incorporate dopamine into synaptic vesicles or reclaim it after synaptic release, enabled scientists to identify dopaminergic neurons by labeling gene or protein expression that is specific to these neurons.

Credit for developing cell theory is usually given to two scientists: Theodor Schwann and Matthias Jakob Schleiden. While Rudolf Virchow contributed to the theory, he is not as credited for his attributions toward it. In 1839, Schleiden suggested that every structural part of a plant was made up of cells or the result of cells. He also suggested that cells were made by a crystallization process either within other cells or from the outside. However, this was not an original idea of Schleiden. He claimed this theory as his own, though Barthelemy Dumortier had stated it years before him. This crystallization process is no longer accepted with modern cell theory. In 1839, Theodor Schwann states that along with plants, animals are composed of cells or the product of cells in their structures. This was a major advancement in the field of biology since little was known about animal structure up to this point compared to plants. From these conclusions about plants and animals, two of the three tenets of cell theory were postulated.
question_src: 谁首先确定了该单元格？
pos_context_src: 在生物学中，细胞理论是历史性的科学理论，现已普遍接受，即生物是由细胞组成的，它们是所有生物体的基本结构/组织单位，并且所有细胞均来自现有的细胞。细胞是所有生物体的基本结构单位，也是繁殖的基本单位。随着时间的流逝，随着时间的推移对显微镜进行了持续的改进，放大技术在17世纪就足够了，可以发现细胞。这一发现在很大程度上归因于罗伯特·胡克（Robert Hooke），并开始对细胞的科学研究，也称为细胞生物学。一个多世纪后，科学家的许多辩论开始了。这些辩论中的大多数涉及细胞再生的性质，以及细胞作为生命的基本单位的思想。细胞理论最终于1839年提出。这通常被认为是Matthias Schleiden和Theodor Schwann。但是，许多其他科学家（例如Rudolf Virchow）为该理论做出了贡献。这是远离自发世代的运动的重要一步。
neg_context_title_src: 克里斯托弗·E·鲁德（Christopher E. Rudd）
neg_context_src: 1921年在多伦多大学发现胰岛素是医学史上最重要的事件之一。该干细胞于1963年在大学发现，构成了骨髓移植以及随后对成人和胚胎干细胞的所有研究的基础。这是多伦多关于干细胞的许多发现中的第一个，包括鉴定胰腺和视网膜干细胞。多伦多研究人员于1997年首次发现了癌症干细胞，这些研究人员此后发现了白血病，脑肿瘤和大肠癌的干细胞关联。多伦多开发的医疗发明包括血糖指数，婴儿谷物Pablum，在心脏心脏手术中使用保护性体温过低和第一个人造心脏起搏器。 1981年在多伦多进行了第一次成功的单肺移植，随后是1988年的第一次神经移植，1989年进行了第一次双肺移植。研究人员确定了调节细胞分裂的成熟因子，并发现了T细胞受体，并发现了T细胞受体，从而触发免疫系统的反应。该大学因隔离引起fanconi贫血，囊性纤维化和早期发作的阿尔茨海默氏病的基因而被认为。在1914年至1972年之间，该大学经营着康诺特医学研究实验室，现在是制药公司Sanofi-Aventis的一部分。在实验室进行的研究中，是凝胶电泳的发展。

在神经科学中，高尔基细胞是在小脑颗粒层中发现的抑制性中间神经元。它们首先被Eccles“等人”鉴定为抑制。 1964年。
这也是抑制反馈网络的第一个例子，在解剖学上鉴定出抑制性中间神经元。
这些细胞突触到颗粒细胞和单极刷细胞的树突上。他们从苔藓纤维中收到兴奋性输入，还可以在颗粒细胞上突触和平行纤维，这些纤维是长颗粒细胞轴突。因此，该电路允许喂养颗粒细胞的前馈和进料抑制。

安东·范·李温霍克（Anton van Leeuwenhoek）是另一位科学家，他在胡克（Hooke）做到这一点后不久就看到了这些细胞。他使用了包含改进的镜头的显微镜，该显微镜可以放大近300倍或270倍的物体。在这些显微镜下，Leeuwenhoek发现了动动物体。他在1676年10月9日致皇家学会的一封信中指出，运动是一种生活质量，因此这些都是活物。随着时间的流逝，他写了更多的论文，其中描述了许多特定形式的微生物。 Leeuwenhoek命名了这些“动物”，其中包括原生动物和其他单细胞生物，例如细菌。尽管他没有太多的正规教育，但他能够确定对红细胞的第一个准确描述，并在对味道感兴趣后发现了细菌，这导致Leeuwenhoek探测了牛的舌头，然后使他于1676年在1676年进行了“研究Pepper Water”。一旦发现了这些类型的细胞，Leeuwenhoek就认为受精过程需要精子细胞进入卵细胞。这结束了先前自发世代的理论。在阅读了Leeuwenhoek的来信后，胡克是第一个确认他的观察结果的人，而其他同时代人认为这是不可能的。
亚历山大·弗里登斯坦（Alexander Friedenstein）和他的同事首先在多个哺乳动物组织中鉴定出骨基因细胞，然后在骨髓或结缔组织制定任何遗传或形态学标准之前。可以通过与现有的骨头或软骨结构的关联或将其放置在胚胎中的关联来鉴定骨源细胞，因为现在已知成骨的部位和软骨发生的位点。

自1890年代以来，细胞，发育和生殖生物学一直是MBL计划的中心部分。在MBL的这些领域中的重要发现可以追溯到1899年，当时雅克·洛布（Jacques Loeb）在海胆卵中表现出人工孤苯二甲发生。直到1905年，当埃德温（Edwin）授予康克林（Conklin）首次鉴定出编程以形成某些组织或器官的卵细胞质区域；直到1916年，当弗兰克·拉特（Frank Rattray）鉴定出影响性别差异的循环激素时（Lillie，1944年）。在MBL的头二十年中，细胞学家Edmund Beecher Wilson，Nettie Stevens和其他人在染色体和Mendelian遗传之间建立了联系，而Wilson在MBL大学和哥伦比亚大学，Thomas Hunt Morgan的同事都启动了实验遗传学领域（Pauly，2000：158）。基思·R·波特（Keith R. Porter）被许多人认为是现代细胞生物学的创始人，因为他在包括细胞的精细结构上的开创性工作（包括发现微管的发现）在1937年开始在MBL上进行了研究，并从1975  -  77年开始指导实验室（Barlow等人，1993年：95-115）。

细胞理论导致生物学家将单个生物体作为单个细胞的相互依存组合重新启动。武装着越来越强大的显微镜和新的染色方法的细胞学领域的科学家很快发现，即使是单个细胞也比早期显微镜所描述的均匀的液体填充室更为复杂。罗伯特·布朗（Robert Brown）在1831年描述了细胞核，到19世纪末，细胞学家鉴定了许多关键细胞成分：染色体，线粒体线粒体，叶绿体和其他通过染色可见的结构。在1874年至1884年之间，沃尔瑟·弗莱明（Walther Flemming）描述了有丝分裂的离散阶段，表明它们不是染色的伪像，而是在活细胞中发生，此外，在细胞分裂和产生子细胞之前，染色体的数量翻了一番。关于细胞繁殖的大部分研究在八月魏斯曼的遗传理论中汇聚在一起：他将核（尤其是染色体）确定为遗传材料，提出了体细胞和生殖细胞之间的区别（认为必须将染色体数量减半，以使细胞的染色体数量减半，是对质生病的概念的前体），以及采用的Hugo de vered de veries debens pangen pangen pangen pangen sore pangen sore pangen sore sod pangen node pangen n of pangen。魏斯曼主义具有极大的影响力，尤其是在实验性胚胎学的新领域。
这些细胞首先是由卡尔·威廉·冯·库普弗（Karl Wilhelm von Kupffer）于1876年观察到的。科学家称它们为“ Sternzellen”（星细胞或肝星状细胞），但不准确地认为它们是肝血管内皮的组成部分，它们是起源于其起源的。经过数年的研究，塔德斯·布罗维兹（Tadeusz Browicz）在1898年正确地将它们确定为巨噬细胞。

陆克文对控制T细胞免疫的细胞内信号的理解产生了重大影响。 RUDD是第一个发现细胞内蛋白激酶与表面受体相互作用，从而产生细胞内蛋白 - 酪氨酸磷酸化级联反应，这是通过鉴定T细胞共受体CD4的相互作用CD4（也是人类免疫缺陷病毒，HIV病毒，HIV和HIV的受体），HIV-1）和CD8 on T-Cells on T-Cells on T-Cells in T-Cells propyein-tylc kincase p56 p56。他的发现为正常细胞信号传导中原癌基因PP60SRC激酶家族成员的作用提供了第一个示例。后来发现其他受体使用与SRC相关的激酶来调节细胞生长。在免疫学方面，CD4和CD8-P56LCK复合物现在被广泛接受为T细胞激活的启动器，从而导致募集了第二个酪氨酸激酶ZAP-70，该酪氨酸激酶ZAP-70控制T细胞对响应对外国病原体，外国病原体，外国病原体和癌细胞Neo-neo-andigens的能力。

威廉·格罗夫（William Grove）于1839年生产了第一个燃料电池。他的实验是基于以下事实，即通过水将水拆分为氢和氧气的成分部分。因此，格罗夫（Grove）试图逆转反应 - 将氢和氧气结合起来，以产生电力和水。最终，“燃料电池”一词是由路德维希·蒙德（Ludwig Mond）和查尔斯·兰格（Charles Langer）于1889年创造的，他们试图使用空气和工业煤气建造第一个实用设备。他还在1839年英国科学进步协会的年度会议上引入了强大的电池。格罗夫的第一个细胞由稀释的硫酸和浓含量的浓缩硝酸中的锌组成，由多孔锅分离。该电池能够以约1.8伏的速度生成约12座电流。该电池的电压几乎是第一个Daniell电池的两倍。格罗夫（Grove）的硝酸细胞是美国早期电报（1840-1860）最喜欢的电池，因为它提供了强大的电流输出。
多巴胺能细胞组是中枢神经系统中神经元的集合，可合成神经递质多巴胺。在1960年代，多巴胺神经元首先由AnnicaDahlström和使用组织化学荧光命名。随后发现编码多巴胺的酶的基因，以及将多巴胺掺入突触囊泡中或在突触释放后恢复的转运蛋白，使科学家能够通过标记特定于这些神经元的基因或蛋白质表达来识别多巴胺能神经元。

发展细胞理论的信用通常给两个科学家：Theodor Schwann和Matthias Jakob Schleiden。尽管鲁道夫·维尔琴（Rudolf Virchow）为这一理论做出了贡献，但他并不因其对此而受到赞誉。 1839年，施莱登（Schleiden）提出，植物的每个结构部分都是由细胞或细胞的结果组成的。他还建议细胞是通过其他细胞内或外部的结晶过程制成的。但是，这不是施莱登的原始想法。尽管巴特莱米·杜莫蒂尔（Barthelemy Dumortier）在他之前说过这一点，但他声称这一理论是他自己的。现代细胞理论不再接受这种结晶过程。 1839年，西奥多·施旺（Theodor Schwann）指出，与植物一起，动物由细胞或结构中细胞的产物组成。这是生物学领域的重大进步，因为与植物相比，至今对动物结构知之甚少。从有关动植物的这些结论中，假设了细胞理论的三个原则中的两个。
report_src: 最早确定并命名“细胞”的人是英国科学家罗伯特·胡克，他在17世纪利用改进的显微镜观察软木切片时发现蜂窝状结构，并首次将其称为 cell（细胞）[1]。

question_en: Where are digestive enzymes found in the body?
pos_context_en: Digestive enzymes are a group of enzymes that break down polymeric macromolecules into their smaller building blocks, in order to facilitate their absorption by the body. Digestive enzymes are found in the digestive tracts of animals (including humans) and in the traps of carnivorous plants, where they aid in the digestion of food, as well as inside cells, especially in their lysosomes, where they function to maintain cellular survival. Digestive enzymes of diverse specificities are found in the saliva secreted by the salivary glands, in the secretions of cells lining
neg_context_en: The planarian has very simple organ systems. The digestive system consists of a mouth, pharynx, and a gastrovascular cavity. The mouth is located in the center of the underside of the body. Digestive enzymes are secreted from the mouth to begin external digestion. The pharynx connects the mouth to the gastrovascular cavity. This structure branches throughout the body allowing nutrients from food to reach all extremities. Planaria eat living or dead small animals that they suck up with their muscular mouths. Food passes from the mouth through the pharynx into the intestines where it is digested by the cells lining the intestines. Then its nutrients diffuse to the rest of the planaria.

Extracellular digestion is a process in which saprobionts feed by secreting enzymes through the cell membrane onto the food. The enzymes catalyze the digestion of the food into molecules small enough to be taken up by passive diffusion, transport, or phagocytosis. Since digestion occurs outside the cell, it is said to be extracellular. It takes place either in the lumen of the digestive system, in a gastric cavity or other digestive organ, or completely outside the body.

Most molluscs have a complete digestive system with a separate mouth and anus. The mouth leads into a short esophagus which leads to a stomach. Associated with the stomach are one or more digestive glands or digestive caeca. Digestive enzymes are secreted into the lumen of these glands. Additional extracellular digestion takes place in the stomach. In cephalopods, digestion is entirely extracellular. In the most other mollusks, the terminal stages of digestion are completed intracellularly, within the tissue of the digestive glands. The absorbed nutrients enter the circulatory system for distribution throughout the body or are stored in the digestive glands for later use. Undigested waste pass through an intestine and out through the anus. Other aspects of food collection and processing have already been discussed where appropriate for each group.

The digestive tract begins slightly behind the head, the mouth lying on the underside a little way from the frontmost point of the body. Here, prey can be mechanically dismembered by the mandibles with their covering of fine toothlets. Two salivary glands discharge via a common conductor into the subsequent "throat", which makes up the first part of the front intestine. The saliva that they produce contains mucus and hydrolytic enzymes, which initiate in and outside the mouth digestion. Historically, the salivary glands probably evolved from the waste-elimination organs known as nephridia, which are found homologously in the other body segments. The throat itself is very muscular, serving to absorb the partially liquified food and to pump it, via the oesophagus, which forms the rear part of the front intestine, into the central intestine. Unlike the front intestine, this is not lined with a cuticula but instead consists only of a single layer of epithelial tissue, which does not exhibit conspicuous indentation as is found in other animals. On entering the central intestine, food particles are coated with a mucus-based peritrophic membrane, which serves to protect the lining of the intestine from damage by sharp-edged particles. The intestinal epithelium secretes further digestive enzymes and absorbs the released nutrients, although the majority of digestion has already taken place externally or in the mouth. Indigestible remnants arrive in the rear intestine, or rectum, which is once again lined with a cuticula and which opens at the anus, located on the underside near to the rear end.

One example of glycoproteins found in the body is mucins, which are secreted in the mucus of the respiratory and digestive tracts. The sugars when attached to mucins give them considerable water-holding capacity and also make them resistant to proteolysis by digestive enzymes.

There are also enzymes (enterocyte digestive enzyme) on the surface for digestion. Villus capillaries collect amino acids and simple sugars taken up by the villi into the blood stream. Villus lacteals (lymph capillary) collect absorbed chylomicrons, which are lipoproteins composed of triglycerides, cholesterol and amphipathic proteins, and are taken to the rest of the body through the lymph fluid.

Where there is a failure to produce, release, or convert trypsinogen—an inactive enzyme precursor or zymogen—muscle fibres are not properly digested and are therefore released in the feces. Trypsinogen is produced in the pancreas and released into the alimentary canal where it is converted to the active enzyme trypsin.
Inflammation of the pancreas, or pancreatitis can therefore precipitate this condition, as can cystic fibrosis which also affects the production of digestive enzymes.

Chewing, in which food is mixed with saliva, begins the mechanical process of digestion. This produces a bolus which can be swallowed down the esophagus to enter the stomach. Here it is mixed with gastric acid until it passes into the duodenum where it is mixed with a number of enzymes produced by the pancreas. Saliva also contains a catalytic enzyme called amylase which starts to act on food in the mouth. Another digestive enzyme called lingual lipase is secreted by some of the lingual papillae on the tongue and also from serous glands in the main salivary glands. Digestion is helped by the chewing of food carried out by the muscles of mastication, by the teeth, and also by the contractions of peristalsis, and segmentation. Gastric acid, and the production of mucus in the stomach, are essential for the continuation of digestion.

The pylorus, the lowest section of the stomach which attaches to the duodenum via the pyloric canal, contains countless glands which secrete digestive enzymes including gastrin. After an hour or two, a thick semi-liquid called chyme is produced. When the pyloric sphincter, or valve opens, chyme enters the duodenum where it mixes further with digestive enzymes from the pancreas, and then passes through the small intestine, where digestion continues. When the chyme is fully digested, it is absorbed into the blood. 95% of absorption of nutrients occurs in the small intestine. Water and minerals are reabsorbed back into the blood in the colon of the large intestine, where the environment is slightly acidic. Some vitamins, such as biotin and vitamin K produced by bacteria in the gut flora of the colon are also absorbed.
question_src: 体内发现的消化酶在哪里？
pos_context_src: 消化酶是一组酶，它们将聚合物大分子分解为其较小的构件，以促进其体内吸收。在动物的消化道（包括人）和食肉植物的陷阱中发现了消化酶，它们有助于食物的消化以及内部细胞，尤其是在其溶酶体中，在这些溶酶体中，它们的作用以维持细胞存活。在唾液腺分泌的唾液中发现了各种特异性的消化酶，
neg_context_src: Planarian具有非常简单的器官系统。消化系统由口腔，咽部和胃血管腔组成。嘴位于身体底面的中心。消化酶从口腔中分泌，以开始外部消化。咽部将口腔连接到胃血管腔。该结构在整个人体中分支，允许食物中的营养到达所有末端。 Planaria吃活着或死的小动物，它们用肌肉嘴巴吮吸。食物通过咽部从口腔传递到肠道，在肠道上被肠内衬里的细胞消化。然后，其营养物质扩散到了平面的其余部分。
细胞外消化是一个过程，在该过程中，通过将酶通过细胞膜分泌到食物中，腐生剂供出酶。这些酶将食物的消化催化成足够小的分子，以通过被动扩散，转运或吞噬作用来吸收。由于消化发生在细胞外，因此据说是细胞外的。它发生在消化系统的腔内，胃腔或其他消化器官，或者完全在体内。

大多数软体动物具有一个完整的消化系统，带有单独的嘴和肛门。嘴会导致短食的短食，导致胃。与胃相关的是一个或多个消化腺或消化闭经。消化酶分泌到这些腺体的腔内。胃中发生其他细胞外消化。在头足动物中，消化完全是细胞外的。在大多数其他软体动物中，消化的消化末端阶段在消化腺组织内完成。吸收的营养成分进入循环系统，以在整个人体中分布或存储在消化腺体中，以供以后使用。未消除的废物通过肠道并通过肛门。在适合每个组的情况下，已经讨论了食物收集和加工的其他方面。

消化道从头部后面略微开始，嘴巴从身体的最前点稍微伸向底面。在这里，下颌骨可以机械地肢解猎物，并覆盖优质的牙齿。两个唾液腺通过公共导体排放到随后的“喉咙”中，这构成了前肠的第一部分。它们产生的唾液中含有粘液和水解酶，它们在口腔消化内外启动。从历史上看，唾液腺可能是从被称为肾脏的废物灭绝器官演变而来的，这些器官在另一个体段中是同源的。喉咙本身非常肌肉发达，可以吸收部分液化的食物，并通过食管形成前肠的后部，将其吸收到中央肠中。与前肠不同，它不衬有表囊，而仅由单层上皮组织组成，该组织不会像其他动物那样表现出显着的压痕。进入中央肠道后，食物颗粒涂有基于粘液的营养膜，该膜可保护肠的内膜免受锋利的颗粒的损害。肠上皮分泌进一步的消化酶并吸收释放的营养素，尽管大部分消化已经发生在外部或口腔中。不可消化的残余物到达后肠或直肠，该直肠再次衬有表皮，并在肛门上打开，肛门位于底部附近的底部。
体内发现的糖蛋白的一个例子是粘蛋白，粘蛋白分泌在呼吸道和消化道的粘液中。当糖附着在粘蛋白上时，糖会使它们具有相当大的水含量，并使它们通过消化酶抗性。
表面上也有酶（肠肠细胞消化酶）进行消化。绒毛毛细血管收集氨基酸和绒毛吸收的简单糖进入血液。绒毛（淋巴毛细血管）收集吸收的乳糜微粒，这些吸收性是由脂蛋白组成的脂蛋白，由甘油三酸酯，胆固醇和两亲性蛋白质组成，并通过淋巴液将其带到身体的其余部分。

如果无法生产，释放或转化胰蛋白酶原（一种无活性酶的前体或Zymogen），则没有适当地消化肌纤维，因此在粪便中释放。胰蛋白酶原是在胰腺中产生的，并释放到消化道中，并将其转化为活性酶胰蛋白酶。
因此，胰腺或胰腺炎的炎症会导致这种情况，囊性纤维化也会影响消化酶的产生。

食物与唾液混合的咀嚼开始了消化的机械过程。这会产生一个推注，可以吞下食道进入胃。在这里，它与胃酸混合，直到它进入十二指肠，并将其与胰腺产生的许多酶混合。唾液还含有一种称为淀粉酶的催化酶，该酶开始作用于口腔中的食物。另一种称为舌脂肪酶的消化酶是由舌头上的一些舌乳头分泌的，也由主要唾液腺中的浆液腺分泌。消化是通过咀嚼肌肉，牙齿以及蠕动和分割的收缩来帮助消化的。胃酸和胃中粘液的产生对于继续消化至关重要。

幽门是胃的最低部分，该胃通过幽门口附着在十二指肠上，含有无数的腺体，这些腺体分泌包括胃蛋白在内的消化酶。一两个小时后，产生了一个厚的半液体，称为Chyme。当幽门括约肌或阀门打开时，Chyme进入十二指肠，它与胰腺中的消化酶进一步混合，然后穿过小肠，消化继续进行。当辣椒完全消化时，它会被吸收到血液中。养分吸收的95％发生在小肠中。水和矿物质被重新吸收到大肠结肠的血液中，那里的环境略微酸。一些维生素，例如在结肠的肠道菌群中产生的细菌产生的生物素和维生素K，也被吸收。
report_src: 体内的消化酶主要分布在动物（包括人类）的消化道，用于将食物大分子降解成易吸收的小分子[1]；它们也随唾液腺分泌的唾液释放，在口腔阶段即开始作用[1]；此外，细胞内部的溶酶体同样含有消化酶，用以分解细胞内物质并维持细胞存活[1]。

question_en: What is the largest international backgammon organization?
pos_context_en: The World Backgammon Association (WBA) has been holding the biggest backgammon Tour of the circuit since 2007, the "European Backgammon Tour" (EBGT). In 2011, the WBA collaborated with the online backgammon provider Play65 for the 2011 season of the European Backgammon Tour and with "Betfair" in 2012. The 2013 season of the European Backgammon Tour featured 11 stops and 19 qualified players competing for 19,000 € in a Grand Finale in Lefkosa, Northern Cyprus. WBA also staged the "US Open" and other events around the globe. WBA has contributed to a high-stakes event called "Crowns Cup" broadcast on several TV-channels.
neg_context_en: By the 21st century, the largest international tournaments had established the basis of a tour for top professional players. Major tournaments are held yearly worldwide. PartyGaming sponsored the first World Series of Backgammon in 2006 from Cannes and later the 'Backgammon Million' tournament held in the Bahamas in January 2007 with a prize pool of one million dollars, the largest for any tournament to date. In 2008, the World Series of Backgammon ran the world's largest international events in London, the UK Masters, the biggest tournament ever held in the UK with 128 international class players; the Nordic Open, which instantly became the largest in the world with around 500 players in all flights and 153 in the Championship, and Cannes, which hosted the Riviera Cup, the traditional follow-up tournament to the World Championships. Cannes also hosted the WSOB Championship, the WSOB finale, which saw 16 players play three-point shootout matches for €160,000. The event was recorded for television in Europe airing on Eurosport.

Beginning in the mid-1960s, the popularity of Backgammon surged, in part due to the charisma of Prince Alexis Obolensky, who was known as “The Father of Modern Backgammon”. "Obe", as he was called by friends, co-founded the International Backgammon Association which published a set of official rules. He also established the World Backgammon Club of Manhattan, devised a backgammon tournament system in 1963, then organized the first major international Backgammon tournament in March, 1964 which attracted royalty, celebrities and the paparazzi. The game became a huge fad and was played on college campuses, in discothèques and at country clubs; stockbrokers and bankers began playing at conservative men's clubs. Cigarette, liquor and car companies began to sponsor tournaments and Hugh Hefner held backgammon parties at the Playboy Mansion.

The popularity of backgammon surged in the mid-1960s, in part due to the charisma of Prince Alexis Obolensky who became known as "The Father of Modern Backgammon". "Obe", as he was called by friends, co-founded the International Backgammon Association, which published a set of official rules. He also established the World Backgammon Club of Manhattan, devised a backgammon tournament system in 1963, then organized the first major international backgammon tournament in March, 1964, which attracted royalty, celebrities and the press. The game became a huge fad and was played on college campuses, in discothèques and at country clubs; stockbrokers and bankers began playing at conservative men's clubs. People young and old all across the country dusted off their boards and checkers. Cigarette, liquor and car companies began to sponsor tournaments and Hugh Hefner held backgammon parties at the Playboy Mansion. Backgammon clubs were formed and tournaments were held, resulting in a World Championship promoted in Las Vegas in 1967.

In October 2011 World Series of Backgammon announced a partnership with the largest online gaming operator in the world, Bwin.com, for online backgammon creating bwin.com/wsob to provide an online tour with a lower buy-in to attract all levels of players. The new tour mimics the major live tournaments run by WSOB and includes a series of events, a points race and the WSOB Championship. The WSOB Champion wins the coveted Gold Cube® and an official backgammon board made by Geoffrey Parker Games and worth apparently €2400.

World Series of Backgammon (WSOB) is a major televised live tour. The television shows capture the match action, jeopardy and background around some of the world’s largest backgammon tournaments, and have broadcast throughout Europe on Eurosport 1 and 2 whilst being distributed worldwide by ESPN International.

The first contemporary ex-gay ministry, Love in Action, was formed in 1973. Three years later, with other ex-gay organizations, it formed Exodus International, the largest ex-gay organization and the largest organization under the Exodus Global Alliance. In June 2013, the Exodus board decided to cease operations, with president Alan Chambers apologizing for the pain and hurt the group had caused and saying that he no longer believed sexual orientation could be changed. Chambers apologized for what he identified as regrettable techniques, and the narrow message of a cure and marriage rather than a relationship with Christ for all. Shortly after, Chambers and his wife started Speak.Love., an organisation for promoting conversations on sexual orientation for all. In September 2014, Speak.Love. was merged into Chambers' personal website. Exodus Global Alliance, however, no longer affiliated with Exodus International, has continued operations.

Season II, 2008, expanded to events in London - the UK Masters saw a 128 draw in the main event, the largest backgammon event held in the UK for 30 years; the world's largest event, the Nordic Open joined the WSOB tour for the first time and saw the Championship field increase from 78 to 153 players and finally on the 08 tour, WSOB Cannes, which recorded 155 Championship players, second only to the World Championships. The television series expanded to 15 hours and saw superstar poker and backgammon player Gus Hansen join John Clark in the commentary box. New Yorker Jessie Cantrell hosted with further contributions from experts Sander Lylloff, Falafel Natanzon and Morten Holm.

The most prominent organization of Browns fans is the "Browns Backers Worldwide" (BBW). The organization has approximately 305,000 members and Browns Backers clubs can be found in every major city in the United States, and in a number of military bases throughout the world, with the largest club being in Phoenix, Arizona. In addition, the organization has a sizable foreign presence in places as far away as Egypt, Australia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and McMurdo Station in Antarctica. According to The Official Fan Club of the Cleveland Browns, the two largest international fan clubs are in Alon Shvut, West Bank and Niagara, Canada, with Alon Shvut having 129 members and Niagara having 310.

The International Jugglers' Association or IJA is the world's oldest and largest nonprofit circus organization, and is open to members worldwide. It was founded in the United States in 1947, with the goal of providing, "an organization for jugglers that would provide meetings at regular intervals in an atmosphere of mutual friendship." Though its focus lies on juggling, its programs also support other circus disciplines.
question_src: 什么是最大的国际巴蒙组织？
pos_context_src: 自2007年以来，世界近卫协会（WBA）一直在举行最大的赛道巡回赛巡回赛，即“欧洲反登山巡回赛”（EBGT）。 2011年，WBA与在线Backmmon提供商Play65合作，参加了2011年的欧洲反登山巡回赛，并在2012年与“ Betfair”合作。2013赛季的欧洲反登山巡回赛赛季有11个站和19名合格的球员在北塞浦路斯列夫科萨（Lefkosa）的大结局中竞争19,000欧元。 WBA还举办了“美国公开赛”和全球其他活动。 WBA为一场名为“ Crowns Cup”的高风险活动做出了贡献。
neg_context_src: 到21世纪，最大的国际比赛已经为顶级专业球员巡回演出的基础。大型比赛每年举行。派对录取派对2006年的戛纳电影节（Cannes）的第一场世界赛车大赛，后来又赞助了2007年1月在巴哈马举行的“ Backgammon Million”锦标赛，其奖金为100万美元，是迄今为止任何比赛中最大的奖金。 2008年，世界近场的世界大赛在伦敦举办了世界上最大的国际赛事，英国大师赛是英国有史以来最大的锦标赛，拥有128个国际班级球员；北欧公开赛立即成为世界上最大的球员，在所有航班中大约有500名球员，在冠军赛中有153名球员，而戛纳（Cannes）举办了里维埃拉杯（Riviera Cup），这是世界锦标赛的传统后续比赛。戛纳电影节还举办了WSOB冠军，WSOB结局，16名球员以160,000欧元的成绩进行了三分枪战。该活动是在欧洲播出的欧洲电视台录制的。

从1960年代中期开始，巴蒙的普及迅速涌现，部分原因是亚历克西斯·奥伯伦斯基王子的魅力，后者被称为“现代野马的父亲”。 “ OBE”被朋友称为“ OBE”，共同创立了国际近卫协会，该协会发布了一系列官方规则。他还建立了曼哈顿世界近卫俱乐部，于1963年设计了一个反登山锦标赛系统，随后组织了1964年3月的首场国际野外主要锦标赛，吸引了皇室，名人和狗仔队。这场比赛变成了巨大的时尚，并在大学校园，迪斯科郡和乡村俱乐部进行了比赛。股票经纪人和银行家开始在保守派男子俱乐部玩。香烟，酒和汽车公司开始赞助比赛，休·赫夫纳（Hugh Hefner）在花花公子的豪宅举行了野药聚会。

在1960年代中期，巴蒙（Backgmon）的普及涌动，部分原因是亚历克西斯·奥伯伦斯基（Alexis Obolensky）王子的魅力被称为“现代野马之父”。正如他被朋友称为“ OBE”，共同创立了国际巴蒙（International Backmon Association），该协会发布了一系列官方规则。他还建立了曼哈顿世界近卫俱乐部，于1963年设计了一个反蒙比赛系统，然后在1964年3月举办了首场主要的国际野马锦标赛，吸引了皇室，名人和新闻界。这场比赛变成了巨大的时尚，并在大学校园，迪斯科郡和乡村俱乐部进行了比赛。股票经纪人和银行家开始在保守派男子俱乐部玩。全国各地的年轻人和老年都从木板和跳棋中撒了粉。香烟，酒和汽车公司开始赞助比赛，休·赫夫纳（Hugh Hefner）在花花公子的豪宅举行了野药聚会。成立了野马俱乐部并举行了比赛，导致1967年在拉斯维加斯举行的世界锦标赛。

2011年10月，Backgammon的世界大赛宣布与世界上最大的在线游戏运营商BWIN.com建立合作伙伴关系，用于在线Backgammon创建BWIN.com/WSOB，以提供在线巡回演出，以较低的买入来吸引所有级别的玩家。新的巡回赛模仿了由WSOB举办的主要现场比赛，其中包括一系列赛事，积分竞赛和WSOB冠军。 WSOB冠军赢得了令人垂涎的GoldCube®和杰弗里·帕克（Geoffrey Parker Games）制作的官方backmon董事会，显然价值2400欧元。
Backmon（WSOB）世界大赛是一次主要的电视实时巡回演出。电视节目捕捉了世界上一些最大的野马锦标赛的比赛，危险和背景，并在Eurosport 1和2上播放了整个欧洲的播放，而ESPN International则在全球范围内分发。

1973年，第一个当代前同性恋部的爱情行动。 2013年6月，出埃及记委员会决定停止行动，总统艾伦·钱伯斯（Alan Chambers）为该组织造成的痛苦道歉，并说他不再相信可以改变性取向。钱伯斯（Chambers）为他所确定的令人遗憾的技巧以及治愈和婚姻的狭窄信息而不是与基督的关系而道歉。不久之后，钱伯斯和他的妻子开始了Speak.love。 2014年9月，Speak.love。被合并到钱伯斯的个人网站。然而，出埃及前全球联盟不再隶属于Exodus International，一直在继续运营。

2008年第二季扩展到伦敦的活动 - 英国大师赛在主要赛事中获得了128次抽奖，这是在英国举行的最大的反登蒙赛事，已有30年了；这是世界上最大的赛事，北欧公开赛首次参加了WSOB巡回赛，看到冠军​​领域从78名球员增加到153名球员，最后在08巡回赛上，WSOB Cannes录制了155名冠军球员，仅次于世界冠军。电视连续剧扩展到15个小时，看到超级巨星扑克和backmon Player Gus Hansen加入了John Clark的评论框。纽约客杰西·坎特雷尔（Jessie Cantrell）主持了专家桑德·莱洛夫（Sand Lylloff），法拉菲尔·纳坦松（Falafel Natanzon）和莫顿·霍尔姆（Morten Holm）的进一步贡献。

布朗球迷最杰出的组织是“全球布朗支持者”（BBW）。该组织在美国的每个主要城市都可以找到大约305,000名成员和棕色支持者俱乐部，在世界各地的许多军事基地中，最大的俱乐部在亚利桑那州凤凰城。此外，该组织在远离南极洲的埃及，澳大利亚，日本，斯里兰卡和麦克穆尔多站的地方都有相当大的外国存在。根据克利夫兰布朗队的官方粉丝俱乐部的说法，两个最大的国际球迷俱乐部位于加拿大西岸和尼亚加拉的阿隆·施瓦特（Alon Shvut）和加拿大尼亚加拉（Niagara），而阿隆·施瓦特（Alon Shvut）有129名成员，尼亚加拉（Niagara）拥有310名。
国际杂耍者协会或IJA是世界上最古老，最大的非营利马戏团组织，并向全球成员开放。它于1947年在美国成立，目的是“为杂耍者提供一个组织，该组织将在相互友谊的气氛中定期提供会议。”尽管其重点在于杂耍，但其计划也支持其他马戏团学科。
