Because of the exceptionally high salinity, comparable to the Dead Sea, it has practically no marine vegetation. Large evaporite, mostly salt deposits accumulated at the south shore were harvested by the local population since the 1920s, but in the 1930s manual collection stopped and the industry shifted northwest to its present center near Garabogaz. From the 1950s on, ground water was pumped from levels lower than the bay itself, yielding more valuable types of salts. In 1963 construction began at Garabogaz on a modern plant for increased production of salines, all the year round and independently of natural evaporation. This plant was completed in 1973.
In March 1980, the barrier to the Caspian was blocked, due to concerns evaporation was accelerating a fall in Caspian Sea level, reducing water levels. The resulting "salt bowl" caused widespread problems of blowing salt, reportedly poisoning the soil and causing health problems for hundreds of kilometers downwind to the east. In 1984 the lake was completely dry. In June 1992, when Caspian Sea levels were rising again, the barrier was breached, allowing Caspian water to again refill Garabogazköl. The remnants of the breached dam can be seen in the satellite photo of the inlet, near the Caspian Sea entrance.

The Caspian Sea, like the Black Sea, Namak Lake, and Lake Urmia, is a remnant of the ancient Paratethys Sea. It became landlocked about 5.5 million years ago due to tectonic uplift and a fall in sea level. During warm and dry climatic periods, the landlocked sea almost dried up, depositing evaporitic sediments like halite that were covered by wind-blown deposits and were sealed off as an evaporite sink when cool, wet climates refilled the basin. (Comparable evaporite beds underlie the Mediterranean.) Due to the current inflow of fresh water, the Caspian Sea is a freshwater lake in its northern portions, and is most saline on the Iranian shore, where the catchment basin contributes little flow. Currently, the mean salinity of the Caspian is one third that of Earth's oceans. The Garabogazköl embayment, which dried up when water flow from the main body of the Caspian was blocked in the 1980s but has since been restored, routinely exceeds oceanic salinity by a factor of 10.

The species is distributed throughout brackish and fresh waters of the Ponto-Caspian basin. It is found in the Caspian Sea, the Sea of Azov, rivers Volga, Don, Kuban and Danube; in the rivers up to over 500 km upstream. All the previous mentionings of "P. baeri" outside the Caspian Sea should probably be attributed to "P. bakuensis". The ranges of "P. bakuensis" and "P. baeri" partly overlap: they can be found together in the Caspian Sea.

Neogobius pallasi, the Caspian sand goby or the Caspian monkey goby, is a species of fish native to fresh and brackish waters of the Caspian Sea basin including the Volga drainage up to the vicinity of Moscow. It has been introduced into the Aral basin. This species of goby can reach a length of SL. It is also important to local commercial fisheries.

The main factors are the advance or recession of the Scandinavian glacier and the isostatic sinking of the landforms due to the weight of ice or isostatic rebound (springing back) when relieved of it. The glacier provides a massive flow of fresh water. Salt water enters from the North Sea through straits when the sea level is high enough to allow reverse flow over the sill. When the straits are above sea level or close to sea level, fresh water will accumulate and a lake forms. Fresh water will accumulate to levels substantially higher than sea level when the sills are substantially above sea level. The release of fresh water from the glaciers depends on climate; the presence or absence of entrances to the ocean depends on land rise and oceanic water level; the latter of course is also affected by the amount of ice held in glaciers worldwide.

Irrigation agriculture has been one of the primary economic mainstays of the lower Kura valley since ancient times. Because of water taken out for irrigation use, up to 20% of the water that formerly flowed in the river no longer reaches the Caspian Sea. Over 70% of the water in the Iori (Gabirry) River, a major tributary of the Kura, is expended before it reaches Lake Mingachevir. Of the of agricultural land in the lower Kura River watershed, , about 31%, are irrigated. Much of the water diverted from the river for irrigation goes to waste because of leakage from the canals, evaporation, poor maintenance, and other causes. Leaking water causes groundwater to rise, in some areas so high that about of land are so waterlogged that they are no longer suitable for agriculture. About of the irrigated lands have a dangerously high salt content because of mineral deposits from irrigation. Of this, are extremely salinated. Irrigation return water, returned to the river by an extensive but outdated drainage system, contributes to severe pollution. Some of this degradation also comes from industrial and municipal wastewater discharge.

Differences between the three regions are dramatic. The Northern Caspian only includes the Caspian shelf, and is very shallow; it accounts for less than 1% of the total water volume with an average depth of only . The sea noticeably drops off towards the Middle Caspian, where the average depth is . The Southern Caspian is the deepest, with oceanic depths of over , greatly exceeding the depth of other regional seas, such as the Persian Gulf. The Middle and Southern Caspian account for 33% and 66% of the total water volume, respectively. The northern portion of the Caspian Sea typically freezes in the winter, and in the coldest winters ice forms in the south as well.

, negotiations related to the demarcation of the Caspian Sea had been going on for nearly a decade among the states bordering the Caspian – Azerbaijan, Russia, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, and Iran. The status of the Caspian Sea is the key problem. Access to mineral resources (oil and natural gas), access for fishing, and access to international waters (through Russia's Volga river and the canals connecting it to the Black Sea and Baltic Sea) all depend upon the outcomes of negotiations. Access to the Volga River is particularly important for the landlocked states of Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, and Turkmenistan. This concerns Russia, because the potential traffic would use its inland waterways. If a body of water is labelled as a sea, then there would be some precedents and international treaties obliging the granting of access permits to foreign vessels. If a body of water is labelled merely as a lake, then there are no such obligations. Environmental issues are also somewhat connected to the status and borders issue.
question_src: 里海是海盐水还是淡水？
pos_context_src: 黑海最初是一个陆上锁定的淡水湖，在全新世期间从地中海淹没了盐水。由于缺乏内部运动和混合，盐水的涌入基本上使淡水窒息，这意味着没有新鲜的氧气到达深水，从而产生了一大堆水。这种缺氧环境对许多破坏含氧水域的木材的生物生物具有敌意，为深水考古调查提供了一个极好的测试地点。
neg_context_src: 该国的淡水盆地和里海占97种鱼类，其中有8种，其中有七种已变得广泛，阿塞拜疆的无脊椎动物已广泛，超过15,000种无脊椎动物。大多数可以在库拉河，周围的湖泊以及Mingechevir水库中找到。大多数鱼是厌氧或半斑点（年轻人在盐水中长大，并在成熟后迁移到淡水中繁殖）。最有价值的动物鱼是鲑鱼，st鱼，stellate st鱼和蓝牙。 Aspius，Chalcalburnus和Eel也是动物的鱼。 st鱼肉和鱼子酱非常有价值。除此之外，阿塞拜疆的水盆含有诸如Bream，Sazan，Rutilus Kutum等的有价值的鱼类。鲱鱼等鱼类在里海中被捕鱼。由于1959年之后在库拉河上建造了许多水力技术植物，因此对河流流量的调节以及里海污染导致了有价值的鱼类数量的显着减少。发射了三个孵化场（Kuragzi，Alibayramli和Kur实验性st鱼孵化场），用于融化和鱼类养殖目的，以恢复鱼类储量并增加物种中的鱼类数量。阿塞拜疆的鱼类农业机构和孵化场造成了2000万st鱼，60万萨尔蒙，超过80万。 2000年，克里利（Khyly）投入了一个具有2000万st鱼的新孵化场。

与里海的1.2％相比，海湾的盐度约为35％，世界上大部分海洋的盐度为35％。由于盐度异常高，与死海相当，因此几乎没有海洋植被。自1920年代以来，当地人口收获了大量的蒸发岩，主要是在南岸积累的盐矿床，但在1930年代，手动收集停止了，该行业将西北转移到了Garabogaz附近的现在中心。从1950年代开始，地下水是从低于海湾本身的水平中抽水，产生了更多有价值的盐。 1963年，建筑始于现代植物的Garabogaz，全年，全年都独立于自然蒸发。该工厂于1973年完成。
1980年3月，由于担心蒸发的速度正在加速中国海平面下降，从而降低了水位，因此中海的障碍被封锁。由此产生的“盐碗”引起了吹盐的广泛问题，据说使土壤中毒并造成了数百公里的健康问题。 1984年，该湖完全干燥。 1992年6月，当里海层再次上升时，障碍物被破坏，使里海水再次重新加入Garabogazköl。在里海入口附近的入口卫星照片中可以看到破坏水坝的残余物。

里海，像黑海，纳马克湖和乌尔米亚湖一样，是古老的副养老院海的残余。由于构造隆起和海平面下降，它大约550万年前被内陆。在温暖而干燥的气候时期，内陆的海洋几乎干燥，沉积蒸发沉积物（如halite），这些沉积物被吹风的沉积物覆盖，并在凉爽，潮湿的气候重新装满盆地时被散布的蒸发沉积物。 （可比的蒸发床是地中海的基础。）由于目前的淡水流入，Caspian Sea是其北部地区的淡水湖，在伊朗海岸上是盐水中最多的盐水，那里的集水区盆地几乎没有贡献。目前，里海的平均盐度是地球海洋的三分之一。 Garabogazköl胚胎在1980年代从里海的主体流动时干燥，但此后恢复了，通常超过了海洋盐度10倍。
该物种分布在蓬托 - 卡斯帕斯盆地的咸咸水和新鲜水域中。它在里海，阿佐夫海，河流伏尔加河，唐，库班和多瑙河中发现。在河流中，上游可达500公里以上。先前对里海海外“ P. Baeri”的所有提及都应该归因于“ Bakuensis”。 “ Bakuensis”和“ P. Baeri”的范围部分重叠：可以在里海中找到它们。
尼戈比乌斯·帕拉西（Neogobius Pallasi）是里海山（Caspian Sand Goby）或里海猴子戈比（Caspian Monkey Goby），是一种被海盗盆地新鲜和咸淡水域的鱼类，包括沃尔加排水系统，直到莫斯科附近。它已被引入Aral盆地。这种Goby物种可以达到SL的长度。这对于当地的商业渔业也很重要。

主要因素是斯堪的纳维亚冰川的前进或衰退以及由于冰或等静力反弹的重量而导致地面的等静力沉没（后退）。冰川提供大量的淡水流。当海平面高足够高以使窗台上的流动时，盐水从北海进入海峡。当海峡高于海平面或靠近海平面时，淡水将积聚并形成湖泊。当窗台基本上高于海平面时，淡水将积累到高于海平面的水平。从冰川中释放淡水取决于气候。海洋入口的存在或不存在取决于土地上升和海洋水位；当然，后者还受到全球冰川冰的冰量的影响。

自古以来，灌溉农业一直是下库拉河谷的主要经济支柱之一。由于用水用于灌溉，多达20％的以前流入河流的水不再到达里海。在到达Mingachevir湖之前，已经花了超过70％的水（Gabirry）河（Gabirry）河（Gabirry）河。下部库拉河流域的农业土地约为31％。由于运河泄漏，蒸发，维护不良和其他原因，从河中转移的大部分水都浪费了。泄漏的水会导致地下水上升，在某些地区如此之高，以至于土地大约被水淹没，以至于它们不再适合农业。由于灌溉的矿物质沉积物，大约在灌溉土地上具有危险的高盐含量。其中，非常生盐。灌溉返回水，通过广泛但过时的排水系统返回河流，造成了严重的污染。这种退化中的一些也来自工业和市政废水的排放。
这三个区域之间的差异是戏剧性的。北部里海只包括里海架，非常浅。它的平均深度仅为总水量的1％。海洋明显地朝着平均深度所在的中海里士安（Caspian）下降。南部里海是最深的，海洋深度大大超过了其他地区海域的深度，例如波斯湾。中海中部和南部分别占总水量的33％和66％。里海的北部通常在冬天冻结，在南部最冷的冬季也形成了冰形。

，与里海的划分有关的谈判已经进行了将近十年的时间，与加西亚人接壤 - 阿塞拜疆，俄罗斯，哈萨克斯坦，土库曼斯坦和伊朗。里海的地位是关键问题。获取矿产资源（石油和天然气），捕鱼的通道以及进入国际水域（通过俄罗斯的伏尔加河和连接到黑海和波罗的海的运河）都取决于谈判的结果。对于阿塞拜疆，哈萨克斯坦和土库曼斯坦的内陆国家而言，通往伏尔加河尤为重要。这涉及俄罗斯，因为潜在的交通将使用其内陆水道。如果将水尸体标记为海洋，那么将有一些先例和国际条约，要求向外国船只授予访问许可证。如果仅将水标记为湖泊，则没有这样的义务。环境问题也与状态和边界问题有所联系。
report_src: 里海是世界最大的封闭型内陆咸水湖，其水体属“半咸水”——盐度明显高于普通淡水，却只有典型海水的约三分之一；整体平均盐度约为12–13‰，但空间差异很大：北部河流汇入区受伏尔加河等淡水补给，盐度低至1–5‰，几乎接近淡水；而南部盆地蒸发强烈、补水不足，盐度可达17‰以上。

question_en: When was Eugene Sternberg born?
pos_context_en: Eugene Sternberg (January 15, 1915 – June 5, 2005) was an Austro-Hungarian born American architect known for his passionate commitment and contribution to contemporary/modernist architecture and town planning in Colorado and other Rocky Mountain states between 1950 and 1990. He designed over 400 building projects and subdivisions, many of them iconic examples of Modernist architecture. Since his focus was on improving the quality of life of the general population, the structures he built were beautiful, useful, and cost-effective. Most of his projects were in the category of social architecture: affordable homes, senior housing projects, public housing, hospitals, medical clinics, public schools, community colleges, community centers, churches, buildings for credit unions, labor unions, and headquarters offices for Rural Electric Associations. As a planner Sternberg designed a number of innovative housing subdivisions and master plans for college campuses, governmental complexes, county fairgrounds, and a number of small western cities.
neg_context_en:
Sternberg was born during World War I in Pressburg, Austria-Hungary where his family had moved to be with his father while he served in the Austro-Hungarian army. When the war, and the Austro-Hungarian Empire, ended in 1918, the family returned to their home in Munkács (now Mukachevo, Ukraine) in the province of Ruthenia; in 1920 it became part of the newly created country of Czechoslovakia.
During his elementary and high school education. Sternberg's major passion was art. He developed into an accomplished young artist and won a coveted place to study architecture at the Czech Technical University in Prague. In the summers he worked for two architectural firms in Munkács and for a well-known Czech architect, Frantisek Libra, in Prague. In 1938, he earned a first degree in architecture/engineering. Adolf Hitler's Germany occupied Czechoslovakia in March 1939. Because Sternberg was offered a scholarship to the University of London's Bartlett School of Architecture he was fortunate to leave Czechoslovakia in 1939, the only one of his large Jewish family to be able to do so.

In 1954 Eugene D. Sternberg and Associates were commissioned to design Sun Valley Homes Annex, a 220-unit addition to the original Public Housing Project. He regarded this as a development that fell far short of his high aspirations for successful public housing. He had to abide by the same mean-spirited limitations as in the earlier project. Homes in the Sun Valley projects were isolated and had no easy access to public transportation, shopping or community facilities. Many years later, Sternberg felt some vindication when the Denver Housing Authority decided that it had erred in not providing any community facilities for its housing projects. In 1965 he was commissioned to design five community centers - Auraria, Rude Park, Stapleton, Curtis Park, J. Q. Newton - to rectify the error and improve the residents' quality of life. The research for this commission led to the publication of Sternberg's second architectural book, Community Centers and Student Unions, which he wrote in cooperation with his wife Barbara Sternberg.

As their Sternberg household dwindled down from eight members to three, Gene began the transition from his professional practice to a new role and a new "hometown." Since 1949, the Sternbergs had enjoyed spending time in summer in a cabin they built in Evergreen, 30 miles into the foothills west of Denver. By 1970, Evergreen was in the process of transformation from a small mountain summer resort to a year-round community within commuting distance of Denver. The Sternbergs sold the cherished home that Eugene had designed for the family in Orchard Hills, and moved into an old log house on the banks of Evergreen's Upper Bear Creek, Colorado with their youngest daughter.

After graduation, Sternberg was invited to join Abercrombie's firm in London, where he worked mainly on planning new neighborhoods to replace the housing destroyed by German bombing. Sternberg also taught part-time at Cambridge University, the University of London and the Regent Street Polytechnic. As the war drew to an end, Sternberg and Barbara Edwards, his British fiancée, decided to emigrate to the United States. To accomplish this, they each had to secure a job in the U.S. Sternberg received a three-year contract to teach city planning at Cornell University. Barbara secured a position at the British Information Services in Manhattan. Gene and Barbara were married in Ithaca, New York in the fall of 1946. Sternberg soon became dissatisfied with the general lack of creative activity in Cornell's architectural and planning departments, and was particularly disappointed when he found that full-time faculty members were forbidden to practice. He resigned from the prestigious university after three months and took on the challenges of a newcomer in an unfamiliar country, with no job and few professional contacts. Fortunately, Sternberg's background and qualifications appealed to Carl Feiss, Director of a new School of Architecture and Planning at the University of Denver, where Sternberg became Associate Professor of Design. The Sternbergs, with a six weeks old baby, took their first ever flight in August 1947 to a new home in a city and state of which they had never heard.

Josef von Sternberg was born Jonas Sternberg to an impoverished Orthodox Jewish family in Vienna, at that time part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. When Sternberg was three years old, his father Moses Sternberg, a former soldier in the army of Austria-Hungary, moved to the United States to seek work. His mother, Serafin née Singer, and her children joined Moses in America in 1901 when the young Sternberg was seven. Jonas attended public school there until the family, except Moses, returned to Vienna three years later. Throughout his life, Sternberg would carry vivid memories of Vienna and nostalgia for some of "his happiest childhood moments."

For Gerald Schlessman, Sternberg designed Hillcrest Apartments, a commercial high-rise apartment building in central Denver. He was sincerely distressed when he heard, about a year after completion of the project, that Schlessman was losing money on it and had put it up for sale. He went to talk with his client and expressed his concern. "Don't give it a thought, Gene," said Schlessman, "I can always use a loss." That reasoning went beyond Sternberg's personal financial experience. At the other end of the housing spectrum was a complex of small, economical apartment units Sternberg designed for a beautiful site overlooking the town of Steamboat Springs. Currently, the owners of the apartments are seeking to have the project designated as having historic significance. The site is too desirable and developers have in mind the razing of the present inexpensive homes to make way for a denser development.

The only medical project about which Sternberg felt great disappointment was the Wardenberg Student Health Center in Boulder. He had long railed publicly against the phony Romanesque façade architecture of the Colorado University campus in Boulder. What can professors of architecture in Boulder do, he would ask, other than take their students for a tour of the campus and show them what not to do? A long-time champion of Sternberg's talents, Vance Austin, was elected in 1956 to the C.U. Board of Regents. Austin vowed that during his term of office, he would introduce some contemporary architecture onto the campus. He succeeded, against considerable opposition, in having the Wardenberg project awarded to Sternberg's firm, but then unexpectedly left the scene when he was appointed to head the Credit Union National Association in Wisconsin.

Sternberg was born on December 8, 1949, to a Jewish family, in New Jersey. Sternberg suffered from test anxiety as a child. As a result, he became an inadequate test taker. This upset him and he reasoned that a test was not an adequate measurement of his true knowledge and academic abilities. When he later retook a test in a room that consisted of younger students, he felt more comfortable and his scores increased dramatically. The following year, he created the Sternberg Test of Mental Ability (STOMA), his first intelligence test. This problem of test taking is what sparked Sternberg's interest in psychology.

In 1950, Sternberg became involved for the first time in the design of public housing in Denver. He was consultant architect to Earl Morris, a long-established Denver architect, on the site plan and building design for Sun Valley Homes, a 200-unit project. Sternberg had been an outspoken critic of the Denver Public Housing Authority's projects. He fought strenuously against the rigid and demeaning limitations imposed at the time by the Housing Authority to appease the political opposition of private home builders. Public housing projects had to be built on sites no commercial homebuilder would consider for development. These sites were isolated from other housing, and the buildings had to be designed so as to look worse than the poorest private housing. In spite of these obstacles, Morris and Sternberg did achieve some limited improvements. They introduced duplexes, in contrast to the customary high-rise buildings or long barracks-like row houses that characterized most public housing of the day. The subdivision plan eliminated the conventional grid street pattern, resulting in greater intimacy and safety from traffic for the residents.
question_src: 尤金·斯特恩伯格什么时候出生？
pos_context_src: 尤金·斯特恩伯格（Eugene Sternberg，1915年1月15日至2005年6月5日）是一位奥匈帝国出生的美国建筑师，以他对1950年至1990年之间在科罗拉多州和其他落基山脉的当代/现代建筑和城镇规划的热情承诺和贡献。由于他的重点是改善普通人群的生活质量，因此他建造的结构很漂亮，有用且具有成本效益。他的大多数项目都属于社会建筑类别：负担得起的房屋，高级住房项目，公共住房，医院，医疗诊所，公立学校，社区学院，社区中心，教堂，信用合作社的建筑物，劳工工会和农村电力协会的总部办公室。作为一名计划者，斯特恩伯格设计了许多创新的住房细分和大学校园，政府综合体，县集市和许多西方小城市的总体计划。
neg_context_src:
斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）出生于奥地利 - 匈牙利的第一次世界大战期间，他的家人在奥匈帝国军队服役期间与父亲在一起。战争和奥匈帝国于1918年结束时，一家人回到了露丝尼亚省的蒙卡克斯（现为乌克兰的穆卡乔夫）的家中； 1920年，它成为新创建的捷克斯洛伐克国家的一部分。
在他的小学和高中教育期间。斯特恩伯格的主要热情是艺术。他发展成为一位成熟的年轻艺术家，并在布拉格捷克技术大学赢得了一个令人垂涎的地方学习建筑。在夏季，他曾在Munkács的两家建筑公司和布拉格的一位著名的捷克建筑师Frantisek Libra工作。 1938年，他获得了建筑/工程学的第一学位。阿道夫·希特勒（Adolf Hitler）的德国于1939年3月占领捷克斯洛伐克。

1954年，尤金·斯特恩伯格（Eugene D.他认为这是他对成功公共住房的高度渴望的发展。他必须遵守与早期项目相同的卑鄙限制。太阳谷项目中的房屋是孤立的，无法轻松使用公共交通，购物或社区设施。多年后，当丹佛住房局（Denver Housing Authority）决定不为其住房项目提供任何社区设施时，斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）感到有些辩护。 1965年，他被委托设计五个社区中心 -  Auraria，Rude Park，Stapleton，Curtis Park，J。Q. Newton-纠正错误并改善居民的生活质量。该委员会的研究导致了Sternberg的第二本建筑书籍，社区中心和学生工会的出版，他与妻子芭芭拉·斯特恩伯格（Barbara Sternberg）合作。

当他们的斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）家庭从八名成员减少到三名成员时，吉恩开始了从他的专业实践转变为新角色和新的“家乡”。自1949年以来，斯特恩伯格（Sternbergs）享受夏天在他们建造的常绿木屋中度过的时光，进入丹佛以西30英里处。到1970年，Evergreen正在从一个小型山区度假胜地转变为丹佛通勤距离的全年社区。斯特恩伯格（Sternbergs）出售了尤金（Eugene）为乌节山（Orchard Hills）的家庭设计的珍贵房屋，并搬进了科罗拉多州常绿上熊溪（Upper Bear Creek）的一家古老的木屋，与他们的小女儿一起。

毕业后，斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）被邀请加入伦敦的阿伯克朗比（Abercrombie）的公司，在那里他主要努力计划新的社区，以取代德国轰炸所破坏的房屋。斯特恩伯格还曾在剑桥大学，伦敦大学和摄政街理工学院兼职。战争结束时，他的英国未婚夫斯特恩伯格和芭芭拉·爱德华兹（Barbara Edwards）决定移民到美国。为此，他们每个人都必须在美国的斯特恩伯格获得一份工作，从而在康奈尔大学获得了三年的合同，以教康奈尔大学的城市规划。芭芭拉（Barbara）在曼哈顿的英国信息服务处获得了职位。吉恩（Gene）和芭芭拉（Barbara）于1946年秋天在纽约伊萨卡（Ithaca）结婚。斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）很快对康奈尔（Cornell）的建筑和规划部门中普遍缺乏创意活动感到不满意，当他发现禁止全职教师被禁止练习时，他感到特别失望。三个月后，他辞去了著名的大学辞职，并在一个陌生的国家承担了一个新来者的挑战，没有工作，几乎没有专业的联系。幸运的是，斯特恩伯格的背景和资格吸引了丹佛大学新建筑与计划学院主任卡尔·费斯（Carl Feiss），斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）成为设计副教授。斯特恩伯格（Sternbergs）拥有一个六周大的婴儿，于1947年8月乘了他们的第一次飞行到一个从未听说过的城市和州的新家。

约瑟夫·冯·斯特恩伯格（Josef von Sternberg）出生于乔纳斯·斯特恩伯格（Jonas Sternberg），当时是维也纳的一个贫穷的东正教犹太家庭，当时是奥匈帝国的一部分。斯特恩伯格三岁时，他的父亲摩西·斯特恩伯格（Moses Sternberg）是奥地利 - 匈牙利军队的前士兵，他移居美国寻求工作。他的母亲SerafinNéeSinger和她的孩子们于1901年在年轻的Sternberg七岁时在美国加入了摩西。乔纳斯（Jonas）在那里就读于公立学校，直到三年后摩西（Moses）除了摩西（Moses）以外的家人返回维也纳。 Sternberg在他的一生中，将在“他最快乐的童年时刻”中对维也纳和怀旧的生动记忆。

对于杰拉尔德·施莱斯曼（Gerald Schlessman），斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）设计了希尔克雷斯特公寓（Hillcrest Apartments），这是丹佛中部的商业高层公寓楼。当项目完成大约一年后，Schlessman在听到它损失了钱并将其出售时，他感到非常痛苦。他去与客户交谈，并表示关注。 Schlessman说：“吉恩，不要考虑一下，我总是可以使用损失。”这种推理超出了斯特恩伯格的个人财务经验。住房谱的另一端是一个小型，经济的公寓单元，斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）设计，专为一个美丽的景点，俯瞰着汽船泉镇。目前，该公寓的所有者正在寻求将该项目指定为具有历史意义。该网站太理想了，开发人员想起了当前廉价房屋的夷为平地，无法为更密集的开发提供空间。

斯特恩伯格感到非常失望的唯一医疗项目是博尔德的沃登伯格学生健康中心。他长期以来一直公开反对博尔德科罗拉多大学校园的虚假罗马式立面建筑。他会问，博尔德（Boulder）的建筑教授能做什么，除了带他们的学生参观校园并向他们展示不做什么？ 1956年，斯特恩伯格才华横溢的万斯·奥斯丁（Vance Austin）的长期冠军当选为C.U.摄政委员会。奥斯汀誓言，在任期期间，他将向校园介绍一些当代建筑。他在沃登伯格（Wardenberg）项目授予斯特恩伯格公司（Sternberg Yess）的情况下取得了成功，反对相当大的反对派，但随后出乎意料地离开了现场，当时他被任命为威斯康星州的信用合作社全国协会。

斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）于1949年12月8日出生于新泽西州的一个犹太家庭。斯特恩伯格小时候患有测试焦虑。结果，他成为了不足的测试者。这让他感到不安，他认为测试不是对他的真实知识和学术能力的充分衡量。当他后来在一个由年轻学生组成的房间里进行测试时，他感到更舒适，他的分数急剧增加。次年，他创建了Sternberg的精神能力测试（Stoma），这是他的首次智力测试。参加测试的问题是激发了斯特恩伯格对心理学的兴趣的原因。

1950年，斯特恩伯格（Sternberg）首次参与了丹佛公共住房的设计。他曾是丹佛（Denver）建筑师伯爵莫里斯（Earl Morris）的顾问建筑师，他是Sun Valley Homes的现场计划和建筑设计，这是200个单元的项目。斯特恩伯格一直是丹佛公共住房管理局项目的直言不讳的批评家。他与住房当局在当时施加的严格而贬低的局限性进行了激烈的战斗，以安抚私人房屋建筑商的政治反对。公共住房项目必须建立在没有商业房屋建筑商开发的网站上。这些地点与其他住房隔离开来，必须设计建筑物，以使其看起来比最贫穷的私人住房更糟。尽管存在这些障碍，但莫里斯和斯特恩伯格确实取得了一些有限的进步。他们引入了复式公寓，与习惯的高层建筑或类似于当天公共住房的大营房的长房屋相比。该细分计划消除了传统的网格街模式，从而使居民的交通更加亲密和安全性。
report_src: 尤金·斯特恩伯格于1915年1月15日出生[1]。

question_en: Where is Fiji located in the world?
pos_context_en: Fiji is the hub of the South West Pacific, midway between Vanuatu and Tonga. The archipelago is located between 176° 53′ east and 178° 12′ west. The 180° meridian runs through Taveuni but the International Date Line is bent to give uniform time (UTC+12) to all of the Fiji group. With the exception of Rotuma, the Fiji group lies between 15° 42′ and 20° 02′ south. Rotuma is located north of the group, from Suva, 12° 30′ south of the equator.
neg_context_title_en: Fiji at the Rugby World Cup
neg_context_en:
Fiji automatically qualified for the 2013 Rugby League World Cup after participating in the 2008 tournament. They took on 
Australia, England and Ireland in the pool stage. In their first match they took on 'the Wolfhounds'. They played at the famous Spotland Stadium, in Rochdale, where Fiji have an historic affiliation with. The Fijians convincingly won by a score of 32-14. As expected Fiji lost to both Australia and England, although they surprised many, as they only conceded 34 points against the teams in each game and they led 2-0 against Australia, and were within a few minutes of taking a half-time lead against England. Fiji would take on 'fierce Pacific rivals' Samoa in the quarter final. They won the, passionate pacific, fixture and they would celebrate with a 22-4 victory. They celebrated even more, as it meant Fiji reached their second consecutive World Cup semi-final. They took on Australia again, but this game was nothing like the group stage fixture. Fiji's errors conceded them 62 points against a classy Australian side. This defeat ended and equalled their best World Cup campaign in their history.

The Fiji national rugby union team has competed at five Rugby World Cup competitions, the first being in 1987. Their best results were at the 1987 and 2007 World Cups where they reached the quarter finals. Fiji also competes in the Pacific Tri-Nations and the Pacific Nations Cup. The Fiji national rugby sevens team is one of the most successful rugby sevens teams in the world. They have won 2 Sevens World Cup titles, the 2005/06 IRB Sevens Series and the 2014/2015 HSBC Sevens World Series. They have also won a number of Hong Kong Sevens titles which is considered the most prestigious annual international Sevens tournament. In the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio, the Fijian rugby sevens team won the country's first gold medal, defeating Great Britain 43-7

Fiji were placed in Pool B of the 2007 Rugby World Cup along with Wales, Canada, Japan and Australia. After beating Japan and Canada in close matches, Fiji rested several key players against Australia for the crucial game against Wales. Australia defeated Fiji 55–12. Fiji's fate in the tournament came down to a "winner advances" game against Wales which Fiji won 38–34 and qualified for the quarter-finals for the second time. Former Wallaby great Michael Lynagh described the see-sawing match as one of the best matches "of all time". Fiji lost their quarter final match against South Africa, however their above expectations performance in the tournament resulted in them moving up to 9th in the world rankings – their highest ever position.

Fiji took part in the 2010 ICC World Cricket League Division Five in Nepal, where they finished sixth and last and in doing so failed to win a single match in the tournament. Fiji then played in the 2011 ICC World Cricket League Division Six and finished sixth and last and in doing so were relegated to 2013 ICC World Cricket League Division Seven.Fiji's most famous player is Neil Maxwell, who played first-class cricket for New South Wales and Victoria in Australia, and for Canterbury in New Zealand in addition to representing Australia A. Nat Uluiviti is the other Fijian to have played first-class cricket for a team other than Fiji, playing for Auckland in the 1950s.

The Fiji Museum is a museum in Suva, Fiji located in the capital city's botanical gardens, Thurston Gardens.
The museum is a statutory body and is under the administration of the Fiji Museum Act and the Preservation of Objects of Archaeological & Palaeontological Interest Act.

Fiji–Solomon Islands relations are diplomatic and other bilateral relations between the Republic of Fiji and Solomon Islands. Diplomatic relations are cordial, although the Solomon Islands government has aligned itself with other countries in the region to urge Fiji interim Prime Minister Voreqe Bainimarama to restore democracy in Fiji. Fiji and the Solomons are both located in Melanesia, and are both members of the Melanesian Spearhead Group. They also participate in other regional organisations including the Pacific Islands Forum. In August 2008, it was announced that Solomon Islands intended to open a High Commission in Suva, and in December the government of Fiji announced that it had "formally endorsed the establishment of a Resident Diplomatic Mission in Suva by the Government of Solomon Islands". Fiji's High Commission to Papua New Guinea is accredited to Solomon Islands.

Fiji's main attractions to tourists are primarily white sandy beaches and aesthetically pleasing islands with all-year-round tropical weather. In general, Fiji is a mid-range priced holiday/vacation destination with most of the accommodations in this range. It also has a variety of world class five-star resorts and hotels. More budget resorts are being opened in remote areas, which will provide more tourism opportunities. CNN named Fiji's Laucala Island Resort as one of the fifteen world's most beautiful island hotels.

Fiji were placed in Pool B of the 2007 Rugby World Cup along with Wales, Canada, Japan and Australia. After beating Japan and Canada in close matches, Fiji rested several key players against Australia for the crucial game against Wales. Australia defeated Fiji by 55–12. Fiji's fate in the tournament came down to a "winner advances" game against Wales which Fiji won 38–34 and qualified for the quarter-finals for the second time. Former Wallaby great Michael Lynagh described the see-sawing match as one of the best matches "of all time". Fiji lost their quarter final match against South Africa, however their above expectations performance in the tournament resulted in them moving up to 9th in the world rankings – their highest ever position. Shannon Fraser and Gregg Mumm from Australia acted as assistant coaches for the period leading up to the world cup and were accredited for much of the Fijians sides success.

Women's participation in netball in Fiji is comparable to men's participation in rugby. The sport started to grow in popularity during the 1970s. Netball has a large amount of grassroots support in Fiji. Games are most often played by girls on Saturdays during the winter, though games can be played at all times of the year. Samoa and Fiji are traditional netball rivals. This rivalry can be seen at events like Pacific Games. Fiji was supposed to host the 2007 World Netball Championship, but a military coup occurred. IFNA decided to move the championship to Auckland instead. Fiji has a men's national team that has competed in the 2009 and 2011 International Challenge Men’s and Mixed Netball Tournament. As of August 2016, the women's national team was ranked number seven in the world.
question_src: 斐济在世界上在哪里？
pos_context_src: 斐济是瓦努阿图和汤加之间的中途西南太平洋的枢纽。该群岛位于176°53'东和178°12'西之间。 180°子午线穿越塔韦尼（Taveuni），但国际日期线倾向于给所有斐济集团提供统一的时间（UTC+12）。除Rotuma外，斐济组位于15°42'和20°02'南之间。 Rotuma位于该组以北，来自Suva，位于赤道以南12°30'。
neg_context_title_src: 斐济国家橄榄球联盟队
斐济在橄榄球世界杯上
斐济 - 索洛蒙群岛的关系
斐济国家橄榄球联盟团队
neg_context_src:
斐济参加2008年锦标赛后，斐济自动获得了2013年橄榄球联赛世界杯的资格。他们接受了 
澳大利亚，英格兰和爱尔兰在泳池舞台上。在他们的第一场比赛中，他们参加了“狼狗”。他们在罗奇代尔（Rochdale）著名的Spotland体育场演出，斐济在那里与之有了历史性的隶属关系。斐济人以32-14的成绩令人信服地获胜。正如预期的那样，斐济输给了澳大利亚和英格兰，尽管他们让许多人感到惊讶，因为他们在每场比赛中只能对阵球队34分，他们以2-0对阵澳大利亚，并在几分钟之内对阵英格兰。斐济将在四分之一决赛中参加“凶猛的太平洋竞争对手”萨摩亚。他们赢得了太平洋，热情的太平洋，他们将以22-4的胜利庆祝。他们更加庆祝，因为这意味着斐济连续第二次进入世界杯半决赛。他们再次乘坐澳大利亚，但是这场比赛与集体舞台赛车不像。斐济的错误使他们对澳大利亚优雅方面的62分。这场失败在历史上结束并等同于他们最好的世界杯运动。

斐济国家橄榄球联盟队已参加了五场橄榄球世界杯比赛，这是1987年的首场比赛。他们的最佳成绩是在1987年和2007年世界杯比赛中，他们进入了四分之一决赛。斐济还参加了太平洋三国和太平洋国家杯。斐济国家橄榄球七人制团队是世界上最成功的橄榄球七人制团队之一。他们赢得了2个七人七世世界杯冠军，2005/06 IRB Sevens系列赛和2014/2015 HSBC Sevens World系列赛。他们还赢得了许多香港七人制冠军，这被认为是最负盛名的年度国际七人制锦标赛。在2016年里约热内卢夏季奥运会上，斐济橄榄球七人制冠军队赢得了该国的第一枚金牌，以43-7击败英国

斐济与威尔士，加拿大，日本和澳大利亚一起被安置在2007年橄榄球世界杯的B池中。在近距离比赛中击败日本和加拿大之后，斐济因对威尔士的关键比赛而对阵澳大利亚的几名关键球员。澳大利亚击败了斐济55-12。斐济在比赛中的命运归结为对威尔士的“获胜者进步”比赛，斐济以38-34赢得了比赛，并第二次获得了四分之一决赛的资格。前小袋鼠伟大的迈克尔·莱纳格（Michael Lynagh）将远见的比赛描述为“有史以来最好的比赛”之一。斐济输掉了对阵南非的四分之一决赛，但是他们在比赛中的上一场预期表现使他们在世界排名中排名第9，这是他们有史以来最高的位置。

斐济参加了尼泊尔的2010年ICC世界板球联赛第五分区，在那里他们获得了第六和最后一场比赛，并在比赛中未能赢得一场比赛。 Fiji then played in the 2011 ICC World Cricket League Division Six and finished sixth and last and in doing so were relegated to 2013 ICC World Cricket League Division Seven.Fiji's most famous player is Neil Maxwell, who played first-class cricket for New South Wales and Victoria in Australia, and for Canterbury in New Zealand in addition to representing Australia A. Nat Uluiviti is the other Fijian to have played first-class cricket for斐济以外的球队，在1950年代为奥克兰效力。

斐济博物馆是位于斐济Suva的博物馆，位于首都植物园，瑟斯顿花园。
博物馆是一个法定的机构，受到《斐济博物馆法》的管理和《考古与古生物学兴趣法》的保存。

斐济 - 索洛蒙群岛的关系是斐济共和国和所罗门群岛之间的外交和其他双边关系。尽管所罗门群岛政府与该地区的其他国家保持一致，以敦促斐济临时总理沃里克·贝尼马拉玛恢复斐济的民主国家。斐济和所罗门族都位于美拉尼西亚，都是美拉尼西亚矛头组的成员。他们还参加了包括太平洋岛屿论坛在内的其他区域组织。 2008年8月，宣布所罗门群岛打算在苏瓦开设一个高级委员会，并在12月斐济政府宣布“已正式认可所罗门群岛政府在苏瓦建立居民外交使团”。斐济新几内亚的高级委员会获得了所罗门群岛的认可。
斐济对游客的主要景点主要是白色的沙滩和美学上令人愉悦的岛屿，并拥有全年的热带天气。总的来说，斐济是一个中标定价的假期/度假胜地，大部分住宿都在此范围内。它还拥有各种世界一流的五星级度假胜地和酒店。在偏远地区开设了更多的预算胜地，这将提供更多的旅游机会。 CNN命名为斐济的劳卡拉岛度假胜地，是15个世界上最美丽的岛屿酒店之一。

斐济与威尔士，加拿大，日本和澳大利亚一起被安置在2007年橄榄球世界杯的B池中。在近距离比赛中击败日本和加拿大之后，斐济因对威尔士的关键比赛而对阵澳大利亚的几名关键球员。澳大利亚以55-12击败了斐济。斐济在比赛中的命运归结为对威尔士的“获胜者进步”比赛，斐济以38-34赢得了比赛，并第二次获得了四分之一决赛的资格。前小袋鼠伟大的迈克尔·莱纳格（Michael Lynagh）将远见的比赛描述为“有史以来最好的比赛”之一。斐济输掉了对阵南非的四分之一决赛，但是他们在比赛中的上一场预期表现使他们在世界排名中排名第9，这是他们有史以来最高的位置。来自澳大利亚的香农·弗雷泽（Shannon Fraser）和格雷格·穆姆（Gregg Mumm）担任世界杯前任时期的助理教练，并获得了斐济人队伍的成功。

女性参加斐济无板篮球的参与与男子参与橄榄球的参与。这项运动在1970年代开始流行。无板篮球在斐济有大量的基层支持。游戏通常是在冬季星期六的女孩玩的，尽管一年中的任何时候都可以玩游戏。萨摩亚和斐济是传统的无板篮球对手。在太平洋游戏等活动中可以看到这种竞争。斐济原本应该举办2007年世界无板篮球冠军，但发生了军事政变。 IFNA决定将冠军转移到奥克兰。斐济拥有一支男子国家队，参加了2009年和2011年国际挑战男子和混合篮球比赛。截至2016年8月，女子国家队在全球排名第七。
report_src: 斐济位于南半球的西南太平洋中部，是瓦努阿图和汤加之间的“中途枢纽”，其主体群岛分布在东经176°53'至西经178°12'、南纬15°42'至20°02'之间[1]；群岛中的塔韦尼岛被180°子午线穿越，但国际日期线向东偏移，使全国采用统一时间 UTC+12[1]；此外，附属的罗图马岛位于主群岛以北，距离首都苏瓦以北约12°30'南纬[1]。

question_en: When did Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov become General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union?
pos_context_en: Upon Brezhnev's death on November 12, 1982, Yuri Andropov succeeded him as General Secretary and (by extension) leader of the Soviet Union. During his tenure, Andropov sought to eliminate corruption and inefficiency within the Soviet system by investigating longtime officials for violations of party discipline and criminalizing truancy in the workplace. However, upon suffering total renal failure in February 1983, Andropov's health began to deteriorate rapidly. On February 9, 1984, he died after leading the country for only 15 months.
neg_context_title_en: History of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
27th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union
neg_context_en: Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov (; ;  – 9 February 1984) was a Soviet politician and the fourth General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Following the 18-year rule of Leonid Brezhnev, Andropov served in the post from November 1982 until his death in February 1984.

Mikhail Gorbachev became the party's general secretary in 1985 following an interregnum after Brezhnev's death in 1982 when the party was led first by Yuri Andropov and then by Konstantin Chernenko. When Brezhnev died Andropov was proclaimed General Secretary within days and by the official coverage in the Soviet media it was clear that he was "the" leader. Andropov died on February 9, 1984 and Chernenko was elected his replacement on February 13 but Chernenko was a compromise stopgap candidate as Gorbachev – Andropov's protege – lacked sufficient support in the Politburo. However, Chernenko was already an ill man and his duties were increasingly carried out by others, particularly Gorbachev, who was nominated by Andrei Gromyko to become General Secretary when Chernenko died. There are indications Gorbachev may have been in control prior to Chernenko's death as he was announced as the new General Secretary the day after Chernenko died on March 10, 1985.

As Yuri Andropov became the new General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Sagdeev participated in the work of a think tank with Gorbachev as the head, which was mandated to find scientific justifications for the nuclear disarmament. Later, as Gorbachev became the new General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, following Ronald Reagan's Strategic Defense Initiative (SDI), they advised the Soviet leadership not to worry and not to respond by creating a similar program.

In 1964, opposition within the Politburo and the Central Committee led to Khrushchev's removal as First Secretary. Leonid Brezhnev succeeded Khrushchev to the post as part of another collective leadership, together with Premier Alexei Kosygin and others. The office was renamed General Secretary in 1966. The collective leadership was able to limit the powers of the General Secretary during the Brezhnev Era. Brezhnev's influence grew throughout the 1970s as he was able to retain support by avoiding any radical reforms. Yuri Andropov and Konstantin Chernenko ruled the country in the same way as Brezhnev had. Mikhail Gorbachev ruled the Soviet Union as General Secretary until 1990, when the Communist Party lost its monopoly of power over the political system. The office of President of the Soviet Union was established so that Gorbachev still retained his role as leader of the Soviet Union. Following the failed August coup of 1991, Gorbachev resigned as General Secretary. He was succeeded by his deputy, Vladimir Ivashko, who only served for five days as Acting General Secretary before Boris Yeltsin, the President of Russia, suspended all activity in the Communist Party. Following the party's ban, the Union of Communist Parties – Communist Party of the Soviet Union (UCP–CPSU) was established by Oleg Shenin in 1993. The UCP–CPSU works as a framework for reviving and restoring the CPSU. The organisation has members in all the former Soviet republics.

In November 1982, Zia travelled to Moscow to attend the funeral of Leonid Brezhnev, the late General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Soviet Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko and new Secretary General Yuri Andropov met with Zia there. Andropov expressed indignation over Pakistan's support of the Afghan resistance against the Soviet Union and its satellite state, Socialist Afghanistan. Zia took his hand and assured him, "General Secretary, believe me, Pakistan wants nothing but very good relations with the Soviet Union". According to Gromyko, Zia's sincerity convinced them, but Zia's actions didn't live up to his words.

The partisans in Finland were controlled by organs of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the NKVD. The three most important people co-ordinating the partisan activity were the NKVD major general Sergey Vershinin, the First Secretary of the Karelian Communist Party Gennady Kupriyanov, and the First Secretary of the Karelo-Finnish Komsomol Yuri Andropov, who later became the leader of the Soviet Union. Andropov's responsibility was to train the Karelian partisans. The headquarters were located in Belomorsk on the shore of the White Sea.

In November 1982, General Zia attended the funeral, in Moscow, of Leonid Brezhnev, the late General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. Soviet Foreign Minister Andrei Gromyko and new Secretary General Yuri Andropov met with Zia there. Andropov expressed indignation over Pakistan's covert support of the Afghan resistance against the Soviet Union and its satellite state, Communist Afghanistan. Zia took his hand and assured him, "General Secretary, believe me, Pakistan wants nothing but very good relations with the Soviet Union". According to Gromyko, Zia's sincerity convinced them, but Zia's actions didn't live up to his words. Ironically, Zia directly dealt with the Israel, working to build covert relations with Israel, allowing the country to actively participate in Soviet–Afghan War. Helped by "ISI", the Mossad channeled Soviet reversed engineered weapons to Afghanistan. In Charlie Wilson's own word, Zia reported to have remarked to Israeli intelligence service: "Just don't put any stars of David on the boxes".

When Leonid Brezhnev died on 10 November 1982 Yuri Andropov was elected chairman of the committee in charge of managing his funeral. According to "Time" magazine Brezhnev's death was mourned by the majority of Soviet citizens. First World commentators saw this as proof that Andropov would become Brezhnev's successor as general secretary. The political corruption which had grown considerably during Brezhnev's tenure had become a major problem to the Soviet Union's economic development by the 1980s. In response Andropov initiated a nationwide anti-corruption campaign. Andropov believed that the Soviet economy would possibly recover if the Soviet Government was able to increase social discipline amongst workers. Brezhnev's regime was also criticised for ideological laxness and self-indulgence. The gerontocracy established by Brezhnev was slowly phased out by Andropov, and new recruits were appointed to the Party "centre", such as future Premier Nikolai Ryzhkov and Chief Ideologue Yegor Ligachev. Soviet foreign policy had also gone awry during Brezhnev's last years, and by June 1982, just before his death, Ronald Reagan classified the Soviet Union as an "Evil Empire". This hardline diplomatic stance did not wither away before Mikhail Gorbachev initiated the "New Thinking". Support for Marxism–Leninism continued to be evident amongst the Soviet people, however, its base of support slowly withered during the Brezhnev Era. The Soviet people still remained wary of such concepts as liberal democracy and multi-party systems, and because of it, Marxism–Leninism remained the leading belief in the country. Due to the large military buildup of the 1960s the Soviet Union was able to consolidate itself as a superpower during Brezhnev's rule.

The 27th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union was held from 25 February to 6 March 1986 in Moscow. This was the first congress presided over by Mikhail Gorbachev as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU. In accordance with the pattern set 20 years earlier by Leonid Brezhnev, the congress occurred five years after the previous CPSU Congress. Much had changed in those five years. Key figures of Soviet politics, Mikhail Suslov, Leonid Brezhnev, Yuri Andropov, Dmitriy Ustinov, and Konstantin Chernenko had died, and Mikhail Gorbachev had become General Secretary of the Party. For this reason the congress was widely anticipated, both at home and abroad, as an indicator of Gorbachev's new policies and directions. The congress was attended by 4993 delegates. It elected the 27th Central Committee.
question_src: Yuri Vladimirovich Andropov什么时候成为苏联共产党的秘书长？
pos_context_src: 布雷兹内夫（Brezhnev）于1982年11月12日去世后，尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）接替了他担任苏联领导人的总秘书和（延伸）。在任职期间，安德罗波夫（Andropov）试图通过调查长期官员违反政党纪律和将工作场所的犯罪定为犯罪，以消除苏联体系内的腐败和效率低下。然而，在1983年2月遭受肾脏衰竭时，安德罗波夫的健康开始迅速恶化。 1984年2月9日，他在领导该国仅15个月后去世。
neg_context_title_src: 巴基斯坦 - 俄罗斯关系
苏联共产党第27届国会大会
neg_context_src: 尤里·弗拉基米洛维奇·安德罗波夫（;;  -   -  1984年2月9日）是苏联政治家，也是苏联共产党的第四任秘书长。遵循Leonid Brezhnev的18年统治，Andropov从1982年11月到1984年2月去世。

米哈伊尔·戈尔巴乔夫（Mikhail Gorbachev）于1982年在布雷兹内夫（Brezhnev）于1982年去世后，于1985年成为该党的秘书长。布雷兹内夫（Brezhnev）在几天之内被宣布为秘书长，并在苏联媒体上的正式报道中被宣布为“他”领导人。安德罗波夫（Andropov）于1984年2月9日去世，切尔森科（Chernenko）于2月13日当选了他的替代者，但切尔森科（Chernenko）是戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）的妥协Quorbachev（安德罗波夫（Andropov）的protege） - 缺乏在政治局中得到足够的支持。但是，切尔森科已经是一个病男人，他的职责越来越多地由其他人，尤其是戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）执行，后者被安德烈·格罗米科（Andrei Gromyko）提名为切尔森科（Chernenko）去世时成为秘书长。戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）在切尔森科（Chernenko）去世之前可能有迹象表明他被宣布为新秘书长在1985年3月10日去世的第二天。
当尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）成为苏联共产党的新秘书长时，萨格德夫（Sagdeev）参加了与戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）的智囊团的工作，该工作被任命为核裁军的科学理由。后来，随着罗纳德·里根（Ronald Reagan）的战略国防倡议（SDI），戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）成为苏联共产党的新秘书长，他们建议苏联领导人不要担心，不要通过创建类似计划来做出回应。

1964年，政治局内部和中央委员会的反对派导致赫鲁晓夫被撤职为第一秘书。 Leonid Brezhnev与总理Alexei Kosygin等人一起接替Khrushchev担任该职位的一部分。该办公室于1966年更名为秘书长。集体领导能够限制Brezhnev时代秘书长的权力。 Brezhnev在整个1970年代的影响力增强，因为他能够避免进行任何激进的改革来保留支持。尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）和康斯坦丁·切尔森科（Konstantin Chernenko）以与布雷兹内夫（Brezhnev）相同的方式统治了该国。米哈伊尔·戈尔巴乔夫（Mikhail Gorbachev）统治苏联担任秘书长，直到1990年共产党失去了对政治制度的权力垄断。建立了苏联总统办公室，以便戈尔巴乔夫仍然保留他作为苏联领导人的角色。在1991年8月政变失败之后，戈尔巴乔夫（Gorbachev）辞去了秘书长。他的副手弗拉基米尔·伊瓦什科（Vladimir Ivashko）继承了他，后者在俄罗斯总统鲍里斯·叶利钦（Boris Yeltsin）之前只担任代理秘书长五天，暂停了共产党的所有活动。在该党禁令之后，Oleg Shenin于1993年建立了共产党联盟 - 苏联共产党（UCP – CPSU）。UCP -CPSU是恢复和恢复CPSU的框架。该组织在所有前苏联共和国都有成员。

1982年11月，Zia前往莫斯科参加了已故苏联共产党秘书长Leonid Brezhnev的葬礼。苏联外交大臣安德烈科（Andrei Gromyko）和新秘书长尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）在那里与齐亚会面。安德罗波夫（Andropov）对巴基斯坦对阿富汗对苏联及其卫星国家社会主义阿富汗的抵抗的支持表示愤慨。 Zia握住他的手向他保证：“总秘大臣，相信我，巴基斯坦只需要与苏联的良好关系。”根据格罗米科（Gromyko）的说法，齐亚（Zia）的诚意使他们说服了他们，但齐亚（Zia）的举动并没有遵守他的话。

芬兰的游击党由苏联和NKVD共产党的器官控制。协调游击党活动的三个最重要的人是NKVD少将Sergey Vershinin，Karelian共产党Gennady Kupriyanov的第一任秘书，也是Karelo-Finnish Komsomol Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Yuri Andropov，后来成为苏联联盟的领导人。安德罗波夫的责任是训练卡雷利亚游击党。总部位于白海岸的Belomorsk。

1982年11月，齐亚将军参加了莫斯科的葬礼，苏联共产党已故秘书长莱昂尼德·布雷兹赫涅夫（Leonid Brezhnev）参加了葬礼。苏联外交大臣安德烈科（Andrei Gromyko）和新秘书长尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）在那里与齐亚会面。安德罗波夫（Andropov）对巴基斯坦对阿富汗对苏联及其卫星国家共产主义阿富汗的抵抗的秘密支持表示愤慨。 Zia握住他的手向他保证：“总秘大臣，相信我，巴基斯坦只需要与苏联的良好关系。”根据格罗米科（Gromyko）的说法，齐亚（Zia）的诚意使他们说服了他们，但齐亚（Zia）的举动并没有遵守他的话。具有讽刺意味的是，齐亚直接与以色列打交道，努力与以色列建立秘密关系，使该国积极参与苏联 - 阿富汗战争。在“ ISI”的帮助下，摩萨德将苏联逆转的工程武器转移到了阿富汗。用查理·威尔逊（Charlie Wilson）自己的话说，齐亚（Zia）据报道对以色列情报部门表示：“不要把大卫的任何星星放在盒子上”。

1982年11月10日，莱昂尼德·布雷兹涅夫（Leonid Brezhnev）去世时，尤里·安德罗波夫（Yuri Andropov）当选为负责管理葬礼的委员会主席。根据《时代》杂志，布雷兹涅夫的死是由大多数苏联公民哀悼。第一世界评论​​员认为这证明了Andropov将成为Brezhnev担任总书记的继任者。布雷兹涅夫（Brezhnev）任职期间已经大大发展的政治腐败已成为苏联在1980年代的经济发展的主要问题。作为回应，安德罗波夫发起了全国性的反腐败运动。安德罗波夫（Andropov）认为，如果苏联政府能够增加工人的社会纪律，苏联经济可能会恢复。布雷兹涅夫的政权也因意识形态宽松和自我放纵而受到批评。布雷兹内夫（Brezhnev）建立的老年官员被安德罗波夫（Andropov）慢慢淘汰，新兵被任命为党的“中心”，例如未来的总理尼古拉·瑞兹科夫（Nikolai Ryzhkkov）和首席思想家耶戈尔·利格切夫（Yegor Ligachev）。苏联外交政策在布雷兹涅夫（Brezhnev）的最后几年中也出了问题，到1982年6月，罗纳德·里根（Ronald Reagan）将苏联归类为“邪恶帝国”。在米哈伊尔·戈尔巴乔夫（Mikhail Gorbachev）发起“新思维”之前，这种艰难的外交立场并没有消失。在苏联人民中，对马克思主义 - 莱宁主义的支持仍然很明显，但是，在布雷兹纳夫时代，其支持基础缓慢地枯萎了。苏联人民仍然对诸如自由民主和多方制度等概念保持警惕，因此，马克思主义 - 莱宁主义仍然是该国的主要信仰。由于1960年代的大量军事积累，苏联能够将自己巩固为Brezhnev统治期间的超级大国。

1986年2月25日至3月6日在莫斯科举行了苏联共产党第27届大会。这是米哈伊尔·戈尔巴乔夫（Mikhail Gorbachev）主持的第一次国会，担任CPSU中央委员会秘书长。根据莱昂尼德·布雷兹内夫（Leonid Brezhnev）20年前的模式，国会发生在上次CPSU国会之后的五年。在那五年中发生了很多变化。苏联政治的关键人物，米哈伊尔·苏斯洛夫，莱昂尼德·布雷兹·奈夫，尤里·安德罗波夫，德米特里·乌斯汀诺夫和康斯坦丁·切尔森科去世了，米哈伊尔·戈尔巴切夫已经成为党总书记。因此，国会在国内外都广泛期待，作为戈尔巴乔夫的新政策和指示的指标。 4993名代表参加了国会。它选举了第27个中央委员会。
report_src: 尤里·弗拉基米罗维奇·安德罗波夫在布雷兹涅夫于1982年11月12日去世后，于同一天被选为苏联共产党总书记，从而成为苏联的新一任最高领导人[1]。

question_en: When was the game Plants vs. Zombies released?
pos_context_en: Plants vs. Zombies is a tower defense video game developed and originally published by PopCap Games for Microsoft Windows and OS X. The game involves homeowners who use a variety of different plants to prevent an army of zombies from entering their houses and "eating their brains". It was first released on May 5, 2009, and made available on Steam on the same day. A version for iOS was released in February 2010, and an HD version for the iPad. An extended Xbox Live Arcade version introducing new gameplay modes and features was released on September 8, 2010. PopCap released a Nintendo DS version on January 18, 2011 with content unique to the platform. The PlayStation 3 version was released in February 2011 also with added new co-op and versus modes found in the Xbox 360 version. An Android version of the game was released on May 31, 2011 on the Amazon Appstore, while it was also released to the Android Market (now Google Play) on December 14, 2011. On February 16, 2012, a version was released for BlackBerry PlayBook. Later, a BlackBerry smartphone version of the game was released on January 2013 following the launch of BlackBerry 10. Furthermore, both the original Windows and Mac version of the game have been re-released with additional content in a "Game of the Year" version. In January 2015, a free ad-supported version of the game was released for iOS.
neg_context_title_en: Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time
Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time
neg_context_en: Plants vs. Zombies Heroes is a digital collectible card game in the "Plants vs. Zombies" series, developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. On March 10, 2016, it underwent a soft launch in some countries on iOS, before being internationally released on October 18, 2016. This is the first mobile release in the "Plants vs Zombies" series in which players can play as either a Plant or a Zombie.

In May 2013, the Facebook game "Plants vs. Zombies Adventures" was released by developer PopCap Games and publisher Electronic Arts. The gameplay is a tower defense game, players no longer had to defend a single home in front of the zombie horde, and could travel to new locations and engage with new characters. On July 14, 2014, it was announced that Plants vs. Zombies Adventures would close down on October 12, 2014. The Facebook game was removed by November 2014.

In 2014, "", a multiplayer third-person shooter based on "Plants vs. Zombies", was released for Xbox One, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation 4. On May 5, 2015, it was revealed by Electronic Arts that a new "Plants vs. Zombies" game would be released in Q1 2016. EA CEO Andrew Wilson said that the upcoming game would be a follow-up to "Garden Warfare" and that it would be a bigger and bolder console experience.

Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time is a 2013 free-to-play tower defense video game developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. It is the sequel to "Plants vs. Zombies", and was released worldwide on Apple App Store on August 15, 2013 and Google Play on October 23, 2013.

Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare 2 is a third-person shooter video game developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It is the sequel to "". The game released in February, 2016.

On March 10, 2016, PopCap revealed "Plants vs. Zombies Heroes", which is a card game in the series. It was soft released to certain countries on the same day, and was fully released internationally on October 18, 2016.

In late 2012, PopCap announced that they were working on a sequel to "Plants vs. Zombies". However, the game's status was in doubt shortly after the announcement when the company went through a period of layoffs, which included series creator George Fan. "" released August 15, 2013 as a free-to-play title, and was a time-limited exclusive title for iOS systems before moving to Android later that year.

In August 2012, PopCap announced that they were working on a sequel to their previous game, "Plants vs. Zombies", and that it would include "new features, settings, and situations". In a later announcement, the company confirmed that the new game would be released on July 18, 2013. On June 26, 2013, PopCap announced on their Twitter page that the game would release later than previously announced. On July 9, the game was released in Australia and New Zealand on the iOS App Store and came out worldwide on August 15, 2013. The Android version was released worldwide on October 23, 2013.

Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare is a multiplayer third-person shooter and tower defense video game. It is the third game in the "Plants vs. Zombies" series, developed by PopCap Games and published by Electronic Arts. Like its predecessors, the basic premise revolves around plants defending the humankind from a zombie invasion. In the game, players assume control of either plants and zombies, as they engage in combat against each other in various cooperative and competitive multiplayer modes. Upon completing matches and finishing objectives, players earn coins to acquire stickers which unlock customization items and character variants.
question_src: 游戏植物与僵尸何时发布？
pos_context_src: 植物与僵尸是一款塔式防御视频游戏，最初由爆米花游戏为Microsoft Windows和OS X发行。该游戏涉及使用各种不同植物的房主来防止一群僵尸进入他们的房屋并“吃他们的大脑”。它于2009年5月5日首次发布，并于同一天在Steam上提供。 iOS版本于2010年2月发布，iPad的高清版本。 2010年9月8日发布了一个扩展的Xbox Live Arcade版本，该版本介绍了新的游戏模式和功能。PopCap于2011年1月18日发布了Nintendo DS版本，其内容是该平台独有的内容。 PlayStation 3版本于2011年2月发布，还添加了新的合作社，并且在Xbox 360版本中找到了与模式。该游戏的Android版本于2011年5月31日在Amazon Appstore上发布，而该游戏也于2011年12月14日发布到Android Market（现为Google Play）。2012年2月16日，BlackBerry Playbook发布了版本。后来，该游戏的BlackBerry智能手机版本于2013年1月发布后发行。 2015年1月，该游戏的免费广告支持版本发布了iOS。
neg_context_title_src: 植物与僵尸2：现在是时候了
植物与僵尸2：现在是时候了
neg_context_src: 植物与僵尸英雄是由爆米花游戏开发的“植物与僵尸”系列中的数字可收藏式纸牌游戏，并由电子艺术出版。 2016年3月10日，它在某些国家 /地区进行了iOS的软推出，然后于2016年10月18日在国际上发布。这是“植物与僵尸”系列中的第一个移动版本，玩家可以作为植物或僵尸发挥作用。
2013年5月，Facebook游戏“植物与僵尸冒险”由开发人员爆米花游戏和发行商电子艺术发布。游戏玩法是一款塔式防守游戏，玩家不再需要在僵尸部落前捍卫一个房屋，并且可以前往新的地方并与新角色互动。 2014年7月14日，宣布植物与僵尸冒险将于2014年10月12日关闭。Facebook游戏已在2014年11月之前删除。

In 2014, "", a multiplayer third-person shooter based on "Plants vs. Zombies", was released for Xbox One, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, and PlayStation 4. On May 5, 2015, it was revealed by Electronic Arts that a new "Plants vs. Zombies" game would be released in Q1 2016. EA CEO Andrew Wilson said that the upcoming game would be a follow-up to "Garden战争”，这将是更大，更大胆的控制台体验。
植物与僵尸2：现在是时候是2013年的免费塔式防御视频游戏，由Popcap Games开发并由电子艺术出版。它是“植物与僵尸”的续集，并于2013年8月15日在Apple App Store和2013年10月23日在Apple App Store上发行。
植物与僵尸：Garden Warfare 2是由爆米花游戏开发的第三人称射击视频游戏，由电子艺术出版。它是针对Microsoft Windows，PlayStation 4和Xbox One发布的。它是“”的续集。该游戏于2016年2月发布。
2016年3月10日，Popcap透露了“植物与僵尸英雄”，这是该系列中的纸牌游戏。它在同一天向某些国家 /地区发行，并于2016年10月18日在国际上完全发布。
2012年底，Popcap宣布他们正在制作“植物与僵尸”的续集。但是，该游戏的状态在宣布宣布后不久，当时该公司经历了一段裁员，其中包括系列创作者乔治·范（George Fan）。 “” 2013年8月15日作为免费游戏发行，在当年晚些时候移居Android之前，是iOS系统的时间限制独家冠军。

2012年8月，PopCap宣布他们正在制作以前游戏“植物与僵尸”的续集，其中包括“新功能，设置和情况”。在后来的公告中，该公司确认新游戏将于2013年7月18日发布。2013年6月26日，Popcap在其Twitter页面上宣布，该游戏将比以前宣布的晚发行。该游戏于7月9日在澳大利亚和新西兰在iOS App Store上发行，并于2013年8月15日在全球发布。该Android版本于2013年10月23日在全球发布。
植物与僵尸：Garden Warfare是多人游戏第三人称射击游戏和塔防御视频游戏。这是由爆米花游戏开发的“植物与僵尸”系列中的第三款游戏，由电子艺术出版。像它的前辈一样，基本的前提也围绕着捍卫人类免受僵尸入侵的植物。在游戏中，玩家可以控制植物和僵尸，因为他们以各种合作和竞争性的多人游戏模式相互对抗。完成比赛并完成目标后，玩家会赚取硬币以获取贴纸，以解锁自定义项目和角色变体。
report_src: 《植物与僵尸》最初版本于2009年5月5日在 Microsoft Windows 和 OS X 平台正式发布，并于同日登陆 Steam[1]；其后推出的移植包括：2010 年 2 月的 iOS 版及同年推出的 iPad 高清版[1]；2010 年 9 月 8 日发布的扩展 Xbox Live Arcade 版[1]；2011 年 1 月 18 日的 Nintendo DS 版[1]；2011 年 2 月的 PlayStation 3 版[1]；2011 年 5 月 31 日在 Amazon Appstore 上线、同年 12 月 14 日登陆 Android Market（现 Google Play）的 Android 版[1]；2012 年 2 月 16 日的 BlackBerry PlayBook 版以及 2013 年 1 月的 BlackBerry 智能手机版本[1]；最后还有 2015 年 1 月推出的 iOS 免费广告支持版[1]。

question_en: When did Bob Fitzsimmons start professional boxing?
pos_context_en: Boxing record books show Fitzsimmons officially began boxing professionally in 1883, in Australia. He beat Jim Crawford there by getting a knockout in three rounds. Fitzsimmons had his first 28 definite professional fights in Australia, where he lost the Australian Middleweight title to Mick Dooley (rumours spoke of a fixed bout) and where he also won a fight by knockout while on the floor: when Edward Starlight Robins dropped Fitzsimmons to the canvas in round nine of their fight, he also broke his hand and could not continue, therefore the referee declared Fitzsimmons the winner by a knockout.
neg_context_en: In the early 1880s Jem Mace, an English bare-knuckle boxer, travelled to New Zealand, and Timaru hosted both his boxing school, and the first boxing championships held in New Zealand. Fitzsimmons entered the tournament, and knocked out four opponents on his way to winning the competition. He successfully defended his title in the subsequent competition. During one of these tournament, it is often suggested that Fitzsimmons defeated Herbert Slade, a professional heavyweight boxer who was touring with Mace, but Slade was touted as being undefeated in 1883, and it is possible that it was Slade's brother that Fitzsimmons beat. After these tournaments, Fitzsimmons boxed at least six times in New Zealand, including some bare knuckle bouts, but it is unclear if he received payment for his fights during this time.

The Fitzsimmons vs Sharkey Heavyweight Championship boxing match between Bob Fitzsimmons and Tom Sharkey was awarded by referee Wyatt Earp to Sharkey after Fitzsimmons knocked Sharkey to the mat. Earp ruled that Fitzsimmons had hit Sharkey when he was down, but very few witnessed the purported foul. The fans at the December 2, 1896 fight in San Francisco booed Earp's decision. It was the first heavyweight championship fight since James J. Corbett, the prior champion, had retired from boxing the year before. The fight may have been the most anticipated fight on American soil that year.
In June 1901 Fitzsimmons took part in a wrestling match against Gus Ruhlin. He lost and went back to boxing. He then enjoyed legitimate boxing knockouts of leading contenders Ruhlin and Tom Sharkey.

Fitzsimmons spent the next two years fighting non-title bouts and exhibitions until giving Hall a chance at the title in 1893. He retained the crown by a knockout in round four. He spent the rest of that year doing exhibitions, and on 2 June, he had scheduled a two-way exhibition where he would demonstrate in public how to hit the boxing bag and then how to box against a real opponent. Reportedly, two freak accidents happened that day: Fitzsimmons hit the bag so hard that it broke, and then his opponent of that day allegedly slipped, getting hit in the head and the boxing exhibition was cancelled.

The Fitzsimmons-Maher Prizefight (February 21, 1896), also considered, unofficially, as the 1896 World Heavyweight Championship, occurred between Bob Fitzsimmons and Peter Maher on a sandbar in the Rio Grande River just far enough outside of the American city of Langtry, Texas, in which state boxing was illegal, to be considered technically in the Mexican state of Coahuila de Zaragoza. Fitzsimmons was victorious, knocking Maher out in the first round; however, upon hearing of the outcome of the fight, the 1895 World Heavyweight Champion James J. Corbett immediately rescinded his retirement.

Robert James Fitzsimmons (26 May 1863 – 22 October 1917) was a British professional boxer who made boxing history as the sport's first three-division world champion. He also achieved fame for beating Gentleman Jim Corbett, (the man who beat John L. Sullivan), and he is in "The Guinness Book of World Records" as the lightest heavyweight champion. Nicknamed "Ruby Robert" and "The Freckled Wonder", he took pride in his lack of scars and appeared in the ring wearing heavy woollen underwear to conceal the disparity between his trunk and leg-development. He was also known for his pure fighting skills due to dislike of training for fights, which cost him at times in his career.
The first triple champion of boxing was Bob Fitzsimmons when he added the Light Heavyweight crown to his World Middleweight and Heavyweight belts on November 25, 1903.

The statue "Peace" on the Dewey Arch was modelled on Fitsimmons by the sculptor Daniel Chester French. A statue of Fitzsimmons has also stood in the city centre of Timaru, New Zealand, since 1987. It was commissioned by New Zealand millionaire boxing fan Bob Jones and sculpted by Margriet Windhausen.

After vacating the Middleweight title, Fitzsimmons began campaigning at heavyweight (the light heavyweight division did not exist at that time). On 2 December 1896, the San Francisco Athletic Club sponsored a fight at the Mechanics' Pavilion in San Francisco between Fitzsimmons and Tom Sharkey. Unable to find a referee, they called on former lawman Wyatt Earp. He had officiated 30 or so matches in earlier days, though not under the Marquess of Queensberry rules. The fight may have been the most anticipated fight on American soil that year. Fitzsimmons was favoured to win, and bets flowed heavily his way. Earp entered the ring still armed with his customary Colt .45 and drew a lot of attention when he had to be disarmed. He later said he forgot he was wearing it. Fitzsimmons was taller and quicker than Sharkey and dominated the fight from the opening bell. In the eighth round, Fitzsimmons hit Sharkey with his famed "solar plexus punch," an uppercut under the heart that could render a man temporarily helpless. The punch caught Sharkey, Earp, and most of the crowd by surprise, and Sharkey dropped, clutched his groin, and rolled on the canvas, screamed foul.
question_src: Bob Fitzsimmons什么时候开始专业拳击？
pos_context_src: 拳击记录簿显示Fitzsimmons于1883年在澳大利亚正式开始专业拳击。他通过三轮淘汰赛击败吉姆·克劳福德（Jim Crawford）。菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）在澳大利亚进行了首次28次明确的职业战斗，在那里他输给了米克·杜利（Mick Dooley）（谣言谈到了固定的回合），他在地板上也通过淘汰赛赢得了一场战斗：当爱德华·史塔兰德·罗宾斯（Edward Starlight Robins）将菲茨斯蒙斯（Fitzsimmmons）丢给了他的手中，他也无法打败他们的战斗，因此，他也无法打败，因此，他的战斗局长，所以他的战斗局长了，因此，他的斗争中的胜利是，因此，他的斗争中的胜利是，因此，他的斗争中的胜利是，因此，他的斗争中的胜利也不得 昏死。
neg_context_title_src: 菲茨西蒙斯 - 马赫奖
neg_context_src: 在1880年代初期，杰姆·梅斯（Jem Mace）是一位英国裸露的拳击手，前往新西兰，蒂马鲁（Timaru）主持了他的拳击学校，以及在新西兰举行的首个拳击锦标赛。菲茨西蒙斯参加了比赛，并在赢得比赛的路上淘汰了四个对手。他在随后的比赛中成功捍卫了自己的冠军。在其中一场比赛中，经常有人建议菲茨西蒙斯击败了赫伯特·斯莱德（Herbert Slade），他是一位专业的重量级拳击手，他正在与梅斯（Mace）一起巡回演出，但斯莱德（Slade）在1883年被宣布不败，可能是斯莱德（Slade）的兄弟菲茨·蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）击败了。在这些比赛之后，菲茨西蒙斯在新西兰至少拳击了六次，其中包括一些裸露的指关节比赛，但目前尚不清楚他在这段时间里是否获得了战斗付款。

Fitzsimmons vs Sharkey重量级冠军拳击比赛Bob Fitzsimmons和Tom Sharkey之间被裁判Wyatt Earp授予Sharkey，此前Fitzsimmons将Sharkey击倒了MAT。埃普（Earp）裁定，菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）摔倒时击中了沙基（Sharkey），但很少有人目睹据称犯规。 1896年12月2日在旧金山的战斗中，球迷们嘘了厄普的决定。这是自前一年退休以来的第一次重量级冠军冠军。这场战斗可能是当年在美国土地上最受期待的战斗。
1901年6月，菲茨西蒙斯参加了与古斯·鲁林（Gus Ruhlin）的摔跤比赛。他输了，回到拳击。然后，他享受了主要竞争者鲁林和汤姆·沙基的合法拳击淘汰赛。

菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）在接下来的两年中与非标题的比赛和展览作斗争，直到霍尔（Hall）在1893年获得冠军的机会。他在那一年的余下时间进行展览，并在6月2日安排了一个双向展览，他将在公共场合展示如何击中拳击袋，然后如何与真正的对手打交道。据报道，那天发生了两次怪胎事故：菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）击中了袋子，以至于打破了袋子，然后他那天的对手据称滑倒了，被击中了头部，拳击展览被取消了。

菲茨西蒙斯 - 马赫奖（Fitzsimmons-Maher Priefight）（1896年2月21日）也非正式地考虑了1896年世界重量级冠军，发生在鲍勃·菲茨西蒙斯（Bob Fitzsimmons）和彼得·马赫（Peter Maher）之间在里奥格兰德河（Rio Grande River）的砂着邦（Sandbar）上的帕克·菲茨西姆斯（Bob Fitzsimmons）和彼得·马赫（Peter Maher）之间，就足够远的是在兰格里（Langtry of State of）的兰格里（Langtry of State of Coh），这是在这一州义务事务所，与该州的国际交易者（Illegan）相提并论。 Zaragoza。菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）取得了胜利，在第一轮比赛中淘汰了马赫（Maher）。然而，在听到战斗的结果后，1895年世界重量级冠军詹姆斯·J·科贝特立即撤销了他的退休。

罗伯特·詹姆斯·菲茨西蒙斯（Robert James Fitzsimmons）（1863年5月26日至1917年10月22日）是英国专业拳击手，他成为这项运动的第一个三分球冠军的拳击历史。他还因击败绅士吉姆·科贝特（Jim Corbett）（击败约翰·沙利文（John L.他被昵称为“ Ruby Robert”和“ The Freckled Wonder”，他以缺乏伤疤为荣，并穿着重型羊毛内衣出现在戒指中，以掩盖他的树干和腿部开发之间的差异。由于不喜欢战斗的训练，他还以其纯粹的战斗技巧而闻名，这有时使他在职业生涯中造成了损失。
拳击的第一个三级冠军是鲍勃·菲茨西蒙斯（Bob Fitzsimmons），他于1903年11月25日为他的世界中量级和重量级腰带增加了轻量级的冠军。
杜威拱门上的“和平”是由雕塑家丹尼尔·切斯特·法国（Daniel Chester French）仿照拟合的。自1987年以来，菲茨西蒙斯雕像也一直位于新西兰蒂马鲁市中心。它是由新西兰百万富翁拳击迷鲍勃·琼斯（Bob Jones）委托的，并由玛格丽特·温豪森（Margriet Windhausen）雕刻。

在撤消了中量级冠军之后，菲茨西蒙斯开始在重量级比赛中竞选（当时不存在轻量级分区）。 1896年12月2日，旧金山体育俱乐部赞助了Fitzsimmons和Tom Sharkey之间在旧金山的机械师馆举行的一场战斗。他们找不到裁判，他们拜访了前律师怀亚特·埃普（Wyatt Earp）。尽管不遵守昆士莓规则的侯爵，但他曾在早些时候主持30场左右的比赛。这场战斗可能是当年在美国土地上最受期待的战斗。菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）很喜欢赢得胜利，赌注大量流动。埃普（Earp）进入戒指，仍然带着他的习惯柯尔特（Colt .45）武装，当他不得不解除武装时引起了很多关注。他后来说他忘了他穿着它。菲茨西蒙斯（Fitzsimmons）比沙基（Sharkey）高，更快，并从开场铃中占据了战斗。在第八轮中，菲茨西蒙斯用他著名的“太阳丛拳”打击了沙基，这是一个内心深处的上衣，可以使一个人暂时无助。拳打抓住了沙基，厄普和大多数人群，而沙基掉了下来，抓住了腹股沟，滚动在画布上，犯规。
report_src: 鲍勃·菲茨西蒙斯于1883年在澳大利亚正式开始其职业拳击生涯，当年他在一场三回合的比赛中击倒吉姆·克劳福德，取得首场职业胜利[1]。

question_en: When were stradivarius violins made?
pos_context_en: According to the Finnish Broadcasting Company YLE, Berglund's Stradivarius violin was sold by his heirs in 2012 to the Finnish Cultural Foundation for 1.8 million euros. At the same time the performing artist's rights to Berglund's recordings as well as his valuable collection of orchestral sheet music were donated to the foundation. The latter material will be made available to researchers in ten years' time. The violin will be named Stradivarius ex. Berglund. Mr Berglund's son Juha Berglund, the spokesperson for the family, says that his father had several instruments, but the Stradivari was the dearest to him. Mr Berglund's specific wish was that the violin should stay in Finland. The violin was built in around 1700. The violin is in exceptionally good condition for its age.
neg_context_title_en: Player preferences among new and old violins
neg_context_en:
In his teens Temianka played a Laurentius Storioni of 1780. While traveling under the aegis of the Curtis Institute, he briefly played a loaned Stradivarius, which was exchanged for a Januarius Gagliano. In 1929 Temianka owned the violin made in 1752 by Joannes Baptista Guadagnini. In the 1930s he played a Silvestre violin, with which he made his early Vintage recordings, and subsequently a Januarius Gagliano and a Carlo Bergonzi.
The Stradivarius he played during the years of the Paganini Quartet was the "Comte Cozio di Salabue" of 1727, which was Paganini's own concert violin. It was later played by Martin Beaver, first violinist of the Tokyo String Quartet, which played since 1995 on the same quartet of Stradivarius instruments once owned by Paganini, until the Tokyo String Quartet retired in July 2013. These remarkable instruments—the viola had inspired Paganini to commission Hector Berlioz's "Harold en Italie"—were also played by the Cleveland Quartet for almost 15 years, beginning in 1982, and are presently owned by Nippon Music Foundation of Japan, after deacquisition by the Corcoran Gallery in the mid-1990s for $15 million. They were then played for several years by the Hagen Quartet, and are now in the hands of the Quartetto di Cremona.
When the years of the Paganini Quartet came to an end, Temianka played a Michelangelo Bergonzi of 1759. His recordings of the Handel Sonatas were made on an Andrea Guarneri of 1687.In February 2013, Chapman University endowed the Henri Temianka Professorship in Music and Scholarship in String Studies. The violin played by Albert Saparoff, concertmaster of the Hollywood Symphony, was endowed as the Temianka-Saparoff violin, and is dedicated for the use of a selected recipient while studying there.

Dalley plays a Nicolas Lupot violin, made in France in 1810. Some years ago the quartet members were approached by the Corcoran Gallery in Washington, D.C., which made a very generous offer of possible extended use by the quartet of its rare Stradivarius instruments. Antonio Stradivarius of Cremona produced a life-time of fine instruments. At the time of the offer, there were only 500 violins, fifty cellos, and ten violas still extant. Although much less rare than the Stradivarii, the specific venerable instruments owned and played by the quartet's members, with their craftsmanship, type of wood, varnish, and all of substantial age, together "created such a warmth and complexity of sound that enticed, then seduced each of us." The offer to use the Stradivarii was politely declined. At this writing Dalley has been playing the violin for 75 years. He refers to his violin as his friend.

Du Pré primarily played on two Stradivarius cellos, one from 1673 and the Davidov Stradivarius of 1712. Both instruments were gifts from her godmother, Ismena Holland. She performed with the 1673 Stradivarius from 1961 until 1964, when she acquired the Davidov. Many of her most famous recordings were made on this instrument, including the Elgar Concerto with Barbirolli, the Robert Schumann Cello Concerto with Barenboim and the two Brahms cello sonatas. From 1969 to 1970 she (like Casals before her) played on a Francesco Goffriller cello, and in 1970 acquired a modern instrument from the Philadelphia violin maker Sergio Peresson. It was the Peresson cello that du Pré played for the remainder of her career until 1973, using it for a second, live, recording of the Elgar Concerto, and her last studio recording, of Frédéric Chopin's Cello Sonata in G minor and César Franck's Violin Sonata in A arranged for cello, in December 1971.

In 1885 he came to New York. While in the United States, he made it a practice to visit Hamburg every summer. He reportedly died from grief over the loss of his 1725 Stradivarius violin, which was stolen from him on 31 March 1894. It was his favorite, and he would play on no other in a concert. After Bott's death, a violin was found in the store of Victor S. Fletcher at 23 Union Square which his widow said was the stolen violin. She pointed to various identifying features, and two violin makers, August Gemünder and John Friedrich, testified that it was a Stradivarius, contradicting a Mr. Ross who had purchased the violin from Fletcher and said he did not think it a Stradivarius.

Yo-Yo Ma played his Stradivarius cello called the "Davidov Stradivarius", made in 1712 during Stradivari's "golden period". Itzhak Perlman played his Stradivarius violin called the "Soil Stradivarius", made in 1714 during Stradivari's "golden period". Gabriela Montero played a Steinway concert grand piano, model D-274. Anthony McGill played a Buffet clarinet.

The Lady Blunt is one of the two best-preserved Stradivarius violins in existence. It has survived, like the Messiah Stradivarius of 1716, in near-original condition, since it has resided mostly in the hands of collectors and seen little use. It was built on the PG form, being a mature golden period violin. The violin also retains its original neck. It has been played very rarely; Yehudi Menuhin played it in 1971, when the instrument was up for sale. In 2011 it was described as "the best-preserved Stradivarius to be offered for sale in the past century."

The Messiah-Salabue Stradivarius of 1716 is a violin made by Italian luthier Antonio Stradivari of Cremona. It is considered to be the only Stradivarius in existence in "as new" state. It is in the collection of the Ashmolean Museum in Oxford, England.

There have been many comparisons of Stradivarius and other old violins with more recent violins since 1817. They generally have found no differences in either subjective impressions or acoustic analysis. However, the tests have been criticized on various grounds. In a well-known 1977 experiment, Isaac Stern and Pinchas Zukerman and a classical violin dealer, Charles Beare, listened to a Stradivarius, a Guarneri, and a 1976 British violin. They were also unable to identify which instrument was which, and two of them mistakenly identified the 1976 violin as the Stradivarius.

The Molitor Stradivarius is an antique violin made by Italian luthier Antonio Stradivari of Cremona in 1697, the very beginning of the maker's celebrated "Golden" period. It bears the label "Antonius Stradivarius Cremonensis / Faciebat Anno 1697" and is branded to the lower rib, "Curtis Phila."
question_src: Stradivarius小提琴是什么时候制作的？
pos_context_src: 根据芬兰广播公司YLE的说法，伯格伦德的Stradivarius小提琴在2012年由他的继承人以180万欧元的价格出售给芬兰文化基金会。同时，表演艺术家的伯格伦德（Berglund）录音的权利以及他宝贵的管弦乐乐队音乐集（Offerestral Segpeque）捐赠给了基金会。后一种材料将在十年内提供给研究人员。小提琴将被命名为Stradivarius Ex。 Berglund。伯格伦德先生的儿子Juha Berglund是一家人的发言人，他的父亲有几种乐器，但Stradivari对他来说是最珍爱的。伯格伦德先生的特定愿望是小提琴应该留在芬兰。小提琴建于1700年左右。小提琴的年龄非常好。
neg_context_title_src: 让·约瑟夫·博特（Jean Joseph Bott）
布朗特·斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯夫人
弥赛亚·斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯
新旧小提琴中的玩家偏好
neg_context_src:
在他的十几岁的时候，西安卡（Temianka）扮演了1780年的劳伦蒂乌斯·斯托里奥尼（Laurentius Storioni）。在柯蒂斯学院（Curtis Institute）的宙斯盾（Aegis of Curtis Institute）下旅行时，他短暂地扮演了一辆租借的斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Stradivarius），后者被换成了Januarius Gagliano。 1929年，Temianka拥有Joannes Baptista Guadagnini于1752年制作的小提琴。在1930年代，他演奏了Silvestre小提琴，并与之制作了早期的唱片，随后是Januarius Gagliano和Carlo Bergonzi。
他在Paganini四重奏中演奏的Stradivarius是1727年的“ Comte Cozio di Salabue”，这是Paganini自己的音乐会小提琴。它后来由东京弦乐四重奏的第一只小提琴家马丁·比弗（Martin Beaver）饰演，自1995年以来，曾经由帕加尼尼（Paganini）拥有的Stradivarius Quarterments在同一批四重奏中演奏，直到2013年7月Tokyo String Quartet退休了。这些了不起的乐器。 15年，从1982年开始，目前由日本日本的日本音乐基金会拥有，在1990年代中期的Corcoran画廊以1500万美元的价格停用后。然后，哈根四重奏将他们播放了几年，现在掌握在四重奏迪克雷莫纳的手中。
When the years of the Paganini Quartet came to an end, Temianka played a Michelangelo Bergonzi of 1759. His recordings of the Handel Sonatas were made on an Andrea Guarneri of 1687.In February 2013, Chapman University endowed the Henri Temianka Professorship in Music and Scholarship in String Studies.好莱坞交响乐团的音乐会大师阿尔伯特·萨帕罗夫（Albert Saparoff）扮演的小提琴被授予Temianka-Saparoff小提琴，并致力于在那里学习时使用选定的接收者。

达利（Dalley）扮演着1810年在法国制造的尼古拉斯·卢波特（Nicolas Lupot）小提琴。几年前，四重奏成员是由华盛顿特区的Corcoran画廊接近的，该画廊非常慷慨地提供了四重奏的稀有Stradivarius Instruments。 Cremona的Antonio Stradivarius生产了一生的精美乐器。在提议时，仍然存在500个小提琴，五十个大提琴和十个小提琴。虽然比Stradivarii少得多，但四重奏成员拥有和演奏的特定的尊贵乐器，其工艺，木材类型，清漆和整个年龄段的年龄，“创造了一种诱使的声音和复杂性，然后诱使我们每个人。”使用Stradivarii的要约被礼貌地拒绝了。在撰写本文中，达利（Dalley）扮演小提琴已有75年了。他称他的小提琴为他的朋友。

杜·普雷（DuPré）主要在两个斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Stradivarius）大提琴上演奏，一个是1673年的一个，1712年的戴维夫·斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Davidov Stradivarius）。这两种乐器都是她教母伊斯梅纳·霍兰德（Ismena Holland）的礼物。从1961年到1964年，她与1673年的Stradivarius一起演出，当时她获得了Davidov。她的许多最著名的录音都是在该乐器上制作的，包括与Barbirolli的Elgar Concerto，Robert Schumann大提琴协奏曲与Barenboim和两个Brahms大提琴奏鸣曲。从1969年到1970年，她（像凯尔斯之前一样）在Francesco Goffriller大提琴上演奏，并于1970年从费城小提琴制造商Sergio Peresson那里获得了现代乐器。直到1973年，杜帕尔（Peresson Cello）一直在她的剩余职业生涯中演奏，直到1973年使用它，唱片《埃尔加协奏曲》（Elgar Concerto）和她的最后一部工作室录音，以及弗雷德里克·肖邦（FrédéricChopin）的大提琴奏鸣曲，在G Minor和CésarFranckfranck的小提琴索纳塔（Curesar Franck）在1971年12月安排了大提琴的小提琴中。

1885年，他来到纽约。在美国，他是每年夏天访问汉堡的习惯。据报道，他因失去1725年的斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯小提琴而死于悲伤，该小提琴于1894年3月31日被他偷走了。这是他的最爱，他在音乐会上没有其他比赛。博特（Bott）死后，在23联合广场的维克多·弗莱彻（Victor S. Fletcher）的商店里发现了小提琴，他的遗ow说这是被盗的小提琴。她指出了各种识别功能，两个小提琴制造商奥古斯·杰恩德（AugustGemünder）和约翰·弗里德里希（John Friedrich）作证说，这是一个史特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Stradivarius），与罗斯先生相矛盾，罗斯先生从弗莱彻（Fletcher）购买了小提琴，并说他不认为这是斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Stradivarius）。

Yo-Yo MA演奏了他的Stradivarius大提琴，称为“ Davidov Stradivarius”，于1712年在Stradivari的“黄金时期”中制作。 Itzhak Perlman演奏了他的Stradivarius小提琴，称为“土壤Stradivarius”，于1714年在Stradivari的“黄金时期”中制作。加布里埃拉·蒙特罗（Gabriela Montero）演奏了Steinway音乐会大钢琴D-274。安东尼·麦吉尔（Anthony McGill）演奏了自助式单簧管。

Blunt女士是存在的两种保存最完好的Stradivarius小提琴之一。它像1716年的弥赛亚·斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Messiah Stradivarius）一样幸存下来，处于近乎原状的状态，因为它主要驻留在收藏家手中，几乎没有使用。它建立在PG形式上，是一个成熟的黄金时期小提琴。小提琴还保留了原始的脖子。它很少演奏。 Yehudi Menuhin在1971年播放该乐器时播放了它。在2011年，它被描述为“过去一个世纪出售的保存最完好的Stradivarius”。
1716年的Messiah-Salabue Stradivarius是由Cremona的意大利琴弦Antonio Stradivari制作的小提琴。它被认为是“新”状态中唯一存在的史特拉迪瓦里乌斯。它是在英国牛津的Ashmolean博物馆的收藏中。

自1817年以来，斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯和其他旧小提琴与最近的小提琴进行了许多比较。他们通常在主观印象或声学分析中没有差异。但是，测试已受到各种理由的批评。在1977年著名的实验中，艾萨克·斯特恩（Isaac Stern）和齐克曼（Pinchas Zukerman）以及古典小提琴经销商查尔斯·贝雷（Charles Beare）听了史特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Stradivarius），瓜纳里（Guarneri）和1976年的英国小提琴。他们也无法识别哪种乐器是哪种乐器，其中两个错误地将1976年的小提琴确定为Stradivarius。
莫特·斯特拉迪瓦里乌斯（Molitor Stradivarius）是1697年Cremona的意大利Luthier Antonio Stradivari制作的古董小提琴，这是制造商著名的“ Golden”时期的开始。它带有标签“ Antonius Stradivarius Cremonensis / Faciebat Anno 1697”，并在下层肋骨上贴上了烙印，” Curtis Phila。
report_src: 这把Stradivarius小提琴大约制作于1700年左右[1]。

question_en: Does the character Kaine Parker appear in any Marvel films?
pos_context_en: Kaine Parker is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character has been depicted as a superhero and former supervillain who serves as an ally, an enemy, and a foil of Spider-Man (Peter Parker) and Ben Reilly. Created by Terry Kavanagh and Steven Butler, the character first appeared in "Web of Spider-Man" #119 (December 1994) as the Jackal's first failed attempt of a clone of Spider-Man. He later appeared as the new Scarlet Spider in the "Marvel Point One" one-shot in November 2011 before starring in his own series.
neg_context_title_en: List of Marvel Comics characters: M
neg_context_en: However, on February 9, 2015, Sony Pictures and Marvel Studios announced that Spider-Man would appear in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU), with the character appearing in an MCU film and Sony releasing a "Spider-Man" film co-produced by Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige and Amy Pascal. Sony Pictures will continue to own, finance, distribute, and exercise final creative control over the "Spider-Man" films. The next month, Marvel Entertainment CCO Joe Quesada indicated that the Peter Parker version of the character would be used, which Feige confirmed in April. Feige also stated that Marvel had been working to add Spider-Man to the MCU since at least October 2014. The following June, Feige clarified that the initial Sony deal does not allow the character to appear in any of the MCU television series, as it was "very specific... with a certain amount of back and forth allowed." In November 2016, Holland revealed that he was signed for "three Spider-Man movies and three solo movies". In June 2017, Holland, Feige and Watts confirmed that a child wearing an Iron Man mask whom Stark saves from a drone in "Iron Man 2" (portrayed by Max Favreau) was a young Peter Parker, retroactively making it the introduction of the character to the MCU.

On July 22, 2011, during the San Diego Comic-Con, Marvel released an image to the audience depicting a burnt sweater of the original Scarlet Spider. This led many readers to assume that Ben Reilly would be returning and taking on the mantle of Scarlet Spider once again. However, through introduction of the Marvel Now event, Marvel Point One showed readers that Kaine Parker would be the main character in the new Scarlet Spider series.

The Ultimate Marvel version of Kaine is depicted as a misguided, disfigured clone who wears a tattered version of Ben Reilly's Spider-Man costume. Like Spider-Man (Peter Parker), Kaine possessed superhuman strength, reflexes, equilibrium and had a spider-sense. Created by ambitious mastermind Dr. Octopus (acting with consent of the CIA), he kidnaps Mary Jane Watson and attempts to give his captive superpowers (via OZ), triggering a transformation into a large red monster despite Tarantula's efforts. While trying to prevent Mary Jane from being taken, Kaine is killed by Nick Fury's Spider Slayers.

It was revealed in the "Marvel Point One" one shot that Kaine is the new Scarlet Spider in his own ongoing series. This was confirmed by editor Stephen Wacker in the "Letters to the Editor" page of "The Amazing Spider-Man" #673.

Kaine makes good on this in the new 2017 series "" where he confronts Ben Reilly upon tracking him to Las Vegas and they get into a fight. Ben convinces Kaine to stand down by arguing that he is genuinely trying to cure Abigail Mercury's terminal condition, but Kaine makes it clear to Ben that he will kill his "brother" for protecting the world if the girl dies and once Ben has saved her life. After Abigail Mercury because Ben tested a new drug on her too quickly, he is attacked by Kaine once again only for Kaine to be "killed" by what appears to be Marlo Chandler. The character that resembles Marlo Chandler then quickly identifies herself as actually being Death in disguise. She offers Ben the chance to restore Abigail Mercury or Kaine to life before she departs. When Ben asks her to save both of them and kill him instead, Death not only heals the other two, but also restores Ben to a healthy physical appearance, affirming that he has made a start on his efforts to redeem himself of his sins as the Jackal.

Alison Mongrain is a recurring character in "The Amazing Spider-Man" comic books during the latter half of the Clone Saga. She served as an agent of Norman Osborn, who had returned to North America to personally finish off Peter Parker and destroy everything he had held dear, which included his unborn child May Parker. In the final storyline of the Clone Saga, "Revelations", Mongrain's task was to poison Peter's pregnant wife Mary Jane Watson, forcing her into premature labor. In the alternate universe of the MC2 "Spider-Girl" title, Mongrain was tracked down by Peter's first clone Kaine, who rescued May from her grip and returned her to Peter and Mary Jane. Having bonded with May whilst keeping her prisoner, Alison returns sometime later with the intent of killing Normie Osborn whose brief tenure as the Green Goblin convince her that he would harm the child that she grew attached to. Spider-Girl. having been informed of her intents by Kaine reassured Mongrain that the child is safe by unmasking herself.

Kaine appears during the miniseries exploring the Clone Saga as it was originally conceived. He is working for both a shadowy figure and Jackal for unknown reasons and attacks Ben Reilly and Peter Parker when they first meet. After Jackal targets Mary Jane, Kaine leads them to Jackal's lair, only for all three to be captured. It is at this point that the two learn that Kaine is another Parker clone. When Kaine sees Gwen Stacy being cloned, he breaks all three free before burning the Mark of Kaine into Jackal's face and breaking his neck. When the building explodes, Kaine escapes, having stolen both Jackal's clone stabilizing agent and a second pod containing an unknown clone for his shadowy boss. The figure is later revealed to be Harry Osborn still alive, with the pod containing a clone of Norman Osborn. The duo have Doctor Octopus make a clone-stabilizing agent. Later, Kaine is shown obtaining the infant May Parker from Allison Mongrain for Harry. He begins having doubts over Harry's plans when he holds the baby. After more soul-searching, he finally convinces himself to defy Harry's orders and returns the baby to Mary Jane Watson before escaping.
