neg_context_src: 2009年10月，维亚康姆（Viacom）从Mirage Studios购买了特许经营权时，将“青少年突变忍者海龟”带入了Nickelodeon家族，此后发行了一部新的CGI-Animated系列和现场动作电影。 2010年5月12日，该网络与海姆·萨班（Haim Saban）达成了一项协议，以获得广播“ Power Rangers”新剧集的权利（在Saban于当月早些时候从Walt Disney Company回购了该专营权的权利）。该网络从2011年2月7日的第18季首次亮相开始播出该系列节目，即“ Power Rangers Samurai”；作为交易的一部分，Nickelodeon还获得了该系列的所有700集的权利，此时在姐妹网络Nicktoons上广播，该系列开始于当年晚些时候播出该系列。 2011年1月1日，尼克（Nickelodeon）首次亮相“阿努比斯（Anubis）之屋”（House of Anubis），该系列基于荷兰尼克（Nickelodeon Netherlands）系列“ Het Huis Anubis”，该系列成为第一个以工作日播放的原始脚本系列（类似于Soap Opera Format）。它在英国生产，也是美国旗舰频道首个在北美以外生产的原始系列。

1991年8月11日，Nickelodeon在Nicktoons Banner下首次亮相了其第一个原始动画系列“ Doug”，“ Rugrats”和“ Ren＆Stimpy Show”。这些程序的开发是对网络以前担心的逆转，因为Nickelodeon此前由于高生产成本而拒绝每周生产动画系列。这三个系列在1993年取得了成功，从而创建了该网络的第四个尼克（Nicktoon）“洛克（Rocko）的现代生活”，这也取得了成功。后来，Nickelodeon与Sony Wonder（目前是Sony Pictures Home Entertainment）合作，发布了该网络在VHS上的情节汇编，该节目成为了最卖家，直到1996年，Nickelodeon将其发行版转换为Paramount Home Entertainment，并随着Paramount重新发布该网络在VHS上的Nicktoons的发行汇编。 “道格”和“ Ren＆Stimpy Show”都将在那个时候结束生产；但是，作为ABC周六早上阵容的一部分，“道格”将在1996年复兴。另一方面，“ Rugrats”于1997年5月9日从休假中返回（重播一直持续到那时）。 1992年8月15日，该网络将周六的时间表延长了两个小时，并于下午8:00至10:00推出了一个名为Snick的黄金时段街区。东部和太平洋时间；多年来，斯尼克（Snick）成为了诸如“你害怕黑暗吗？”，“克拉丽莎（Clarissa）”，“所有”，“所有”，“ Amanda Show”和“ Kenan＆Kel”之类的节目。 2004年，该街区被重新格式化为Teenick的星期六版，该版本最初是在2000年的周日晚上首次亮相。今天的周六晚上街区今天仍在2009年至2012年，当时“ Gotta See See Sethdays”品牌在周六早上和Primetime Blocks中被采用。此后，这款tegeick品牌的拼写已更改为Teennick，此后一直在以前被称为N的Nickelodeon姊妹频道上使用。 1990年，Nickelodeon于1993年6月恢复了“ Nickelodeon杂志”。1993年3月，该频道吸引了观众的帮助，以提出新的形状，在网络促销中显示其标志性的橙色徽标。所选的设计 - 帽子，气球，装备，火箭和顶部以及其他形状 - 主要是3D渲染，并与1993年6月的新促销图形套餐一起首次亮相。《星期六黄金时段街区的成功》导致Nickelodeon在1996年其他晚上将其节目扩展到了Prineptim，并在1996年的其他夜晚扩展了其广播的日报。东部和太平洋时间（后来从1998年至2009年下午9:00）在周日至周五晚上。

1998年11月，维亚康姆国际媒体网络欧洲；然后，MTV Networks欧洲宣布在非洲创建Nickelodeon。该频道将与MTV Europe一起广播。 1999年7月1日推出的一个编程块，尼克（Nickelodeon）在这里显示在Mnet的儿童块K-TV上播出。 2005年，K-TV决定停止广播Nickelodeon制作的节目。 2008年，VIMN非洲决定在非洲推出24小时频道。
MTV Networks Africa还运营其他渠道，这些渠道包括Nickelodeon的本地版本，并推广MTV Live HD，VH1，MTV，MTV，MTV葡萄牙和MTV France的欧洲版本。

在1990年代中期，尼克（Nickelodeon）决定将一些真人剧系列的生产转移到佛罗里达州奥兰多市环球影城的Nickelodeon Studios。经过一年的侦察声舞台之后，该网络在派拉蒙（Paramount）图片上度过了一年的头条新闻，然后Nickelodeon获得了6238 Sunset Blvd设施的租约，获得了声音舞台，并在1997年在日落时在Sunset上重塑了Nickelodeon，到1997年到1997年，由于有限的工作空间，需要在几个节目中控制一些计划。结果，为该网络制作的其他真人赛系列是在整个好莱坞地区的其他舞台设施中拍摄的，并在整个好莱坞地区进行了封闭的策略。
在尼克（Nickelodeon）拍摄的一些节目包括“所有”，“阿曼达表演”，“ Drake＆Josh”，以及最近的“ Icarly”和“ Victorious”的十季跑。
2009年9月28日，该网络被重新启动为小尼克（Nick Jr.尼克·小（Nick Jr.）允许，特别是当网络运营一个单一的东部时区饲料时，这会导致尼克莫姆（Nickmom）街区在所有六个美国时区都同时播出（早在夏威夷 - 亚利亚人时区，最早在下午5:00广播）。虽然传统广告在尼克莫姆（Nickmom）块期间出现在频道上，但该网络否则仅运行编程促销活动和承销商风格的赞助，以代替常规广告。

Nicktoons于2002年5月1日启动，当时是数字有线电缆的MTV Digital Suite的一部分Nicktoons TV，以吸引有线电视运营商接收网络并为他们提供比卫星服务的营销优势。但是，到2004年初，Nickelodeon管理层更改了课程，并将其提供给Digital Satellite Services DirectV和Dish Network。该网络最初是无商业销售的，喜剧促销活动涉及Nickelodeon Animation Studios，来自国外市场的两分钟的卡通短裤，以及以前在Nickelodeon上使用过商业时间的计划促销活动。到2005年6月6日，随着网络的分布的增加，该网络开始定期进行广告。

TeenNick is a pay television network that is aimed at adolescents and young adults, which originated as a nighttime block called "The N" on Noggin (in a similar scheduling structure as Nickelodeon and Nick at Nite) on April 1, 2002, and was spun off into a standalone channel on December 31, 2007, when it took over the satellite transponder of Nickelodeon Games and Sports. On September 28, 2009, the network was rebranded as TeenNick, named after the former TEENick block that aired on Nickelodeon from July 2000 to February 2009. Although TeenNick has more relaxed program standards than the other Nickelodeon channels (save for Nick at Nite and the Nickmom block on Nick Jr.) – allowing for moderate profanity, suggestive dialogue and some violent content – the network has shifted its lineup almost exclusively towards current and前Nickelodeon系列（包括由于旗舰频道上的评级低而被烧毁的一些），其内容标准更严格。它还播放了一些获得的情景喜剧和戏剧系列（例如，自2003年以来一直以N网络为N），直到品牌重塑为止，还纳入了一些原始的编程。 2011年7月25日，Teennick于2015年10月开始播出“ 90年代的全部”，更名为“ Splat”，这是Nickelodeon 1990年代最受欢迎的编程的街区，针对该时代的网络目标人群。

Nickelodeon Creative Labs由艾米·弗里德曼（Amy Friedman）于1994年成立。该公司为Nickelodeon网络制作了运动图形和矮小材料，包括屡获殊荣的“短片短片”间质系列。 1996年，Nickelodeon Creative Labs开始使用Adobe After Effect，Photoshop和Power Macintosh计算机在内部生产Nick Jr.系列“蓝色的线索”。 1999年10月，Nickelodeon Creative Labs重新推出了Nick Digital；现在还制作了另一个小尼克（Nick Jr.）系列“小比尔”（Little Bill）。 2008年12月，MTV Networks计划在今年年底之前关闭Nick Digital。该公司最终保持开放，但是Nickelodeon Animation Studio的Nick Digital Branch接管了Nickelodeon动画系列的视觉效果。 2009年，Nickelodeon推出了Nickelodeon Creative Advertising，这是一家创意代理商，为儿童和家庭制作广告。
report_src: Nickelodeon 网络于1979年4月1日在华纳有线的全国专营权上正式启动，被定位为“所有儿童网络”[1]。

question_en: When was the Montana Vigilantes formed?
pos_context_en: The history of vigilante justice and the Montana Vigilantes began in 1863 in what was at the time a remote part of eastern Idaho Territory. Vigilante activities continued, although somewhat sporadically, through the Montana Territorial period until the territory became the state of Montana on November 8, 1889. Vigilantism arose because territorial law enforcement and the courts had very little power in the remote mining camps during the territorial period.
neg_context_en:
The first written account of the vigilantes was Thomas Dimsdale's "Vigilantes of Montana" which first appeared as a series of articles in 1865 editions of the "Montana Post", Virginia City's and Montana's first newspaper. Dimsdale was a member of the Alder Gulch Vigilance Committee and editor of the "Montana Post." His early accounts of the Alder Gulch vigilante events are widely cited and the book version of his articles, the first book published in Montana Territory in 1866, has been extensively reprinted since its first edition.
X. Biedler, one of the Alder Gulch and Helena vigilante enforcers wrote about his vigilante activities in his personal journals. They weren't available until well after his death when Helen F. Sanders, the daughter-in-law of Wilbur Sanders finally got them published in 1957. Nathaniel Langford, also a member of the vigilantes, explorer of the upper Yellowstone (1870), first superintendent of Yellowstone National Park (1872–1877), territorial tax collector (1864–1869) and author published "Vigilante Days and Ways-Pioneers of the Rockies" in 1893 after he returned to his home in Minnesota. In a 1912 speech to the Montana Historical Society, western historian, Olin Wheeler provided positive commentary on the Alder Gulch vigilantes in a tribute to the life of Nathaniel Langford.
Another account, not published until 1982, is that of former Montana Supreme Court Justice (1922–1935) Lew L. Callaway. Edited by his son Lew Callaway Jr., "Montana's Righteous Hangmen:The Vigilantes in Action" stems from Callaway's association with vigilante Captain James William in the late 1800s. Lew Callaway wrote extensively about the vigilantes and his stories which add more intimate details about how the vigilantes operated are captured in this volume. Although some vigilante activities during this period were criticized by citizens and civic leaders, there was a general affirmation of their purpose and contribution to law and order in a growing territory. Mark C. Dillon's "Montana Vigilantes 1863–1870 Gold, Guns and Gallows" (2013) concludes that given the lawless environment and criminal activity in Alder Gulch and Helena at the time, the lack of any functioning justice system and the understanding of due process at the time, the vigilantes acted in a way they thought was best for their communities. He contends that judging the vigilantes by today's understanding and standards of due process is problematic.
In 2004, Frederick Allen, a journalist and historian, published "A Decent and Orderly Lynching:The Montana Vigilantes" reviewed as an up-to-day balanced account of Montana's vigilante history (1864–1870). Allen's book reinforces the motivations and methods of the earliest vigilantes in Alder Gulch while commenting on the growing disdain for vigilantism in the late 1860s. More generalist works on Montana history such as Merrill G. Burlingame's "The Montana Frontier" (1942) and Michael P. Malone's "Montana-A History of Two Centuries" (1991) adequately summarize the vigilante period largely based on earlier accounts by Dimsdale, Langford and Biedler. Additionally, many topical histories of Montana, such as novelist and Montana historian Dan Cushman's "Montana: The Gold Frontier" (1973) cover the vigilante period.

As the gold fields of Alder Gulch and Grasshopper Creek declined in 1865, prospectors and fortune seekers migrated to newly discovered areas in and around Last Chance Gulch (now Helena, Montana). As lawlessness increased, vigilante justice continued there with the formation of the Committee of Safety in 1865. During the period 1865–1870, at least 14 alleged criminals were executed by Helena's vigilantes. In 1884, ranchers in Central and Eastern Montana resorted to vigilante justice to deal with cattle rustlers and horse thieves. The best-known vigilante group in that area were "Stuart's Stranglers", organized by Granville Stuart in the Musselshell region. As formal law enforcement became more prevalent in the region, vigilantism fell into decline.

Vigilantism in pre-territorial and territorial Montana has been written about, romanticized and chronicled in personal memoirs, biographies, documentary and scholarly works, film and fiction for well over a century. The first book published in Montana was Thomas J. Dimsdale's 1866 first edition of "The Vigilantes of Montana", which was compiled from a series of newspaper articles he wrote for the "Montana Post" in 1865. Historical analysis of the period ranges from disrepute to heroism, with debates over whether the lack of any functioning justice system and the understanding of due process at the time meant the vigilantes acted in a way they thought was best for their communities or if modern standards of due process should govern analysis of their actions.

On December 19–21, 1863, a public trial was held for George Ives, the suspected murderer of a young Dutch immigrant Nicholas Tiebolt. Hundreds of miners from around the area attended the 3-day, outdoor trial. George Ives was prosecuted by Wilbur F. Sanders and Ives was convicted and hanged on December 21, 1863. Sanders played a prominent role in Montana history and eventually became the first U.S. Senator from Montana when the territory gained statehood in 1889. While the Ives trial resulted in an execution many residents were frustrated by a cumbersome process that could easily be manipulated. This sentiment is illustrated by a quote from Thomas Dimsdale who wrote the first published account of the Montana Vigilantes, originally written in 1865 as a series of articles for the "Montana Post" and later compiled into a book.

The numerical symbol 3-7-77 has long been associated with Montana vigilantes. Its meaning is unclear though many theories have been put forward trying to explain what it symbolized, none conclusive, including references to the dimensions of a grave, the amount of time a miscreant had to leave town, assorted Masonic symbolism, details of membership structure, and a simple copying of the symbol from organizations in Colorado and California. Although it has been associated with vigilantes in Alder Gulch, this is not supported by historical evidence. The first documented evidence of use of the symbol in a vigilante scenario occurred in November 1879 in Helena when it was mentioned in a newspaper article. A 1914 dissertation noted that it was simply used as part of a meeting notice. It was incorporated into the uniform patch of the Montana Highway Patrol (MHP) in 1956. MHP administrator Alex Stephenson designed the insignia and explained, "we chose the symbol to keep alive the memory of this first people's police force."

Although the vigilance committee started as a small secret institution in Virginia City, knowledge of it soon spread in the territory and membership grew. As a secret organization, exact accounts of membership vary, but many members became prominent in the history of the territory and state. Among those who were members include Wilbur Sanders (1st U.S. Senator from Montana (1890)), Sidney Edgerton (first Governor of Montana Territory (1864)), Nelson Story (famous for his 1866 cattle drive from Texas to Bozeman and prominent Bozeman merchant), John Bozeman (founder of Bozeman, Montana (1864) and the Bozeman Trail), Nathaniel P. Langford (first Yellowstone National Park superintendent (1872–1877)), James Stuart (brother of Granville Stuart, who would form the Stuarts' Stranglers in 1884), Tom Cover (one of the Alder Gulch prospectors who discovered the first gold there and alleged murderer of John Bozeman (1867)) and Thomas Dimsdale (editor of Montana's first newspaper, the "Montana Post" and author of "The Vigilantes of Montana" (1866)).

The first stockmen's association in Montana was formed in Virginia City in 1873. The association was established to discuss branding standards, how to deal with rustling and how to influence the territorial legislature to pass laws favorable to the cattle industry. This association did not survive, but led to the creation of other organizations in subsequent years. In 1878, the Montana Stock Association of Lewis and Clark County was organized. One of its prominent members, Ross Deegan, editorialized about the need for extralegal action if the territorial legislature did not enact laws to protect the cattle industry:
In July, 1879, a Territorial Stock Association was formed that ultimately spawned a number of small county or district based associations throughout Montana. By 1883, the value of cattle in Montana was estimated at greater than $25 million and annual losses from rustling exceeded three percent. By the summer of 1884, cattle men resorted to vigilatism to deal with rustlers and the first recorded hanging occurred at Fort Maginnis on July 3, 1884, when Reese Anderson, a DHS ranch foreman, and several other ranch hands hanged Sam McKenzie for horse thievery.

On July 14, 1864, four prospectors—John S. Cowan, John Crab, Bob Staley and Daniel Jackson—found gold in a small creek they named "Last Chance Gulch". As word of the strike spread throughout the area, prospectors and fortune seekers, including many from Alder Gulch and Bannack, migrated to Last Chance Gulch and the town of Helena, Montana was founded. By the middle of 1865, many prominent vigilantes of Alder Gulch, including Wilbur Sanders, John X. Biedler, and Anton Holter, had moved to Helena. When the territory was formed, three judicial districts were established. The First District belonged to Judge Hosmer and included the towns of Bannack, Virginia City, Nevada City and Deer Lodge. The Third District encompassed the towns around Helena. From July 1864, until August 1865, the only justice system was the miners' court; the Third District did not get its first chief judge until August 1865, when Judge Lyman Munson arrived from the east.

Due to the secret nature of the organization it is difficult to be sure when an execution was carried out by the vigilance committee or another group of motivated citizens. In the months following the Ives trial many suspected road agents were hanged. Notably, Henry Plummer, the sheriff of Bannack, who was suspected by many of being the ringleader of the road agents. The Montana Vigilantes hanged men using the testimony of other men who faced their imminent executions as the sole evidence. Of the few accounts of the early actions of the Alder Gulch Vigilantes, Beidler and Dimsdale are the most complete, although they give little information about the secret trials conducted by the vigilantes. Estimates vary, but noted vigilante historian Frederick Allen believes that between the years 1863 and 1865 somewhere from 15 to 35 people were killed due to the actions of the Alder Gulch vigilantes.
question_src: 蒙大拿州的警惕是什么时候形成的？
pos_context_src: 维吉兰特司法和蒙大拿州警惕的历史始于1863年，当时是爱达荷州东部地区的偏远地区。在蒙大拿州的领土时期，维吉兰特的活动仍在继续，尽管有些零星，直到1889年11月8日领土成为蒙大拿州。由于领土的执法和法院在领土时期，在偏远的采矿营中，警惕性发生。
neg_context_src: 警惕者的第一个书面记录是托马斯·迪姆斯代尔（Thomas Dimsdale）的“蒙大拿州的警惕”，该文章首次出现在1865年的《蒙大拿州邮报》（Montana Post），弗吉尼亚市和蒙大拿州的第一张报纸上。 Dimsdale是Alder Gulch警惕委员会的成员，也是“ Montana Post”的编辑。他对Alder Gulch Vigilante事件的早期记录被广泛引用，他的文章的书版本是1866年在蒙大拿州领土上出版的第一本书，自第一版以来就已被广泛重印。 X. Biedler是Alder Gulch和Helena Vigilante Enforcers之一，他在他的个人期刊上写了他的警惕活动。他们直到他去世后才能获得，威尔伯·桑德斯（Wilbur Sanders）的daughter妇海伦·桑德斯（Helen F. Sanders）终于于1957年出版。落基山脉的途径在1893年回到明尼苏达州的家后。西方历史学家在1912年对蒙大拿州历史学会的讲话中，奥林·惠勒（Olin Wheeler）在对纳撒尼尔·兰福德（Nathaniel Langford）一生的敬意中就alder gulch守夜者发表了积极评论。直到1982年才出版的另一个说法是前蒙大拿州最高法院大法官（1922-1935）Lew L. Callaway。由他的儿子Lew Callaway Jr.编辑，“蒙大拿州的正义吊犬：行动中的警惕性”源于卡拉威（Callaway）在1800年代后期与维利兰特队长詹姆斯·威廉（James William）的联系。 Lew Callaway广泛写了有关警惕者及其故事的文章，这些故事增加了有关在本卷中如何捕获警惕者如何捕获警惕性的详细细节。尽管在此期间的一些警惕活动受到公民和公民领袖的批评，但人们对他们在不断增长的领土上对法律和秩序的贡献有所普遍肯定。标记 C.狄龙（C. Dillon）的“蒙大拿州警惕者1863-1870金，枪支和绞刑架”（2013年）得出结论，鉴于当时奥尔德·戈尔奇（Alder Gulch）和海伦娜（Helena）在阿尔德·戈尔奇（Alder Gulch）和海伦娜（Helena）的无法环境和犯罪活动中，缺乏正常运作的司法系统，以及当时对正当程序的理解，当时的警惕性在他们认为的方式上最适合他们的社区。他认为，根据当今的理解和适当程序的标准来判断警惕性是有问题的。 2004年，记者和历史学家弗雷德里克·艾伦（Frederick Allen）出版了“一个体面而有序的私刑：蒙大拿州警惕者”，被评论为对蒙大拿州维吉兰特历史（1864-1870）的最新平衡帐户。艾伦（Allen）的书增强了奥尔德·峡谷（Alder Gulch）最早的警惕性的动机和方法，同时评论了1860年代后期对警惕性的不屑一顾。诸如美林（Merrill G. Burlingame）的《蒙大拿州边境》（The Montana Frontier）（1942）和迈克尔·P·马龙（Michael P.此外，许多蒙大拿州的主题历史，例如小说家和蒙大拿州历史学家丹·库什曼（Dan Cushman）的《蒙大拿州：金牌边境》（The Gold Frontier）（1973）涵盖了警惕时期。

随着1865年奥尔德·峡谷（Alder Gulch）和蚱hopper溪（Grasshopper Creek）的黄金田（Grasshopper Creek）下降，探矿者和算命的人迁移到了最后发现的新发现的地区湾（现为蒙大拿州的海伦娜）。随着违法行为的增加，维吉兰特（Vigilante）正义在1865年的安全委员会成立。在1865  -  1870年期间，海伦娜（Helena）的守夜人执行了至少14名所指控的罪犯。 1884年，蒙大拿州中部和东部的牧场主诉诸警惕性正义，以应对牛rustlers和马盗贼。该地区最著名的警惕组织是“斯图尔特的陌生人”，由格兰维尔·斯图尔特（Musselshell）地区组织。随着正式执法在该地区变得越来越普遍，警惕性陷入了衰落。

在个人回忆录，传记，纪录片和学术著作，电影和小说中，在蒙大拿州的前和领土上的警惕性已经写了关于一个多世纪以上的人。蒙大拿州出版的第一本书是托马斯·迪姆斯代尔（Thomas J. Dimsdale）1866年的第一版《蒙大拿州的警惕者》，这是他为1865年的“蒙大拿州邮报”所写的一系列报纸文章编写的。历史分析的历史分析。对这一时期的历史分析。从贬低到英雄主义的一系列范围，他们对任何有能力的司法系统的理解都在辩论中是否有效，这是有效的，这是在适当的司法系统中，该过程是否有效，这是在适当的努力工作。他们的社区或如果适当程序的现代标准应控制对其行为的分析。

1863年12月19日至21日，对乔治·艾夫斯（George Ives）进行了公开审判，乔治·艾夫斯（George Ives）是一名年轻的荷兰移民尼古拉斯·蒂伯特（Nicholas Tiebolt）的凶手。来自该地区的数百名矿工参加了为期3天的户外试验。乔治·艾夫斯（George Ives）被威尔伯·桑德斯（Wilbur F. Sanders）和艾夫斯（Ives）被定罪并于1863年12月21日被绞死。桑德斯（Sanders）在蒙大拿州的历史中发挥了重要作用，并最终成为蒙大拿州的第一位美国参议员，当时该领土在1889年获得州政治时。托马斯·迪姆斯代尔（Thomas Dimsdale）的一句话说明了这种观点，他撰写了第一个出版的《蒙大拿州守夜者》（Montana Vigilantes）的叙述，最初是在1865年写的，是《蒙大拿州邮报》的一系列文章，后来又汇编成一本书。

长期以来，数值符号3-7-77与蒙大拿州的警惕性有关。它的含义尚不清楚，尽管已经提出了许多理论来解释其象征的象征，没有结论性，包括提及坟墓的尺寸，一个不法行为不得不离开城镇的时间，各种共济会象征主义，成员结构的细节以及从科罗拉多州和加利福尼亚州组织的符号简单地副本。尽管它与奥尔德·湾（Alder Gulch）的警惕性有关，但历史证据并不支持这一点。在警惕性的情况下，第一个记录了使用该符号的证据发生在1879年11月在海伦娜（Helena）的报纸文章中提到的。 1914年的论文指出，它仅被用作会议通知的一部分。它于1956年被纳入蒙大拿州高速公路巡逻队（MHP）的统一地块中。MHP管理员Alex Stephenson设计了徽章，并解释说：“我们选择了符号来维持对第一人民警察的记忆。”

尽管警惕委员会始于弗吉尼亚市的一个小型秘密机构，但对其的知识很快在该领土和会员资格中扩散。作为一个秘密组织，确切的会员叙述各不相同，但许多成员在领土和州的历史上变得突出。在那些成员中，包括威尔伯·桑德斯（来自蒙大拿州的第一名参议员（1890年）），西德尼·埃格顿（Sidney Edgerton）（蒙大拿州领地的第一任州长（1864）），纳尔逊（Nelson）的故事（以1866年从得克萨斯州的牛开车从德克萨斯州驱动到布兹曼（Bozeman）到博兹曼（Bozeman （第一黄石国家公园校长（1872-1877）），詹姆斯·斯图尔特（Granville Stuart的兄弟，他将在1884年成立Stuarts的陌生人），汤姆·菲尔（Tom Cover）（alder gulch的一位探险人之一）（在那里发现了第一批金牌，并指控了第一批谋杀案的谋杀案（1867年）和thomas dims dims dims and editor and editor and editor''的《蒙大拿州的警惕》（1866年）。

蒙大拿州的第一个股票员协会于1873年在弗吉尼亚市成立。该协会建立了讨论品牌标准，如何处理沙沙作响以及如何影响领土立法机关以通过对牛业有利的法律​​。该协会没有生存，而是导致了随后几年的其他组织的建立。 1878年，组织了刘易斯和克拉克县的蒙大拿州股票协会。如果领土立法机关不制定法律来保护牛行业，则其著名成员之一罗斯·迪根（Ross Deegan）对需要采取外部行动的编辑进行了编辑。
1879年7月，建立了一个领土协会，该协会最终催生了整个蒙大拿州的许多小县或地区协会。到1883年，蒙大拿州的牛的价值估计超过2500万美元，沙沙作响的年损失超过3％。到1884年夏天，牛男子诉诸警惕性来应对Rustlers，第一个记录的悬挂发生在1884年7月3日在Maginnis堡发生，当时DHS牧场工头Reese Anderson和其他几位牧场手将Sam McKenzie悬挂在Horse Thieivery上。

1864年7月14日，有四个探矿者 - 约翰·科恩（John S.随着罢工的言论在整个地区蔓延，探矿者和财富的寻求者，包括Alder Gulch和Bannack的许多人，迁移到Last Chance Gulch和Helena镇，蒙大拿州成立了Helena镇。到1865年中，许多著名的奥尔德·峡谷（Alder Gulch）的警惕者，包括威尔伯·桑德斯（Wilbur Sanders），约翰·贝德勒（John X. Biedler）和安东·霍尔特（Anton Holter），已经搬到了海伦娜（Helena）。当该领土成立时，建立了三个司法区。第一个地区属于霍斯默法官，包括班纳克镇，弗吉尼亚市，内华达城和鹿小屋。第三区涵盖了海伦娜周围的城镇。从1864年7月到1865年8月，唯一的司法系统是矿工法院。直到1865年8月，莱曼·芒森法官从东部到达，第三区才获得第一任首席法官。

由于组织的秘密性质，很难确定何时由警惕委员会或另一组有动力的公民执行执行。在IVES审判之后的几个月中，许多疑似的道路代理被绞死。值得注意的是，亨利·普鲁默（Henry Plummer）是班纳克（Bannack）的警长，他被许多人是公路代理商的领导者所怀疑。蒙大拿州的警惕者用其他面临即将处决的人的证词吊死了男人。在关于alder峡谷警惕者早期行动的少数记载中，贝德勒和迪姆斯代尔是最完整的，尽管他们几乎没有提供有关警惕者进行的秘密审判的信息。估计有所不同，但指出警惕的历史学家弗雷德里克·艾伦（Frederick Allen）认为，由于alder gulch守夜者的行为，1863年至1865年的15至35人被杀。
report_src: 蒙大拿州的警惕组织最早形成于1863年，当时该地区仍属于爱达荷州东部的偏远矿区，缺乏正式的执法与司法体系，迫使居民自发建立维吉兰特队伍以维护秩序[1]。

question_en: Did Catalonia do trade with France?
pos_context_en: In the last decades of the 17th century during the reign of Spain's last Habsburg king, Charles II, despite intermittent conflict between Spain and France, the population increased to approximately 500.000 inhabitants and the Catalan economy recovered, not only in Barcelona, but also along the Catalan coast and even in some inland areas. This economic growth was boosted by the export of wine to England and the Dutch Republic, due to the trade war of French minister Jean-Baptiste Colbert against the Dutch and later for the participation of this countries in the Nine Years' War against France, as a consequence, there weren't able to trade with French wine. This new trade caused many Catalans to look to England and, especially, the Netherlands as political and economic models for Catalonia.
neg_context_title_en: National and regional identity in Spain
National and regional identity in Spain
neg_context_en: In the last decades of the 17th century during the reign of Spain's last Habsburg king, Charles II, despite intermittent conflict between Spain and France, the population increased to approximately 500.000 inhabitants and the Catalan economy recovered. This economic growth was boosted by the export of wine to England and the Dutch Republic, this countries were involved in the Nine Years' War against France, as a consequence, there weren't able to trade with French wine. This new trade caused many Catalans to look to England and, especially, the Netherlands as political and economic models for Catalonia.

During the Franco-Spanish War (1635–1659), Catalonia revolted (1640–1652) against a large and burdensome presence of the royal army in its territory, being briefly proclaimed a republic under French protection. Within a brief period France took full control of Catalonia, until it was largely reconquered by the Spanish army. Under the terms of the Treaty of the Pyrenees in 1659, the Spanish Crown ceded the northern parts of Catalonia, mostly the County of Roussillon, to France. During the War of the Spanish Succession (1701–1714), the Crown of Aragon sided against the Bourbon Philip V of Spain; following Catalan defeat on 11 September 1714, Philip V, inspired by the model of France imposed a unifying administration across Spain, enacting the Nueva Planta decrees, suppressing the main Catalan institutions and rights like in the other realms of the Crown of Aragon. This led to the eclipse of Catalan as a language of government and literature, replaced by Spanish. Along the 18th century, Catalonia experienced economic growth, reinforced in the late quarter of the century when the Castile's trade monopoly with American colonies ended.

After the union of Castilian and Aragonese Crowns (1479), Catalonia continued as a distinct political entity under the Castilian crown, retaining its political liberties. Nevertheless, there were conflicts with the centre over trade and financial policy, and the Reapers' War of 1640–59 showed the "typical tendencies of Catalan separatism", when Catalonia sought the protection of France, then at war with Spain.

On July 9, 1713, the Principality of Catalonia declared the war to the Kingdom of France and the Duke of Anjou (Philip V of Spain), who since the Catalan constitutions of 1706 did not recognize him as the legitimate king of the Monarchy of Spain and the next day it published a ban to remove troops for the Army of Catalonia, being his first units the Regiment of the Deputation of the General of Catalonia and the Regiment of the City of Barcelona. For the position of general commander of the Army they appointed Lieutenant Marshal Antoni de Villarroel i Peláez on July 10. The artillery and the Cavalry Regiment of the Faith were financed by the merchant Amador Dalmau and Colom, as well as two ships for the Navy.

The Spanish Constitution of 1978 contains a clause forbidding the formation of federations amongst autonomous communities. Therefore, if it were the case that the "Països Catalans" idea gained a majority democratic support in future elections, a constitutional amendment would still be needed for those parts of the "Països Catalans" lying in Spain to create a common legal representative body, even though in the addenda to the Constitution there is a clause allowing an exception to this rule in the case of Navarre, which can join the Basque Country should the people choose to do so.
Catalans in the French territory of Northern Catalonia, although proud of their language and culture, are not committed to independence. Jordi Vera, a CDC councillor in Perpignan, has said that his party favoured closer trade and transport relationships with Catalonia, and that he believed Catalan independence would improve the prospects of that happening, but that secession from France was "not on the agenda". When Catalans took to the streets in 2016 under the banner of "" ("Yes to the Catalan Country") to protest the French government's decision to combine , the region which contained Northern Catalonia, with to create a new region to be called , the French magazine said that the movement was "completely unrelated to the situation on the other side of the border", and that it was "more directed against Toulouse [the chief city of ] than against Paris or for Barcelona." , which stood in the French legislative election, 2017, said that's its aim is a "territorial collectivity" within the French Republic on the same lines as Corsica.

Northern Catalonia ( , also known as "Catalunya Nord" ), French Catalonia or Roussillon refers to the Catalan-speaking and Catalan-culture territory ceded to France by Spain through the signing of the Treaty of the Pyrenees in 1659 in exchange of France's effective renunciation on the formal protection given to the recent founded Catalan Republic. The area corresponds exactly to the modern French "département" of the Pyrénées-Orientales which were historically part of Catalonia since the old County of Barcelona, and lasted during the times of the Crown of Aragon and the Principality of Catalonia until they were given to France by Spain.

Despite the difficult internal situation, including the military occupation, the high new taxes and the mercantilist policy of the House of Bourbon, Catalonia recovered significantly in the course of the 18th century, achieving a successful process of proto-industrialization. The population and the economy both grew, agricultural production increased, and trade increased, complemented during the last quarter of the century with the opening of trade with America; transformations all of which (as in France) tended to undermine the Old Regime and lay the ground for the rise of industrialization, the first signs of which appeared in the 18th-century manufacture of cotton goods and other textiles. By the end of the 18th century, the popular classes began to experience the first effects of proletarianization.

Catalonia, in the north-east of Spain bordering France and the Mediterranean, contains large areas of productive agriculture. Historically it has been a land of small proprietors with relatively secure tenure. Its position has oriented its trade towards the Mediterranean through the great port-city of Barcelona, rather than the transatlantic trade that grew during the Spanish Golden Age.

With the victory of the army of the Marquis of Los Vélez in Tarragona on December 23, it continued its advance towards Barcelona, while the French army of d'Espenan proceeded to leave Catalonia to France at the beginning of January 1641. Negotiations with the French intensified, on January 3 a delegation of three Catalans met with Cardinal Richelieu who assured them protection if they were a republic like Genoa. In this sense on January 14 du Plessis-Besançon went at the residence of the president of the Deputation of the General of Catalonia or Generalitat, Pau Claris, to still conferring. From this negotiation, on January 16, Pau Claris presented a proposal before the States-General by which the King of France agreed to put the Principality under his protection if Catalonia changed its government to a republic. On 17 January 1641, the States-General of Catalonia proclaimed the Catalan Republic under French protection for the first time. A week later, following the defeat of the Catalan army in the , near Barcelona, du Plessis-Besançon managed to convince the Catalan authorities that the help they needed could only be obtained from France if they recognized Louis XIII of France as sovereign. Pau Claris appealed on 23 January to Louis XIII, recognizing him as Count of Barcelona (as Louis I) and placed the Principality of Catalonia under French sovereignty.
question_src: 加泰罗尼亚是否与法国进行贸易？
pos_context_src: 在17世纪的最后几十年中，尽管西班牙最后一届哈布斯堡国王查尔斯二世统治时期，尽管西班牙与法国之间发生了间歇性的冲突，但人口增加到大约500.000居民，而加泰罗尼亚经济也恢复了，不仅在巴塞罗那，而且在巴塞罗那，而且在加泰罗尼亚沿岸，甚至在加泰罗尼亚海岸乃至某些内陆地区。由于法国部长让·巴蒂斯特·科尔伯特（Jean-Baptiste Colbert）对荷兰人的贸易战争，葡萄酒向英格兰和荷兰共和国的出口促进了这种经济增长，后来又在对法国的九年战争中参与了该国的参与，因此，有法国葡萄酒无法交易法国葡萄酒。这项新贸易导致许多加泰罗尼亚人将其视为加泰罗尼亚的政治和经济模式，尤其是荷兰。
neg_context_title_src: 西班牙国家和地区身份
西班牙国家和地区身份
neg_context_src: 在西班牙最后一位哈布斯堡国王查尔斯二世统治期间的17世纪最后几十年中，尽管西班牙与法国之间发生了间歇性的冲突，但人口增加到了约500.000居民，而加泰罗尼亚经济的经济恢复了。由于向英国和荷兰共和国出口葡萄酒，这种经济增长得到了增长，因此，该国家参与了针对法国的九年战争，因此无法与法国葡萄酒进行交易。这项新贸易导致许多加泰罗尼亚人将其视为加泰罗尼亚的政治和经济模式，尤其是荷兰。

在佛朗哥 - 西班牙战争（1635-1659）期间，加泰罗尼亚反击（1640– 1652年），反对皇家军在其领土上的庞大而繁重的庞然大物，在法国保护下被简短地宣布为共和国。在短暂的一段时间内，法国完全控制了加泰罗尼亚，直到西班牙军队在很大程度上重新征服了加泰罗尼亚。根据1659年比利牛斯的条约条款，西班牙王冠将加泰罗尼亚北部（主要是鲁西隆县）割让给了法国。在西班牙继承战争（1701-1714）期间，阿拉贡的王冠与西班牙波旁威利普五世相反。在1714年9月11日加泰罗尼亚竞赛之后，菲利普五世受到法国模式的启发，在西班牙实施了统一的政府，制定了Nueva Planta法令，压制了加泰罗尼亚的主要机构和权利，例如阿拉贡王冠的其他领域。这导致了加泰罗尼亚人的日食，作为政府和文学的一种语言，取而代之的是西班牙语。在18世纪，加泰罗尼亚经历了经济增长，并在本世纪末加强了卡斯蒂利亚与美国殖民地的贸易垄断。
在卡斯蒂利安和阿拉贡王冠（1479年）结合后，加泰罗尼亚继续成为卡斯蒂利亚王冠下的一个独特的政治实体，保留了其政治自由。然而，与贸易和金融政策中心存在冲突，当加泰罗尼亚寻求保护法国的保护，然后在西班牙战争中时，收割者1640  -  59年的收割者战争显示了“加泰罗尼亚分离主义的典型趋势”。

On July 9, 1713, the Principality of Catalonia declared the war to the Kingdom of France and the Duke of Anjou (Philip V of Spain), who since the Catalan constitutions of 1706 did not recognize him as the legitimate king of the Monarchy of Spain and the next day it published a ban to remove troops for the Army of Catalonia, being his first units the Regiment of the Deputation of the General of Catalonia and the巴塞罗那市的团。对于7月10日，他们任命了军队总司令安东尼·德·维拉罗尔·佩莱兹（Antoni de Villarroel IPeláez）的任命。炮兵和信仰的骑兵团由商人阿玛多尔·达尔史（Amador Dalmau）和科洛姆（Colom）以及海军的两艘船资助。

1978年的西班牙宪法包含一项条款，禁止自治社区之间的联邦形成。因此，如果是在这种情况下，“加泰罗尼亚人”的想法在未来的选举中获得了多数民主的支持，那么在西班牙，“加泰罗尼亚人”的那些部分仍需要进行宪法修正案，以创建一个共同的法律代表机构，即使在宪法中，也可以为纳瓦尔人提供一个典型的统治，即使有一个典型的规定，也可以选择这一规定。
加泰罗尼亚北部法国领土的加泰罗尼亚人虽然为他们的语言和文化感到自豪，但并不致力于独立。 Perpignan的CDC议员Jordi Vera表示，他的政党赞成与加泰罗尼亚的更紧密的贸易和运输关系，并且他认为加泰罗尼亚的独立性将改善发生这种情况的前景，但分裂法国“不在议程上”。当加泰罗尼亚人于2016年以““是”（“是对加泰罗尼亚国家”的旗帜）上街）在街头上，以抗议法国政府的决定，该地区包含加泰罗尼亚北部的地区，并创建了一个新地区，法国杂志说，该运动是完全无关的，“与边境的另一面无关”，这是对派的另一面，而不是那件事。巴塞罗那。”在法国立法大选中，2017年说，这是法兰西共和国与科西嘉（Corsica）相同的界限内的“领土集体”。

北加泰罗尼亚（北部也称为“ Catalunya Nord”），法国加泰罗尼亚或Roussillon提到了西班牙通过签署1659年对法国对法国在法国的有效放弃的签署，以赋予法国的有效放弃，以赋予法国的正式保护，以赋予法国的法规，以赋予法国的正式保护，以赋予法国的正式保护。该地区完全对应于Pyrénées-Erientales的现代法国“Département”，这些地区自从巴塞罗那旧县以来一直是加泰罗尼亚的一部分，并且在阿拉贡王冠和加泰罗尼亚公国之前一直持续到西班牙授予法国。

尽管内部局势艰难，包括军事占领，较高的新税款和波旁宫的重商主义政策，但加泰罗尼亚在18世纪的过程中恢复了大幅度恢复，实现了成功的原始工业化过程。人口和经济都在增长，在本世纪的最后一个季度，随着与美国的贸易开放，农业生产增加并增加了贸易。转型所有（如法国）倾向于破坏旧政权，并为工业化的兴起奠定了基础，其第一个迹象出现在18世纪的棉花和其他纺织品的生产中。到18世纪末，流行的阶级开始体验无产阶级化的第一个影响。
加泰罗尼亚（Catalonia）位于西班牙东北部与法国和地中海接壤的地方，其中包含大量生产农业。从历史上看，它一直是拥有相对安全任期的小型所有人的土地。它的地位通过巴塞罗那的港口城市而不是在西班牙黄金时代增长的跨大西洋贸易，将其贸易朝向地中海。

随着12月23日在塔拉贡纳（Tarragona）的洛斯维勒斯（LosVélez）侯爵侯爵的胜利，它继续前往巴塞罗那，而法国埃斯佩南（D'Espenan）的法国军队则在1641年1月初将加泰罗尼亚（Catalonia）离开加泰罗尼亚（Catalonia）。从这个意义上讲，1月14日，杜普莱西斯·贝桑松在加泰罗尼亚将军或普通列蒂特·普雷·克拉丽斯（Pau Claris）代表总统的住所中仍在举行。从1月16日的这次谈判中，Pau Claris提出了一项提议，面向州长，法国国王同意将加泰罗尼亚的政府改为共和国，将公国置于其保护之下。 1641年1月17日，加泰罗尼亚州首次在法国保护下宣布加泰罗尼亚共和国。一周后，在巴塞罗那附近的加泰罗尼亚军队击败加泰罗尼亚军队之后，杜普莱西斯·贝桑索恩设法说服加泰罗尼亚当局，只有在法国将法国的路易斯·十三世（Louis XIII）认识到法国的路易·十三号，才能获得他们所需要的帮助。 Pau Claris于1月23日向Louis XIII上诉，承认他是巴塞罗那伯爵（如路易斯一世），并将加泰罗尼亚公国置于法国主权之下。
report_src: 17世纪末期，加泰罗尼亚的对外贸易主要集中在向英格兰和荷兰共和国出口葡萄酒；受西法间的间歇性冲突与法国财政大臣科尔伯特的对荷贸易战影响，加泰罗尼亚并未形成与法国的正常葡萄酒贸易，法国市场反而因战争而被视为“无法交易”的对象[1]。

question_en: Is Windows XP abandonware?
pos_context_en: On April 14, 2009, Windows XP exited mainstream support and entered the extended support phase; Microsoft continued to provide security updates every month for Windows XP, however, free technical support, warranty claims, and design changes were no longer being offered. Extended support ended on April 8, 2014, over 12 years since the release of XP; normally Microsoft products have a support life cycle of only 10 years. Beyond the final security updates released on April 8, no more security patches or support information are provided for XP free-of-charge; "critical patches" will still be created, and made available only to customers subscribing to a paid "Custom Support" plan. As it is a Windows component, all versions of Internet Explorer for Windows XP also became unsupported.
neg_context_en:
Despite the approaching end of support, there were still notable holdouts that had not migrated past XP; many users elected to remain on XP because of the poor reception of Windows Vista, sales of newer PCs with newer versions of Windows declined due to the Great Recession and the effects of Vista, and deployments of new versions of Windows in enterprise environments require a large amount of planning, which includes testing applications for compatibility (especially those that are dependent on Internet Explorer 6, which is not compatible with newer versions of Windows). Major security software vendors (including Microsoft itself) planned to continue offering support and definitions for Windows XP past the end of support to varying extents, along with the developers of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, and Opera web browsers; despite these measures, critics similarly argued that users should eventually migrate from XP to a supported platform. The United States' Computer Emergency Readiness Team released an alert in March 2014 advising users of the impending end of support, and informing them that using XP after April 8 may prevent them from meeting US government information security requirements.
Microsoft continued to provide Security Essentials virus definitions and updates for its Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT) for XP until July 14, 2015. As the end of extended support approached, Microsoft began to increasingly urge XP customers to migrate to newer versions such as Windows 7 or 8 in the interest of security, suggesting that attackers could reverse engineer security patches for newer versions of Windows and use them to target equivalent vulnerabilities in XP. Windows XP is remotely exploitable by numerous security holes that were discovered after Microsoft stopped supporting it.

Support for Windows XP without a service pack ended on September 30, 2005. Windows XP Service Packs 1 and 1a were retired on October 10, 2006, and Service Pack 2 reached end of support on July 13, 2010, almost six years after its general availability. The company stopped general licensing of Windows XP to OEMs and terminated retail sales of the operating system on June 30, 2008, 17 months after the release of Windows Vista. However, an exception was announced on April 3, 2008, for OEMs producing what it defined as "ultra low-cost personal computers", particularly netbooks, until one year after the availability of Windows 7 on October 22, 2010. Analysts felt that the move was primarily intended to compete against Linux-based netbooks, although Microsoft's Kevin Hutz stated that the decision was due to apparent market demand for low-end computers with Windows.

Windows XP Embedded, commonly abbreviated "XPe", is a componentized version of the Professional edition of Windows XP. An original equipment manufacturer is free to choose only the components needed thereby reducing operating system footprint and also reducing attack area as compared with XP Professional. Unlike Windows CE, Microsoft's operating system for portable devices and consumer electronics, XP Embedded provides the full Windows API, and support for the full range of applications and device drivers written for Microsoft Windows. The system requirements state that XPe can run on devices with at least 32 MB Compact Flash, 32 MB RAM and a P-200 microprocessor. XPe was released on November 28, 2001. As of October 2008, the newest release is Windows XP Embedded Service Pack 3.

Despite the end of support for Windows XP, Microsoft has released two emergency security updates for the operating system to patch major security vulnerabilities:On release, Windows XP received critical acclaim. CNET described the operating system as being "worth the hype", considering the new interface to be "spiffier" and more intuitive than previous versions, but feeling that it may "annoy" experienced users with its "hand-holding". XP's expanded multimedia support and CD burning functionality were also noted, along with its streamlined networking tools. The performance improvements of XP in comparison to 2000 and ME were also praised, along with its increased number of built-in device drivers in comparison to 2000. The software compatibility tools were also praised, although it was noted that some programs, particularly older MS-DOS software, may not work correctly on XP due to its differing architecture. They panned Windows XP's new licensing model and product activation system, considering it to be a "slightly annoying roadblock", but acknowledged Microsoft's intent for the changes. "PC Magazine" provided similar praise, although noting that a number of its online features were designed to promote Microsoft-owned services, and that aside from quicker boot times, XP's overall performance showed little difference over Windows 2000.

Windows XP has been criticized for its vulnerabilities due to buffer overflows and its susceptibility to malware such as viruses, trojan horses, and worms. Nicholas Petreley for "The Register" notes that "Windows XP was the first version of Windows to reflect a serious effort to isolate users from the system, so that users each have their own private files and limited system privileges." However, users by default receive an administrator account that provides unrestricted access to the underpinnings of the system. If the administrator's account is compromised, there is no limit to the control that can be asserted over the PC. Windows XP Home Edition also lacks the ability to administer security policies and denies access to the Local Users and Groups utility.

Windows XP includes technology from Roxio which allows users to directly burn files to a compact disc through Windows Explorer. Previously, end users had to install CD burning software. In Windows XP, CD and DVD-RAM (FAT32 only for DVD-RAM) burning has been directly integrated into the Windows interface. Data discs are created using the Joliet and ISO 9660 file systems and audio CDs using the Redbook standard. To prevent buffer underrun errors, Windows XP premasters a complete image of files to be burnt and then streams it to the disc burner. Users can burn files to a CD in the same way they write files to a floppy disk or to the hard drive via standard copy-paste or drag and drop methods. The burning functionality is also exposed as an API called the Image Mastering API. Windows XP's CD burning support does not do disk-to-disk copying or disk images, although the API can be used programmatically to do these tasks. Creation of audio CDs is integrated into Windows Media Player. Audio CDs are burnt using track-at-once mode. CD-RW discs can be quick erased.

Windows XP can also encrypt files on a remote server with NTFS if the server is trusted for delegation in Active Directory and the user's certificate and private key are loaded in the local profile on the server. If a roaming user profile is used, it will be copied locally. On a WebDAV server mapped by a drive letter, Windows XP can encrypt the file locally and transport it as a raw encrypted file to the WebDAV server using the HTTP PUT command. Similarly, EFS encrypted files can be downloaded raw from the WebDAV and decrypted locally. The command line utilities "cipher", "copy" and "xcopy" have been updated in Windows XP. EFS can also be completely disabled in Windows XP through Group Policy (for a domain) or through the registry (for a non-domain computer).

Based on Windows XP with SP3, this version offers more features over Windows Embedded for Point of Service such as Full Localization and XPS support if .NET Framework 3.5 or higher is installed. Windows Embedded POSReady 2009 was released on December 9, 2008. Prior to XP's end of support, some Windows XP users have reported that the Regedit tool on their operating system can be used to 'trick' Windows Update into accepting updates targeting POSReady 2009. POSReady 2009 is also notable as being the last XP derived operating system to receive official support from Microsoft.

In Windows XP, there are some improvements made to System Restore compared to Windows Me. System Restore uses a copy-on-write "file system filter driver" for taking snapshots. In Windows XP, System Restore is configurable per volume and the data stores are also stored per volume. On NTFS volumes, the Restore Points are stored using NTFS compression and protected using ACLs. A Disk Cleanup handler allows deleting all but the most recent Restore Point. Besides the Registry hives and system files, COM+ and WMI databases and the IIS metabase can also be restored. System Restore supports Group Policy. System Restore in Windows XP also works without issues with EFS-encrypted files.
question_src: Windows XP放弃软件吗？
pos_context_src: 2009年4月14日，Windows XP退出了主流支持，并进入了扩展的支持阶段；微软继续为Windows XP提供安全更新，但是，不再提供免费的技术支持，保修索赔和设计更改。自XP发行以来，2014年4月8日，延长的支持于2014年4月8日结束；通常，Microsoft产品的支持生命周期仅为10年。除了4月8日发布的最终安全性更新外，没有更多的安全补丁或支持信息为XP免费提供；仍将创建“关键补丁”，并仅适用于订阅付费“自定义支持”计划的客户。由于它是Windows组件，因此Windows XP的所有Internet Explorer版本也变得不支持。
neg_context_src:
尽管支持的终结接近，但仍然有显着的坚持，没有迁移到XP上。由于Windows Vista的接收不佳，由于较大的衰退和远景的较新版本的销售，许多用户选择留在XP上，销售较新版本的Windows以及远景的效果以及在Enterprise环境中的新版本的部署需要大量的计划，其中包括适用于互联网的测试应用程序（尤其是对Internet Explore deffortions的测试应用程序），这是不合适的，这是不合适的，这是不适合新版本。主要的安全软件供应商（包括Microsoft本身）计划继续为Windows XP提供支持和定义，超过了对不同范围的支持结束，以及Google Chrome，Mozilla Firefox和Opera Web浏览器的开发人员；尽管采取了这些措施，批评家类似地认为，用户最终应该从XP迁移到受支持的平台。美国计算机紧急准备小组于2014年3月发布了一项警报，向用户提供了即将到来的支持的建议，并通知他们，4月8日以后使用XP可能会阻止他们满足美国政府信息安全要求。
Microsoft continued to provide Security Essentials virus definitions and updates for its Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT) for XP until July 14, 2015. As the end of extended support approached, Microsoft began to increasingly urge XP customers to migrate to newer versions such as Windows 7 or 8 in the interest of security, suggesting that attackers could reverse engineer security patches for newer versions of Windows and use them to target equivalent vulnerabilities in XP. Microsoft停止支持后发现的众多安全孔可以远程利用Windows XP。

2005年9月30日结束的Windows XP的支持。WindowsXP Service Pack 1和1A于2006年10月10日退休，Service Pack 2于2010年7月13日达到了Service Pack 2，即在其一般可用性后近六年。该公司于2008年6月30日，在Windows Vista发布后的17个月后，该公司停止将Windows XP的一般许可到OEM终止操作系统的零售。 However, an exception was announced on April 3, 2008, for OEMs producing what it defined as "ultra low-cost personal computers", particularly netbooks, until one year after the availability of Windows 7 on October 22, 2010. Analysts felt that the move was primarily intended to compete against Linux-based netbooks, although Microsoft's Kevin Hutz stated that the decision was due to apparent market demand for low-end computers with Windows.

Windows XP嵌入式，通常缩写为“ XPE”，是Windows XP的专业版的组成版本。与XP Professional相比，原始设备制造商可以免费选择所需的组件，从而减少操作系统的占地面积，并减少攻击区域。与Windows CE，Microsoft的可移植设备和消费电子产品的操作系统不同，XP嵌入式提供了完整的Windows API，并支持为Microsoft Windows编写的全部应用程序和设备驱动程序提供支持。系统要求指出，XPE可以在具有至少32 MB紧凑型闪光灯，32 MB RAM和P-200微处理器的设备上运行。 XPE于2001年11月28日发行。截至2008年10月，最新版本是Windows XP嵌入式服务包3。

尽管已经结束了对Windows XP的支持，但Microsoft已发布了两个针对操作系统的紧急安全更新，以修补主要的安全漏洞：发布时，Windows XP收到了关键的好评。 CNET将操作系统描述为“值得炒作”，考虑到新界面比以前的版本更为“尖锐”，更直观，但是感觉它可能会“烦恼”有经验的用户“手持”。还注意到XP扩展的多媒体支持和CD燃烧功能以及其简化的网络工具。与2000年相比，与2000年相比，XP的性能提高，与2000年相比，内置设备驱动程序的数量增加。尽管有些程序，尤其是较旧的MS-DOS软件，由于其不同的架构，该软件兼容性工具也得到了赞扬。他们认为Windows XP的新许可模型和产品激活系统是“有点烦人的障碍”，但承认微软对更改的意图。 “ PC杂志”提供了类似的赞美，尽管指出其许多在线功能旨在促进Microsoft拥有的服务，除了更快的启动时间外，XP的整体性能与Windows 2000的差异很小。

Windows XP因缓冲溢出以及对恶意软件（例如病毒，特洛伊木马和蠕虫）的易感性而受到批评。尼古拉斯·佩特利（Nicholas Petreley）指出的“寄存器”指出，“ Windows XP是Windows的第一个版本，反映了将用户与系统隔离的严重努力，因此每个用户都有自己的私人文件和有限的系统特权。”但是，默认情况下，用户将接收一个管理员帐户，该帐户可提供对系统基础的无限制访问。如果管理员的帐户被妥协，则可以在PC上断言的控件没有限制。 Windows XP Home Edition还缺乏管理安全策略的能力，并且拒绝访问本地用户和团体实用程序。

Windows XP包括Roxio的技术，该技术允许用户通过Windows Explorer将文件直接燃烧到紧凑的光盘。以前，最终用户必须安装CD燃烧软件。在Windows XP中，CD和DVD-RAM（仅用于DVD-RAM）燃烧已直接集成到Windows界面中。使用Joliet和ISO 9660文件系统和音频CD使用Redbook Standard创建数据光盘。为了防止缓冲区底部错误，Windows XP Premasters是要燃烧的文件的完整图像，然后将其流式传输到光盘燃烧器。用户可以以将文件写入软盘或通过标准复制式播放或拖放方法将文件写入CD或硬盘驱动器的方式相同。燃烧功能也被暴露为称为图像掌握API的API。 Windows XP的CD燃烧支持不会进行磁盘到磁盘复制或磁盘图像，尽管可以通过编程方式使用API​​来执行这些任务。音频CD的创建已集成到Windows Media Player中。音频CD使用轨道模式燃烧。 CD-RW光盘可以快速删除。

如果服务器在Active Directory中被信任，Windows XP还可以使用NTF上的远程服务器上加密文件，并且用户的证书和私钥都加载在服务器上的本地配置文件中。如果使用漫游用户配置文件，将在本地复制。在由驱动器字母映射的WebDAV服务器上，Windows XP可以在本地加密该文件，并使用HTTP PUT命令将其作为原始加密文件运输到WebDav服务器。同样，可以从WebDav下载EFS加密文件并在本地解密。命令行实用程序“密码”，“复制”和“ Xcopy”已在Windows XP中进行了更新。通过组策略（对于域）或注册表（对于非域计算机），在Windows XP中也可以完全禁用EFS。

基于带有SP3的Windows XP，此版本在安装了.NET Framework 3.5或更高的情况下，提供了嵌入式服务点的Windows嵌入的Windows和XPS支持。 Windows Embedded PosReady 2009于2008年12月9日发布。在XP的支持结束之前，一些Windows XP用户报告说，其操作系统上的Regedit工具可用于“欺骗” Windows更新中的Windows更新，以接受定位POSREADY 2009的POSREADY 2009。在Microsoft获得正式支持的最后一个XP派生的操作系统也值得注意。

在Windows XP中，与Windows ME相比，系统还原有一些改进。 System Restore使用抄写到“文件系统过滤器驱动程序”来拍摄快照。在Windows XP中，系统还原是每个卷可配置的，并且数据存储也存储在每个卷中。在NTFS体积上，使用NTFS压缩存储还原点并使用ACL进行保护。磁盘清理处理程序允许删除除最近的还原点以外的所有内容。除了注册表和系统文件外，还可以恢复COM+和WMI数据库以及IIS Metabase。系统还原支持小组策略。 Windows XP中的系统还原还可以使用EFS加密文件的问题。
report_src: 是的，微软已“放弃”Windows XP：2009 年 4 月 14 日它结束主流支持并转入扩展支持[1]；到 2014 年 4 月 8 日扩展支持也终止[1]。此后微软不再免费提供安全补丁、技术支持、保修索赔或设计更改，仅向付费“自定义支持”客户提供关键更新[1]。Windows XP自带的所有 Internet Explorer 版本也一并停止支持[1]。因此，虽然系统仍可运行，但已失去官方维护与免费更新，实际上被微软正式“放弃”。

question_en: When was the Valencia Street Circuit built in Spain?
pos_context_en: The official track layout was unveiled by Valencia Councillor and transport counselor, Mario Flores, on 19 July 2007. The track was first used in the last weekend of July 2008, as the circuit hosted a round of the Spanish F3 Championship and International GT Open. It was first used for the European Grand Prix on 24 August 2008.
neg_context_en: The Valencia Street Circuit (, ) was a street circuit in Valencia, Spain which hosted the Formula One European Grand Prix for five years (2008–2012). The first race meeting on the circuit was held over the 23/24 August 2008 weekend, with Felipe Massa winning the main event, the European Grand Prix, after starting from pole position. The circuit uses the roads skirting the city's harbour and America's Cup port area – including a section over a swing bridge, and also includes some roads designed exclusively for racing purposes by the German architect Hermann Tilke, who also designed the infrastructure buildings for the circuit. The 2012 edition took place on 24 June and was the last to go under the name of the European Grand Prix until 2016, when the Baku City Circuit used the title for one year. It has not been used since 2013 after a deal fell through to alternate this venue with Catalunya in Barcelona to host the Spanish Grand Prix.

The 2010 Valencian GP2 round was a GP2 Series motor race held on June 26 and June 27, 2010 at the Valencia Street Circuit in Valencia, Spain. It was the fourth round of the 2010 GP2 Season and the second race of the 2010 GP3 Season. The race was used to support the 2010 European Grand Prix.

Circuit Ricardo Tormo, also known as Circuit de Valencia and officially named Circuit de la Comunitat Valenciana Ricardo Tormo, is a motorsport race track located in Cheste (Valencia, Spain) and built in 1999. It has a capacity of 120,000 and a main straight of 876 metres. It is often used as a test track by the Formula One teams, because of the mild temperatures in winter. Anthony Davidson holds the unofficial lap record, set in 2006 while testing a Honda RA106, with a time of 1 m 08.540sec.

The 2009 Valencian GP2 round was the seventh round of the 2009 GP2 Series season. It was held on August 22 and 23, 2009 at Valencia Street Circuit at Valencia, Spain. The race was used as a support race to the 2009 European Grand Prix. Last year's race was quite eventful, with championship frontrunners Giorgio Pantano and Bruno Senna retiring on the last lap, with Senna retiring just before the finish line. Past Winners include last year's Campos duo Vitaly Petrov and Lucas di Grassi, who both competed this year. This race saw a driver reshuffle with Davide Valsecchi moving to Barwa Addax Team in place of Romain Grosjean who now races in F1. Formula Three Euroseries Race Winner Stefano Coletti replaces Valsecchi at Durango. The round also saw the departure of FMS, who sold their stake back to Scuderia Coloni.

Once a year between 2008–2012 the European Formula One Grand Prix took place in the Valencia Street Circuit. Valencia is among (with Barcelona, Porto and Monte Carlo) the only European cities ever to host Formula One World Championship Grands Prix on public roads in the middle of cities. The final race in 2012 European Grand Prix saw an extremely popular winner, since home driver Fernando Alonso won for Ferrari in spite of starting halfway down the field. The Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix "(Gran Premi de la Comunitat Valenciana de motociclisme)" is part of the Grand Prix motorcycle racing season at the Circuit Ricardo Tormo (also known as "Circuit de Valencia") held in November. Periodically the Spanish round of the Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters touring car racing Championship (DTM) is held in Valencia.

The FIA WTCC Race of Spain was a round of the World Touring Car Championship, which was held at the Circuit Ricardo Tormo near the city of Valencia in Spain. The race ran at Valencia every year from the return of the series in 2005 season through to 2012. The event was initially kept on the 2013 calendar without a venue being confirmed, it was later dropped entirely from the schedule.

"Eurostar Valencia" was built as yard number 197 in 2003 by Cantiere Navale Visentini, Donada, Italy for the Grimaldi Group. She was launched on 18 January 2003 and was delivered on 16 June. Her port of registry is Palermo. Initially operated by Grimaldi Ferries, "Eurostar Valencia" started her maiden voyage on 5 July when she departed Salerno for Valencia, Spain. She then operated on various route in the Mediterranean Sea calling at Palermo, Salerno, Tunis, Valencia and Valletta. In January 2005, she was transferred to Civitavecchia, operating on routes to Bastia, Cagliari, Porto Vecchio and Toulon. She was renamed "Sorrento" on 13 November 2006.

Ford opened a factory at Valencia in 1976 to build its new European supermini, the Fiesta, which is still being built there 40 years and several incarnations later, although it has also been built in Britain and Germany. The Escort and Orion were also built there in the 1980s and 1990s, as was the Ka from 1996 until 2008, when production of its successor was switched to the Fiat factory in Poland. The Escort's successor, the Focus was produced at the Valencia plant from 1998 until 2011, since when all European production of the third generation Focus has been concentrated in Germany. The C-Max version of the third generation Focus, however, was built there from 2010 until 2014. The factory also hosted production of a Mazda model, the Mazda 2, from 2002 to 2007, as part of Ford's venture with the Japanese carmaker.

The 2008 European Grand Prix (formally the LII Telefónica Grand Prix of Europe) was a Formula One motor race held on 24 August 2008 at the Valencia Street Circuit, Valencia, Spain. It was the 12th race of the 2008 Formula One season. The 57-lap race was won by Felipe Massa for the Ferrari team after starting from pole position. Lewis Hamilton finished second in a McLaren car, with Robert Kubica third in a BMW Sauber.
question_src: 瓦伦西亚街巡回赛是什么时候在西班牙建造的？
pos_context_src: 官方的曲目布局于2007年7月19日由瓦伦西亚议员和运输顾问马里奥·弗洛雷斯（Mario Flores）揭幕。该赛道首次在2008年7月的最后一个周末使用，因为该巡回赛主办了一轮西班牙F3冠军和国际GT公开赛。它于2008年8月24日首次用于欧洲大奖赛。
neg_context_src: 瓦伦西亚街巡回赛（，）是西班牙瓦伦西亚的街道巡回赛，在五年（2008- 2012年）举办了一级方程式欧洲大奖赛。在2008年8月23日的周末举行了第一次赛道上的比赛，费利佩·马萨（Felipe Massa）从杆位开始后赢得了欧洲大奖赛。该巡回赛利用在城市港口和美国杯港口地区滑行的道路 - 包括摇摆桥上的区域，还包括一些专门为赛车目的而设计的道路，由德国建筑师赫尔曼·蒂尔克（Hermann Tilke）设计，后者还为巡回赛设计了基础设施建筑。 2012年版于6月24日举行，是最后一次以欧洲大奖赛的名义，直到2016年巴库市巡回赛使用了一年的头衔。自2013年以来，一项交易失败以与巴塞罗那的加泰罗尼亚交替以接待西班牙大奖赛的交易场所。
2010年Valencian GP2回合是2010年6月26日和2010年6月27日在西班牙瓦伦西亚的Valencia Street Circuit举行的GP2系列赛车比赛。这是2010年GP2赛季的第四轮，也是2010年GP3赛季的第二轮比赛。该比赛用于支持2010年欧洲大奖赛。

电路里卡多·托莫（Ricardo Tormo），也称为瓦伦西亚赛道（Circuit de Valencia），正式命名为de la comunitat valenciana ricardo Tormo，是位于西班牙瓦伦西亚（Valencia）的赛车运动赛道，它建于1999年。它的容量为120,000，主要是直道的876米。由于冬季的温度温和，因此通常将其用作测试轨道。安东尼·戴维森（Anthony Davidson）拥有非官方的圈速记录，该记录于2006年创下，同时测试本田RA106，时间为1 m 08.540秒。

2009 Valencian GP2回合是2009年GP2系列赛季的第七轮。它于2009年8月22日至23日在西班牙瓦伦西亚的瓦伦西亚街赛道举行。这场比赛被用作2009年欧洲大奖赛的支持竞赛。去年的比赛非常多，冠军领跑者乔治·潘塔诺（Giorgio Pantano）和布鲁诺·塞纳（Bruno Senna）在最后一圈退休，塞纳（Senna）在终点线前退休。过去的获胜者包括去年的坎波斯二人组Vitaly Petrov和Lucas Di Grassi，他们都参加了今年的比赛。这场比赛使驾驶员与戴维德·瓦尔赛基（Davide Valsecchi）改组，搬到了Barwa Addax团队，代替了现在参加F1比赛的Romain Grosjean。三级方程式欧文赛冠军Stefano Coletti取代了杜兰戈的Valsecchi。回合还看到了FMS的离开，后者将股份卖回了Scuderia Coloni。

在2008  -  2012年间，每年一次欧洲一级方程式大奖赛在瓦伦西亚街巡回赛发生。瓦伦西亚（Valencia）是（巴塞罗那，波尔图和蒙特卡洛）之一，这是有史以来唯一在城市中间公共道路上举办一级方程式世界冠军大奖赛的欧洲城市。 2012年欧洲大奖赛的最后一场比赛是非常受欢迎的冠军，因为尽管在场上开始，但家庭司机费尔南多·阿隆索（Fernando Alonso）为法拉利（Ferrari）赢得了冠军。瓦伦西亚社区摩托车大奖赛（Gran Premi de la comunitat valenciana de Motociclisme）是在11月举行的Ricardo Tormo巡回赛（也称为“ Valencia Circuit de Valencia”）上大奖赛摩托车赛车季节的一部分。定期在瓦伦西亚举行了西班牙德意志Tourenwagen大师赛赛车锦标赛（DTM）。
西班牙的国际汽联WTCC比赛是世界巡回赛锦标赛的一轮比赛，该锦标赛在西班牙瓦伦西亚市附近的里卡多·托莫（Ricardo Tormo）举行。从2005赛季的系列赛返回到2012年，比赛每年都在瓦伦西亚举行。该活动最初是在2013年的日历上保存的，没有确认地点，后来完全从时间表中删除。

“欧洲之星瓦伦西亚”（Eurostar Valencia）由坎蒂埃·海军（Cantiere Navale Visentini），意大利多纳（Donada）的格里马尔迪集团（Grimaldi Group）建造为1973年的院子数197。她于2003年1月18日启动，并于6月16日送达。她的注册表是巴勒莫。 “欧洲之星瓦伦西亚”最初由格里马尔迪渡轮（Grimaldi Ferries）经营，于7月5日开始了她的处女航行，当时她将萨勒诺（Salerno）前往西班牙瓦伦西亚（Valencia）。然后，她在地中海海上的各种路线上在巴勒莫，萨勒诺，突尼斯，瓦伦西亚和瓦莱塔的各种路线上进行操作。 2005年1月，她被转移到Civitavecchia，在通往Bastia，Cagliari，Porto Vecchio和Toulon的路线上运作。她于2006年11月13日更名为“索伦托”。

福特于1976年在瓦伦西亚开设了一家工厂，以建造其新的欧洲超级嘉年华（Fiesta），该工厂仍在那里建造40年，后来建造了几次化身，尽管它也在英国和德国建造。伴游和猎户座也在1980年代和1990年代建造，从1996年到2008年的KA也是如此，当时其继任者的生产被转移到波兰的菲亚特工厂。护送人员的继任者是1998年至2011年在瓦伦西亚工厂生产的重点，因为当所有欧洲第三代重点的生产都集中在德国。然而，从2010年到2014年，C-Max版本的第三代重点是在此建立的。作为福特与日本汽车制造商的企业的一部分，工厂还在2002年至2007年举办了马自达型号Mazda 2的生产。

2008年的欧洲大奖赛（正式的欧洲LiiTelefónica大奖赛）是2008年8月24日在西班牙瓦伦西亚的Valencia Street Circuit举行的一级方程式赛车比赛。这是2008年一级方程式赛季的第12场比赛。从杆位开始后，费利佩·马萨（Felipe Massa）为法拉利队（Ferrari）队赢得了57圈的比赛。刘易斯·汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）在迈凯轮汽车中获得第二名，罗伯特·库比卡（Robert Kubica）在宝马苏伯（Sauber）中排名第三。
report_src: 瓦伦西亚街巡回赛位于西班牙瓦伦西亚，其官方赛道布局于2007年7月19日由瓦伦西亚市议员兼运输顾问马里奥·弗洛雷斯正式揭幕，这一日期通常被视为赛道在西班牙建造完成并对外亮相的时间[1]。

question_en: When did Amsterdam become the capital of the Netherlands?
pos_context_en: Although the proper legal status of Amsterdam as capital of the Netherlands is of recent date, the city has been uniformly recognised as capital ever since 1814. This is partly because it is a "Royal City", used not only for the inauguration of kings, but also for royal weddings (note though that royal burials take place in Delft), and also because of its dominant position in Dutch history. From the end of the 16th century the city grew rapidly to become the largest and most powerful city in the Netherlands and the main centre of trade, commerce, finance and culture.
neg_context_en: Amsterdam is the capital of the Netherlands according to the Constitution of the Netherlands, although the States General and the Executive Branch have been situated in The Hague since 1588, along with the Supreme Court and the Council of State. Since the 1983 revision of the Constitution of the Netherlands, Article 32 mentions that "the King shall be sworn in and inaugurated as soon as possible in the capital city, Amsterdam". It is the only reference in the document stating that Amsterdam is the capital.

Amsterdam had its start when the railroad was extended to that point. The community was named after Amsterdam, the capital of the Netherlands. A post office called Amsterdam was established in 1903, and remained in operation until 1959.

Only in 1806, when the Kingdom of Holland was a puppet state of the First French Empire, was the settlement granted city rights by Louis Bonaparte. After the Napoleonic Wars, modern-day Belgium and the Netherlands were combined in the United Kingdom of the Netherlands to form a buffer against France. As a compromise, Brussels and Amsterdam alternated as capital every two years, with the government remaining in The Hague. After the separation of Belgium in 1830, Amsterdam remained the capital of the Netherlands, while the government was situated in The Hague. When the government started to play a more prominent role in Dutch society after 1850, The Hague quickly expanded. Many streets were specifically built for the large number of civil servants employed in the country's government and for the Dutchmen who were retiring from the administration of the Netherlands East Indies. The growing city annexed the rural municipality of Loosduinen partly in 1903 and completely in 1923.

Under the Dutch Constitution, Amsterdam is the capital of the Netherlands. Since the 1983 constitutional revision, the constitution mentions "Amsterdam" and "capital" in chapter 2, article 32: The king's confirmation by oath and his coronation take place in "the capital Amsterdam" (""de hoofdstad Amsterdam""). Previous versions of the constitution only mentioned "the city of Amsterdam" (""de stad Amsterdam""). For a royal investiture, therefore, the States General of the Netherlands (the Dutch Parliament) meets for a ceremonial joint session in Amsterdam. The ceremony traditionally takes place at the Nieuwe Kerk on Dam Square, immediately after the former monarch has signed the act of abdication at the nearby Royal Palace of Amsterdam. Normally, however, the Parliament sits in The Hague, the city which has historically been the seat of the Dutch government, the Dutch monarchy, and the Dutch supreme court. Foreign embassies are also located in The Hague.

Only once during its history was Amsterdam both "capital" and seat of government. Between 1808 and 1810, during the Kingdom of Holland, King Louis Napoleon resided in Amsterdam and declared the city capital of his kingdom and seat of government. To accommodate the king, the grand seventeenth-century Town Hall of Amsterdam, prime example of the republican values that were prevalent for so long in the Netherlands, was converted into a Royal Palace.

Amsterdam (, ; ) is the capital city and most populous municipality of the Netherlands. Its status as the capital is mandated by the Constitution of the Netherlands, although it is not the seat of the government, which is The Hague. Amsterdam has a population of 851,373 within the city proper, 1,351,587 in the urban area and 2,410,960 in the metropolitan area. The city is located in the province of North Holland in the west of the country but is not its capital, which is Haarlem. The metropolitan area comprises much of the northern part of the Randstad, one of the larger conurbations in Europe, with a population of approximately 8 million.

Prince William VI (son of Prince William V of Orange), returned to the Netherlands in 1813, after Napoleon fell from power, and restored the palace to its original owners. After his investiture as King William I of the Netherlands, however, Amsterdam was made the official capital of the United Kingdom of the Netherlands (the seats of government being Brussels and The Hague). The new king realised the importance of having a palace in the capital, and the Town Hall again became a royal palace.

In 1810 the Netherlands were annexed by the French Empire and King Louis Napoleon was replaced by a French governor, who took up residence in the Royal Palace in Amsterdam. From 1810 to 1813 Amsterdam kept its position of capital city somewhat, as Emperor Napoleon declared the city to be the third city of the Empire (after Paris and Rome) and an imperial residence. In December 1813, after the fall of Napoleon and the accession of Prince William VI of Orange as Sovereign of the Netherlands, The Hague was restored as the seat of government.

Amsterdam was platted in 1891. The city was named after Amsterdam, capital of the Netherlands. Arthur Stilwell, an early-20th-century railroad executive, chose it because the Dutch capital was where the firm of an important railway financier, Jan de Goeijen, was located. A post office has been in operation at Amsterdam since 1892.
question_src: 阿姆斯特丹什么时候成为荷兰的首都？
pos_context_src: 尽管阿姆斯特丹作为荷兰首都的适当法律地位是最近的日期，但自1814年以来，这座城市就被统一地承认为资本。这部分是因为它是一个“皇家城市”，不仅用于国王的开幕典礼，而且还用于皇家婚礼（尽管在皇家埋葬中也是皇家埋葬在delft中，而且在delft中也是如此，因为它在DELF中也是如此，因为它具有其统治统治的历史。从16世纪末开始，这座城市迅速发展，成为荷兰最大，最强大的城市以及贸易，商业，金融和文化的主要中心。
neg_context_src: 根据荷兰的宪法，阿姆斯特丹是荷兰的首都，尽管自1588年以来，州将军和行政部门一直位于海牙，以及最高法院和国务委员会。自1983年《荷兰宪法》修订以来，第32条提到“国王应在阿姆斯特丹首都阿姆斯特丹宣誓就职并尽快就职”。这是文件中唯一的参考，指出阿姆斯特丹是资本。
当铁路扩展到那时，阿姆斯特丹已经开始了。该社区以荷兰首都阿姆斯特丹的名字命名。 1903年成立了一个名为阿姆斯特丹的邮局，并一直在运营到1959年。

直到1806年，荷兰王国才成为第一个法国帝国的木偶状态，才是路易斯·波拿巴（Louis Bonaparte）授予的城市权利。拿破仑战争后，荷兰英国的现代比利时和荷兰合并了，形成了针对法国的缓冲。作为妥协，布鲁塞尔和阿姆斯特丹每两年交替担任首都，政府仍留在海牙。 1830年比利时分离后，阿姆斯特丹仍然是荷兰的首都，而政府则位于海牙。 1850年后，当政府开始在荷兰社会中发挥更为突出的作用时，海牙迅速扩大了。许多街道是专门为该国政府雇用的大量公务员和正在从荷兰东印度政府退休的荷兰人而建造的。不断增长的城市吞并了1903年的洛斯杜宁（Loosduinen）农村城市，并在1923年完全吞并。

根据荷兰宪法，阿姆斯特丹是荷兰的首都。自1983年的宪法修订以来，《宪法》在第2章，第32章中提到“阿姆斯特丹”和“资本”：国王的宣誓确认及其加冕典礼在“首都阿姆斯特丹”（“阿姆斯特丹”（“” de hoofdstad Amstardam“”）。宪法的先前版本仅提及“阿姆斯特丹市”（““ de stad Amsterdam””）。因此，为了进行皇家投资，荷兰州将军（荷兰议会）开会在阿姆斯特丹举行仪式联席会议。仪式传统上是在前君主在阿姆斯特丹附近的皇家皇宫签署退位之后，立即在大坝广场的Nieuwe Kerk举行。但是，通常情况下，议会位于海牙，这座城市历来是荷兰政府，荷兰君主制和荷兰最高法院的所在地。外国大使馆也位于海牙。
在其历史上，只有一次是阿姆斯特丹，既是“资本”和政府的所在地。在1808年至1810年之间，在荷兰王国期间，路易斯国王居住在阿姆斯特丹，并宣布其王国和政府所在地的城市首都。为了容纳国王，阿姆斯特丹的十七世纪大厅大厅是共和党价值观的主要例子，在荷兰很长时间以来一直盛行，被转变为皇宫。
阿姆斯特丹（，，;）是荷兰的首都，是人口最多的市政当局。它作为资本的地位是由荷兰宪法授权的，尽管它不是政府的所在地，即海牙。阿姆斯特丹在城市中有851,373人的人口，在城市地区为1,351,587，在大都市地区有2,410,960。该市位于该国西部北荷兰省，但不是其首都，即哈勒姆。大都市地区包括兰德斯塔德北部的大部分地区，这是欧洲较大的Conurbations之一，人口约为800万。
威廉王子（William VI）（奥兰治王子五世的儿子威廉·V·王子的儿子）于1813年返回荷兰，拿破仑从权力下来后，将宫殿恢复为原始所有者。然而，在他担任荷兰威廉一世国王一世之后，阿姆斯特丹被任命为荷兰英国的正式首都（政府的所在地是布鲁塞尔和海牙）。新国王意识到在首都拥有宫殿的重要性，市政厅再次成为皇宫。
1810年，荷兰被法国帝国吞并，路易斯·拿破仑国王被一位法国州长取代，后者在阿姆斯特丹的皇宫居住。从1810年到1813年，阿姆斯特丹保持其首都的地位，因为拿破仑皇帝宣布这座城市是帝国的第三城市（仅次于巴黎和罗马）和帝国住所。 1813年12月，拿破仑（Napoleon）倒塌和奥兰治王子（William VI）作为荷兰主权的加入后，海牙被恢复为政府的所在地。
阿姆斯特丹于1891年被宣传。这座城市以荷兰首都阿姆斯特丹的名字命名。 20世纪初的铁路高管亚瑟·斯蒂尔威尔（Arthur Stilwell）之所以选择它，是因为荷兰首都是重要的铁路金融家扬·德·戈伊恩（Jan de Goeijen）的公司。自1892年以来，邮局一直在阿姆斯特丹运营。
report_src: 阿姆斯特丹自1814年起便被一致承认为荷兰的首都，尽管其正式法律地位是在较晚时期才确立的[1]。

question_en: What is Mathematical physics used for?
pos_context_en: The term "mathematical physics" is sometimes used to denote research aimed at studying and solving problems inspired by physics or thought experiments within a mathematically rigorous framework. In this sense, mathematical physics covers a very broad academic realm distinguished only by the blending of pure mathematics and physics. Although related to theoretical physics, mathematical physics in this sense emphasizes the mathematical rigour of the same type as found in mathematics.
neg_context_en: It is common to use idealized models in physics to simplify things. Massless ropes, point particles, ideal gases and the particle in a box are among the many simplified models used in physics. The laws of physics are represented with simple equations such as Newton's laws, Maxwell's equations and the Schrödinger equation. These laws are such as a basis for making mathematical models of real situations. Many real situations are very complex and thus modeled approximate on a computer, a model that is computationally feasible to compute is made from the basic laws or from approximate models made from the basic laws. For example, molecules can be modeled by molecular orbital models that are approximate solutions to the Schrödinger equation. In engineering, physics models are often made by mathematical methods such as finite element analysis.

The usage of the term "mathematical physics" is sometimes idiosyncratic. Certain parts of mathematics that initially arose from the development of physics are not, in fact, considered parts of mathematical physics, while other closely related fields are. For example, ordinary differential equations and symplectic geometry are generally viewed as purely mathematical disciplines, whereas dynamical systems and Hamiltonian mechanics belong to mathematical physics. John Herapath used the term for the title of his 1847 text on "mathematical principles of natural philosophy"; the scope at that time being 
"the causes of heat, gaseous elasticity, gravitation, and other great phenomena of nature".

Letters in Mathematical Physics is a peer-reviewed scientific journal in mathematical physics published by Springer Science+Business Media. It publishes letters and longer research articles, occasionally also articles containing topical reviews. It is essentially a platform for the rapid dissemination of short contributions in the field of mathematical physics. In addition, the journal publishes contributions to modern mathematics in fields which have a potential physical application, and developments in theoretical physics which have potential mathematical impact. The editors are Volker Bach, Edward Frenkel, Maxim Kontsevich, Dirk Kreimer, Nikita Nekrasov, Massimo Porrati, and Daniel Sternheimer.

On the other hand, theoretical physics emphasizes the links to observations and experimental physics, which often requires theoretical physicists (and mathematical physicists in the more general sense) to use heuristic, intuitive, and approximate arguments. Such arguments are not considered rigorous by mathematicians, but that is changing over time.

Modeling and simulation (M&S) at simple terms is a substitute for physical experimentation, in which computers are used to compute the results of some physical phenomenon. As it is apparent from its name "Modeling and simulation" firstly a computer is used to build a mathematical model which contains all the parameters of physical model and represent physical model in virtual form then conditions are applied which we want to experiment on physical model, then simulation starts i.e, we leave on computer to compute/calculate the results of those conditions on mathematical model. In this way, actual experimentation can be avoided which is costly and time-consuming instead of using mathematical knowledge and computer's computation power to solve real-world problems cheaply and in a time efficient manner. As such, M&S can facilitate understanding a system's behavior without actually testing the system in the real world. For instance, to determine which type of spoiler would improve traction the most while designing a race car, a computer simulation of the car could be used to estimate the effect of different spoiler shapes on the coefficient of friction in a turn. Useful insights about different decisions in the design could be gleaned without actually building the car. In addition, simulation can support experimentation that occurs totally in software, or in human-in-the-loop environments where simulation represents systems or generates data needed to meet experiment objectives. Furthermore, simulation can be used to train persons using a virtual environment that would otherwise be difficult or expensive to produce.

The distinction is clear-cut, but not always obvious. For example, mathematical physics is the application of mathematics in physics. Its methods are mathematical, but its subject is physical. The problems in this field start with a "mathematical model of a physical situation" (system) and a "mathematical description of a physical law" that will be applied to that system. Every mathematical statement used for solving has a hard-to-find physical meaning. The final mathematical solution has an easier-to-find meaning, because it is what the solver is looking for.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
Ẑ is a Latin script letter, the letter Z with a circumflex, used for transliteration of the Cyrillic letter Ѕ in ISO 9 family of transliteration standards. The lower case version of the letter is ẑ.
Ġ is used in some Arabic transliteration schemes, such as DIN 31635 and ISO 233, to represent the letter (ġain).
question_src: 数学物理学的用途是什么？
pos_context_src: “数学物理学”一词有时被用来表示旨在研究和解决数学上严格框架内物理或思想实验启发的问题的研究。从这个意义上讲，数学物理学涵盖了一个非常广泛的学术领域，仅由纯数学和物理学的融合而区别。尽管与理论物理学有关，但这种意义上的数学物理学强调了与数学相同类型的数学严谨性。
neg_context_src: 在物理学中使用理想化的模型来简化事物是常见的。无质量的绳索，点颗粒，理想气体和盒子中的粒子是物理中使用的许多简化模型之一。物理定律用简单的方程式表示，例如牛顿定律，麦克斯韦方程和schrödinger方程。这些定律是制定实际情况数学模型的基础。许多真实情况非常复杂，因此在计算机上建模近似，在计算上可行的模型是根据基本定律或基本定律制成的近似模型制成的。例如，分子可以通过分子轨道模型对schrödinger方程的近似溶液进行建模。在工程学中，物理模型通常是通过数学方法（例如有限元分析）制成的。

“数学物理学”一词的用法有时是特殊的。实际上，最初源于物理学的发展而产生的数学的某些部分实际上并不是数学物理学的一部分，而其他密切相关的领域则不被视为。例如，普通的微分方程和符号几何形状通常被视为纯粹的数学学科，而动态系统和哈密顿力学属于数学物理学。约翰·赫拉帕斯（John Herapath）使用该术语撰写了他1847年的“自然哲学数学原理”文字的标题；当时的范围是 
“热量，气态弹性，引力和其他自然现象的原因”。

数学物理学中的字母是Springer Science+商业媒体发表的数学物理学的同行评审科学期刊。它发表了字母和较长的研究文章，偶尔还包含局部评论的文章。它本质上是一个快速传播数学物理领域短贡献的平台。此外，该期刊还为具有潜在物理应用的领域的现代数学发表了贡献，以及具有潜在数学影响的理论物理学的发展。编辑是Volker Bach，Edward Frenkel，Maxim Kontsevich，Dirk Kreimer，Nikita Nekrasov，Massimo Porrati和Daniel Sternheimer。
另一方面，理论物理学强调了与观察和实验物理学的联系，这通常需要理论物理学家（在更一般的意义上）使用启发式，直觉和近似论点。这种论点并不被数学家视为严格，但是随着时间的流逝，这种论点正在发生变化。

简单的术语建模和仿真（M＆S）是物理实验的替代品，其中使用计算机来计算某些物理现象的结果。从其名称“建模和仿真”中可以明显看出，首先使用计算机来构建一个数学模型，该模型包含物理模型的所有参数并以虚拟形式表示物理模型，然后应用条件，然后我们希望在物理模型上进行实验，然后在物理模型上进行实验，然后在计算机上事图，以计算计算数学模型的这些条件/计算数学模型的结果。通过这种方式，可以避免实际的实验，这是昂贵且耗时的，而不是使用数学知识和计算机的计算能力来便宜地及时地解决现实世界中的问题。因此，M＆S可以促进理解系统的行为，而无需实际测试现实世界中的系统。例如，为了在设计赛车时确定哪种类型的扰流板可以最大程度地提高牵引力，可以使用对汽车进行计算机模拟来估计不同扰流板形状在转弯中对摩擦系数的影响。关于设计中不同决策的有用见解可以在不实际制造汽车的情况下收集。此外，模拟可以支持完全在软件中发生的实验，或者在模拟代表系统或生成满足实验目标所需的数据的人类环境中。此外，模拟可用于使用虚拟环境来训练人员，而虚拟环境原本很难或昂贵。
区别是明确的，但并不总是很明显。例如，数学物理学是数学在物理学中的应用。它的方法是数学的，但其主题是物理的。该领域的问题从“物理状况的数学模型”（系统）和将应用于该系统的“物理定律的数学描述”开始。每个用于求解的数学语句都有难以找到的物理含义。最终的数学解决方案具有易于找到的含义，因为它是求解器所寻找的。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。
ẑ是拉丁文脚本字母，带有绕行的字母z，用于在ISO 9的音译标准家族中的西里尔字母s译。该字母的较低案例版本是ẑ。
ġ用于某些阿拉伯语音译方案，例如DIN 31635和ISO 233，以代表字母（ġAAN）。
report_src: 数学物理学的主要用途在于以与纯数学相同的严格性来研究和解决来源于物理学或思想实验的问题，从而在纯数学与物理学的交汇处建立系统的理论框架[1]。这种方法论使科学家能够对量子场论、统计力学、广义相对论等物理理论进行公理化与定理化推导，以检验其内部一致性、揭示隐含假设，并在必要时给出严格证明；同时，它借助拓扑、表示论、偏微分方程等工具，为高能物理、凝聚态物理、量子信息等前沿领域提供精确计算方法和模型，推动对新物理现象的预测与实验验证；此外，数学物理学在教育与科研中培养能够跨越两门学科的复合型人才，促进数学新结构（如同调量子场论、镜像对称等）的发现，并为现代科技（例如半导体设计和量子计算算法）奠定理论基础。

question_en: Does human breast milk have higher protein than cow milk?
pos_context_en: Whole cow's milk contains too little iron, retinol, vitamin E, vitamin C, vitamin D, unsaturated fats or essential fatty acids for human babies. Whole cow's milk also contains too much protein, sodium, potassium, phosphorus and chloride which may put a strain on an infant's immature kidneys. In addition, the proteins, fats and calcium in whole cow's milk are more difficult for an infant to digest and absorb than the ones in breast milk. Evaporated milk may be easier to digest due to the processing of the protein but is still nutritionally inadequate. Some infants are allergic to cow's milk protein, this problem may be associated with infant formulas derived from cow's milk.
neg_context_en: Breast milk also contains much more protein than cow's milk. It contains 60% protein whereas cow’s milk contains only 40% protein. Protein is very important for infants because they need more protein per pound than adults do. For the first few months of their life, this protein must come from breast milk or formula, it cannot come from cow's milk . One specific protein that breast milk has is lactoferrin, which is bacteriostatic, meaning it prevents the growth of harmful bacteria. Without protein, the baby cannot produce the immunity that its body desperately needs, resulting in a higher risk of disease and malnutrition. Breast milk provides the best source of protein for an infant.

However, some farming groups promote the practice. For example, Small Farm Today, in 2005, claimed beneficial use in invalid and convalescent diets, proposing that glycerol ethers, possibly important in nutrition for nursing infants, are much higher in does' milk than in cows' milk. A 1970 book on animal breeding claimed that does' milk differs from cows' or humans' milk by having higher digestibility, distinct alkalinity, higher buffering capacity, and certain therapeutic values in human medicine and nutrition. George Mateljan suggested doe milk can replace ewe milk or cow milk in diets of those who are allergic to certain mammals' milk. However, like cow milk, doe milk has lactose (sugar), and may cause gastrointestinal problems for individuals with lactose intolerance. In fact, the level of lactose is similar to that of cow milk.

Livestock are modified with the intention of improving economically important traits such as growth-rate, quality of meat, milk composition, disease resistance and survival. Animals have been engineered to grow faster, be healthier and resist diseases. Modifications have also improved the wool production of sheep and udder health of cows. Goats have been genetically engineered to produce milk with strong spiderweb-like silk proteins in their milk. A GM pig called Enviropig was created with the capability of digesting plant phosphorus more efficiently than conventional pigs. They could reduce water pollution since they excrete 30 to 70% less phosphorus in manure. Dairy cows have been genetically engineered to produce milk that would be the same as human breast milk. This could potentially benefit mothers who cannot produce breast milk but want their children to have breast milk rather than formula. Researchers have also developed a genetically engineered cow that produces allergy-free milk.

The hydrolyzed nature of fish protein powder (low molecular weight profile) leads it to be used in hypoallergenic applications such as infant formulas. There is no evidence that infants who have a high risk of having an allergy to cows milk should be fed hydrolyzed infant formula instead of breast milk for allergy prevention. For infants who have a high-risk of a cows milk allergy but cannot be fed breast milk, there is low-quality evidence suggesting that hydrolyzed protein-based formula may reduce the risk of a cows milk allergy compared to cow milk protein formula.

Overall buffalo milk has greater nutritional properties and values than cow milk. Buffalo milk has higher levels of fat lactose, protein, calcium, and vitamins A and C, with lower levels of vitamin E riboflavin an cholesterol. There is an absence of carotene and a presence of bioactivepentasaccharides and gangliosides not present in cows. Fat globules are larger but contain less membrane material than cow milk. However, specific breed of buffalo does affect milk composition. In a 2008 comparison of four Indian buffalo breeds, the Bhadawari was shown to have more solids not fat than the Murrah, which had the highest performance for fat, total protein, and casein contents.

There is a market for human breast milk, both in the form of wet nurse service and milk product. As a product, breast milk is exchanged by human milk banks as well as directly between milk donors and customers mediated by websites on the Internet. Human milk banks generally have standardized measures for screening donors and storing the milk, while donors on websites vary in regard to these measures. A study in 2013 came to the conclusion that 74% of breast milk samples from providers found from websites were colonized with Gram-negative bacteria or had more than 10,000 colony-forming units/mL of aerobic bacteria. Growth happens during transit. According to the FDA, the bacteria in fresh milk doubles every 20 minutes. Breast milk is considered to be healthier than cow's milk and infant formula when it comes to feeding an infant in the first 6 months of life, but only under extreme situations do international health organizations support feeding an infant breast milk from a healthy wet nurse rather than that of its biological mother. One reason is because the unregulated breast milk market is fraught with risks such as drugs of abuse and prescription medications being present in donated breast milk. The transmission of these substances through breast milk can do more harm than good when it comes to the health outcomes of the infant recipient.

Camel milk is a staple food of nomadic tribes living in deserts. According to a study, it consists of 11.7% solids, 3% protein, 3.6% fat, 0.8% ash, 4.4% lactose and 0.13% acidity (pH 6.5). The quantities of sodium, potassium, zinc, iron, copper, manganese, niacin and vitamin C were relatively higher than the amounts in cow milk. However, the levels of thiamin, riboflavin, folacin, vitamin B, pantothenic acid, vitamin A, lysine, and tryptophan were lower than those in cow milk. The molar percentages of the fatty acids in milk fat were 26.7% for palmitic acid, 25.5% oleic acid, 11.4% myristic acid and 11% palmitoleic acid. Camel milk has higher thermal stability compared with cow milk, but it does not compare favourably with sheep milk.

All mammalian species produce milk, but the composition of milk for each species varies widely and other kinds of milk are often very different from human breast milk. As a rule, the milk of mammals that nurse frequently (including human babies) is less rich, or more watery, than the milk of mammals whose young nurse less often. Human milk is noticeably thinner and sweeter than cow's milk.

The medicinal property of the Vechur cow's milk have been documented traditionally by Ayurveda and recent scientific studies have substantiated this. The protein component of the Vechur cow's milk has an improved antimicrobial property. As per recent findings, the anti-bacterial property of the lactoferrin protein present in the Vechur Cow milk is more than that of the antibiotic ampicillin. Although lactoferrin, present in the milk of all mammals, is found to have antimicrobial, antiviral, antitumor, immunodefence and anti-inflammatory properties recent studies prove that in the case of the lactoferrin protein in the Vechur Cow milk, these properties are much more enhanced. The Vechur Ghee (clarified butter) produced from Vechur cow’s milk, is famous for its high medicinal values due to the presence of A2 beta-lactalbumin protein and higher arginine content which is good for the health of convalescing people.
