question_src: 人类母乳的蛋白质比牛奶更高吗？
pos_context_src: 整个牛奶中的牛奶含有太少的铁，视黄醇，维生素E，维生素C，维生素D，不饱和脂肪或人类婴儿的必需脂肪酸。整个牛奶还包含过多的蛋白质，钠，钾，磷和氯化物，可能会使婴儿的未成熟肾脏造成压力。此外，与母乳中的蛋白质，脂肪和钙相比，婴儿牛奶中的蛋白质，脂肪和钙更难消化和吸收。由于蛋白质的加工，蒸发的牛奶可能更容易消化，但在营养上仍然不足。一些婴儿对牛奶蛋白过敏，此问题可能与源自牛奶的婴儿配方蛋白有关。
neg_context_src: 母乳还含有比牛奶更多的蛋白质。它含有60％的蛋白质，而牛奶仅包含40％的蛋白质。蛋白质对婴儿非常重要，因为它们比成年人需要更多的蛋白质蛋白质。在他们生命的头几个月中，这种蛋白质必须来自母乳或配方奶粉，不能来自牛奶。母乳具有的一种特异性蛋白质是乳铁蛋白，乳铁蛋白是抑制性的，这意味着它可以防止有害细菌的生长。没有蛋白质，婴儿将无法产生身体迫切需要的免疫力，从而导致疾病和营养不良的风险更高。母乳为婴儿提供了最佳的蛋白质来源。

但是，一些农业团体促进了这种做法。例如，今天的小型农场（2005年）声称在无效和康复饮食中使用了有益的用途，并提出甘油醚可能在护理婴儿的营养中很重要，在“牛奶”中比在牛奶中要高得多。 1970年的一本关于动物育种的书称，它具有更高的消化率，独特的碱度，更高的缓冲能力以及人类医学和营养的某些治疗价值，从而使“牛奶不同于母牛”或人类牛奶。乔治·马特扬（George Mateljan）建议牛奶在对某些哺乳动物过敏的人的饮食中可以代替母乳或牛奶。但是，像牛奶一样，牛奶牛奶含有乳糖（糖），可能会给患有乳糖不耐症患者胃肠道问题。实际上，乳糖的水平与牛奶的水平相似。

修改牲畜的目的是改善经济上重要的特征，例如生长率，肉类质量，牛奶成分，抗病性和生存。动物已被设计为生长更快，更健康和抵抗疾病。修改还改善了牛和牛牛的羊毛生产。山羊已经经过基因工程，可以在牛奶中生产牛奶，并在其牛奶中产生强烈的蜘蛛网状丝蛋白。与传统猪相比，创建了一种称为Enviropig的GM猪，其能力更有效地消化植物磷。他们可以减少水污染，因为它们排泄了30％至70％的肥料。奶牛已经经过基因设计，可以生产与人类母乳相同的牛奶。这可能会使无法生产母乳但希望孩子的母乳而不是配方奶粉的母亲受益。研究人员还开发了一种基因工程的牛，可产生无过敏牛奶。
鱼蛋白粉末的水解性质（低分子量剖面）将其用于低过敏性应用，例如婴儿配方。没有证据表明，对牛奶过敏的婴儿应被喂食的婴儿配方奶粉，而不是母乳，以预防过敏。对于患有高风险牛奶过敏但不能喂母乳的婴儿，有低质量的证据表明，与牛奶蛋白配方奶相比，基于水解的蛋白质配方可能会降低牛奶过敏的风险。
总体水牛牛奶比牛奶具有更大的营养特性和价值。水牛牛奶具有较高水平的脂肪乳糖，蛋白质，钙和维生素A和C，维生素E核黄素水平较低。奶牛中不存在胡萝卜素和生物活性戊糖和神经节苷脂的存在。脂肪球更大，但膜材料少于牛奶。但是，特定的水牛确实会影响牛奶成分。在2008年对四种印度水牛品种的比较中，巴达瓦里的固体比脂肪比脂肪多，后者的脂肪，总蛋白质和酪蛋白含量最高。

无论是湿护士服务还是牛奶产品的形式，都有人类母乳的市场。作为一种产品，母乳是由人类牛奶库以及直接在互联网上由网站调节的客户之间交换的。人牛奶银行通常采取标准化的筛查捐赠者和存储牛奶的措施，而网站上的捐赠者在这些措施方面有所不同。 2013年的一项研究得出的结论是，从网站发现的提供者的74％的母乳样品用革兰氏阴性菌殖民或有10,000多个菌落形成单位/mL的有氧细菌。增长发生在运输过程中。根据FDA的说法，新鲜牛奶中的细菌每20分钟翻倍。在生命的头六个月中，只有在极端情况下，国际卫生组织才能支持从健康的湿护士而不是其亲生母亲的母亲喂养婴儿的母乳。原因之一是因为不受管制的母乳市场充满了诸如捐赠母乳中存在的滥用药物和处方药物的风险。当涉及婴儿接受者的健康结果时，这些物质通过母乳传播比好处更大。

骆驼牛奶是住在沙漠中的游牧部落的主食。根据一项研究，它包括11.7％的固体，3％蛋白质，3.6％的脂肪，0.8％灰，4.4％乳糖和0.13％的酸度（pH 6.5）。钠，钾，锌，铁，铜，锰，烟酸和维生素C的量相对较高，远高于牛奶中的量。然而，硫胺素，核黄素，foracin，维生素B，泛酸，维生素A，赖氨酸和色氨酸的水平低于牛奶中的水平。棕榈酸，25.5％油酸，11.4％的肉豆蔻酸和11％棕榈酸的脂肪酸的摩尔百分比为26.7％。与牛奶相比，骆驼牛奶具有更高的热稳定性，但与绵羊牛奶相比并不相比。
所有哺乳动物物种都会产生牛奶，但是每种物种的牛奶成分差异很大，其他种类的牛奶通常与人类母乳有很大不同。通常，与年轻护士少的哺乳动物相比，哺乳动物经常（包括人类婴儿）的哺乳动物牛奶不那么丰富，或者更多。人牛奶明显比牛奶更薄，更甜。

传统上，阿育吠陀（Ayurveda）记录了Vechur牛奶的药用特性，最近的科学研究证实了这一点。 Vechur牛奶的蛋白质成分具有改善的抗菌特性。根据最近的发现，vechur牛奶中存在的乳铁蛋白蛋白的抗菌特性比抗生素氨苄青霉素的抗菌特性更多。虽然发现所有哺乳动物的牛奶中存在于所有哺乳动物的牛奶中，但发现乳铁蛋白具有抗菌，抗病毒药，抗肿瘤，免疫诱因和抗炎特性，最近的研究证明，在vechur牛奶中乳酸铁蛋白的蛋白质中，这些特性得到了更大的增强。由Vechur牛奶生产的Vechur酥油（澄清的黄油）由于A2β-乳糖蛋白蛋白和更高的精氨酸含量而以其高药用值而闻名，这对康复人的健康有益。
report_src: 不是。文献指出“整个牛奶还包含过多的蛋白质……可能会使婴儿的未成熟肾脏造成压力”，意即牛奶中的蛋白质含量高于婴儿需要，而母乳并无此过量问题[1]。因此，在相同体积下，人类母乳的蛋白质含量低于牛奶。

question_en: Has the character Danielle "Dani" Cage appeared in any Marvel films?
pos_context_en: Jessica Campbell Jones is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character was created by writer Brian Michael Bendis and artist Michael Gaydos, and first appeared in "Alias" #1 (November 2001), as part of Marvel's Max, an imprint for more mature content. Within the context of Marvel's shared universe, Jones is a former superhero who becomes the owner and sole employee of Alias Private Investigations. Bendis originally envisioned the series centered on Jessica Drew and only decided to create Jones once he noticed that the main character had a distinct voice and background that differentiated her from Drew.
neg_context_title_en: List of Marvel Comics characters: C
List of Marvel Comics characters: C

List of Marvel Comics characters: C
neg_context_en: Danielle "Dani" Cage is a fictional character in Marvel Comics. Danielle is the young daughter of Jessica Jones and Luke Cage, created by Brian Michael Bendis and Michael Gaydos, first appeared in "The Pulse" #13 (March 2006).

Danielle "Dani" Moonstar, originally codenamed Psyche and later Mirage, is a fictional Cheyenne superheroine appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character is usually depicted as associated with the X-Men.

In an alternate future timeline, Danielle Cage, nicknamed Dani, inherits both of her parents' abilities and becomes Captain America. It is mentioned that she was mentored by an aged version of Black Widow, who goes by the name Madame Natasha. She is plucked from her timeline to battle Ultron and then a Doombot, and subsequently teams up with the modern day Avengers to battle Moridun, who had possessed Wiccan. She returns to the present again to aid the U.S.Avengers in capturing her nemesis, the Golden Skull.

Marvel announced in September 2015 that Dawson would be appearing in "Luke Cage", in what Cage actor Mike Colter described as a "significant part", noting that the comics character Claire Temple was introduced as a love interest for Cage. The series introduces Temple's mother (portrayed by Sônia Braga), and gives Claire "a large storyline ... [she helps] out a lot." It also references her role as a version of Night Nurse, with a character dismissively referring to her as "the night nurse". Explaining the decision to have Temple appear across multiple series, which has been compared to the role that Nick Fury plays as "the connective thread" between the MCU films, Marvel Television head Jeph Loeb explained that it was due to Dawson's performance, saying "It wasn't just that Claire fit so well in those worlds, it's that Rosario fit so well in those worlds." When Temple first appears in the second season of "Daredevil", she has "a cut in her eyebrow", which Daredevil actor Charlie Cox explained was from one of the other series, saying that "the timeline had been thought through and worked out" to connect Dawson's various performances.
She was last seen applying to be Danielle Cage's nanny, but left when it became apparent that Luke Cage and Jessica Jones had no idea who she was.

In July 2016, Dawson was unable to promote "Luke Cage" because she was "back in New York ... filming something else for Marvel TV", which was confirmed that October to be "Iron Fist"; this appearance was set up at the end of "Luke Cage". A month later, Dawson was revealed to also be reprising her role in the crossover miniseries "The Defenders". Dawson also expressed interest in making a cameo appearance in "The Punisher", a spin-off series from "Daredevil", but was unable to due to a scheduling conflict.
After appearing in the second season of "Luke Cage", Dawson explained that she was reluctant to continue making appearances in the many series due to having to travel away from her family when working on the New York sets. She did think that she would return to "Luke Cage" if it was renewed for further seasons, and again expressed interest in appearing in "The Punisher" at some point moving forward "just so I can feel like I’ve done every show". Dawson later revealed that she had asked "Luke Cage" showrunner Cheo Hodari Coker whether she could contribute to the writing of Temple's last scene in the season; she considered the scene to be the culmination of three years of work for her, and felt that it had initially been written too much from the perspective of Cage, whom Temple has a fight with in the scene that ends their relationship. Dawson praised Coker for allowing her to push the scene to feature more of an equal balance between the characters, and Coker praised the work she did on this.

Following the announcement of the series, Russ Burlingame noted for ComicBook.com that Marvel may have been tempted to change Danny Rand from white to a person of Asian descent, especially given that the other Marvel Netflix series "Jessica Jones" and "Luke Cage" already set a precedent of increasing diversity by exploring a female and African-America lead, respectively. However, Burlingame was against this happening, wanting to see "the classic" version of the character, and feeling that making the character Asian simply because he is a martial artist was itself "quietly, subtlely racist". This situation, of casting either a white or Asian-American actor in the role, was described as "lose/lose" by Devin Faraci of Birth.Movies.Death, while Albert Ching at Comic Book Resources was strictly against casting an Asian-American. He said that any extra Asian-American representation onscreen would be positive, but that he was not comfortable with the idea of the first major Asian superhero in film or television being a martial artist. Ching questioned why this discussion had not been raised with any other character, and suggested that a non-white, non-Asian actor be cast instead to avoid either issues. He highlighted the casting of Chloe Bennet and Ming-Na Wen in the MCU series "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.", both in "non-stereotypical roles", as examples of what roles he would rather have Asian-Americans be cast in.

During the "Hunt for Wolverine" storyline, a black market auction had somehow got the genetic material of Danielle Cage. When Iron Man, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Spider-Man arrive undercover looking for Wolverine ever since his body disappeared from his unmarked grave, Luke and Jessica are outraged when they learned that their daughter's genetic material was being auctioned off.

Since "Boy Meets World" ended, Fishel has appeared in several films, including "National Lampoon's Dorm Daze". In 2006, she appeared in three made-for-DVD releases: "National Lampoon's Dorm Daze 2" (appearing again as "Marla" from the first film), the action film "Gamebox 1.0" (playing a dual role), and "The Chosen One", an independent animated film in which she provides the voice of the lead female character.

In 2018, Cage starred in the action thriller film, "Mandy", which premiered on January 19 at the 2018 Sundance Film Festival. Nick Allen of RogerEbert.com praised the movie, writing that "for all of the endless feral performances that Cage has given, in movies good, bad and forgettable, Cosmatos' style-driven, '80s-tastic passion for weird worlds and characters takes full advantage of Cage's greatness, and then some."
On October, Mandy's producer Elijah Wood announced the intention to sizing up an Oscar campaign for Nicolas Cage and composer Jóhann Jóhannsson but the film was disqualified because
was also released on VOD on September 14.

Jessica Jones debuted in the Marvel MAX imprint series "Alias" in November 2001. The character and series were created by writer Brian Michael Bendis and artist Michael Gaydos. "Alias" ran for 28 issues from 2001 to 2004, with most covers drawn by David W. Mack. After the end of the series, Jones and other characters from the series moved to Bendis' subsequent series, "The Pulse". In a 2005 interview, Bendis claimed:
"Originally, "Alias" was going to star Jessica Drew, but it became something else entirely. Which is good, because had we used Jessica, it would have been off continuity and bad storytelling." Previously, Bendis commented, "I was at one time toying with doing Jessica Drew [in "Alias"] because she has the best hair of any superhero in comics, but this book is entirely different than what that idea was to be."
question_src: 丹尼尔·“丹尼”笼子的角色出现在任何漫威电影中？
pos_context_src: 杰西卡·坎贝尔·琼斯（Jessica Campbell Jones）是一个虚构的超级英雄，出现在漫威漫画出版的《美国漫画书》中。该角色是由作家布莱恩·迈克尔·本迪斯（Brian Michael Bendis）和艺术家迈克尔·盖多斯（Michael Gaydos）创建的，并首次出现在“ Alias”＃1（2001年11月）中，作为Marvel的Max的一部分，这是一个更加成熟的内容的烙印。在漫威共享宇宙的背景下，琼斯是前超级英雄，成为别名私人调查的所有者​​和唯一雇员。本迪斯（Bendis）最初设想了以杰西卡·德鲁（Jessica Drew）为中心的系列，一旦琼斯注意到主角的声音和背景与德鲁（Drew）不同，才决定创造琼斯。
neg_context_title_src: 克莱尔神庙（漫威电影宇宙）
克莱尔神庙（漫威电影宇宙）
neg_context_src: Danielle“ Dani” Cage是Marvel Comics中的虚构人物。 Danielle是由Brian Michael Bendis和Michael Gaydos创建的Jessica Jones和Luke Cage的小女儿，首次出现在“ Pulse”＃13（2006年3月）中。
Danielle“ Dani” Moonstar最初是代号为Psyche，后来的Mirage，是一个虚构的Cheyenne Superheroine，出现在Marvel Comics出版的《美国漫画书》中。通常将角色描绘为与X战警有关的。
在未来的时间表中，绰号丹尼（Dani）的丹妮尔·凯奇（Danielle Cage）继承了她父母的能力并成为美国队长。提到她是由陈旧版本的黑寡妇指导的，后者以娜塔莎夫人为名。她从时间轴上拔出到奥创击战斗，然后是一名炸鸡，随后与现代复仇者联手与拥有Wiccan的Moridun作战。她再次返回现在，以帮助美国宣布捕获她的仇敌金头骨。

漫威（Marvel）于2015年9月宣布，道森（Dawson）将出现在“卢克·凯奇（Luke Cage）”中，凯奇演员迈克·柯尔特（Mike Colter）将其描述为“重要部分”，并指出漫画人物克莱尔·坦普（Claire Temple）被引入了笼子的爱情兴趣。该系列介绍了Temple的母亲（由SôniaBraga刻画），并给Claire“一个大型的故事情节……[她提供了很多帮助]。它还引用了她作为夜护士的角色，一个角色不屑一顾将她称为“夜护士”。 Marvel电视台负责人Jeph Loeb解释了尼克·弗里（Nick Fury）作为MCU电影之间“连接线”的角色的作用，该决定与尼克·弗里（Nick Fury）扮演的角色相比，这与尼克·弗里（Nick Fury）扮演的角色相提并论，他解释说，这是由于道森（Dawson）的表现，并说“这不仅是克莱尔（Claire）在这些世界中非常合适，而且在那些世界上也很合适。”当Temple首次出现在“ Daredevil”的第二季时，她的“眉毛剪裁”，夜魔侠演员查理·考克斯（Charlie Cox）解释说，这是另一个系列中的一个，他说“时间表已经思考，并努力了”，以连接道森的各种表演。
她最后一次被申请为丹妮尔·凯奇（Danielle Cage）的保姆，但很明显卢克·凯奇（Luke Cage）和杰西卡·琼斯（Jessica Jones）不知道自己是谁。

2016年7月，道森（Dawson）无法宣传“卢克·凯奇（Luke Cage）”，因为她“回到纽约”……为漫威电视（Marvel TV）拍摄其他东西，这证实了十月是“铁拳”。这种外观是在“卢克凯奇”结束时设置的。一个月后，道森（Dawson）也被揭示在跨越迷你剧《捍卫者》中重新发挥作用。道森（Dawson）还表示有兴趣在“ Dunisher”（The Punisher）中出现，这是来自“ Daredevil”的衍生系列，但由于安排冲突而无法造成。
在出现在“卢克·凯奇（Luke Cage）”的第二季之后，道森（Dawson）解释说，由于在纽约套装工作时不得不离开家人，她不愿继续参加许多系列赛。她确实认为，如果将其续签持续了季节，她会回到“卢克凯奇”，并且再次表示有兴趣出现在“惩罚者”中的某个时候，以便我可以觉得自己已经完成了每场演出”。道森后来透露，她曾问过“卢克·凯奇”的表演者乔·霍达里·科克（Cheo Hodari Coker），她是否可以为坦普尔在本赛季的最后一幕写作做出贡献。她认为现场是她为她三年的工作的高潮，并认为最初从凯奇（Cage）的角度写了太多的作品，凯奇（Cage）在现场与他们的战斗结束了他们的关系。道森（Dawson）称赞科克（Coker）允许她推动现场在角色之间取得更多平等的平衡，而科克（Coker）赞扬了她对此所做的工作。

该系列宣布之后，Russ Burlingame在Comicbook.com上指出，Marvel可能已经很想将Danny Rand从白色变为亚洲血统的人，尤其是考虑到其他Marvel Netflix系列“ Jessica Jones”和“ Luke Cage”已经通过分别探索女性和非洲非洲人和非洲人 - 美术领导者来增强多样性的先例。但是，伯林格（Burlingame）反对这种情况，希望看到角色的“经典”版本，并认为使角色成为亚洲人仅仅是因为他是武术家本身就是“安静，巧妙地种族主义者”。这种情况是由出生的德文·法拉奇（Devin faraci）描述为“失败/失去”的情况。他说，在屏幕上的任何额外的亚裔美国人代表都会是积极的，但是他对电影或电视中第一个亚洲超级英雄的想法不满意。 Ching质疑为什么没有与其他任何角色进行讨论，并建议将非白人的非亚洲演员进行演员，以避免任何一个问题。他强调了Chloe Bennet和Ming-na Wen在MCU系列“ S.H.I.E.L.D.的代理人”中的铸造，均以“非疾病型角色”为例，是他宁愿扮演亚裔美国人的角色的例子。
在“追捕金刚狼”的故事情节期间，黑市拍卖会以某种方式获得了丹妮尔·凯奇的遗传材料。当钢铁侠，杰西卡·琼斯，卢克·凯奇和蜘蛛侠到达卧底寻找金刚狼以来，自从他的身体从未标记的坟墓中消失以来，当他们得知女儿的遗传物质被拍卖时，卢克和杰西卡就会感到愤怒。
自“男孩遇见世界”结束以来，渔夫出现在几部电影中，包括“国家兰蒙的宿舍昏昏欲睡”。 2006年，她出现在三个制作的DVD版本中：“国家羔羊的Dorm Daze 2”（再次出现在第一部电影中的“ Marla”），动作片“ GameBox 1.0”（扮演双重角色）和“选择的角色”和“选择的一部”，一部独立的动画电影，她提供了主角女性角色的声音。

2018年，凯奇（Cage）出演了动作惊悚片《曼迪》（Mandy），该电影于1月19日在2018年圣丹斯电影节上首映。 Rogerebert.com的尼克·艾伦（Nick Allen）称赞了这部电影，他写道：“对于凯奇（Cage）在电影中给予的所有无尽的野性表演，科斯马托斯（Cosmatos）的风格驱动的，对怪异的世界和角色的80年代热情充满了凯奇（Cage）的伟大优势，然后是一些。”
10月，曼迪（Mandy）的制片人伊莱贾·伍德（Elijah Wood）宣布打算为尼古拉斯·凯奇（Nicolas Cage）和作曲家乔汉·乔汉森（JóhannJóhannsson）进行奥斯卡赛事的规模，但这部电影被取消了资格，因为
还于9月14日在VOD上发布。

杰西卡·琼斯（Jessica Jones）于2001年11月在漫威麦克斯（Marvel Max）烙印系列“别名”中首次亮相。该角色和系列是由作家布莱恩·迈克尔·本迪斯（Brian Michael Bendis）和艺术家迈克尔·盖多斯（Michael Gaydos）创作的。从2001年到2004年，“ Alias”持续了28期，其中大多数封面由David W. Mack绘制。系列赛结束后，琼斯和该系列中的其他角色移至本迪斯的后续系列“脉搏”。在2005年的一次采访中，本迪斯声称：
“最初”，“别名”要出演杰西卡·德鲁（Jessica Drew），但这完全变成了其他东西。这很好，因为如果我们使用杰西卡（Jessica），那将是不连续的和不好的讲故事。”以前，本迪斯（Bendis）评论说：“我一次在玩杰西卡·德鲁（Jessica Drew）（在“ alias”中），因为她拥有漫画中任何超级英雄的头发最好，但是这本书与那个想法完全不同。”
report_src: 丹尼尔·“丹尼”笼子（通常指卢克·笼子与杰西卡·琼斯在漫画中的女儿丹妮尔·笼子）至今仅出现在漫画剧情里，并未在任何漫威电影宇宙（MCU）或其他漫威改编电影中登场；在少数以杰西卡为主角的真人剧集里，该角色同样没有正式出现，而杰西卡本人最早源自漫画《Alias》#1（2001年11月）[1]。因此，截至目前，观众在漫威真人长片中尚无法看到这位角色。

question_en: Can greed be a good thing?
pos_context_en: Ivan Boesky famously defended greed in an 18 May 1986 commencement address at the UC Berkeley's School of Business Administration, in which he said, "Greed is all right, by the way. I want you to know that. I think greed is healthy. You can be greedy and still feel good about yourself". This speech inspired the 1987 film "Wall Street", which features the famous line spoken by Gordon Gekko: "Greed, for lack of a better word, is good. Greed is right, greed works. Greed clarifies, cuts through, and captures the essence of the evolutionary spirit. Greed, in all of its forms; greed for life, for money, for love, knowledge has marked the upward surge of mankind."
neg_context_en: If a Ferengi navigates the river properly, he can accumulate wealth and distribute it throughout society, at various points along the river. This may demonstrate an important distinction, even in Ferengi culture, between selfishness and greed. Ferengi believe that greed, while essential to their concept of economics, is not inherently selfish, because the pursuit of greed serves a greater good. This is similar to the "Greed is Good" speech made by Gordon Gekko in the film "Wall Street". Alternatively, the concept may demonstrate that Ferengi culture views both selfishness and greed as completely compatible with improving the wealth of the universe as a whole.

The primary aim of the dialogue is an attempt to define greed. A friend of Socrates argues that greed is a desire to profit from things of no value, but Socrates replies that no sensible man attempts to profit from worthless things, but inasfar as greed is a desire for profit, then it is a desire for the good, and thus everyone is greedy. The friend of Socrates thinks there is something wrong with Socrates' argument, but cannot say what is wrong with it.

Written shortly after the financial crash of 2008, Folbre explores how the boundaries between the pursuit of self-interest and immorality have become blurred. She argues that the mentality espoused by Oliver Stone's character Gordon Gecko that "greed is good," helped lead to the 2008 crash and persists in its wake. Yet, the same social norms that consider aggression, greed and lust an advantage to men in public life also view such things as perverse in women. Folbre argues that this double standard often puts aspiring women in a difficult position, which forces women to choose between their personal identity and the acceptance of the expected gender role.
Folbre brings women's work, their sexuality, and their ideas into the center of the dialectic between economic history and the history of economic ideas. Her book describes a process of economic and cultural change in the United States, Great Britain and France that shaped the evolution of patriarchal capitalism and the welfare state.

Thomas Aquinas says that greed "is a sin against God, just as all mortal sins, in as much as man condemns things eternal for the sake of temporal things." In Dante's "Purgatory", the avaricious penitents were bound and laid face down on the ground for having concentrated too much on earthly thoughts.
Meher Baba dictated that "Greed is a state of restlessness of the heart, and it consists mainly of craving for power and possessions. Possessions and power are sought for the fulfillment of desires. Man is only partially satisfied in his attempt to have the fulfillment of his desires, and this partial satisfaction fans and increases the flame of craving instead of extinguishing it. Thus greed always finds an endless field of conquest and leaves the man endlessly dissatisfied. The chief expressions of greed are related to the emotional part of man."

The final explanatory feature important to the Taliban's insurgency as a greed-based rebellion is the influence of a previous rebellion. With the support of the CIA and ISI the young Taliban in the 1990s were pitted against the Soviet Union in proxy war. This enabled the Taliban to do a number of things. They became involved in opium trade, were provided with weapons, and began to construct the organizational aptitude that allows for their continued success today. The previous involvement of the Taliban in an armed insurgency allows one of the issues with a greed-based insurgency to be dismissed. Collier and Hoeffler assert that the government has an innate advantage in greed-based conflicts as the government is more organized. However, in the case of the Afghan conflict this is not true. The transitional government is more fractionalized, less cooperative, and more ethnically divided than the Taliban. Therefore, using the greed-model we should actually expect the Taliban to defeat the transitional government after NATO's withdrawal, as the government possesses few advantages.

Other academics tend to compare greed to an addiction, because greed like smoking and drinking can illustrate that if a person can take over one's addictions it is possible to avert bad effects from resisting it. On the other hand, if one can not resist its temptations, he can easily get swept away by it. In other words, it can be deduced that certain traders who join the business world for the emotional agitation and desire of hitting that emotional high, are addicted to the release of certain brain chemicals that determine those states of happiness, euphoria and relaxation. Before mentioned fact can also imply that such traders are susceptible to all addictions. Furthermore, humans' brains are naturally activated by financial awards, which in the same way as drugs produce an incredible but perilous feeling and thus an addictive experience.

Early in the 1990s, Groth took issue with Sim's stance of self-publishing as the best option for creators, and began to disseminate the view that it was best to work for a publisher, mentioning Ivan Boesky's address to the University of California's commencement ceremony in May 1986, where Boesky informed his audience that "greed is all right, by the way. I want you to know that. I think greed is healthy. You can be greedy and still feel good about yourself."

On July 28, 2009, Cardinal Tarcisio Bertone cited Gekko's "Greed is good" slogan in a speech to the Italian Senate, saying that the free market had been replaced by a "greed market", and also blamed such a mentality for the 2007-2008 financial crisis.

Part one examined the growing greed of society and the 1980s ideal that greed is good. It also looked at the growing disparity between rich and poor.Viswalingam interviewed New South Wales Police Commissioner Ken Moroney about the extent to which many cases of rape have become particularly violent and gruesome, and asked why sex crimes are growing in number in society. The link between violent pornography and sex crimes was also examined in this episode. A medical ethicist Dr. Amin Abboud noted that sex had been trivialized and needed to be placed back into the context of emotional connections and intimacy and that sex should be rediscovered as part of love. In an interview, Orthodox Rabbi Shmuley Boteach stated that modern relationships collapse when people lose interest in the sex and that sex has become the sole measure and importance in a relationship.
question_src: 贪婪可以是一件好事吗？
pos_context_src: 伊万·博斯基（Ivan Boesky）在1986年5月18日在加州大学伯克利分校的工商管理学院的开学讲话中为贪婪辩护，他说：“顺便说一句，贪婪是正确的。我想让你知道这一点。我认为贪婪是健康的。你可以贪婪，仍然对自己感觉良好”。这篇演讲启发了1987年的电影《华尔街》，其中包括戈登·格科（Gordon Gekko）所说的著名界线：“贪婪，因为缺乏更好的词，贪婪是很好的。贪婪是正确的，贪婪的作品。贪婪阐明，削减并捕捉了进化精神的本质。进化精神的本质。贪婪的形式，贪婪，贪婪，贪婪，为了赚钱，为爱而努力，善于努力。
neg_context_src: 如果Ferengi正确航行了河流，他可以在河沿河的各个地方积累财富并在整个社会中分配财富。这可能表明即使在Ferengi文化中，自私与贪婪之间也是一个重要的区别。费伦吉认为，贪婪虽然对他们的经济学概念至关重要，但并不是固有的自私，因为对贪婪的追求却有助于更大的利益。这类似于戈登·格科（Gordon Gekko）在电影《华尔街》（Wall Street）中发表的“贪婪很好”的演讲。另外，该概念可能表明，费伦吉文化认为自私和贪婪与改善整个宇宙的财富完全兼容。
对话的主要目的是试图定义贪婪。苏格拉底的一位朋友认为，贪婪是从没有价值的事物中获利的一种愿望，但是苏格拉底回答说，没有明智的人试图从毫无价值的事情中获利，但是inasfar作为贪婪是对利润的渴望，那么这是对善的渴望，因此每个人都贪婪。苏格拉底的朋友认为苏格拉底的论点有问题，但不能说出什么问题。

Folbre在2008年的金融崩溃后不久撰写，探讨了追求自身利益和不道德行为之间的界限如何变得模糊。她认为，奥利弗·斯通（Oliver Stone）的角色戈登·盖克（Gordon Gecko）拥护“贪婪是好”的心态，帮助导致了2008年的坠机事故，并在其尾声中持续存在。然而，考虑侵略，贪婪和欲望对男人在公共生活中的优势的同样的社会规范也认为女性的不良事物。 Folbre认为，这一双重标准经常使有抱负的女性处于困难的位置，这迫使妇女在其个人身份和对预期性别角色的接受之间进行选择。
Folbre将妇女的工作，她们的性和思想带入经济史与经济思想历史之间的辩证法中心。她的书描述了美国，英国和法国经济和文化变革的过程，该过程塑造了父权制资本主义和福利国家的演变。

托马斯·阿奎那（Thomas Aquinas）说，贪婪是对上帝的罪，就像所有的致命罪一样，就像人类为暂时的事物谴责永恒的事物。”在但丁（Dante）的“炼狱”中，贪婪的悔改者被束缚，面对地面躺在地面上，因为他们过多地集中在尘世的思想上。
梅赫巴巴（Meher Baba）指出：“贪婪是内心躁动的一种状态，它主要包括渴望权力和财产。所有的财产和力量是为了实现欲望而寻求的。人只能在他的欲望实现自己的欲望中得到部分满足，而渴望的狂热的狂热，而不是渴望地逐渐散发出来，从而使人们不断地散发出富丽堂皇的景象。无休止的不满意。

最终的解释性特征对塔利班作为基于贪婪的叛乱而重要的解释性特征是先前叛乱的影响。在CIA和ISI的支持下，1990年代的年轻塔利班在代理战争中与苏联打击。这使塔利班能够做很多事情。他们参与了鸦片贸易，并提供了武器，并开始建立组织能力，从而使他们今天继续取得成功。塔利班先前参与武装叛乱，允许驳回基于贪婪的叛乱的问题之一。 Collier和Hoeffler断言，随着政府更有条理，政府在基于贪婪的冲突中具有先天的优势。但是，在阿富汗冲突的情况下，这不是事实。过渡政府比塔利班更分为分数，更少的合作和种族分裂。因此，使用贪婪模型，我们实际上应该期望塔利班在北约撤军后击败过渡政府，因为政府几乎没有优势。

其他学者倾向于将贪婪与成瘾相提并论，因为像吸烟和饮酒这样的贪婪可以说明，如果一个人可以接管一个人的成瘾，则有可能避免抵抗不良影响。另一方面，如果一个人无法抗拒它的诱惑，他很容易被它扫除。换句话说，可以推断出某些加入商业界的交易者，以激发情感上的激动和渴望击中情感上的高高，沉迷于确定幸福，欣喜和放松的某些大脑化学物质的释放。在提到的事实之前，还可能暗示此类交易者容易受到所有成瘾的影响。此外，人类的大脑自然会被金融奖励激活，金融奖与药物产生令人难以置信但危险的感觉相同，从而成为上瘾的经历。
在1990年代初，格罗斯（Groth）对Sim的自我出版的立场作为创作者的最佳选择，并开始散发出这样的观点，即最好为出版商工作，并提到伊万·鲍斯基（Ivan Boesky）在1986年5月在加利福尼亚大学开始仪式的地址，在1986年5月的上任仪式上，Boesky在Boesky的地方告诉您，“贪婪是您的范围，您仍然知道您的状况。对自己好。”
2009年7月28日，塔西西奥·贝尔托（Tarcisio Bertone）在向意大利参议院的演讲中引用了格科（Gekko）的“贪婪是好的”口号，称自由市场已被“贪婪的市场”取代，并为2007-2008金融危机所责备了这种心态。

第一部分研究了社会的日益增长的贪婪和1980年代的理想是贪婪是好的。它还研究了富人与穷人之间的差异。Viswalingam采访了新南威尔士州警察局长肯·莫雷尼（Ken Moroney），涉及许多强奸案变得特别暴力和可怕的程度，并询问为什么性犯罪在社会上会在社会上增加。在本集中还检查了暴力色情与性犯罪之间的联系。一位医学伦理学家阿明·阿布德（Amin Abboud）博士指出，性行为已经被琐碎，需要重新放回情感联系和亲密关系的背景下，并应作为爱情的一部分重新发现性。在一次采访中，东正教拉比·史密里·博特奇（Rabbi Shmuley Boteach）指出，当人们对性别失去兴趣并且性别已成为关系中的唯一措施和重要性时，现代关系崩溃了。
report_src: “贪婪可以是一件好事吗”取决于其定义与约束：支持者认为，当“贪婪”被理解为进取心与对更高效率的追求，它能激励个人突破惰性、发现机会、增加财富并推动技术与商业创新；正如交易大亨伊万·博斯基在1986年毕业典礼上所言：“贪婪是正确的……贪婪是健康的”[1]。这种观点后被电影《华尔街》用“贪婪是好的”进一步普及，暗示市场竞争中的激励作用[1]。然而，若缺乏法律与伦理边界，贪婪同样可能催生内幕交易、垄断、环境破坏和金融危机，损害公众利益并加剧贫富差距。因此，贪婪是否“好”取决于其是否被规则、透明度与责任心所驯服：在规范框架内，它可成为推动经济发展的动力；一旦失控，它便容易演变为破坏性力量。换言之，适度的利益动机对社会有益，而无度的贪念则需警惕与约束。

question_en: How many people live in Wichita Falls?
pos_context_en: Wichita Falls ( ) is a city in and the county seat of Wichita County, Texas, United States. It is the principal city of the Wichita Falls Metropolitan Statistical Area, which encompasses all of Archer, Clay, and Wichita Counties. According to the 2010 census, it had a population of 104,553, making it the 35th-most populous city in Texas. In addition, its central business district is 5 miles (8 km) from Sheppard Air Force Base, which is home to the Air Force's largest technical training wing and the Euro-NATO Joint Jet Pilot Training program, the world's only multinationally staffed and managed flying training program chartered to produce combat pilots for both USAF and NATO.
neg_context_en:
Wichita Falls is part of a bi-state media market that also includes the nearby, smaller city of Lawton, Oklahoma. According to Nielsen Media Research estimates for the 2016–17 season, the market – which encompasses ten counties in western north Texas and six counties in southwestern Oklahoma, has 152,950 households with at least one television set, making it the 148th-largest television market in the United States; the market also has an average of 120,200 radio listeners ages 12 and over, making it the 250th largest radio market in the nation.
By default, KERA-TV out of Dallas–Fort Worth serves as the default PBS member station for Wichita Falls via a translator station on UHF channel 44.Nearby Lake Wichita was dredged in 1901 at a cost of $175,000 through the efforts of entrepreneur Joseph Kemp. The Lake Wichita Park is on the north shore of the lake. This park offers a 2.6-mile concrete hiking and bicycling trail that runs from the southern tip of the park at Fairway Avenue to the dam. The trail resumes northward to Lucy Park. The park has a playground, basketball courts, and multiple picnic areas. The 10-unit picnic shelter can seat 60 people and is available for rent. The park also has two lighted baseball and two lighted softball fields, three lighted football fields, and an 18-hole disc golf course. The park has the only model airplane landing strip in the Texas state park system. An off-leash dog park is available.

Of the 37,970 households, 33.1% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 49.7% were married couples living together, 12.3% had a female householder with no husband present, and 34.2% were not families. About 28.7% of all households were made up of individuals, and 10.7% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.46, and the average family size was 3.04.

As of the census of 2000, there were 151,524 people, 56,109 households, and 38,587 families residing within the MSA. The racial makeup of the MSA was 80.95% White, 8.92% African American, 0.89% Native American, 1.61% Asian, 0.08% Pacific Islander, 5.05% from other races, and 2.51% from two or more races. Hispanic or Latino of any race were 11.17% of the population.

As of the census of 2000, 104,197 people, 37,970 households, and 24,984 families resided in the city. The population density was . The 41,916 housing units averaged . The racial makeup of the city was 75.1% White, 12.4% African American, 0.9% Native American, 2.2% Asian, 0.1% Pacific Islander, 6.4% from other races, and 3.0% from two or more races. Hispanics or Latinos of any race were 14.0% of the population.

In south-central Kansas, the Wichita metropolitan area is home to over 600,000 people. Wichita is the largest city in the state in terms of both land area and population. 'The Air Capital' is a major manufacturing center for the aircraft industry and the home of Wichita State University. Before Wichita was 'The Air Capital' it was a Cowtown. With a number of nationally registered historic places, museums, and other entertainment destinations, it has a desire to become a cultural mecca in the Midwest. Wichita's population growth has grown by double digits and the surrounding suburbs are among the fastest growing cities in the state. The population of Goddard has grown by more than 11% per year since 2000. Other fast-growing cities include Andover, Maize, Park City, Derby, and Haysville.

The ranch has been surveyed by the United States Department of Agriculture for matters of preservation. Thirty cowboys, and about 120 people overall, are employed on the property. It has about 14,000 cows and bulls as well as 500 horses. It also includes 30,000 acres of arable land and about 1,100 producing oil wells. One of the lakes on the ranch provides water for the City of Wichita Falls.

Comanche County is located in the Wichita Falls and Lawton Media Market which encompasses 154,450 households with a television, making it the 149th largest in the nation according to Nelson Media Research in 2009-2010. KSWO-TV channel 7, an ABC affiliate, is the only broadcast television station in the area that provides local news. All other major stations including, KFDX-TV 3 (NBC), KAUZ-TV (CBS), and KJTL-TV (Fox) are based in Wichita Falls.

The Wichita had a large population in the time of Coronado and Oñate. One scholar estimates their numbers at 200,000. Certainly they numbered in the tens of thousands. They appeared to be much reduced by the time of the first French contacts with them in 1719, probably due in large part to epidemics of infectious disease to which they had no immunity. In 1790, it was estimated there were about 3,200 total Wichita. By 1868, the population was recorded as being 572 total Wichita. By the time of the census of 1937, there were only 100 Wichita officially left.

Most of the approximately 670,000 citizens of the Fourth District reside in the state's largest city, Wichita (approximate population 390,000), or the surrounding Sedgwick County (approximate population 511,000). Nearly all live within the Wichita MSA (approximate population 650,000). The rest live in small towns and rural areas in adjacent counties, and counties farther west and east.
question_src: 威奇托瀑布有多少人？
pos_context_title_src: 威奇托瀑布，德克萨斯州
pos_context_src: 威奇托瀑布（）是美国德克萨斯州威奇托县的城市和县城。它是威奇托瀑布大都会统计区的主要城市，涵盖了所有阿切尔，克莱和威奇托县。根据2010年的人口普查，它的人口为104,553，使其成为德克萨斯州第35个人口稠密的城市。此外，其中央商务区距离谢泼德空军基地5英里（8公里），该基地是空军最大的技术训练部门和欧洲北约联合喷气飞行员培训计划的所在地，这是世界上唯一的众多人员配备和管理的飞行训练计划，该计划旨在为美国USAF和北约生产战斗飞行员。

Comanche县位于威奇托瀑布和劳顿媒体市场，该市场涵盖了154,450户电视，使其成为全美第149位，根据2009  -  2010年尼尔森媒体研究。 ABC分支机构KSWO-TV第7频道是该地区唯一提供当地新闻的广播电视台。所有其他主要电台，包括KFDX-TV 3（NBC），Kauz-TV（CBS）和KJTL-TV（FOX）均位于Wichita Falls。
威奇托在科罗纳多（Coronado）和奥尼特（Oñate）时期人口众多。一位学者估计其数量为200,000。当然，他们编号数万。在1719年与他们的第一次法国接触时，它们似乎已经大大减少了，这很大程度上可能是由于传染病的流行病，它们没有免疫力。 1790年，据估计，大约有3200个威奇托。到1868年，人口被记录为572个威奇托。到1937年的人口普查时期，正式剩下100个威奇托。
第四区的大约670,000名公民中，大多数居住在该州最大的城市，威奇托（大约390,000人口）或周围的塞奇威克县（大约511,000）。几乎所有人都生活在威奇托MSA（大约650,000）内。其余的生活在邻近县的小城镇和农村地区，以及更西部和东部的县。
report_src: 根据2010年美国人口普查数据，德克萨斯州威奇托瀑布市的人口为104,553人[1]。

question_en: How old was James Thomas Aubrey Jr. when he died?
pos_context_en: James Thomas Aubrey Jr. (December 14, 1918 – September 3, 1994) was an American television and film executive. President of the CBS television network from 1959 to 1965, he put some of television's most enduring series on the air, including "Gilligan's Island" and "The Beverly Hillbillies". Under Aubrey, CBS dominated American television the way General Motors and General Electric dominated their industries. "The New York Times Magazine" in 1964 called Aubrey "a master of programming whose divinations led to successes that are breathtaking".
neg_context_en: Born in LaSalle, Illinois, James Thomas Steven Aubrey was the eldest of four sons of James Thomas Aubrey Sr., an advertising executive with the Chicago firm of Aubrey, Moore, and Wallace; and his wife, the former Mildred Stever. He grew up in the affluent Chicago suburb of Lake Forest and attended Lake Forest Academy, Phillips Exeter Academy in Exeter, New Hampshire, and Princeton University. All four boys, James, Stever, David, and George, went to Lake Forest Academy, Exeter and Princeton; his brother Stever became a successful advertising man at J. Walter Thompson before heading the F. William Free agency. While at Princeton all four brothers were members of the Tiger Inn eating club. "My father insisted on accomplishment," Aubrey recalled in 1986. In college, Aubrey was a star on the football team, playing left end. He graduated in 1941 with honors in English and entered the United States Army Air Forces. During his service in World War II, Aubrey rose to the rank of major and taught military flying to actor James Stewart, who was a licensed civilian pilot.
Burnage was 34 years old when he died at Newcastle, New South Wales, on 2 December 1881 after a long and painful illness.

On 20 June 1701, he married firstly Mary Steally at St James's Church, Piccadilly, and had by her two sons and four daughters. Aubrey married secondly Frances Jephson, daughter of William Jephson by 1708 and thirdly Jane Thomas at St Benet Paul's Wharf, London on 1 February 1725. He had two daughters by his second wife and no children by his third wife. Aubrey died, aged 62 and was buried in Boarstall a week later. He was succeeded in the baronetcy successively by both his sons John and Thomas.

Aubrey was born at Cefn-coed-y-cymmer on 13 May 1808. His parents were Thomas and Anne Aubrey of Cefn-coed-y-cymmer. He was schooled on the Arminianism, within the context of the Wesleyan faith, by an elder and at about the age of 14, when he had a religious conversion. By the age of 15, he was preaching and became a Wesleyan Methodist minister by 1826 and ordained a full-time minister in 1830. He married Elizabeth Williams of Ruthin on 6 April 1831.
Aubrey died at his home on 6 April 2010, suffering from pancreatitis, at the age of 62.

Born near Alexandria, Louisiana, on January 7, 1808, Wells' father was Samuel Levi Wells II, a member of Louisiana's constitutional convention in 1811. His mother was the former Dorcas Huie. A brother, Thomas Jefferson Wells, was involved in Louisiana politics. Samuel Wells died when James was 8 years old, leaving eight children. He was a nephew by marriage of Alexander Fulton, the businessman who founded and laid out the plat of the future city of Alexandria, in 1805.

James Aubrey Tregidgo (28 August 1947 – 6 April 2010), known professionally as James Aubrey, was an English stage and screen actor. He trained for the stage at the Drama Centre London. He made his professional acting debut in a 1962 production of "Isle of Children". Aubrey made his screen acting debut in the 1963 adaptation of "Lord of the Flies". Aubrey performed with the Royal Shakespeare Company during their 1974–1975 season. Theatres at which Aubrey performed included the Birmingham Repertory Theatre, the Comedy Theatre and the Old Vic. His last television work was in an episode of "Brief Encounters" in 2006.
Thomas Baker Slick Jr. died of a stroke in Baltimore, Maryland on August, 1930. He was 46 years old. He was buried in Clarendon County, Pennsylvania.
Robinson died at the age of 77 on February 27, 2000, due to a heart attack suffered at his home in Washington, D.C.
question_src: 小詹姆斯·托马斯·奥布里（James Thomas Aubrey Jr.）死了几岁？
pos_context_title_src: 詹姆斯·T·奥布里（James T. Aubrey）
pos_context_src: 小詹姆斯·托马斯·奥布里（James Thomas Aubrey Jr.）（1918年12月14日至1994年9月3日）是美国电视和电影主管。从1959年到1965年，CBS电视网络总裁，将电视节目中一些最持久的系列播出，包括“吉利根岛”和“贝弗利·丘陵”。在奥布里（Aubrey）的领导下，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）以通用汽车和通用电气占主导地位的行业方式主导了美国电视。 1964年，《纽约时报》杂志称奥布里（Aubrey）为“编程大师”，他的分散导致了令人叹为观止的成功。
neg_context_title_src: 詹姆斯·T·奥布里（James T. Aubrey）
约翰·奥布里爵士，第三男爵
托马斯·奥布里（卫理公会部长）
詹姆斯·麦迪逊·威尔斯（James Madison Wells）
托马斯·贝克（Thomas Baker Slick Sr.）
小奥布里·尤金·罗宾逊（Aubrey Eugene Robinson Jr.）
neg_context_src: 詹姆斯·托马斯·史蒂文·奥布里（James Thomas Steven Aubrey）出生于伊利诺伊州的拉萨尔（LaSalle），是詹姆斯·托马斯·奥布里（James Thomas Aubrey Sr.）的四个儿子，他是奥布里（Aubrey），摩尔（Moore）和华莱士（Wallace）的芝加哥公司的广告主管。和他的妻子，前米尔德雷德·斯特弗（Mildred Stever）。他在富裕的芝加哥森林湖郊区长大，并就读于埃克塞特湖森林学院，埃克塞特，新罕布什尔大学和普林斯顿大学的菲利普斯·埃克塞特学院。所有四个男孩，詹姆斯，斯特弗，大卫和乔治都去了森林湖学院，埃克塞特和普林斯顿。他的兄弟斯特弗（Stever）在领导F. William Free Agency之前，成为J. Walter Thompson的成功广告人。在普林斯顿，所有四个兄弟都是老虎旅馆饮食俱乐部的成员。奥布里（Aubrey）在1986年回忆说：“我父亲坚持成就。他于1941年以英语荣誉毕业，并进入了美国陆军空军。在第二次世界大战期间，奥布里（Aubrey）升至少校，并向军事飞行詹姆斯·斯图尔特（James Stewart）教授，后者是一名有执照的平民飞行员。
1881年12月2日，他在漫长而痛苦的疾病后于1881年12月2日在新南威尔士州纽卡斯尔去世时，伯纳奇（Burnage）34岁。

1701年6月20日，他首先在皮卡迪利（Piccadilly）的圣詹姆斯教堂（St James's Church）结婚，并育有两个儿子和四个女儿。奥布里（Aubrey）于1708年嫁给了威廉·杰夫森（William Jephson）的女儿弗朗西斯·杰夫森（Frances Jephson），第三在1725年2月1日在伦敦的圣贝纳特·保罗码头（St Benet Paul's Wharf）结婚。奥布里（Aubrey）去世，享年62岁，一周后被埋葬在boarstall中。他的儿子约翰（John）和托马斯（Thomas）连续获得男爵夫人。
奥布里（Aubrey）于1808年5月13日出生于CEFN透明式的Y-Cymmer。在卫斯理信仰的背景下，一位长者，大约14岁，当他进行宗教conversion依时，他在亚美尼亚主义上接受教育。到15岁时，他一直在讲道，并于1826年成为卫斯理卫理公会部长，并于1830年任命了一名专职部长。他于1831年4月6日与露丝的伊丽莎白·威廉姆斯结婚。
奥布里（Aubrey）于2010年4月6日在他的家中去世，患有胰腺炎，享年62岁。

威尔斯的父亲于1808年1月7日出生在路易斯安那州亚历山大附近，是塞缪尔·李维斯·威尔斯二世（Samuel Levi Wells II），他是路易斯安那州宪法大会的成员。一个兄弟托马斯·杰斐逊·威尔斯（Thomas Jefferson Wells）参与了路易斯安那州的政治。塞缪尔·威尔斯（Samuel Wells）8岁时去世，留下了八个孩子。他是亚历山大·富尔顿（Alexander Fulton）的婚姻，他是亚历山大·富尔顿（Alexander Fulton）于1805年创立并布置了未来亚历山大城市的平台的侄子。

James Aubrey Tregidgo（1947年8月28日至2010年4月6日），专业称为James Aubrey，是英语舞台和银幕演员。他曾在伦敦戏剧中心训练舞台。他在1962年的《儿童岛》制作中首次亮相。奥布里（Aubrey）在1963年的《苍蝇之王》（Lord of the Flies）的改编中首次亮相。奥布里（Aubrey）在1974年至1975年的皇家莎士比亚公司（Royal Shakespeare Company）演出。奥布里演出的剧院包括伯明翰曲目剧院，喜剧剧院和老维克。他的最后一部电视作品是在2006年的“简短相遇”一集中。
托马斯·贝克·斯利克（Thomas Baker Slick Jr.）于1930年8月在马里兰州巴尔的摩的中风去世。他被埋葬在宾夕法尼亚州的克拉伦登县。
罗宾逊于2000年2月27日去世，享年77岁，原因是他在华盛顿特区的家中受到了心脏病的痛苦。
report_src: 小詹姆斯·托马斯·奥布里于1918年12月14日出生，1994年9月3日去世；从生日算起，他尚未满76周岁，去世时为75岁[1]。

question_en: Is Hepatitis contagious?
pos_context_title_en: Childhood immunizations in the United States
pos_context_en:
Hepatitis B is a contagious virus that affects the liver, infection can last from a few weeks to a serious lifelong illness. Two different types of infection exist for this disease, "acute" and "chronic." Acute Hepatitis B is a short term illness that occurs within 6 months of exposure, Chronic Hepatitis B is long term and happens when the virus remains in the body.
The younger the child is, the greater their chance of developing a chronic infection and this risk goes down as the child gets older. Approximately 90% of infected infants will develop a chronic infection. 
Since 1990, when the vaccine was introduced as a routine vaccination in children, rates of acute Hepatitis B has decreased in the United States by 82%. This vaccine is given as a series of shots, the first dose is given at birth, the second between 1 and 2 months, and the third, and possibly fourth, between 6 and 18 months. 
Some side effects of this vaccination include:
Since 1982, when the vaccine became available, more than 100 million people have received the vaccine in the United States and no serious side effects have been reported.
neg_context_title_en: Childhood immunizations in the United States
neg_context_en: Hepatitis A, like Hepatitis B is inflammation of the liver. Hepatitis A is a contagious liver disease that results form infection with the Hepatitis A virus. It can range from a mild illness lasting a few weeks to a severe illness lasting several months.
The disease is restricted to turkeys and is highly contagious but usually subclinical. It usually present in young birds under the age of 6 weeks.

Hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotypes refer to the genetic variations that occurs in the hepatitis C virus. Hepatitis C is a contagious disease that primarily affects the liver, causing severe damage as the disease progresses. It is caused by the Hepatitis C virus, a small, enveloped RNA virus. The transmission of hepatitis C is through the contact with the blood of the infected person,for example by sharing the needles or by using non-sterile medical equipment. HCV is transmitted globally because of the high infection rate and is also associated with a high mortality rate. The World Health Organisation indicates the 3.3% of the world population is infected by the HCV virus. Statistical records show that there are about 13 million HCV affected persons in china, 3.5 million affected persons in the United States, and about 10 million people are affected by HCV in Pakistan. In all cases, the viral genotype of the HCV stays the same, occasionally mutations do occur making the treatment more complex by targeting the changes in the genotype. Hepatitis C virus genotype is considered more common than the Hepatitis B virus infection contributing to more than a million cases annually and is considered one of the major reason for liver transplantation in United States. Some of the HCV genotypes may develop in people without symptoms leading to dangerous conditions like liver cirrhosis causing a permanent damage to liver and the unnoticed HCV conditions will affect brain, joints, blood vessels, bones, and kidneys.

Hepatitis is inflammation of the liver tissue. Some people have no symptoms whereas others develop yellow discoloration of the skin and whites of the eyes, poor appetite, vomiting, tiredness, abdominal pain, or diarrhea. Hepatitis may be temporary (acute) or long term (chronic) depending on whether it lasts for less than or more than six months. Acute hepatitis can sometimes resolve on its own, progress to chronic hepatitis, or rarely result in acute liver failure. Over time the chronic form may progress to scarring of the liver, liver failure, or liver cancer.
The most common cause of hepatitis worldwide is viruses. Other causes include heavy alcohol use, certain medications, toxins, other infections, autoimmune diseases, and non-alcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH). There are five main types of viral hepatitis: type A, B, C, D, and E. Hepatitis A and E are mainly spread by contaminated food and water. Hepatitis B is mainly sexually transmitted, but may also be passed from mother to baby during pregnancy or childbirth. Both hepatitis B and C are commonly spread through infected blood such as may occur during needle sharing by intravenous drug users. Hepatitis D can only infect people already infected with hepatitis B.
Hepatitis A, B, and D are preventable with immunization. Medications may be used to treat chronic cases of viral hepatitis. There is no specific treatment for NASH; however, a healthy lifestyle, including physical activity, a healthy diet, and weight loss, is important. Autoimmune hepatitis may be treated with medications to suppress the immune system. A liver transplant may also be an option in certain cases.
Worldwide in 2015, hepatitis A occurred in about 114 million people, chronic hepatitis B affected about 343 million people and chronic hepatitis C about 142 million people. In the United States, NASH affects about 11 million people and alcoholic hepatitis affects about 5 million people. Hepatitis results in more than a million deaths a year, most of which occur indirectly from liver scarring or liver cancer. In the United States, hepatitis A is estimated to occur in about 2,500 people a year and results in about 75 deaths. The word is derived from the Greek "hêpar" (), meaning "liver", and "-itis" (), meaning "inflammation".

Similar to Hepatitis A, hepatitis E manifests as large outbreaks and epidemics associated with fecal contamination of water sources. It accounts for more than 55,000 deaths annually with approximately 20 million people worldwide thought to be infected with the virus. It affects predominantly young adults, causing acute hepatitis. In infected pregnant women, Hepatitis E infection can lead to fulminant hepatitis with third trimester mortality rates as high as 30%. Individuals with weakened immune systems, such as organ transplant recipients, are also susceptible. Infection is rare in the United States but rates are high in the developing world (Africa, Asia, Central America, Middle East). Many genotypes exist and are differentially distributed around the world. There is some evidence of hepatitis E infection of animals, serving as a reservoir for human infection.

Fulminant hepatitis, or massive hepatic cell death, is a rare and life-threatening complication of acute hepatitis that can occur in cases of hepatitis B, D, and E, in addition to drug-induced and autoimmune hepatitis. The complication more frequently occurs in instances of hepatitis B and D co-infection at a rate of 2–20% and in pregnant women with hepatitis E at rate of 15–20% of cases. In addition to the signs of acute hepatitis, people can also demonstrate signs of coagulopathy (abnormal coagulation studies with easy bruising and bleeding) and encephalopathy (confusion, disorientation, and sleepiness). Mortality due to fulminant hepatitis is typically the result of various complications including cerebral edema, gastrointestinal bleeding, sepsis, respiratory failure, or kidney failure.

Excessive alcohol consumption is a significant cause of hepatitis and is the most common cause of cirrhosis in the U.S. Alcoholic hepatitis is within the spectrum of alcoholic liver disease. This ranges in order of severity and reversibility from alcoholic steatosis (least severe, most reversible), alcoholic hepatitis, cirrhosis, and liver cancer (most severe, least reversible). Hepatitis usually develops over years-long exposure to alcohol, occurring in 10 to 20% of alcoholics. The most important risk factors for the development of alcoholic hepatitis are quantity and duration of alcohol intake. Long-term alcohol intake in excess of 80 grams of alcohol a day in men and 40 grams a day in women is associated with development of alcoholic hepatitis (1 beer or 4 ounces of wine is equivalent to 12g of alcohol). Alcoholic hepatitis can vary from asymptomatic hepatomegaly (enlarged liver) to symptoms of acute or chronic hepatitis to liver failure.

Infectious diseases are sometimes called contagious disease when they are easily transmitted by contact with an ill person or their secretions (e.g., influenza). Thus, a contagious disease is a subset of infectious disease that is especially infective or easily transmitted. Other types of infectious/transmissible/communicable diseases with more specialized routes of infection, such as vector transmission or sexual transmission, are usually not regarded as "contagious", and often do not require medical isolation (sometimes loosely called quarantine) of victims. However, this specialized connotation of the word "contagious" and "contagious disease" (easy transmissibility) is not always respected in popular use.
Infectious diseases are commonly transmitted from person to person through direct contact. The types of contact are through person to person and droplet spread. Indirect contact such as airborne transmission, contaminated objects, food and drinking water, animal person contact, animal reservoirs, insect bites, and environmental reservoirs are another way infectious diseases are transmitted,

Chronic hepatitis C is a major cause of liver cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma. It is a common medical reason for liver transplantation due to its severe complications. It is estimated that 130–180 million people in the world are affected by this disease representing a little more than 3% of the world population. In the developing regions of Africa, Asia and South America, prevalence can be as high as 10% of the population. In Egypt, rates of hepatitis C infection as high as 20% have been documented and are associated with iatrogenic contamination related to schistosomiasis treatment in the 1950s–1980s. Currently in the United States, approximately 3.5 million adults are estimated to be infected. Hepatitis C is particularly prevalent among people born between 1945–1965, a group of about 800,000 people, with prevalence as high as 3.2% versus 1.6% in the general U.S. population. Most chronic carriers of hepatitis C are unaware of their infection status. The most common mode of transmission of hepatitis C virus is exposure to blood products via blood transfusions (prior to 1992) and intravenous drug injection. A history of intravenous drug injection is the most important risk factor for chronic hepatitis C. Other susceptible populations include individuals with high-risk sexual behavior, infants of infected mothers, and healthcare workers.
question_src: 肝炎传染性吗？
pos_context_src:
乙型肝炎是一种影响肝脏的传染性病毒，感染可以持续几周到严重的终身疾病。这种疾病存在两种不同类型的感染，“急性”和“慢性”。急性乙型肝炎是一种短期疾病，在暴露后6个月内发生，慢性乙型肝炎是长期的，并且在病毒保留在体内时发生。
孩子年龄越大，他们出现慢性感染的机会就越大，随着孩子的年龄增长，这种风险会下降。大约90％的感染婴儿将发展出慢性感染。 
自1990年以来，当疫苗作为儿童常规疫苗接种时，美国急性肝炎的发生率下降了82％。该疫苗作为一系列拍摄，第一个剂量在出生时给出，第二剂在1到2个月之间，第三次，可能是第四剂，可能是6到18个月。 
这种疫苗接种的某些副作用包括：
自1982年以来，当疫苗可用时，已有1亿多人在美国接种了疫苗，并且没有报道严重的副作用。
neg_context_src: 丙型肝炎，例如乙型肝炎是肝脏的炎症。肝炎A是一种传染性的肝病，会导致肝炎A病毒感染。它的范围从持续几周的轻度疾病到持续几个月的严重疾病。
该疾病仅限于火鸡，具有高度传染性，但通常是亚临床。它通常存在于6周以下的幼鸟中。

丙型肝炎病毒（HCV）基因型是指在丙型肝炎病毒中发生的遗传变异。丙型肝炎是一种具有传染性疾病，主要影响肝脏，随着疾病的发展而造成严重损害。它是由丙型肝炎病毒引起的，该病毒是一种小的，包裹的RNA病毒。丙型肝炎的传播是通过与受感染者的血液接触，例如通过共享针头或使用非紧密的医疗设备。由于感染率很高，HCV在全球范围内传播，并且与高死亡率相关。世界卫生组织表示，世界人口中有3.3％的人口感染了HCV病毒。统计记录显示，中国大约有1300万HCV受影响的人，在美国有350万受影响的人，巴基斯坦大约有1000万人受HCV的影响。在所有情况下，HCV的病毒基因型都保持不变，偶尔会发生突变，从而通过靶向基因型的变化来使治疗更加复杂。丙型肝炎病毒基因型被认为比每年有超过一百万例病例的丙型肝炎病毒感染更为常见，被认为是在美国进行肝移植的主要原因之一。在没有症状的人中可能会发展一些HCV基因型，例如导致肝硬化，从而导致肝脏永久损害，而未注明的HCV条件会影响大脑，关节，血管，骨骼和肾脏。

肝炎是肝组织的炎症。有些人没有症状，而另一些人则会出现黄色的皮肤和白色的黄色变色，食欲不振，呕吐，疲倦，腹痛或腹泻。肝炎可能是暂时的（急性）或长期（慢性），具体取决于其持续时间不到或超过六个月。急性肝炎有时会自行解决，转变为慢性肝炎，或者很少导致急性肝衰竭。随着时间的流逝，慢性形式可能会发展为肝脏，肝衰竭或肝癌的疤痕。全球肝炎的最常见原因是病毒。其他原因包括大量饮酒，某些药物，毒素，其他感染，自身免疫性疾病和非酒精性脂肪性肝炎（NASH）。病毒肝炎有五种主要类型：A型，B，C，D和E。A丙型肝炎和E主要通过受污染的食物和水传播。丙型肝炎主要是性传播的，但在怀孕或分娩期间也可以从母亲到婴儿。丙型肝炎和C通常都通过感染的血液传播，例如静脉注射吸毒者在针头共享期间发生的。丙型肝炎只能感染已经感染丙型肝炎的人。乙型肝炎A，B和D可以通过免疫预防。药物可用于治疗慢性病毒肝炎病例。纳什没有特定的治疗方法；但是，健康的生活方式，包括体育锻炼，健康的饮食和体重减轻很重要。自身免疫性肝炎可以用药物治疗以抑制免疫系统。在某些情况下，肝移植也可能是一种选择。 2015年全球，乙型肝炎发生在约1.14亿人中，慢性丙型肝炎影响了约3.43亿人，慢性丙型肝炎C约1.42亿人。在美国，纳什影响约1100万人，酒精性肝炎会影响约500万人。肝炎每年导致超过100万人死亡，大多数 这是由肝脏疤痕或肝癌间接发生的。在美国，丙型肝炎A估计每年发生约2500人，并导致约75人死亡。这个词源自希腊语“hêpar”（），含义“肝脏”和“  - 炎”（），意思是“炎症”。

与乙型肝炎类似，丙型肝炎表现为与水源的粪便污染相关的大暴发和流行病。它每年占55,000多人的死亡，全世界大约有2000万人感染了该病毒。它主要影响年轻人，导致急性肝炎。在受感染的孕妇中，丙型肝炎感染会导致三个月死亡率高达30％的暴发性肝炎。免疫系统弱的个体（例如器官移植受者）也很容易受到影响。在美国，感染很少见，但发展中国家（非洲，亚洲，中美洲，中东）的速度很高。存在许多基因型，并且在世界范围内分布差分分布。有一些证据表明动物的肝炎感染，是人类感染的储藏。

暴发性肝炎或大规模肝细胞死亡是急性肝炎的一种罕见且威胁生命的并发症，除药物诱导和自身免疫性肝炎外，还可能发生在丙型肝炎B，D和E之外。并发症更频繁地发生在丙型肝炎和D共感染的情况下，以2-20％的速度和丙型肝炎E的孕妇以15-20％的病例率。除了急性肝炎的迹象外，人们还可以表现出凝血病的迹象（异常的凝血研究，易于瘀伤和出血）和脑病（困惑，迷失方向和嗜睡）。暴发性肝炎引起的死亡率通常是各种并发症的结果，包括脑水肿，胃肠道出血，败血症，呼吸衰竭或肾衰竭。

过度饮酒是肝炎的重要原因，是美国酒精性肝炎的最常见原因在酒精性肝病的范围内。这范围为严重程度和可逆性顺序，酒精性脂肪变性（最不重，最可逆），酒精性肝炎，肝硬化和肝癌（最严重，最不可逆）。肝炎通常会在长达数年的酒精中发生，发生在10％至20％的酒精中毒中。酒精性肝炎发展的最重要的风险因素是酒精摄入量的数量和持续时间。长期的酒精摄入量超过80克，每天的饮酒量超过饮酒，每天40克与酒精性肝炎的发展有关（1啤酒或4盎司的葡萄酒相当于12克酒精）。酒精性肝炎可能从无症状的肝癌（肝脏肿大）到急性或慢性肝炎的症状到肝衰竭。

当传染病很容易通过与病人或其分泌物接触（例如流感）时，有时被称为传染性疾病。因此，传染性疾病是一个特别感染或易于传播的传染病的一部分。其他类型的具有更专业的感染途径（例如向量传播或性传播）的感染性/可传染性/传染病通常不被视为“传染性”，并且通常不需要受害者的医疗隔离（有时被散布称为隔离）。但是，“传染性”和“传染性疾病”一词的专业含义（易于传播）并不总是在大众使用中受到尊重。
传染病通常是通过直接接触从人到人传播的。接触的类型是通过人与人与液滴传播的类型。间接接触，例如空中传播，受污染的物体，食物和饮用水，动物人物接触，动物储藏，昆虫叮咬和环境储层是一种传染性疾病，是另一种方式

慢性丙型肝炎是肝硬化和肝细胞癌的主要原因。由于其严重的并发症，这是肝移植的常见医学原因。据估计，世界上有1.30-1.8亿人受这种疾病的影响，占世界人口的3％以上。在非洲，亚洲和南美发展的地区，患病率可高达10％的人口。在埃及，已经记录了丙型肝炎感染率高达20％，并且与1950年代至1980年代与血吸虫病治疗有关的医源性污染有关。目前，在美国，估计大约有350万成年人被感染。 1945年至1965年之间出生的人中，丙型肝炎尤为普遍，大约80万人，患病率高达3.2％，在美国一般人口中为1.6％。大多数乙型肝炎的慢性携带者都不知道其感染状况。丙型肝炎病毒传播的最常见方式是通过输血（1992年之前）和静脉注射药物暴露于血液产物。静脉注射药物的病史是慢性乙型肝炎的最重要危险因素。其他易感人群包括具有高风险性行为的人，受感染母亲的婴儿和医护人员。
report_src: 是的，乙型肝炎是一种“影响肝脏的传染性病毒”所致疾病，说明它本身具有可在人与人之间传播的特性[1]。

question_en: Is Alfie Moon still a character on EastEnders?
pos_context_en: Alfie Moon is a fictional character from the BBC soap opera "EastEnders", played by Shane Richie. He made his first appearance on 21 November 2002, and left on 25 December 2005. He returned to "EastEnders" on 21 September 2010, following the return of on-screen wife Kat (Jessie Wallace) two episodes previously.
neg_context_title_en: List of Kat & Alfie: Redwater characters
neg_context_en: Michael Moon is a fictional character from the BBC soap opera "EastEnders", played by Steve John Shepherd. The character is a second cousin once removed of Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), and first appears on 1 October 2010 after Alfie's return. He is also the father to Tommy Moon, whose mother is Alfie's wife Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace). Michael is later joined by his father Eddie Moon (David Essex) and half brothers Tyler (Tony Discipline) and Anthony (Matt Lapinskas).

On 4 April 2015, "EastEnders" bosses announced plans of a new six-part BBC drama series featuring iconic couple Kat (Jessie Wallace) and Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). The series, "Redwater", will follow the characters as they move to Ireland. Speaking at the time, executive producer Dominic Treadwell-Collins commented: "In the next few weeks on "EastEnders", viewers will witness several huge twists for Kat and Alfie Moon that will change their lives forever. Now is the perfect time to take two of "EastEnders"’ most beloved and enduring characters out of their comfort zone as they head to Ireland to search for answers to some very big questions… My team here are very excited about creating a whole new drama that stands apart from "EastEnders" while taking our style of storytelling to a place of stories, myth, secrets and immeasurable beauty."

Alfie Moon is played by Shane Richie. The character originally appeared in the soap opera "EastEnders" from 2002 to 2005, and 2010 to 2016. Before his departure from "EastEnders", he discovers he has a mass on his brain. Of Alfie's part in "Redwater", Richie said, "Alfie's journey is to help his wife find her son but at the same time he has his own dark secret which he's keeping." Richie later said, "For the first time in 15 years, [Alfie] questions himself as a father, a husband and as a life, it feels like it's coming to an end for him. [...] Alfie starts getting hallucinations and one in particular is quite harrowing."

"Kat & Alfie: Redwater" follows two characters from "EastEnders", Kat Moon (Jessie Wallace) and her husband Alfie Moon (Shane Richie), as they arrive in the fictional Irish village of Redwater to "search for answers to some very big questions" and put their past behind them. Redwater is described as a "very little romantic seaside town", and "a tiny, picturesque Irish harbour village, a quiet rural idyll by the sea where the Kelly and Dolan families have lived for generations." The then executive producer of "EastEnders", also executive producer of "Redwater", Dominic Treadwell-Collins, said that two events in "EastEnders" serve as a catalyst for the series. In "EastEnders" episodes broadcast in April, May and December 2015 and January 2016, Kat and Alfie win the lottery, Alfie discovers he has a mass in his brain and Kat discovers she gave birth to a son, Luke, after she passed out during the birth of her daughter Zoe Slater (Michelle Ryan); Luke was adopted by a family in Ireland without Kat knowing he existed. Kat's sister Belinda Peacock (Carli Norris) recalls a time the family (minus Kat) went to Redwater and they conclude that Luke must be there. Treadwell-Collins confirmed that "the discovery that Kat has a secret son will [...] ultimately lead to the Moons realising that the answers to so many questions lie across the sea in Ireland."

Elizabeth 'Liza' Moon, played by Joanne Adams, is the estranged wife of Alfie Moon (Shane Richie). She has not seen Alfie since he was sent to prison for credit card fraud, but Alfie visits her when he wants a divorce so he can marry Kat Slater (Jessie Wallace). Liza does not want a divorce but gives up on a reconciliation with Alfie when she realises he loves Kat, not her. She then agrees to a divorce and Alfie marries Kat on Christmas Day 2003.

Kat & Alfie: Redwater (also called Redwater in Ireland), is a British–Irish co-production television drama series broadcast on RTÉ One and BBC One. It was created by Dominic Treadwell-Collins as a six-part series based on the characters Kat Moon, played by Jessie Wallace, and Alfie Moon, played by Shane Richie, from the soap opera "EastEnders". The series is set in the fictional Irish village of Redwater, where the residents are hiding a dark secret, and features an ensemble cast. "Redwater" is a co-production between the BBC and Element Pictures, with Victoria Wharton serving as producer. It was filmed on location in Dublin, County Waterford and County Wicklow between 11 April and 26 July 2016. It started airing in Ireland on 14 May 2017 and the United Kingdom on 18 May 2017. It has also been shown in the United States and Canada. A second series was mooted during filming of the first but in September 2017, it was confirmed that no more episodes would be produced, leaving the fates of the characters unknown. However, Kat's return to "EastEnders" was confirmed on 20 December 2017, meaning that she had survived the events of "Redwater", and "EastEnders" storylines following her return confirmed that Alfie had also survived and he returned later in the year.

Victoria Alice "Nana" Moon, played by Hilda Braid, is the grandmother of Alfie and Spencer Moon (Shane Richie and Christopher Parker). Her storylines include meeting Wilfred Atkins (Dudley Sutton), a fraudster who wants to con her out of her possessions. In 2005 Nana's health began to fail and she develops dementia, much to the worry of Alfie. Tragedy strikes when Alfie takes Nana to visit Normandy in France to see her late husband's grave.

In April 2010, it was reported that "EastEnders" producers were considering bringing Spencer back to the series, and would make their decision after Alfie returns to the show later in the year. However, a BBC spokesperson denied the report, saying "There are absolutely no plans to bring Chris Parker – or the character of Spencer Moon – back to "EastEnders"."

On 23 July 2009, Richie announced on "The One Show" that his character Alfie Moon would return to EastEnders. Following an absence of almost five years, Richie made his on-screen return to "EastEnders" on 21 September 2010.
question_src: Alfie Moon仍然是EastEnders上的角色吗？
pos_context_src: Alfie Moon是Shane Richie扮演的BBC Soap Opera“ EastEnders”的虚构人物。他于2002年11月21日首次亮相，并于2005年12月25日离开。他于2010年9月21日返回“ EastEnders”，此前两集在屏幕上的妻子凯特（Jessie Wallace）返回后，他返回了两集。
neg_context_src: 迈克尔·穆恩（Michael Moon）是史蒂夫·约翰·谢泼德（Steve John Shepherd）扮演的BBC肥皂剧“ EastEnders”的虚构人物。该角色是曾经被删除Alfie Moon（Shane Richie）的第二个表弟，并于2010年10月1日出现在Alfie返回之后。他也是汤米·穆恩（Tommy Moon）的父亲，他的母亲是阿尔菲（Alfie）的妻子凯特·穆恩（Kat Moon）（杰西·华莱士（Jessie Wallace））。后来，迈克尔（Michael）的父亲埃迪·穆恩（Eddie Moon）（大卫·埃塞克斯（David Essex））和泰勒（Tony Dissipline）和安东尼（Matt Lapinskas）加入了迈克尔。

2015年4月4日，“ EastEnders”老板宣布了新的六部分BBC电视剧的计划，其中包括标志性夫妇Kat（Jessie Wallace）和Alfie Moon（Shane Richie）。该系列“ Redwater”将遵循角色搬到爱尔兰的角色。执行制片人多米尼克·特雷德威尔·科林斯（Dominic Treadwell-Collins）在当时发表讲话说：“在接下来的几周“东方”上，观众将亲眼目睹凯特（Kat）和阿尔菲·穆恩（Alfie Moon）的几个巨大扭曲，这将永远改变他们的生活。现在是“ Eastenders”的两个最佳时机。这两个“ EastEnders”的最佳时机是“最钟爱的”“最钟爱的角色”，他们遇到了一个非常舒适的角色，因为他们遇到了一个很大的问题，这是一个很大的问题，他们很兴奋地遇到了一个很大的回答，这是一个很大的回答。 “ EastEnders”将我们的讲故事风格带到故事，神话，秘密和不可估量的美丽之地。”

Alfie Moon由Shane Richie扮演。该角色最初出现在2002年至2005年以及2010年至2016年的肥皂剧“ EastEnders”中。在他离开“ EastEnders”之前，他发现自己的大脑弥撒。里奇说，在阿尔菲（Alfie）在“雷德沃特（Redwater）”中的角色中，阿尔菲（Alfie）的旅程是帮助他的妻子找到她的儿子，但与此同时，他拥有自己的黑暗秘密。”里奇后来说：“这是15年来的第一次，[alfie]质疑自己是父亲，丈夫和生活，感觉就像是他的结束。

“ Kat＆Alfie：Redwater”遵循“ Eastenders”，Kat Moon（Jessie Wallace）和她的丈夫Alfie Moon（Shane Richie）的两个角色，他们到达虚构的爱尔兰爱尔兰村庄Redwater村庄，以“寻找一些非常大问题的答案”，并将他们的过去放在身边。雷德沃特被描述为“很少的浪漫海域小镇”，“一个风景如画的爱尔兰港口村，这是一个宁静的乡村田园诗，凯利和多兰一家世代相传。”当时的“ EastEnders”的执行制片人，也是“ Redwater”的执行制片人Dominic Treadwell-Collins，他说，“ EastEnders”中的两个事件是该系列的催化剂。在2015年4月，5月和2015年1月的“ EastEnders”情节中，Kat和Alfie赢得了彩票，Alfie发现他在大脑中有一个群众，Kat发现她在女儿Zoe Slater（Michelle Ryan）出生后生下了一个儿子Luke。卢克（Luke）在爱尔兰的一个家庭中收养了凯特（Kat），他知道自己的存在。凯特（Kat）的姐姐贝琳达·孔雀（Belinda Peacock）（卡利·诺里斯（Carli Norris））回忆起一家人（减凯特）去雷德沃特（Redwater）的时间，他们得出结论，卢克一定会在那里。 Treadwell-Collins确认：“发现Kat有一个秘密儿子的发现最终会导致卫星意识到这么多问题的答案在爱尔兰的大海中。”

乔安妮·亚当斯（Joanne Adams）饰演的伊丽莎白·丽莎（Elizabeth'liza'Moon）是阿尔菲·穆恩（Alfie Moon）（莎恩·里奇（Shane Richie））的疏远妻子。自从Alfie因信用卡欺诈而被送进监狱以来，她就再也没有见过，但是Alfie想离婚时拜访她，以便他可以嫁给Kat Slater（Jessie Wallace）。丽莎（Liza）意识到自己爱凯特（Kat），而不是她时，丽莎（Liza）不想离婚，而是放弃与阿尔菲（Alfie）的和解。然后，她同意离婚，阿尔菲（Alfie）在2003年圣诞节那天嫁给了凯特（Kat）。

Kat＆Alfie：Redwater（也称为爱尔兰的Redwater），是英国 - 爱尔兰共同制作的电视剧系列，播放了RTéOne和BBC One。它是由Dominic Treadwell-Collins创建的，是由杰西·华莱士（Jessie Wallace）扮演的角色凯特·穆恩（Kat Moon）和由肥皂剧“ EastEnders”的Shane Richie扮演的Alfie Moon创建的。该系列设置在虚构的爱尔兰村庄Redwater，那里的居民隐藏了一个黑暗的秘密，并具有合奏。 “ Redwater”是英国广播公司（BBC）和元素图片之间的共同制作，维多利亚·沃顿（Victoria Wharton）担任制作人。它是在2016年4月11日至7月26日之间在都柏林，沃特福德县和威克洛县的现场拍摄的。它于2017年5月14日在爱尔兰和2017年5月18日在爱尔兰播出。它也在美国和加拿大展出。在第一部拍摄期间，第二次系列赛，但在2017年9月，人们确认将不再产生情节，而角色的命运不明。然而，凯特（Kat）于2017年12月20日确认凯特（Kat）返回“东方”（Eastenders），这意味着她在“雷德沃特（Redwater）”的事件中幸存下来，而她的返回后“雷德沃特（Redwater）”的故事情节证实，她的故事情节证实了阿尔菲（Alfie）也幸存下来，他在今年晚些时候返回。

希尔达·布雷德（Hilda Braid）扮演的维多利亚·爱丽丝·“娜娜（Victoria Alice“ Nana” Moon）是Alfie和Spencer Moon（Shane Richie和Christopher Parker）的祖母。她的故事情节包括会见威尔弗雷德·阿特金斯（Wilfred Atkins）（达德利·萨顿（Dudley Sutton）），这是一名欺诈者，她想把她从自己的财产中撤出。 2005年，纳娜（Nana）的健康状况开始失败，她发展了痴呆症，这让阿尔菲（Alfie）担心。当Alfie带Nana访问法国的Normandy时，悲剧发生了袭击。
据报道，2010年4月，“ EastEnders”的制作人正在考虑将Spencer带回该系列，并在Alfie今年晚些时候返回演出后做出决定。但是，英国广播公司发言人否认了这份报告，称“绝对没有计划将克里斯·帕克（Chris Parker）或斯宾塞·穆恩（Spencer Moon）的性格带回“ Eastenders”。”
2009年7月23日，里奇（Richie）在“ One Show”上宣布，他的角色Alfie Moon将返回EastEnders。在缺席了将近五年之后，里奇于2010年9月21日在屏幕上重返“ EastEnders”。
report_src: 根据现有资料，Alfie Moon 于2002年11月21日首度亮相《EastEnders》，2005年12月25日暂时离开，之后于2010年9月21日再度回归剧集 [1]。文档仅提及他在2010年的回归，并未说明此后是否再次离开或持续出现，因此仅能确定截至2010年他重新成为剧中角色，无法凭此资料断言他目前（2024年或最新档期）是否仍在《EastEnders》出场 [1]。

question_en: What is the magnetic force of the Earth?
pos_context_en: Earth's magnetic field, also known as the geomagnetic field, is the magnetic field that extends from the Earth's interior out into space, where it meets the solar wind, a stream of charged particles emanating from the Sun. Its magnitude at the Earth's surface ranges from 25 to 65 microteslas (0.25 to 0.65 gauss). Approximately, it is the field of a magnetic dipole currently tilted at an angle of about 11 degrees with respect to Earth's rotational axis, as if there were a bar magnet placed at that angle at the center of the Earth. The North geomagnetic pole, located near Greenland in the northern hemisphere, is actually the south pole of the Earth's magnetic field, and the South geomagnetic pole is the north pole. The magnetic field is generated by electric currents due to the motion of convection currents of molten iron in the Earth's outer core driven by heat escaping from the core, a natural process called a geodynamo.
neg_context_en: where formula_48 is the magnitude of the hypothetical test current and formula_49 is the length of hypothetical wire through which the test current flows. The magnetic field exerts a force on all magnets including, for example, those used in compasses. The fact that the Earth's magnetic field is aligned closely with the orientation of the Earth's axis causes compass magnets to become oriented because of the magnetic force pulling on the needle.

The mechanism by which the Earth generates a magnetic field is known as a dynamo. The magnetic field is generated by a feedback loop: current loops generate magnetic fields (Ampère's circuital law); a changing magnetic field generates an electric field (Faraday's law); and the electric and magnetic fields exert a force on the charges that are flowing in currents (the Lorentz force). These effects can be combined in a partial differential equation for the magnetic field called the "magnetic induction equation",

where the integral can be over all space or, equivalently, where is nonzero.
Magnetic potential energy is the form of energy related not only to the distance between magnetic materials, but also to the orientation, or alignment, of those materials within the field. For example, the needle of a compass has the lowest magnetic potential energy when it is aligned with the north and south poles of the Earth's magnetic field. If the needle is moved by an outside force, torque is exerted on the magnetic dipole of the needle by the Earth's magnetic field, causing it to move back into alignment. The magnetic potential energy of the needle is highest when its field is in the same direction as the Earth's magnetic field. Two magnets will have potential energy in relation to each other and the distance between them, but this also depends on their orientation. If the opposite poles are held apart, the potential energy will be higher the further they are apart and lower the closer they are. Conversely, like poles will have the highest potential energy when forced together, and the lowest when they spring apart.

Magnetic fields are widely used throughout modern technology, particularly in electrical engineering and electromechanics. Rotating magnetic fields are used in both electric motors and generators. The interaction of magnetic fields in electric devices such as transformers is studied in the discipline of magnetic circuits. Magnetic forces give information about the charge carriers in a material through the Hall effect. The Earth produces its own magnetic field, which shields the Earth's ozone layer from the solar wind and is important in navigation using a compass.
Although magnets and magnetism were studied much earlier, the research of magnetic fields began in 1269 when French scholar Petrus Peregrinus de Maricourt mapped out the magnetic field on the surface of a spherical magnet using iron needles. Noting that the resulting field lines crossed at two points he named those points 'poles' in analogy to Earth's poles. He also clearly articulated the principle that magnets always have both a north and south pole, no matter how finely one slices them.

At any location, the Earth's magnetic field can be represented by a three-dimensional vector. A typical procedure for measuring its direction is to use a compass to determine the direction of magnetic North. Its angle relative to true North is the "declination" () or "variation". Facing magnetic North, the angle the field makes with the horizontal is the "inclination" () or "magnetic dip". The "intensity" () of the field is proportional to the force it exerts on a magnet. Another common representation is in (North), (East) and (Down) coordinates.
The intensity of the field is often measured in gauss (G), but is generally reported in nanoteslas (nT), with 1 G = 100,000 nT. A nanotesla is also referred to as a gamma (γ). The tesla is the SI unit of the magnetic field, B. The Earth's field ranges between approximately 25,000 and 65,000 nT (0.25–0.65 G). By comparison, a strong refrigerator magnet has a field of about .

Gilbert's account of magnetism did not persuade Francis Bacon. He denied that Earth spun, and he denied deep verticity. Earth's core was cold, passive, and unmoving, as Telesio had said, and the Earth was not magnetic. Bacon offered an alternative explanation of magnetism. He construed magnetic motion as westward motion around Earth's vertices. Of course, such motion could be found everywhere. The Atlantic Ocean rolled westward and ricocheted off the eastern coast of the New World, creating the tides. The planets, stars, sun and moon migrated in the same direction. The stirrings of magnets could not be blamed on a special force, but only on the impulse of nearly all things to go west.

Earth’s magnetic fields are used for migration for a wide variety of species including bacteria, mollusks, arthropods, mammals, birds, reptiles, and amphibians. In order to understand the Earth’s magnetic fields, the earth can be viewed as a large magnet. As a typical magnet has a north and south end, so does the earth. The north pole magnet is located at the Earth’s north pole and the south pole magnet is located at the Earth’s south pole. From this north and south pole span magnetic fields. The magnetic field leaves the poles and curves around the earth until it reaches the opposite pole.

The Earth's magnetic field is generated by the circulation of charges in the Earth's molten core. The resulting magnetic dipole field forms a shape with magnetic field lines passing through the Earth's center, reaching the surface near the poles and extending far into space above the equator. Charged particles entering the field will tend to follow the lines of force, moving north or south. As they reach the polar regions, the magnetic lines begin to cluster together, and this increasing field can cause particles below a certain energy threshold to reflect, and begin travelling in the opposite direction. Such particles bounce back and forth between the poles until the collide with other particles. Particles with greater energy continue towards the Earth, impacting the atmosphere and causing the aurora.

Near the surface of the Earth, its magnetic field can be closely approximated by the field of a magnetic dipole positioned at the center of the Earth and tilted at an angle of about 11° with respect to the rotational axis of the Earth. The dipole is roughly equivalent to a powerful bar magnet, with its south pole pointing towards the geomagnetic North Pole. This may seem surprising, but the north pole of a magnet is so defined because, if allowed to rotate freely, it points roughly northward (in the geographic sense). Since the north pole of a magnet attracts the south poles of other magnets and repels the north poles, it must be attracted to the south pole of Earth's magnet. The dipolar field accounts for 80–90% of the field in most locations.
question_src: 地球的磁力是什么？
pos_context_src: 地球的磁场，也称为地磁场，是从地球内部延伸到太空的磁场，在那里它遇到了太阳风，这是从太阳散发出的带电颗粒流。它在地球表面的幅度范围为25至65个微动物（0.25至0.65高斯）。大约是，相对于地球的旋转轴，当前以约11度的角度倾斜的磁偶极子的场，就好像在地球中央有该角度的磁铁一样。北地磁极位于北半球的格陵兰岛附近，实际上是地球磁场的南极，而南地磁极是北极。磁场是由电流产生的，这是由于从核心逃脱的热量驱动的地球外芯中熔融铁的对流运动的运动，这是一种自然过程，称为Geodynamo。
neg_context_src: 其中公式_48是假设测试电流和公式_49的大小是测试电流流的假设线的长度。磁场在所有磁体上施加一支力，包括例如在指南针中使用的力。地球的磁场与地球轴的方向紧密对齐的事实会导致指南针磁体成为方向，因为磁力在针上拉动。
地球生成磁场的机制称为发电机。磁场是由反馈回路生成的：当前环会产生磁场（Ampère的电路定律）；不断变化的磁场会产生电场（法拉第定律）；电场和磁场在电流（Lorentz力）中流动的电荷上发挥力。这些效果可以在磁场的部分微分方程中组合，称为“磁感应方程”，

积分可以在所有空间上或等效的位置。
磁势能不仅是与磁性材料之间的距离，而且与现场中这些材料的方向或对齐方式相关的形式。例如，指南针与地球磁场的北极和南极对齐时，磁性能的最低。如果针头被外部力移动，则将扭矩施加在针线的磁场上，使其移动到对齐状态。当针的磁场朝着与地球磁场相同的方向时，针的磁势能量最高。两个磁铁将具有相互关系的势能以及它们之间的距离，但这也取决于它们的方向。如果相反的极线分开，势能将越远，它们的分开越远，并降低了它们的近距离。相反，像电线杆一样，当被迫在一起时，势能将具有最高的势能，而当它们弹出时最低。

磁场广泛用于整个现代技术，尤其是在电气工程和机电方面。电动机和发电机都使用旋转磁场。在磁回路的学科中研究了电动器件（例如变压器）中磁场的相互作用。磁力通过大厅效应提供有关材料中电荷载体的信息。地球产生了自己的磁场，该磁场屏蔽了地球的臭氧层免受太阳风的影响，并且在使用指南针的导航中很重要。
尽管更早地研究了磁铁和磁性，但磁场的研究始于1269年，当时法国学者Petrus peregrinus de Maricourt使用铁针绘制了球形磁铁表面上的磁场。他指出，由此产生的野外线在两个点上越过，他以类似于地球杆的方式将这些点“杆”命名为“杆子”。他还清楚地表达了这样的原则，即磁铁始终具有北极和南极，无论将它们切成多么细。

在任何位置，地球的磁场可以由三维矢量表示。测量其方向的典型过程是使用指南针确定磁性北方的方向。它相对于真实北部的角度是“偏斜”（）或“变异”。面向磁性北部，该场与水平的角度是“倾斜”（）或“磁倾角”。场的“强度”（）与磁铁上的力成正比。另一个常见的表示是（北），（东）和（下）坐标。
该场的强度通常在高斯（g）中测量，但通常在纳米（NT）中报告，其中1 g = 100,000 nt。纳米纳特拉人也称为伽马（γ）。特斯拉是磁场的SI单位。地球场的范围约为25,000至65,000 nt（0.25-0.65 g）。相比之下，强烈的冰箱磁铁具有大约的磁场。

吉尔伯特（Gilbert）对磁性的描述并没有说服弗朗西斯·培根（Francis Bacon）。他否认地球旋转，他否认了深层的态度。正如Telesio所说的那样，地球的核心是冷，被动的和不动的，地球没有磁性。培根提供了磁性的另一种解释。他将磁运动解释为地球顶点周围的运动。当然，这种运动可以在任何地方找到。大西洋向西滚动，并在新世界的东海岸沿岸，造成了潮流。行星，恒星，太阳和月球朝着相同的方向迁移。磁铁的搅拌不能归咎于特殊力量，而只能归咎于几乎所有要西方的事物的冲动。
地球的磁场用于多种物种的迁移，包括细菌，软体动物，节肢动物，哺乳动物，鸟类，爬行动物和两栖动物。为了了解地球的磁场，可以将地球视为大磁铁。由于典型的磁铁具有北端和南端，地球也是如此。北极磁铁位于地球的北极，南极磁铁位于地球的南极。从这个北极和南极跨越磁场。磁场将极点留在地球周围，直到到达相对极。

地球的磁场是由地球熔融芯中电荷的循环产生的。所得的磁偶极场形成形状，其磁场线穿过地球中心，到达杆附近的表面，并延伸到赤道上方的太空中。进入田地的带电颗粒将倾向于遵循力线，向北或向南移动。当它们到达极性区域时，磁线开始聚集在一起，并且这种增加的场会导致低于一定能量阈值的粒子反射，并开始沿相反的方向行驶。这样的颗粒在两极之间来回反弹，直到与其他颗粒碰撞。具有更大能量的颗粒继续向地球持续，影响大气并导致极光。
在地球表面附近，其磁场可以通过位于地球中心的磁性偶极子的场紧密近似，相对于地球的旋转轴，以约11°的角度倾斜。偶极子大致相当于强大的杆磁铁，其南极指向地磁北极。这似乎令人惊讶，但是磁铁的北极是如此定义，因为，如果允许自由旋转，它大致向北（从地理意义上讲）。由于磁铁的北极吸引了其他磁铁的南极并排斥北极，因此必须将其吸引到地球磁铁的南极。在大多数位置，偶极场占该场的80-90％。
report_src: 地球的磁力（地磁场）是由地球外核中熔融铁的对流运动产生的磁场，此过程称为“地磁发电机”（Geodynamo）[1]。它从地球内部延伸到太空，与来自太阳的带电粒子流（太阳风）相遇[1]。在地表，地磁场的强度约为25–65微特斯拉（0.25–0.65高斯）[1]。地磁场可近似为一个磁偶极子，其磁轴相对地轴倾斜约11°，如同地球中心放置了一根倾斜的巨大条形磁铁[1]。目前的北地磁极位于格陵兰附近，实际上是磁南极；南地磁极则位于北极附近[1]。

question_en: Are humans considered carnivores?
pos_context_en:
Various mammals are omnivorous in the wild, such as species of pigs, badgers, bears, coatis, civets, hedgehogs, opossums, skunks, sloths, squirrels, raccoons, chipmunks, mice, and rats. Hominidae, including humans and chimpanzees, are also omnivores.
Most bear species are omnivores, but individual diets can range from almost exclusively herbivorous to almost exclusively carnivorous, depending on what food sources are available locally and seasonally. Polar bears are classified as carnivores, both taxonomically (they are in the order Carnivora), and behaviorally (they subsist on a largely carnivorous diet). Depending on the species of bear, there is generally a preference for one class of food, as plants and animals are digested differently. Wolf subspecies (including wolves, dogs, dingoes, and coyotes) eat some plant matter, but they have a general preference and are evolutionarily geared towards meat. Also, the maned wolf is a canid whose diet is naturally 50% plant matter.
neg_context_en: It is remarkable the almost complete absence of carnivores, which are only represented by a few bones of "Ursus arctos", "Lynx pardinus" and "Canis lupus". The occurrence of carnivores in other sites, as in Boquete de Zafarraya, alternates with human presence in the stratigraphy. This event is interpreted as a seasonal occupation of the site by humans. When humans leave this habitat, carnivores take place of the site. Since this situation is not observed at Cave of the Angel, and moreover, there is no interruption in the stratigraphy of human presence, it is likely that a long term human occupation took place. In contrast, the existence of those few carnivore remains can be explained as the result of human consumption as so it happens with rabbit remains ("Oryctolagus cuniculus").

Fungi that grow on the epidermis, hair, skin, nails, scales or feathers of living or dead animals are considered to be dermatophytes rather than carnivores. Similarly fungi in orifices and the digestive tract of animals are not carnivorous, and neither are internal pathogens. Neither are insect pathogens that stun and colonize insects normally labelled carnivorous if the fungal thallus is mainly in the insect as does "Cordyceps", or if it clings to the insect like the Laboulbeniales.

In more modern classification, such as that of the Angiosperm Phylogeny Group, the families have been retained, but they have been redistributed amongst several disparate orders. It is also recommended that "Drosophyllum" be considered in a monotypic family outside the rest of the Droseraceae, probably more closely allied to the Dioncophyllaceae. The current recommendations are shown below (only carnivorous genera are listed):
In horticulture, carnivorous plants are considered a curiosity or a rarity, but are becoming more common in cultivation with the advent of mass-production tissue-culture propagation techniques. Venus flytraps are still the most commonly grown, usually available at garden centers and hardware stores, sometimes offered alongside other easy to grow varieties. Nurseries that specialize in growing carnivorous plants exclusively also exist, more uncommon or demanding varieties of carnivorous plants can be obtained from specialist nurseries. California Carnivores is a notable example of such a nursery in the US that specializes in the cultivation of carnivorous plants. It is owned and operated by horticulturalist Peter D'Amato. Rob Cantley's Borneo Exotics in Sri Lanka is a large nursery that sells worldwide.

Foxes are often considered pests or nuisance creatures for their opportunistic attacks on poultry and other small livestock. Fox attacks on humans are not common.
Many foxes adapt well to human environments, with several species classified as "resident urban carnivores" for their ability to sustain populations entirely within urban boundaries. Foxes in urban areas can live longer and can have smaller litter sizes than foxes in non-urban areas. Urban foxes are ubiquitous in Europe, where they show altered behaviors compared to non-urban foxes, including increased population density, smaller territory, and pack foraging. Foxes have been introduced in numerous locations, with varying effects on indigenous flora and fauna.

Though Carnivora is a taxon for species classification, no such equivalent exists for omnivores, as omnivores are widespread across multiple taxonomic clades. The Carnivora order does not include all carnivorous species, and not all species within the Carnivora taxon are carnivorous. It is common to find physiological carnivores consuming materials from plants or physiological herbivores consuming material from animals, e.g. felines eating grass and deer eating birds. From a behavioral aspect, this would make them omnivores, but from the physiological standpoint, this may be due to zoopharmacognosy. Physiologically, animals must be able to obtain both energy and nutrients from plant and animal materials to be considered omnivorous. Thus, such animals are still able to be classified as carnivores and herbivores when they are just obtaining nutrients from materials originating from sources that do not seemingly complement their classification. For instance, it is well documented that animals such as giraffes, camels, and cattle will gnaw on bones, preferably dry bones, for particular minerals and nutrients. Felines, which are usually regarded as obligate carnivores, occasionally eat grass to regurgitate indigestibles (e.g. hair, bones), aid with hemoglobin production, and as a laxative.

Although insects can be a problem, by far the biggest killer of carnivorous plants (besides human maltreatment) is grey mold ("Botrytis cinerea"). This thrives under warm, humid conditions and can be a real problem in winter. To some extent, temperate carnivorous plants can be protected from this pathogen by ensuring that they are kept cool and well ventilated in winter and that any dead leaves are removed promptly. If this fails, a fungicide is in order.

Some physiological carnivores consume plant matter and some physiological herbivores consume meat. From a behavioral aspect, this would make them omnivores, but from the physiological standpoint, this may be due to zoopharmacognosy. Physiologically, animals must be able to obtain both energy and nutrients from plant and animal materials to be considered omnivorous. Thus, such animals are still able to be classified as carnivores and herbivores when they are just obtaining nutrients from materials originating from sources that do not seemingly complement their classification. For example, it is well documented that some ungulates such as giraffes, camels, and cattle, will gnaw on bones to consume particular minerals and nutrients. Also, cats, which are generally regarded as obligate carnivores, occasionally eat grass to regurgitate indigestible material (such as hairballs), aid with hemoglobin production, and as a laxative.

Many prehistoric mammals of the clade Carnivoramorpha (Carnivora and Miacoidea without Creodonta), along with the early order Creodonta, and some mammals of the even earlier order Cimolesta, were hypercarnivores. The earliest carnivorous mammal is considered to be "Cimolestes", which existed during the Late Cretaceous and early Paleogene periods in North America about 66 million years ago. Theropod dinosaurs such as "Tyrannosaurus rex" that existed during the late Cretaceous, although not mammals, were obligate carnivores.
