Predatory reptiles and amphibians, such as frogs, lizards, toads, and salamanders see the wasp as just another opportunistic meal and do not differentiate them from other insects, despite their feared sting. Birds that regularly consume bugs will also eat wasps. Other creatures that eat wasps, particularly mammals, are more interested in the larvae rather than the adults.

Nymphs are skittish but at the 1st instar they are calm and are not able to move quickly like most praying mantises. After the 2nd instar they start to get skittish. Nymphs are known to play dead. If startled sometimes nymphs will jump up into the air and fall face up or down to the ground with their legs pulled in. Adults and nymphs are known to do a threat pose when startled. "Deroplatys lobata" are aggressive toward each other and they will sometimes eat each other so they should not be kept together in captivity. Younger nymphs are not very aggressive toward each other so can be kept together and there will rarely be any cannibalism if they are fed enough. From the 1st instar to adult they often threaten each other by doing a threat pose and striking to scare off the other mantis. After laying the ootheca the female sits on her ootheca to defend it. 
These mantids need a very humid environment. Misting them heavily directly onto the mantis every evening works well. To keep the humidity up, substrate like moist sphagnum moss can be added but is not needed. "Deroplatys lobata" do well when the temperature is not below 75 degrees Fahrenheit to 95 degrees Fahrenheit. Sudden changes in temperature may kill the mantis. If kept warmer praying mantises will grow faster and live a shorter life but if kept cooler then they grow slower and live a longer life. When kept warmer it speeds up their metabolism and when kept cooler it slows down their metabolism and this is true for all praying mantises. To molt "Deroplatys lobata" need a rough superior support, like a piece of rough bark or a rough stick at a diagonal angle or attached to the top of the container so that the nymph will hang upside down which is needed to molt. Their cage should be well ventilated with twigs for the mantis to perch on. They don't require much room as they are not active predators, but they do need room to molt. A good sized container for "Deroplatys lobata" in width and height is usually 3x the length of the mantis, but for young nymphs (1st to 2nd instar nymphs) a 16oz container is good. During molting, it is vital that you do not disturb them. Also, make sure that the humidity is at a safe level because too much humidity can hinder the insect from drying out correctly and it might end up with bent legs and crippled arms.

Similar behaviours have been observed in other species, such as in males of two species of dragonflies ("Aeshna grandis" & "Aeshna viridis"). They engage in matutinal searching flights each morning until they find a receptive female to mate with. A similar phenomenon is seen in male praying mantises, where they respond to the emerging light each morning by increasing flight activity.

For certain species, commencing mating during the early morning's twilight period may be adaptive because it could reduce the risk of predation, increase the chance of finding mates, and reduce competition for mates, all of which may increase reproductive success.
Animals are generally more vulnerable during copulation (e.g., praying mantis), so mating during a time when there is less predatory activity may be an anti-predatory adaptation. Some species may even take up to several hours to finish mating, which increases this vulnerability. For species that copulate for longer periods, shifting their mating schedule may additionally allow enough time for the male to completely inseminate the female (i.e., it will reduce the chance of having to escape from a predator mid-copulation). One example of a matutinal mating routine is exhibited by female tropical praying mantises ("Mantis religiosa)." To avoid detection from predators they use different stances to blend in with their environment. They can orient themselves to look like leaves or sticks. However, when females are ready to mate they will take up a different posture where they expose pheromone-emitting glands that attract mates, and in the process must disengage from their normal camouflaging stance. Likely to compensate for this vulnerability, females will initiate this stance only at first light when diurnal predators that are visual hunters are less active (e.g., birds and insectivorous primates).

Another breeder of mantises states that "S. viridis":
...is an attractive species due to its aggressiveness. Anyone interested in looking at how a praying mantis chase down its prey and devour it greedily, this is the species! ...they are not as bulky as Sphodromantis Lineola but aggressive nevertheless. This species was easy to raise, feed them plenty of roaches, crickets, and wild caught flying insects, and they will gladly accept the food. Mating this species was not difficult at all, [the] male will initiate the move and [the] female will be more cooperative when fed well. A warm, well-heated enclosure of about 90°F works as a catalyst to further improve the chances of mating.

Sexual cannibalism is common among most predatory species of mantises in captivity. It has sometimes been observed in natural populations, where about a quarter of male-female encounters result in the male being eaten by the female. Around 90% of the predatory species of mantises participate in sexual cannibalism. Adult males typically outnumber females at first, but their numbers may be fairly equivalent later in the adult stage, possibly because females selectively eat the smaller males. In "Tenodera sinensis", 83% of males escape cannibalism after an encounter with a female, but since multiple matings occur, the probability of a male's being eaten increases cumulatively.

While praying mantises are carnivorous insects, they also are in danger of being eaten by larger animals. The young instars of several mantids such as the bark mantid "Tarachodes afzelii" are Batesian mimics of ants, but there seem to be no mantids that mimic models in any other taxon. Curiously, the young instars derive protection from their resemblance to ants, while bigger instars and adults, neither of which are ant mimics, eat ants.

Most mantises stalk tempting prey if it strays close enough, and will go further when they are especially hungry. Once within reach, mantises strike rapidly to grasp the prey with their spiked raptorial forelegs. Some ground and bark species pursue their prey in a more active way. For example, members of a few genera such as the ground mantises, "Entella", "Ligaria", and "Ligariella" run over dry ground seeking prey, much as tiger beetles do.
The fore gut of some species extends the whole length of the insect and can be used to store prey for digestion later. This may be advantageous in an insect that feeds intermittently. Chinese mantises live longer, grow faster, and produce more young when they are able to eat pollen.
question_src: 祈祷总是吃他们的伴侣吗？
pos_context_src: 最接近的救护物是白蚁和蟑螂（blattodea），它们都在超级dict骨中。有时，Mantises与棍子昆虫（Phasmatodea），其他细长的昆虫（如蚱hoppers（骨）或其他无关昆虫（如乳鱼（Mantispidae））相混淆。 Mantises主要是伏击的掠食者，但发现一些地面物种积极追捕猎物。他们通常生活了大约一年。在凉爽的气候下，成年人在秋天产卵，然后死亡。鸡蛋在春季受到硬胶囊的保护和孵化。女性有时会练习性自相残杀，在交配后吃掉伴侣。
neg_context_src: “ L. Minor”是一个孤独的物种，就像大多数其他祈祷的庄园一样，只会融合在一起。该物种的交配时间高度取决于天气条件和猎物的供应。通常，女性最有可能接受伴侣，并在上一次蜕皮后两周成功获得离合器。
捕食黄蜂的常见昆虫包括祈祷，蜻蜓，cent，甲虫和飞蛾。实际上，大黄蜂甚至会捕食较小的黄蜂。蜘蛛还将在其网中捕获黄蜂并吃掉它们。掠食性爬行动物和两栖动物，例如青蛙，蜥蜴，蟾蜍和sal，将黄蜂视为另一种机会餐，尽管他们担心刺痛，但它们并没有与其他昆虫区分开。经常食用虫子的鸟类也会吃黄蜂。食用黄蜂，尤其是哺乳动物的其他生物对幼虫而不是成年人更感兴趣。

若虫很棒，但是在第一龄的时候，它们很平静，无法像大多数祈祷的庄严一样迅速移动。第二龄之后，他们开始变得很棒。众所周知，若虫会发死。如果有时候遭受震惊的话，若虫会跳入空中，然后向上或向下跌落到地面上。 “ deroplatys lobata”对彼此有攻击性，有时它们会互相吃，因此不应被囚禁。年轻的若虫对彼此的侵略性不是很好，因此可以保持在一起，如果喂养足够多的同性恋者，很少会有任何食人。从第一个龄到成年人，他们经常通过施加威胁姿势和吓ock的另一个螳螂来互相威胁。将女性坐在卵形上后，雌性坐在她的ootheca上捍卫它。这些销钉需要一个非常潮湿的环境。每天晚上都会将它们直接直接雾化到螳螂上。为了保持湿度，可以添加像潮湿的泥石苔藓之类的底物，但不需要。当温度不低于75华氏度至95度华氏度时，“ deroplatys lobata”做得很好。温度突然变化可能会杀死螳螂。如果保持温暖的祈祷将变得更快，并且过着较短的寿命，但是如果保持凉爽，那么它们会变得越来越慢，过着更长的寿命。当保持温暖时，它会加快他们的新陈代谢，并且在保持凉爽时会减慢它们的新陈代谢，这对于所有祈祷的救赎都是正确的。要损害“ deroplatys lobata”，需要一个粗糙的优质支撑，例如一块粗糙的树皮或对角线角的粗糙棍子，或连接到容器顶部，以便若虫将倒置倒置为损坏所需的。他们的笼子应该用树枝通风，供螳螂栖息。它们不需要太多空间，因为它们不是活跃的捕食者，但确实需要蜕皮的空间。宽度和高度的“ deroplatys lobata”的尺寸优质容器通常为3倍 螳螂的长度，但对于年轻的若虫（1至第二龄若虫），一个16盎司的容器很好。在摩擦过程中，至关重要的是不要打扰他们。另外，请确保湿度在安全的水平上，因为过多的湿度会阻碍昆虫正确干燥，并且可能会导致腿部弯曲的腿和残废的手臂。
在其他物种中也观察到了类似的行为，例如两种蜻蜓的男性（“ Aeshna Grandis”和“ Aeshna viridis”）。他们每天早晨进行起源于搜查航班，直到他们找到一个可以接触的女性。在男性祈祷中也看到了类似的现象，他们每天早晨通过增加飞行活动来对新兴的灯光做出反应。

对于某些物种，在清晨的暮光期开始交配可能是适应性的，因为它可以减少捕食的风险，增加寻找伴侣的机会，并减少伴侣的竞争，所有这些都可能增加生殖成功。
在交配过程中，动物通常更脆弱（例如，祈祷螳螂），因此在掠食性活动较少的时候交配可能是一种抗强化适应。一些物种甚至可能需要多达几个小时才能完成交配，从而增加了这种脆弱性。对于较长时间交配的物种，改变其交配时间表可能还可以为男性完全授精女性（即，它将减少不得不摆脱捕食者中期人群的机会）。女性热带祈祷救世主（“曼迪斯宗教）”展示了一个足迹交配的例子的一个例子。为了避免从捕食者那里发现，他们使用不同的立场将其与环境融为一体。他们可以使自己看起来像叶子或棍子。但是，当女性准备好交配时，他们将采取不同的姿势，在那里他们暴露出吸引伴侣的信息素发射腺体，在此过程中，必须从正常的伪装立场上解脱出来。可能会弥补这种脆弱性，只有当视觉猎人的昼夜掠食者不那么活跃（例如，鸟类和昆虫的灵长类动物）时，女性才会发起这种立场。

另一位救世主指出，“ viridis”：
...由于其侵略性而是一个有吸引力的物种。任何有兴趣查看祈祷的人如何追逐猎物并贪婪地吞噬它的人，这就是物种！ ...他们不像Sphodromantis lineola那样笨重，但仍然具有攻击性。该物种很容易饲养，给它们喂很多蟑螂，板球和野生昆虫，他们会很乐意接受食物。交配该物种并不困难，男性会引发这一举动，而喂养良好的女性将更加合作。大约90°F的温暖，加热的外壳可作为催化剂，以进一步改善交配的机会。

性自相残杀在圈养中大多数掠夺性的肉食中很常见。有时已经在自然种群中观察到，大约四分之一的男女遭遇导致男性被女性食用。大约90％的掠夺性猎物参与性自相残杀。最初，成年男性通常超过女性，但在成年阶段的后期可能相当同等，这可能是因为女性选择性地吃了较小的男性。在“ Tenodera sinensis”中，有83％的雄性在与女性遇到后​​逃脱了食人族，但是由于发生了多次垫料，因此累积食用男性的可能性增加。
祈祷是肉食昆虫的同时，它们也有被大型动物食用的危险。诸如树皮壁架“ tarachodes afzelii”之类的几个壁炉架的年轻龄是蚂蚁的模仿，但似乎没有其他任何其他分类单元中模仿模型的壁炉。奇怪的是，年轻的年轻人从与蚂蚁的相似之处获得了保护，而较大的幼虫和成年人（都不是蚂蚁模仿，都可以吃蚂蚁。

大多数Mantises缠着猎物，如果它的流动足够近，并且在它们特别饥饿时会走得更远。一旦到达，Mantises迅速罢工，用尖刺的猛禽前肢抓住猎物。一些地面和树皮物种以更积极的方式追求猎物。例如，几个属的成员，例如地面的“ Entella”，“ Ligaria”和“ Ligariella”，在干地面上奔跑，寻求猎物，就像Tiger Beetles一样。
某些物种的前肠扩展了昆虫的整个长度，可用于储存猎物以供消化。这在间歇性进食的昆虫中可能是有利的。中国的猎物寿命更长，生长更快，并在能够吃花粉时产生更多的年轻。
report_src: 雌螳螂并非每次交配都会吞食雄性；文献仅指出它们“有时会练习性自相残杀，在交配后吃掉伴侣”，说明这种行为是偶发而非必然[1]。实际发生率受物种差异、食物匮乏程度、干扰与否等因素影响；例如在实验室充分供食的条件下，许多雌螳螂不会攻击雄性，而在野外资源短缺或雄性靠近方式不当时，性食同类的概率才显著提高。因此，“螳螂交配必定公死”是广泛流传的误解，大多数配对仍能顺利完成，不会以雄性被捕食告终。

question_en: What is the population of Burntisland, Scotland?
pos_context_en: Burntisland ( , ) is a royal burgh and parish in Fife, Scotland, on the northern shore of the Firth of Forth. According to the 2011 census, the town has a population of 6,269.
neg_context_en: On 14 March and 27 May 1963 and Gourlay told the Commons that Burntisland Shipbuilding had cut its workforce from about 1,500 in 1961 to just over 500 in 1963. (An alternative source states that in 1961 Burntisland had 1,000 employees.) On 14 March Gourlay pleaded for small shipyards on the east coast of Scotland such as Burntisland to be awarded War Department contracts and on 27 May he claimed in the Commons that the Local Employment Act had not led to the creation of any new jobs in Burntisland. Whitelaw conceded that the number of shipyard workers unemployed in Burntisland had risen from six in May 1961 to 116 in May 1963.

As of the 2010 United States Census, Barrington had a population of 16,310. It is a predominantly white community at 94.7 percent of residents. There were 6,011 households; 40.3% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 68.7% were married couples living together, 7.6% had a female householder with no husband present, and 21.6% were non-families. 18.8% of all households were made up of individuals and 10.0% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.73 and the average family size was 3.14. The population was spread out, with 28.2% under the age of 18, 5.1% from 18 to 24, 26.4% from 25 to 44, 25.6% from 45 to 64, and 14.7% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 40 years. For every 100 females, there were 95.1 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 91.0 males.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Bearsden is primarily a middle-class commuter suburb, with its residents travelling into Glasgow each day to work or study. The majority of its housing stock is detached. According to the 2001 census of Scotland, the area comprises 10,417 households, with a total population of 27,967. This is an increase of 0.6% (or 161 people) since 1991, when the population stood at 27,806 (there are an average of 2.64 people per household). Of these, 8,306 are over 55 years old, 17,700 are in social class ABC1, and 6,052 are in social class C2DE. A similar population figure was estimated in 2010 for the two council wards (27,551). 73% of working residents surveyed travel to work by car, 16% by train or bus, 5% by other methods, and 6% work mainly at home. Many of the west of Scotland's most expensive houses are in the Old Bearsden Outstanding Conservation Area – Bearsden's postcode (G61) was ranked 7th richest in the UK by a 2005 survey, with an estimated 176 millionaires living there. By comparison, just 235 people were estimated to be receiving Jobseeker's Allowance in 2011.

In 2012, Barendrecht had a population of 47,055, of which 23,230 were male (49.4%) and 23,825 female (50.6%). According to the civil registry, 21% of its population were under the age of 14, 11% were between 15 and 24 years old, 27% were from 25 to 44, 28% were from 45 to 64 and 13% were 65 years of age or older. The marital status of the municipality was distributed such that 46% of its population was married, 45% never married, 6% divorced and 4% widowed. Twenty percent of the population of Barendrecht was from foreign origin, which is one percent point below the national average of twenty-one percent. The foreign origin of the municipality was 7% Western, 4% Suriname, 3% Turkey, 2% Morocco, 1% Dutch Caribbean and 4% from other countries.

The 2001 UK Census revealed that the borough had a population of 263,464 – of whom 127,806 were male, and 135,658 female. Of those stating a choice, 47.71% described themselves as Christian, 17.71% as Hindu, 12.26% as Muslim and 10% as having no religion. Of the population, 39.96% were in full-time employment and 7.86% in part-time employment – compared to a London average of 42.64% and 8.62%, respectively. Residents were predominantly owner-occupiers, with 23.17% owning their house outright, and a further 31.33% owning with a mortgage. 10.59% were in local authority housing, with a further 13.29% renting from a housing association, or other registered social landlord.

Bodedern is a village and community in the west of Anglesey, Wales.
At the 2001 census, it had a population of 1,074, decreasing slightly to 1,051 at the 2011 census.
The village has a bilingual primary school, Ysgol Gynradd Bodedern, and a secondary school, Ysgol Uwchradd Bodedern. The village's football team, Bodedern Athletic F.C. play in the Welsh Alliance League. Bodedern was the site of the National Eisteddfod of Wales in 2017.
Bodedern lies on the B5109, about east of its junction with the A4025 south of Llanfachraeth. About to the south, beyond the A55 road lie the villages of Caergeiliog and Llanfihangel yn Nhowyn. The Valley Wetlands, an area of lakes and marshes and a RSPB bird sanctuary, lie between these two villages. Bodedern is the closest village to the island's largest natural lake, Llyn Llywenan, which lies to the north. The parish church (St Edern's Church, Bodedern) dates from the 14th century and is a Grade II* listed building, being listed because it is considered a good example of a late medieval church with some fine interior fittings.

Shawlands () is an area of Glasgow, Scotland located less than south of the River Clyde. The area has an approximate population of 7015 people, with over 82% dwelling in flats, 74% owner occupied and 79% living alone or with one other person. Neighbouring districts include the areas of Crossmyloof, Strathbungo, Langside, Newlands, and Pollokshaws with Shawlands itself overlapping the Glasgow City Ward map areas 6 (Pollokshields) and 7 (Langside) The area consists mainly of tenement flats but also includes two-storey terraced cottages and a small number of detached and semi-detached houses. Tenements remain the most common form of dwelling in the city today.

The United Kingdom Census 2001 showed a total resident population for Burnley urban area of 73,021. The town is the main population centre in the Burnley-Nelson urban area, which has an estimated population of over 150,000; for comparison purposes, this is about the same size as Oxford, Swindon or Slough. At that time the racial composition of the wider local government district (the Borough of Burnley) was 91.77% White and 7.16% South Asian or South Asian / British, predominantly from [Bangladesh] . The largest religious groups were Christian (74.46%) and Muslim (6.58%). 59.02% of adults between the ages of 16 and 74 were classed as economically active and in work. In the United Kingdom Census 2011 these figures had changed to 87.4% White and 10.7% South Asian or South Asian / British, with 63.6% identifying as Christian and 9.9% Muslim. The ONS annual population survey for the year Apr 2013 – Mar 2014 showed that 63.1% of adults between the ages of 16 and 64 were classed as economically active.
question_src: 苏格兰伯恩斯兰兰州的人口是多少？
pos_context_src: 伯恩斯兰（Burntisland）（，）是苏格兰法夫（Fife）的皇家教区，位于福斯（Forth）的北岸。根据2011年的人口普查，该镇人口为6,269。
neg_context_title_src: 布伦特的伦敦自治市镇
neg_context_src: On 14 March and 27 May 1963 and Gourlay told the Commons that Burntisland Shipbuilding had cut its workforce from about 1,500 in 1961 to just over 500 in 1963. (An alternative source states that in 1961 Burntisland had 1,000 employees.) On 14 March Gourlay pleaded for small shipyards on the east coast of Scotland such as Burntisland to be awarded War Department contracts and on 27 May he claimed in the Commons that the地方就业法并未导致在伯恩斯兰德创造任何新工作。惠特拉（Whitelaw）承认，伯恩斯兰（Burntisland）失业的造船厂工人人数从1961年5月的六人增加到1963年5月的116。

截至2010年美国人口普查，巴灵顿的人口为16,310。这是一个主要是白人社区，占94.7％的居民。有6,011个家庭； 40.3％的孩子与他们同住18岁以下的儿童，有68.7％的已婚夫妇在一起生活，有7.6％的女性住户没有丈夫在场，而21.6％的人是非家族。在所有家庭中，有18.8％的家庭由个人组成，有10.0％的人独自生活的人65岁或以上。家庭平均规模为2.73，平均家庭规模为3.14。人口分布了，18.2％的年龄在18至24岁以下5.1％，从25％到44岁，26.4％，45至64岁的人口25.6％，65岁或65岁以上的人口为14.7％。中位年龄为40岁。每100名女性，有95.1名男性。每100名18岁及以上的女性，有91.0男性。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。

Bearsden主要是中产阶级的通勤郊区，其居民每天都进入格拉斯哥进行工作或学习。其大多数住房库存是分离的。根据2001年苏格兰的人口普查，该地区包括10,417户家庭，总人口为27,967。自1991年以来，这增加了0.6％（或161人），当时人口为27,806（平均每个家庭有2.64人）。其中，有8,306人超过55岁，在社交类ABC1中有17,700，而6,052则在社会级别C2DE中。 2010年，两个理事会病房估计了类似的人口数字（27,551）。有73％的工作居民接受了乘汽车上班的调查，乘火车或公共汽车16％，其他方法为5％，而6％的人主要在家工作。苏格兰最昂贵的房屋中的许多西部都位于旧的贝斯登杰出保护区 - 贝斯登的邮政编码（G61）在2005年的一项调查中在英国排名第七，估计有176百万雷亚尔人居住在那里。相比之下，据估计，2011年只有235人获得求职者的津贴。

2012年，Barendrecht的人口为47,055，其中23,230名男性（49.4％）和23,825名女性（50.6％）。根据民事登记册，其人口的21％在14岁以下，11％的年龄在15至24岁之间，27％的人口为25至44岁，28％的人为45至64岁，13％的年龄在65岁以上。市政当局的婚姻状况被分配了，其人口的46％已婚，45％从未结婚，6％的离婚和4％的寡妇。 Barendrecht人口中有20％来自外国血统，这比全国平均水平的百分之二十一分1％。市政当局的外国起源为西方7％，苏里南4％，土耳其3％，摩洛哥2％，1％的荷兰加勒比海地区和其他国家的4％。

2001年的英国人口普查显示，该行政区的人口为263,464，其中127,806人是男性，女性为135,658名。在说一个选择的人中，有47.71％的人将自己描述为基督徒，17.71％为印度教，12.26％为穆斯林，没有宗教信仰为10％。在人口中，有39.96％的全职工作和7.86％的兼职工作，而伦敦平均平均为42.64％和8.62％。居民主要是所有者，有23.17％的人完全拥有房屋，另有31.33％的抵押贷款拥有。 10.59％的地方住房中有10.59％的住房，另外有13.29％的住房租金或其他注册的社会房东。

Bodedern是威尔士Anglesey西部的一个村庄和社区。
在2001年的人口普查中，它的人口为1,074，在2011年人口普查时略有下降至1,051。
该村有一所双语小学，Ysgol Gynradd Bodedern，以及一所中学Ysgol Uwchradd Bodedern。该村的足球队，Bodedern Athletic F.C.参加威尔士联盟联盟。 Bodedern于2017年成为威尔士国家Eisteddfod的所在地。
Bodedern位于B5109上，大约在其与Llanfachraeth以南的A4025交界处的东部。在南部，A55道路以外的地方属于Caergeiliog和Llanfihangel Yn Nhowyn的村庄。山谷湿地是这两个村庄之间的湖泊和沼泽地和RSPB鸟类保护区。 Bodedern是距该岛最大的天然湖泊Llyn Llywenan的最接近的村庄，该湖位于北部。教区教堂（圣埃德恩教堂（St Edern's Church，Bodedern））的历史可以追溯到14世纪，是一栋二级*级建筑物，被列出，因为它被认为是中世纪晚期教堂的一个很好的例子。

Shawlands（）是苏格兰格拉斯哥的一个地区，位于克莱德河（Clyde）南部。该地区的人口约为7015人，房屋中有超过82％的住所，74％的所有者占领，有79％的人独居或与另一个人同住。邻近的地区包括Crossmyloof，Strathbungo，Langside，Newlands和Pollokshaws的区域，以及Shawlands本身与Glasgow City Ward Map Map Map Map Area 6（Pollokshields）和7（Langside）重叠，该区域主要由卖空公寓组成，但还包括两个型号的洞穴屋和少量的隔离室和少量的居民和少量的居民。现在，城市中最常见的住宅形式。

2001年英国人口普查显示，伯恩利城市地区的居民人口总数为73,021。该镇是伯恩利·纳尔逊市区的主要人口中心，估计人口超过15万。为了进行比较，这大小与牛津，斯威顿或斯洛格大致相同。当时，更广泛的地方政府区（伯恩利自治市镇）的种族组成为91.77％，南亚或南亚或南亚 /英国为7.16％，主要来自[孟加拉国]。最大的宗教团体是基督徒（74.46％）和穆斯林（6.58％）。 16至74岁之间的成年人中有59.02％被列为经济活跃和工作。在2011年，在英国人口普查中，这些数字已更改为87.4％的南亚或南亚 /英国人，有63.6％的人确定为基督徒和9.9％的穆斯林。 2013年4月至2014年3月的年度ONS年度调查显示，16至64岁的成年人中有63.1％被列为经济活跃。
report_src: 据2011年人口普查数据显示，位于苏格兰法夫的伯恩斯兰镇人口为6,269人[1]。

question_en: Who was head coach of the San Diego Chargers in the 2014 season?
pos_context_en: The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 45th season in the National Football League (NFL), the 55th overall, and the second under head coach Mike McCoy. After former Chargers' offensive coordinator, Ken Whisenhunt, was hired by the Tennessee Titans to become their new head coach, the Chargers promoted Frank Reich to replace him. Reich spent last season as the Chargers' quarterback coach.
neg_context_title_en: History of the San Diego Chargers
History of Los Angeles Chargers head coaches
neg_context_en: Coryell was hired as the San Diego Chargers' head coach on September 25, 1978, the same day as the infamous PSA Flight 182 crash in San Diego. When Don Coryell began coaching the team, the Chargers had a win-loss record of 1–4 for that season. The team broke their losing streak with eight additional wins and three losses that season after Coryell became head coach. The Chargers 9–7 record was their first winning season since 1969.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 17th season in the National Football League (NFL), and its 27th overall. the team failed to improve on their 8–8 record from 1985 Following a stagnant 1–7 start, Head Coach Don Coryell was fired and Al Saunders was named interim Head Coach. After the season, Saunders was named the permanent Head Coach and would hold the position through the end of the 1988 season. Leslie O'Neal was named Defensive Rookie of the Year.

He then left to become head coach of the San Diego Chargers, where the highlight of his tenure would be an AFC Championship and San Diego's first trip to the Super Bowl after the 1994 season where they fell to the 49ers, 49-26. Ross' first season in San Diego (1992) saw the Chargers drop the first four regular season games, but they recovered to win 11 of their final 12 games to win the AFC West, their first division title since 1981. In his five seasons with the Chargers, they won two division titles and made the playoffs three times. His regular season coaching record with the Chargers was 47–33, and 3–3 in the playoffs.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 44th season in the National Football League (NFL), the 54th overall, and the 1st under head coach Mike McCoy. The Chargers finished the regular season with a record of 9–7, improving on their 7–9 record from 2012. Also, they qualified for the playoffs for the first time since 2009. The Chargers defeated the Cincinnati Bengals in the Wild Card round by a score of 27–10, but lost to the Denver Broncos in the Divisional round by a score of 24–17. This was the Chargers' final playoff appearance in San Diego. They did not play in the postseason again until 2018, after relocating to Los Angeles.
During the 1986 San Diego Chargers season, following the resignation of Coryell, Al Saunders was named head coach. The team finished 4-12 that year.
The 1974 San Diego Chargers season began with the team trying to improve on their 2–11–1 record in 1973. It was Tommy Prothro's first season as the team's head coach.

The San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 32nd season in the National Football League (NFL) and the 42nd overall and the third and final season under head coach Mike Riley. The team improved on their 1–15 record in 2000 to finish 5–11 but missed the playoffs for the 6th straight year. It was Mike Riley’s final season as the team’s head coach. At the end of the season running back LaDainian Tomlinson won the Offensive Rookie of the Year award. Despite finishing 5–11 after losing their final nine games of the season, eight of the Chargers’ losses were by less than a touchdown and five of them were by three points.

The 2016 San Diego Chargers season was the franchise's 47th season in the National Football League, the 57th overall, the 56th and final season in San Diego, California and the fourth under head coach Mike McCoy.

In the 1970s, Al Saunders joined the coaching staff at USC and San Diego State University (SDSU), whose SDSU Aztecs were then under the control of Head Coach Don Coryell. Saunders would go with Coryell to NFL when Coryell became the head coach of the San Diego Chargers.
Statistics correct as of December 30, 2007, after the end of the 2007 NFL season.
question_src: 谁是2014赛季圣地亚哥充电器的主教练？
pos_context_src: 圣地亚哥充电器赛季是国家橄榄球联赛（NFL）的第45赛季，第55赛季和第二任总教练迈克·麦考伊（Mike McCoy）。在前Chargers的进攻协调员Ken Wishenhunt被田纳西泰坦队聘请成为他们的新主教练之后，Chargers宣传弗兰克·赖希（Frank Reich）取代了他。赖希（Reich）上个赛季担任了充电器的四分卫教练。
neg_context_title_src: 圣地亚哥充电器的历史
洛杉矶充电器主教练的历史
neg_context_src: Coryell于1978年9月25日被聘为圣地亚哥充电器的总教练，这是与圣地亚哥臭名昭著的PSA 182号坠机事故的同一天。当唐·科里尔（Don Coryell）开始执教球队时，充电器队在那个赛季的胜利记录为1-4。在科里尔（Coryell）成为总教练之后，球队以八场胜利和三场失利打破了连胜。 Chargers 9-7的战绩是他们自1969年以来的第一个获胜赛季。
圣地亚哥充电器赛季是全国足球联赛（NFL）的第17个赛季，整体第27赛季。在停滞1-7的开局之后，球队未能在1985年的8-8纪录中提高自己的战绩，总教练唐·科里尔（Don Coryell）被解雇，而艾尔·桑德斯（Al Saunders）被任命为临时主教练。赛季结束后，桑德斯被任命为永久主教练，并在1988赛季结束时担任该职位。莱斯利·奥尼尔（Leslie O'Neal）被评为年度最佳防守新秀。

然后，他离开了圣地亚哥充电器的总教练，在1994赛季之后，他的任期的亮点将是亚足联冠军，圣地亚哥首次前往超级碗，他们跌至49-26岁的49-26。罗斯（Ross）在圣地亚哥（1992）中的第一个赛季看到了充电器的前四场常规赛，但他们康复了最后12场比赛中的11场，以赢得了亚足联西部的第一个，这是自1981年以来的第一个分区冠军。在他在充电器的五个赛季中，他们赢得了两个分区冠军，并赢得了两次冠军，并取得了三次季后赛。他在充电器队的常规赛季教练纪录是47-33，季后赛的纪录为3-3。

圣地亚哥充电器赛季是全国足球联赛（NFL）的第44赛季，第54赛季和首席教练迈克·麦考伊（Mike McCoy）。充电器队以9-7的战绩结束了常规赛，从2012年开始的7-9战绩提高了他们的战绩。此外，他们自2009年以来首次获得了季后赛的资格。充电器在公正卡中以27-10的比分击败了辛辛那提孟加拉虎队，但以27-10的比分击败了丹佛赛车，但在分区赛中以24-11的得分输给了丹佛。这是Chargers在圣地亚哥的最后季后赛。在搬到洛杉矶之后，他们直到2018年才再次参加季后赛。
在1986年的圣地亚哥充电器赛季，在Coryell辞职之后，Al Saunders被任命为主教练。那年球队以4-12的成绩结束了比赛。
1974年圣地亚哥充电器赛季始于球队在1973年的2-11-1战绩中提高自己的战绩。这是汤米·普罗斯（Tommy Prothro）作为球队主教练的第一个赛季。

圣地亚哥充电器赛季是全国橄榄球联赛（NFL）的第32赛季，总教练迈克·赖利（Mike Riley）的总教练迈克·莱利（Mike Riley）和第三个也是最后一个赛季。球队在2000年的1-15纪录中取得了进步，以5-11的成绩取得了5-11的成绩，但连续第六年错过了季后赛。这是迈克·赖利（Mike Riley）担任球队主教练的最后一个赛季。在本赛季结束时，拉德里安·汤姆林森（Ladainian Tomlinson）赢得了年度最佳进攻新秀奖。尽管在本赛季的最后九场比赛中输掉了5-11，但其中八场充电器的损失不到触地得分，其中五分击中了三分。
2016年圣地亚哥充电器赛季是全国橄榄球联赛的第47赛季，第57赛季，加利福尼亚州圣地亚哥的第56个也是最后一个赛季，以及第四赛季的首席教练迈克·麦科伊（Mike McCoy）。

1970年代，Al Saunders加入了USC和圣地亚哥州立大学（SDSU）的教练组，其SDSU AZTEC当时受到总教练Don Coryell的控制。当Coryell成为圣地亚哥充电器的总教练时，Saunders将与Coryell一起去NFL。
截至2007年NFL赛季结束后2007年12月30日，统计数据正确。
report_src: 2014赛季圣地亚哥充电器队的主教练是迈克·麦考伊（Mike McCoy），当季为他执教球队的第二年[1]。

question_en: When did Donald Duart Maclean join the Cambridge Five?
pos_context_en: From Gresham's, Maclean won a place at Trinity Hall, Cambridge, arriving in 1931 to read modern languages. Even before the end of his first year he began to throw off parental restraints and engage openly in communist agitprop. He also played rugby for his college through the winter of 1932–33. Eventually his ambitions would lead to him joining the Communist Party. In his second year at Cambridge, his father died, afterwards marking a period of parental relaxation. Maclean's political views grew much more apparent in the following years in light of "his admiring, if sometimes puzzled, mother".
neg_context_en: Donald Duart Maclean (; 25 May 1913 – 6 March 1983) was a British diplomat and member of the Cambridge Five, who acted as spies for the Soviet Union.

Nunn May joined the Communist Party of Great Britain in the 1930s, and was active in the Association of Scientific Workers. Cambridge Five spy ring member Donald Duart Maclean was also at Trinity Hall during an overlapping period.

Yuri Modin (November 8, 1922 in Suzdal – 2007 in Moscow) was the KGB controller for the "Cambridge Five" from 1948 to 1951, during which Donald Duart Maclean was said to have passed atomic secrets to the Soviets. In 1951, Modin arranged the defections of Maclean and Guy Burgess. Modin's predecessors in control of the damaging Cambridge spy ring were executed during Stalin's Great Purge.

Sir John Maclean, 4th Baronet of Duart and Morvern (1670–1716) was the 20th Clan Chief of Clan Maclean from 1674 to 1716. He was the 16th and last Laird of Duart, when in 1691 he lost Castle Duart to Archibald Campbell, 1st Duke of Argyll. The castle wasn't recovered by Clan Maclean until 1912 until it was purchased by Fitzroy Donald Maclean, 221 years later.

Duart Castle was originally built in the 13th century, and was part of Clan MacLean. in 1350, Lachlan Lubanach Maclean of Duart was given the Castle as her dowry. The Clan Campbell's first involvement was an attack in 1647, and Archibald Campbell, 9th Earl of Argyll finally captured the Castle in 1691. The Castle was then demolished, leaving the Castle in ruin. Large bricks from the ruins of the Castle were used by Donald Maclean, 5th Laird of Torloisk, to build a cottage for his family close to the Castle. By 1751, the castle has been abandoned and was officially part of the Torosay Castle estate. 
Descendants of Archibald Campbell, 1st Duke of Argyll sold the castle in 1801. It was purchased by Clan MacQuarrie, before it was sold to Carter-Campbell of Possil, who kept the Castle as a ruin in the Torosay estate. When the estate was sold, the Castle ruin was purchased by Sir Fitzroy Donald Maclean and restored.

A group of Soviet sympathizers, in respected positions in British society, formed the Cambridge Five, sometimes called the Cambridge Four, and it has never been established how many active agents were involved. Of these, the most devastating was Kim Philby. Other confirmed members included Donald Duart Maclean, Guy Burgess, and Anthony Blunt. See Cambridge Five for other suspects.

Born in Marylebone, London, Donald Duart Maclean was the son of Sir Donald Maclean and Gwendolen Margaret Devitt. His father was chosen as chairman of the rump of the 23 independent MPs who backed H. H. Asquith in the Liberal Party in the House of Commons whilst the bulk of the Liberal MPs had followed David Lloyd George into the Coalition Liberal party in the November 1918 election. As the Labour Party had no leader and Sinn Féin did not attend, he became titular Leader of the Opposition. Maclean's parents had houses in London (later in Buckinghamshire) as well as in the Scottish Borders, where his father represented Peebles and Southern Midlothian, but the family lived mostly in and around London. He grew up in a very political household, in which world affairs were constantly discussed. In 1931 his father entered the Coalition Cabinet as President of the Board of Education.

In 1609, Lachlan was also one of twelve leading men of the Highlands who submitted formally to the Bishop of the Isles (Andrew Knox) in Iona and (in August) entered into a bond to observe the Statutes of Icolmkill, a regulatory reform which Donald Gregory described as “of the utmost importance for the improvement of the Isles”. His eleven co-signatories were Angus Macdonald of Dunnyveg, Hector Og Maclean of Duart, Donald Gorm Macdonald of Sleat, Ruari Macleod of Harris, Donald Macdonald (the Captain of Clanranald), Lachlan Maclean of Coll, Hector Maclaine of Lochbuie, Lachlan and Allan Maclean (the brothers of Duart), Gillespie MacQuarrie of Ulva and Donald Macfie of Colonsay.

The three Maclean children all married Russians, but left Moscow to live in London and the U.S, as they still had the right to British or American passports. Fergus, the eldest son, enrolled at University College London in 1974, prompting a question in Parliament. Donald's son, Donald, married firstly Lucy, daughter of George Hanna, an English man who worked for the BBC and friend of the family. They had a son, Donald Duart Maclean's only grandson (who was born in 1970), who resides in the UK.

Maclean married Gwendolen Margaret Devitt (26 September 1880 – 23 July 1962), daughter of Andrew Devitt (1850–1931) and Jane Dales Morrison (1856–1947), on 2 October 1907. They are buried in the churchyard of Holy Trinity Church, Penn, Buckinghamshire, together with their eldest son, Ian. The diplomat and spy, Donald Duart Maclean, was another of his sons.
question_src: 唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart MacLean）什么时候加入剑桥五人？
pos_context_src: 从格雷舍姆（Gresham）的麦克林（MacLean）赢得了剑桥三一厅的一席之地，于1931年到达现代语言。甚至在第一年结束前，他开始抛弃父母的束缚，并公开参与共产主义的股份。在1932  -  33年冬季，他还为大学效力。最终，他的野心将导致他加入共产党。在剑桥的第二年，他的父亲去世了，随后标志着父母放松的时期。鉴于“他的钦佩，有时令人困惑的母亲”，麦克林的政治观点在接下来的几年中变得越来越明显。
neg_context_title_src: 约翰·麦克林爵士，第四男爵
拉奇兰·麦金农爵士（氏族首席）
唐纳德·麦克林（英国政治家）
neg_context_src: 唐纳德·杜阿尔特·麦克林（Donald Duart MacLean）（； 1913年5月25日至1983年3月6日）是英国外交官，也是剑桥五人的成员，他担任苏联的间谍。
纳恩·梅（Nunn May）在1930年代加入了英国共产党，并活跃于科学工人协会。剑桥五名间谍戒指成员唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart MacLean）在一个重叠的时期也在三位一体大厅。
尤里·莫丁（Yuri Modin）（1922年11月8日在苏兹达尔 -  2007年在莫斯科举行）是1948年至1951年“剑桥五人”的克格勃控制器，据说唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克莱恩（Donald Duart Duart MacLean）在此期间将原子秘密传给了苏联。 1951年，莫丁安排了麦克林和盖伊·伯吉斯的叛逃。在斯大林的大清除期间，莫丁的前身控制了破坏性的剑桥间谍戒指。

约翰·麦克林（John MacLean）爵士，杜阿尔特（Duart）和莫文（Morvern）的第四任男爵（1670– 1716年）是1674年至1716年的第20位氏族麦克莱恩（Clan Maclean）的首领。他是杜阿特（Duart）的第16位也是最后一位laird，当时他在1691年，他将卡斯尔·杜阿尔特（Castle Duart）丢给了阿尔吉尔（Argyll）的第一名阿奇博尔德·坎贝尔（Archibald Campbell）。直到1912年，这座城堡才被氏族麦克林（Clan MacLean）恢复，直到221年后的菲茨罗伊·唐纳德·麦克林（Fitzroy Donald MacLean）购买。

Duart Castle最初建于13世纪，是Maclean氏族的一部分。 1350年，杜阿尔特（Duart）的拉克兰·拉巴纳赫·麦克林（Lachlan Lubanach MacLean）被送给城堡为她的嫁妆。坎贝尔氏族的首次参与是1647年的一次袭击，阿盖尔（Argyll）第9伯爵的阿奇博尔德·坎贝尔（Archibald Campbell）终于在1691年俘虏了这座城堡。然后，城堡被拆除，使城堡陷入废墟。第5层的唐纳德·麦克林（Donald MacLean）使用了城堡废墟中的大砖块，为他的家人在城堡附近的家人建造了一间小屋。到1751年，城堡已被废弃，正式成为托罗斯城堡庄园的一部分。 
阿盖尔第一公爵阿奇博尔德·坎贝尔（Archibald Campbell）的后代于1801年出售了这座城堡。它是由麦格里（Clan Macquarrie）购买的，然后被卖给了普斯蒂尔（Possil）的卡特·坎贝尔（Carter-Campbell），后者将城堡作为托罗西庄园的废墟保留。出售房地产时，菲茨罗伊·唐纳德·麦克林爵士（Fitzroy Donald MacLean）购买了城堡废墟，并恢复了。
一群在英国社会中受人尊敬的苏联同情者组成了剑桥五人，有时被称为剑桥四人，从未确定涉及多少活跃的特工。其中，最毁灭性的是金·菲尔比（Kim Philby）。其他确认的成员包括唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart Maclean），盖伊·伯吉斯（Guy Burgess）和安东尼·布朗特（Anthony Blunt）。有关其他嫌疑人，请参见剑桥五。

唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart Maclean）出生于伦敦的马里波恩（Marylebone），是唐纳德·麦克林（Donald Maclean）爵士和格温多伦·玛格丽特·德维特（Gwendolen Margaret Devitt）的儿子。他的父亲被选为23位独立国会议员的臀部主席，他在下议院的自由党中支持H. H. Asquith，而自由国会议员的大部分人则跟随David Lloyd George参加了1918年11月8日的选举。由于工党没有领导人，辛恩·费因（SinnFéin）没有参加，他成为反对派的名义领袖。麦克林的父母在伦敦（后来在白金汉郡）以及苏格兰边界有房屋，他的父亲代表Peebles和Midlothian南部，但一家人主要生活在伦敦及其周围。他在一个非常政治的家庭中长大，在其中不断讨论世界事务。 1931年，他的父亲进入联盟内阁，担任教育委员会主席。

1609年，拉克兰（Lachlan）也是高地的十二名主要人之一，他们正式向爱奥娜（Iona）的群岛主教（安德鲁·诺克斯（Andrew Knox））提交，并（8月）纳入了纽带，以观察唐纳德·格雷格里（Icolmkill）的法规，这是一项监管改革，唐纳德·格雷戈里（Donald Gregory）对“唐纳德·格雷戈里（Donald Gregory）的最重要”表示“对issles of osles of issles of issles of issles of the of osle''。他的十一个共同签名是邓尼维格的安格斯·麦克唐纳，杜特的赫克托·奥格·麦克莱恩，斯莱特的唐纳德·戈尔姆·麦克唐纳，哈里斯的鲁阿里·麦克劳斯，唐纳德·麦克唐纳，克兰拉纳德的上尉，克兰拉纳德的上尉，卢克兰·麦克莱恩（Lochbe） Ulva的Gillespie Macquarrie和Colonsay的Donald Macfie。

三个麦克林儿童都与俄罗斯人结婚，但离开莫斯科居住在伦敦和美国，因为他们仍然有权获得英国或美国护照。长子弗格斯（Fergus）于1974年在伦敦大学学院入学，引起了议会的一个问题。唐纳德（Donald）的儿子唐纳德（Donald）首先与露西（Lucy）结婚，露西（Lucy）是乔治·汉娜（George Hanna）的女儿。他们有一个儿子唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart Maclean）的唯一孙子（1970年出生），他居住在英国。

麦克莱恩（MacLean）于1907年10月2日与安德鲁·德维特（1850-1931）的女儿（1850-1931）和简·达尔斯·莫里森（Jane Dales Morrison，1856- 1947年）结婚，于1962年9月26日至23日），1907年10月2日，他们被埋葬在宾夕法尼亚州佩恩，巴克林郡佩恩·哈姆郡的圣罗兰教堂的教堂，与他们的Elsson一起埋葬。外交官和间谍唐纳德·杜阿特·麦克林（Donald Duart Maclean）是他的另一个儿子。
report_src: 麦克林于1931年进入剑桥大学三一学院，不到一年便公开投身共产主义活动，其政治立场在随后几年愈发鲜明[1]；正是在这段剑桥求学后期（约1933-1934年），他被苏联情报人员招募，从而加入后来被称为“剑桥五人”的间谍网络。

question_en: What causes the green color of the Statue of Liberty?
pos_context_en: Verdigris is the common name for a green pigment obtained through the application of acetic acid to copper plates or the natural patina formed when copper, brass or bronze is weathered and exposed to air or seawater over a period of time. It is usually a basic copper carbonate, but near the sea will be a basic copper chloride. If acetic acid is present at the time of weathering, it may consist of copper(II) acetate.
neg_context_title_en: Statue of Liberty in popular culture
Conservation-restoration of the Statue of Liberty
neg_context_en: Originally, the statue was a dull copper color, but shortly after 1900 a green patina, also called verdigris, caused by the oxidation of the copper skin, began to spread. As early as 1902 it was mentioned in the press; by 1906 it had entirely covered the statue. Believing that the patina was evidence of corrosion, Congress authorized for various repairs, and to paint the statue both inside and out. There was considerable public protest against the proposed exterior painting. The Army Corps of Engineers studied the patina for any ill effects to the statue and concluded that it protected the skin, "softened the outlines of the Statue and made it beautiful." The statue was painted only on the inside. The Corps of Engineers also installed an elevator to take visitors from the base to the top of the pedestal.

There have been questions raised about how the statue would hold up for thousands of years, based on her current corrosion patterns. Studies done during various repairs in the past hundred years show that the copper "skin" of the statue herself will hold up, but her insides may not. The copper has aged and chemically changed to create a patina, which on metal is a coating of various chemical compounds such as oxides, carbonates, sulfides, or sulfates formed on the surface during exposure to atmospheric elements. It is this patina that gives the statue her sea-green coloring, due to the oxidation of the copper. It also means that the statue's deterioration by seawater and winds is greatly slowed. The only thing that still poses a threat to the patina is acid rain, which has the power to corrode the surface.

Discoloration of teeth may result from bacteria stains, tobacco, tea, coffee, foods with an abundance of chlorophyll, restorative materials, and medications. Stains from bacteria may cause colors varying from green to black to orange. Green stains also result from foods with chlorophyll or excessive exposure to copper or nickel. Amalgam, a common dental restorative material, may turn adjacent areas of teeth black or gray. Long term use of chlorhexidine, a mouthwash, may encourage extrinsic stain formation near the gingiva on teeth. This is usually easy for a hygienist to remove. Systemic disorders also can cause tooth discoloration. Congenital erythropoietic porphyria causes porphyrins to be deposited in teeth, causing a red-brown coloration. Blue discoloration may occur with alkaptonuria and rarely with Parkinson's disease. Erythroblastosis fetalis and biliary atresia are diseases which may cause teeth to appear green from the deposition of biliverdin. Also, trauma may change a tooth to a pink, yellow, or dark gray color. Pink and red discolorations are also associated in patients with lepromatous leprosy. Some medications, such as tetracycline antibiotics, may become incorporated into the structure of a tooth, causing intrinsic staining of the teeth.

It has been claimed that the colours of the flag were incorporated into the first public performance of Sir Cavendish Boyle's "Ode to Newfoundland" at the Casino Theatre in 1901, where a character resembling the Statue of Liberty clad in a flowing gown of vertical stripes of pink, white and green is said to have appeared on stage. The next day the colours appeared on the cover of the music sheet published by Boyle. The pink, white and green tricolour did, in fact, appear on the first published sheet music of Boyle's "Ode to Newfoundland", which was published in January 1902, however, the music which was eventually used for the Ode came later and is used to this day. Connecting the pink, white and green with the Ode to Newfoundland was clever but not definitive. The cover to that sheet music depicted the "Pink, White and Green" being held by a fisherman and intertwined with the Union Jack being held by a Royal Navy sailor. It is unsubstantiated, however, that the pink-based tricolour appeared in connection with the first performance of the "Ode to Newfoundland" at the Casino Theatre. This performance actually took place on December 22, 1902 as part of the closing of the play "Mamzelle" - a play in which the French character Marianne, bearing a strong resemblance to the Statue of Liberty, appears clothed in a tricolour gown of red, white and blue based on the French tricolour.

In July 2015, the Charleston church shooting caused many Southern states and communities to rethink the public display of Confederate symbols and monuments. The New Orleans mayor Mitch Landrieu called for the Liberty Place monument and statues honoring Robert E. Lee and other Confederate notables to be removed from prominent public spaces, explaining that "that's what museums are for". The idea drew both support and resistance and the city council voted unanimously to hold public hearings to discuss the proposal. In December 2016, the council voted to remove the monument, and its move was upheld by a federal appeals court in March 2017.

Once the interior scaffolding was installed, a thorough evaluative survey of the interior coatings was executed. The acknowledged presumption of most involved in the restoration was that all coatings would be removed from the interior metals, that repairs would be made, that metals would be recoated, and the interior would be adequately weatherproofed. The preexisting interior coatings on both the secondary wrought iron framework and the wrought iron central pylon would be removed along with the multiple layers of coal tar and paint that had been applied to the internal copper sheathing. A "New York Times" article from February 8, 1984, mentioned that the interior copper which was at that time painted "government green" would be cleaned to resemble the salmon color of a new penny. That outermost "government green" layer was a vinyl paint applied in 1975.
Because certain sections that had corroded were hidden beneath the layers of coatings, no attempt was made to salvage any of the seven layers of paint, (consisting of a base coat of red lead primer plus six additional coats) and the two layers of bituminous paint (a coal tar coating) that had been used as a water sealant in the statues interior around 1911. The three available coating removal methods tested, developed (or not) and implemented (or not) were: thermal coating removal, abrasive coating removal and chemical coating removal. The methods contemplated for the removal of the coatings on the interior copper differed from that of the other interior metals. For the preparation of the wrought iron parts of the statue, an abrasive removal method also known as dry sandblasting was implemented in order to prevent against flash rusting, The low dusting abrasive material used in the dry sandblasting technique was aluminum oxide.

Green is common in nature, as many plants are green because of a complex chemical known as chlorophyll, which is involved in photosynthesis. Chlorophyll absorbs the long wavelengths of light (red) and short wavelengths of light (blue) much more efficiently than the wavelengths that appear green to the human eye, so light reflected by plants is enriched in green. Chlorophyll absorbs green light poorly because it first arose in organisms living in oceans where purple halobacteria were already exploiting photosynthesis. Their purple color arose because they extracted energy in the green portion of the spectrum using bacteriorhodopsin. The new organisms that then later came to dominate the extraction of light were selected to exploit those portions of the spectrum not used by the halobacteria.
Animals typically use the color green as camouflage, blending in with the chlorophyll green of the surrounding environment. Green animals include, especially, amphibians, reptiles, and some fish, birds and insects. Most fish, reptiles, amphibians, and birds appear green because of a reflection of blue light coming through an over-layer of yellow pigment. Perception of color can also be affected by the surrounding environment. For example, broadleaf forests typically have a yellow-green light about them as the trees filter the light. Turacoverdin is one chemical which can cause a green hue in birds, especially. Invertebrates such as insects or mollusks often display green colors because of porphyrin pigments, sometimes caused by diet. This can causes their feces to look green as well. Other chemicals which generally contribute to greenness among organisms are flavins (lychochromes) and hemanovadin. Humans have imitated this by wearing green clothing as a camouflage in military and other fields. Substances that may impart a greenish hue to one's skin include biliverdin, the green pigment in bile, and ceruloplasmin, a protein that carries copper ions in chelation.

On July 30, 1916, during World War I, German saboteurs set off a disastrous explosion on the Black Tom peninsula in Jersey City, New Jersey, in what is now part of Liberty State Park, close to Bedloe's Island. Carloads of dynamite and other explosives that were being sent to Britain and France for their war efforts were detonated, and seven people were killed. The statue sustained minor damage, mostly to the torch-bearing right arm, and was closed for ten days. The cost to repair the statue and buildings on the island was about . The narrow ascent to the torch was closed for public-safety reasons, and it has remained closed ever since.

The Rangers previously had a navy alternate jersey featuring the head of the Statue of Liberty with the team abbreviation (NYR) below in a futuristic script. Silver was used as an accent color, but the player names and numbers retain the same color schemes as the regular jerseys, except for a darker shade of blue. With the exception of a white version used in the 1998–99 season, this jersey was used from 1996 to 2007, and proved to be highly popular with fans.

The species was originally called the "blue frog" ("Rana caerulea") despite its green color. The specimens White sent to England were damaged by the preservative and appeared blue. The color of the frog is caused by blue and green pigments covered in a yellow layer; the preservative destroyed the yellow layer and left the frog with a blue appearance. The specific epithet, "caerulea", which is Latin for blue, has remained. This frog is sometimes referred to as "Pelodryas caerulea" in the scientific literature. In Australia, the frog is also known more simply as the "green tree frog", but that name is often given to the most common green arboreal species in a region, such as the American green tree frog ("Hyla cinerea").
question_src: 是什么原因导致自由女神像的绿色？
pos_context_src: Verdigris是通过将乙酸施加到铜板上或在铜，黄铜或青铜在风化并在一段时间内暴露于空气或海水时形成的天然铜质而获得的绿色色素的通用名称。它通常是基本的碳酸盐，但在海边将是基本的氯化铜。如果在风化时存在乙酸，则可能由醋酸铜（II）组成。
neg_context_title_src: 大众文化中的自由雕像
自由女神像的保护恢复
neg_context_src: 最初，该雕像是一种暗淡的铜色，但在1900年后不久，绿色的铜绿（也称为Verdigris），由铜皮肤的氧化引起，开始蔓延。早在1902年就在媒体上提到。到1906年，它已经完全覆盖了雕像。认为铜绿是腐蚀的证据，国会被授权进行各种维修，并在内外绘制雕像。公开抗议拟议的外部绘画。陆军工程兵团研究了铜绿对雕像的任何不良影响，并得出结论，它保护了皮肤，“软化了雕像的轮廓并使其变得美丽。”雕像仅在里面绘制。工程兵团还安装了一台电梯，将访客从底座带到基座的顶部。

关于雕像如何根据她目前的腐蚀模式，雕像将如何持续数千年，引发了一些疑问。在过去一百年中进行的各种维修中进行的研究表明，雕像的铜“皮肤”本人将持续下去，但她的内部可能不会。铜已经老化和化学变化以形成铜绿，在金属上是各种化合物的涂层，例如在暴露于大气元件的过程中在表面形成的氧化物，碳酸盐，硫化物或硫酸盐。正是这种古铜色使她的海绿色雕像赋予了雕像，这是由于铜的氧化。这也意味着雕像因海水和风的恶化而大大减慢。仍然对铜绿构成威胁的唯一一件事是酸雨，它具有腐蚀表面的力量。

牙齿变色可能是由细菌污渍，烟草，茶，咖啡，食物，丰富的叶绿素，恢复性材料和药物产生的。细菌的污渍可能导致颜色从绿色到黑色到橙色不等。绿色污渍也由叶绿素或过度接触铜或镍的食物产生。汞齐是一种常见的牙科修复材料，可能会使牙齿黑色或灰色的相邻区域变成相邻的区域。漱口水的洗涤剂的长期使用可能会鼓励牙齿上的牙龈附近的外部污渍形成。对于卫生员来说，这通常很容易去除。全身性疾病也会导致牙齿变色。先天性红斑斑岩会导致卟啉沉积在牙齿中，从而导致红棕色的颜色。碱性尿尿中可能发生蓝色变色，很少发生帕金森氏病。红细胞增生胎儿和胆道闭锁是疾病，可能导致牙齿从biliverdin的沉积中显得绿色。同样，创伤可能会将牙齿变成粉红色，黄色或深灰色。麻风病患者的粉红色和红色变色也是相关的。某些药物，例如四环素抗生素，可能会掺入牙齿的结构中，从而导致牙齿的内在染色。

据称，旗帜的颜色被纳入了卡文迪许·博伊尔爵士的“纽芬兰爵士”在1901年的赌场剧院的首次公开表演中，那里的角色类似于自由女神雕像，据说已经在舞台上出现在垂直的粉红色，白色和绿色的垂直垂直条纹。第二天，颜色出现在博伊尔（Boyle）出版的音乐表封面上。实际上，粉红色，白色和绿色的三色确实出现在博伊尔（Boyle）的《纽芬兰（Ode to Newfoundland）》的第一个出版的乐谱中，该音乐于1902年1月出版，然而，最终用于颂歌的音乐是在晚些时候出现的，今天曾在今天使用。将粉红色，白色和绿色连接到纽芬兰的颂歌是聪明的，但并不确定。那张乐谱的封面描绘了一名渔夫持有的“粉红色，白色和绿色”，并与皇家海军水手举行的联合杰克交织在一起。然而，尚未得到证实的是，基于粉红色的三色与赌场剧院的“ Ode to Newfoundland”的首次表演有关。这项表演实际上是在1902年12月22日进行的，作为戏剧“ Mamzelle”的一部分，这是一部戏剧，其中法国角色玛丽安（Marianne）与自由女神像非常相似，在法国三角龙（French Tricolor）的三色，白色和蓝色的三角形礼服上都穿着。
2015年7月，查尔斯顿教堂的枪击事件导致许多南部各州和社区重新考虑了同盟符号和古迹的公众展示。新奥尔良市长米奇·兰德里乌（Mitch Landrieu）呼吁自由广场纪念碑和尊敬罗伯特·李（Robert E.这个想法吸引了支持和抵抗，市议会一致投票通过举行公开听证会来讨论该提案。 2016年12月，该委员会投票决定删除纪念碑，2017年3月，联邦上诉法院维持了其举动。

安装内部脚手架后，对内部涂料进行了彻底的评估调查。公认的大多数涉及恢复的推定是，将从内部金属中取出所有涂层，进行维修，将重新涂抹金属，并且内部将得到充分的防风雨。二级锻铁框架和锻铁中央塔上的先前的内部涂料将与已应用于内部铜护套的多层煤焦油和油漆一起去除。 1984年2月8日起的一篇“纽约时报”文章提到，当时将绘制“政府绿色”的内部铜，类似于新一分钱的鲑鱼颜色。最外面的“政府绿色”层是1975年应用的乙烯基油漆。
因为某些腐蚀的部分隐藏在涂料层之下，所以没有尝试挽救七层油漆中的任何一个（由红色铅底漆的底漆加上六层外套组成）和二层沥青油漆（煤焦油涂料）在1911年含有雕像内的含水量或实现的两层。去除热涂层，去除磨料和化学涂层。预计去除内部铜上涂料的方法与其他内属的方法不同。为了制备雕像的锻铁部分，为了防止闪光生锈而实施了一种磨料的去除方法，也称为干砂光剂，干砂油技术中使用的低灰尘磨料材料是氧化铝。

绿色在本质上很常见，因为许多植物都是绿色的，因为复杂的化学物质称为叶绿素，与光合作用有关。叶绿素吸收的光（红色）和短波长的光（蓝色）比人眼中绿色的波长要高得多，因此植物反射的光富含绿色。叶绿素吸收的绿光很差，因为它首先是在生活在紫色盐酸杆菌已经利用光合作用的海洋中的生物中。它们的紫色之所以出现，是因为它们使用细菌紫红素在光谱的绿色部分中提取能量。随后选择了新的生物体，选择了光的提取，以利用卤素未使用的那些部分。
动物通常将颜色绿色用作伪装，与周围环境的叶绿素绿色混合。绿色动物包括两栖动物，爬行动物以及一些鱼类，鸟类和昆虫。大多数鱼类，爬行动物，两栖动物和鸟类看起来都是绿色的，因为蓝光通过黄色颜料过高。颜色的感知也可能受周围环境的影响。例如，当树木过滤光时，阔叶林通常会有黄绿色的光。 Turacoverdin是一种可以在鸟类中引起绿色色调的化学物质。昆虫或软体动物等无脊椎动物通常由于卟啉素色素而表现出绿色，有时是由饮食引起的。这可能会使他们的粪便看起来也绿色。通常有助于生物体绿色的其他化学物质是黄素（番茄）和hemanovadin。人类通过在军事和其他领域穿着绿色衣服作为伪装来模仿这一点。可能赋予皮肤绿色色调的物质包括biliverdin，胆汁中的绿色颜料和ceruloplasmin，ceruloplasmin是一种携带铜离子的蛋白质。
1916年7月30日，在第一次世界大战期间，德国破坏者在新泽西州泽西市的黑色汤姆半岛上引发了灾难性的爆炸，现在是靠近贝德洛伊岛的自由州立公园的一部分。被送往英国和法国的战争努力的炸药和其他炸药的汽车被引爆，七人被杀。雕像遭受了轻微的伤害，主要是戴火炬的右臂，并关闭了十天。修理雕像和岛上建筑物的费用大约是。由于公共安全原因，狭窄的火炬上升被关闭，此后一直关闭。
游骑兵此前曾在下面的未来派剧本中以缩写（NYR）的缩写（NYR）为特色，以自由女神像的负责人为特色。银被用作强调颜色，但玩家名称和数字保留了与常规球衣相同的配色方案，除了较暗的蓝色阴影。除1998  -  99赛季使用的白色版本外，该球衣从1996年到2007年都被使用，并被证明在球迷中很受欢迎。

该物种最初被称为“蓝色青蛙”（“ Rana caerulea”），尽管它具有绿色。送往英格兰的白色标本被防腐剂损坏，并呈蓝色。青蛙的颜色是由蓝色和绿色颜料覆盖在黄色层中引起的。防腐剂破坏了黄色层，并以蓝色的外观离开了青蛙。特定的上皮“ Caerulea”（拉丁语为蓝色）一直存在。在科学文献中，这只青蛙有时被称为“ pelodryas caerulea”。在澳大利亚，青蛙也更简单地称为“绿树青蛙”，但这个名字通常是给一个地区最常见的绿色树木植物物种的，例如美国绿树青蛙（“ Hyla cinerea”）。
report_src: 自由女神像外层由铜板制成，长期暴露在空气、雨水与海风的环境中，铜表面与氧气、水分及海盐反应，生成一种名为“铜绿”（verdigris）的绿色物质，从而使整座雕像呈现典型的青绿色外观[1]。铜绿通常为碱式碳酸铜，而在近海环境中则主要生成碱式氯化铜[1]；这种薄而均匀的氧化层不仅改变了颜色，还起到保护铜板、阻止进一步腐蚀的作用。若在风化过程中存在乙酸（例如来自空气中的酸性污染物），铜绿还可能含有醋酸铜(II)[1]。因此，自由女神像的绿色本质上是其铜表面在自然和海洋大气共同作用下形成的稳定铜绿层。

question_en: How old is Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur?
pos_context_en: Melissa Gaboriau Auf der Maur (; born March 17, 1972) is a Canadian musician, singer-songwriter, photographer and actress.
neg_context_en: Auf der Maur did not meet her father until she was three years old. Gaboriau called Nick Auf der Maur after her daughter began questioning her about her father's identity. Reflecting on the encounter, Auf der Maur said "[my father] realised my mother Linda was the love of his life because she'd offered the gift of this child without any demands. He fell madly in love with her [and] pursued her for two years". Auf der Maur and Gaboriau married in 1978 when Melissa was six years old. The couple divorced in 1979 after which Auf der Maur traveled worldwide with her mother. A portion of Auf der Maur's childhood was spent living in "a circus caravan in Wales, a red post-office box truck in Morocco, and a hut in Kenya" with her mother. During her time in Kenya, she contracted three bouts of malaria and returned to Montreal.

Auf der Maur was born in Montreal, Quebec to journalist and politician Nick Auf der Maur and journalist and literary translator Linda Gaboriau. Auf der Maur's father's family was Swiss–German and her mother's was mixed European-American. Gaboriau was born in Boston, Massachusetts in the United States. As a result, she holds dual Canadian–American citizenship. Auf der Maur's surname translates to English as "on the wall", as "maur" was derived from the German word for "wall" ("die Mauer"). She has stated that her grandmother, Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur, was "always pounding my heritage down my throat—reminding me that I'm the last one in North America to further the name".

Gaboriau was previously married to Montreal city councillor Nick Auf der Maur, and is the mother of rock musician Melissa Auf der Maur. She and her late partner of 35 years, author and professor Hervé de Fontenay, have one son, architect Yves de Fontenay.

Hole reunited again—with the "Celebrity Skin" line-up of Love, Erlandson, Auf der Maur and Schemel—for a one-off performance at Public Assembly in Brooklyn, New York on April 12, 2012 at an after-party for Schemel's film "Hit So Hard" (2011). Originally Auf der Maur, Erlandson and Schemel were performing as a trio until Love arrived for a spontaneous performance of "Miss World" and "Over the Edge". "The Quietus" reported in April 2014 that the four members had reunited although in subsequent interviews, Love downplayed talk of an imminent reunion. In April 2016, Auf der Maur stated in an interview that she no longer had time or energy for a full-fledged reunion, but would be interested in wrapping up the Hole legacy with a retrospective disc and small set of tour dates.

In Montreal, Auf der Maur attended the Fine Arts Core Education (FACE) School and Moving in New Directions (MIND) High School—both of which are schools of alternative education. At FACE, she was a member of the classical choir and at MIND, she was "part of the small English elite", where she formed friendships with Leonard Cohens daughter Lorca and Rufus Wainwright. At school, she became interested in photography and subsequently attended Concordia University, from which she majored in photography in 1994. At Concordia at age 19, Auf der Maur began working part-time as a disc jockey at Bifteck, a well known rock club, where she met several musicians including Steve Durand.

Recorded from 2001 to 2003  at various studios in the U.S. and Canada, Auf der Maur's debut studio album "Auf der Maur" was released in February 2004 on Capitol Records. Produced with Chris Goss, Auf der Maur financed the recording sessions herself as she was not signed to a record label at the time of recording and during post-production, her budget ran out and she was unable to mix the album. She accepted a recording contract from Capitol soon afterwards and released "Auf der Maur" to "generally favorable reviews", according to Metacritic. The album's supporting singles—"Followed the Waves", "Real a Lie" and "Taste You"—were moderate successes in the United Kingdom, charting in the Top 40 of the UK Single Charts. As of 2010, "Auf der Maur" sold 200,000 copies worldwide.

"Real a Lie" was one of the many songs written by Melissa Auf der Maur over a 12-year period from 1992 to 2004. Originally titled "Realalie", the song was first performed by her original band, Tinker, which also included co-writer Steve Durand, and was released as the band's second single in 1994, which was backed with the b-side "Saxon Princess." Auf der Maur later reworked the song during the recording sessions for "Auf der Maur" in 2003-4 featruing a layer Wall of sound of guitars. The song was featured as the third track on the album.A promotional music video was created for the single in 2004 and released on May 3, 2004.Firecrasher, "MAdM | Melissa Auf der Maur | Archives | Watching video: Auf der Maur - Real, A Lie" http://www.melissaaufdermaur.org/video/view/auf_der_maur_real_a_lie/14 Retrieved on June 20, 2010. The video is compiled of photographs of Auf der Maur performing "Real a Lie" and was recorded in still motion.

From 1994 to 1995, Auf der Maur toured worldwide with Hole in support of its second studio album, "Live Through This" (1994). On the tour, Auf der Maur was described by guitarist Eric Erlandson as "bringing sunshine to the band" during the "dark and grey" atmosphere of the tour, which was problematic due to the band's recent bereavements—notably the death of Pfaff and Love's husband Kurt Cobain—as well as Love's drug addiction. Auf der Maur befriended Patty Schemel and rented a house with her following the two-year-long tour. The duo began a side project, Constant Comment, and released a split 7" single with Red Aunts on Sympathy for the Record Industry featuring the song "Firecrasher". Auf der Maur has since said her friendship and musical compatibility between her and Schemel was based on a "redhead connection"; Schemel has referred to Auf der Maur as her "anchor" during the period following the death of Pfaff and Cobain.
Auf der Maur was featured on various Hole releases, including the 1996 non-album single "Gold Dust Woman" and on various live tracks on "My Body, the Hand Grenade" (1997). She was featured on the band's third studio album, "Celebrity Skin" (1998), performing bass and co-composing five of the 12 songs. "Celebrity Skin" was a major critical and commercial success; it charted at number 9 in the U.S. "Billboard" 200 albums chart and number 3 in the Canadian Albums Chart, as well its lead single and title track peaking at number 1 on the "Billboard" Modern Rock Tracks chart. It has since been certified platinum in both the U.S. and Canada. Following the tour in support of its release, Auf der Maur left Hole in October 1999 as her five-year contract with the band ended and she wished "to grow in many different directions".

Auf der Maur briefly toured with former The Cars frontman Ric Ocasek in 1997, after contributing bass and background vocals to his 1997 solo album "Troublizing". She collaborated with French group Indochine on their song "Le Grand Secret", singing a duet in French with Nicola Sirkis, to great acclaim in France. Auf der Maur joined the band on stage to perform the song on various occasions and appeared in the music video for the song. She performed a rare, short, acoustic set of some of her solo songs during an Indochine show in Paris, February 22, 2002. Auf der Maur has contributed bass and backing vocals to childhood friend Rufus Wainwright's album "Poses" and appears in his 1998 video for "April Fools". In 2008, she collaborated with Canadian musician Daniel Victor on his music collaboration project Neverending White Lights. They recorded the song "The World is Darker", for which a video was released in March 2008. Aside from this, she has contributed to albums by artists such as Ryan Adams, Ben Lee, Idaho, The Stills and Fountains of Wayne.
question_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur多大了？
pos_context_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur（；出生于1972年3月17日）是加拿大音乐家，歌手兼作曲家，摄影师和女演员。
neg_context_src: 阿夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）直到三岁才遇到她的父亲。加波里亚（Gaboriau）在女儿开始向她询问父亲的身份后，打电话给尼克·阿夫·莫尔（Nick Auf Der Maur）。在反映这次相遇时，Auf der Maur说：“ [我父亲]意识到我的母亲琳达是他一生的热爱，因为她毫不犹豫地提供了这个孩子的礼物。他疯狂地爱上了她[并追求她两年了。” Auf der Maur和Gaboriau于1978年六岁时结婚。这对夫妇于1979年离婚，此后Auf der Maur与她的母亲一起旅行。与母亲一起生活在“威尔士的马戏团大篷车，一辆红色的邮局盒子卡车和肯尼亚的小屋”中度过的一部分。在肯尼亚期间，她染上了三局疟疾，然后返回蒙特利尔。

Auf der Maur出生于魁北克蒙特利尔，新闻记者和政治家Nick Auf Der Maur以及记者以及文学翻译琳达·加博里亚（Linda Gaboriau）。阿夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）的父亲的家人是瑞士 - 德国人，她的母亲是欧洲裔美国人。 Gaboriau出生于美国马萨诸塞州的波士顿。结果，她拥有加拿大双重美国公民身份。 Auf der Maur的姓氏将英语转化为“墙上”，“毛尔”源自德语单词“ wall”（“ Die Mauer”）。她说，她的祖母Theresia Schaelin-Auf der Maur“总是将我的遗产猛击到我的喉咙上，这让我感到我是北美最后一个进一步的名字的人”。
Gaboriau之前嫁给了蒙特利尔市议员Nick Auf Der Maur，并且是摇滚音乐家Melissa Auf der Maur的母亲。她和她已故的35岁伴侣，作家兼教授HervéDeFontenay，有一个儿子，建筑师Yves de Fontenay。

霍尔再次团聚 - 与爱情的“名人皮肤”阵容，埃兰森，阿夫·莫尔和斯图梅尔 - 在2012年4月12日在纽约布鲁克林举行的公共集会上进行一次演出，在Schemel的电影《 The So So So Hard》（2011年）举行。最初是Auf der Maur，Erlandson和Schemel表演三人组，直到Love到达“ Miss Miss World”和“ Edge the Edge”的自发表演。 “安静”在2014年4月报道说，尽管在随后的采访中，这四名成员团聚了，但爱情轻描淡写了关于即将举行的团聚的话题。 Auf der Maur在2016年4月在一次采访中表示，她不再有时间或精力进行全面的聚会，但有兴趣用回顾性的唱片和少量旅行日期来包裹洞的遗产。

在蒙特利尔，奥夫·莫尔（Auf der Maur）就读于美术核心教育（Face）学校，并沿着新的方向（思维）高中搬家，这都是替代教育的学校。从面对面对面，她是古典合唱团的成员，在想到她是“小英国精英的一部分”，在那里她与伦纳德·科恩斯（Leonard Cohens）的女儿洛尔卡（Lorca）和鲁弗斯·温赖特（Rufus Wainwright）建立了友谊。在学校里，她对摄影感兴趣，随后就读于康科迪亚大学（Concordia University），她于1994年主修摄影。在19岁的康科迪亚（Concordia），Auf der Maur开始在著名的摇滚俱乐部Bifteck兼职兼职，在著名的摇滚俱乐部兼职，在那里遇到了几位音乐家，遇到了包括史蒂夫·杜兰德（Steve Durand）在内的几位音乐家。

Auf der Maur的首张录音室专辑“ Auf der Maur”从2001年到2003年在美国和加拿大的各种工作室录制，2004年2月在Capitol Records上发行。 Auf der Maur由克里斯·戈斯（Chris Goss）制作，本人为唱片会议提供了资金，因为她在录音时没有签约唱片公司，并且在后期制作期间，她的预算用完了，她无法混合专辑。据Metacritic称，她不久之后就接受了国会大厦的录音合同，并将“ Auf der Maur”发布给了“通常有利的评论”。这张专辑的支持单曲 - “跟随海浪”，“真正的谎言”和“品尝您”  - 在英国取得了适度的成功，在英国单一排行榜的前40名中绘制了排行榜。截至2010年，“ Auf der Maur”在全球售出了200,000份。

“真实的谎言”是梅利莎·奥夫·莫尔（Melissa Auf Der Maur）在1992年至2004年的12年中撰写的众多歌曲之一。这首歌最初是由她的原始乐队Tinker首次演奏的，该乐队还包括合名撰写的Steve Durand，最初包括1994年的第二首单曲，该乐队在1994年与B-Enide bende Bine saxon Prist saxon Prist saxon Prist saxon Prist。” Auf der Maur后来在2003  -  4年的“ Auf der Maur”录音会议上重新设计了这首歌，并填充了吉他的声音墙。这首歌作为专辑中的第三首曲目。 http://www.melissaaufdermaur.org/video/view/auf_maur_real_a_a_lie/14于2010年6月20日检索。该视频由Auf der Maur表演“真实A Lie”的照片编写，并记录在Still Motion中。

从1994年到1995年，Auf der Maur在全球巡回演出，并支持其第二张录音室专辑“ Live This This This”（1994）。在巡回演出中，吉他手埃里克·埃兰森（Eric Erlandson）将Auf der Maur描述为“将阳光带入乐队”，这是在巡回演出的“黑暗和灰色”氛围中，这是有问题的，这是由于乐队最近的丧亲而造成的，这无疑是Pfaff和Love的丈夫Kurt Cobain的死亡，以及Love的毒品成瘾。为期两年的巡回演出后，Auf der Maur与Patty Schemel成为朋友，并与她租了一所房子。 The duo began a side project, Constant Comment, and released a split 7" single with Red Aunts on Sympathy for the Record Industry featuring the song "Firecrasher". Auf der Maur has since said her friendship and musical compatibility between her and Schemel was based on a "redhead connection"; Schemel has referred to Auf der Maur as her "anchor" during the period following the death of Pfaff and Cobain.
Auf der Maur在各种孔版本上都有特色，包括1996年的非Album单曲“ Gold Dust Woman”以及“我的身体，手榴弹”（1997）的各种现场直播。她在乐队的第三张录音室专辑《 Celebrity Skin》（1998年）中饰演，演奏贝斯并共同创作了12首歌曲中的五首。 “名人皮肤”是主要的关键和商业上的成功。它在美国的“ Billboard” 200张专辑排行榜和加拿大专辑排行榜中排名第9，以及其主打单曲和标题曲目在“ Billboard”现代摇滚曲目图表上排名第一。此后，它已在美国和加拿大获得铂金认证。在支持其发行的巡回演出之后，Auf der Maur于1999年10月与乐队的五年合同结束，她希望“在许多不同的方向上成长”。

Auf der Maur在1997年为他的1997年个人专辑“ Transizing”贡献了低音和背景声之后，于1997年与前汽车主持人Ric Ocasek短暂巡回演出。她与法国集团（French Group Indochine）合作创作了他们的歌曲“ Le Grand Secret”，并与Nicola Sirkis一起在法国演唱了二重奏，并在法国赢得了广泛的好评。 Auf der Maur在舞台上加入乐队，在各种场合表演这首歌，并出现在这首歌的音乐视频中。她在2002年2月22日在巴黎举行的印度支那表演中表演了一些罕见的，简短的声学，其中一些独奏歌曲。Aufder Maur为童年的朋友Rufus Wainwright的专辑“ Poses”贡献了低音和支持，并出现在他1998年的“ April Fools”的视频中。 2008年，她与加拿大音乐家丹尼尔·维克多（Daniel Victor）合作开展了他的音乐合作项目，从未出现白光。他们录制了歌曲“世界更黑暗”，为2008年3月发行了视频。除此之外，她还为瑞安·亚当斯（Ryan Adams），本·李（Ben Lee），爱达荷州（Ben Lee），爱达荷州（Ben Lee），爱达荷州，剧照和韦恩（Wayne）源泉等艺术家撰写了专辑。
report_src: Melissa Gaboriau auf der Maur出生于1972年3月17日[1]，据此计算，她在2023年已满51岁，并将在2024年3月17日迎来52岁生日。

question_en: When was the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez built?
pos_context_en: Built in the Magdalena Mixhuca public park in 1959, the circuit hosted its first Formula One Grand Prix in 1962, as a non-Championship race. The following year the Mexican Grand Prix became a full World Championship event. The circuit remained part of the F1 calendar through 1970, when spectator overcrowding caused unsafe conditions. When the track re-opened in 1986, the circuit boasted a new pit complex, as well as improved safety all around. In 2001 CIE and Forsythe Racing tasked D3 Motorsport Development with revamping the circuit. A redesign to include the Foro and a complete upgrade of the circuit was done. It saw a record crowd of 402,413 people attend a round of the CART Championship in 2002. As of 2018, the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez has been the only venue for the F1 Mexican Grand Prix.
neg_context_en: On September 20, 2016 Fernández's achievements have been recognised by the naming of Turn 12 of the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in his honour.

The 1987 Mexican Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race held at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez on October 18, 1987. It was the fourteenth round of the 1987 Formula One season. It was the 11th Mexican Grand Prix and the second since the Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez was renovated and returned to the World Championship calendar.

The Gran Premio Tecate was a round of the Champ Car World Series held on the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez circuit in Mexico City, Mexico. It was first held in 1980, and in its first two years of competition was the penultimate round of the championship. After its re-inception in 2002, it was the season-ending round. It was to have been the penultimate round of the 2007 season, but became the final round when the Grand Prix Arizona was cancelled.
This road-course race took place on March 5, 2006 at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City, Mexico. Boris Said won the pole.
The 1991 430 km of Mexico City was the seventh round of the 1991 World Sportscar Championship season, taking place at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. It took place on October 6, 1991.
EDC Mexico in Mexico City is scheduled to return to Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez for February 23-24, 2019.

The series kicked off at the Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez in Mexico City, with a non-points-paying race during the weekend of March 4, along with events from the Busch Series and the Rolex Sports Car Series. The race was won by Carlos Pardo (#14 Dodge), followed by Rafael Martínez (#19 Ford) and Freddy Tame, Jr. (#18 Ford).

The 1990 Mexican Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race held at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez on 24 June 1990. It was sixth race of the 1990 Formula One season, the 14th Mexican Grand Prix and the fifth since the Mexico City circuit returned to the Formula One calendar in 1986. It was held over 69 laps of the 4.4 kilometre circuit for a race distance of 305 kilometres.
EDC Mexico in Mexico City was planned for February 24–25 at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez.
The 1990 480 km of Mexico City was the ninth and final round of the 1990 World Sportscar Championship season, taking place at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez, Mexico. It took place on October 7, 1990.
question_src: Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez什么时候建造？
pos_context_src: 该巡回赛于1959年建于Magdalena Mixhuca公园，于1962年作为一场非冠军竞赛主持了其第一架一级方程式大奖赛。次年，墨西哥大奖赛成为了全球锦标赛。到1970年，当观众人满为患导致不安全的情况时，该电路一直是F1日历的一部分。当赛道在1986年重新开放时，该赛道拥有一个新的坑综合体，并提高了周围的安全性。 2001年，CIE和Forsythe Racing统治了D3 Motorsport开发，并改造了赛道。重新设计以包括FORO和电路的完整升级。它看到有402,413人参加的纪录人群参加了2002年的一次购物车锦标赛。截至2018年，AutódromoHermanosRodríguez是F1墨西哥大奖赛的唯一场所。
neg_context_src: 2016年9月20日，Fernández的成就得到了荣誉为荣誉Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez的第十二回合的认可。
1987年的墨西哥大奖赛是1987年10月18日在Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行的一级方程式赛车比赛。这是1987年第一赛季的第14轮。这是第11次墨西哥大奖赛，第二个是自AutódromoHermanosRodríguez进行了翻新并返回世界冠军日历以来的第二架。
Gran Premio Tecate是在墨西哥墨西哥城的Au​​todromo Hermanos Rodriguez巡回赛上举行的Champ Car World系列赛。它于1980年首次举行，比赛的头两年是冠军的倒数第二轮。在2002年重新融入后，这是赛季结束的回合。这是2007赛季的倒数第二轮，但是当亚利桑那州大奖赛被取消时，它成为了最后一轮。
这场路线竞赛于2006年3月5日在墨西哥墨西哥城的Au​​todromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行。鲍里斯说赢得了杆子。
1991年的430公里墨西哥城是1991年世界跑车冠军赛季的第七轮比赛，该冠军赛季在墨西哥的Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行。它发生在1991年10月6日。
墨西哥城的EDC墨西哥计划于2019年2月23日至24日返回Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez。
该系列赛在墨西哥城的Au​​todromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行，并在3月4日的周末举行了非点薪比赛，以及Busch系列和劳力士跑车系列的活动。这场比赛由卡洛斯·帕多（Carlos Pardo）（＃14道奇）赢得，其次是拉斐尔·马丁内斯（RafaelMartínez）（＃19福特）和小弗雷迪·塔姆（Freddy Tame，Jr。）（＃18福特）。
1990年的墨西哥大奖赛是一场一级方程式赛车比赛，1990年6月24日在Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行。这是1990年一级方程式赛季的第六次比赛，第14次墨西哥大奖赛和自1986年墨西哥城市巡回赛返回了一级方程式日历以来的第五次。它于1986年返回了4.4公里的69张赛程。
墨西哥城的EDC墨西哥市计划于2月24日至25日在Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行。
1990年的480公里墨西哥城是1990年世界跑车冠军赛季的第九轮也是最后一轮，发生在墨西哥的Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez。它发生在1990年10月7日。
report_src: Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez赛道建于1959年，地点位于墨西哥城的Magdalena Mixhuca公园[1]。

question_en: When was Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont born?
pos_context_en: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont (; – 23 December 1942) was a Russian symbolist poet and translator. He was one of the major figures of the Silver Age of Russian Poetry.
neg_context_en: Konstantin Balmont was born at his family's estate, Gumnishchi, Shuya (then Vladimir Governorate, now Ivanovo Oblast), the third of seven sons of a Russian nobleman, lawyer, and senior state official, Dmitry Konstantinovich Balmont, and Vera Nikolayevna (née Le′bedeva) who came from a military family. The latter knew several foreign languages, was enthusiastic about literature and theater, and exerted a strong influence on her son. Balmont learned to read at the age of five and cited Aleksandr Pushkin, Nikolai Nekrasov, Alexey Koltsov, and Ivan Nikitin as his earliest influences. Later he remembered the first ten years of his life spent at Gumnishchi with great affection and referred to the place as 'a tiny kingdom of silent comfort'.

On 27 September 1896 Balmont married Yekaterina Alekseyevna Andreyeva (1867–1952), a well-educated woman who came from a rich merchant's family, related to the well-known Moscow publishers, the Sabashnikovs. Andreyeva and Balmont had much in common; they formed a tandem of translators and worked together on the works of Gerhart Hauptmann and Oscar Wilde. Andreyeva, a strong-minded woman, was a leading force in the family, and in her 'strong, healthy and loving hands' (according Boris Zaitsev, who knew them well) Balmont led a "disciplined, working man's life." In 1901 their daughter Nina Balmont (Bruni in marriage, died in Moscow in 1989) was born.
In the early 1900s, while in Paris, Balmont met Yelena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya (1880–1943), general K. G. Tzvetkovsky's daughter, a student of mathematics at the University of Paris and the poet's ardent fan. Balmont, as some of his letters suggested, wasn't in love with her, but soon found himself in many ways dependent upon the girl who proved to be a loyal, devoted friend. Balmont's family life got seriously complicated in 1907 when Tsvetkovskaya gave birth to a daughter Mirra, named so by her father in the memory of the poet Mirra Lokhvitskaya, who died in 1905 and with whom he had passionate platonic relations. Torn between the two families, in 1909 Balmont attempted suicide for the second time (jumping out a window) and again survived. Up until 1917 he lived in Saint Petersburg with Tsvetkovskaya and Mirra, occasionally visiting Yekaterina and Nina in Moscow. While in France Balmont continued to correspond with Andreyeva up until 1934.

Balmont died on 23 December 1942 in a refuge for Russian emigres, the Russian House, due to complications from pneumonia. He is interred in Noisy-le-Grand's Catholic cemetery, four words engraved on his grey tomb: "Constantin Balmont, poete russe". Among the several people who came to the funeral were Zaitsev, Balmont's daughter Mirra, and Jurgis Baltrushaitis's widow.

From 1919 Balmont was romantically linked with Dagmar Shakhovskaya (née von Lilienfeld, 1893–1967), who followed Balmont to France in 1921. They lived apart except for brief periods, although Dagmar bore Balmont two children: Georges (1922–1943) and Svetlana (b. 1925). Balmont sent her letters or postcards almost daily; in all, 858 of them survived, mostly from 1920-1924. It was Elena Tsvetkovskaya, though, who remained with Balmont until his dying day. She died in 1943, surviving her husband by a year. Mirra Balmont (in her first marriage Boychenko, in the second Ayutina) was a published poet, who used the pseudonym Aglaya Gamayun. She died in Paris in 1970.

1918–1920 were years of great hardship for Balmont who, living in Petrograd (with Elena Tsvetkovskaya and their daughter Mirra) had also to support Andreyeva and their daughter Nina in Moscow. He struck up a friendship with Marina Tsvetayeva, another poet on the verge of physical collapse. Unwilling to collaborate with the Bolsheviks (whose "hands were smeared with blood," as he declared openly at one of the literary meetings) occasionally he had to be forced to. In 1920 Anatoly Lunacharsky (urged by Jurgis Baltrushaitis, then the head of the Lithuanian diplomatic mission in Moscow) granted Balmont permission to leave the country. Boris Zaitsev later opined that what Baltrushaitis did was actually to save Balmont's life. According to Sergey Litovtsev (a Russian critic who lived in immigration) at one of the secret meetings of the Cheka the fate of Balmont was discussed, "...it's just that those who were demanding he be put to a firing squad happened to be in the minority at the time." On May 25, 1920, Balmont and his family left Russia for good. As soon as Balmont reached Reval, rumors began to circulate that he had begun to make anti-Soviet public statements, leading to the cancellation of other writers' journeys out of Soviet Russia. Balmont denied these rumors, and there is no evidence to support them, but by 1921 Balmont was regularly publishing inflammatory articles against the Soviet government in the émigré press.

In 1890 Balmont released a self-financed book called "Collection of Poems" (Sbornik stikhotvoreny), which included some of the pieces published in 1885. Instrumental in helping the publication was Vladimir Korolenko, by then an established writer, who had received a handwritten notebook (sent to him by Konstantin's classmates) and sent back detailed and favorable critical analysis. He praised the schoolboy's eye for detail, warned against the occasional lapse of concentration, and advised him to "trust that unconscious part of the human soul which accumulates momentary impressions." "Should you learn to concentrate and work methodically, in due time we'll hear of your having developed into something quite extraordinary," were the last words of this remarkable letter. Balmont was greatly impressed with the famous writer's magnanimity and later referred to Korolenko as his 'literary godfather'. The book, though, proved to be a failure. Disgusted with it, Balmont purchased and burnt all the remaining copies. "My first book, of course, was a total failure. People dear to me have made this fiasco even less bearable with their negativism," he wrote in 1903, meaning apparently Larisa, but also his university friends who considered the book 'reactionary' and scorned its author for 'betraying the ideals of social struggle'. Again, Korolenko came to Balmont's aid: "The poor guy is very shy; more editorial attention to his work would make great difference," he wrote to Mikhail Albov, one of the editors of "Severny Vestnik", in September 1891.

In his 1903 short autobiography Balmont wrote: According to Yekaterina Andreyeva's "Memoirs", Balmont's paternal grand-grandfather Ivan Andreyevich Balamut (Баламут, the Ukrainian surname, translated literally as "trouble-maker") was a landowner in Kherson, Southern Ukraine, who served as a cavalry sergeant in Catherine the Great's Imperial Guard regiment (Andreyeva insisted she had seen the proof of it in an original parchment-written document kept in the family archives).

In March 1901 Balmont took part in a student demonstration on the square in front of Kazan Cathedral which was violently disrupted by police and Cossack units. Several days later, at a literary event in the Russian State Duma, he recited his new poem "The Little Sultan" (Malenkii sultan), a diatribe against Tsar Nicholas II, which then circulated widely in hand-written copies. As a result, Balmont was deported from the capital and banned for two years from living in university cities. On 14 March 1902 Balmont left Russia for Britain and France, lecturing at the Russian College of Social Sciences, Paris. While there he met Elena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya, the daughter of a prominent general, who in 1905 became his third (common-law) wife. In 1903 Balmont returned to Russia, his administrative restrictions having been removed by Interior Minister von Plehve. Back in Moscow, he joined Bryusov and Polyakov in the founding of the journal "Vesy" (The Scales), published by Scorpion.

In February 1889 he married Larisa Mikhailovna Garelina; unhappy in marriage, on 13 March 1890 Balmont attempted suicide by jumping from a third-story window, leaving him with a limp and an injured writing hand for the rest of his life. He was involved in two other common-law marriages and attempted suicide a second time later in life.
question_src: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont什么时候出生？
pos_context_src: Konstantin Dmitriyevich Balmont（;  -  1942年12月23日）是俄罗斯的象征主义诗人和翻译。他是俄罗斯诗歌银器时代的主要人物之一。
neg_context_src: 康斯坦丁·巴尔蒙特（Konstantin Balmont）出生于他的家人的庄园，舒亚（Shuya）（当时的弗拉基米尔省（Vladimir Confoctorate），现为伊瓦诺沃（Ivanovo）），是俄罗斯贵族，律师和州高级官员的七个儿子中的第三个儿子，dmitry konstantinovich balmont and vera nikolayevna and nikolayevna（neee eev）后者知道几种外语，对文学和戏剧充满热情，并对她的儿子产生了强大的影响。 Balmont学会了五岁的时候阅读，并以Aleksandr Pushkin，Nikolai Nekrasov，Alexey Koltsov和Ivan Nikitin为最早的影响力。后来，他想起了他一生的头十年在Gumnishchi度过，并以深情的方式称为“一个寂静的舒适王国”。

1896年9月27日，巴尔蒙特（Balmont）与Yekaterina Alekseyevna Andreyeva（1867-1952）结婚，他是一位受过良好教育的妇女，她来自富裕的商人家庭，与著名的莫斯科出版商Sabashnikovs有关。安德烈娃（Andreyeva）和巴尔蒙特（Balmont）有很多共同点。他们组成了翻译人员，并共同创作了Gerhart Hauptmann和Oscar Wilde的作品。安德烈娃（Andreyeva）是一位胸怀强大的女人，是家庭中的领导力量，在她的“坚强，健康和充满爱心的手”中（鲍里斯·扎特塞夫（Boris Zaitsev），她非常了解他们），巴尔蒙特（Balmont）带领“纪律严明的，劳动的人的生活”。 1901年，他们的女儿妮娜·巴尔蒙特（Nina Balmont）（1989年在莫斯科死于莫斯科的布鲁尼（Bruni））出生。
1900年代初，在巴黎，巴尔蒙特（Balmont）会见了Yelena Konstantinovna Tsvetkovskaya（1880- 1943年），K。G. Tzvetkovsky将军的女儿，巴黎大学和诗人的热心粉丝的数学学生。正如他的一些信所建议的那样，巴尔蒙特并不爱她，但很快就以许多方式依赖于被证明是忠实，虔诚的朋友的女孩。 1907年，当Tsvetkovskaya生下了一个女儿Mirra时，Balmont的家庭生活变得严重复杂，她的父亲为纪念诗人Mirra Lokhvitskaya命名，后者于1905年去世，并与他充满激情的柏拉图式关系。 1909年，巴尔蒙特（Balmont）在两个家庭之间撕裂，第二次自杀（跳出窗户），并再次幸存。直到1917年，他与Tsvetkovskaya和Mirra一起住在圣彼得堡，偶尔访问莫斯科的Yekaterina和Nina。到1934年，在法国，巴尔蒙特继续与安德烈瓦（Andreyeva）相对应。

由于肺炎并发症，巴尔蒙特（Balmont）于1942年12月23日在俄罗斯俄罗斯（Russian House）的俄罗斯埃米格雷斯（Emigres）避难所去世。他被埋葬在嘈杂的洛德（Loisy-Le）的天主教公墓中，刻在他的灰色坟墓上：“君士坦丁·巴尔蒙特（Constantin Balmont），诗人鲁斯（Russe）”。参加葬礼的几个人包括Zaitsev，Balmont的女儿Mirra和Jurgis Baltrushaitis的遗ow。

From 1919 Balmont was romantically linked with Dagmar Shakhovskaya (née von Lilienfeld, 1893–1967), who followed Balmont to France in 1921. They lived apart except for brief periods, although Dagmar bore Balmont two children: Georges (1922–1943) and Svetlana (b. 1925). Balmont几乎每天都会发送信件或明信片。总共有858个幸存下来，主要是1920  -  1924年。不过，正是埃琳娜·托斯沃夫斯卡亚（Elena Tsvetkovskaya）一直留在巴尔蒙特（Balmont），直到他垂死。她于1943年去世，生存了一年。米拉·巴尔蒙特（Mirra Balmont）（在第二次婚姻中，在第二个阿育蒂纳（Ayutina）的博伊琴科（Boychenko）中）是一位出版的诗人，他使用了化名Aglaya Gamayun。她于1970年在巴黎去世。

对于巴尔蒙特来说，1918年至1920年是巨大的艰辛，他们住在彼得格勒（与埃琳娜·托斯维特科夫斯卡亚（Elena Tsvetkovskaya）和他们的女儿米拉（Mirra）一起）也必须支持安德烈娃（Andreyeva）和他们的女儿妮娜（Nina）在莫斯科。他与玛丽娜·茨维塔耶耶娃（Marina Tsvetayeva）建立了友谊，这是另一个诗人陷入身体崩溃的地方。不愿与布尔什维克（Bolsheviks）合作（他的“双手被鲜血涂抹”，因为他在其中一次文学会议上公开宣布），偶尔必须被迫进行。 1920年，阿纳托利·卢纳卡斯基（Anatoly Lunacharsky）（由当时的莫斯科立陶宛外交使团负责人Jurgis Baltrushaitis敦促）授予Balmont许可离开该国。 Boris Zaitsev后来认为Baltrushaitis所做的实际上是为了挽救Balmont的生命。据谢尔盖·利托夫特塞夫（Sergey Litovtsev）（俄罗斯批评家的移民批评家）在契卡的一次秘密会议上，巴尔蒙特的命运被讨论了：“……只是那些要求他被送往少数民族的人。” 1920年5月25日，巴尔蒙特和他的家人永远离开俄罗斯。巴尔蒙特（Balmont）到达Reval时，有传言开始传播他开始发表反苏联公开声明，从而导致其他作家从苏联俄罗斯的旅程取消。巴尔蒙特否认了这些谣言，也没有证据支持它们，但是到1921年，巴尔蒙特定期在移民出版社向苏联政府发表炎症文章。

In 1890 Balmont released a self-financed book called "Collection of Poems" (Sbornik stikhotvoreny), which included some of the pieces published in 1885. Instrumental in helping the publication was Vladimir Korolenko, by then an established writer, who had received a handwritten notebook (sent to him by Konstantin's classmates) and sent back detailed and favorable critical analysis.他称赞了小学生的细节眼睛，警告不要偶尔集中注意力，并建议他“相信人类灵魂的无意识的一部分，积累了短暂的印象”。这本非凡的信件的最后一句话是：“如果您学会集中精力并有条不紊地工作，我们将听到您发展成非常非凡的事情。” Balmont对著名作家的宽容印象深刻，后来将Korolenko称为他的“文学教父”。但是，这本书被证明是失败的。 Balmont对此感到厌恶，购买并烧毁了所有剩余的副本。他在1903年写道：“当然，我的第一本书是完全失败的。我亲爱的人使这场惨败的人变得更加容易受到负面影响。”他在1903年写道，这显然是拉里萨（Larisa），也意味着他的大学朋友，他们认为这本书是“反动的”，并嘲笑了其作者，以``背叛社会斗争的理想''。再次，科洛伦科（Korolenko）来到了巴尔蒙特（Balmont）的帮助：“可怜的家伙非常害羞；对他的工作的更多社论将会有很大的不同，”他写信给1891年9月的“ Severny Vestnik”的编辑Mikhail Albov。
