The Sunday edition of "Morning", with Kuralt as host, was kept; it remains on the air under its original title, "CBS News Sunday Morning" (now hosted by Jane Pauley).

The February 1, 2009 broadcast celebrated "Sunday Morning"s 30th anniversary. Segments examined how the world has changed in the three decades since the program began, the history of Sundays in America and – as a tie-in to the show's logo – the physics of the sun. An artist was commissioned to create new sun logos for the program, which debuted on that edition and were used in future broadcasts. CBS News correspondent Steve Hartman periodically revisits some of Charles Kuralt's memorable personal profiles. On May 17, 2009, "CBS News Sunday Morning" began broadcasting in high-definition. In 2014, rebroadcasts of the program began airing on sister cable network Smithsonian Channel (owned by CBS's parent company CBS Corporation), but has since been pulled from that channel's programming.

CBS, in contrast, has struggled since television's early age to maintain a long-term morning program. Though it initially tried to mimic "Today" when it debuted a morning show in a two-hour format in 1954, the show was reduced to one hour within a year in order to make room for the new children's television series "Captain Kangaroo". The network abandoned the morning show in 1957. From the late 1960s throughout the 1970s, the "CBS Morning News" aired as a straight one-hour morning newscast that had a high rate of turnover among its anchors. In January 1979, the network launched the innovative "___day Morning" series, which focused more on lifestyle and feature reports; this format, however, was relegated exclusively to Sundays after two years, and still airs under the title "CBS News Sunday Morning". It was not until 1982 that "Captain Kangaroo" ended its run on weekdays (before ending altogether in 1984), allowing CBS to expand its morning show to a full two hours. However, the high rate of turnover among anchors returned. An ill-fated comedic revamp of the show, "The Morning Program", debuted in 1987. After that, however, came "This Morning", which has so far had the longest run of any of CBS' morning show attempts. "This Morning" was eventually cancelled 12 years later, being replaced by "The Early Show" in 1999; "The Early Show", in turn, ceded to the new version of "CBS This Morning" (this time featuring a format focused more on hard news and interviews, excising lifestyle and infotainment segments) in January 2012.

An exception to the usual Saturday format occurred on February 2, 2013 (the day before Super Bowl XLVII), when the weekday anchor team hosted from New Orleans (where the game was held at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome), an edition that was branded as simply "CBS This Morning" (instead of "CBS This Morning Saturday") and was formatted similarly to the weekday program, including "EyeOpener" segments at the top of both hours. "CBS This Morning" does not produce a Sunday edition, due to the presence of the long-running "CBS News Sunday Morning", a newsmagazine that debuted in 1979 (and is a remnant of a short-lived reformatting of the original "CBS Morning News" broadcast that lasted until 1982). In contrast to "CBS This Morning", "CBS Sunday Morning" has long led the ratings among the Sunday network morning shows.
In Australia, a trimmed version (for 70 minutes excluding commercials) of the "CBS This Morning" weekday edition currently airs on CBS's sister network (since November 2017) Network Ten, along with regional affiliate WIN Television, weekday mornings from 4am until 6am AEST, with the Friday edition held over to the following Monday. A national weather map of Australia is inserted during local affiliate cutaways for weather. Commercial advertising is inserted instead of the usual cutaway to local news, however, near-simultaneously with the other U.S. "Big Three" television networks' breakfast television programs, with ABC-TV's "Good Morning America" on the Nine Network from 3:30 a.m. and NBC's "Today" airing on the Seven Network from 4 a.m. It is subject to preemption in regional areas for paid and religious programming. Unlike the Nine Network and Seven Network, the weekend edition is not shown.

For its first year, the program was broadcast live one hour later than the Monday through Friday version of the original "CBS This Morning", starting at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time; however, it was based out of the same studio at the CBS Broadcast Center that was home to the weekday broadcast. The program moved to the 7:00 a.m. Eastern time slot (uniform with the weekday broadcast) in September 1998. Many CBS stations aired "CBS News Saturday Morning"/"The Saturday Early Show" in varying time slots; however, some affiliates opted to pre-empt the Saturday edition in favor of airing local morning newscasts, while some chose to carry the network's Saturday morning children's program block afterward if their newscast ended before 9:00 a.m. in order to make up for the pre-emption of the national program (something that remains the case with "CBS This Morning Saturday"). Production of the Saturday edition to the General Motors Building in 1999, when the weekday and Saturday programs were relaunched under "The Early Show" brand.

On Sunday, January 28, 1979, CBS revamped the program, premiering Morning, which was titled in accordance to the day of the week ("Monday Morning", "Tuesday Morning", etc.). The weekday "Morning" series competed with "Good Morning America" and "Today". Charles Kuralt hosted Sundays, while Bob Schieffer hosted the rest of the week; Kuralt took over the daily broadcasts as well starting on October 27, 1980. The program featured long-form pieces from CBS News bureaus, and many viewed it as a highbrow, classy newscast in the best CBS tradition. Despite critical acclaim, the program remained dead last in the ratings, and CBS was under more pressure from affiliates to present a more viable morning competitor. So on September 28, 1981, "Morning" dropped the days of the week from its title (except for "Sunday Morning"), was extended to 90 minutes and added Diane Sawyer as co-host; in the process, "Captain Kangaroo" was reduced to a half-hour daily and pushed to an earlier time period (7:00 a.m.).

On January 28, 1979, CBS launched "CBS News Sunday Morning" with Kuralt as host. On October 27, 1980, he was added as host of the weekday broadcasts of CBS' "Morning" show as well, being joined with Diane Sawyer as weekday co-host on September 28, 1981. Kuralt left the weekday broadcasts in March 1982, but continued to anchor the popular Sunday morning program until April 3, 1994, when he retired after 15 years as host and was succeeded by Charles Osgood.
question_src: CBS周日早上何时播出？
pos_context_src: CBS新闻周日上午是一项美国新闻杂志电视节目，自1979年1月28日以来一直在CBS上播出。由Robert Northshield和原始主持人Charles Kuralt创建，目前为90分钟的节目，目前9:00至10:30在上午9:00至10:30播出。其他地方）。自2016年10月9日以来，该节目由简·保利（Jane Pauley）主持，后者也发布了新闻节目，后者是在长期主持人查尔斯·奥斯古德（Charles Osgood）退休后。奥斯古德（Osgood）是22年的主持人（这是该计划最长的任期主持人），于1994年4月10日从库拉特（Kuralt）接管。
neg_context_title_src: 哥伦比亚广播公司今天早上
neg_context_src: 2014年4月27日，在“现在在哪里”的“现在在哪里”和“ CBS Sunday Mother”采访时，Pauley开始作为记者和偶尔的替代主持人为演出做出贡献。保利（Pauley）一直是“ CBS今天早上”的客座主持人，还曾在“ CBS晚报”上为Scott Pelley填补。 2016年9月25日宣布，保利将接任查尔斯·奥斯古德（Charles Osgood）退休后的“ CBS Sunday Moyr”的主持人。该节目的执行制片人兰德·莫里森（Rand Morrison）在一份声明中说：“当我们在“星期日早晨”做有关她的故事时，我们首先认识了简。 “我们的观众立即提出她属于“星期日早晨”的回应。而且 - 而且 - 通常情况下，他们是对的。她是一位敬业的，经验丰富的广播记者。但是 - 但 - 每一点都很重要 - 她很高兴与之合作。值得的继任者 - 非常适合。”

在1982年，工作日版本扩展到整整两个小时，并恢复了以前的“ CBS Morning News”标题，后来被1987年短暂的“早晨节目”取代。但是，周日版本幸存下来，并保留了其原始格式。每日版本结束很久之后，周日版的开幕序列一直显示一周中的所有七天，直到2000年代初。 2004年1月25日，“ CBS新闻周日早晨”庆祝了其25周年的片段和节目上四分之一世纪的亮点。主持人查尔斯·奥斯古德（Charles Osgood）展示了前主持人查尔斯·库拉特（Charles Kuralt）的剪辑。

1982年1月18日，再次以“袋鼠上尉”为代价，“早晨”被扩展到与“今天”和“ GMA”使用的两个小时格式。在此过程中，它放映了CBS Morning News的标题（不要与CBS的凌晨新闻广播《 CBS清晨新闻》混淆，后来被称为“ CBS Morning News”）。 1982年3月的工作日广播更换了库尔特。到了这个时候，管理层决定早间新闻节目应该更具竞争力，并雇用了比尔·库尔蒂斯（Bill Kurtis），这是芝加哥WBBM-TV的高度评价的晚间新闻广播的主持人，为索耶（Sawyer）的共同主持人。周日版的“早晨”（Morning）与库尔特（Kuralt）作为主持人。它以其原始标题“ CBS News Sunday Moyr”（现在由Jane Pauley主持）保持播出。

2009年2月1日，播出了“星期日早晨” 30周年。片段研究了该节目开始以来的三十年中，世界已经发生了变化，即美国周日的历史，以及 - 作为演出徽标的搭配 - 太阳的物理学。一位艺术家被委托为该节目创建新的Sun Logos，该计划在该版本上首次亮相，并在未来的广播中使用。 CBS新闻通讯员史蒂夫·哈特曼（Steve Hartman）定期重新审视查尔斯·库拉特（Charles Kuralt）令人难忘的个人资料。 2009年5月17日，“ CBS新闻周日早晨”开始以高清广播。 2014年，该计划的重新播放开始在姐妹有线网络史密森尼频道（CBS CBS Company CBS Corporation拥有）上播出，但此后已从该频道的编程中撤出。

相比之下，哥伦比亚广播公司自电视时期以来就一直在挣扎，以维持长期的早晨计划。尽管它最初试图模仿1954年以两个小时格式的早间演出时模仿“今日”，但该节目在一年内就减少到一小时，以便为新的儿童电视连续剧“袋鼠队长”腾出空间。该网络在1957年放弃了早晨的演出。从1970年代后期开始，“ CBS Morning News”作为一个直接一小时的早晨新闻广播播出，其锚点的营业率很高。 1979年1月，该网络启动了创新的“ ___日上午”系列，该系列更多地关注生活方式和功能报告。然而，这种格式仅在两年后才降级到周日，但仍以“ CBS News Sunday Moyr”为名。直到1982年，“袋鼠队长”才在工作日结束（在1984年完全结束），允许CBS将其早晨的演出扩大到整整两个小时。但是，锚点之间的离职率很高。命运的喜剧节目《早晨节目》于1987年首次亮相。然而，在那之后，“今天的早晨”是迄今为止CBS的早晨演出尝试中最长的演出。 “今天早晨”最终在12年后取消，被1999年的“早期表演”取代；反过来，2012年1月，“早期表演”又归结为新版本的“ CBS今天早晨”（这次以一种格式为重点是硬新闻和访谈，削减生活方式和信息娱乐领域的格式）。

通常的星期六格式的例外发生在2013年2月2日（超级碗XLVII的前一天），当时的工作日主播团队从新奥尔良举办（比赛在梅赛德斯 - 奔驰超级人会举行），该版本以“ CBS今天早上”为“ CBS”（Noie noike of This Meey oferement of This Meirterment of Togners of Leekertion and Togners and Weeking at of Weeking at of Weeking at of Weeking at of Weeking tode note neking teegrent''），并在周六的演出中均列出了同样的演出。两个小时。 “ CBS今天早上”没有生产周日版，这是因为长期运行的“ CBS News Sundy Moyr”的存在，该新闻杂志于1979年首次亮相（并且是对原始“ CBS Morning News”广播的短暂重新格式化的残余，直到1982年）。与“ CBS今天早上”相反，“ CBS Sunday Mother”长期以来一直领先于周日网络早晨展览中的收视率。
在澳大利亚，“ CBS今天早上”的“ CBS今天早晨”的修剪版本（不包括商业广告）目前在CBS的姊妹网络（自2017年11月以来）网络TEN上播出，以及区域会员赢家电视台，周日早上4点至凌晨6点，直到上午6点。在当地的会员发育中插入了澳大利亚的国家天气图，以供天气。商业广告是插入的，而不是与当地新闻的通常切割，但是与其他美国“三巨头”电视网络网络的早餐电视节目相比，ABC-TV的“早安美国”在上午3:30上的“早安美国”，NBC的“今日”网络在七个网络上在七个网络上播出。与九个网络和七个网络不同，周末版未显示。

该节目的第一年比周一至周五版本的原始“ CBS今天早上”的现场直播，从东部时间上午8:00开始；但是，它位于CBS广播中心的同一个工作室，该工作室是工作日广播的所在地。该计划于1998年9月搬到了上午7:00的东部时间段（与工作日广播的制服）。许多CBS车站在各种时段播出了“ CBS新闻星期六早上”/“星期六早期秀”；但是，一些分支机构选择在周六版本中抢先播放当地的晨报，而有些会员则选择随后将网络的周六早晨的儿童节目块携带，如果他们的新闻广播在上午9:00之前结束，以弥补国家计划的预先避免（这是与“今天的CBS星期六”的情况下的情况”）。 1999年，在“早期表演”品牌下重新启动了星期六版本的星期六版本，当时的通用汽车大楼。

1979年1月28日，星期日，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）对该计划进行了改进，首映的早晨，该节目的标题是根据一周的那天（“星期一早上”，“星期二早上”等）。工作日的“早晨”系列与“早安美国”和“今天”竞争。查尔斯·库拉特（Charles Kuralt）主持了周日，而鲍勃·希夫（Bob Schieffer）则在本周剩下的时间内举办。 Kuralt从1980年10月27日开始接管每日广播。该节目以CBS新闻局的长期作品为特色，许多人将其视为最佳CBS传统中的高潮，优雅的新闻广播。尽管受到了良好的好评，但该计划仍在评级中死亡，CBS承受着更大的压力，要求他们提出更可行的早晨竞争对手。因此，1981年9月28日，“早晨”从其头衔（除了“星期日早上”）下降了，延长到90分钟，并将黛安·索耶（Diane Sawyer）添加为共同主持人。在此过程中，“袋鼠上尉”每天减少到半小时，并将其推到更早的时间（上午7:00）。

1979年1月28日，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）与库拉特（Kuralt）担任主持人“ CBS新闻周日早晨”。 1980年10月27日，他也被加入了CBS的“早晨”节目的工作日广播，并与黛安·索耶（Diane Sawyer）一起担任1981年9月28日的工作日共同主持人。库尔特（Kuralt）于1982年3月离开了工作日，但继续将受欢迎的周日上午的节目锚定，直到1994年4月3日，他在1994年4月3日暂停了15年后的主持人，并在接待了15年之后。
report_src: 《CBS新闻周日早上》（CBS Sunday Morning）目前在美国东部时间每周日上午9:00至10:30于CBS电视网播出，全长约90分钟，不同地区会根据当地时区做相应调整 [1]。

question_en: Does XETV-TDT have a website?
pos_context_en: As the original American digital television transition date of 17 February 2009 approached, XETV had expressed intentions to follow other San Diego-area stations in ceasing transmission of its analog signal. While the U.S. switchover deadline of 17 February was later pushed back to 12 June 2009 and only applied to American-licensed stations in any case, plans were announced to voluntarily make the station's English-language programming digital-only. The analog signal would be repurposed to retransmit the Mexican Galavisión network (not to be confused with the American cable channel of the same name). Claims on XETV's website that the station was indeed going to transmit a digitally-exclusive signal were rescinded on 17 February 2009 as the station decided to delay cutting off its analog signal until after it secured approval from the Mexican government. XETV management later stated that it had decided to maintain its analog signal to benefit Mexican viewers. XETV's analog signal was eventually repurposed on 5 March 2012, when the station began multicasting on its digital signal with the addition of Televisa's youth-oriented Canal 5 network on subchannel 6.2 and on its analog feed, while digital channel 6.1 retained the newscasts, CW network and syndicated programs in English. On the same date, XHBJ-TV channel 45 dropped Canal 5 for Galavisión. Canal 5 replaced XETV's English-language programming on its analog signal, in order to serve Spanish-speaking viewers in Tijuana that did not have television sets with built-in digital tuners or digital converter boxes prior to the Tijuana market's 2013 transition to digital television. The affiliation switch coincided with the commencement of digital multicasting on Televisa's Tijuana stations. Canal 5 moved to its primary channel on 31 May 2017, at which point, the 6.2 subchannel was decommissioned.
neg_context_en: Because XETV-TDT is licensed to Tijuana by the Mexican government, it is not covered under the FCC's must carry rules. This means that local cable providers are not required to carry XETV-TDT, even if the television station requests to be carried under this provision. As an English-language station XETV had been carried by Cox Communications, Time Warner Cable (now Charter Spectrum) and AT&T U-verse in San Diego, all on channel 6. KFMB-TV's "The CW San Diego" has replaced XETV on the American cable systems, as well as satellite television providers DirecTV and Dish Network. XETV is carried by all Mexican cable systems in its coverage area, as carriage of local broadcast stations is mandated by the Federal Telecommunications Institute (IFT).

In October 2001, Grupo Televisa entered into a joint sales and programming agreement with Entravision Communications. Under this agreement, Entravision, which already operated UPN affiliate XHUPN-TV (channel 49, now MyNetworkTV affiliate XHDTV-TDT) under a local marketing agreement, took over the management of XETV and consolidated XHUPN's operations into XETV's facilities. The agreement expired in 2006; by 2007, Televisa, through Bay City Television, had retaken full control of XETV's operations.

Prior to the CW disaffiliation, syndicated programs broadcast by XETV () included "Maury", "Seinfeld", "The Insider", "Rules of Engagement", "The Doctors" and "2 Broke Girls". As the San Diego affiliate of The CW, XETV-TDT cleared the network's entire programming schedule on digital channel 6.1 until 30 May 2017, when some of these shows carried over to KFMB's "The CW San Diego" subchannel.

XETV-TDT, virtual channel 6 (UHF digital channel 23), is a Mexican free-to-air television station located in Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico, carrying the Canal 5 network. XETV's terrestrial signal also covers the San Diego, California area across the international border in the United States. The station is owned by Mexican media company Grupo Televisa, and its technical operations and transmitter facilities are located on Mount San Antonio in Tijuana.

In 2000, XETV began transmitting a digital signal on UHF channel 23, becoming the first San Diego area station to begin digital television transmissions. It was also the first television station in Mexico to operate a digital signal; no other Mexican television station had begun digital operations at that time, and a digital television standard was not formally selected until 2004. It maps on digital tuners in both countries as virtual channel 6.1 through PSIP technology. In January 2006, the Secretariat of Communications and Transportation, which at the time still regulated broadcasting in Mexico, gave formal authorization for XETV's digital signal, with the full callsign XETV-TDT (a suffix standing for "Televisión digital terrestre", or Digital terrestrial television) and an effective radiated power of 402.8 kilowatts.

XETV retained virtual channel 6 after a major reshuffle of Mexican virtual channels in October 2016, which ordered all existing Mexican national networks to realign their virtual channels based on the flagship channel numbers in Mexico City. XETV then was temporarily the only station using a channel 6 assignment throughout Mexico, because the IFT reserved channel 6 for a potential fourth national network; as of February 2018, channel 6 has been assigned nationwide to Multimedios Televisión, which re-numbered all of their stations (including construction concessions that include the CDMX and Guadalajara regions) to that number (currently, Multimedios has no plans to expand their network to Tijuana, though its sister news network Milenio Television began an affiliation with XHDTV-TDT in September 2018). Virtual channel 5 is not available to XETV because of signal overlap between XETV and KTLA (owned by Tribune, and broadcasting on virtual channel 5), primarily around Oceanside, California; most Tijuana stations face similar signal overlap issues in this area to Los Angeles stations that preclude them from using the virtual channels that correspond to their networks.

Bay City Television, the Televisa subsidiary which operated XETV from San Diego, concurrently ceased operations on 31 May; unusually, the same repeat episode of "The King of Queens" that ended XETV's run as an English-language station near midnight local time, launched KFMB-DT2's run as a CW affiliate three minutes later. By Dunning's estimate, about 150 full-time, part-time, and freelance staffers were laid off between the closure of the news department on 31 March and the corporate shutdown. In addition to ending channel 6's affiliation with The CW three months earlier than scheduled, the closure of Bay City Television concluded XETV's 64-year history of serving San Diego with English-language programming; the move left MyNetworkTV affiliate XHDTV-TDT as the sole Mexican-licensed station providing English-language programming to the San Diego market.

The announcement of The CW's move to KFMB left XETV's future in question, with a station spokesperson stating on the day of the announcement that the station was evaluating its options. The station would reveal its plans on 26 January; on that date, it announced that news programming on XETV would be discontinued following the conclusion of the 10:00 p.m. newscast on 31 March 2017. Then, at midnight on 31 May and at the network's request, the CW affiliation moved to KFMB-TV's 8.2 subchannel. KFMB-TV also purchased substantially all of XETV's syndicated program inventory to run on the new subchannel, which it branded as "The CW San Diego". XETV then moved Canal 5 programming from its 6.2 subchannel to its main 6.1 subchannel, making the station a full-time Spanish-language outlet for the first time in its history. XETV had initially indicated it would transmit the Gala TV network, already seen in the Tijuana/San Diego area on XHBJ-TDT (channel 45), but later retracted that statement.

During a seminar by Sam Zell on 25 March 2008, it was announced that Tribune Broadcasting (which Zell had acquired the previous year as part of his takeover of corporate parent Tribune Company) had signed an affiliation agreement with Fox for its San Diego CW affiliate KSWB-TV (channel 69). Fox cited concerns with having its programming airing on a Mexican-licensed station, even though XETV had been with the network since Fox's inception and had broadcast its programming almost entirely in English for over half a century. This caught XETV station management off guard as officials were unaware about the pending affiliation switch until the announcement was made public.

XETV had originally carried a local newscast from the station's sign-on in 1953 until its news department was shut down in 1967 (Lionel Van Deerlin, later a congressman representing San Diego in the U.S. House of Representatives, served as news director during XETV's early years). In 1980, during its tenure as an independent station, XETV began running local news updates throughout the day; these continued to air until several months prior to the station's affiliation with Fox in October 1986. Although then-general manager Martin Colby originally stated that XETV would not offer a newscast, in response to then-Fox President Barry Diller's comments during the 1991 Television Critics Association Convention in pushing for Fox's affiliates to produce local newscasts that the network "won't tolerate any affiliate that is not in the news business," XETV began reconsidering the possibility of launching a news department.
question_src: XETV-TDT有网站吗？
pos_context_src: 随着2009年2月17日的最初美国数字电视过渡日期的临近，XETV表示打算遵循其他圣地亚哥地区站，以停止其模拟信号的传播。尽管2月17日的美国切换截止日期后来被推迟到2009年6月12日，并且在任何情况下仅适用于美国许可的车站，但宣布宣布自愿使该电台的英语编程仅数字化数字化。模拟信号将被重新使用以重新传播墨西哥Galavisión网络（不要与同名的美国有线通道相混淆）。 XETV网站上的声称，该电台确实将在2009年2月17日被取消，因为该电台决定将其模拟信号推迟到获得墨西哥政府的批准后，该电视台被撤销。 XETV管理层后来表示，它已决定维持其模拟信号，以使墨西哥观众受益。 XETV的模拟信号最终于2012年3月5日重新利用，当时该电台开始在其数字信号上进行数字播放，并在Subchannel 6.2上添加了Televisa面向青年的Canal 5 Network和Analog Feed，而Digital Channel 6.1则保留了新闻广播，CW网络，CW网络，CW网络和英文中的合成程序。在同一日期，XHBJ-TV频道45丢下了Galavisión的运河5。 Canal 5在其模拟信号上取代了XETV的英语节目，以便在蒂华纳（Tijuana）中为讲西班牙语的观众服务，这些观众在蒂华纳市场（Tijuana Market）2013年的2013年过渡到数字电视之前，没有内置的数字调谐器或数字转换器盒有电视机。隶属开关与Televisa Tijuana Stations上数字多播的开始。运河5于2017年5月31日移至其主要渠道，此时，6.2个亚渠道已退役。
neg_context_src: 由于墨西哥政府已将XETV-TDT授予蒂华纳，因此FCC的必须携带规则不涵盖。这意味着，即使电视台请求根据此规定携带，也不需要本地有线提供商携带XETV-TDT。作为英语电台XETV是由Cox Communications，Time Warner Cable（现为宪章频谱）和圣地亚哥的AT＆T U-verse携带的，所有这些都在第6频道的第6频道上。KFMB-TV的“ CW San Diego”取代了美国电缆系统上的XETV，以及卫星电视台Directer directer directv and DiseNewert。 XETV由所有墨西哥电缆系统在其覆盖范围内携带，因为联邦电信研究所（IFT）要求当地广播电台的运输。

2001年10月，Grupo Televisa与Ertravision Communications签订了联合销售和编程协议。根据本协议，已经经营UPN会员Xhupn-TV（第49频道，现为MynetworkTV会员XHDTV-TDT）的Entravision接管了XETV的管理层，并将Xhupn的运营合并为XETV的设施。该协议于2006年到期；到2007年，Televisa通过Bay City电视台，已经完全控制了XETV的运营。
在CW脱落之前，由XETV（）播出的联合计划包括“ Maury”，“ Seinfeld”，“ Insider”，“订婚规则”，“医生”和“ 2 Broke Girls”。作为CW的圣地亚哥分支机构，XETV-TDT清除了该网络在数字频道6.1上的整个编程时间表，直到2017年5月30日，当时其中一些节目延续到了肯德基的“ CW San Diego”子渠道。
XETV-TDT，虚拟频道6（UHF Digital Channel 23），是位于墨西哥巴哈加利福尼亚州蒂华纳市的墨西哥免费电视台，载有运河5网络。 XETV的地面信号还涵盖了美国国际边界的加利福尼亚州圣地亚哥地区。该电台由墨西哥媒体公司Grupo Televisa拥有，其技术运营和发射机设施位于蒂华纳山的圣安东尼奥。

在2000年，XETV开始在UHF Channel 23上传输数字信号，成为第一个开始数字电视传输的圣地亚哥地区车站。这也是墨西哥第一个操作数字信号的电视台。当时还没有其他墨西哥电视台开始进行数字运营，直到2004年才正式选择数字电视标准。它以PSIP技术为虚拟频道6.1，在两国的数字调谐器上映射。 2006年1月，当时仍在墨西哥进行广播的通讯和运输秘书处，授予了XETV的数字信号的正式授权，并带有完整的呼叫XETV-TDT（代码为“TelevisiónDigital Terrestre”的后缀，或者是“数字地面电视”），有效的辐射功率为402.8 K K K K K K I辐射。

XETV在2016年10月进行了墨西哥虚拟频道的重新改组后保留了虚拟频道，该频道命令所有现有的墨西哥国家网络根据墨西哥城的旗舰频道编号重新调整其虚拟渠道。 XETV当时是暂时使用墨西哥第6频道任务的唯一一个站，因为IFT保留了第四个国家网络的第6频道；截至2018年2月，第6频道已在全国范围内分配给MultimediosTelevisión，该电视连续将其所有电视台（包括包括CDMX和Guadalajara地区在内的建筑优惠）重新分配给该数字（目前，MultiMedios没有计划向Tijuana扩展到Tijuana News NewsEnternio Televiation andiriation Milenio Mileniation ins Sectiriation x. Nosporiation and ins ins neptiriation x.由于XETV和KTLA之间的信号重叠（由Tribune拥有，并且在Virtual Channel 5上的广播），XETV无法使用虚拟频道。大多数蒂华纳电台在该区域与洛杉矶电台面临类似的信号重叠问题，这些问题排除了他们使用与其网络相对应的虚拟渠道。

Bay City电视台是Televisa子公司，该子公司从圣地亚哥运营了XETV，并于5月31日停止了运营；不寻常的是，“皇后之王”的相同重复剧集结束了XETV在当地时间附近的英语电台结束，并在三分钟后推出了KFMB-DT2的跑步。根据邓宁的估计，大约150名全日制，兼职和自由职业员工在3月31日新闻部关闭与公司关闭之间被解雇。除了结束第6频道的隶属与CW的隶属关系之外，贝城电视台的关闭还结束了XETV的64年历史，其中包括英语节目的圣地亚哥为圣地亚哥提供服务；此举离开了MynetworkTV会员XHDTV-TDT，作为唯一的墨西哥许可电台，为圣地亚哥市场提供了英语语言节目。

CW搬到肯德基的宣布使XETV的未来留下了有关的未来，车站发言人在宣布该电台评估其选择的那天发言人。该车站将于1月26日揭示其计划；在那个日期，它宣布在晚上10:00结束后，XETV上的新闻节目将被停止。新闻广播将于2017年3月31日。然后，在5月31日午夜，应网络的要求，CW隶属关系转移到了KFMB-TV的8.2子通道。 KFMB-TV还基本购买了XETV的所有联合计划库存，以在新的子渠道上运行，并以“ CW San Diego”的烙印。然后，XETV将运河5编程从其6.2子渠道移动到其主要6.1子渠道，使该电台成为其历史上第一次成为全职西班牙语渠道。 XETV最初表示它将传输盛大的电视网络，该网络已经在XHBJ-TDT（第45频道）的Tijuana/San Diego地区看到，但后来撤回了该声明。

在萨姆·泽尔（Sam Zell）于2008年3月25日举行的研讨会上，宣布Tribune Broadcasting（Zell作为对公司父母Tribune Company的接管的一部分获得了前一年）已与Fox签署了与FOX的隶属协议，以获得其San Diego CW Affiliate KSWB-TV（69频道）。福克斯（Fox）引用了担心其编程在墨西哥许可的电台上播出的问题，尽管XETV自Fox成立以来一直在网络上使用，并且已经在半个多世纪的时间内完全用英语广播了其编程。这使XETV站管理措施措手不及，因为官员们对待定的隶属开关没有意识到，直到公告公开为止。

XETV最初是在1953年从该电台的登录处携带的当地新闻广播，直到其新闻部门于1967年关闭（后来是一名代表圣地亚哥在美国众议院代表圣地亚哥的国会议员的莱昂内尔·范·戴尔林（Lionel van Deerlin）在XETV早期担任新闻总监）。 1980年，在担任独立电台的任期期间，XETV全天开始运行本地新闻更新。这些一直持续到1986年10月该电台与福克斯隶属的几个月之前。尽管当时的经理马丁·科尔比（Martin Colby）表示，XETV不会提供新闻广播，以回应当时的福克斯总统巴里·迪勒（Barry Diller）在1991年在1991年的电视节目电视批评协会中最初推动福克斯（Fox）的新闻社会的新闻社会的发起人的新闻社会“不耐心启动``无需），这是“不耐心的，”启动新闻部的可能性。
report_src: 有。文件明确提到“XETV网站上的声称”，表明XETV-TDT（当时称XETV）拥有自己的官方网站，用以发布关于模拟信号停播与频道调整等公告，因此可以确认该台设有网站[1]。

question_en: How old is Captain Cold?
pos_context_en: Created by John Broome and Carmine Infantino, the character made his first appearance in "Showcase" #8 (June 1957).
neg_context_en: In the 2008 miniseries "", Captain Cold and the Rogues briefly joined Libra's Secret Society of Super Villains. In "" story, however, Cold and the rest of the Rogues reject Libra's offer, wanting to stay out of the game. Before they can retire, they hear of Inertia escaping and decide to stick around long enough to get revenge for being used. Cold and his group are challenged by a new set of Rogues, formed by Libra to be their replacements. The new group, having kidnapped Cold's father, challenge the Rogues, and are defeated and killed. Cold goes to his father, talking to him about the abuse he suffered, and the fate of his sister. After the elder Snart insults him and his mother, calling them weak, Cold punches him, but finds himself unable to kill him, instead getting Heat Wave to do it. The Rogues have their confrontation with Inertia, despite interference by Zoom and Libra, and kill Inertia. Libra then reveals that he needs the Rogues because Barry Allen has returned from the dead, and the Flashes are potential threats to him and Darkseid. Though shocked by the news that Allen is alive, Cold still rejects his offer of membership. After regrouping, Cold and the other Rogues agree not to retire, claiming that the game is back on. In "Final Crisis" #7, someone that looks like Captain Cold appears as a Justifier and is seen fighting the Female Furies alongside the other Justifiers under Lex Luthor's control.

Captain Cold was declared the leader of the Flash's Rogues Gallery. His skill and experience have made him a strong leader to the likes of the Weather Wizard, the new Trickster, the new Mirror Master, and the new Captain Boomerang. Len seems to have taken the young Captain Boomerang under his wing, after the elder Boomerang was recently killed. Tabloids rumoured that Captain Cold's sister, the Golden Glider, was Boomerang's mother, making him Captain Cold's nephew. This turned out to be false, however, as the new Boomerang's mother has been revealed to be Meloni Thawne, who is also the mother of Bart Allen. Despite his more ruthless nature as of late, Captain Cold's heart is not completely frozen, evidenced by having sent flowers to honor Sue Dibny, murdered wife of the Elongated Man.

In the timeline of the 2011 company-wide reboot of all its superhero titles, The New 52, Captain Cold is reintroduced as a younger man than in the previous timeline and now with his Rogues lives with a code to never kill. His origin remains the same, however, his sister Lisa has not been the Golden Glider, and is instead dying of cancer. Upon learning that the hospital does not have enough energy to power a laser that could save her life, because of an EMP seemingly caused by the Flash, Cold blames him for everything that has happened to him, including a falling out with the Rogues, and decides to break the rules of their "game" and kill the Flash. Captain Cold has undergone experiments that have given him ice-based metahuman powers, including the ability to slow down the molecules around him, creating a field of inertia that reduces the Flash's speed to human level, allowing Captain Cold to touch him and effortlessly beat him. He and the Rogues are set to return, but later defeated them with help from Flash, and the Pied Piper.

During the events of "Underworld Unleashed", Captain Cold lost his soul to Neron but Wally West brought it back to the land of the living. He soon returned to crime, this time a member of Wally's Rogues Gallery. The Rogues had first been assembled when another Flash foe, the super-intelligent Gorilla Grodd had broken them out of jail to distract the Flash. The Golden Glider had abandoned her bounty hunter career and had started partnering with a series of thugs who she dressed in a costume, armed with a copy of Captain Cold's signature Cold Gun, and called Chillblaine. Already distraught over the death of her lover, the Top, it seemed that the supposed death of her brother pushed her over the edge. But the last Chillblaine was a little smarter and more vicious. He murdered the Golden Glider, prompting Captain Cold to hunt him down, torture him and kill him by freezing his outer layer of skin and then pushing him off a high rise building. Not long after that, Snart was framed by a new incarnation of Mister Element. He used his Element Gun to simulate Cold's gun, using ice and cold to murder several police officers before Captain Cold and the Flash discovered who was actually responsible. With the death of his sister, and having killed Chillblaine and Mr. Element in vengeance, Cold has again become an unrepentant criminal. However, during a confrontation with Brother Grimm, Cold actually worked with Wally West to defeat the powerful magic user, although this was mainly because he and Mirror Master had been betrayed by Grimm and wanted revenge.

Traditionally, Captain Cold is driven by three things: money, women, and the desire to beat Barry Allen. Although not the lecher that Captain Boomerang was, Len Snart has an eye for the ladies, particularly models. When Barry Allen died, Captain Cold drifted for a while, jumping back and forth over the lines of crime and justice. He was captured by the Manhunter and served time in the Suicide Squad, worked with his sister as a bounty hunter (Golden Snowball Recoveries), and, with his longtime friend and sometimes nemesis Heat Wave, encountered Fire and Ice of the Justice League. He has teamed up with various villains over the years other than the many Rogues. These include Catwoman and the Secret Society of Super Villains. His favorite baseball team is the Houston Astros.

Captain Cold (Leonard Snart) is a fictional supervillain/antihero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. Captain Cold is the leader of the Rogues, a loose criminal association, as well as the older brother of Golden Glider. An acquaintance of the various superheroes known as the Flash, he has served as a bitter enemy to Barry Allen, both enemy and grudging friend to Wally West, and one of the regretting killers of Bart Allen. As part of 2011's The New 52 reboot, Captain Cold is a villain that with his team The Rogues lives by a code to never kill and sometimes can be perceived as a hero.

In the 2009–2010 "Blackest Night" storyline, the Rogues realize that the bodies of various dead Rogues are missing and prepare to fight them. Captain Cold knows that his sister, the Golden Glider, is among the reanimated Black Lanterns but is still ready to lead the Rogues against the zombies. He is confronted by the Black Lantern Glider, who attempts to use his feelings of love for her against him. However, Captain Cold manages to suppress these feelings long enough for him to fight back, freezing her within a block of ice. He subsequently kills Owen Mercer by throwing him into a pit with his Black Lantern father when he learns that Owen has been feeding people to his father in the belief that consuming flesh will restore him to life, informing Owen that Rogues do not kill women and children.

In the New 52 universe Captain Cold temporarily had metahuman ice powers, including the power to slow down the Flash or objects traveling at high velocities via molecular deceleration caused by Absolute Zero, but these powers are later lost in the "Forever Evil" series when he is attacked by Deathstorm- the Earth-3 counterpart of Firestorm- with Cold reverting to using his classic ice gun. Despite his lack of professional or technical expertise, Cold states that he spent so long analyzing the parts of his cold gun that he is able to recreate it in just over half an hour using parts stolen from a standard electronics shop. He's even skilled enough to program it for a host of unique effects simulating some of his powers; like his "Cold Field" which quick cools the atmosphere to the point everything caught in it grinds to a halt, or an auto activation function which triggers his Cold Gun's freeze ray via vocalized password input.
ㅞ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅞ is U+315E.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.
question_src: 冷船长多大了？
pos_context_src: 该角色由约翰·布鲁姆（John Broome）和胭脂红（Carmine Infantino）创作，在＃8（1957年6月）中首次亮相。
neg_context_src: 在2008年的迷你剧《》中，冷酷队长和流氓短暂加入了天秤座的超级恶棍秘密协会。然而，在“”故事中，寒冷和其他流氓拒绝了天秤座的提议，希望远离游戏。在他们退休之前，他们听说惯性逃脱，并决定坚持足够长的时间，以报仇。寒冷和他的团队受到新的流氓的挑战，由天秤座形成，是他们的替代者。新组织被绑架了冷的父亲，挑战了流氓，并被击败和杀害。感冒向他的父亲说，与他谈论他所遭受的虐待以及姐姐的命运。长老鼻子侮辱了他和他的母亲，称他们为虚弱，冷酷地打了他，但发现自己无法杀死他，而是得到热浪。尽管Zoom和Libra受到干扰，但Rogues仍与惯性对抗，并杀死了惯性。天秤座随后透露，他需要流氓，因为巴里·艾伦（Barry Allen）从死里复活了，闪光是对他和Darkseid的潜在威胁。尽管对艾伦还活着的消息感到震惊，但冷仍然拒绝了他的会员资格。重新组合后，Cold和其他Rogues同意不退休，声称游戏重新开始。在“最终危机”＃7中，看起来像冷船长的人似乎是辩护者，并且被认为与Lex Luthor在控制下的其他义士一起战斗。

Cold船长被宣布为Flash的Rogues画廊的负责人。他的技巧和经验使他成为天气向导，新骗子，新镜子大师和新船长Boomerang之类的强大领导者。在最近的Boomerang最近被杀后，Len似乎将年轻的Boomerang带到了他的翅膀下。小报有传言说，冷酷的姐姐金滑翔机是Boomerang的母亲，使他成为Cold上尉的侄子。然而，这是错误的，因为新的Boomerang的母亲被发现是Meloni Thawne，他也是Bart Allen的母亲。尽管他最近更加无情的天性，但Cold上尉的心并没有完全冻结，这证明了曾派鲜花来纪念延长的男人的谋杀妻子Sue Dibny。

在2011年全公司范围内所有超级英雄冠军的时间表中，新的52号船长比以前的时间表重新引入了Cold船长，现在他的流氓以永不杀死的代码生活。然而，他的起源保持不变，他的姐姐丽莎（Lisa）并不是金滑翔机，而是死于癌症。在得知医院没有足够的能量来为可以挽救她的生命的激光供电，因为似乎是由闪光灯造成的EMP，Cold将他归咎于他发生的一切，包括与Rogues脱颖而出，并决定破坏他们的“游戏”规则并杀死闪光灯。 Cold上尉进行了实验，使他赋予了基于冰的元人类力量，包括能够减慢他周围分子的能力，创造了一个惯性领域，从而将闪光灯的速度降低到人类水平，使Cold船长能够触摸他并毫不费力地击败了他。他和流氓将返回，但后来在Flash和Pied Piper的帮助下击败了他们。

在“黑社会释放”的事件中，冷船长将自己的灵魂输给了内隆，但沃利·韦斯特（Wally West）将其带回了生活之地。他很快回到了犯罪，这次是沃利的流氓画廊的成员。当另一个闪光敌人，超级智慧的大猩猩格罗德（Gorilla Grodd）将它们从监狱中分散出来，以分散闪光的注意力时，这些流氓首先是组装。金滑翔机放弃了她的赏金猎人事业，并开始与一系列穿着服装的暴徒合作，并配备了Cold上尉的招牌冷枪的副本，并称为Chillblaine。她的爱人的死亡已经心烦意乱，看来她的兄弟的死亡使她推到了边缘。但是最后一个Chillblaine有点聪明，更恶毒。他谋杀了金色滑翔机，促使Cold船长追捕他，折磨他并冻结他的皮肤外层，然后将他从高层建筑中推开。此后不久，Snart被Mister Emplem先生的新化身所构成。他用元素枪模拟了Cold的枪，在Cold上尉之前，使用冰和冷谋杀了几名警察，而Flash发现了谁实际上是负责任的。随着他姐姐的去世，杀死了Chillblaine和Element先生，Cold再次成为一个毫无罪的罪犯。但是，在与格林兄弟的对抗中，Cold实际上与Wally West合作击败了强大的魔术用户，尽管这主要是因为他和Mirror Master被Grimm背叛并想报仇。

传统上，冷船长由三件事驱动：金钱，女人和击败巴里·艾伦的愿望。尽管不是Boomerang上尉的Lecher，但Len Snart还是关注女士，尤其是模特。当巴里·艾伦（Barry Allen）去世时，冷船长漂流了一段时间，在犯罪和正义的路线上来回跳跃。他被追捕者俘虏，并在自杀小队中度过了一段时间，与姐姐一起担任赏金猎人（金雪球恢复），并与他的长期朋友，有时甚至克星夫妻热浪一起遇到了正义联盟的火和冰。多年来，除了许多流氓以外，他与各种恶棍合作。其中包括猫女和超级恶棍的秘密协会。他最喜欢的棒球队是休斯顿太空人队。

Cold上尉（伦纳德·斯纳特（Leonard Snart））是由DC Comics出版的《美国漫画书》中出现的虚构的Supperillain/Antihero。冷船长是Rogues的负责人，一个松散的犯罪协会以及Golden Glider的哥哥。他的熟人被称为“闪光灯”，他曾是巴里·艾伦（Barry Allen）的痛苦敌人，敌人和渴望的朋友沃利·韦斯特（Wally West），也是巴特·艾伦（Bart Allen）的遗憾杀手之一。作为2011年新的52重新启动的一部分，Cold上尉是一个恶棍，他的团队与Rogues一起以永不杀死的代码生活，有时可以将其视为英雄。

在2009  -  2010年的“最黑夜”故事情节中，流氓意识到各种死亡的尸体都缺失了，并准备与之抗争。冷船长知道他的姐姐金滑翔机是复兴的黑色灯笼之一，但仍准备带领僵尸对阵僵尸。他面临着黑灯笼滑翔机，他试图利用对她的爱情对他的爱。但是，Cold船长设法抑制了这些感觉足够长的时间，让他反击，将她冻结在冰块中。随后，当他得知欧文一直在向他的父亲喂养人们时，他将他与黑灯笼父亲一起扔进坑，以杀死欧文·默瑟（Owen Mercer），因为他认为食用肉会使他恢复生命，并告知欧文，流氓不会杀死妇女和儿童。

在新的52个宇宙中，寒冷的船长暂时具有元人性冰的力量，包括通过绝对零引起的分子减速以高速降低闪光的能力，但后来，这些力量在“永远的邪恶”系列中丢失了，当他被Deather-Storm-the Deatherstorm-the Deather-Storm-the Earth-3 The Earth-3-3-3-3-3与他使用经典的Ice Ice guns grounding of Colding of colly ground grounder grounder grounder the Earth-the Earth-3-3。尽管他缺乏专业或技术专业知识，但Cold指出，他花了很长时间分析冷枪的部分，以至于他能够在短短半小时内使用标准电子商店偷来的零件来重新创建它。他甚至足够熟练地编程它，以模拟他的某些力量，以进行许多独特的效果。就像他的“冷场”快速冷静下来，到达陷入困境的所有东西都会停止，或者是自动激活功能，该功能通过发声密码输入触发了他的冷枪的冷冻射线。
ㅞ是朝鲜hangul之一。 ㅞ的Unicode是U+315E。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。
report_src: “冷船长”（Captain Cold）是一位虚构漫画角色，他在《Showcase》​​第 8 期中于 1957 年 6 月首次亮相，由约翰·布鲁姆和胭脂红创作[1]。如果按照这一首次登场时间计算，到 2024 年该角色诞生已有约 67 年历史。

question_en: What was the largest city in the Gupta Empire?
pos_context_en: The city also became a flourishing Buddhist centre boasting a number of important monasteries. It remained the capital of the Gupta dynasty (3rd–6th centuries) and the Pala Dynasty (8th-12th centuries). The city was largely in ruins when visited by Xuanzang, and suffered further damage at the hands of Muslim raiders in the 12th century. Afterwards, Sher Shah Suri made Pataliputra his capital and changed the name to modern Patna.
neg_context_en: The Gupta Empire had their capital at Pataliputra. The difference between Gupta Empire's and Mauryan Empire's administration was that in the Mauryan administration power was centralised but in the Gupta administration power was more decentralised. The empire was divided into provinces and the provinces were further divided into districts. Villages were the smallest units. The kingdom covered Gujarat, North-East India, south-eastern Pakistan, Odisha, northern Madhya Pradesh and eastern India with capital at Pataliputra, modern Patna. All forms of worship were carried out in Sanskrit.

The Gupta Empire was an ancient Indian empire existing from the mid-to-late 3rd century CE to 590 CE. At its zenith, from approximately 319 to 550 CE, it covered much of the Indian subcontinent. This period is called the "Golden" Age of India by some historians. The ruling dynasty of the empire was founded by the king Sri Gupta; the most notable rulers of the dynasty were Chandragupta I, Samudragupta, and Chandragupta II alias Vikramaditya. The 5th-century CE Sanskrit poet Kalidasa credits the Guptas with having conquered about twenty-one kingdoms, both in and outside India, including the kingdoms of Parasikas, the Hunas, the Kambojas, tribes located in the west and east Oxus valleys, the Kinnaras, Kiratas, and others.

During the reign of Chandragupta II, Gupta Empire maintained a large army consisting of 500,000 infantry, 50,000 cavalry, 20,000 charioteers and 10,000 elephants along with a powerful navy with more than 1200 ships. Chandragupta II controlled the whole of the Indian subcontinent; the Gupta empire was the most powerful empire in the world during his reign, at a time when the Roman Empire in the West was in decline.

A study of the epigraphical records of the Gupta empire shows that there was a hierarchy of administrative divisions from top to bottom. The empire was called by various names such as "Rajya", "Rashtra", "Desha", "Mandala", "Prithvi" and "Avani". It was divided into 26 provinces, which were styled as "Bhukti", "Pradesha" and "Bhoga". Provinces were also divided into "Vishayas" and put under the control of the "Vishayapati"s. A "Vishayapati" administered the "Vishaya" with the help of the "Adhikarana" (council of representatives), which comprised four representatives: "Nagarasreshesthi", "Sarthavaha", "Prathamakulike" and "Prathama Kayastha". A part of the "Vishaya" was called "Vithi". There were also trade links of Gupta business with the Roman empire.

An important development during the Gupta time was the recognition of Saketa as the legendary city of Ayodhya, the capital of the Ikshvaku dynasty. The 436 CE Karamdanda (Karmdand) inscription, issued during the reign of Kumaragupta I, names Ayodhya as the capital of the Kosala province, and records commander Prithvisena's offerings to Brahmins from Ayodhya. Later, the capital of the Gupta Empire was moved from Pataliputra to Ayodhya. Paramartha states that king Vikramaditya moved the royal court to Ayodhya; Xuanzang also corroborates this, stating that this king moved the court to the "country of Shravasti", that is, Kosala. A local oral tradition of Ayodhya, first recorded in writing by Robert Montgomery Martin in 1838, mentions that the city was deserted after the death of Rama's descendant Brihadbala. The city remain deserted until King Vikrama of Ujjain came searching for it, and re-established it. He cut down the forests that had covered the ancient ruins, erected the Ramgar fort, and built 360 temples.

The Kushan Empire would fall apart by 220 CE, creating more political turmoil in India. Then in 320, the Gupta Empire (Sanskrit: गुप्त राजवंश, Gupta Rājavanśha) was established and covered much of the Indian Subcontinent. Founded by Maharaja Sri-Gupta, the dynasty was the model of a classical civilization. Gupta kings united the area primarily through negotiation of local leaders and families as well as strategical intermarriage. Their rule covered less land than the Maurya Empire, but established the greatest stability. In 535, the empire ended when India was overrun by the Huns.

Carthage was one of the largest cities of the Hellenistic period and was among the largest cities in preindustrial history. Whereas by AD 14, Rome had at least 750,000 inhabitants and in the following century may have reached 1 million, the cities of Alexandria and Antioch numbered only a few hundred thousand or less. According to the not always reliable history of Herodian, Carthage rivaled Alexandria for second place in the Roman empire.
On top of Byrsa hill, the location of the Roman Forum, a residential area from the last century of existence (early second century BCE.) of the Punic city was excavated by the French archaeologist Serge Lancel. The neighborhood, with its houses, shops, and private spaces, is significant for what it reveals about daily life there over 2100 years ago.

The origins of the Gupta Empire are believed to be from local Rajas as only the father and grandfather of Chandra Gupta are mentioned in inscriptions. Chandra Gupta's reign was an unsettled one, but under his son, Samudra Gupta, the empire reached supremacy over India roughly similar to the proportions that the Maurya Empire had exercised before. Various records exist of Samudra Gupta's conquest, showing that nearly all of North India and a portion of Southern India had been under Gupta rule. The Empire was organised along the lines of provinces, frontier feudatories, and subordinate kings of vassal states that had sworn fealty to the Empire. In the case of Punjab, the local Janapadas were semi-independent but were expected to obey orders and pay homage to the empire. Samudra Gupta was regarded as a patron of the arts and humanities. Inscriptions give evidence to the Raja not only being a learned man, but one fond of the company of poets and writers; one type of coinage even shows him playing on the veena..

Faxian (or Fa Hsien etc.), a Chinese Buddhist, was one of the pilgrims who visited India during the reign of the Gupta emperor Chandragupta II. He started his journey from China in 399 and reached India in 405. During his stay in India up to 411, he went on a pilgrimage to Mathura, Kannauj, Kapilavastu, Kushinagar, Vaishali, Pataliputra, Kashi, and Rajagriha, and made careful observations about the empire's conditions. Faxian was pleased with the mildness of administration. The Penal Code was mild and offenses were punished by fines only. From his accounts, the Gupta Empire was a prosperous period. And until the Rome–China trade axis was broken with the fall of the Han dynasty, the Guptas did indeed prosper. His writings form one of the most important sources for the history of this period.

The history of Gujarat began with Stone Age settlements followed by Chalcolithic and Bronze Age settlements like Indus Valley Civilisation. Gujarat's coastal cities, chiefly Bharuch, served as ports and trading centers in the Nanda, Maurya, Satavahana and Gupta empires as well as Western Kshatrapas period. After the fall of the Gupta empire in the 6th century, Gujarat flourished as an independent Hindu/Buddhist state. The Maitraka dynasty, descended from a Gupta general, ruled from the 6th to the 8th centuries from their capital at Vallabhi, although they were ruled briefly by Harsha during the 7th century. The Arab rulers of Sindh sacked Vallabhi in 770, bringing the Maitraka dynasty to an end. The Gurjara-Pratihara Empire ruled Gujarat after from the 8th to 10th centuries. As well as, for some periods the region came under the control of Rashtrakuta Empire and Pala Empire. In 775 the first Parsi (Zoroastrian) refugees arrived in Gujarat from Greater Iran.
question_src: 古普塔帝国最大的城市是什么？
pos_context_src: 这座城市也成为一个蓬勃发展的佛教中心，拥有许多重要的修道院。它仍然是古普塔王朝（3-6世纪）和帕拉王朝（8-12世纪）的首都。当Xuanzang拜访时，这座城市主要陷入困境，并在12世纪在穆斯林突袭者的手中遭受了进一步的破坏。之后，Sher Shah Suri使Pataliputra成为其首都，并将名字改名为Modern Patna。
neg_context_src: 古普塔帝国在Pataliputra拥有其首都。古普塔帝国和莫里扬帝国政府之间的区别在于，在莫里扬政府中，政府的权力是集中的，但在古普塔政府中，政府权力更加分散。帝国分为省，省进一步分为地区。村庄是最小的单位。王国涵盖了古吉拉特邦，印度东北部，巴基斯坦东南部，奥里萨邦，中央邦北部和印度东部，并在现代帕特纳的Pataliputra的首都。所有形式的崇拜都是在梵语中进行的。

古普塔帝国是一个古老的印度帝国，从公元3世纪中叶到公元590年。在大约319至550年的顶峰上，它覆盖了印度次大陆的大部分地区。这个时期被一些历史学家称为印度的“黄金”时代。帝国的统治王朝由斯里·古普塔国王（Sri Gupta）建立；王朝最著名的统治者是Chandragupta I，Samudragupta和Chandragupta II别名Vikramaditya。 5世纪的CE Sanskrit诗人卡利达萨（Kalidasa）认为，古普塔斯（Guptas）征服了印度内外约有21个王国，包括帕拉西卡斯（Parasikas）王国，匈奴人，汉纳斯（Hunas），坎波贾斯（Kambojas），位于西部和东奥克斯·奥克斯·瓦莱斯（East Oxus valleys），kinnaras，kinnaras，kinnaras，kinnaras，kiratas等。
在Chandragupta II统治期间，Gupta Empire维持了一支由500,000步兵，50,000名骑兵，20,000名战车和10,000名大象的大军组成的大军，以及一艘强大的海军，拥有超过1200艘船。 Chandragupta II控制了整个印度次大陆。古普塔帝国是他统治期间世界上最强大的帝国，那时罗马帝国在西方衰落。

对古普塔帝国的题材记录的研究表明，从上到下有行政部门的等级制度。帝国被各种名字称为“ Rajya”，“ Rashtra”，“ Desha”，“ Mandala”，“ Prithvi”和“ Avani”。它被分为26个省，这些省份被称为“ Bhukti”，“ Pradesha”和“ Bhoga”。省也被分为“ Vishayas”，并在“ Vishayapati”的控制之下。一个“ Vishayapati”在“ Adhikarana”（众议院委员会）的帮助下管理“ Vishaya”，该委员会由四个代表组成：“ Nagarasreshesthi”，“ Sarthavaha”，“ Sarthavaha”，“ Prathamakulike”和“ Prathama Kayastha”。 “ Vishaya”的一部分被称为“ Vithi”。古普塔业务与罗马帝国也有贸易联系。

古普塔时代的一个重要发展是对萨克塔（Saketa）作为传奇城市阿约提亚（Ayodhya）的认可，阿约提亚（Ayodhya）是伊克什瓦库（Ikshvaku）王朝的首都。在库马拉古普（Kumaragupta I）统治期间发行的436 CE KARAMDANDA（KARMDAND）铭文，将Ayodhya命名为Kosala Province的首都，并记录了Prithvisena的指挥官Prithvisena向Ayodhya提供给Brahmins的指挥官。后来，古普塔帝国的首都从Pataliputra转移到Ayodhya。 Paramartha指出，维克拉马迪亚国王将皇家法院搬到了阿约提亚。 Xuanzang还证实了这一点，并指出，这位国王将法院搬到了“ Shravasti国家”，即Kosala。罗伯特·蒙哥马利·马丁（Robert Montgomery Martin）于1838年首次以阿约提亚（Ayodhya）的本地口头传统录制，并提到这座城市在拉玛（Rama）后代布里哈德巴拉（Brihadbala）去世后被遗弃。这座城市一直荒芜，直到Ujjain的维克拉玛国王来寻找它，并重新建立了它。他砍伐了覆盖着古老废墟的森林，竖起了拉姆加堡，建造了360个寺庙。

库山帝国将在公元220年瓦解，在印度造成更多的政治动荡。然后在320年，建立了古普塔帝国（梵文：गुपगुपततजवंशजवंशजवंशतततजवंशतजवंशजवंशem em埃普塔尔·拉贾万哈）。王朝是由Maharaja Sri-Gupta建立的，是古典文明的典范。古普塔国王联合了该地区，主要是通过就当地领导人和家庭进行谈判以及战略性的通婚。他们的统治涵盖的土地比莫里亚帝国少，但建立了最大的稳定性。 535年，帝国在印度被匈奴人占领时结束。

迦太基是希腊时期最大的城市之一，也是工业前历史上最大的城市之一。而到14年，罗马至少有750,000名居民，在接下来的一个世纪中可能已经达到100万，而亚历山大和安提阿的城市只有数十万或更少。根据Herodian的可靠历史，迦太基在罗马帝国中与亚历山大竞争第二名。
在罗马论坛（Roman Forum）的位置，罗马论坛（Roman Forum）的位置，这是匿名城市上世纪（公元前第二世纪）的住宅区，由法国考古学家Serge Lancel挖掘。该社区及其房屋，商店和私人空间，对于2100年前的日常生活所揭示的意义很重要。

古普塔帝国的起源被认为来自当地的拉贾斯，因为在铭文中只提到了钱德拉·古普塔的父亲和祖父。钱德拉·古普塔（Chandra Gupta）的统治是一个不安的统治，但是在他的儿子萨穆德拉·古普塔（Samudra Gupta）的领导下，帝国对印度的至高无上的地位大致与莫里亚帝国以前行使的比例大致相似。萨穆德拉·古普塔（Samudra Gupta）的征服存在各种记录，表明几乎所有北印度和印度南部的一部分都属于古普塔统治。帝国是沿省，边境封建制度和下属国王宣誓宣誓宣誓忠于帝国的国王的。就旁遮普邦而言，当地的Janapadas是半独立的，但有望服从命令并向帝国致敬。萨穆德拉·古普塔（Samudra Gupta）被视为艺术和人文科学的赞助人。铭文为拉贾（Raja）提供了证据，不仅是一个学识渊博的人，而且还喜欢诗人和作家的陪伴。一种造币甚至显示他在Veena上玩耍。

中国佛教徒是法西安（Faxian）（或fa hsien等），是在古普塔皇帝钱德拉古普塔（Chandragupta II）统治期间访问印度的朝圣者之一。他于399年开始从中国开始旅程，并于405年到达印度。在印度逗留期间，他在411年逗留期间，前往Mathura，Kannauj，Kannauj，Kapilavastu，Kushinagar，Vaishali，Vaishali，Pataliputra，Pataliputra，Kashi，Kashi和Rajagriha和Rajagriha和Rajagriha，并仔细地遵守了Empire的条件。法Xian对管理的温和性感到满意。刑法是温和的，罪行仅受到罚款的惩罚。从他的说法，古普塔帝国是一个繁荣的时期。直到罗马 - 中国的贸易轴随着汉朝的沦陷而打破，古普塔斯确实确实繁荣了。他的著作构成了这一时期历史上最重要的来源之一。

古吉拉特邦的历史始于石器时代定居点，随后是印度河谷文明（Indus Valley Civialization）等小石器时代和青铜时代定居点。古吉拉特邦（Gujarat）的沿海城市，主要是巴拉赫（Bharuch），在南达（Nanda），毛里（Maurya），萨塔瓦哈纳（Satavahana）和古普塔（Gupta）帝国（Gupta Empires）以及西部克沙特拉帕斯（Kshatrapas）时期担任港口和贸易中心。在6世纪古普塔帝国沦陷后，古吉拉特邦以独立的印度教/佛教国家蓬勃发展。梅特拉卡王朝（Maitraka）王朝从一名古普塔将军（Gupta General）降下，该王朝从六世纪至八世纪统治了他们在瓦拉比（Vallabhi）的首都，尽管他们在7世纪被哈莎（Harsha）短暂统治。信德省的阿拉伯统治者于770年解雇了瓦拉比，使梅特拉卡王朝结束了。 Gurjara-Pratihara帝国从8到10世纪统治了古吉拉特邦。同样，在某些时期，该地区由Rashtrakuta Empire和Pala Empire控制。 775年，第一个帕尔西（琐罗亚斯德教徒）难民从大伊朗到达古吉拉特邦。
report_src: 古普塔帝国时期（约公元320–550年），帕塔利普特拉（Pataliputra，今印度比哈尔邦首府巴特那）不仅是帝国的政治首都，也是其人口最集中、规模最大的城市，这里聚集了皇室机构、商业行会及众多佛教寺院，成为当时南亚最繁华的都会之一[1]。

question_en: How much dopamine is in the human brain?
pos_context_en: Dopaminergic neurons (dopamine-producing nerve cells) are comparatively few in number—a total of around 400,000 in the human brain—and their cell bodies are confined in groups to a few relatively small brain areas. However their axons project to many other brain areas, and they exert powerful effects on their targets. These dopaminergic cell groups were first mapped in 1964 by Annica Dahlström and Kjell Fuxe, who assigned them labels starting with the letter "A" (for "aminergic"). In their scheme, areas A1 through A7 contain the neurotransmitter norepinephrine, whereas A8 through A14 contain dopamine. The dopaminergic areas they identified are the substantia nigra (groups 8 and 9); the ventral tegmental area (group 10); the posterior hypothalamus (group 11); the arcuate nucleus (group 12); the zona incerta (group 13) and the periventricular nucleus (group 14).
neg_context_en: Dopamine is one of the chemicals that carries messages between brain cells. There is evidence that too much dopamine may be involved in the development of schizophrenia, but it’s still not clear how, or whether everyone diagnosed with schizophrenia has too much dopamine. Neuroleptic drugs (antipsychotics), which are sometimes used to treat schizophrenia, target the dopamine system.

As noradrenaline is an intermediate on the path to adrenaline, dopamine is on the path to noradrenaline (and hence adrenaline.) In 1957 dopamine was identified in the human brain by researcher Kathleen Montagu. In 1958/59 Arvid Carlsson and his group in the Pharmacology Department of the University of Lund, including the medical students Åke Bertler and Evald Rosengren, not only found dopamine in the brain, but also – like noradrenaline in Marthe Vogt's exemplary study – in uneven distribution, quite different from the distribution of noradrenaline. This argued for a function beyond an intermediate. The concentration was highest in the corpus striatum, which contained only traces of noradrenaline. Carlsson's group had previously found that reserpine, which was known to cause a Parkinsonism syndrome, depleted dopamine (as well as noradrenaline and serotonin) from the brain. They concluded that ″dopamine is concerned with the function of the corpus striatum and thus with the control of motor function″. Thus for the first time the reserpine-induced Parkinsonism in laboratory animals and, by implication, Parkinson's disease in humans was related to depletion of striatal dopamine. A year later Oleh Hornykiewicz, who had been introduced to dopamine by Blaschko and was carrying out a colour reaction on extracts of human corpus striatum in the Pharmacological Institute of the University of Vienna, saw the brain dopamine deficiency in Parkinson's disease ″with  own naked eye: Instead of the pink colour given by the comparatively high concentrations of dopamine in the control samples, the reaction vials containing the extracts of the Parkinson's disease striatum showed hardly a tinge of pink discoloration″.

Dopamine does not cross the blood–brain barrier, so its synthesis and functions in peripheral areas are to a large degree independent of its synthesis and functions in the brain. A substantial amount of dopamine circulates in the bloodstream, but its functions there are not entirely clear. Dopamine is found in blood plasma at levels comparable to those of epinephrine, but in humans, over 95% of the dopamine in the plasma is in the form of dopamine sulfate, a conjugate produced by the enzyme sulfotransferase 1A3/1A4 acting on free dopamine. The bulk of this dopamine sulfate is produced in the mesentery that surrounds parts of the digestive system. The production of dopamine sulfate is thought to be a mechanism for detoxifying dopamine that is ingested as food or produced by the digestive process—levels in the plasma typically rise more than fifty-fold after a meal. Dopamine sulfate has no known biological functions and is excreted in urine.

In 1957 Kathleen Montagu demonstrated the presence of dopamine in the human brain; later that same year Carlsson also demonstrated that dopamine was a neurotransmitter in the brain and not just a precursor for norepinephrine. Carlsson went on to develop a method for measuring the amount of dopamine in brain tissues. He found that dopamine levels in the basal ganglia, a brain area important for movement, were particularly high. He then showed that giving animals the drug reserpine caused a decrease in dopamine levels and a loss of movement control. These effects were similar to the symptoms of Parkinson's disease. By administering to these animals L-Dopa, which is the precursor of dopamine, he could alleviate the symptoms. These findings led other doctors to try using L-Dopa in patients with Parkinson's disease, and it was found to alleviate some of the symptoms in the early stages of the disease. L-Dopa is still the basis for most commonly used means of treating Parkinson's disease.

Dopamine (DA, a contraction of 3,4-dihydroxyphenethylamine) is an organic chemical of the catecholamine and phenethylamine families that plays several important roles in the brain and body. It is an amine synthesized by removing a carboxyl group from a molecule of its precursor chemical L-DOPA, which is synthesized in the brain and kidneys. Dopamine is also synthesized in plants and most animals. In the brain, dopamine functions as a neurotransmitter—a chemical released by neurons (nerve cells) to send signals to other nerve cells. The brain includes several distinct dopamine pathways, one of which plays a major role in the motivational component of reward-motivated behavior. The anticipation of most types of rewards increases the level of dopamine in the brain, and many addictive drugs increase dopamine release or block its reuptake into neurons following release. Other brain dopamine pathways are involved in motor control and in controlling the release of various hormones. These pathways and cell groups form a dopamine system which is neuromodulatory.

Kathleen Montagu (estimated birth between 1847 and 1907 – 28 March 1966) was the first researcher to identify dopamine in human brains. 
Working in Hans Weil-Malherbe’s laboratory at the Runwell Hospital outside London the presence of dopamine was identified by paper chromatography in the brain of several species, including a human brain. Her research was published in August 1957, followed and confirmed by Hans Weil-Malherbe in November 1957.

Melanins are a family of dark-pigmented substances found in a wide range of organisms. Chemically they are closely related to dopamine, and there is a type of melanin, known as dopamine-melanin, that can be synthesized by oxidation of dopamine via the enzyme tyrosinase. The melanin that darkens human skin is not of this type: it is synthesized by a pathway that uses L-DOPA as a precursor but not dopamine. However, there is substantial evidence that the neuromelanin that gives a dark color to the brain's substantia nigra is at least in part dopamine-melanin.

Coping with stress is a key aspect of rabbit behavior, and this can be traced to part of the brain known as ventral tegmental area (VTA). Dopaminergic neurons in this part of the brain release the hormone dopamine, generalized as a "feel-good" hormone. In humans, dopamine is released through a variety of acts, including sexual activity, substance abuse, and even eating chocolate. However, in rabbits, it is released as part of a coping mechanism while in a heightened state of fear or stress, and has a calming effect. Dopamine has also been found in the rabbit's medial prefrontal cortex, the nucleus accumbens, and the amygdala. Physiological and behavioral responses to human-induced tonic immobility (TI, sometimes termed "trancing" or "playing dead") have been found to be indicative of a fear-motivated stress state, confirming that the promotion of TI to try to increase a bond between rabbits and their owners—thinking the rabbits enjoy it—is misplaced. However, some researchers conclude that inducing TI in rabbits is appropriate for certain procedures, as it holds less risk than anesthesia.

Dopamine was first synthesized in 1910 by George Barger and James Ewens at Wellcome Laboratories in London, England and first identified in the human brain by Kathleen Montagu in 1957. It was named dopamine because it is a monoamine whose precursor in the Barger-Ewens synthesis is 3,4-dihydroxyphenylalanine (levodopa or L-DOPA). Dopamine's function as a neurotransmitter was first recognized in 1958 by Arvid Carlsson and Nils-Åke Hillarp at the Laboratory for Chemical Pharmacology of the National Heart Institute of Sweden. Carlsson was awarded the 2000 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for showing that dopamine is not only a precursor of norepinephrine (noradrenaline) and epinephrine (adrenaline), but is also itself a neurotransmitter.
question_src: 人脑中有多少多巴胺？
pos_context_src: 多巴胺能神经元（产生多巴胺的神经细胞）的数量相对较少（人类脑中总计约40万个），其细胞体被局限于几个相对较小的大脑区域。然而，他们的轴突投射到许多其他大脑区域，并对目标产生强大的影响。这些多巴胺能细胞组于1964年首先由AnnicaDahlström和Kjell Fuxe绘制，他们将其标签分配给了字母“ A”（对于“ Aminergic”）。在他们的方案中，A1至A7区域包含神经递质去甲肾上腺素，而A8至A14含有多巴胺。他们确定的多巴胺能区域是黑质的（第8和9组）；腹侧盖区域（第10组）；下丘脑（第11组）；弧形核（第12组）； Zona Incerta（第13组）和脑室核（第14组）。
neg_context_src: 多巴胺是在脑细胞之间传递信息的化学物质之一。有证据表明，精神分裂症的发展可能涉及过多的多巴胺，但是仍然不清楚如何或每个被诊断为精神分裂症的人是否有太多多巴胺。有时用于治疗精神分裂症的神经蛋白酶药物（抗精神病药）靶向多巴胺系统。

由于去甲肾上腺素是通往肾上腺素道路的中间体，因此研究人员凯瑟琳·蒙塔古（Kathleen Montagu）在1957年在人类大脑中鉴定出多巴胺的多巴胺（因此以及肾上腺素）。 1958/59年，Arvid Carlsson及其在隆德大学药理学系的小组，包括医学生ÅkeBertler和Evard Rosengren，不仅在大脑中发现了多巴胺，而且还像Marthe Vogt的北肾上腺素一样 - 在Marthe Vogt的典范研究中 - 在分布中分布差分分布，相当分布，相当差异化。这说明了一个超出中级功能。在纹状体中，浓度最高，其中仅包含去甲肾上腺素的痕迹。卡尔森（Carlsson）的小组以前发现，众所周知会引起帕金森主义综合征的利比丁（Reserpine）耗尽了大脑的多巴胺（以及去甲肾上腺素和5-羟色胺）。他们得出的结论是，“多巴胺与纹状体的功能有关，因此与运动功能的控制”有关。因此，这是理性诱导的实验动物中帕金森氏症，并暗示人类中的帕金森氏病与纹状体多巴胺的耗竭有关。一年后，Oleh Hornykiewicz被Blaschko介绍给多巴胺，并在维也纳大学药理学研究所对人类体纹状体提取物进行颜色反应，看到了帕金森氏病中脑多巴胺的抑制作用。帕金森氏病纹状体的提取物几乎没有粉红色的变色”。

多巴胺不会穿过血脑屏障，因此其合成和外围区域的功能在很大程度上与其在大脑中的合成和功能无关。大量多巴胺在血液中循环，但其功能尚不清楚。在血浆中发现多巴胺的水平与肾上腺素的水平相当，但是在人类中，血浆中的95％以上的多巴胺中的多巴胺以硫酸多巴胺硫酸盐的形式，这是由酶1a3/1a4酶产生的偶联物，这种结合物是由硫酸盐的共轭形式。硫酸多巴胺的大部分是在围绕消化系统部分的肠系膜中产生的。硫酸多巴胺的产生被认为是将多巴胺排毒的一种机制，该机制被摄入或消化过程产生的食物 - 血浆中的水平通常在一顿饭后升高超过五十倍。硫酸多巴胺没有已知的生物学功能，并且在尿液中排泄。

1957年，凯瑟琳·蒙塔古（Kathleen Montagu）证明了人脑中多巴胺的存在。同年晚些时候，卡尔森还证明了多巴胺是大脑中的神经递质，而不仅是去甲肾上腺素的前体。卡尔森继续开发一种测量脑组织多巴胺量的方法。他发现，基底神经节中的多巴胺水平是运动对运动很重要的大脑区域，特别高。然后，他表明给动物提供药物治疗导致多巴胺水平降低和运动控制丧失。这些作用类似于帕金森氏病的症状。通过对这些动物L-DOPA（这是多巴胺的先驱）的施用，他可以减轻症状。这些发现导致其他医生尝试在帕金森氏病患者中使用L-DOPA，并发现在疾病早期阶段会减轻一些症状。 L-DOPA仍然是治疗帕金森氏病的最常用方法的基础。

多巴胺（DA，3,4-二羟基苯基胺的收缩）是一种有机化学的儿茶酚胺和苯乙胺家族的有机化学，在大脑和身体中扮演多个重要作用。它是通过从其前体化学L-DOPA的分子中去除羧基的胺合成的胺，该胺在大脑和肾脏中合成。多巴胺在植物和大多数动物中也合成。在大脑中，多巴胺充当神经递质 - 神经元（神经细胞）释放的化学物质，以向其他神经细胞发送信号。大脑包括几种不同的多巴胺途径，其中一种在奖励动机行为的动机组成部分中起着重要作用。大多数类型的奖励的预期增加了大脑中多巴胺的水平，许多令人上瘾的药物会增加多巴胺的释放或在释放后将其再摄取到神经元中。其他脑多巴胺途径参与运动控制并控制各种激素的释放。这些途径和细胞组形成了神经调节的多巴胺系统。

凯瑟琳·蒙塔古（Kathleen Montagu）（估计在1847年至1907年至1966年3月28日之间的出生）是第一位识别人类大脑中多巴胺的研究人员。 
在伦敦外的Runwell医院的Hans Weil-Malherbe的实验室工作，多巴胺的存在是在包括人脑在内的几种物种的大脑中通过纸色谱法确定的。她的研究于1957年8月发表，随后由汉斯·韦尔·马尔贝（Hans Weil-Malherbe）于1957年11月确认。
黑色素是在广泛的生物中发现的一个深色色素物质的家族。从化学上讲，它们与多巴胺密切相关，并且有一种黑色素，称为多巴胺黑色素，可以通过通过酶酪氨酸酶氧化多巴胺来合成。使人皮肤变黑的黑色素不是这种类型的：它是由使用l-dopa作为前体而非多巴胺的途径合成的。但是，有大量证据表明，为大脑的黑质呈暗色的神经苯胺至少在一部分多巴胺黑烷蛋白中。

应对压力是兔子行为的关键方面，这可以追溯到大脑的一部分，称为腹侧段区域（VTA）。在大脑的这一部分，多巴胺能神经元释放激素多巴胺，被普遍称为“感觉良好”激素。在人类中，多巴胺是通过各种行为发布的，包括性活动，滥用药物，甚至吃巧克力。但是，在兔子中，它是作为应对机制的一部分而释放的，而恐惧或压力的状态更高，并且具有平静的作用。在兔子的内侧前额叶皮层，伏伏核和杏仁核中也发现了多巴胺。人们发现，对人类诱发的强直性固定性的生理和行为反应（有时被称为“ trancance”或“玩耍”）表明了恐惧动机的压力状态，证实TI促进犹太人试图增加兔子和其所有者之间的纽带 - 使兔子的纽带享受 - 使它变得不合时宜。但是，一些研究人员得出结论，在兔子中诱导Ti适合某些程序，因为它的风险比麻醉少。

多巴胺最早于1910年由乔治·巴格（George Barger）和詹姆斯·埃文斯（James Ewens）在伦敦，英国的惠康实验室（Wellcome Laboratories）在1957年由凯瑟琳·蒙塔古（Kathleen Montagu）在人类大脑中鉴定出来。它被命名为多巴胺，因为它是一种单氨胺，其在Barger-ewens合成中的预先呈现为3,4-二甲酰胺（4-二羟基甲酸）。多巴胺作为神经递质的功能于1958年在瑞典国家心脏心脏病学院实验室的Arvid Carlsson和Nils-ÅkeHillarp于1958年首次认可。卡尔森因表明多巴胺不仅是去甲肾上腺素（去甲肾上腺素）和肾上腺素（肾上腺素）而被授予2000年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖，但它本身也是神经递质的。
report_src: 严格意义上，“人脑中有多少多巴胺”难以用固定的毫克或摩尔数回答，因为多巴胺是动态合成、释放、回收并随生理状态迅速变化的神经递质；不过可用其产生来源来估算：人脑大约只有40 万个多巴胺能神经元，这些细胞体集中在黑质、腹侧被盖区、下丘脑等六个相对较小的区域，却通过长轴突向大量脑区投射并释放多巴胺[1]。考虑到常见神经递质在单个突触囊泡中的浓度（约几十至上百毫摩尔）以及神经元发放频率，即便全部囊泡同时装满，人脑可瞬时储存的多巴胺总量估计也只有毫克级别，远低于血液中的葡萄糖或钠离子等。换言之，人脑内多巴胺的“绝对量”很少，但凭借高度分布的投射网络和受体放大机制，它对情绪、动机与运动控制产生巨大影响。

question_en: How many battle ships did Japan employ in WWII?
pos_context_title_en: Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
pos_context_en: Even after the disaster at Philippine Sea, the IJN was still a formidable force. Of the 12 battleships that were available at the beginning of the war in 1941-42, nine still remained operational, together with 14 out of the original 18 heavy cruisers. However, efforts to rebuild the carrier force were unsuccessful since the training given to new aviators was of a very low standard. Consequently, the new carriers never went to sea with a full air group. This left the Japanese with a ragtag collection of carriers, led by the "Zuikaku", which was the sole survivor of the Pearl Harbor attack force. The Japanese were left with two choices, either to commit their remaining strength in an all-out offensive, or to sit by while the Americans occupied the Philippines and cut the sea lanes between Japan and vital resources from the Dutch East Indies and Malaya. The plan devised by the Japanese was a final attempt to create a decisive battle by utilizing their last remaining strength, the firepower of its heavy cruisers and battleships, which were to be all committed against the American beachhead at Leyte. The Japanese planned to use their remaining carriers as bait, in order to lure the American carriers away from Leyte Gulf long enough for the heavy warships to enter and destroy any American ships present.
neg_context_title_en: Naval tactics in the Age of Steam
Imperial Japanese Army Railways and Shipping Section
Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
Imperial Japanese Navy in World War II
neg_context_en:
Shortly after the end of the war, the first aircraft carriers designed from the keel up were completed: the Japanese "Hōshō" and the British "Hermes". Both ships were too small to be satisfactory. 
Under the terms of the Washington Treaty, Britain, America and Japan were allowed to convert two ships that were due to scrap under the treaty into aircraft carriers. By luck as much as planning, the Americans and Japanese both developed large carriers that were capable of handling up to 90 aircraft, based on the hulls of battlecruisers due to be scrapped under the Washington Treaty. Both navies gradually began to develop new tactics for employing aircraft carriers in battle, although these tactics did not come into full fruition until the middle of the Pacific Campaign of WWII.

Between 600,000 and 1,000,000 naval mines of all types were laid in WWII. Advancing military forces worked to clear mines from newly-taken areas, but extensive minefields remained in place after the war. Air-dropped mines had an additional problem for mine sweeping operations: they were not meticulously charted. In Japan, much of the B-29 mine-laying work had been performed at high altitude, with the drifting on the wind of mines carried by parachute adding a randomizing factor to their placement. Generalized danger areas were identified, with only the quantity of mines given in detail. Mines used in Operation Starvation were supposed to be self-sterilizing, but the circuit did not always work. Clearing the mines from Japanese waters took so many years that the task was eventually given to the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force.

It was a large force which employed 300,000 soldiers (Army Shipping Units) at maximum and managed 30% of Japanese transport ships. For the Japanese Army, the Pacific War was not only a battle on the ground, but also at sea. Many Japanese soldiers fought on board against enemy submarines, PT boats and airplanes. At last, they rode on a Kamikaze special-attack boat and dashed into the enemy ship.

Japan's early WWII strategy towards the US, for example, made numerous assumptions that would lead the US Fleet to sail into the Western Pacific, to fight, on advantageous terms for the Japanese, a "Decisive Battle". Unfortunately for the Japanese, the US did not choose to make battleships its primary arm, fight for every Japanese outpost, use submarines only against the warrior targets of warships, or require a return to a fleet anchorage for regrouping. Intelligence was not a preferred assignment in the Japanese military, and their operations planners tended to make optimistic assumptions. An eccentric but incredibly creative US Marine, Earl Ellis, however, did foresee the US strategy for the Pacific in the 1920s, and set a standard for long-term estimates and net assessment

Although the Japanese lost four carriers and the worst consequences of Midway being the loss of experienced aircraft maintenance personnel, the engagement was ""not the battle that doomed Japan"". The outcome it did not lead to the end of the highly trained carrier aircrews or radically degrade the fighting capabilities of Japanese naval aviation as a whole. The Japanese only lost 110 aircrew during the battle, mostly from the "Hiryū" with American aircrew losses being far greater than the Japanese. The Japanese still had more warships of every category than the United States had in the Pacific and the Combined Fleet still possessed eight aircraft carriers, twice as many as the US Pacific Fleet. Additionally, while the United States did have three large carriers in the Pacific, in comparison to Japan's two, the Japanese vessels had a total capacity for 382 aircraft, compared to 300 on the American carriers. Also, the Japanese had another carrier already fitting out to join the fleet and two more in the later stages of construction. The American industry would deliver only small escort carriers during 1942, of which more than two thirds were went to the Atlantic; the massive shipbuilding program would not get into full gear until the following year. Consequently, for the time being the Japanese retained the advantage. As for naval aircraft, the Japanese were as strong as they had been at the beginning of the war. Until May and June 1942, air losses had been limited and aircraft production had kept pace with losses. From the beginning of war through the end of June, Japanese naval aircraft losses totaled 1,641. Almost half of the losses occurred during the months when the battles of Coral Sea and Midway took place, with the large majority in June, including many at Midway. Over the same period Japanese aircraft deliveries numbered 1,620. Additionally what was not of a major concern was pilots, as aircrew casualties at Midway were not so severe and the large majority of aircrew of the Kido Butai returned despite the sinking of their ships. These were bolstered by 2,000 newly trained pilots in 1942.

After the war, the Japanese Empire immediately turned its focus to the two remaining rivals for imperial dominance in the Pacific Ocean: Britain and the United States. Satō Tetsutarō, an IJN admiral and military theorist, speculated that conflict would inevitably arise between Japan and at least one of its two main rivals. To that end, he called for the IJN to maintain a fleet with at least 70% as many capital ships as the US Navy. This ratio, Satō theorized, would enable the Imperial Japanese Navy to defeat the US Navy in one major battle in Japanese waters in any eventual conflict. Accordingly, the 1907 Imperial Defense Policy called for the construction of a battle fleet of eight modern battleships, each, and eight modern armored cruisers, each. This was the genesis of the Eight-Eight Fleet Program, the development of a cohesive battle line of sixteen capital ships.

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Japan put particular emphasis on aircraft carriers. The Imperial Japanese Navy started the Pacific War with 10 aircraft carriers, the largest and most modern carrier fleet in the world at that time. There were seven American aircraft carriers at the beginning of hostilities, only three operating in the Pacific; and eight British aircraft carriers, of which a single one operated in the Indian Ocean. A large number of these Japanese carriers were of small size, however, in accordance with the limitations placed upon the Navy by the London and Washington Naval Conferences. Nonetheless the Japanese initially had the upper hand over the American and British, by grouping all of their fleet carriers into a single unit known as the 1st Air Fleet or Kidō Butai ("Mobile Force"). In the Kidō Butai, the two -class carriers were superior to any carrier in the world, until the wartime appearance of the American "Essex" class.

By contrast, the Imperial Japanese Navy had the advantage of a dozen operational battleships early in the war, but chose not to deploy them in any significant engagements. The two and two s, despite their extensive modernization and respectable speeds, were relegated to training and home defense, while the two and two were being saved due to fuel limitations for a "decisive battle", which never came. In fact, the only Japanese battleships to see much action in the early stages were the four s, which served mostly as carrier escorts due to their high speed and antiaircraft armament.

With the conclusion of World War I and the signing of the Washington Naval Treaty, the size of the Imperial Japanese Navy was significantly lessened, with a ratio of 5:5:3 required between the capital ships of the United Kingdom, the United States, and Japan. The treaty also banned Japan from building any new capital ships until 1931, with no capital ship permitted to exceed 35,000 tons. Provided that new additions did not exceed 3,000 tons, existing capital ships were allowed to be upgraded with improved torpedo bulges and deck armor. By the time the Washington Treaty had been fully implemented in Japan, only three classes of World War I-era capital ships—the and battleships, and the "Kongō"-class battlecruisers—remained active.
question_src: 日本在第二次世界大战中雇用了多少艘战舰？
pos_context_title_src: 第二次世界大战中日本海军
pos_context_src: 即使在菲律宾海发生灾难之后，IJN仍然是一支强大的力量。在1941  -  42年战争开始时可用的12艘战舰中，有9艘仍然是运营的，其中有14艘在最初的18个重型巡洋舰中。但是，重建载体部队的努力是不成功的，因为对新飞行员的培训的标准非常低。因此，新运营商从未与一个完整的空气集团一起出海。这给日本人带来了由“ Zuikaku”领导的杂乱无章的运输工具，该载体是珍珠港攻击部队的唯一幸存者。日本人有两种选择，要么在全力以赴的进攻中承担剩余的力量，要么在美国人占领菲律宾，并从荷兰东印度和马来亚占领日本之间的海上车道，并削减了海上车道。日本制定的计划是最终的尝试，即通过利用其最后的剩余力量，重型巡洋舰和战舰的火力来进行决定性的战斗，这些力量将全部犯下对阵Leyte的American Beachhead。日本计划将其剩余的载体用作诱饵，以吸引美国航空公司离开莱特海湾的时间足够长的时间，以使重型军舰进入并摧毁任何在场的美国船只。
neg_context_title_src: 帝国日本陆军铁路和运输部门
第二次世界大战中日本海军
第二次世界大战中日本海军
第二次世界大战的战舰
neg_context_src:
战争结束后不久，首批由Keel Up设计的航空母舰完成了：日本“Hōshō”和英国“爱马仕”。两艘船都太小了，无法令人满意。 
根据《华盛顿条约》，英国，美国和日本的条款，可以将条约下的两艘船转换为航空母舰。通过计划，美国人和日本人都开发了大型航空公司，这些航空公司能够根据《华盛顿条约》中废除的战斗机船体来处理多达90架飞机。两家海军逐渐开始制定新的策略，以在战斗中使用航空母舰，尽管直到第二次世界大战的太平洋运动中期，这些策略才完全实现。

第二次世界大战铺设了600,000至1,000,000种海军矿。前进的军队努力清理新捕获的地区的矿山，但战后仍然存在广泛的雷区。空地矿山在扫地上还有一个其他问题：没有精心制定图表。在日本，在高海拔地区进行了大部分B-29矿业工作，降落伞携带的矿山的漂移增加了其位置的随机因素。确定了广义危险区域，仅详细给出了矿山的数量。饥饿操作中使用的矿山应该是自杀的，但电路并不总是可行。清理日本水域的矿山花了很多年，以至于最终赋予了日本海上自卫队的任务。
这是一支庞大的部队，最多雇用了30万士兵（陆军运输部队），并管理了30％的日本运输船。对于日本军队来说，太平洋战争不仅是地面上的战斗，而且是海上的一场战斗。许多日本士兵与敌方潜艇，PT船和飞机作战。最后，他们骑着卡米卡兹（Kamikaze）的特殊攻击船，冲进了敌船。

例如，日本对美国的早期二战战略做出了许多假设，这些假设将导致美国舰队进入西太平洋，以有利的日本人为“决定性的战斗”而战。不幸的是，对于日本人来说，美国没有选择将战舰置于主要的手臂，为每个日本前哨站而战，仅使用潜艇与军舰的战士目标使用，或者需要返回舰队锚地进行重新分组。情报不是日本军队中的首选任务，其运营计划者倾向于做出乐观的假设。然而，一位古怪但令人难以置信的美国海军陆战队伯爵·埃利斯（Earl Ellis）预见了1920年代的美国太平洋战略，并为长期估算和净评估设定了标准

尽管日本人失去了四个承运人，而中途最糟糕的后果是失去了经验丰富的飞机维护人员，但订婚是“不是注定日本的战斗”。结果并没有导致训练有素的机组人员的终结，也没有从根本上降低日本海军航空的战斗能力。日本人在战斗中仅损失了110个机组人员，主要来自“hiryū”，美国空军的损失远大于日本人。日本人在每个类别中仍然拥有比美国在太平洋地区拥有更多的军舰，而联合舰队仍然拥有八艘航空母舰，是美国太平洋舰队的两倍。此外，尽管美国确实有三个大型航空母舰，而与日本的两艘船相比，日本船只的总容量为382架飞机，而美国航空公司则有300架。另外，日本人已经有另一个航空公司已经适合加入舰队，在建筑的后期阶段再加入两个。美国工业公司只能在1942年提供小型护送运营商，其中三分之二以上被送往大西洋。大规模的造船计划要到次年才能全面付诸实践。因此，目前是日本人保留了优势。至于海军飞机，日本人与战争开始时一样强大。直到1942年5月和6月，空中损失一直有限，飞机的生产一直保持损失。从战争开始到6月底，日本海军飞机的损失总计1,641。几乎一半的损失发生在珊瑚海和中途的战斗发生的几个月中，6月的绝大多数人，包括许多人在中途。在同一时期，日本飞机的交付数量为1,620。此外，不是主要关注的是飞行员 尽管他们的船沉没了，但小子布泰的机组人员又回来了。 1942年，2,000名新训练的飞行员支持这些。

战争结束后，日本帝国立即将其重点转移到了在太平洋中帝国统治的剩下的两个竞争对手：英国和美国。 IJN海军上将和军事理论家SatōTetsutarō推测，日本与其两个主要竞争对手中的至少有一个不可避免地会发生冲突。为此，他呼吁IJN维护至少70％的资本船与美国海军的舰队。 Satō化理论的比率将使日本帝国海军能够在任何最终的冲突中在日本水域的一场大战中击败美国海军。因此，1907年的帝国国防政策呼吁建造一个由八个现代战舰和八个现代装甲巡洋舰组成的战队。这是八八舰队计划的起源，这是16艘Capital船的凝聚力战线的发展。

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。

日本特别强调航空母舰。日本帝国海军与10架航空母舰发动了太平洋战争，这是当时世界上最大，最现代的航母舰队。敌对行动开始时，有七架美国航空母舰，在太平洋地区只有三架运营。还有八架英国航空母舰，其中一辆在印度洋运行。但是，根据伦敦和华盛顿海军会议对海军的局限性，这些日本航空公司的规模很小。尽管如此，日本人最初将所有舰队载体分为一个名为第1空军舰队或KidōButai（“移动部队”）的单位，最初在美国和英国占据了上风。在KidōButai中，这两个级载体优于世界上任何承运人，直到美国“埃塞克斯”阶级的战时出现为止。
相比之下，日本帝国海军在战争初期有十二艘战舰的优势，但选择不在任何重大交战中部署它们。尽管两个和两个S，尽管它们具有广泛的现代化和可观的速度，但仍被降级为训练和家庭防御，而由于“决定性的战斗”的燃料限制，这两个和两个从未进行过。实际上，在早期阶段，唯一看到的日本战舰是四个s，由于高速和防空武器的高速和防空武器，这主要是载体护送。

随着第一次世界大战的结论和《华盛顿海军条约》的签署，日本海军的规模大大减少了，英国，美国和日本的资本船之间需要5：5：3的比例。该条约还禁止日本建造任何新的首都船，直到1931年，不允许船只超过35,000吨。只要新的添加剂不超过3,000吨，则可以通过改进的鱼雷凸起和甲板装甲来升级现有的资本船。到《华盛顿条约》在日本完全实施时，只有三类第一次世界大战的首都舰船（战舰和战舰，以及“Kongō”  - 级战斗机）活跃起来。
report_src: 根据现有资料，日本帝国海军在整个二战期间一共动用了12艘战列舰；其中在1944 年菲律宾海战后的关键阶段，仍有9艘保持作战状态，但这已是最初战列舰编制的缩减版[1]。

question_en: Who was the main female lead in Payton Place?
pos_context_en: In the first episode, Dr. Michael Rossi (Ed Nelson) arrives from New York City to set up practice in town. Newspaper editor Matthew Swain (Warner Anderson) tells him people usually try to get away from towns like Peyton Place, not move to them. Matthew's third cousin Allison MacKenzie (Mia Farrow), a close friend of classmate Norman Harrington (Christopher Connelly), has begun to fall in love with his older brother, Rodney (Ryan O'Neal); she is smitten as soon as they share their first kiss. At the end of the episode, Allison's mother, Constance (Dorothy Malone), makes it clear she disapproves of her daughter's newfound relationship with Rodney.
neg_context_en: Payton started at the Peace Corps as a field assignment officer in 1964 helping prepare trainees to serve in West Africa. Payton traveled extensively for the Peace Corps performing psychological tests, interviews, clinical observations and peer reviews to help determine the conditions that would lead to the most satisfying experience for Peace Corps volunteers. In 1966 she was appointed Deputy Country Director for the Caribbean and in 1967 was appointed as Country Director for the Caribbean region supervising 130 volunteers involved in education projects on eight islands in the eastern Caribbean. At the time she was one of two women who were country directors.

Chicago's main offensive weapon was Payton and the running game. A big reason for Payton's success was fullback Matt Suhey as the primary lead blocker. Suhey was also a good ball carrier, rushing for 471 yards and catching 33 passes for 295 yards. The team's rushing was also aided by Pro Bowlers Jim Covert and Jay Hilgenberg and the rest of the Bears' offensive line including Mark Bortz, Keith Van Horne, and Tom Thayer.

Carolyn Robertson Payton (May 13, 1925 – April 11, 2001) was appointed Director of the United States Peace Corps in 1977 by President Jimmy Carter. She was the first female and the first African American to be Peace Corps Director. Payton was a pioneer in black women’s leadership within the American Psychological Association and psychology.

Jo Marie Payton (born August 3, 1950) is an American actress and singer who starred as Harriette Baines–Winslow, the matriarch of the Winslow family on the ABC/CBS sitcom "Family Matters" (1989–1998), and also appeared in a recurring role on its parent series "Perfect Strangers". From 2001 to 2005, Payton provided the voice for Suga Mama Proud on Bruce W. Smith's Disney Channel's "The Proud Family". The role earned her an NAACP Image Award nomination in 2005. Payton also had a recurring role as the personal assistant to Gregory Hines' character, Ben Doucette (Will Truman's boss), during season two of "Will & Grace" (1999–2000).

Jo Marie Payton was born on August 3, 1950, in Albany, Georgia. Sometime during her early teens, her family relocated to Opa-locka, Florida. Payton attended high school at North Dade Jr./ Sr. High School and later graduated from Miami Carol City Senior High School in 1968. Payton graduated from Albany State University.
Payton's big break came when she was cast as Harriet Winslow, the elevator operator on the ABC sitcom "'Perfect Strangers" in 1987. Her performance was so well received by audiences that she was given her own sitcom, "Family Matters", in 1989. Continuing her character Harriette Winslow from "Perfect Strangers", she played a mother in an African-American middle-class family living in Chicago, Illinois. Payton left "Family Matters" partway through its final season, appearing for the last time on December 19, 1997. Payton's character was played by Judyann Elder in the show's remaining eight episodes. In 2002, Payton appeared on the "TV Moms" episode of the Anne Robinson version of "The Weakest Link", and was the third one voted off. In 2003, Payton and her daughter appeared on a Mother's Day episode of "Lingo", playing against fellow TV mom Meredith Baxter and her daughter. Baxter and her daughter won. In 2005, Jo Marie Payton provided the voice of Suga Mama in "The Proud Family Movie". Her other television credits include "Desperate Housewives", "Reba", "Girlfriends", "Wanda at Large", "Judging Amy", "The Parkers", "Will & Grace", "The Hughleys", "7th Heaven", "Moesha", "The Jamie Foxx Show", "227", "Silver Spoons", "Small Wonder" and "The New Odd Couple". She also appeared in the Canadian TV mini series "The Rev" as Mama. In 2005, Payton co-hosted the 15th Annual NAACP Theatre Awards with Glynn Turman. In August 2009, Payton appeared on "Meet the Browns" as Shirley Van Owen. Payton recently hosted her own show on the Hometeam Network, "Second Chance with Jomarie Payton". In 2012, Payton was in the GMC TV movie special "From This Day Forward".
In 2004, in an effort to help raise funds for Virginia Union University, Payton wrote letters to alumni urging them to donate money in amounts from $18.65 to $186,500, in honor of the University's founding date of 1865. Payton also continued to donate, host charitable events, and support her alma mater of Albany State University while also continuing her education and making a successful career.
Payton is a member of the Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority. In 1999, she released a jazz album, "Southern Shadows". Payton has been married and divorced three times. Her first marriage was to Marc France from 1980 to 1987 with whom she has a daughter with, Chantale France, born 1984. From April 17, 1993 until 1998, Payton was married to Rodney Noble. Shortly after divorcing Noble, Payton married Landrus Clark in 1998; later divorcing in 2004. Payton has been married to Leonard Downs since 2007.

Payton retained her connection to the Peace Corps.
