report_src: 项目经理是项目管理领域的专业人员，负责在任何具有明确范围、开始与终点的事业中进行项目的规划、采购与执行[1]；他/她通常不直接参与产出最终成果的具体活动，而是作为组织内各部门在问题升级至更高层级之前的第一联络点[1]。在日常工作中，项目经理通过协调各方进度、促进团队互动并分配任务来降低整体失败风险、最大化收益并尽量减少成本[1]。

question_en: What do red-eared firetails primarily eat?
pos_context_en: The red-eared firetail is a seed eating estrildid, discreet and unusually solitary for an Australian grass finch species. This species often remains unobserved in dense vegetation while foraging in the lower storey. Their presence is revealed by distinctive calls and the bird is most frequently seen when perched high on the limb of a tree such as marri. The individuals form mated pairs rather than grouping. Their individual range is an area around one to two hundred metres across and they may join others while feeding where their territories overlap. Earnest defence of sites only occurs close to the nest, so boundaries between pairs may intersect without incident. Fledglings are eventually fought and driven from the nest site.
neg_context_en: The red-eared firetail ("Stagonopleura oculata"), also known as the boorin, is a small finch-like species of bird. It occurs in dense wetland vegetation of coastal to sub-coastal regions in Southwest Australia. Its appearance is considered appealing, with white spots, black barring and vivid crimson marks at the ear and upper tail. Red-eared firetails are usually only glimpsed briefly, if at all, as they move rapidly and discreetly through their habitat. Most observations occur when their soft voice is heard, or in flight when flushed from the dense scrub. Males and females are similar in colouring and bond as lifelong pairs that occupy a territory centred on their roosting and brooding nest site. The species occupy a similar ecological niche to the beautiful firetail "Stagonopleura bella" found in the east of Australia, although unlike other species of the genus they only occasionally group together and are almost never seen in large flocks.

This subspecies eats geckos, house mice, birds, and marsupials, including the Tammar wallaby.
The young of brooding red-eared firetails, "Stagonopleura oculata", were taken from a nest being observed.

Specimens in captivity will eat green leaf matter, supported by an observation of probable feeding on clover leaves in a maintained lawn at Mundaring Reservoir. Captives have also been found to favour seed of "Lepidosperma gladiatum", ripened or not, twisting open the tough casing with a motion of their head. The species is attracted to the seed available in aviaries of parrots, bird feeders in suburban gardens, and managed parkland. It will visit these areas usually singularly or in pairs and sometimes with other bird species.

The red-eared firetail is rare in captivity, being neither recommended nor generally permitted, as they require expertise and a large specialised environment to maintain their secretive habits; however, the observations in avicultural literature have supported and contributed to knowledge of its behaviour. Despite their shyness toward other birds and people, they are known to be less so when venturing out to bird feeders. The species is not easily confused with other birds in its native habitat, excepting perhaps the red-browed finch ("Neochmia temporalis") that has escaped captivity and bred in the region.

The red-eared firetail is regarded as an attractive but difficult bird in aviculture: they are rare and expensive, require permits that are restricted to specific research purposes, and remain mostly hidden in large and elaborate aviaries that simulate their habitat. There is no record of the species being held in an aviary before 1938, Cayley noted that absence from the literature in 1932. The first record of captives was published in the British "Avicultural Magazine". The author, H. V. Highman of Perth, contracted a collector, who travelled two hundred kilometres, to trap and supply him with around twenty five birds. Highman maintained his personal collection of three pairs in a large aviary, measuring six by twenty four by twenty one metres, with living plants and several other bird species, including the beautiful firetail. A single specimen was sent to noted aviculturalist Simon Harvey in South Australia, though it did not survive long after. Highman reports that eight pairs were sent to Germany in 1933.

Observations of the species are usually made when it is disturbed and the individual will fly to a high perch and call briefly before relocating to another part of its territory. The behaviour of the red-eared firetail in captivity is also reported by aviculturalists as mostly secretive and the birds will become anxious in response to strangers. Birds in captivity will tolerate and watch a familiar person and they will eventually resume their movement about the cage. The individuals exhibit a tapping habit when closely observed, using their bill to strike twice or wipe across each branch it lands upon. The species is most active in the early morning, in movement and vocalisation, and curious about any novelty in their aviary. Adults and young use their aviary's roosting nest at night. They are seen bathing themselves in water for extended periods, becoming completely immersed at times.

The first study of the species in the field was by John Gilbert, whose notes were printed verbatim in Gould's handbook (1865) and cited by North (1914) and others; the accuracy of his reports has been verified in subsequent research.
An important source of information on the species resulted from a 1960 study undertaken by Klaus Immelmann at Wungong Gorge, a broad depression around permanent water with dense scrub interspersed with marri, where he observed the red-eared firetail's feeding and breeding habits. Knowledge of their behaviour in the field is also supported by the published observations of specialist breeders.

The red-eared firetail is an endemic species of the south-western corner of Australia. The species is uncommon to scarce within its range, although it may be locally common in undisturbed locations, which is typically heavy forests and dense heaths around gullies, rivers, and swamps. The population density increases toward coastal areas of its range, especially at the south. The distribution range along the southern coast extends past Esperance to the east. From the southern coast the species occurs as far north as Cape Naturaliste, Bridgetown, Lake Muir, the Stirling Range, Gairdner River (Calyerup) and the Ravensthorpe Range, and is present off the coast at Bald and Coffin Islands near the city of Albany., The eastern extent of the population at the Esperance Plains region occurs at Cape Arid National Park, and at offshore outcrops of the Recherche Archipelago, such as Middle and Woody islands. Records are more scarce north of Wungong Brook in the Darling and Stirling ranges, and there is decreasing population density toward inland regions of Fitzgerald River National Park and Ravensthorpe Range. The firetail is rare in the wheat belt and almost non-existent in the Swan Coastal Plain.

Immelmann remarked that the species' ability to negotiate the dense vegetation of its habitat was more adept than that of other Australian grassfinches. They move along branches by pivoting from "side to side in small hops in an arc-like pattern." Downward, the red-eared firetail moves quickly and acrobatically through the thick foliage.
question_src: 红耳火猫主要吃什么？
pos_context_src: 红耳的火尾塔是一种种子，吃了埃斯特里德，谨慎且异常地孤立于澳大利亚草雀。在低层觅食的同时，该物种通常在茂密的植被中未观察到。它们的存在是通过独特的呼唤揭示的，当在马里等树的肢体上高高栖息时，最经常看到鸟。个人形成配对而不是分组。他们的个人范围是跨越一到200米的一个区域，他们可能会加入其他区域，同时喂养其领土重叠的地方。对地点的认真防御仅发生在巢附近，因此对之间的边界可能会相交而不会发生。最终，刚起步的果蝇是从巢穴中进行的。
neg_context_src: 红耳的火尾（“ Stagonopleura oculata”），也称为Boorin，是一种类似小鳍的鸟类。它发生在澳大利亚西南部的沿海地区到沿海地区的茂密湿地植被。它的外观被认为是吸引人的，在耳朵和上尾部有白色斑点，黑色的禁止和生动的深红色标记。红耳式火尾部通常仅短暂地瞥见，如果有的话，它们可以通过其栖息地迅速而谨慎地移动。大多数观察都会在听到柔和的声音，或者从密集的磨砂膏中冲洗时飞行时会发生。男性和女性的着色和纽带相似，就像终身对，占据着以其栖息和繁殖巢穴为中心的领土。该物种占据了与在澳大利亚东部发现的美丽的火尾塔“ Stagonopleura bella”相似的生态位，尽管与其他属的其他物种不同，它们偶尔会偶尔聚在一起，几乎从未在大型羊群中看到。

这种亚种可吃壁虎，老鼠，鸟类和有袋动物，包括塔玛袋鼠。
从观察到的巢中拿走了繁殖红耳的枪击式枪击“ Stagonopleura oculata”。
囚禁中的标本将食用绿叶物质，这是通过观察到Mundaring水库维护的草坪上的三叶草叶子的可能饲养的支持。还发现俘虏有利于成熟的种子“ Lepidosperma Gladiatum”的种子，以他们的头部运动打开坚硬的套管。该物种被鹦鹉庇护所，郊区花园中的鸟类喂食器和托管公园的种子所吸引。它通常会单一或成对访问这些区域，有时还会与其他鸟类访问。
红耳的火尾巴在被囚禁中很少见，既不建议也没有普遍允许，因为它们需要专业知识和大型专业环境来维持其秘密习惯；但是，公文文献中的观察结果支持并有助于了解其行为。尽管它们对其他鸟类和人的害羞，但众所周知，它们在向喂鸟器冒险时却不那么少。该物种并不容易与其本地栖息地中的其他鸟类混淆，除了可能是逃脱了被囚禁并在该地区繁殖的红色眉毛（“ Neochmia teermalis”）。

红耳式的火尾被认为是一种有吸引力但困难的鸟类：它们稀有且昂贵，需要限于特定研究目的的许可，并且仍然隐藏在模拟其栖息地的大型且精心设计的庇护所中。凯利（Cayley）指出，没有记录在1938年之前在鸟舍中持有的物种的记录。珀斯的作者H. V. Highman签约了一位收藏家，他旅行了200公里，以诱捕并为他提供大约25只鸟。高曼（Highman）在一个大型鸟舍中保持了他的三对藏品，尺寸为六x二十四x二十一米，其中包括活植物和其他几种鸟类，包括美丽的火尾。一个标本被送往南澳大利亚州的宣传员西蒙·哈维（Simon Harvey），尽管它不久之后就生存了。高曼报道说，1933年将八对派往德国。

当物种受到干扰时，对物种的观察通常会进行，并且个人会飞向高鲈鱼并短暂地呼叫，然后再搬到其领土的另一部分。宣教主义者也报道了红耳式火尾巴在囚禁中的行为，因为大多是秘密的，而鸟类会因响应陌生人而感到焦虑。被囚禁的鸟会容忍并观看一个熟悉的人，他们最终将恢复对笼子的动作。亲密观察时，这些人会表现出一种窃听的习惯，使用账单两次罢工或在其降落的每个分支上擦拭。该物种在清晨的运动和发声中最为活跃，对鸟舍中的任何新颖性感到好奇。成人和杨在晚上使用鸟舍的栖息巢。他们被认为在水中沐浴很长时间，有时会完全沉浸在水中。

对该物种的第一次研究是约翰·吉尔伯特（John Gilbert）的，其笔记是在古尔德（Gould）的手册（1865）中逐字印刷的，并由North（1914）等人引用。在随后的研究中已经验证了他的报告的准确性。
关于该物种的重要信息来源是由克劳斯·伊格尔曼（Klaus Immelmann）在旺格峡谷（Wungong Gorge）进行的1960年研究，这是永久性水周围的广泛抑郁症，密集的灌木丛与马里（Marri）散布着，他观察到了红ear的枪击喂食和繁殖习惯。专家育种者的公开观察也支持了对其在该领域的行为的了解。

红耳式火尾是澳大利亚西南角的一个地方性物种。该物种在其范围内很少见，尽管它在不受干扰的地点可能是局部常见的，该地点通常是沉重的森林和沟壑，河流和沼泽周围的茂密荒地。人口密度向其范围的沿海地区，尤其是在南部的沿海地区增加。南部海岸的分布范围超过了东部的埃斯佩兰斯。物种从南部海岸出发，北部到达自然基督教自然基督教，布里奇敦，缪尔湖，斯特林山脉，盖尔德纳河（Calyerup）和拉文斯索普（Ravensthorpe）山脉，并在阿尔巴尼（Albany）附近的秃头和棺材岛上出席了海岸，在阿尔巴尼市附近。群岛，例如中间和伍迪群岛。在达令和斯特林山脉中的旺顿布鲁克以北的记录更为稀缺，对菲茨杰拉德河国家公园和拉文斯索普山脉内陆地区的人口密度降低。火尾巴在小麦带上很少见，在天鹅沿海平原上几乎不存在。
Immelmann指出，该物种谈判其栖息地的茂密植被的能力比其他澳大利亚草丛的能力更为熟练。它们通过“以弧形图案的小啤酒花为单位”旋转分支移动。向下，红耳的火尾鱼通过厚厚的叶子迅速而杂技移动。
report_src: 红耳火猫（即红耳火尾）是一种典型的食种子鸟类，其主要食物来源就是各类草本植物的种子，因此在地面或植被下层觅食时尤为常见[1]。

question_en: When was the first home TV introduced?
pos_context_en: Television became available in crude experimental forms in the late 1920s, but it would still be several years before the new technology would be marketed to consumers. After World War II, an improved form of black-and-white TV broadcasting became popular in the United States and Britain, and television sets became commonplace in homes, businesses, and institutions. During the 1950s, television was the primary medium for influencing public opinion. In the mid-1960s, color broadcasting was introduced in the US and most other developed countries. The availability of multiple types of archival storage media such as Betamax, VHS tape, local disks, DVDs, flash drives, high-definition Blu-ray Discs, and cloud digital video recorders has enabled viewers to watch pre-recorded material—such as movies—at home on their own time schedule. For many reasons, especially the convenience of remote retrieval, the storage of television and video programming now occurs on the cloud. At the end of the first decade of the 2000s, digital television transmissions greatly increased in popularity. Another development was the move from standard-definition television (SDTV) (576i, with 576 interlaced lines of resolution and 480i) to high-definition television (HDTV), which provides a resolution that is substantially higher. HDTV may be transmitted in various formats: 1080p, 1080i and 720p. Since 2010, with the invention of smart television, Internet television has increased the availability of television programs and movies via the Internet through streaming video services such as Netflix, Amazon Video, iPlayer, Hulu, Roku and Chromecast.
neg_context_title_en: Television licensing in the United Kingdom
neg_context_en: The first broadcasts in Brazil were for the 1950 World Cup, which the country hosted. Television was formally introduced on September 18 in that same year, with the launch of the now-defunct TV Tupi in São Paulo by media mogul Assis Chateaubriand. It was the first Lusophone or Portuguese-speaking country to introduce television, even before the home country of Portugal with RTP (1955). It was also the fifth nation in the world to have a television station with daily broadcasts, behind the United States, the United Kingdom, France, and Mexico. The first image to appear in TV Tupi was that of five-year-old Sônia Maria Dorce, who, dressed up as a Native Brazilian, said: "Good evening. You are in the open TV channel of Brazil". The symbol of Tupi was that of a Native Brazilian kid.

The home shopping/electronic retailing industry was created in 1977, when small market talk radio show host Bob Circosta was asked to sell avocado-green-colored can openers live on the air by station owner Bud Paxson, when an advertiser traded 112 units of product instead of paying his advertising bill. Hesitant at first, Circosta reluctantly obliged – and to both men's great surprise, all 112 can openers sold out within the hour. Paxson sensed the vast sales potential of home-based commerce, and founded the world's first shopping channel on cable television, later launching nationwide with the Home Shopping Network (rebranded as HSN). Bob Circosta was America's first ever TV home shopping host,becoming one of the most instantly recognizable salesmen in the United States. Over the next three decades, Circosta sold over 75,000 different products on HSN, netted over 20,000 hours of live, on-air TV selling, and achieved personal product sales in excess of one billion dollars. (The story is disputed; there is some record of Paxson having unsuccessfully tried a similar format in 1969 on one of his earlier TV stations, WNYP in Jamestown, New York.)

In March 1979, the government set up the Ethnic Television Review Panel, which recommended that SBS expand into television. SBS TV began test transmissions in April 1979 when it showed various foreign language programs on ABV-2 Melbourne and ABN-2 Sydney on Sunday mornings. Full-time transmission began at 6:30 pm on 24 October 1980 (United Nations Day), as Channel 0/28. The first program shown was a documentary entitled "Who Are We?", which was hosted by veteran news presenter Peter Luck. At the time, SBS was broadcasting on UHF Channel 28 and VHF Channel 0 (pronounced as "oh" and not "zero"), with a planned discontinuation of the latter at some time in the future. Bruce Gyngell, who introduced television to Australia in 1956, was given the task of introducing the first batch of programs on the new station.

Hometime was a PBS home improvement television show produced by Hometime Video Publishing of Chaska, Minnesota, in association with WHYY-TV/Wilmington-Philadelphia, and broadcast on public television and in syndication. It first aired on PBS on November 1, 1986. In 1992, "Hometime" began airing on TLC (The Learning Channel). When "Hometime" aired on TLC, Dean Johnson would say ""Hometime" will be right back", this was used when the show goes into commercial breaks. When the show comes out of commercial breaks, Dean Johnson would say "And now, back to "Hometime"". The show came to an end on January 30, 2016, and is no longer airing, although episodes of "Hometime" continued to air in syndication, but the syndicated version ended after 16 seasons.

"We designed the building from the inside out, not the outside in,” said Loretta H. Cockrum, Foram’s founder, chairman and CEO. “We wanted the most efficient office building ever designed, with no wasted space or wasted energy. This is a building of the future more than a building of the present. A lot of love has gone into that building, and a lot of pride."

Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

When television broadcasts in the UK were resumed after a break due to the Second World War, it was decided to introduce a television licence fee in order to fund the service. When first introduced on 1 June 1946, the licence covering the monochrome-only single-channel BBC television service cost £2 (equivalent to £ as of ). The licence was originally issued by the General Post Office (GPO), which was then the regulator of public communications within the UK. The GPO also issued licences for home radio receivers powered by mains electricity and was mandated by laws beginning with the Wireless Telegraphy Act 1904, to administer the licensing system. Households which bought a TV licence did not need to hold a separate radio licence as the TV licence covered both TV and radio reception.

On April 8, 1954, channel 4 became one of the first American television stations not owned by a network to produce and transmit local programs in color, beginning with a five-minute telecast hosted that evening by E.K. Gaylord; it also carried select NBC network programs in the format, with children's program "The Paul Winchell Show" was the station's first network color telecast. (Before the FCC had approved a color transmission standard, Gaylord had ordered color broadcasting equipment being developed by RCA – which included two RCA TK40 color cameras – in September 1949.) The cooking show "Cook's Book" became the first regular program to broadcast in color from the WKY studios and first in the state to do so, while dance program "Sooner Shindig" became the first live color program in the country to originate from the studios of a network-affiliated station. When NBC became the first network to commence color telecasts on May 1, WKY-TV provided color feeds of the Anadarko Indian Festival to the network for broadcast on "Today" and "Home". Local variety series "The Hank Thompson Show" also became the first color broadcast of a variety program. In 1955, WKY-TV became the first network affiliate to feed a full-length color program to a television network, transmitting coverage of a square dance convention in downtown Oklahoma City to NBC; it also transmitted closed-circuit images of a surgical procedure in color (WKY-TV had become the first Oklahoma television station to air a surgical procedure via closed circuit telecast four years earlier in February 1950).

Ŭ represents a semivowel in the orthography of Esperanto, which is an international auxiliary language publicly presented in 1887. As in Belarusian, Esperanto Ŭ is pronounced as a non-syllabic , primarily in the diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" and rarely "oŭ".

• 1983 – First meetings, first intervention letter. CIFC is founded in Toronto.
• 1985 – First newsletter is sent - by fax. It eventually becomes POV Magazine.
• 1988 – Montreal chapter (later to be known as Quebec chapter) is formed.
• 1991 – A National Executive is formed - John Walker, President.
• 1991 – First edition of POV Magazine, edited by Wyndham Wise – Geoff Bowie, first Publisher.
• 1994 – The first edition of Hot Docs is held- Paul Jay was Chair of CIFC and Founding Chair of Hot Docs!
• 1995 – Atlantic chapter is formed.
• 1996 – BC chapter is formed.
• 1997 – Hot Docs incorporates as a separate charitable organization.
• 1998 – First coast-to-coast National Executive elected - Gary Marcuse, Chair.
• 2003 – The CIFC changes its name to DOC.
• 2006 – Ottawa chapter is formed.
• 2006 – Newfoundland chapter is formed.
• 2007 – Winnipeg chapter is formed.
• 2008 – Alberta chapter is formed.
• 2009 – Newfoundland chapter folds.
question_src: 什么时候介绍了第一台家庭电视？
pos_context_src: 电视在1920年代后期以粗略的实验形式获得，但要向消费者销售这项新技术还需要几年的时间。第二次世界大战后，在美国和英国流行的黑白电视广播的改进形式变得很普遍，电视机在家庭，企业和机构中变得司空见惯。在1950年代，电视是影响公众舆论的主要媒介。在1960年代中期，在美国和大多数发达国家引入了色彩广播。诸如Betamax，VHS磁带，本地磁盘，DVD，Flash Drives，高清蓝光光盘和云数字录像机等多种类型的档案存储媒体的可用性，使观众能够观看预先录制的材料（例如电影），按照自己的时间表。由于许多原因，尤其是远程检索的便利性，电视和视频编程的存储现在发生在云上。在2000年代最初十年结束时，数字电视传输的受欢迎程度大大增加。另一个发展是从标准定义电视（SDTV）（576i，有576个交错的分辨率和480i）到高清电视（HDTV）的转变，该电视（HDTV）提供了更高的分辨率。 HDTV可以以各种格式传输：1080p，1080i和720p。自2010年以来，随着智能电视的发明，Internet电视通过Netflix，Amazon Video，Iplayer，Hulu，Hulu，Roku和Chromecast等流视频服务通过互联网通过互联网提高了电视节目和电影的可用性。
neg_context_src: 巴西的第一批广播是为1950年举办的世界杯。电视是同年9月18日正式推出的，随着媒体大亨Assis Chateaubriand在圣保罗的现已停产Tupi推出。这是第一个讲电视的说法，甚至在葡萄牙与RTP（1955年）之前。它也是世界上第五个国家，拥有一个每日广播的电视台，在美国，英国，法国和墨西哥之后。在电视图皮电视台（TV Tupi）出现的第一张图片是五岁的SôniaMaria Dorce，他打扮成巴西本地人，他说：“晚上好。您在巴西的开放电视频道中。”图比的象征是一个巴西本地的孩子。

家庭购物/电子零售业是在1977年创建的，当时小型市场脱口秀电台节目主持人鲍勃·库克斯塔（Bob Circosta）被要求出售鳄梨绿色的罐头罐头罐子由车站所有者Bud Paxson播出，当时广告商交易了112个产品，而不是支付广告账单。起初犹豫不决，Circosta勉强地义务 - 令两个人感到惊讶的是，所有112个罐头都在一个小时内售罄。帕克森感受到了家庭商务的巨大销售潜力，并在有线电视上创建了世界上第一个购物频道，后来在全国范围内通过家庭购物网络推出（重新品牌为HSN）。鲍勃·尤利斯塔（Bob Circosta）是美国有史以来第一位电视家购物主持人，成为美国最直接识别的推销员之一。在接下来的三十年中，Circosta在HSN上售出了75,000多种不同的产品，在超过20,000个小时的现场直播，直播电视销售中获得了超过10亿美元的个人产品销售。 （这个故事是有争议的；有一些记录是，帕克森在1969年在他的较早的电视台，纽约詹姆斯敦的WNYP上尝试了类似的格式。）

1979年3月，政府成立了民族电视评小组，建议SBS扩展到电视。 SBS TV于1979年4月开始测试传输，当时它在周日的早晨展示了ABV-2墨尔本和ABN-2悉尼的各种外语计划。全日制传输于1980年10月24日（联合国日）下午6:30开始，作为频道0/28。显示的第一个节目是一部名为“我们是谁？”的纪录片，该纪录片由经验丰富的新闻主持人彼得·勒克（Peter Luck）主持。当时，SBS在UHF频道28和VHF频道0上广播（发音为“ OH”，而不是“零”），并计划在将来的某个时候停止使用后者。布鲁斯·吉恩格尔（Bruce Gyngell）于1956年向澳大利亚介绍了电视，他的任务是在新车站介绍第一批节目。

HomeTime是一部由明尼苏达州Chaska的Hometime Video Publishing制作的PBS家庭装修电视节目，与Whyy-TV/Wilmington-Philadelphia合作，并在公共电视和综合上广播。它于1986年11月1日在PBS上首次播出。1992年，“ HomeTime”开始在TLC（学习频道）上播出。当“ HomeTime”在TLC上播出时，Dean Johnson会说“ HomeTime”将“正确”，这是在演出进入商业假期时使用的。当节目从商业休息中出来时，迪恩·约翰逊（Dean Johnson）会说“现在，回到“家庭”。该节目于2016年1月30日结束，不再播出，尽管“ HomeTime”的剧集继续在联合组织中播出，但该联合版本在16个赛季后结束。
“我们从内而外设计的建筑物，而不是外部设计。” “我们想要有史以来最有效的办公楼，没有浪费的空间或浪费的能量。这是未来的建筑，而不是当前的建筑物。这座建筑物已经有很多爱，而且很自豪。”

温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。

由于第二次世界大战，在休息后在英国恢复了电视广播时，决定引入电视许可费以资助这项服务。 1946年6月1日首次推出时，该许可证涵盖了仅单色单渠道BBC电视服务的价格为2英镑（相当于£）。该许可最初是由总邮局（GPO）颁发的，该邮局当时是英国境内公共通信的监管者。 GPO还为由电力电力提供动力的家庭无线电接收器颁发了许可证，并由1904年《无线电电报法》开始执行法律，以管理许可系统。购买电视许可证的家庭不需要持有单独的广播许可证，因为电视执照涵盖了电视和广播接待。

1954年4月8日，第4频道成为网络不拥有的最早以彩色制作和传输本地节目的美国电视台之一，从E.K.当晚托管的五分钟电视转播开始。盖洛德；它还以该格式进行了精选的NBC网络程序，儿童节目“ Paul Winchell Show”是该电台的第一个网络颜色电视转播。 （1949年9月，在FCC批准了颜色传播标准之前，盖洛德订购了由RCA开发的彩色广播设备（包括两个RCA TK40彩色相机）。 车站。当NBC成为5月1日开始电视转播的第一个网络时，WKY-TV将Anadarko Indian Festival的颜色供稿提供给了“今日”和“ Home”的网络。本地综艺节目“汉克·汤普森（Hank Thompson Show）”也成为综艺节目的第一个彩色广播。 1955年，WKY-TV成为第一个向电视网络提供全长色彩计划的网络分支机构，将俄克拉荷马州市中心的Square Dance大会的报道传播到NBC；它还传输了彩色外科手术程序的闭路图像（WKY-TV已成为俄克拉荷马州电视台第一个通过四年前的1950年2月前通过闭路电视播放手术程序的俄克拉荷马州电视台）。
ŭ代表Esperanto拼字法中的一个半小动物，这是一种国际辅助语言，于1887年公开呈现。与白俄罗斯人一样，Esperantoŭ发音为非音节，主要是在Diphthongs“aŭ”，“ e”，“ e”和“ of”oŭ中。

•1983年 - 初次会议，第一次干预信。 CIFC建立在多伦多。
•1985年 - 第一个时事通讯是由传真发送的。它最终成为POV杂志。
•1988年 - 蒙特利尔分会（后来被称为魁北克章）。
•1991年 - 成立了国家高管 - 总裁约翰·沃克（John Walker）。
•1991年 - 第一版POV杂志，由Wyndham Wise编辑 - 杰夫·鲍伊（Geoff Bowie），第一版出版商。
•1994年 -  Hot Docs的第一版 - 保罗·杰伊（Paul Jay）是CIFC主席，也是Hot Docs的创始主席！
•1995年 - 大西洋分会成立。
•1996年 - 卑诗省分会。
•1997年 -  Hot Docs将其作为一个独立的慈善组织。
•1998年 - 首次海岸到海岸国家高管当选-Gary Marcuse，主席。
•2003  -  CIFC将其名称更改为DOC。
•2006年 - 渥太华分会成立。
•2006年 - 成立了纽芬兰分会。
•2007年 - 温尼伯分会成立。
•2008年 - 艾伯塔省分会成立。
•2009年 - 纽芬兰分会折叠。
report_src: 第一台家庭电视机的雏形在1920年代后期即已出现，但由于仍处于粗略的实验阶段，要向普通消费者销售这项新技术还需要再过几年的时间，因此真正被引入家庭并开始商业销售大约是在1930年代初期[1]。

question_en: How long did it take to complete the Chicago Central Area Transit Plan?
pos_context_en: In the summer of 1974, the CUTD selected a Core Plan, the initial portion of the Chicago Central Area Transit Project to be built. It consisted essentially of the Monroe Line, the Franklin Line, and a portion of the Randolph Line. The Core Plan, which would take about six years to complete and cost $1 billion based on an August 1973 cost estimate, was submitted to the Federal government on August 21, 1974. The Core Plan was received well, however, it was recommended that the project be reduced to $700 million. Modifications to the original Core Plan were made and the revised Plan was presented to UMTA in September 1974.
neg_context_en: In the early 1970s, while final planning was underway for a start on the new downtown subways, controversy began swirling in the District over the validity of the project and its cost. The 1968 Transit Plan was thought to be "mode restricted" and did not consider alternatives to the steel wheel-on-steel rail mode of rail rapid transit. Rail supporters argued that the "L" system was too extensive to replace with completely new equipment and vehicles, and that passenger volume on the core rail routes exceeded those which could be most efficiently carried by buses.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan, or generally referred to as the Chicago Central Area Transit Project (CCATP) in the 1970s, was an extensive study of the rapid transit system in downtown Chicago; the study had begun in 1965.

In April 1968, the completed study resulted in a three-volume report that proposed a series of recommendations for redeveloping and expanding Central Area communities, and for the replacement of The Loop elevated rapid transit system with a new Loop Subway under Randolph, Franklin, Van Buren, and Wabash, and a new Distributor Subway system in downtown Chicago (see Chicago "L").

A few years after the demise of the Chicago Central Area Transit Project (CCATP), the city was working on plans for new and less expensive transit alternatives for downtown Chicago. The Central Area had grown well beyond the expectations of the 1968 Transit Planning Study in terms of building development and employment growth. There were still concerns among Chicago's civic leaders that this growth would seriously outpace Chicago's mass transportation systems which had become insubstantial. By the 1980s and 1990s, replacement subways were deemed too expensive and extensions to the existing CTA heavy rail transit system were considered too limited in their benefits. Additional or expanded bus service on overcrowded and badly congested streets was considered impractical.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Project was formally adopted by the City of Chicago as part of the Comprehensive Plan of Chicago. In April 1970, the Chicago City Council passed a resolution authorizing the creation and implementation of the Chicago Urban Transportation District (CUTD). It also defined the boundaries of the District, a area encompassing downtown Chicago — bounded on the north by North Avenue, on the west by Ashland Avenue, on the south by the Stevenson Expressway, and on the east by Lake Michigan. In June, the CUTD was approved by public referendum with the power to levy taxes to provide the local share of funds for the Chicago Central Area Transit Project, which might have been the seed money for massive Federal assistance, at last, to bury the venerable Union Loop. In July, it was established by Illinois Statute as a separate municipal corporation with taxing powers.

The Central Area Circulator Project, coordinated by the Metropolitan Planning Council, opted for a light rail plan to enhance connectivity to a larger area of downtown by commuter railroad and rapid transit systems. The proposed system was dubbed the "Central Area Circulator", an eight-mile (13 km) light-rail transit network linking the North Western, Union and Randolph Metra suburban railroad stations to North Michigan Avenue, Streeterville, Navy Pier, the museums, and McCormick Place. The system was to include east-west routes north and south of the Chicago River as well as north-south links on portions of Michigan Avenue and Columbus Drive.

The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan called for subway construction to start in 1969, with the system opening in stages between 1973 and 1978. According to the 1968 report, the new Loop and Distributor Subways should have carried more than 390,000 passengers on an average weekday, including 152,000 daily passengers using the Distributor system. The total daily Distributor Subway travel by passengers who transferred to or from the commuter railroads (today's Metra and Amtrak) or other CTA rapid transit lines would have been twice these volumes. The Chicago Central Area Transit Plan's financial recommendations were, in retrospect, overly optimistic even for those days before the runaway inflation of the late 1960s and 1970s. The projected cost of building the Loop and Distributor Subway systems was $478 million in 1969 dollars. In this and other financial projections, the CCATPS assumed an "escalation" of 5% per year, an unfortunate estimate of the unforeseeable 8–11% inflation rates of the next few years.

Earlier proposals for transit facilities in the Chicago Central Area were reviewed, new plans were prepared and analyzed, and a recommended Central Area Transit Plan was developed. Loop area development potential was evaluated. Traffic projections were made. Consideration was given to architectural and environmental factors, operational requirements, and potential methods of financing the system. In April 1968 the study had culminated into an exhaustive three volume report recommending the construction of a fifteen-mile (24 km) subway system to replace the old elevated lines in downtown Chicago, naming it the Chicago Central Area Transit Project or CCATP.
The system proposed as a result of the 1968 Transit Planning Study consisted of two major transit facilities:The 'L' structures in downtown Chicago were to be replaced by subways under Franklin Street, Van Buren Street, Wabash Avenue, and Randolph Street. The proposed Loop Subway was to be linked to the Dan Ryan branch (then under construction at the time; now part of the Red Line) using the median strip of the proposed (but never built) Franklin Street Extension Expressway from the southwest corner of the Loop (Van Buren/Franklin) to Cermak-Chinatown. The Lake Street 'L' (Green Line) was to be replaced from Damen Avenue to the northwest corner of the Loop (Franklin/Randolph) by a new subway under Randolph Street. The Northside 'L' which carries Ravenswood (Brown Line) and Evanston Express (Purple Line) trains from Willow Street to the northwest corner of the Loop (Franklin/Randolph) would have been replaced by a new subway under Orleans Street to Division Street, and then northwest along Clybourn Avenue (adjacent to the State Street tubes) to the connection with the existing lines just south of Armitage.

The plan of expanded transit facilities would have undoubtedly benefited the whole Chicago metropolitan area. Many of the projects were basically completed, namely the extension of the West Side Subway (Congress Line) in the median of the Eisenhower Expressway (in operation June 22, 1958), Lake Street Elevation (in operation October 28, 1962), a part of the Englewood rapid transit extension (to Ashland/63rd, in operation May 6, 1969), the Dan Ryan rapid transit line (in operation September 28, 1969), the Kennedy and O'Hare rapid transit extensions (in operation February 1, 1970, completed September 3, 1984), massive signal and train control system improvements between 1967 and 1976, and the Southwest rapid transit extension, built in the form of the Midway Line (in operation October 31, 1993). Rolling stock and equipment improvements were made between 1964 and 1992 with the delivery of the High Performance Generation cars (the 2000-Series, 2200-Series, 2400-Series, 2600-Series, and 3200-Series). Modernization of many traction power substations, and remodeling of several outlying terminal stations were also completed. Some curve straightening projects were also completed such as the 2002-built Harrison Street Curve on the Green and Orange Lines, although most were not.
question_src: 完成芝加哥中央地区过境计划需要多长时间？
pos_context_title_src: 芝加哥中央地区运输计划
pos_context_src: 1974年夏天，CUTD选择了一个核心计划，这是要建造的芝加哥中央地区运输项目的初始部分。它基本上由门罗线，富兰克林线和兰道夫线的一部分组成。根据1973年8月的成本估算，该核心计划大约需要六年才能完成，并耗资10亿美元，并于1974年8月21日提交给联邦政府。核心计划得到了很好的收到，但是建议将该项目降低至7亿美元。对原始核心计划进行了修改，并于1974年9月将修订的计划提交给UMTA。

neg_context_src: 在1970年代初期，尽管最终的计划开始了新的市区地铁，但争议开始在该地区的项目及其成本上旋转。 1968年的过境计划被认为是“限制模式”，并且没有考虑钢轮在钢制钢铁快速运输模式的替代方案。铁路支持者认为，“ L”系统太广泛，无法用全新的设备和车辆代替，并且核心铁路路线上的乘客数量超过了公共汽车最有效携带的乘客。
1970年代，芝加哥中央地区过境计划，通常称为芝加哥中央地区运输项目（CCATP），是对芝加哥市中心快速运输系统的广泛研究。这项研究已于1965年开始。

In April 1968, the completed study resulted in a three-volume report that proposed a series of recommendations for redeveloping and expanding Central Area communities, and for the replacement of The Loop elevated rapid transit system with a new Loop Subway under Randolph, Franklin, Van Buren, and Wabash, and a new Distributor Subway system in downtown Chicago (see Chicago "L").

芝加哥中央地区运输项目（CCATP）灭亡的几年后，该市正在为芝加哥市中心的新且价格较低的过境替代方案制定计划。在建筑发展和就业增长方面，中心地区的发展远远超出了1968年运输计划研究的期望。芝加哥的公民领导人仍然担心这种增长将严重超过芝加哥的大众运输系统，而芝加哥的大众运输系统已经变得不稳定。到1980年代和1990年代，替换地铁被认为太昂贵了，对现有的CTA重型铁路运输系统的扩展被认为其福利过于限制。人满为患且拥挤的街道上的其他公交服务被认为是不切实际的。

芝加哥中央地区运输项目被芝加哥市正式采用，作为芝加哥综合计划的一部分。 1970年4月，芝加哥市议会通过了一项决议，授权创建和实施芝加哥城市交通区（CUTD）。它还定义了该地区的边界，该地区的边界是一个涵盖芝加哥市中心的地区 - 北大街（North Avenue）在北大街（North Avenue），西部由Ashland Avenue，南部的史蒂文森高速公路（Stevenson Expressway）和密歇根湖（Lake Michigan）边界。 6月，CUTD获得了公众全民投票的批准，其权力有权为芝加哥中央地区过境项目提供当地份额的资金，这可能是终于获得大量联邦援助的种子资金，以埋葬这位值得一杀的联盟循环。 7月，它由伊利诺伊州法规成立，是一家拥有税收权力的独立市政公司。
由大都会规划委员会协调的中央区域循环商项目选择了轻轨计划，以通过通勤铁路和快速运输系统来增强与市区更大区域的连通性。拟议的系统被称为“中央区域循环者”，这是一个八英里（13公里）的轻轨过境网络，将西北，联盟和伦道夫·梅尔多夫·梅尔斯拉郊区的火车站连接到北密歇根大街，斯特劳维尔，海军码头，博物馆和麦考米克广场。该系统将包括芝加哥河以北和南部的东西方路线，以及密歇根大道和哥伦布大道部分的南北连接。

芝加哥中央区域的运输计划要求从1969年开始地铁建设，该系统在1973年至1978年之间开放。根据1968年的报告，新的环路和分销商的地铁应在平均工作日携带390,000多名乘客，其中包括使用发行人系统的每日152,000名每日乘客。乘客的每日分销商地铁旅行总数将是这些量的两倍。回想起来，即使在1960年代后期和1970年代末期通货膨胀之前，芝加哥中央地区过境计划的财务建议也过于乐观。建造循环和分销商地铁系统的预计成本为1969年的4.78亿美元。在此和其他财务预测中，CCATP的“升级”为每年5％，这是对未来几年不可预见的8-11％通货膨胀率的不幸估计。

审查了芝加哥中央地区过境设施的较早提案，准备了新的计划和分析，并制定了建议的中央地区过境计划。评估了循环区域开发潜力。进行了交通预测。考虑了建筑和环境因素，运营要求以及资助该系统的潜在方法。 1968年4月，这项研究最终导致了一份详尽的三卷报告，建议建造一个15英里（24公里）的地铁系统，以替换芝加哥市中心的旧高架线，并将其命名为芝加哥中央地区运输项目或CCATP。
1968年运输计划研究的结果由两个主要的过境设施组成：芝加哥市中心的“ L”结构将由富兰克林街，范布伦街，瓦巴什大街和伦道夫街取代的“ L”结构。拟议的循环地铁将使用拟建的（但从未建造过的）富兰克林街伸展路的中间条形的中间条从Loop（Van Buren/Franklin）到Cermak-Chinatown。湖街“ L”（绿线）将从伦道夫街（Randolph Street）下的新地铁（Franklin/Randolph）从Damen Avenue（Franklin/Randolph）的西北角取代。带有Ravenswood（棕线）和Evanston Express（紫线）火车从Willow Street到Loop的西北角（Franklin/Randolph）的北侧“ L”将被Orleans街下的新地铁到Division Street下的新地铁所取代，然后是西北沿着Clybourn Avenue（Clybourn Avenue（Clybourn Avenue）的西北（与州街相邻的），与现有的行动相连。

扩大的过境设施的计划无疑将使整个芝加哥大都市地区受益。许多项目基本上都完成了，即在艾森豪威尔高速公路中位数（1958年6月22日在运营中），湖街海拔（1962年10月28日在运营中），Englewood Rapid extression的一部分（在运营的一部分），在1969年5月6日运营，Dan Ryyan Ryyan Ryyan Ryyan Ryyan Ryyan ryyan ryyan，肯尼迪（Kennedy）和奥黑尔（O'Hare）快速公交扩展（1970年2月1日运营，于1984年9月3日完成），1967年至1976年之间的大规模信号和火车控制系统的改进，以及西南快速运输扩展，内形式（1993年10月31日运营）。在1964年至1992年之间进行了滚动库存和设备改进，并提供了高性能一代汽车（2000系，2200系列，2400系列，2600系列和3200系列）。许多牵引力变电站的现代化以及对几个外围终端站进行了重塑。还完成了一些曲线拉直项目，例如2002年建造的Harrison Street曲线在绿色和橙色线上，尽管大多数不是。
report_src: 根据1973年8月的成本估算，芝加哥中央地区过境计划的核心工程（由门罗线、富兰克林线及兰道夫线部分组成）预计大约需要六年才能建成[1]。

question_en: What does FIFA stand for?
pos_context_en: The Fédération Internationale de Football Association (FIFA ; French for 'International Federation of Association Football') is an organization which describes itself as an international governing body of association football, fútsal, beach soccer, and eFootball. FIFA is responsible for the organization of football's major international tournaments, notably the World Cup which commenced in 1930 and the Women's World Cup which commenced in 1991.
neg_context_en: Winfield Toll Bridge, also known as the Ross Booth Memorial Bridge, is a historic three-span cantilever Warren Truss bridge located at Winfield and Red House, Putnam County, West Virginia. It was built in 1955, and spans the Kanawha River, carrying West Virginia Route 34. The cantilever through-truss consists of two anchor spans each 245 feet in length and the main span 462 feet in length between pier center lines. The main span consists of two 128 feet, 4 inch, cantilever arms and a 205 feet, 4 inch, suspended span.

Sweden beat Finland 8–1 on 2 October 1949 in Malmö. However, FIFA's website does not include this match in the list of matches or in the group standings. RSSSF's website lists the match with the note "Sweden played B-team", and does not provide group standings.
ㅟ is one of the Korean hangul. The Unicode for ㅟ is U+315F.
Ơ is one of the 12 Vietnamese language vowels. It is pronounced (an unrounded [o]).
X̂ is the Latin letter "X" with a circumflex. The letter is used in the Haida language and Aleut languages of Alaska.
ڼ is the twenty-ninth letter of Pashto alphabet. It represents the retroflex nasal (IPA: ) which is ण in Devanagari and is transliterated . In Saraiki it is written as ݨ.
s͎ is a symbol used in the Extensions to the International Phonetic Alphabet to represent a whistled s. The sound occurs in the Shona language represented by sv, as in the name of Morgan Tsvangirai.

Ŭ represents a semivowel in the orthography of Esperanto, which is an international auxiliary language publicly presented in 1887. As in Belarusian, Esperanto Ŭ is pronounced as a non-syllabic , primarily in the diphthongs "aŭ", "eŭ" and rarely "oŭ".
Ġ is the 7th letter of the Maltese alphabet, preceded by F and followed by G. It represents the sound .
Ĥ or ĥ is a consonant in Esperanto orthography, representing a voiceless velar fricative or voiceless uvular fricative . Its name in Esperanto is "ĥo" (pronounced ).
question_src: 国际足联代表什么？
pos_context_src: Fédération国际足球协会（FIFA；法国国际协会足球联合会）是一个组织，该组织将自己描述为国际协会足球，Fútsal，Beach Soccer和Efootball的国际理事机构。 FIFA负责组织足球的主要国际比赛，尤其是1930年开始的世界杯以及1991年开始的女子世界杯。
neg_context_src: 温菲尔德收费桥（Winfield Toll Bridge），也被称为罗斯·布斯纪念桥（Ross Booth Memorial Bridge），是位于西弗吉尼亚州普特南县温菲尔德（Winfield）和红屋（Red House）的历史悠久的三跨悬臂沃伦·特鲁斯桥（Warren Truss Bridge）。它建于1955年，跨越了卡纳瓦河（Kanawha River），载有西弗吉尼亚州34号公路。悬臂穿越漫游器由两个锚固跨度分别为245英尺，主跨度为462英尺，长度为462英尺。主跨度由两个128英尺，4英寸，悬臂臂和205英尺4英寸的悬架组成。
瑞典于1949年10月2日在马尔默击败芬兰。但是，FIFA的网站不包括在比赛列表或组排行榜中。 RSSSF的网站列出了“瑞典播放B-Team”的注释，并且不提供小组排名。
ㅟ是朝鲜hangul之一。 ㅟ的Unicode是U+315F。
ơ是12种越南语言元音之一。它是发音（一个不可能的[O]）。
x̂是带有绕行的拉丁字母“ x”。这封信用于阿拉斯加的海达语言和阿留勒族语言。
ڼ是Pashto字母的第29封信。它代表反射鼻鼻腔（IPA：），它在Devanagari中是ण，并进行了音译。在saraiki中，它被写成ݨ。
S͎是在扩展到国际语音字母的符号中代表吹口哨的符号。声音以SV代表的Shona语言出现，就像Morgan Tsvangirai的名义一样。
ŭ代表Esperanto拼字法中的一个半小动物，这是一种国际辅助语言，于1887年公开呈现。与白俄罗斯人一样，Esperantoŭ发音为非音节，主要是在Diphthongs“aŭ”，“ e”，“ e”和“ of”oŭ中。
ġ是马耳他字母的第七个字母，之前为f，然后是G。它代表声音。
ĥ或ĥ是Esperanto拼字法中的辅音，代表了无声的丝绒摩擦或无声的紫红色摩擦力。它在Esperanto中的名称是“ĥo”（发音）。
report_src: “国际足联”是“国际足球联合会”（法语全称 Fédération Internationale de Football Association，缩写 FIFA）的中文简称，负责全球范围内的协会足球、五人制足球、沙滩足球和电子足球的管理，并组织自1930年起举办的世界杯及自1991年起举办的女子世界杯等主要国际赛事[1]。

question_en: Where is the Gulf of Tonkin?
pos_context_en: The Gulf of Tonkin (, ; also ) is a body of water located off the coast of northern Vietnam and southern China. It is a northern arm of the South China Sea. The Gulf is defined in the west by the northern coastline of Vietnam, in the north by China's Guangxi province, and to the east by China's Leizhou Peninsula and Hainan Island.
neg_context_en: On the morning of 2 August 1964, the morning after OPLAN commandos raided a North Vietnamese radio transmitter located on an offshore island, one of these destroyers, the USS "Maddox", was reported to have come under attack by DRV naval patrol boats in the Gulf of Tonkin. There was a second alleged attack on August 4, which was later shown to be a falsehood. These attacks, and the ensuing naval actions, known as the Gulf of Tonkin Incident, were seized upon by President Lyndon Johnson to secure passage by the U.S. Congress of the Southeast Asia Resolution (better known as the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution) on 7 August 1964, leading to a dramatic escalation of the Vietnam War. It has since been alleged that the Gulf of Tonkin Incident was partly a fabrication, including testimony by participants, such as squadron commander James Stockdale, in the events themselves. Even the attacks that did happen were not unprovoked, but a result of the OPLAN 34A raids, which was in essence an American operation.

US Naval forces had been introduced intermittently off the coast of Vietnam since March 1950 as "show the flag" tours to reinforce the Republic of Vietnam. In May 1964 three carrier task groups took up position at Yankee Station in the Gulf of Tonkin. Reconnaissance flights were conducted by these carriers, although no combat missions had started. The Soviets had assisted the Vietnamese in the construction of more sophisticated anti-aircraft installations. The Navy sought to bring electronic warfare "DeSoto missions" to identify these installations and sent the , leading to the Tonkin Gulf Incident.

It was originally claimed by the National Security Agency that a Second Gulf of Tonkin incident occurred on August 4, 1964, as another sea battle, but instead evidence was found of "Tonkin ghosts" (false radar images) and not actual North Vietnamese torpedo boats. In the 2003 documentary "The Fog of War", the former United States Secretary of Defense Robert S. McNamara admitted that the August 2 USS "Maddox" attack happened with no Defense Department response, but the August 4 Gulf of Tonkin attack never happened. In 1995, McNamara met with former Vietnam People's Army General Võ Nguyên Giáp to ask what happened on August 4, 1964 in the second Gulf of Tonkin Incident. "Absolutely nothing", Giáp replied. Giáp claimed that the attack had been imaginary.

On 2 August 1964, United States President Lyndon B. Johnson claimed that North Vietnamese forces had twice attacked American destroyers in the Gulf of Tonkin. Known today as the Gulf of Tonkin Incident, this event spawned the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution of 7 August 1964, ultimately leading to open war between North Vietnam and the United States. It furthermore foreshadowed the major escalation of the Vietnam War in South Vietnam, which began with the landing of US regular combat troops at Da Nang in 1965.

In the convention on Gulf of Tonkin signed between the Vietnamese government and the Chinese government, China respects the Vietnamese sovereignty over the island and there is no dispute over the island
The core issue to be settled in the Gulf of Tonkin is which principle should be used in order to divide the Gulf. In this context, the impact of islands is of crucial importance and, in particular, the Vietnamese controlled Bach Long Vi Island. The first question is whether or not it qualifies as an island according to the provisions of the 1982 United Nations Law of the Sea Convention (1982 UNCLOS). If it does impact on the tracing of a line of equidistance if this principle is applied in the Gulf of Tonkin. Logically, Vietnam would take the position that Bach Long Vi Island should have its full impact in any agreement on how to divide the Gulf. On the other hand, China has an interest in minimising the impact that the Island would have on any agreed delimitation. This could be done by, either arguing that Bach Long Vi is not an island in accordance with the provisions of 1982 UNCLOS or, by arguing that its impact should be minimised and possibly even be disregarded. For China to argue that it is not an island would be counterproductive as China has earlier controlled the island and has claimed that the island was inhabited before it was handed-over to Vietnam in the late 1950s.

The Beibu Gulf Economic Rim or Beibu Economic Belt () also known as Gulf of Tonkin Economic Belt in (Vietnamese: Vành đai kinh tế vịnh Bắc Bộ) defines the economic region or rim surrounding around China's southwestern coastal region and cities around the Gulf of Tonkin. The region is part of Chinese government's "Go West" strategy, to boost its less developed western regions. The implementation of the campaign, has resulted in many construction projects in cities on the Beibu Gulf Rim, especially in Guangxi. The Beibu Gulf economic rim has emerged as a new highlight of China-ASEAN cooperation, especially between Vietnam, who is also cooperating in this economic zone. It covers Guangdong, Hainan and Guangxi, and northern and central Vietnam.
The cooperation scope includes trade, investment, exploitation of marine, tourism and oceanic environmental protection.

The bay's Vietnamese and Chinese names – and , respectively – both mean "Northern Bay". The name "Tonkin", written "" in Hán-Nôm characters and in the Vietnamese alphabet, means "eastern capital", and is the former toponym for Hanoi, the present capital of Vietnam. It should not to be confused with Tokyo, which is also written "" and also means "eastern capital". During Vietnam's French colonial era, the northern region was called "Tonkin".

Various news sources, including "Time", "Life" and "Newsweek", ran articles throughout August on the Tonkin Gulf incident. "Time" reported: "Through the darkness, from the West and south ... intruders boldly sped ... at least six of them ... they opened fire on the destroyers with automatic weapons, this time from as close as 2,000 yards." "Time" stated that there was "no doubt in Sharp's mind that the US would now have to answer this attack", and that there was no debate or confusion within the administration regarding the incident.

The Gulf of Tonkin incident (), also known as the USS "Maddox" incident, was an international confrontation that led to the United States engaging more directly in the Vietnam War. It involved either one or two separate confrontations involving North Vietnam and the United States in the waters of the Gulf of Tonkin. The original American report blamed North Vietnam for both incidents, but eventually became very controversial with widespread belief that at least one, and possibly both incidents were false, and possibly deliberately so. On August 2, 1964, the destroyer , while performing a signals intelligence patrol as part of DESOTO operations, was pursued by three North Vietnamese Navy torpedo boats of the 135th Torpedo Squadron. "Maddox" fired three warning shots and the North Vietnamese boats then attacked with torpedoes and machine gun fire. "Maddox" expended over 280 3-inch (76.2 mm) and 5-inch (127 mm) shells in a sea battle. One U.S. aircraft was damaged, three North Vietnamese torpedo boats were damaged, and four North Vietnamese sailors were killed, with six more wounded. There were no U.S. casualties. "Maddox" "was unscathed except for a single bullet hole from a Vietnamese machine gun round."
question_src: Tonkin湾在哪里？
pos_context_src: Tonkin湾（，也是）是位于越南北部和中国南部海岸的水体。它是南中国海的北部。海湾由越南北部海岸线，中国的广西省以及中国的莱佐半岛和海南岛定义。
neg_context_src: 1964年8月2日，奥普兰突击队突袭了位于离岸岛上的北越无线电发射机后的第二天早晨，据报道，其中一名驱逐舰“ Maddox”在Tonkin湾被DRV海军巡逻艇遭到攻击。 8月4日发生了第二次涉嫌袭击，后来被证明是虚假的。这些袭击以及随之而来的海军行动，称为Tonkin湾事件，总统林登·约翰逊（Lyndon Johnson）于1964年8月7日抓住了美国东南亚国会决议（称为Tonkin Julf of Tonkin Consolution）的通过，导致了越南战争的巨大升级。此后，据称，在事件本身中，诸如中队指挥官詹姆斯·斯托克代尔（James Stockdale）等参与者的证词，包括参与者的证词。即使确实发生的攻击也不是无端的，而是由OPLAN 34A突袭的结果，这本质上是美国的行动。
自1950年3月以来，美国海军在越南沿海地区被间歇地引入，作为“展示国旗”之旅，以加强越南共和国。 1964年5月，三个载体任务小组在旺金湾的洋基车站担任职位。这些载体进行了侦察飞行，尽管没有开始战斗任务。苏联人协助越南人建造了更复杂的防空装置。海军试图带来电子战“ Desoto Missions”来识别这些装置并将其发送给Tonkin Gulf事件。

国家安全局最初声称，第二次湾湾事件发生在1964年8月4日，是另一场海战，而是发现了“ Tonkin Ghosts”（虚假雷达图像）的证据，而不是实际的北越鱼雷船。在2003年的纪录片《战争的雾》中，前美国国防部长罗伯特·麦克纳马拉（Robert S. McNamara）承认，8月2日USS“ Maddox”袭击发生了，没有国防部的反应，但8月4日，Tonkin袭击的袭击从未发生过。 1995年，麦克纳马拉（McNamara）会见了前越南人民陆军将军维恩·吉普（V(NguyênGiáp），询问1964年8月4日在第二次托金海湾事件中发生了什么。吉普回答：“绝对没有”。吉普声称这次袭击是虚构的。
1964年8月2日，美国总统林登·约翰逊（Lyndon B. Johnson）声称，北越部队两次袭击了温金湾的美国驱逐舰。今天被称为Tonkin湾事件，这项事件催生了1964年8月7日的Tonkin决议，最终导致了北越北部与美国之间的战争。它还预示着越南南部的越南战争的重大升级，该战争始于1965年美国常规战斗部队在丹南的登陆。

在《越南政府与中国政府之间签署的托金湾公约》中，中国尊重越南主权岛上的主权，岛上没有争议
要解决的核心问题是特林湾，应该使用哪个原则来划分海湾。在这种情况下，岛屿的影响至关重要，尤其是越南受控的巴赫长六世岛。第一个问题是，它是否根据1982年联合国海公约法（1982 UNCLOS）的规定作为岛屿。如果它确实会影响到等距线的追踪，如果在Tonkin的海湾中应用了该原理。从逻辑上讲，越南将采取这样一个立场，即巴赫·朗·VI岛应在如何对海湾分裂的任何协议中产生全部影响。另一方面，中国有兴趣最大程度地减少该岛对任何商定的划界的影响。这可以通过认为Bach Long VI不是根据1982年UNCLOS的规定的岛屿，或者认为应将其影响最小化，甚至可能被忽略。中国认为这不是一个岛屿会适得其反，因为中国早些时候控制了该岛，并声称该岛在1950年代后期将其移交给越南之前就居住了。

Beibu Gulf经济边缘或Beibu经济带（）也被称为Tonkin经济带（越南人：Vànhgai kinhtếvịnhbắcbắcbộ），定义了中国西南沿海地区和托金（Tonkin Kulf of tonkin）的经济区域。该地区是中国政府“西部”战略的一部分，以增强其不太发达的西部地区。该活动的实施导致了Beibu Gulf Rim的城市的许多建筑项目，尤其是在广西地区。 Beibu Gulf经济篮板已成为中国 - 东盟合作的新亮点，尤其是在越南之间，越南也在这个经济区合作。它涵盖了广东，海南和广西，以及北部和越南中部。
合作范围包括贸易，投资，剥削海洋，旅游业和海洋环境保护。
海湾的越南和中国名字，分别是“北湾”。 “ Tonkin”这个名字是Hán-Nôm角色和越南字母的名称，意为“东部首都”，并且是越南现任首都河内的前任最高名称。它不应与东京混淆，这也是写入“”的，也意味着“东方首都”。在越南法国殖民时代，北部地区被称为“ Tonkin”。
各种新闻来源，包括“时间”，“生活”和“新闻周刊”，在整个八月的Tonkin Gulf事件中都刊登了文章。 “时间”报道：“通过黑暗，从西方和南部的黑暗中……入侵者大胆地加速了……至少六个...他们用自动武器向驱逐舰开火，这次是从2,000码处开始。” “时间”指出：“毫无疑问，夏普，美国现在将不得不回答这一攻击”，政府内部就事件没有辩论或困惑。

Tonkin事件（）的湾，也称为“ Maddox”事件，是一次国际对抗，导致美国更直接参与越南战争。它涉及一两个单独的对抗，涉及北越和美国在托金海湾的水域中。最初的美国报告将这两种事件都归咎于北越，但最终引起了人们的争议，普遍认为，至少有一次，可能都是错误的，可能是错误的，并且可能是故意的。 1964年8月2日，驱逐舰在作为Desoto行动的一部分进行信号情报巡逻时，由第135 Torpedo中队的三艘北越海军鱼雷船追逐。 “ Maddox”开了三枪，北越船随后用鱼雷和机枪射击袭击。 “ Maddox”在海战中花费了超过280 3英寸（76.2毫米）和5英寸（127毫米）的贝壳。一架美国飞机损坏了，三只北越鱼雷船损坏了，四名北越水手被杀，又受伤了6人。没有美国伤亡。 “ Maddox”“除了越南机枪的单个子弹孔外，毫发无损。”
report_src: Tonkin湾（又称北部湾）位于越南北部与中国南部海岸之间，是南中国海最北部的海湾，其范围由越南北部海岸线、中国广西壮族自治区，以及中国的雷州半岛和海南岛所环绕[1]。

question_en: When was the American Diabetes Association formed?
pos_context_en: The ADA was founded in 1940 by six leading physicians − including Dr. Herman O. Mosenthal, Dr. Joseph T. Beardwood Jr., Dr. Joseph H. Barack, and Dr. E. S. Dillion − at their 1939 meeting of The American College of Physicians. In September 1946, they hosted a meeting in Toronto, Canada to celebrate the twenty-fifth anniversary of the discovery of insulin. The meeting served as a successful forum for hundreds of physicians and leading figures interested in the studies of diabetes and carbohydrate metabolism. The organization is now a national nonprofit with 40 affiliate organizations, more than 800 individual chapters, over a million volunteers, and almost 1,000 staff members − including officer and a board of directors.
neg_context_en: The Diabetic Association of Australia was formed in 1938. In 1956 the Diabetes Federation of Australia was formed and New South Wales changed its name to the Diabetic Association of NSW. In 2010, the name was changed to the Australian Diabetes Council, but in April 2014, after a change in the leadership, the organisation became known as Diabetes NSW. In 2016 following the merger with Diabetes ACT the organisation became known as Diabetes NSW & ACT - the peak consumer body for diabetes in New South Wales and the ACT.

In 1934, he conceived the idea of an association which would foster research and encourage education and welfare of patients. To this end a group of doctors and diabetics met in the London home of Lawrence's patient, H. G. Wells, the scientist and writer, and the Diabetic Association was formed. When other countries followed suit it became the British Diabetic Association (the BDA). Lawrence was Chairman of the Executive Council from 1934–1961 and Hon. Life President from 1962. His enthusiasm and drive ensured the life and steady growth of this association which soon became the voice of the diabetic population and constantly sought to promote the welfare of diabetics. There are now active branches through the country. He was also a prime mover in production of "The Diabetic Journal" (forerunner of Balance), the first issue of which appeared in January 1935. Many articles thereafter were contributed by himself anonymously. He and colleague Joseph Hoet were the main proponents in founding the International Diabetes Federation and he served as their first president from 1950–1958. At their triennial conferences, Lawrence's appearance was always greeted with acclaim.

He has carried out pioneering work in the medical field with a particular interest in diabetes. In 1982, he pioneered the formation of the Diabetes Association of the Caribbean, which now has 26 member countries, and was its President from 1985 to 1987 and its Vice President from 1989 to 1991. In 1991, he launched the University Diabetes Outreach Project (UDOP) with the help of a Wolfson Foundation grant. He played a key role in partnerships between the International Diabetes Federation and the Pan American Health Organization (PAHO/WHO), in responding to the emerging pandemic of type 2 diabetes, by applying the St. Vincent Declaration intervention model to the Americas, in the form of the Declaration of the Americas on Diabetes or DOTA (1996).

Dr. Charles Best, a co-inventor of medical insulin founded the Diabetic Association of Ontario in the late 1940s. As other provinces and territories started to form their own associations, it became clear that if the provincial branches combined their resources they could more effectively serve their membership. This culminated in the formation of the Canadian Diabetes Association in 1953.

The late national professor Muhammad Ibrahim is the founder of BIRDEM in 1980. Under his leadership, Bangladesh Diabetic Association (then named Diabetic Association for Pakistan) was formed in February 1956. Bangladesh Diabetic Association are nine separate organizations. These are the BIRDEM (Bangladesh Institute of Research and Rehabilitation in Diabetes, Endocrine and Metabolic Disorders), Rehabilitation and Vocational Training Center, National Healthcare Network, Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital and Research Center, Ibrahim Medical College, Bangladesh Institute of Health Sciences, BIRDEM Nursing College, Bangladesh University of Health Sciences and Healthcare Development Project. Professor Muhammad Ibrahim proposed a chamber of the lower house of his home in Segunbagicha, Dhaka to use the Association. In the home, he started the outdoor department for diabetes. First of all, there was a free medical treatment. During the Pakistan period, the Samity was given some land for the hospital in Segunbagicha. The hospital was inaugurated in 1980 at Shahbagh. In 2013 BIRDEM-2 hospital was started in Segunbagicha.

Founded in 1973, AADE works to define the practice of diabetes education, increase patients' access to the services of diabetes educators, and provide members with the support and tools to become leaders in the field of diabetes care.

Mayes became a volunteer working to improve the lives of people with diabetes when his son Wendell Mayes III was diagnosed with diabetes at age nine. He has served as Chairman of the American Diabetes Association (1974–77) and President of the International Diabetes Federation (1991–94), the first layperson to hold the position. The American Diabetes Association named its highest non-scientific award for Mayes and presented him with the first medal in 1986. The ADA also presented Mayes with the Charles H. Best Medal (1978), the Addison B. Scoville Award (1977), the Josiah Kirby Lilly Sr. Award (1991) and the Harold Rifkin Award (1994). In 1994 in Kobe, Japan, the Colloquium on Medical Science presented Mayes with the Masaji Takeda Medal. Mayes was honored by the American Diabetes Association Texas Affiliate in 1994 with a dinner in Dallas. When the State of Texas formed the Texas Diabetes Council in 1983, he served as its first chairman. For nine months in 1999 he returned to the Texas Diabetes Council to serve as its Interim Executive Director. He was the first inductee into the Texas Diabetes Hall of Fame.

William Christopher Stadie (June 15, 1886 – September 12, 1959) was a researcher, a Diabetes specialist. He was John Herr Musser Emeritus Professor of Research Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania. He also served as an editor of the "Diabetes", the journal of the American Diabetes Association. Other distinctions included: honorary degree of the University of Pennsylvania, the Phillips Medal of the American College of Physicians (1941), the Kober Medal for 1955 from the Association of American Physicians and the Banting Medal of the American Diabetes Association. During the 1918 influenza epidemic Stadie invented oxygen therapy for treatment of cyanosis, a condition resulting from pneumonia.

Diabetes is a monthly peer-reviewed medical journal published since 1952 by the American Diabetes Association. It covers research about the physiology and pathophysiology of diabetes mellitus including any aspect of laboratory, animal or human research. Emphasis is on investigative reports focusing on areas such as the pathogenesis of diabetes and its complications, normal and pathologic pancreatic islet function and intermediary metabolism, pharmacological mechanisms of drug and hormone action, and biochemical and molecular aspects of normal and abnormal biological processes. Diabetes also publishes abstracts presented at the ADA's annual meeting, Scientific Sessions, in as a supplement.

Created following Hurricanes Katrina and Rita in 2005 by the American College of Endocrinology (ACE) with support provided from Lilly Diabetes, the My Diabetes Emergency Plan is a comprehensive resource for diabetes patients in crises. The plan has three components: A pocket-sized checklist, an instructional “how-to” video and an educational website. Available in English and Spanish, the checklist details for diabetes patients the essential items and the practical steps to take in advance of an emergency situation - before they are faced with a difficult situation. The video provides patients with real-life examples of the elements they should include in their kits and can be viewed by visiting: www.mydiabetesemergencyplan.com.
question_src: 美国糖尿病协会何时形成？
pos_context_src: ADA由六位主要医生于1940年成立，其中包括Herman O. Mosenthal博士，Joseph T. Beardwood Jr.，Joseph H. Barack博士和E. S. Dillion博士 - 在1939年美国医师学院的1939年会议上。 1946年9月，他们在加拿大多伦多举行了一次会议，以庆祝发现胰岛素二十五周年。这次会议为数百名医生和对糖尿病和碳水化合物代谢研究感兴趣的领先人物的成功论坛。该组织现在是一家国家非营利组织，拥有40个会员组织，超过800个个人章节，超过一百万的志愿者，以及近1,000名员工 - 包括官员和董事会。
neg_context_title_src: 罗伯特·丹尼尔·劳伦斯（Robert Daniel Lawrence）
美国糖尿病教育者协会
美国临床内分泌学家协会
neg_context_src: 澳大利亚糖尿病协会成立于1938年。1956年，澳大利亚糖尿病联合会成立，新南威尔士州将其名称改为新南威尔士州的糖尿病协会。 2010年，这个名字改为澳大利亚糖尿病委员会，但在领导层改变后，2014年4月，该组织被称为新南威尔士州糖尿病。在与糖尿病法案合并后，该组织在2016年被称为NSW＆ACT，这是新南威尔士州糖尿病的峰值消费者和该法案。

1934年，他想到了一个协会的想法，该协会将促进研究并鼓励患者的教育和福利。为此，一群医生和糖尿病患者在伦敦的劳伦斯病人的住所H. G. Wells，科学家和作家H. G. Wells和糖尿病协会成立。当其他国家效仿时，它成为英国糖尿病协会（BDA）。劳伦斯（Lawrence）于1934  -  1961年担任执行理事会主席，并曾担任Hon。生命总统从1962年开始。他的热情和动力确保了这种协会的生活和稳定成长，这很快就成为糖尿病人口的声音，并不断寻求促进糖尿病患者的福利。现在有整个国家的活跃分支机构。他还是《糖尿病期刊》（Balance of Balance of Balance）生产中的主要推动者，其第一期发表于1935年1月。此后，许多文章匿名匿名撰写了许多文章。他和同事约瑟夫·霍伊特（Joseph Hoet）是成立国际糖尿病联合会的主要支持者，他在1950  -  1958年担任第一任总统。在三年期间，劳伦斯的出现总是受到赞誉。

他在医疗领域进行了开拓性的工作，对糖尿病特别感兴趣。 1982年，他开创了加勒比海糖尿病协会的成立，该协会现在拥有26个成员国，并于1985年至1987年担任总裁，并于1989年至1991年。1991年，他在沃尔夫森基金会的帮助下启动了大学糖尿病外展项目（UDOP）。他在国际糖尿病联合会与泛美卫生组织（PAHO/WHO）之间的合作伙伴关系中发挥了关键作用，在对2型糖尿病的新兴大流行中，通过将圣文森特宣言干预模型应用于美洲的形式，以《神圣宣言》的形式应用于Diabetes或Dota（1996年）。
医学胰岛素的共同发育员查尔斯·贝斯特（Charles Best）在1940年代后期建立了安大略省的糖尿病协会。随着其他省份和地区开始建立自己的协会，很明显，如果省级分支机构将资源结合在一起，他们就可以更有效地为会员服务。这最终达到了1953年加拿大糖尿病协会的形成。

已故的国家教授穆罕默德·易卜拉欣（Muhammad Ibrahim）是1980年的伯德（Birdem）创始人。在他的领导下，孟加拉国糖尿病协会（当时被任命为巴基斯坦糖尿病协会）成立了1956年2月。孟加拉国糖尿病协会是九个独立的组织。这些是鸟类（孟加拉国研究与康复研究所，内分泌和代谢疾病的研究与康复研究所），康复和职业培训中心，国家医疗保健网络，易卜拉欣心脏医院和研究中心，易卜拉欣医学院，孟加拉国健康科学研究院研究所，鸟类护士学院，班克拉德什大学健康科学研究所和医疗保健研究。穆罕默德·易卜拉欣（Muhammad Ibrahim）教授提出了他位于达卡（Dhaka）Segunbagicha的房屋下议院的一个房间，以使用该协会。在家里，他成立了户外糖尿病部门。首先，有一种免费的医疗。在巴基斯坦时期，该samity被送去了塞古尼巴吉卡医院的一些土地。该医院于1980年在Shahbagh开幕。 2013年，Birdem-2医院在Segunbagicha开始。
AADE成立于1973年，致力于定义糖尿病教育的实践，增加患者对糖尿病教育者的服务，并为成员提供支持和工具，以成为糖尿病护理领域的领导者。

当他的儿子温德尔·梅斯三世（Wendell Mayes III）在9岁时被诊断出患有糖尿病时，梅斯（Mayes）成为一名志愿者，致力于改善糖尿病患者的生活。他曾担任美国糖尿病协会（1974  -  77年）的主席和国际糖尿病联合会主席（1991  -  94年），这是第一个担任该职位的外行。美国糖尿病协会（American Diabetes Association）命名为Mayes的最高非科学奖，并在1986年获得了第一枚奖牌。ADA还向Mayes颁发了Charles H. Best Medal（1978），Addison B.Scoville Award（1977），Josiah Kirby Lilly Sr. Sr.奖（1991年）和Harold Rifkin奖和Harold Rifkink Kind（1994年）。 1994年，在日本科比（Kobe），医学座谈会向梅斯（Masaji Takeda）颁发了梅斯（Mays）。梅斯（Mayes）于1994年在达拉斯（Dallas）的晚餐中受到美国糖尿病协会的荣誉。德克萨斯州于1983年成立德克萨斯糖尿病委员会时，他担任第一任主席。 1999年，他回到德克萨斯州糖尿病委员会担任临时执行董事。他是德克萨斯糖尿病名人堂的第一位入选者。

威廉·克里斯托弗·斯塔迪（William Christopher Stadie）（1886年6月15日至1959年9月12日）是一名研究人员，糖尿病专家。他是宾夕法尼亚大学的John Herr Musser名誉研究医学教授。他还担任美国糖尿病协会杂志“糖尿病”的编辑。其他区别包括：宾夕法尼亚大学荣誉学位，美国医师学院的菲利普斯奖章（1941年），1955年美国医师协会的Kober奖章以及美国糖尿病协会的banting奖牌。在1918年，流感流行的Stadie发明了氧疗法以治疗氰，这是由肺炎引起的。
糖尿病是美国糖尿病协会自1952年以来发表的每月同行评审的医学杂志。它涵盖了有关糖尿病的生理学和病理生理学的研究，包括实验室，动物或人类研究的任何方面。重点是调查报告，重点是糖尿病的发病机理及其并发症，正常和病理胰岛功能以及中介代谢，药物和激素作用的药理机制以及正常和异常生物学过程的生化和分子方面。糖尿病还发表了在ADA年度会议，科学会议上发表的摘要，作为补充。

美国内分泌学院（ACE）于2005年遵循飓风卡特里娜飓风和丽塔飓风，并在礼来糖尿病提供的支持下，我的糖尿病紧急计划是危机中糖尿病患者的全面资源。该计划有三个组成部分：袖珍清单，教学“操作方法”视频和一个教育网站。糖尿病患者的清单详细信息提供了英语和西班牙语，在紧急情况之前，在面临困难的情况之前，要采取的基本项目和实际步骤。该视频为患者提供了现实生活中应包含的元素的现实示例，可以通过访问来查看：www.mydiabetesemergencyplan.com。
report_src: 美国糖尿病协会（American Diabetes Association，ADA）成立于1940年，由六位主要医生——包括Herman O. Mosenthal博士、Joseph T. Beardwood Jr.、Joseph H. Barack博士及E. S. Dillion博士——在1939年美国医师学院会议之后共同发起创立[1]。

question_en: What is the largest U.S. Navy shipyard?
pos_context_en: The Norfolk Naval Shipyard, often called the Norfolk Navy Yard and abbreviated as NNSY, is a U.S. Navy facility in Portsmouth, Virginia, for building, remodeling, and repairing the Navy's ships. It is the oldest and largest industrial facility that belongs to the U.S. Navy as well as the most multifaceted. Located on the Elizabeth River, the yard is just a short distance upriver from its mouth at Hampton Roads.
neg_context_title_en: Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works
Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works
neg_context_en: Naval Base Kitsap is the third-largest Navy base in the U.S. It features one of the U.S. Navy's four nuclear shipyards, one of two strategic nuclear weapons facilities, the only West Coast dry dock capable of handling a Nimitz-class aircraft carrier and the Navy's largest fuel depot.

Charleston, North Charleston, Goose Creek, and Hanahan are home to branches of the United States military. During the Cold War, the Naval Base (1902–1996) became the third largest U.S. homeport, with 23,500 Navy and Marine personnel, and 13,200 civilians serving over 80 ships and submarines. In addition, the combined facilities of the Naval Base and Weapons Station created the largest U.S. submarine port. The Charleston Naval Shipyard repaired frigates, destroyers, cruisers, submarine tenders, and submarines. Also during this period, the shipyard conducted refueling of nuclear submarines.

The Bellingham Shipyards was founded in 1941 by Arch Talbot before the Second World War in Bellingham, Washington from the merger of the Bellingham Marine Railway and the Bellingham Iron Works. During the war the shipyard produced wooden minesweepers for the United States Navy. At the time they were the largest privately owned shipyard in the United States. The yard continued operations after the war under the name Bellingham Marine. They built Minesweepers for the U.S. and Belgium Navy, and were noted for their production of the Bell Boy Boats line. The company closed in 1963.

For the first dozen years of its operations, the Roach shipyard was by far the U.S Navy's biggest contractor. Between 1873 and 1885, the yard received almost $4 million in contracts from just one Navy department, four times as much as the next largest contractor. Unfortunately, Naval contracts in this era often turned out to be liabilities for shipyards, and this would also prove to be the case for John Roach & Sons.

In 1871, the Delaware River Iron Ship Building and Engine Works was opened by John Roach through the purchase of the Reaney, Son & Archbold shipyard. The first steel ships of the U.S. Navy were built at the Roach shipyard. For the first 15 years of operation, it was the largest and most productive shipyard in the United States. More tonnage of ships were built at the Roach shipyard than its next two competitors combined.

There are currently three shipyards on San Diego Bay, National Steel and Shipbuilding Company (NASSCO), Continental Maritime of San Diego (Huntington Ingalls), and Southwest Marine (BAE Systems). NASSCO is the largest new-construction shipyard on the west coast of the United States; "specializing in auxiliary and support ships for the U.S. Navy and oil tankers and dry cargo carriers for commercial markets."

Over the course of its 37-year history, the Roach shipyard had many notable achievements to its credit. In 1874 it built "City of Peking" and "City of Tokio", the two largest gross-tonnage ships ever built in the United States to that date and the second largest in the world after the experimental British behemoth . In 1883 it constructed America's first steamer with a steel-plated hull. The yard played a key role in the so-called "Birth of the New Navy" when it built the four "ABCD ships"—the U.S. Navy's first steel ships. It also established a reputation for itself as a builder of lavishly outfitted "night boats" for the Long Island Sound trade, and in its last years, built the first three American ships to be powered by steam turbines. In total, the Delaware River Works built 179 ships between 1871 and 1908, including 10 warships for the U.S. Navy.

The Portsmouth Naval Shipyard Museum and the associated Lightship Museum are located on the downtown Portsmouth, Virginia, United States waterfront. The museum covers the 250+ year relationship with the shipyard - America's oldest and largest naval shipyard located on the Portsmouth Waterfront. The city and the shipyard have been intertwined since the founding of the Gosport Shipyard in 1767, which was later renamed Norfolk Navy Yard and finally Norfolk Naval Shipyard. This rich history is told through exhibits, hands-on programs and special events.

The San Francisco Bay Naval Shipyard was a short-lived shipyard formed in 1965 as the combination of the San Francisco Naval Shipyard (aka Hunters Point) and the Mare Island Naval Shipyard. The combined yards were the largest naval shipyard in the world, but the desired cost savings did not materialize, and the two yards reverted to separate existences in February 1970. The shipyard was used for radioactive testing when the United States was testing the atomic bomb. The site has since been contaminated. Now the Hunters Point Naval Shipyard is a Superfund site, as designated by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA). It is the Navy's job to clean up the site to "reasonable" levels to those who live adjacent to the shipyard.
question_src: 什么是美国最大的海军造船厂？
pos_context_src: 诺福克海军造船厂，通常称为诺福克海军院子，被称为NNSY，是弗吉尼亚州朴次茅斯的美国海军设施，用于建造，改建和修理海军的船只。它是属于美国海军和最多方面的最古老，最大的工业设施。院子位于伊丽莎白河（Elizabeth River），距汉普顿路（Hampton Roads）的嘴很短。
neg_context_title_src: 南卡罗来纳州查尔斯顿
特拉华河铁船建筑和发动机工程
特拉华河铁船建筑和发动机工程
朴茨茅斯海军造船厂博物馆
neg_context_src: 海军基地基萨普（Kitsap）是美国第三大海军基地，其特色是美国海军的四个核造船厂之一，这是两个战略性核武器设施之一，这是唯一能够处理Nimitz级航空母舰和海军最大的燃料燃料仓库的西海岸干船坞之一。
查尔斯顿，北查尔斯顿，鹅溪和哈纳汉是美国军方分支机构的所在地。在冷战期间，海军基地（1902-1996）成为美国第三大主港，拥有23,500名海军和海洋人员，还有13,200名平民为80多艘船和潜艇提供服务。此外，海军基地和武器站的合并设施创造了最大的美国潜艇港口。查尔斯顿海军造船厂修复了护卫舰，驱逐舰，巡洋舰，潜艇招标和潜艇。同样在此期间，造船厂对核潜艇进行了加油。
贝灵汉造船厂于1941年由塔尔伯特（Arch Talbot）于1941年在贝灵汉海军铁路和贝灵汉铁工厂的合并中于华盛顿的第二次世界大战之前成立。战争期间，造船厂为美国海军生产了木匠。当时，他们是美国最大的私人造船厂。战争后，院子以贝灵汉海军陆战队的名字继续行动。他们为美国和比利时海军建造了扫雷机，并因其生产贝尔男孩船系列而闻名。该公司于1963年关闭。
在运营的头十几年中，蟑螂造船厂是迄今为止美国海军最大的承包商。在1873年至1885年之间，院子仅从一个海军部获得了近400万美元的合同，是下一个大承包商的四倍。不幸的是，这个时代的海军合同通常是造船厂的责任，这也是John Roach＆Sons的情况。
1871年，约翰·罗奇（John Roach）通过购买Reaney，Son＆Archbold Shipyard开设了特拉华河铁船建筑和发动机工程。美国海军的第一艘钢制船是在蟑螂造船厂建造的。在运营的头15年中，它是美国最大，生产力最高的造船厂。与接下来的两个竞争对手的总和相比，在罗奇造船厂建造的船只吨位要多。
目前，圣地亚哥湾有三个造船厂，国家钢铁和造船公司（NASSCO），圣地亚哥的大陆海事（亨廷顿·英格尔斯）和西南海军陆战队（BAE Systems）。拿方是美国西海岸最大的新建船厂。 “专门为美国海军和油轮的辅助机构和支持船舶，以及用于商业市场的干货车。”

在37年的历史中，蟑螂造船厂取得了许多值得注意的成就。 1874年，它建造了“北京市”和“ Tokio之城”，这是美国有史以来建造的两艘最大的总吨位船，截至该日期，是仅次于英国实验性的英国庞然大物之后的世界第二大船只。 1883年，它建造了美国第一个用钢镀层的船体的蒸笼。当美国海军的第一批钢铁船建造了四艘“ ABCD船”时，院子在所谓的“新海军的诞生”中发挥了关键作用。它还为长岛贸易的豪华“夜艇”建造了自己的声誉，并在其最后几年建造了由蒸汽涡轮机提供动力的前三艘美国船只。总共，特拉华河工厂在1871年至1908年之间建造了179艘船，其中包括10艘美国海军的军舰。
朴茨茅斯海军造船厂博物馆和相关的灯塔博物馆位于弗吉尼亚州弗吉尼亚州滨水区的朴次茅斯市中心。博物馆涵盖了与造船厂的250多年关系 - 美国最古老，最大的海军造船厂位于朴茨茅斯海滨。自1767年Gosport造船厂成立以来，该市和造船厂就已经交织在一起，后来被更名为诺福克海军院子，最后是诺福克海军造船厂。通过展览，动手节目和特殊活动来讲述这一悠久的历史。
旧金山湾海军造船厂是一家短暂的造船厂，成立于1965年，是旧金山海军造船厂（又名猎人角）和马雷岛海军造船厂的组合。合并后的院子是世界上最大的海军造船厂，但所需的节省成本并未实现，两码在1970年2月恢复为单独存在。当美国测试原子炸弹时，造船厂被用于放射性测试。此后已被污染。现在，猎人角海军造船厂是环境保护局（EPA）指定的超级基金站点。为居住在造船厂附近的人“合理”的人们清理现场是海军的工作。
report_src: 美国最大的海军造船厂是位于弗吉尼亚州朴次茅斯的诺福克海军造船厂（Norfolk Naval Shipyard，简称 NNSY）；它不仅负责海军舰艇的建造、改建与修理，还被美国海军认定为其历史最悠久且规模最大的工业设施[1]。

question_en: What was Frances greatest victory?
pos_context_en: The Battle of Austerlitz (2 December 1805/11 Frimaire An XIV FRC), also known as the Battle of the Three Emperors, was one of the most important and decisive engagements of the Napoleonic Wars. In what is widely regarded as the greatest victory achieved by Napoleon, the "Grande Armée" of France defeated a larger Russian and Austrian army led by Emperor Alexander I and Holy Roman Emperor Francis II. The battle occurred near the town of Austerlitz in the Austrian Empire (modern-day Slavkov u Brna in the Czech Republic). Austerlitz brought the War of the Third Coalition to a rapid end, with the Treaty of Pressburg signed by the Austrians later in the month. The battle is often cited as a tactical masterpiece, in the same league as other historic engagements like Cannae or Gaugamela.
neg_context_title_en: 1994 France rugby union tour of Canada and New Zealand
France in the Eurovision Song Contest
neg_context_en: Summer campaigns saw him not only retake, sometimes with brutal reprisals, what he had lost in the "close" season, but also seek to widen his sphere of operation—and we see him in action in the Aveyron at St. Antonin and on the banks of the Rhone at Beaucaire. Simon's greatest triumph was the victory against superior numbers at the Battle of Muret—a battle which saw not only the defeat of Raymond of Toulouse and his Occitan allies—but also the death of Peter of Aragon—and the effective end of the ambitions of the house of Aragon/Barcelona in the Languedoc. This was in the medium and longer term of much greater significance to the royal house of France than it was to de Montfort—and with the battle of Bouvines was to secure the position of Philip Augustus vis a vis England and the Empire. The Battle of Muret was a massive step in the creation of the unified French kingdom and the country we know today—although Edward III, the Black Prince and Henry V would threaten later to shake these foundations.

Austria allied with its traditional rival, France, in the Diplomatic Revolution (1756); Austria, France, and Russia were all aligned against Prussia. Frederick preemptively attacked his enemies with an army of 150,000, beginning the Seven Years' War. The Austrian Army had been reformed by Kaunitz, and the improvements showed in their success over Prussia at Kolin. Frederick achieved one of his greatest victories, however, at Rossbach, where the Prussian cavalry of Friedrich Wilhelm von Seydlitz smashed a larger Franco-Imperial army with minimal casualties, despite being outnumbered two to one. Frederick then rushed eastward to Silesia, where Austria had defeated the Prussian army under the Duke of Bevern. After a series of complicated formations and deployments hidden from the Austrians, the Prussians successfully struck their enemy's flank at Leuthen, with Friedrich once again directing the battle; the Austrian position in the province collapsed, resulting in a Prussian victory even more impressive than the one at Rossbach.

Napoleon, upon ascending to First Consul of France in 1799, had inherited a chaotic republic; he subsequently created a state with stable finances, a strong bureaucracy, and a well-trained army. In 1805, Austria and Russia waged war against France. In response, Napoleon defeated the allied Russo-Austrian army at Austerlitz in December 1805, which is considered his greatest victory. At sea, the British severely defeated the joint Franco-Spanish navy in the Battle of Trafalgar on October 1805. 
This victory secured British control of the seas and prevented the invasion of Britain itself. Prussian concerns about increasing French power led to a resumption of war in October 1806. Napoleon quickly defeated the Prussians, and defeated Russia in June 1807, bringing an uneasy peace to the continent. The peace failed, though, as war broke out in 1809, and a new coalition was soon defeated.

LeMond's unexpected Tour victory resulted in significant media attention, with sports writer Nige Tassell describing it in 2017 as "now the biggest sports story of them all". Not only had LeMond overcome a significant time deficit, he had also won the Tour after coming back from a near-fatal hunting accident. Due to its small margin of victory and exciting racing, the 1989 Tour has repeatedly been named as one of the best editions in the race's history. In 2009, journalist Keith Bingham called it "the greatest Tour of them all", while Cyclingnews.com in 2013 described it as "arguably the best [Tour] there’s ever been". American media, traditionally not overly interested in cycling, made his victory headline news and TV broadcasters interrupted their regular programming to break the news. "Sports Illustrated", who named LeMond their Sportsperson of the Year, called it a "heroic comeback". A month after the Tour, LeMond also won the Road World Championship race in Chambéry, with Fignon coming in sixth. Due to LeMond's overall victory, ADR received the largest share of the prize money, at £185,700, followed by £129,000 for PDM and £112,700 for Super U.

In France, the victory was the cause of celebration, "Le Moniteur Universel" declaring that "the combat covers the French arms with glory and shows what they are capable of". Linois was proclaimed a national hero and presented with a "Sabre d'honneur" by Napoleon. The French victory over a significantly stronger British force was an unusual event in the war during which the Royal Navy had dominated at sea. Saumarez publicly represented the battle as a victory, declaring that he had "compleately succeeded in disabling the Enemy's ships", although in private he acknowledged the defeat. Historian Richard Gardiner commented that "The well trained and led French had fought hard and skillfully and a combination of weather, luck and shore support had given them the victory against a superior force of which they had captured one. It is, however, also significant that this rare British setback occurred close inshore with all the difficulties and chanciness that implied."

The 22–8 victory on 29 June was the biggest win by France over New Zealand up to then. In the second test, on 3 July, New Zealand led 20–16 with three minutes of the match remaining. As they tried to run down the clock, Philippe Saint-André started a move in his own 22 which, 65 seconds later, ended with Jean-Luc Sadourny crossing the French line to score what became known as (the try from the end of the world), giving them a 23–20 victory. It was the first time a side from the northern hemisphere had won a test series against the All Blacks.

Rick Broadbent, writing in "The Times", said that due to his victory, Franchitti should have become "a household name" and felt that his future career prospects would be unhindered. Mike Nicks in "The Observer" called Franchitti's win "the greatest of his career", while Jim McGill of "Scotland on Sunday" noted that while Formula One was promoted as the fastest and most glamorous motorsport, he wrote of his feeling that Franchitti's victory allowed CART to showcase its more "dramatic" action. Grace remarked on the possible implications of Franchitti's success on the promotion of CART in the United Kingdom, "If that doesn't sell this sport to Britain then I don't know what will." The "Stamford Mercury & Citizen" said the sound of the cars at the circuit was "one of those sporting moments which stand up the hairs on the back of your head."

Napoleon did not succeed in defeating the Allied army as thoroughly as he wanted, but historians and enthusiasts alike recognize that the original plan provided a significant victory, comparable to other great tactical battles such as Cannae. Some historians suggest that Napoleon was so successful at Austerlitz that he lost touch with reality, and what used to be French foreign policy became a "personal Napoleonic one" after the battle. In French history, Austerlitz is acknowledged as an impressive military victory, and in the 19th century, when fascination with the First Empire was at its height, the battle was revered by the likes of Victor Hugo, who "in the depth of [his] thoughts" was hearing the "noise of the heavy cannon rolling towards Austerlitz." In the 2005 bicentennial, however, controversy erupted when neither French President Jacques Chirac nor Prime Minister Dominique de Villepin attended any functions commemorating the battle. On the other hand, some residents of France's overseas departments protested against what they viewed as the "official commemoration of Napoleon," arguing that Austerlitz should not be celebrated since they believed that Napoleon committed genocide against colonial people.

France is one of the most successful countries in the Eurovision, winning the contest five times, coming second four times and coming third seven times. France was ranked first in number of victories (either alone or tied with other countries) without interruptions from 1960 to 1993. Moreover, Amina was close to victory with the song "Le Dernier qui a parlé..." in 1991, when she finished in joint first place (with the same number of points as Sweden). Therefore, the 'countback' rule applied, but both countries had an equal number of twelve points (four lots), but the victory went to Sweden, when France had fewer 10-point scores. Today, with the new rules, France would have won the competition, because they received points from more countries than Sweden. One year before, France was also close to winning with Joëlle Ursull performing Serge Gainsbourg's song "White and Black Blues". The song finished in equal second place with Ireland's entry.
question_src: 弗朗西斯最伟大的胜利是什么？
pos_context_src: 奥斯特利茨（Austerlitz）战役（1805/11弗里米尔（Frimaire an x​​iv Frc）），也被称为三位皇帝之战，是拿破仑战争中最重要，最决定性的参与之一。在被广泛认为是拿破仑取得的最大胜利中，法国的“格兰德·阿米尔”击败了由亚历山大一世皇帝和神圣罗马皇帝弗朗西斯二世领导的更大的俄罗斯和奥地利军队。这场战斗发生在奥地利帝国的奥斯特利茨镇附近（捷克共和国的现代斯拉夫科夫U Brna）。奥斯特利茨（Austerlitz）将第三联盟的战争迅速结束，本月晚些时候奥地利人签署了《普拉斯堡条约》。这场战斗通常被称为战术杰作，与其他历史性参与（如Cannae或Gaugamela）相同。
neg_context_title_src: 阿尔吉拉斯的第一场战斗
1994年法国橄榄球联盟巡回赛加拿大和新西兰
法国在欧洲电视网大赛中
neg_context_src: 夏季竞选活动不仅看到他在“结束”季节中失去了他的失败，而且还试图扩大他的运营领域，而且我们看到他在圣安东尼的大街和博伊科尔的罗恩河岸上行动。西蒙最大的胜利是在穆雷特战役中击败上级数字的胜利，这场战斗不仅看到了图卢兹及其Occitan Allies的雷蒙德（Raymond）的失败，而且还看到了阿拉贡（Aragon）的彼得（Peter of Aragon）的死，也是朗格多克（Languedoc）阿拉贡/巴塞罗那之家的有效终结。这对法国皇家大厦的中等和长期与DE Montfort的意义更大，而Bouvines战役则是确保菲利普·奥古斯都（Philip Augustus）的地位，菲利普·奥古斯都（Philip Augustus）vis vis England and the Empire。穆雷特战役是统一法国王国和我们今天所知道的国家的巨大一步，尽管爱德华三世，黑人王子和亨利五世将随后威胁要摇晃这些基金会。

奥地利在外交革命（1756年）与其传统的竞争对手法国结盟；奥地利，法国和俄罗斯都与普鲁士保持一致。弗雷德里克（Frederick）抢先地用15万人的军队袭击了他的敌人，开始了七年的战争。奥地利军队已由考尼茨（Kaunitz）改革，并在科林（Kolin）对普鲁士（Prussia）的成功中进行了改进。弗雷德里克（Frederick）在罗斯巴赫（Rossbach）取得了最大的胜利之一，尽管弗里德里希·威廉·冯·塞德利兹（Friedrich Wilhelm von Seydlitz）的普鲁士骑兵击中了一支较大的弗朗西帝国军队，但遭到极少的伤亡，尽管人数超过了两比一。弗雷德里克（Frederick）随后向东冲向西里西亚（Silesia），奥地利在那里击败了普鲁士军队，在贝弗公爵（Duke of Bevern）下。在一系列复杂的形态和部署被奥地利人隐藏起来之后，普鲁士人成功地撞到了莱森，弗里德里希再次指挥了战斗。奥地利在该省的地位崩溃了，导致普鲁士的胜利比罗斯巴赫的胜利更令人印象深刻。

拿破仑（Napoleon）于1799年登上法国首次领事，继承了一个混乱的共和国。随后，他创建了一个拥有稳定的财务状况，强大的官僚机构和一支训练有素的军队的国家。 1805年，奥地利和俄罗斯对法国发动了战争。作为回应，拿破仑在1805年12月在奥斯特利茨击败了盟军鲁索 - 奥斯特里亚军队，这被认为是他最大的胜利。在海上，英国在1805年10月在特拉法加战役中严重击败了佛朗哥 - 西班牙海军。 
这场胜利使英国对海洋的控制权，并阻止了英国本身的入侵。普鲁士对增加法国权力的担忧导致1806年10月的战争恢复。拿破仑迅速击败了普鲁士人，并于1807年6月击败了俄罗斯，给大陆带来了不安的和平。不过，随着1809年战争爆发，和平失败了，新联盟很快被击败。

伦德（Lemond）意外的巡回赛胜利引起了媒体的极大关注，体育作家尼格·塔塞尔（Nige Tassell）在2017年将其描述为“现在都是他们的最大体育故事”。莱蒙德（Lemond）不仅克服了严重的时间赤字，而且在一次近乎致命的狩猎事故中回来后，他还赢得了巡回演出。由于其胜利和激动人心的赛车幅度很小，因此1989年的巡回赛一再被任命为比赛历史上最好的版本之一。 2009年，记者基思·宾厄姆（Keith Bingham）称其为“全部最伟大的巡回演出”，而Cyclingnews.com在2013年将其描述为“可以说是有史以来最好的[巡回演出]”。传统上，美国媒体对骑自行车不太感兴趣，他的胜利头条新闻和电视广播公司打断了他们的常规节目来打破新闻。命名为年度运动员Lemond的《体育画报》称其为“英勇的复出”。巡回演出一个月后，伦德还赢得了尚贝里（Chambéry）公路世界冠军赛的冠军，而芬尼（Fignon）排名第六。由于Lemond的整体胜利，ADR获得了奖金中最大的份额，为185,700英镑，其次是PDM的129,000英镑，超级美国为112,700英镑。
